/study/scriptures/dc-testament/introduct.title: Isandulelo
text: IMfundiso neziVumelwano yinhlanganisela yezambulo zikaNkulunkulu nezimemezelo ezenziwe ngokuholwa ngumoya ezanikwa ukuze kumiswe futhi kulawulwe umbuso kaNkulunkulu emhlabeni ngezinsuku zokugcina. Nakuba izigaba eziningi ziqondiswe kumalungu eBandla likaJesu Kristu labaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina, imiyalezo, izexwayiso, neziyalo zenziwe ukuze kuzuze bonke abantu futhi ziqukethe isimemo esibhekiswe kubantu bonke yonke indawo ukuthi bezwe izwi leNkosi uJesu Kristu, ekhuluma nabo ukuze kufezwe inhlalakahle yabo emhlabeni futhi nensindiso yabo yaphakade.

Iningi lezambulo kulenhlanganisela zatholakala ngoJoseph Smith omNcane, umPhrofethi nomongameli wokuqala weBandla likaJesu Kristu labaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina. Ezinye zazikhishwe ngabanye abamlandela kubuMongameli (bheka izihloko ze Mf&V 135, 136, no 138, namaZwi aGunyaziwe 1 no 2).

Incwadi yeMfundiso neziVumelwano ingenye yemisebenzi ebhaliweyo eyamukelekile yeBandla ehambisana neBhayibheli eliNgcwele, INcwadi kaMormoni, kanye neGugu LeNani eliKhulu. Kodwa, iMfundiso neziVumelwano ihlukile ngoba ayikona ukuhunyushwa kombhalo wakudala, kodwa ingeyesikhathi samanje futhi yanikwa nguNkulunkulu ngabaphrofethi Bakhe abakhethiweyo ukuze kubuyiselwe umsebenzi Wakhe ongcwele nokumiswa kombuso kaNkulunkulu emhlabeni kulezi zinsuku. Kulezi zambulo, umuntu uzwa izwi elizothileyo kodwa eliqinisekileyo leNkosi uJesu Kristu, ekhuluma kabusha kulo uhlelo lokwengamela lokuphelela kwezikhathi; futhi umsebenzi oqaliweyo lapha ulungiselela ukuZa Kwakhe kwesiBili, ukuze kugcwaliseke futhi kuhambisane nawo wonke amagama abo bonke abaphrofethi abangcwele kusuka ekuqaleni komhlaba.

UJoseph Smith omNcane wazalwa ngomhlaka 23 Disemba 1805, eSharon, kwisiFunda iWindsor, eVermont. Ngesikhathi esemncane, wahamba nomndeni wakhe waya endaweni manje esibizwa ngeManchester, ngasentshonalanga yeNew York. Kwakungesikhathi ehlala lapho ngentwasahlobo ka1820, ngesikhathi eseneminyaka eyishumi nane ubudala, lapho abona khona umbono wakhe wokuqala, kuwo avakashelwa nguNkulunkulu, uBaba waPhakade uqobo, neNdodana Yakhe uJesu Kristu. Watshelwa kulombono ukuthi iBandla leqiniso likaJesu Kristu elalimiswe ngezikhathi zeTestamente eLisha, futhi elaliphethe ukuphelela kwevangeli, lalingasekho emhlabeni. Ezinye izambulo zikaNkulunkulu zalandela kuzo afundiswa yizingelosi eziningi; watshengiswa ukuthi uNkulunkulu wayenomsebenzi okhethekileyo ayefuna awenze emhlabeni futhi nokuthi iBandla likaJesu Kristu laliyobuyiselwa ngaye emhlabeni.

Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, uJoseph Smith wakwazi ngosizo lukaNkulunkulu ukuhumusha futhi akhiphe iNcwadi kaMormoni. Ngaleso sikhathi yena no-Oliver Cowdery bagcotshelwa kubuPhristi buka-Aroni nguJohani umBhabhadisi ngoMeyi 1829 (bheka Mf&V 13), futhi masinyane emva kwalokho bagcotshelwa kubuPhristi bukaMelkisedeki ngabaPhostoli bakudala uPetru, uJakobe, kanye noJohane (bheka Mf&V 27:12). Okunye ukugcotshwa kwalandela kukho okwanikwa izikhiye zobuphristi nguMose, u-Eliya, u-Eliyasi, kanye nabaningi abaphrofethi bakudala (bheka Mf&V 110; 128:18, 21). Loku kugcotshwa, eqinisweni, kwakungukubuyiselwa kwegunya likaNkulunkulu kumuntu emhlabeni. Ngomhlaka 6 Epreli 1830, ngokuyalelwa kwasezulwini, umPhrofethi uJoseph Smith walimisa iBandla, futhi ngaleyo ndlela iBandla leqiniso likaJesu Kristu laphinda futhi lasebenza njengebandla phakathi kwabantu, elinegunya lokufundisa ivangeli nokuphatha izimiso zensindiso. (Bheka Mf&V 20 kanye neGugu leNani eliKhulu, Joseph Smith—uMlando 1.)

Lezi zambulo ezingcwele zatholakala kuphendulwa umkhuleko, ngezikhathi zokudinga, futhi ziphuma ezimweni zempilo ezenzeka ngempela lapho okwakukhona khona abantu bangempela. UmPhrofethi nalabo ayehlangene nabo bafuna ukuholwa nguNkulunkulu, futhi lezi zambulo ziqinisa ukuthi bakuthola. Kulezi zambulo, umuntu ubona ukubuyiselwa nokwambulwa kwevangeli likaJesu Kristu nokungeniswa kohlelo lokwengamela lokuphelela kwezikhathi. Ukufudukela ngasentshonalanga kweBandla lisuka eNew York nasePennsylvania liya e-Ohio, liya eMissouri, liya e-Illinois, futhi ekugcineni liya kwisiGodi esiKhulu sasentshonalanga neMelika nemishikashika emikhulu yabaNgcwele ekuzameni ukwakha iSiyoni emhlabeni kulezizikhathi zamanje kuyatshengiswa futhi kulezi zambulo.

Eziningi izigaba zokuqala zinezindaba eziphathelene nokuhunyushwa nokhishwa kweNcwadi kaMormoni (bheka izigaba 3, 5, 10, 17, kanye no 19). Ezinye izigaba zakamuva zikhombisa umsebenzi womPhrofethi uJoseph Smith wokuhunyushwa kweBhayibheli ngokuholwa ngumoya, lapho okwatholakala khona izigaba eziningi ezikhuluma ngemfundiso ebalulekile (isibonelo, bheka, izigaba 37, 45, 73, 76, 77, 86, 91, kanye no 132, zonke eziphathelene nokuhunyushwa kweBhayibheli).

Kulezi zambulo, izimfundiso zevangeli zibekwa obala nezincazelo ngamaqiniso asemqoka njengesimilo sobuNkulunkulu, imvelaphi yomuntu, ubukhona bukaSathane, inhloso yempilo yasemhlabeni, ukubaluleka kokulalela, ukudingeka kokuphenduka, ukusebenza kukaMoya oNgcwele, izimiso nokwenziwayo okuphathelene nensindiso, lokho umhlaba odalelwe kona, izimo ezizayo zomuntu emva koVuko nokwaHlulelwa, ukungapheli kobudlelwano bomshado, nokungapheli kobudlelwano bomndeni. Kanjalo-ke, nokwembulwa kancane kohlelo lwabaphetheyo lweBandla kuyatshengiswa ngokubizwa kwababhishobhi, ubuMongameli bokuQala, umKhandlu wabayiShumi namBili, nabangamaShumi ayisiKhombisa nokumiswa kwabanye abaphathi-zikhundla abengameleyo nemigwamanda. Okokugcina, ubufakazi obunikeziwe bukaJesu Kristu—ubunkulunkulu Bakhe, ubukhulu Bakhe, ukulunga Kwakhe, uthando Lwakhe, namandla Akhe akhululayo—kwenza lencwadi ibe yigugu elikhulu kubantu bonke futhi “ibaluleke kakhulu eBandleni njenge ngcebo yoMhlaba wonke” (bheka isihloko kwi Mf&V 70).

Lezi zambulo ekuqaleni zabhalwa ngomabhalane ba Joseph Smith, futhi amalungu eBandla ayabelana ngogqozi ngama khophi ezambulo ayebhalwe ngesandla. Ukuze kwenziwe umbhalo owawuzo hlezi ukhona, omabhalane masinyane bazibhala lezi zambulo ezincwadini ezaziqukethe imibhalo elotshwe ngesandla, abaholi beBandla ababezi sebenzisa ukulungiselela izambulo ukuthi zigaywe. UJoseph Smith kanye nabaNgcwele bokuqala lezi zambulo babezithatha ngendlela efanayo naleyo ababethatha ngayo iBandla: zaziphila, zishintsha shintsha, futhi zazisazo thola okunye ukukhanya ngezambulo ezilandelayo. Babekubona futhi ukuthi kwakungenzeka ukuthi kwakukhona amaphutha ayenzeke ngokwakungeyona inhloso ngesikhathi kubhalwa izambulo futhi nangesikhathi sezilungiselelwa ukuthi zikhishwe. Ngenxa yalokho, eMhlanganweni omkhulu weBandla uJoseph Smith wacelwa ngonyaka ka 1831 ukuthi “awalungise lawo maphutha ayengawathola ngo Moya oNgcwele.”

Emva kokuthi lezi zambulo sezibuyekeziwe futhi namaphutha alungiswa, amalungu eBandla aqala ukugaya incwadi abayibiza ngokuthi yi A Book of Commandments for the Government of the Church of Christ (INcwadi yemiYalelo yokuPhathwa kweBandla lika Kristu), eyayiqukethe izambulo eziningi zokuqala zomPhrofethi. Kodwa lomzamo wokuqala wokukhipha lezi zambulo awuphumelelanga ngenxa yokuthi iqulu labantu lalibhubhisa ihhovisi labaNgcwele lokugaya elalisesi Fundeni iJackson ngomhlaka 20 Julayi, 1833.

Emva kokuzwa ngokubhujiswa kwehhovisi lokugaya elalise Missouri, uJoseph Smith kanye nabanye abaholi beBandla baqala ukwenza amalungiselelo okukhipha lezi zambulo eKirtland, e-Ohio. Ukuze alungise amanye amaphutha, acacise kahle okubhaliweyo, nokuthi akwazise ukukhula kwemfundiso yeBandla nokuhleleka kwalo, uJoseph Smith wengamela ukulungiswa kwemibhalo yezinye zezambulo ukulungiselela ukuba zikhishwe ngonyaka ka 1835 njenge Doctrine and Covenants of the Church of the Latter Day Saints (IMfundiso neziVumelwano zeBandla labaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina). UJoseph Smith wagunyaza ukuthi kukhishwe enye futhi incwadi yeMfundiso neziVumelwano, eyakhishwa emva kwezinyangana emva kokufel’ ukholo kukamPhrofethi ngo 1844.

AbaNgcwele bezinsuku zokuGcina bokuqala babe zazisa lezi zambulo futhi babezi thatha njengemi yalezo evela kuNkulunkulu. Ngolunye usuku unyaka ka 1831 usuya ngasema phethelweni, amagosa ambalwa eBandla afakaza ngesizotha ukuthi iNkosi yayifakazile kubo ngobu qiniso balezi zambulo. Lobu bufakazi bakhishwa kwenye incwadi yeMfundiso neziVumelwano yango nyaka ka 1835 njengobu fakazi baba Phostoli abayiShumi namBili:
UBufakazi boFakazi abazibonela ngokuphathelene neNcwadi yeMiyalelo yeNkosi, eyayinika iBandla Layo ngoJoseph Smith, omNcane, owakhethelwa lenhloso ngezwi leBandla:

Ngakho-ke, sizwa sithanda ukufakaza emhlabeni wonke, kukho konke okudaliweyo ebusweni bomhlaba, ukuthi iNkosi isinikile ubufakazi, ngoMoya oNgcwele esiphiwe wona, ukuthi lemiyalelo yanikwa ngentshisekelo kaNkulunkulu, futhi bonke abantu bangazuza kuyo futhi iyiqiniso ngempela.

Sinika lobu bufakazi emhlabeni, iNkosi ingumsizi wethu; futhi kungomusa kaNkulunkulu uBaba, neNdodana Yakhe, uJesu Kristu, ukuthi sivunyelwe ukuba nalelilungelo lokunika lobu bufakazi emhlabeni, esijabula kakhulu ngalo, sikhuleka eNkosini njalo ukuthi sengathi abantwana babantu bangazuza ngabo.
Amagama abayiShumi naMbili yilawa:
uThomas B. Marsh
uDavid W. Patten
uBrigham Young
uHeber C. Kimball
u-Orson Hyde
uWilliam E. McLellin
uParley P. Pratt
uLuke S. Johnson
uWilliam Smith
u-Orson Pratt
uJohn F. Boynton
uLyman E. Johnson

Kwezinye izincwadi zeMfundiso neziVumelwano ezabuya zakhishwa kamuva, kwabuye kwengezwa ezinye izambulo nezinye izindaba ezibalulekile, njengoba zazitholakala futhi zemukelwa yimihlangano yeBandla. Encwadini eyakhishwa ngonyaka ka 1876, eyalungiswa yiGosa u-Orson Pratt ngokuyalelwa ngu Brigham Young, izambulo zahlelwa ngokulandelana kwezikhathi zezehlakalo ezatholakala kuzo futhi kwabe sekwengezwa izihloko ezazichaza ngomlando wesambulo ngasinye.

Kwaqalwa ngencwadi eyakhishwa ngo1835, ukuthi kufakwe futhi izifundo eziyisikhombisa ezilandelanayo eziphathelene noNkulunkulu nokukholwa; lezi zona zanikwa isihloko esithi Lectures on Faith (IziFundo ngokuKholwa). Lezi zazilungiselwe ukusetshenziswa esiKoleni sabaPhrofethi eKirtland, e-Ohio, kusuka ngo1834 kuya ku1835. Nakuba zazinenzuzo ngokwemfundiso nokufundisa, lezi zifundo azifakwanga encwadini yeMfundiso neziVumelwano eyakhishwa ngo1921 ngoba zazinga tholakalanga noma zazinga nikwanga njengezambulo kulo lonke iBandla.

Encwadini yeMfundiso neziVumelwano eyakhishwa ngonyaka ka 1981, kwengezwa imibhalo emithathu okoku qala emlandweni. Lemibhalo kwakuyizi gaba 137 no 138, ezazichaza ngokuqavileyo okwakumayelana nensindiso yabafileyo; kanye neZwi eliGunyaziwe 2, elalazisa ngokuthi wonke amadoda afanelekile eBandla angagcotshelwa kubu phristi ngaphandle kokunaka ukuthi angawaluphi uhlanga.

Incwadi ngayinye ekhishiwe yeMfundiso neziVumelwano ilungise amaphutha abekhona phambilini futhi yabuye yengeza olunye ulwazi olusha, ikakhulukazi kulezo zingxenye zezihloko zezigaba ezinomlando. Kulencwadi kulethwe ukukhanya maqondana nezinsuku kanye namagama ezindawo kwabuye futhi kwalungiswa neminye imininingwane. Lezi zinguquko zenziwe ngenhloso yokuthi lokho okubhaliweyo kuhambisane nolwazi olusemlandweni okuyilona lona. Okunye okugqamileyo kulencwadi amabalazwe akhombisa lezo zindawo ezibalulekile lapho kwatholakala khona lezi zambulo, ngokunjalo nezithombe ezenziwe ngcono zezindawo zomlando weBandla, izinkomba, izihloko zezigaba, kanye namabal’ engwe alokho okuphakathi esambulweni ngasinye, konke okuhloswe ngakho ukuba kusizakale umfundi ngomyalezo weNkosi onikiwe kuleMfundiso neziVumelwano. Ulwazi olukhona ezihlokweni zezigaba luthathwe kwimiBhalo eLotshwe ngesandla yoMlando weBandla ngokunjalo nakwi History of the Church (UMlando weBandla) (okubizwa ndawonye ezihlokweni zezigaba njengomlando ka Joseph Smith) kanye nakwi Joseph Smith Papers (AmaPhepha ka Joseph Smith).

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/1.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 1
chapter_summary: 1–7, Izwi lesexwayiso liya kubo bonke abantu; 8–16, Ukuhlubuka nobubi bandulela ukuZa kwesiBili; 17–23, UJoseph Smith ubizwa ukuba abuyisele emhlabeni amaqiniso namandla eNkosi; 24–33, INcwadi kaMormoni iyavezwa neBandla leqiniso liyamiswa; 34–36, Ukuthula kuzothathwa emhlabeni; 37–39, Hlolani lemiyalelo.

verses.text: Lalelani, O nina bantu be bandla lami, kusho izwi la lowo ohlala phezulu, nomehlo akhe aphezu kwabantu bonke; yebo, ngiqinisile ngithi: Lalelani nina bantu bakude; futhi nani enisezi qhingini zolwandle, lalelani nonke.
Ngokuba ngiqinisile izwi leNkosi liya kubo bonke abantu, futhi akekho elizokumphunyuka; futhi akunaso elingeke libone, noma indlebe engayikuzwa, noma inhliziyo engayikuthinteka.
Futhi nabavukela iNkosi bayohlatshwa ngosizi olukhulu; ngokuba ububi babo buyo khulunywa phezu kwezindlu, nezimfihlo zabo ziyokwembulwa.
Futhi izwi lesexwayiso lizoya kubo bonke abantu, ngemilomo yabafundi bami, engibakhethe kulezi zinsuku zokugcina.
Futhi bayohamba futhi akekho oyobavimba, ngokuba mina iNkosi ngibayalile.
Bhekani, leli yigunya lami, negunya lezinceku zami, futhi nesandulela sami encwadini yemiyalelo yami, engibanike yona ukuthi bayikhiphele nina, O bantu basemhlabeni.
Ngalokho-ke, yesabani nithuthumele, O nina bantu, ngokuba lokho mina iNkosi engikushilo kubo kuyo fezeka.
Futhi ngiqinisile ngithi kini, labo abahambayo, behambisa lezi zindaba kubantu basemhlabeni, kubo amandla anikiwe ukuba babophe emhlabeni nasezulwini, abangakholwa nabavukela iNkosi;
Yebo, ngiqinisile, ukubabophela usuku lapho ulaka lukaNkulunkulu luyothululwa kwababi ngaphandle kwesilinganiso—
Kufinyelela osukwini lapho iNkosi iyokuza ukuzokhokhela wonke umuntu ngokuhambisana nomsebenzi wakhe, futhi ilinganisele wonke umuntu ngesilinganiso alinganisela ngaso umakhelwane wakhe.
Ngalokho-ke izwi leNkosi liya kubo bonke abantu emhlabeni wonke, ukuze bonke abazokuzwa bezwe:
Lungiselelani, lungiselelani lokhu okuzokuza, ngokuba iNkosi isiseduze;
Futhi intukuthelo yeNkosi iyokheleka, futhi inkemba yakhe izinelisile ezulwini, futhi izowela phezu kwabantu basemhlabeni.

Futhi ingalo yeNkosi iyokwembulwa; futhi usuku luyeza lapho labo abangayi kulizwa izwi leNkosi, noma izwi lezinceku zakhe, noma abangawa naki amazwi abaphrofethi nabaphostoli, bayo suswa phakathi kwabantu;
Ngokuba baphambukile ezimisweni zami, futhi basephulile isivumelwano sami saphakade;

Abayifuni iNkosi ukuze bamise ukulunga kwayo, kodwa wonke umuntu uhamba kweyakhe indlela, futhi ngoko mfanekiso kankulunkulu wakhe, umfanekiso wakhe lowo ofana nomhlaba, futhi osiqu sawo siyisithombe, esigugayo futhi esizoshatshalaliswa eBabiloni, ngisho iBabiloni enkulu, ezokuwa.
Ngalokho-ke, mina iNkosi, ngokwazi usizi oluzoza phezu kwabantu basemhlabeni, ngabiza inceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, futhi ngakhuluma naye ngisezulwini, futhi ngamnika imiyalelo;
Futhi ngaphinda nganika nabanye imiyalelo, ukuze bamemezele lezi zinto emhlabeni; futhi konke lokhu ukuze kugcwaliseke, okwakulotshwe ngabaphrofethi—
Izinto ezibuthaka zomhlaba zizovela futhi ziphule ezinamandla nezinqinile, ukuze umuntu angamyali umakhelwane wakhe, noma angathembeli engalweni yenyama—
Kodwa ukuze wonke umuntu akhulume egameni likaNkulunkulu iNkosi, ngisho umSindisi womhlaba;
Ukuze ukholo nalo lwande emhlabeni;
Ukuze isivumelwano sami saphakade simiswe;
Ukuze ukuphelela kwevangeli lami kumenyezelwe ngababuthaka nabafokazana emhlabeni wonke, naphambi kwamakhosi nababusi.
Bheka, nginguNkulunkulu futhi ngikukhulumile lokhu; lemiyalelo isuka kimi, futhi yanikwa izinceku zami ebuthakathakeni bazo, ngendlela yolimi lwabo, ukuze bafinyelele ekuqondeni.
Futhi kangangoba babephambuka kwakungaziswa;
Futhi kangangoba babefuna inhlakanipho babengayalwa;
Futhi kangangoba babonile babenga jeziswa, ukuze baphenduke;
Futhi kangangoba babezi thobile babengenziwa baqine, futhi babusiswe kusuka phezulu, futhi bathole ulwazi izikhathi ngezikhathi.
Futhi emva kokuthola umbhalo wamaNefi, yebo, ngisho inceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, wayengaba namandla okuhumusha ngomusa kaNkulunkulu, nangamandla kaNkulunkulu, iNcwadi kaMormoni.

Futhi nakulabo abebenikwe lemiyalelo, babengaba namandla okubeka isisekelo saleli bandla, futhi nokulikhipha ekusithekeni nasebu mnyameni, okuyilona kuphela eliyiqiniso futhi neliphilayo ibandla phezu kobuso bomhlaba wonke, mina, Nkosi, engithokozile ngalo, ngikhuluma nebandla lonke hhayi ngalinye—
Ngokuba mina iNkosi angiyikusibuka isono ngisivumele ngisho nakancane;
Nokho, lowo ophendukayo futhi ayenze imiyalelo yeNkosi uyothethelelwa;
Futhi lowo ongaphenduki, kuyena kuzothathwa ngisho naloko kukhanya asekutholile; ngokuba uMoya wami awuyiku busa njalo kumuntu, kusho iNkosi yamaBandla.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, O bantu basemhlabeni: Mina iNkosi ngizimisele ukwambula lezi zinto kubo bonke abantu;

Ngokuba angibandlululi muntu, futhi ngifuna wonke umuntu azi ukuthi usuku luza ngokushesha; ihora alikakafiki, kodwa seliseduze, lapho ukuthula kuzothathwa emhlabeni, no develi uyoba namandla phezu kombuso wakhe.
Futhi neNkosi iyokuba namandla phezu kwabangcwele bayo, futhi iyobusa phakathi kwabo, futhi iyokwehla ngokwahlulela phezu kwe-Edomi, noma umhlaba.
Yihloleni lemiyalelo, ngokuba iyiqiniso futhi ithembekile, iziphrofetho nezethembiso ezikuyo zizofezeka zonke.

Lokhu mina iNkosi engikukhulumile, ngikukhulumile, futhi angixolisi ngengikushilo; futhi noma amazulu nomhlaba kudlula, izwi lami aliyukudlula, kodwa lonke liyogcwaliseka, noma ngelami izwi noma ngezwi lezinceku zami, kuyafana.
Ngokuba bhekani, futhi bheka, iNkosi inguNkulunkulu, no Moya uyafakaza, nobufakazi buyiqiniso, futhi iqiniso lihlala phakade naphakade. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/2.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 2
chapter_summary: 1, U-Eliya uzokwambula ubuphristi; 2–3, Izethembiso zobaba zitshalwe ezinhliziyweni zabantwana.

verses.text: Bheka, ngizokwambulela ubuPhristi, ngesandla sika-Eliya umphrofethi, ngaphambi kokuza kosuku olukhulu nolwesabekayo lweNkosi.
Futhi uzotshala ezinhliziyweni zabantwana izethembiso ezenziwa kobaba, futhi izinhliziyo zabantwana ziyophendukela koyise.
Uma bekungenjalo, umhlaba wonke ungachitheka ube yize impela ekuzeni kwakhe.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/3.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 3
chapter_summary: 1–4, Indlela yeNkosi yinye ayiguquki naphakade; 5–15, UJoseph Smith makaphenduke kungenjalo uzolahlekelwa yisipho sokuhumusha; 16–20, INcwadi kaMormoni yambulelwe ukuzosindisa inzalo kaLehi.

verses.text: Imisebenzi, nezinhlelo, nezinhloso zikaNkulunkulu ngeke zavinjelwa, noma zibe yize.

Ngokuba uNkulunkulu akahambi ezindleleni ezigwegwile, akajikeli kwesokudla isandla noma sobunxele, noma aguquke kulokhu asekushilo, ngakho-ke izindlela zakhe ziqondile, futhi indlela yakhe yinye ayiguquki naphakade.
Khumbula, khumbula ukuthi akuwona umsebenzi weNkosi ovimbelekayo, kodwa wumsebenzi wabantu;

Ngokuba nakuba umuntu engaba nezambulo eziningi, futhi abe namandla okwenza eminingi imisebenzi emikhulu, kodwa uma eziqhayisa ngawakhe amandla, futhi engazinaki iziyalo zikaNkulunkulu, futhi alandele okufunwa yintando yakhe nezifiso zenyama, kufanele awe futhi athole impindiselo kaNkulunkulu olungileyo phezu kwakhe.
Bheka, uphathiswe lezi zinto, kodwa ibiqine kangakani imiyalelo yakho; futhi khumbula izethembiso ezenziwa kuwe, uma ubungayiphulanga.
Futhi bheka, kukaningi kangakanani uyiphula imiyalelo nemithetho kaNkulunkulu, futhi ulandele ukuboniswa ngabantu.
Ngokuba, bheka, ubungamele wesabe abantu kunoNkulunkulu. Nakuba abantu bengazinaki iziyalo zikaNkulunkulu, futhi bewadelela namazwi akhe—
Kodwa wena bekufanele uthembeke; futhi ubezolula isandla sakhe akusekele kuyo yonke imicibisholo evuthayo yesitha; futhi ubezokuba nawe kuzo zonke izikhathi zenkathazo.
Bheka, wena unguJoseph, futhi wakhethwa ukuthi wenze umsebenzi weNkosi, kodwa ngenxa yokuphambuka, uma ungaqapheli uzowa.
Kodwa khumbula, uNkulunkulu unesihawu; ngakho-ke, phenduka kulokho okwenzile okuphambene nomyalo engikunike wona, futhi usakhethiwe, futhi usabiziwe futhi kulomsebenzi;
Ngaphandle kokuthi wenze lokhu, uzofulathelwa ube njengabanye abantu, ungabe usabanaso isipho.
Futhi ngenkathi unika umuntu lokho uNkulunkulu ayekunike ukuthi ukuqonde namandla okuthi ukuhumushe, wanika lokho okwakungcwele ezandleni zendoda embi,
Engayinakanga imiyalelo kaNkulunkulu, futhi neyaphula nezingcwele kakhulu izethembiso ezenziwa phambi kukaNkulunkulu, futhi nencike kokwayo ukwahlulela futhi neziqhayise ngokwayo ukuhlakanipha.
Futhi lesi yiso isizathu sokuthi ulahlekelwe amalungelo akho okwesikhashana—
Ngokuba uvumele umyalelo womqondisi wakho unyathelwe kusukela ekuqaleni.
Nokho, umsebenzi wami uyoqhubeka, njengokuba ulwazi lo mSindisi luze emhlabeni, ngobufakazi bamaJuda, ngisho kanjalo-ke ulwazi ngomSindisi luyokuza kubantu bami—
Naku maNefi, nakumaJakobe, nakumaJosefa, nakumaZoramu, ngobufakazi boyise—

Futhi lobu bufakazi buyofinyelela ekwazini kwa maLamani, nokwamaLemuweli, nokwama-Ishmayeli, abalahlekelwa wukholo ngenxa yobubi boyise, labo iNkosi ebavumele ukubhubhisa abafowabo amaNefi, ngenxa yobubi babo nezinengiso zabo.
Futhi kungenxa yalesi sizathu ukuthi lezi zingcwephe zilondoloziwe, eziqukethe lemibhalo—ukuze izethembiso zeNkosi zifezeke, ezenze kubantu bayo;

Nokuze amaLamani afinyelele ekwazini oyise, futhi ukuze azi ngezethembiso zeNkosi, nokuze akholwe yivangeli futhi athembele ezenzweni ezinhle zikaJesu Kristu, futhi adunyiswe ngokholo egameni lakhe, futhi nokuthi ngokuphenduka kwawo asindiswe. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/4.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 4
chapter_summary: 1–4, Ukusebenza ngesibindi kusindisa abafundisi beNkosi; 5–6, Isimilo sobunkulunkulu sibanika ikhono lobufundisi; 7, Izinto zikaNkulunkulu kufanele ziphokophelelwe.

verses.text: Manje bhekani, umsebenzi omangalisayo usuzoqala kubantwana babantu.

Ngakho-ke, O nina enenza umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu, bonani ukuthi nimsebenzela ngayo yonke inhliziyo yenu, nangamandla, nangomqondo, nangomfutho, ukuze nime ningenacala phambi kukaNkulunkulu ngosuku lokugcina.
Ngakho-ke, uma ninentshisekelo yokusebenzela uNkulunkulu nibizelwe emsebenzini;

Ngokuba bhekani insimu imhlophe isilungele ukuvunwa; futhi bheka, lowo oshwiba isikela lakhe ngamandla akhe, yena lowo uzilondolozela ukuthi angashatshalaliswa, kodwa uzilethela insindiso emoyeni wakhe;
Futhi ukholo, ithemba, isihe, nothando, ngeso eliqonde inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu, kumnika ikhono lalomsebenzi.
Khumbula ukholo, ubumsulwa, ulwazi, ukuzithiba, isineke, umusa wobuzalwane, ubunkulunkulu, isihe, ukuzithoba, nokuzikhandla.
Cela, futhi uzophiwa; ngqongqotha, futhi uzovulelwa. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/5.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 5
chapter_summary: 1–10, Lesi sizukulwana sizothola izwi leNkosi ngoJoseph Smith; 11–18, Ofakazi abathathu bazofakaza ngeNcwadi kaMormoni; 19–20, Izwi leNkosi lizoqinisekiswa njengasezikhathini ezedlule; 21–35, UMartin Harris angaphenduka futhi abe ngomunye wofakazi.

verses.text: Bheka, ngithi kuwe, njengoba inceku yami uMartin Harris efise ubufakazi esandleni sami, bokuthi wena, nceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, unazo izingcwephe ofakaze ngazo futhi wanika ubufakazi bokuthi uzithole ngami;

Manje, bheka, lokhu uzokusho kuyena—lowo okhulume kuwe, uthe kuwe: Mina, iNkosi, nginguNkulunkulu, futhi ngikwambulele lezizinto, nceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, futhi ngikuyalile ukuthi ume njengofakazi walezi zinto;
Futhi ngenze ukuthi ungene esivumelwaneni nami, ukuthi ungazikhombisi ngaphandle kwalabo bantu engikuyale kubo; futhi awuna mandla phezu kwazo ngaphandle kokuwanikwa yimi.

Futhi unesipho sokuhumusha izigcwephe; futhi lesi yisipho sokuqala engikunike sona; futhi ngikuyale ukuba ungazenzi onesinye isipho kuze kugcwaliseke inhloso yami kulokhu; ngokuba angizukukunika esinye isipho kuze kuphele lokhu.
Ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, usizi luyokuza kubantu basemhlabeni uma bengezukuwalalela amazwi ami;
Ngokuba emuva kwalokhu uzogcotshwa futhi uhambe ukhulume amazwi ami kubantwana babantu.
Bheka, uma bengezukuwa kholwa amazwi ami, bebengezukukukholwa nawe, nceku yami uJoseph, uma kwakungenzeka ukuthi ubakhombise zonke lezizinto engizibeke kuwe.
Oh, lesisizukulwana esingakholwa nesiqine intamo—ulaka lwami luyokheleka kubo.
Bheka, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, ngizigodlile lezo zinto engizibeke kuwe, nceku yami uJoseph, ngenhloso ehlakaniphile ekimi, futhi izokwaziswa kuzizukulwane ezizayo;
Kodwa lesisizukulwane siyothola izwi lami ngawe;
Futhi ngaphezu kobufakazi bakho, ubufakazi bezinceku zami ezintathu, engiyozibiza futhi ngizigcobe, engizozibonisa lezi zinto, futhi bayohamba namazwi ami ambulwe ngawe.
Yebo, bayokwazi ngesiqiniseko ukuthi lezizinto ziyiqiniso, ngokuba ngiyokusho kubo kusuka ezulwini.
Ngizobanika amandla ukuze bakwazi ukuzibuka futhi bazibone lezizinto njengoba zinjalo;

Futhi akekho omunye engizomnika lamandla, okuthola lobu bufakazi obufanayo phakathi kwalesi sizukulwane, kulesi siqalo sokukhula nokuvela kwe bandla lami liphuma ehlane—licwebile njenge nyanga, futhi lilihle njengelanga, futhi lisabisa njengebutho nezindwangu zalo.
Futhi ngizobuthumela ubufakazi bofakazi abathathu ngokuphathelene nezwi lami.
Futhi bheka, noma wubani okholelwa emazwini ami, labo ngizoba vakashela ngesambulo so Moya wami; futhi bayozalwa ngami, ngisho ngamanzi nangoMoya—
Futhi kufanele nilinde isikhashana, ngokuba anikaka gcotshwa—
Futhi ubufakazi babo buyoba nomphumela woku lahlwa ngecala kwalesisizukulwane uma siqinisa izinhliziyo;

Ngokuba isijeziso esibhubhisayo siyothululwa phakathi kwabantu basemhlabeni, futhi siyoqubeka nokuthululwa izikhathi ezahlukene, uma bengaphenduki, umhlaba uze usale ungenabantu, futhi abantu basemhlabeni babhujiswe baphele ngokukhanya kokuza kwami.
Bheka, ngikutshela lezizinto, ngisho njengoba ngatshela abantu ngokubhujiswa kweJerusalema; futhi izwi lami liyoqinisekiswa ngalesi sikhathi njengoba laqinisekiswa phambilini.
Manje ngiyakuyala, nceku yami uJoseph, ukuba uphenduke futhi uhambe ngobuqotho phambi kwami, futhi ungabe usakuvumela ukuboniswa ngabantu;
Futhi nokuthi uqine ekugcineni imiyalelo engikuyale ngayo; futhi uma ukwenza lokhu, bheka ngikunika ukuphila okuphakade, ngisho noma ungabulawa.
Manje, ngiyaphinda, ngikhuluma nawe, nceku yami uJoseph, mayelana nendoda efuna ubufakazi—

Bheka, ngithi kuye, uyaziphakamisa futhi akazithobi ngokwanele phambi kwami; kodwa uma ezokhothama phambi kwami, futhi azithobe ngomkhuleko ojulileyo nokholo, engazenzisi, emva kwalokho ngizomvumela ukubona lezizinto afisa ukuzibona.

Futhi emva kwalokho uyobe esethi kulaba bantu balesi sizukulwane: Bhekani, ngizibonile lezizinto iNkosi ezikhombise uJoseph Smith, omNcane, futhi ngazi kahle ukuthi ziyiqiniso, ngokuba ngizibonile, ngokuba ngiziboniswe ngamandla kaNkulunkulu angesiwo awomuntu.

Futhi mina iNkosi ngiyayiyala, inceku yami uMartin Harris, ukuthi akukho ayobuye akusho kubo mayelana nalezi zinto, ngaphandle uma eyokuthi: Ngizibonile, futhi ngiziboniswe ngamandla kaNkulunkulu; futhi yiwo lawa mazwi ayowasho.
Kodwa uma ekuphika lokhu uzosephula isivumelwano avumelane ngaso nami ngaphambilini, futhi bheka, unecala.

Manje, ngaphandle kokuba azithobe futhi avume kimi lezi zinto azenzileyo ezingalungile, futhi enze isivumelwano nami ukuthi uyokuyigcina imiyalelo yami, futhi asebenzise ukholo kimi, bheka, ngithi kuye, akayikuzibona lezo zinto, ngokuba angizukumnika mibono yalezizinto engikhulume ngazo.
Futhi uma kunjalo, ngiyakuyala, nceku yami uJoseph, ukuthi uyothi kuye, akayukwenza lutho, futhi angabe esangihlupha mayelana naloludaba.
Futhi uma kunjalo, bheka, ngithi kuwe uJoseph Smith, uma sewuhumushe amanye ambalwa amakhasi uyobe usuma okwesikhashana, ngisho ngize ngikuyale futhi; emva kwalokho uyobe usuhumusha futhi.
Futhi ngaphandle kokuba wenze lokhu, bheka, ungeke usabanaso isipho, futhi ngizozithatha izinto engikuphathise zona.
Manje, ngoba ngibona abalinde ukukubhubhisa, yebo, ngiyabona ukuthi uma inceku yami uMartin Harris engazithobi futhi athole ubufakazi esandleni sami, uzowela esiphambekweni;
Futhi baningi abahleli belinde ukukubhubhisa ebusweni bomhlaba; futhi ngalesisizathu, ukuze izinsuku zakho zande, ngikunike lemiyalelo.
Yebo, ngalesi sizathu ngithe: Mana, futhi ulinde ngize ngikuyale, futhi ngizolungisa indlela yokuthi ukwazi ukufeza leyonto engikuyale ngayo.
Futhi uma uthembeka ekugcineni imiyalelo yami, uyonyuswa ngosuku lokugcina. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/6.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 6
chapter_summary: 1–6, Izisebenzi ensimini yeNkosi zizuza insindiso; 7–13, Asikho isipho esikhulu ngaphezulu kwesipho sensindiso; 14–27, Ubufakazi beqiniso bufika ngamandla oMoya; 28–37, Bheka kuKristu, futhi wenze okuhle njalo.

verses.text: Umsebenzi omkhulu nomangalisayo usuzoqala phakathi kwabantwana babantu.

Bheka, nginguNkulunkulu; linakeni izwi lami, elisheshayo futhi elinamandla, elibukhali ngaphezu kwenkemba ebukhali nhlangothi zombili, ukuhlukanisa ujuqu amalunga nomkantsha; ngakho-ke wanakeni amazwi ami.

Bhekani, insimu isimhlophe isilungele ukuvunwa; ngakho-ke, noma ubani onesifiso sokuvuna, makashwibe isikela lakhe ngamandla, futhi avune ngesikhathi kusesemini, ukuze alondolozele umoya wakhe insindiso yaphakade embusweni kaNkulunkulu.
Yebo, yilowo nalowo ozoshwiba isikela lakhe futhi avune, nguye lowo obizwe nguNkulunkulu.
Ngakho-ke, uma uzocela kimi uyothola; uma uyongqongqotha uyovulelwa.
Manje, njengoba ucelile, bheka, ngithi kuwe, ngcina imiyalelo yami, futhi ufune ukuveza futhi umise umgomo we Siyoni.
Ungafuni ingcebo kepha funa inhlakanipho, futhi bheka, imfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu uyokwambulelwa yona, futhi emuva kwalokho uyokwenziwa unothe. Bheka, lowo onokuphila okuphakade unothile.
Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, ngisho njengoba ulangazelela kimi kuyoba njalo nakuwe; futhi uma ulangazelela, uyoba oyoletha okuhle kulesi sizukulwane.
Ungasho lutho kulesi sizukulwane ngaphandle kokuphenduka; gcina imiyalelo yami, futhi ulekelele ekuvezeni umsebenzi wami, ngokwemiyalelo yami, futhi uyobusiswa.
Bheka unesipho, futhi ubusisiwe ngenxa yesipho sakho. Khumbula singcwele futhi sivela phezulu—

Futhi uma uzobuza, uyokwazi izimfihlakalo ezinkulu nezimangalisayo; ngakho-ke uyosebenzisa isipho sakho ukuze uthole izimfihlakalo, ukuze ukwazi ukuletha iqiniso kwabaningi, yebo, ubenze babone izindlela zabo eziphambukileyo.
Ungazisi ngesipho sakho kunoma ubani ngaphandle kwalabo bokholo lwakho. Ungadlali ngezinto ezingcwele.

Uma uyokwenza okuhle, yebo, futhi uqhubeke noku thembeka kuze kube sekugcineni, uyosindiswa embusweni kaNkulunkulu, oyisipho esikhulu kunazo zonke izipho zikaNkulunkulu; ngokuba asikho isipho esikhulu kunesipho sensindiso.

Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, ubusisiwe ngalokho okwenzileyo; ngokuba ubuzile kimi, futhi bheka, njengoba ujwayele ukubuza uthole umyalelo ngoMoya wami. Uma bekungenjalo, ubungeke uze endaweni okuyo ngalesisikhathi.
Bheka, uyazi ukuthi ubuzile kimi futhi ngakukhanyisela ingqondo yakho; manje ngikutshela lezi zinto ukuze wazi ukuthi ukhanyiselwe uMoya weqiniso;
Yebo, ngiyakutshela, ukuze wazi ukuthi kakho muntu owazi imicabango yakho nezinhloso zenhliziyo yakho ngaphandle kukaNkulunkulu.
Ngikutshela lezi zinto ukuze kube ubufakazi kuwe—ukuthi amazwi noma umsebenzi obuwubhala uyiqiniso.
Ngakho-ke khuthala; ume eduze nenceku yami uJoseph, ngokuthembeka, kuzona zonke izimo ezinzima angaba kuzo ngenxa yezwi.
Msole emaphutheni akhe, nawe futhi wamukele ukusolwa nguye. Bekezela; ube nesizotha; uzithibe; ube nokubekezela, ukholo, ithemba futhi nesihe.

Bheka, ungu-Oliver, futhi ngikhulume kuwe ngenxa yezifiso zakho; ngakho-ke gcina ulondoloze lamazwi enhliziyweni yakho. Thembeka uyigcine njalo imiyalelo kaNkulunkulu, ngizobe sengikusingatha ezandleni zothando lwami.
Bheka, nginguJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu. Nginguye owafika kwabami, futhi abami abangemukelanga. Nginguku khanya okukhanya ebumnyameni, futhi ubunyama abukuqondanga.
Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, uma ulangazelela obunye ubufakazi, khumbula lobo busuku mhla ukhala kimi ngenhliziyo yakho, ukuze wazi mayelana neqiniso lalezi zinto.
Angikunikanga yini ukuthula enqondweni yakho mayelana naloludaba na? Yibuphi-ke ubufakazi obukhulu ongaba nabo kunalobo obuvela kuNkulunkulu na?
Manje, bheka, usuthole ubufakazi; ngokuba uma ngikutshele izinto ezingaziwa muntu awubutholanga yini ubufakazi na?
Futhi, bheka, ngikupha isipho, uma usifisa kimi, ukuze uhumushe, ngisho njengenceku yami uJoseph.
Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, kunemibhalo equkethe eliningi ivangeli lami, egodliwe ngenxa yobubi babantu;

Manje ngiyakuyala, ukuthi uma unezifiso ezinhle—isifiso sokuzibekela amagugu ezulwini—emuva kwalokho uzobe ususiza ekuletheni ekukhanyeni, ngesipho sakho, lezo zingxenye zemibhalo engcwele yami ebezifihliwe ngenxa yobubi.
Manje, bheka, nginika wena, kanye nenceku yami uJoseph, izikhiye zalesi sipho, eziyokwembula lobu bufundisi; futhi ngemilomo yofakazi ababili noma abathathu amazwi onke ziyoqiniswa.
Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, uma benqaba ukwemukela amazwi ami, kanye nalengxenye yevangeli lami nobufundisi, nibusisiwe, ngokuba ngeke benza kini okungaphezulu kwalokho abakwenza kimi.
Futhi ngisho bengenza kini njengoba benzile kimi, nibusisiwe, ngokuba niyohlala nami enkazimulweni.
Kepha uma bengawenqabi amazwi ami, ayobekwa ngobufakazi obuyonikwa, babusisiwe, futhi ngalesosikhathi niyoba nokuthokoza ngezithelo zemisebenzi yenu.

Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, njengoba ngasho kubafundi bami, lapho ababili noma abathathu behlangene egameni lami, mayelana nodaba oluthile, bhekani, ngiyokuba khona phakathi kwabo—ngisho kanjalo-ke ngikhona phakathi kwenu.
Ningesabi ukwenza okuhle, madodana ami, ngokuba noma yikuphi enikutshalayo yikho futhi eniyokuvuna; ngakho-ke, uma nitshala okuhle niyovuna umvuzo omuhle.
Ngakho-ke, ningesabi, mhlambi omncane; yenzani okuhle; umhlaba nesihogo makuhlangane kumelane nani, ngokuba uma nakhele edwaleni lami, ngeke banqobe.
Bhekani, anginibeki cala, hambani futhi ningabe nisona; nenze ngesizotha umsebenzi enginiyalele wona.
Bhekani kimi ngayo yonke imicabango yenu; ningangabazi, ningesabi.
Bhekani amanxeba ahlaba uhlangothi lwami, kanye nezibazi ezenziwa yizipikili ezandleni nasezinyaweni zami; thembekani, nigcine imiyalelo yami, niyokudla ifa lombuso wasezulwini. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/7.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 7
chapter_summary: 1–3, UJohane oThandekayo uzophila kuze kubuye iNkosi; 4–8, UPetru, uJakobe, noJohane banezikhiye zevangeli.

verses.text: Futhi iNkosi yathi kimi: Johane, othandekayo wami, yini oyilangazelelayo na? Ngokuba uma ucela okufisayo, uzonikwa kona.
Ngase ngithi kuyo: Nkosi, nginike amandla phezu kokufa, ukuze ngiphile futhi ngiphendukisele abantu kuwe.

INkosi yase ithi kimi: Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, ngoba ulangazelela lokhu uzoqhubeka nokuphila ngize ngibuye ngisenkazimulweni yami, futhi uzophrofetha phambi kwezizwe, nezihlobo, nezilimi nakubantu.

Ngenxa yalokhu iNkosi yathi kuPetru: Uma ngivuma ukuthi aqhubeke nokuphila enyameni ngize ngibuye, kuyini lokho kuwe na? Ngokuba ulangazelele ukuphendukisela abantu kimi, kodwa wena ulangazelela ukuba uze ufike kimi ngokushesha embusweni wami.
Ngithi kuwe, Petru, bekuyisifiso esihle lesi; kodwa othandekayo wami ufise ukuthi enze okungaphezulu, noma umsebenzi omkhulu futhi phakathi kwabantu kunalokho asekwenzile phambilini.
Yebo, usethathe umsebenzi omkhulu kakhulu; ngakho-ke ngiyomenza abe ngumlilo onelangabi futhi nengelosi ethunywayo; uyosebenzela labo abayoba yizindlalifa zensindiso abahlala emhlabeni.
Futhi ngizokwenza wena umsebenzele kanye nomfowenu uJakobe; futhi kini nobathathu ngizoninika lamandla nokhiye balobu bufundisi ngize ngibuye.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, nobabili niyozuza ngokwezifiso zenu, ngokuba nobabili niyakujabulela lokho enikufisile.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/8.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 8
chapter_summary: 1–5, Isambulo sifika ngamandla oMoya oNgcwele; 6–12, Ulwazi lwezimfihlakalo zikaNkulunkulu futhi namandla okuhumusha imibhalo yakudala kufika ngokukholwa.

verses.text: U-Oliver Cowdery, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, ngesiqiniseko njengoba iNkosi iphila, enguNkulunkulu wakho nomHlengi wakho, kanjalo-ke ngesiqiniseko uyozuza ulwazi lwanoma yini oyoyicela ngokukholwa, nangenhliziyo enokuthembeka, ukholwa ukuthi uyoluthola ulwazi oluphathelene nalokho okuqoshwe emibhalweni yakudala, equkethe lezozingxenye zemibhalo engcwele okukhulunywe ngayo ngokwambulelwa ngoMoya wami.
Yebo, bheka, ngizokutshela engqondweni nasenhliziyweni yakho, ngo Moya oNgcwele, oyoza kuwe futhi noyohlala enhliziyweni yakho.
Manje, bheka, lona ngumoya wesambulo; bheka, lona ngumoya uMose ahola ngawo abantwana bakwa-Israyeli phakathi no Lwandle oluBomvu emhlabathini owomileyo.
Ngakho-ke lesi yisipho sakho; sisebenzise, futhi ubusisiwe, ngokuba siyokukhulula ezandleni zezitha zakho, njengoba, uma bekungenjalo, babeyokubulala futhi baholele nomoya wakho ekubhujisweni.
O, khumbula lawa mazwi, futhi ugcine imiyalelo yami. Khumbula, isipho sakho lesi.
Manje akusona lesi kuphela isipho sakho; ngokuba unaso esinye isipho, okuyisipho sika-Aroni; bheka, sesikutshele izinto eziningi;
Bheka, awekho amanye amandla, ngaphandle kwamandla kaNkulunkulu, angenza lesi sipho sika-Aroni sibe kuwe.

Ngakho-ke, ungangabazi, ngokuba kuyisipho sikaNkulunkulu; futhi uyosibamba ngezandla zakho, futhi wenze imisebenzi emangalisayo; futhi akukho mandla ayokwazi ukusithatha ezandleni zakho, ngokuba kuwumsebenzi kaNkulunkulu.
Futhi, ngakho-ke, noma yini oyoyicela kimi ukuthi ngikutshele yona ngalolotho, lokho ngizokunika kona, futhi uyoba nolwazi mayelana nalokho.
Khumbula ukuthi ngaphandle kokholo ungeke wenze lutho; ngakho-ke cela ngokukholwa. Ungadlali ngalezi zinto; ungaceli lokho ongafanele ukukucela.
Cela ukuthi wazi izimfihlo zikaNkulunkulu, futhi ukuze uhumushe futhi uthole ulwazi kuyo yonke imibhalo yakudala ebicashisiwe, engcwele; futhi ngokholo lwakho uyokwenzelwa kona.
Bheka, yimina engikhulume lokhu; futhi kuseyimina owakhuluma kuwena nasekuqaleni. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/9.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 9
chapter_summary: 1–6, Eminye imibhalo yakudala isazohunyushwa; 7–14, INcwadi kaMormoni ihunyushwa ngokufunda nangokuthola isiqiniseko ngokomoya.

verses.text: Bheka, ngithi kuwe, ndodana yami, ngokuba awuzange uhumushe njengalokho ucelile kimi, futhi uphinde waqala futhi ukubhalela inceku yami, uJoseph Smith, omNcane, ngisho kanjalo-ke ngifisa ukuba uqhubeke uze uqede lombhalo, engimphathise wona.
Futhi emva kwalokho, bheka, ngineminye imibhalo, engizokunika amandla ongawasebenzisela ukulekelela ukuyihumusha.
Bekezela, ndodana yami, ngokuba kuwukuhlakanipha kimi, futhi akudingekile ukuthi uhumushe kulesi sikhathi samanje.
Bheka, umsebenzi wena obizelwe ukuwenza ukubhalela inceku yami uJoseph.
Futhi, bheka, kungenxa yokuthi awuqhubekanga njengoba uqalile, ngesikhathi uqala ukuhumusha, okudale ukuthi ngilithathe leli lungelo kuwe.
Ungavungami, ndodana yami, ngokuba kuwukuhlakanipha kimi okudale ngikuphathe ngalendlela.
Bheka, awuzange uqondisise; ucabange ukuthi ngizokunika leli lungelo, ekubeni ungazange uzihluphe ngaphandle kokucela kimi.

Kodwa, bheka, ngithi kuwe, kufanele uzindle ngakho engqondweni yakho; bese ungibuza ukuthi kulungile yini, futhi uma kulungile ngiyokweza ukuthi isifuba sakho sivuthe ngaphakathi kuwe; ngakho-ke, uyozwa ukuthi kulungile.

Kodwa uma kungalungile ngeke ube naleyo mizwa, kodwa uyokuba nomqondo ongasebenzi oyokwenza ukukhohlwe lokho okuyinto engalungile; ngakho-ke, ngeke ukwazi ukubhala lokho okungcwele ngaphandle kokuthi unikwe yimi.
Manje, ukuba ubukwazile lokhu ngabe uhumushile; nokho, akudingekile ukuthi uhumushe manje.
Bheka, bekudingekile ngesikhathi uqala; kodwa usabile, futhi isikhathi sesidlulile, futhi akusadingekile manje;
Ngokuba, awuboni yini ukuthi nginike inceku yami uJoseph amandla anele, akwazile ngawo ukukhokhela isikhathi esilahlekile na? Futhi akekho kini engimlahle ngecala.
Yenza lokhu engikuyale ngako, futhi uyophumelela. Thembeka, ungasivumeli silingo.
Yima uqine emsebenzini engikubizele kuwo, futhi ngeke kulahleke ngisho nolulodwa unwele ekhanda lakho, futhi uyophakanyiswa ngosuku lokugcina. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/10.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 10
chapter_summary: 1–26, USathane ubhebhezela abantu ababi ukuba baphikisane nomsebenzi weNkosi; 27–33, Ufuna ukubhubhisa imimoya yabantu; 34–52, Ivangeli kumele liye kumaLamani nakuzo zonke izizwe ngeNcwadi kaMormoni; 53–63, INkosi izomisa iBandla Layo kanye nevangeli phakathi kwabantu; 64–70, Izoqoqela abaphendukileyo eBandleni Layo futhi ibahlenge abayithobelayo.

verses.text: Manje, bheka, ngithi kuwe, ngokuba udlulisele leyo mibhalo owawunikwe amandla okuyihumusha nge-Urimi neThumimi, ezandleni zomuntu omubi, usuyilahlile.
Futhi nawe ulahlekelwe yisipho sakho ngaso lesosikhathi, nomqondo wakho wafiphala.
Nokho, manje sesibuyiselwe kuwe futhi; ngakho-ke qiniseka ukuthi uyathembeka futhi uqhubeke kuze kube sekupheleni komsebenzi osele wokuhumusha njengoba bewuqalile.
Ungagijini kakhulu noma usebenze ngokungaphezulu kwamandla nezindlela onikwe zona ukuze ukwazi ukuhumusha; kodwa khuthala kuze kube sekugcineni.
Khuleka njalo, ukuze ube ngumqobi; yebo, ukuze umnqobe uSathane, futhi ukuze uphunyule ezandleni zezinceku zikaSathane ezisekela umsebenzi wakhe.
Bheka, bebefuna ukonakalisa udumo lwakho; yebo, ngisho nendoda obuyithembile ibifuna ukonakalisa udumo lwakho.
Futhi yilesi sizathu esenze ngithi uyindoda embi, ngokuba ubefuna ukuthatha kuwe izinto ophathiswe zona; futhi ubefuna ukushabalalisa isipho sakho.
Futhi ngokuba udlulise imibhalo ezandleni zakhe, bheka, abantu ababi bayithathile kuwena.
Ngakho-ke, uyidlulisile, yebo, lokho okwakungcwele, kwababi.
Futhi, bheka, uSathane ukufake ezinhliziyweni zabo ukushintsha amazwi owenze ukuthi abhalwe, noma owahumushile, asesukile ezandleni zakho.
Futhi bheka, ngithi kuwe, ngokuba sebewashintshile amagama, asehlukile kulokho owakuhumusha nalokho owenza ukuthi kubhalwe;
Futhi, ngalendlela, udeveli ufuna ukubeka isu lobuqili, ukuze ashabalalise lomsebenzi;
Ngokuba ukufakile ezinhliziyweni zabo ukwenza lokhu, ukuze kuthi ngokuqamba amanga bathi baku bambile emazwini owenze sengathi uwahumushile.
Ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, ngeke ngivumele ukuthi uSathane aphumelele ukufeza izinhloso zakhe ezimbi ngalesi senzo.
Ngokuba bheka, ukufakile ezinhliziyweni zabo ukukwenzisa ukuthi ulinge iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho, ngokucela ukuphinda uhumushe kabusha futhi.
Futhi, bheka, bathi ezinhliziyweni zabo—Sizobona uma uNkulunkulu emnikile amandla okuhumusha; uma kunjalo, uzophinda amnike amandla futhi;
Futhi uma uNkulunkulu emnika amandla futhi, noma ehumusha futhi, noma, ngamanye amazwi, uma eveza amazwi afanayo, bheka, nathi sinawo, futhi sesiwashintshile;
Ngakho-ke ngeke avumelane, futhi siyothi uqambe amanga emazwini akhe, nokuthi akanaso isiphiwo, nokuthi akanawo amandla;
Ngakho-ke sizokonakalisa udumo lwakhe, kanye nalomsebenzi; futhi sizokwenza lokhu ukuze singabi nokujabha ekugcineni, futhi ukuze sithole udumo lomhlaba.
Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, bagcwele uSathane ezinhliziyweni zabo; ubabhebhezela ukuthi bone ngokuphambene nalokho okuhle;
Futhi izinhliziyo zabo zonakele, futhi zigcwele ububi nezinengiso; futhi bathanda ubumnyama kunokukhanya, ngokuba izenzo zabo zimbi; ngakho-ke ngeke bacele kimi.
USathane uyababhebhezela, ukuze aholele imimoya yabo embujisweni.
Futhi ngaleyondlela usebeke isu lobuqili, ecabanga ukushabalalisa umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu; kodwa ngizokufuna lokhu ezandleni zabo, futhi kuyophenduka injabhiso nokulahlwa ngecala ngosuku lokwahlulela.
Yebo, ubhebhezela izinhliziyo zabo ukuze bawucasukele lomsebenzi.

Yebo, uthi kubo: Khohlisa abanye futhi ulale phansi ulindele ukubamba, ukuze ubulale; bheka, lokhu akulimazi. Futhi ubalutha ngalendlela, ebatshela ukuthi akusona isono ukuqamba amanga ukuze babambe lowo oqamba amanga, ukuze bonakalise udumo lwakhe.
Futhi ubalutha ngalendlela, futhi ebahola njalo aze adonsele imimoya yabo phansi esihogweni; ngaleyondlela wenza bazibambe ngolwabo ugibe.
Futhi uhamba ngalendlela ephansi phezulu eya lapha nalaphaya emhlabeni, efuna ukukhubaza imimoya yabantu.

Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, maye kulowo oqamba amanga ngenhloso yokukhohlisa ngoba ekholwa wukuthi nomunye umuntu uqamba amanga ngenhloso yokukhohlisa, ngokuba labo abanjalo abayikuxolelwa ekulungeni kukaNkulunkulu.
Manje, bheka, bawashintshile lamagama, ngokuba uSathane uthi kubo: Unikhohlisile—futhi ubalutha ngalendlela ebadukisa ukuze benze ububi, ukuze akwenze ulinge iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho.
Bheka, ngithi kuwe, ungawahumushi futhi lawo magama asesukile ezandleni zakho;

Ngokuba, bheka, ngeke baphumelele ezinhlosweni zabo ezimbi ngokuqamba amanga ukuphikisana nalawo magama. Ngokuba, bheka, uma ungaveza lawomagama afanayo bayothi uqambe amanga futhi wenze sengathi ubuhumusha, kodwa uziphikisile wena uqobo.
Futhi, bheka, bayokwazisa lokhu emphakathini, futhi uSathane uzozenza lukhuni izinhliziyo zabantu ukuze ababhebhezele ukuthi bakuthukuthelele, ukuze bangakholwa ngamazwi ami.
Ngaleyondlela uSathane unecebo lokuqeda amandla obufakazi bakho kulesi sizukulwane, ukuze umsebenzi ungaqhubeki kulesi sizukulwane.

Kodwa bheka, nakhu ukuhlakanipha, futhi ngokuba ngikutshengisa ukuhlakanipha, futhi ngikunika imiyalelo mayelana nalezizinto, okufanele ukwenze, ungakuvezi emhlabeni kuze kube uwuqedile umsebenzi wokuhumusha.
Ungamangaliswa wukuthi ngithe kuwe: Nakhu ukuhlakanipha, ungakuvezi emhlabeni—ngokuba ngithe ungakuvezi emhlabeni, ukuze ulondolozwe.
Bheka, angisho ukuthi ungakukhombisi kwabalungileyo;

Kodwa njengoba ungeke njalo wabona ukuthi ngubani olungileyo, noma njengoba ungeke njalo ukwazi ukuhlukanisa ababi kwabalungileyo, ngakho-ke ngithi kuwe, thula ngize ngibone kufanele ukwazisa ngezinto zonke emhlabeni mayelana naloludaba.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, indaba ngalezo zinto ozibhalile, ezisukile ezandleni zakho, iqoshiwe ezingcwepheni zikaNefi;
Yebo, futhi uyakhumbula kwashiwo kuleyo mibhalo ukuthi indaba enemininingwane eminingi yabhalwa ngalezi zinto ezingcwepheni zikaNefi.
Manje, ngokuba indaba eqoshwe ezingcwepheni zikaNefi inemininingwane eminingi mayelana nezinto, ngokuhlakanipha kwami, engizozazisa abantu kulendaba—
Ngakho-ke, uyohumusha imibhalo eqoshwe ezingcwepheni zikaNefi, usuka emuva uze ufike ekubuseni kwenkosi uBenjamini, noma uze ufike kulokho okuhumushile, okugcinile;
Futhi bheka, uyokwazisa emphakathini njengombhalo kaNefi; ngaleyondlela ngizobavimbela labo abashintshe amazwi ami.
Ngeke ngibavumele ukuthi bashabalalise umsebenzi wami; yebo, ngizobatshengisa ukuthi ukuhlakanipha kwami kukhulu kunobuqili bukadeveli.
Bheka, bathole ingxenye nje kuphela, noma indaba efingqiwe kaNefi.

Bheka, ziningi izinto eziqoshwe ezingcwepheni zikaNefi eziveza kabanzi ngevangeli lami; ngakho-ke, kuwukuhlakanipha kimi ukuthi uhumushe lengxenye yokuqala yemiqopho kaNefi, futhi wazise abantu bonke okubhalwe kulo msebenzi.

Futhi, bheka, sonke isigaba sokugcina salomsebenzi sinazo zonke lezozingxenye zevangeli lami ezacelwa ngabaphrofethi bami abangcwele, yebo, kanye nabafundi bami, emikhulekweni yabo ukuthi zifinyelele kulaba bantu.
Futhi ngathi kubo, ngizobapha ngokokholo lwabo emikhulekweni yabo;

Yebo, ukholo lwabo kwakuyilokhu—ukuthi ivangeli lami, engabanika lona ukuthi balishumayele ezinsukwini zabo, lifinyelele kubafowabo amaLamani, kanye nalabo bonke abase bengamaLamani ngenxa yokuhlubuka kwawo.
Manje, akukona kodwa lokhu—ukholo lwabo emikhulekweni yabo kwakuwukuthi leli vangeli kumele laziswe futhi, uma kwakungenzeka ukuthi ezinye izizwe zenze lelizwe kube ngelazo;
Futhi ngaleyondlela bashiya isibusiso kulelizwe emikhulekweni yabo, ukuze noma wubani oyokholwa yileli vangeli kulelizwe athole ukuphila okuphakade;
Yebo, ukuze kube yizwe elikhululekile kubona bonke kunoma yisiphi isizwe, izihlobo, izilimi, noma abantu.
Manje, bheka, ngokokholo lwabo emikhulekweni yabo ngizoletha lengxenye yevangeli lami kubantu bami. Bheka, angiyilethi ukuzoqeda lokho abakutholile, kodwa ukuzokwandisa.
Futhi ngenxa yalokhu ngithe: Uma lesi sizukulwane singazenzi lukhuni izinhliziyo zaso, ngizokwakha ibandla lami phakathi kwabo.
Manje angisho lokhu ukuqeda ibandla lami, kodwa ngisho lokhu ukuze ngakhe ibandla lami;
Ngakho-ke, noma wubani webandla lami akufanele esabe, ngokuba labo bayodla ifa lombuso wezulu.

Kodwa yilabo abanga ngesabi, nabangagcini imiyalelo yami kodwa abakhe amabandla abo ukuze bathole inzuzo, yebo, futhi nabo bonke labo abenza ububi futhi nabakha umbuso kadeveli—yebo, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, yilabo engizobaphazamisa, futhi engizobenza bavevezele ngaphakathi.
Bheka, nginguJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu. Ngeza kwabami, kodwa abami abangemukelanga.
Nginguku khanya okukhanye ebumnyameni, kodwa ubumnyama abukuqondanga.
Nginguye owathi—Nginezinye izimvu ezingezona ezalomhlambi—kubafundi bami, futhi baningi abangangiqondanga.
Futhi ngizobakhombisa lababantu ukuthi nganginezinye izimvu zami, futhi nokuthi zaziyigatsha lendlu kaJakobe;
Futhi ngizokwambula imisebenzi yabo emangalisayo, abayenza egameni lami;

Yebo, futhi ngizokwambula futhi ivangeli lami elashunyayelwa kubo, futhi, bheka, ngeke bakwenqabe lokho okwamukelile, kodwa bazokwandisa, futhi bayofundisa imininingwane eyiqiniso yemfundiso yami, yebo, okuyiyona yodwa imfundiso ekimi.

Futhi lokhu ngikwenzela ukuthi ngimise ivangeli lami, ukuze ingabi bikho impikiswano eningi; yebo, uSathane ubhebhezela izinhliziyo zabantu ukuze baphikisane mayelana nemininingwane yemfundiso yami; futhi kulezi zinto bayaphambuka, ngoba bayayihlanekezela imibhalo engcwele futhi abayiqondi.
Ngakho-ke, ngizokwambula kubo lemfihlakalo enkulu;
Ngokuba, bheka, ngizobaqoqa njengesikhukhukazi siqoqela amachwane ngaphansi kwamaphiko aso, uma bengeke bazenze lukhuni izinhliziyo zabo;
Yebo, uma befisa ukuza, bangeza, futhi baphuze amanzi okuphila ngaphandle kwenkokhelo.
Bheka, lena yimfundiso yami—lowo ophendukayo futhi eze kimi, nguye lowo owebandla lami.
Lowo oshumayela okungaphezulu noma okungaphansi kwalokhu, nguye lowo ongeyena owami, kodwa uphambene nami; ngakho-ke akayena owebandla lami.
Manje, bheka, lowo ongowebandla lami, futhi obekezela esebandleni lami kuze kube sekugcineni, ngiyomakhela phezu kwe dwala lami, futhi amasango esihogo awayikubanqoba.
Manje, khumbula amazwi akhe lowo ongukuphila noku khanya komhlaba, umHlengi wakho, iNkosi yakho futhi noNkulunkulu wakho. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/11.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 11
chapter_summary: 1–6, Izisebenzi ensimini zizothola insindiso; 7–14, Funa ukuhlakanipha, shumayela ukuphenduka, thembela kuMoya; 15–22, Gcina imiyalelo, futhi uwafunde amazwi eNkosi; 23–27, Ungawuphiki umoya wesambulo nowokuphrofetha; 28–30, Labo abemukela uKristu baba ngamadodana kaNkulunkulu.

verses.text: Umsebenzi omkhulu nomangalisayo usuzoqala phakathi kwabantwana babantu.
Bheka, nginguNkulunkulu; naka izwi lami, elisheshayo nelinamandla, elibukhali ngaphezu kwenkemba ebukhali nhlangothi zombili, ukuhlukanisa ujuqu amalunga nomkantsha; ngakho-ke naka izwi lami.

Bheka, insimu isimhlophe isilungele ukuvunwa; ngakho-ke, noma ubani onesifiso sokuvuna makashwibe isikela lakhe ngamandla, futhi avune ngesikhathi kusesemini, ukuze alondolozele umoya wakhe insindiso yaphakade embusweni kaNkulunkulu.
Yebo, yilowo nalowo ozoshwiba isikela lakhe futhi avune, nguye lowo obizwe nguNkulunkulu.
Ngakho-ke, uma uzocela kimi oyothola; uma uzongqongqotha uyovulelwa.
Manje, njengoba ucelile, bheka, ngithi kuwe, ngcina imiyalelo yami, futhi ufune ukuveza futhi umise inhloso ye Siyoni.
Ungafuni ingcebo kepha funa inhlakanipho; futhi, bheka, imfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu uyokwambulelwa yona, futhi emva kwalokho uyokwenziwa unothe. Bheka, lowo onokuphila okuphakade unothile.
Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, ngisho njengoba ulangazelela kimi kuyokuba njalo nakuwe; futhi, uma ulangazelela, uyokuba yindlela yokwenza okuhle kulesi sizukulwane.
Ungasho lutho ngaphandle kokuphenduka kulesi sizukulwane. Gcina imiyalelo yami, futhi ulekelele ekuvezeni umsebenzi wami, ngokwemiyalelo yami, ngokwenza lokho uyobusiswa.
Bheka, une sipho, noma uyoba nesipho uma usicela kimi ngokukholwa, ngeqiniso, ukholwa emandleni kaJesu Kristu, noma emandleni ami okhuluma nawe;
Ngokuba, bheka, yimi lona okhulumayo; bheka, ngingu kukhanya okukhanya ebumnyameni, futhi nangamandla ami ngikunika lamazwi.

Manje, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, beka ithemba lakho kulowo Moya oholela ekwenzeni okuhle—yebo, ekwenzeni ukulunga, ekuhambeni ngokuzithoba, nokwahlulela ngokulunga; futhi nguMoya wami lona.
Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, ngizokwambula kuwe okoMoya wami, oyo khanyisela ingqondo yakho, oyogcwalisa umoya wakho ngenjabulo.
Futhi emva kwalokho uyokwazi, noma ngenxa yalokhu uyokwazi, zonke izinto zanoma yini oyifisayo kimi, eziphathelene nezinto zokulunga, ngokukholwa ukholwa kimi ukuthi uzozithola.
Bheka, ngikuyala ngokuthi akufanele ucabange ukuthi ubizelwe ukushumayela kuze kube ubiziwe.
Linda isikhashana, uze ube nezwi lami, idwala lami, ibandla lami, futhi nevangeli lami, ukuze wazi kahle ngemfundiso yami.
Futhi emva kwalokho, bheka, ngokwe zifiso zakho, yebo, ngisho nangokukholwa kwakho uNkulunkulu uyokwazisa yona.
Gcina imiyalelo yami; thula; nxusa kuMoya wami;
Yebo, bambelela kimi ngenhliziyo yakho yonke, ukuze usize ekwaziseni abantu lezo zinto osekukhulunywe ngazo—yebo, ukuhunyushwa komsebenzi wami; bekezela uze ukufeze lokho.
Bheka, ngumsebenzi wakho lona, ukugcina imiyalelo yami, yebo, ngawo wonke amandla, ingqondo nangokuqina kwakho.

Ungafuni ukushumayela izwi lami, kodwa funa kuqala ukulithola izwi lami, futhi emva kwalokho ulimi lwakho luyoqaqeka; emva kwalokho, uma ulangazelela, uyokuba noMoya wami futhi nezwi lami, yebo, amandla kaNkulunkulu enza abantu bakholwe.

Kodwa manje thula; funda izwi lami eselimenyezelwe phakathi kwabantwana babantu, futhi ufunde nezwi lami elizokwambulwa phakathi kwabantwana babantu, noma lelo elihunyushwayo manje, yebo, uze ukuthole konke engizokupha abantwana babantu kulesi sizukulwane, futhi emva kwalokho zonke izinto ziyokwengezwa kulokho.
Bheka ungu Hyrum, ndodana yami; funa umbuso kaNkulunkulu, futhi zonke izinto ziyokwengezwa ngokuvumelana nokulunga.
Yakhela phezu kwedwala lami, okuyi vangeli lami;
Ungawuphiki umoya wesambulo, nalowo moya wokuphrofetha, ngokuba maye kulowo oyophika lezi zinto;
Ngakho-ke, londoloza enhliziyweni yakho izwi lami kuze kube yisikhathi engiyobona khona kufanele ukuthi uhambe.
Bheka, ngikhuluma kubo bonke abanezifiso ezinhle, futhi nabashwibe isikela labo ukuze bavune.
Bheka, ngingu Jesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu. Ngingukuphila noku khanya komhlaba.
Nginguye oweza kwabami futhi abami abangemukelanga;
Kodwa ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, bonke abangemukelayo, kubo ngizobanika amandla okuba ngama dodana kaNkulunkulu, ngisho kulabo abakholelwa egameni lami. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/12.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 12
chapter_summary: 1–6, Izisebenzi ensimini zizothola insindiso; 7–9, Bonke abafisayo futhi benamandla bangasiza emsebenzini weNkosi.

verses.text: Umsebenzi omkhulu nomangalisayo usuzoqala phakathi kwabantwana babantu.
Bheka, nginguNkulunkulu; naka izwi lami, elisheshayo futhi elinamandla, elibukhali ngaphezu kwenkemba ebukhali nhlangothi zombili, ukuhlukanisa ujuqu amalunga nomkantsha; ngakho-ke, naka izwi lami.

Bheka, insimu isimhlophe isilungele ukuvunwa; ngakho-ke, noma ubani onesifiso sokuvuna makashwibe isikela lakhe ngamandla, futhi avune ngesikhathi kusesemini, ukuze alondolozele umoya wakhe insindiso yaphakade embusweni kaNkulunkulu.
Yebo, yilowo nalowo ozoshwiba isikela lakhe futhi avune, nguye lowo obizwe nguNkulunkulu.
Ngakho-ke, uma uzocela kimi uyothola; uma uzongqongqotha uyovulelwa.
Manje, njengoba ucelile, bheka, ngithi kuwe, ngcina imiyalelo yami, futhi ufune ukuveza futhi umise inhloso yeSiyoni.
Bheka, ngikhuluma nawe, futhi nakubo bonke abanezifiso zokuveza futhi bamise lomsebenzi;
Futhi akekho noyedwa ongasiza kulomsebenzi ngaphandle uma ethobekile futhi egcwele uthando, enoku kholwa, nethemba, nesihe, enokuzithiba ezintweni zonke, kuzo zonke izinto ayophathiswa zona.
Bheka, ngingukukhanya nokuphila komhlaba, okhuluma lamazwi, ngakho-ke naka ngamandla akho, futhi emva kwalokho ubiziwe. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/13.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 13
chapter_summary: Izikhiye namandla obuPhristi buka-Aroni kubekwa obala nguJohane umBhabhadisi.

verses.text: Phezu kwenu zinceku ezisebenza nami, egameni likaMesiya ngiyani nika ubuPhristi buka-Aroni, obuphethe izikhiye zokusetshenzelwa yizi ngelosi, futhi nezevangeli lokuphenduka, nezoku bhabhadisa ngokucwiliswa ukuze kuthethelelwe izono; futhi lokhu ngeke kuphinde kuthathwe emhlabeni, kuze kube amadodana kaLevi aphinde futhi anikele umnikelo eNkosini ngokulunga.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/14.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 14
chapter_summary: 1–6, Izisebenzi ensimini zizothola insindiso; 7–8, Ukuphila okuphakade kuyisipho esikhulu kunazo zonke izipho zikaNkulunkulu; 9–11, UKristu wadala amazulu nomhlaba.

verses.text: Umsebenzi omkhulu nomangalisayo usuzoqala kubantwana babantu.
Bheka, nginguNkulunkulu; naka izwi lami, elisheshayo nelinamandla, elibukhali ngaphezu kwenkemba ebukhali nhlangothi zombili, ukuhlukanisa ujuqu amalunga nomkantsha; ngakho-ke naka izwi lami.

Bheka, insimu isimhlophe isilungele ukuvunwa; ngakho-ke, noma ubani onesifiso sokuvuna makashwibe isikela lakhe ngamandla, futhi avune ngesikhathi kusesemini, ukuze alondolozele umoya wakhe insindiso yaphakade embusweni kaNkulunkulu.
Yebo, yilowo nalowo oyoshwiba isikela lakhe futhi avune, nguye lowo obizwe nguNkulunkulu.
Ngakho-ke, uma uyocela kimi uyofumana; uma uyongqongqotha uyovulelwa.
Funa ukuveza futhi wakhe iSiyoni yami. Gcina imiyalelo yami kuzo zonke izinto.
Futhi, uma ugcina imiyalelo yami futhi ubekezela kuze kube sekugcineni uyozuza ukuphila okuphakade, okuyisipho esikhulu kunazo zonke izipho zikaNkulunkulu.

Futhi kuzokwenzeka, ukuthi uma ucela kuBaba egameni lami, unethemba ukholwa, uyothola uMoya oNgcwele, ozokunika ozokusho, ukuze ukwazi ukuma njengo fakazi ngezinto oyozizwa noyozibona, futhi nokuthi ushumayele ukuphenduka kulesi sizukulwane.
Bheka, ngingu Jesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo, eyadala amazulu nomhlaba, ukukhanya okungeke kwacashiswa ebumnyameni;
Ngalokho-ke, ukumele ngilethe ukuphelela kwevangeli lami lisuka kwabe Zizwe liya endlini ka-Israyeli.
Futhi bheka, unguDavid, futhi ubiziwe ukuthi ulekelele; nokuyinto oyothi uma uyenza, futhi uthembekile, uzobusiseka kabili ngokomoya nangokomhlaba, futhi uyoba mkhulu umvuzo wakho. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/15.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 15
chapter_summary: 1–2, Ingalo yeNkosi iphezu kwawo wonke umhlaba; 3–6, Ukushumayela ivangeli futhi usindise abantu kuyinto ebaluleke kakhulu.

verses.text: Lalela, nceku yami uJohn, futhi uzwe amazwi kaJesu Kristu, iNkosi yakho futhi nongumHlengi wakho.
Ngokuba bheka, ngikhuluma kuwe ngokuthintayo nangamandla, ngokuba eyami ingalo iphezu komhlaba wonke.
Futhi ngizokutshela lokho okungaziwa muntu ngaphandle kwami nawe kuphela—
Ngokuba izikhathi eziningi ucelile kimi ukuba wazi lokho okuyobe kubaluleke kakhulu kuwe.
Bheka, ubusisiwe ngenxa yalesisenzo, futhi nangokukhuluma amazwi ami engikunike wona ngokwemiyalelo yami.
Manje, bheka, ngithi kuwe, isenzo esiyoba ngesibaluleke kakhulu kuwe wukushumayela ngokuphenduka kulaba bantu, ukuze ulethe abantu kimi, ukuze uphumule nabo embusweni kaBaba. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/16.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 16
chapter_summary: 1–2, Ingalo yeNkosi iphezu kwawo wonke umhlaba; 3–6, Ukushumayela ivangeli futhi usindise abantu kuyinto ebaluleke kakhulu.

verses.text: Lalela, nceku yami uPeter, futhi uzwe amazwi kaJesu Kristu, iNkosi yakho futhi nongumHlengi wakho.
Ngokuba bheka, ngikhuluma kuwe ngokuthintayo nangamandla, ngokuba eyami ingalo iphezu komhlaba wonke.
Futhi ngizokutshela lokho okungaziwa muntu ngaphandle kwami nawe—
Ngokuba izikhathi eziningi ucelile kimi ukwazi lokho okuyoba okubaluleke kakhulu kuwe.
Bheka, ubusisiwe ngenxa yalesisenzo, futhi nangokukhuluma amazwi ami engikunike wona ngokwemiyalelo yami.
Manje, bheka, ngithi kuwe, isenzo esiyoba ngesibaluleke kakhulu kuwe ukushumayela ngokuphenduka kulaba bantu, ukuze ulethe abantu kimi, ukuze uphumule nabo embusweni kaBaba. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/17.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 17
chapter_summary: 1–4, Ngokholo oFakazi abaThathu bazozibona izingcwephe nezinye izinto ezingcwele; 5–9, UKristu ufakaza ngeNcwadi kaMormoni njengesuka kuNkulunkulu.

verses.text: Bheka, ngithi kini, kufanele nithembele ezwini lami, okuyothi uma nikwenza ngokuphikelela okupheleleyo, niyokwazi ukubona izingcwephe, kanye nesivikelo sesifuba, nenkemba kaLabani, ne-Urimi neThumimi, okwanikezwa umfowabo kaJarede phezulu entabeni, ngesikhathi ekhuluma neNkosi ubuso nobuso, futhi nezinti eziyisimangaliso ezikhombisa indlela ezanikezwa uLehi ngesikhathi besehlane, emngceleni woLwandle oluBomvu.
Futhi kungokholo lwenu ukuthi nizokwazi ukuzibona, ngisho ngalolokholo lwabaphrofethi basemandulo.
Futhi emva kokuba senithole ukholo, futhi senizibonile ngamehlo enu, niyofakaza ngazo, ngamandla kaNkulunkulu;
Futhi lokhu niyokwenza ukuze inceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, bangalonakalisi udumo lwakhe, ukuze ngifeze izinhloso zami ezilungileyo kubantwana babantu ngalomsebenzi.
Futhi niyofakaza ukuthi nizibonile, njengoba nenceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, ezibonile; ngokuba kungamandla ami ukuthi ukwazile ukuzibona, futhi kungoba ubenokholo.
Futhi uyihumushile incwadi, ngisho leyo ngxenye engimyalile ngayo, futhi njengoba iNkosi yenu noNkulunkulu wenu iphila kuyiqiniso.
Ngalokho-ke, niphiwe amandla afanayo, futhi nokholo olufanayo, nesipho esifanayo njengakuye;
Futhi uma niyigcina lemiyalelo yami yokugcina, engininike yona, amasango esihogo ngeke abuse phezu kwenu; ngokuba umusa wami unanele, futhi niyo phakanyiswa ngosuku lokugcina.
Futhi mina, uJesu Kristu, iNkosi yenu noNkulunkulu wenu, ngikukhulumile lokhu kini, ukuze ngifeze izinhloso zami ezilungileyo kubantwana babantu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/18.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 18
chapter_summary: 1–5, Imibhalo engcwele itshengisa ukuthi ibandla lakhiwa kanjani; 6–8, Umhlaba usuyavuthwa ebubini; 9–16, Ukubaluleka kwabantu kukhulu; 17–25, Ukuze abantu bathole insindiso, kufanele bamukele uKristu babe ngabalandeli bakhe; 26–36, Ubizo nomsebenzi wokufundisa ivangeli wabayiShumi namBili kuyambulwa; 37–39, U-Oliver Cowdery noDavid Whitmer kufanele bafune abayiShumi namBili; 40–47, Ukuze abantu bazuze insindiso, kufuneka baphenduke, babhabhadiswe, futhi bagcine imiyalelo.

verses.text: Manje, bheka, ngenxa yodaba wena, nceku yami u-Oliver Cowdery, ofise ukwazi ngalo kimi, ngikunika lawa mazwi:
Bheka, ngambulile kuwe, ngoMoya wami ezikhathini eziningi, ukuthi izinto ozibhalile ziliqiniso; ngalokho-ke uyazi ukuthi ziliqiniso.
Futhi uma wazi ukuthi ziliqiniso, bheka, ngikunikeza umyalelo, ukuthi thembela ezintweni ezibhaliweyo;
Ngokuba kuzona kubhalwe zonke izinto eziphathelene nesisekelo sebandla lami, ivangeli lami, nedwala lami.
Ngalokho-ke, uma uyokwakha ibandla lami, phezu kwesisekelo sevangeli lami nedwala lami, amasango esihogo ngeke abuse phezu kwakho.
Bheka, umhlaba uyavuthwa ebubini; futhi kuzofanele ukuthi abantwana babantu bavuswe ukuba baphenduke, abeZizwe kanye nendlu ka-Israyeli.
Ngalokho-ke, njengoba wabhabhadiswa ngezandla zenceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, ngokuphathelene nalokho engimuyale ngakho, uzifezile izinto engimuyale ngazo.

Manje, ungamangaliswa ukuthi ngimubizele ukuthi afeze inhloso yami uqobo, inhloso eyaziwa yimi; ngalokho-ke, uma eyokhuthalela ukugcina imiyalelo yami uyobusiswa ngokuphila okuphakade; futhi igama lakhe nguJoseph.

Manje, u-Oliver Cowdery, ngikhuluma nawe, kanye nakuDavid Whitmer, ngendlela yomyalelo; ngokuba, bheka, ngiyala bonke abantu yonke indawo ukuba baphenduke, futhi ngikhuluma nani, nanjengakuPawulu umphostoli wami, ngokuba nibizwe ngisho nangalolobizo olufanayo naye ayebizwe ngalo.
Khumbulani ukubaluleka kwabantu kukhulu emehlweni kaNkulunkulu;
Ngokuba, bhekani, iNkosi umHlengi wenu wezwa ukufa enyameni; ngalokho-ke wezwa ubuhlungu babo bonke abantu, ukuze bonke abantu baphenduke futhi beze kuyo.
Futhi uvukile futhi kwabafileyo, ukuze alethe bonke abantu kuye, uma bephenduka.
Futhi kukhulu kungakanani ukujabula kwakhe ngomuntu ophendukayo!
Ngalokho-ke, nibizwelwe ukuthi nishumayele ngokuphenduka kulaba bantu.

Futhi uma kwenzeka ukuthi niyosebenza zonke izinsuku zenu nishumayela ngokuphenduka kulaba bantu, futhi nilethe, umuntu oyedwa kuphela kimi, kuyoba kukhulu kangakanani ukujabula kwenu naye embusweni kaBaba!
Manje, uma ukujabula kwenu kuyoba kukhulu ngomuntu oyedwa enimlethe kimi embusweni kaBaba, kuyoba kukhulu kangakanani ukujabula kwenu uma ningaletha abantu abaningi kimi!
Bhekani, ninevangeli lami phambi kwenu, nedwala lami, nensindiso yami.
Celani kuBaba egameni lami ngokholo, nikholwa ukuthi niyonikwa, futhi niyonikwa uMoya oNgcwele, owambula zonke izinto ezifanele kubantwana babantu.
Futhi uma ningenalo ukholo, ithemba, nesihe, ngeke nenze lutho.
Ningabangi nabandla, ngaphandle kwebandla likadeveli.
Yamukelani uKristu nibizwe ngegama lakhe, futhi nikhulume iqiniso ngesizotha.
Futhi bonke abaphendukayo futhi babhabhadiswe egameni lami, elinguJesu Kristu, futhi ababekezela kuze kube sekugcineni, yibo abayosindiswa.
Bhekani, uJesu Kristu yigama elinikwe nguBaba, futhi alikho elinye igama elinikiwe umuntu angasindiswa ngalo;
Ngalokho-ke, bonke abantu kufanele bamukele igama elinikiwe nguBaba, ngokuba bayobizwa ngalelogama ngosuku lokugcina;
Ngalokho-ke, uma bengalazi igama ababizwa ngalo, ngeke bahlale embusweni kaBaba.
Manje, bhekani, kukhona abanye ababizelwe ukushumayela ivangeli lami, kwabeZizwe nakumaJuda;

Yebo, ngisho nabayishumi nambili; futhi abayiShumi namBili bayoba ngabafundi bami, futhi bayokwamukela igama lami; futhi abayiShumi namBili yilabo abayofisa ukwamukela igama lami ngokuzinikela okupheleleyo.
Futhi uma befisa ukwamukela igama lami ngokuzinikela okupheleleyo, babizelwe ukuya kuwo wonke umhlaba ukuyoshumayela ivangeli lami kubo bonke abantu.
Futhi yibo labo abagcotshwe yimi ukubhabhadisa egameni lami, ngokuvumelana nalokho okubhaliweyo;
Futhi ninakho lokho okubhaliweyo phambi kwenu; ngalokho-ke, kufanele nikufeze ngokuvumelana namazwi abhaliweyo.
Manje sengikhuluma kini, abayiShumi namBili—Bhekani, umusa wami unanele; kufanele nihambe ngokulunga phambi kwami futhi ningoni.
Futhi, bhekani, niyibo abagcotshwa yimina ukugcoba abaphristi nabafundisi; ukushumayela ivangeli lami, ngokwamandla kaMoya oNgcwele okinina, futhi ngokobizo nezipho zikaNkulunkulu kubantu;
Futhi mina, uJesu Kristu, iNkosi yenu noNkulunkulu wenu, ngikukhulumile lokhu.
Lawa mazwi akuwona awabantu noma omuntu, kodwa ngawami, ngalokho-ke, niyokufakaza ukuthi ngawami futhi akuwona awomuntu;
Ngokuba yizwi lami eliwakhulumayo kini; ngokuba ambulwe nguMoya wami kini, futhi ngamandla ami ningakwazi ukufundelana omunye komunye; futhi ngaphandle uma kungamandla ami beningeke nibe nawo;
Ngalokho-ke, ningafakaza ukuthi nilizwile izwi lami, futhi niyawazi amazwi ami.
Manje, bheka, nginika wena, u-Oliver Cowdery, kanye nakuDavid Whitmer, umsebenzi wokuthi niyofuna abayiShumi namBili, abayoba nalezo zifiso engikhulume ngazo;
Futhi ngezifiso zabo nangemisebenzi yabo niyobazi.
Futhi uma senibatholile niyobatshengisa lezi zinto.
Futhi niyowa phansi futhi nikhonze uBaba egameni lami.
Futhi kufanele nishumayele emhlabeni, nithi: Kumele niphenduke futhi nibhabhadiswe, egameni likaJesu Kristu;
Ngokuba bonke abantu kumele baphenduke futhi babhabhadiswe, futhi kungewona amadoda kuphela, kodwa nabesifazane, nabantwana asebefike eminyakeni yokuziphendulela.
Manje, ngemuva kokuba senikutholile lokhu, kufanele nigcine imiyalelo yami kuzo zonke izinto;
Futhi ngezandla zenu ngizokwena umsebenzi omangalisayo phakathi kwabantwana babantu, ukuze ngivumise abaningi ukuthi bonile, ukuze baphenduke, nokuze beze embusweni kaBaba.
Ngalokho-ke, izibusiso engininika zona zingaphezu kwezinto zonke.
Futhi ngemuva kokuba senikutholile lokhu, uma ningayigcini imiyalelo yami ngeke nisindiswe embusweni kaBaba.
Bhekani, mina, uJesu Kristu, iNkosi yenu noNkulunkulu wenu, futhi nomHlengi wenu, ngamandla oMoya wami ngikukhulumile lokhu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/19.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 19
chapter_summary: 1–3, UKristu unawo wonke amandla; 4–5, Bonke abantu kumele baphenduke noma bezwe ubuhlungu; 6–12, Isijeziso saphakade yisijeziso sikaNkulunkulu; 13–20, UKristu wazwela bonke abantu ubuhlungu, ukuze bangezwa ubuhlungu uma bephenduka; 21–28, Shumayela ivangeli lokuphenduka; 29–41, Yazisa ngezindaba ezinhle.

verses.text: Ngingu-Alfa no-Omega, uKristu iNkosi; yebo, impela nginguye uqobo, oyisiqalo nesiphetho, umHlengi womhlaba.
Mina, sengiyenzile futhi ngayifeza intando yakhe lowo engingowakhe, ngisho uBaba, mayelana nami—sengikwenzile lokhu ukuze ngithobise zonke izinto zibe ngaphansi kwami—

Ngigcine wonke amandla, ngisho okubhubhisa uSathane nemisebenzi yakhe ekupheleni komhlaba, futhi nolukhulu usuku nolokugcina lokwahlulela, engiyoluletha kubantu bawo, ngahlulela wonke umuntu ngokwe misebenzi yakhe nezenzo azenzile.
Futhi impela wonke umuntu kufanele aphenduke noma ezwe ubuhlungu, ngokuba mina, uNkulunkulu, anginasiphetho.
Ngalokho-ke, angisihoxisi isahlulelo engiyosikhipha, kodwa usizi luyothunyelwa, ukukhala, ukuklewula nokugedla kwamazinyo, yebo, kulabo abatholakala benga kwesokunxele sami.
Nokho, akubhaliwe ukuthi ngeke kube nesiphetho kulobu buhlungu, kodwa kubhalwe ukuthi obungapheli ubuhlungu.

Phezu kwalokho, kubhalwe ukuthi wusizi nobuhlungu baphakade; ngalokho-ke kugqame kakhudlwana kunakweminye imibhalo engcwele, ukuze kusebenze ezinhliziyweni zabantwana babantu, ngenhloso yokudumisa igama lami ngokupheleleyo.
Ngalokho-ke, ngizonichazela lemfihlakalo, ngokuba nifanele ukwazi ngisho njengabaphostoli bami.
Ngikhuluma nani enikhethiweyo kulokhu, njengoyedwa, ukuze ningene ekuphumuleni kwami.

Ngokuba, bhekani, imfihlakalo yobunkulunkulu, inkulu kangakanani! Ngokuba, bhekani, anginasiphelo, futhi isijeziso esiphuma esandleni sami yisijeziso esingenasiphelo, ngokuba oNgenasiphelo yigama lami. Ngalokho-ke—
Isijeziso saphakade yisijeziso sikaNkulunkulu.
Isijeziso esingenasiphelo yisijeziso sikaNkulunkulu.
Ngalokho-ke, ngikuyala ukuba uphenduke, futhi ugcine imiyalelo oyithole ngesandla senceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, egameni lami;
Futhi uyithole ngamandla ami amakhulu;

Ngakho-ke ngikuyala ukuba uphenduke—phenduka, kungenjalo ngizokushaya ngenduku yomlomo wami, nangolaka lwami, futhi nangentukuthelo yami, futhi ukuzwa kwakho ubuhlungu kube kukhulu—ubuhlungu obungakanani awazi, ukuthi bukhulu kangakanani awazi, yebo, ukuthi bunzima kangakanani ukububekezelela awazi.
Ngokuba bheka, mina, uNkulunkulu, ngibahluphekele bonke kulezi zinto, ukuze bangabuzwa ubuhlungu uma bephenduka;
Kodwa uma bengaphenduki kufanele bezwe ubuhlungu njengami;

Lokho kuzwa ubuhlungu okwenza mina, ngisho uNkulunkulu uqobo, omkhulu kunabo bonke, ngiqhaqhazele ngenxa yobuhlungu, futhi ngophe kuzo zonke iziqu zoboya, futhi ngizwe ubuhlungu emzimbeni nasemoyeni—futhi ngangifisa ukuthi ngingasiphuzi lesositsha esibabayo, futhi nginqikaza—
Nokho, udumo malube kuBaba, futhi ngaphuza ngawaqeda amalungiselelo ami ukuze kuzuze abantwana babantu.

Ngalokho-ke, ngikuyala futhi ukuba uphenduke, kungenjalo ngizokuthobisa ngamandla ami amakhulu; nokuthi uvume izono zakho, kungenjalo uzozwa ubuhlungu balezi zijeziso esengikhulume ngazo, okuncane kwako, yebo, ngisho okuncane osuke wakuzwa ngesikhathi ngisusa uMoya wami.
Futhi ngikuyala ukuba ungashumayeli okunye ngaphandle kokuphenduka, futhi ungazikhombisi lezi zinto kubantu kuze kube wukuhlakanipha kimi.
Ngokuba abakafanelwa wukudla okuqinileyo, kodwa wubisi okufanele baluthole; ngalokho-ke, akufanele bazazi lezi zinto, ukuze bangafi ngokomoya.
Funda kimi, futhi ulalele amazwi ami; hamba ngobumnene boMoya wami, futhi uzoba nokuthula kimi.
Ngingu Jesu Kristu; ngeza ngentando kaBaba, futhi ngenza intando yakhe.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiyakuyala ukuthi ungamfisi umfazi kamakhelwane wakho, noma ufise ukubulala umakhelwane wakho.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiyakuyala ukuthi ungayigodli impahla yakho, kodwa phana ngayo ukuze kucindezelwe iNcwadi kaMormoni, equkethe iqiniso nezwi likaNkulunkulu—
Okuyizwi lami kwabeZizwe, ukuze masinyane liye kumaJuda, amaLamani ayinsali yawo, ukuze akholwe yivangeli, futhi angalindeli uMesiya osazokuza osevele esefikile.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiyakuyala ukuthi uyokhuleka ngokuzwakala futhi nangenhliziyo; yebo, phambi kwabantu nasesithe, phambi kwabantu nangasese.
Futhi uyoshumayela izindaba ezinhle, yebo, yazisa ngazo phezulu ezintabeni, nakuzo zonke izindawo eziphakemeyo, naphakathi kwabo bonke abantu oyovunyelwa ukubabona.
Futhi uyokwenza lokho ngakho konke ukuzithoba, uthembela kimi, ungabethuki labo abethukayo.
Futhi mayelana nezimfundiso zenkolo ungakhulumi ngazo, kodwa uyoshumayela ngokuphenduka nokholo kumSindisi, nangokuthethelwa kwezono ngokubhabhadiswa, nangomlilo, yebo, ngisho nango Moya oNgcwele.
Bheka, lona ngumyalelo omkhulu nowokugcina engiyokunika wona mayelana naloludaba; ngokuba lokhu kuyokwanela ukuhamba kwakho imihla ngemihla, kuze kube sekupheleni kwempilo yakho.
Futhi wusizi oyoluzwa uma ungazinaki lezi ziyalo, yebo, ngisho nokufa kwakho nokonakaliswa kwempahla yakho.
Phana ngengxenye yempahla yakho, yebo, ngisho nangengxenye yomhlaba wakho, nangakho konke ngaphandle kwalokho kokondla umndeni wakho.
Khokha isikweletu ovumelene ngaso nowenza izincwadi. Zikhulule ebugqilini.
Shiya indlu nekhaya lakho, ngaphandle uma ufisa ukubona umndeni wakho;
Futhi khuluma ngokukhululeka kubo bonke; yebo, shumayela, uyale, ushumayele iqiniso, ngisho nangezwi elikhulu, ngezwi lenjabulo, umemezele uthi—Hosana, hosana, libusisiwe igama leNkosi uNkulunkulu!
Khuleka njalo, futhi ngizothulula uMoya wami phezu kwakho, futhi siyokuba sikhulu isibusiso sakho—yebo, ngisho ngaphezulu kokuthola ingcebo yezwe nokonakala kokulunga okuhambisana nayo.
Bheka, ungakufunda yini lokhu ungabi nakho ukuthokoza nokwenama enhliziyweni yakho ngenxa yenjabulo na?
Noma ungagijima kade njengomholi ongaboni na?
Noma ungazithoba ube mnene, futhi uziphathe ngokuhlakanipha phambi kwami? Yebo, woza kimi umSindisi wakho. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/20.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 20
chapter_summary: 1–16, INcwadi kaMormoni ibonisa ukuthi umsebenzi wezinsuku zokugcina uvela kuNkulunkulu; 17–28, Izimfundiso ngendalo, ngokuwa, ngenhlawulo, nangokubhabhadiswa ziyaqiniswa; 29–37, Imithetho elawula ukuphenduka, isihlanguzo, ukungcweliswa, nokubhabhadiswa ibekwa obala; 38–67, Imisebenzi yamagosa, abaphristi, abafundisi, namadikoni ibekwa kafushane; 68–74, Imisebenzi yamalungu, ukubusiswa kwabantwana, nendlela yokubhabhadisa iyembulwa; 75–84, Imikhuleko yesidlo esingcwele nemithetho elawula ubulungu beBandla iyanikezwa.

verses.text: Ukuqala kwe Bandla likaKristu kulezi zinsuku zokugcina, kuyinkulungwane namakhulu ayisishiyagalombili namashumi amathathu eminyaka selokhu kweza iNkosi nomSindisi wethu uJesu Kristu enyameni, elahlelwa futhi lamiswa ngokufaneleyo ngokuvumelana nemithetho yezwe lethu, ngentando nangemiyalelo kaNkulunkulu, kweyesine inyanga, nangolwesithupha usuku lwenyanga ebizwa ngo-Epreli—
Imiyalelo eyanikwa uJoseph Smith, omNcane, owabizwa nguNkulunkulu, wagcotshwa waba ngumphostoli kaJesu Kristu, ukuba abe yigosa lokuqala laleli bandleni;
Futhi naku-Oliver Cowdery, naye owabizwa nguNkulunkulu, umphostoli kaJesu Kristu, ukuba abe yigosa lesibili laleli bandla, futhi nowagcotshwa ngokubekwa izandla nguye;
Futhi lokhu ngokomusa weNkosi nomSindisi wethu uJesu Kristu, udumo lonke maluye kuye, manje naphakade. Amen.
Emva kokuba iNkosi isilikhombisile leligosa lokuqala ukuthi lase lithethelelwe izono, laphinda lahileka futhi ezintweni eziyize zomhlaba;

Kodwa emva kokuphenduka, nokuzithoba ngeqiniso, ngokholo, uNkulunkulu wambusisa nge ngelosi engcwele, ubuso bayo obabufana nombani, izingubo zayo ezazimsulwa futhi zimhlophe ngaphezu kwabo bonke ubumhlophe;
Futhi yamnika imiyalelo eyamshisekelisa;
Futhi yamnika amandla avela phezulu, ngezindlela ezazilungiswe ngaphambilini, ukuhumusha iNcwadi kaMormoni;
Equkethe imibhalo yabantu abawileyo, nokuphelela kwevangeli likaJesu Kristu okufanele liye kwabeZizwe nakumaJuda futhi;
Eyanikwa ngentshisekelo, futhi iqiniswa kwabanye ngokusetshenzelwa yizingelosi, futhi yaziswa yibo emhlabeni—

Okubonisa abantu ukuthi imibhalo engcwele iliqiniso, futhi nokuthi uNkulunkulu uyabafundisa abantu futhi ababizele emsebenzini wakhe ongcwele kuleminyaka nakulesi sizukulwane, njengasezizukulwaneni zakudala;
Ngalokho utshengisa ukuthi usewuNkulunkulu ofanayo izolo, nanamuhla, naphakade. Amen.
Ngakho-ke, njengoba umhlaba unobufakazi obukhulu kangaka, umhlaba uyokwahlulelwa ngabo, ngisho abaningi abayokwamukela ulwazi lwalomsebenzi emva kwalesi sikhathi.
Futhi labo abamukela lomsebenzi ngokukholwa, futhi nabenza umsebenzi wokulunga, bayonikwa umqhele wokuphila okuphakade;
Kodwa labo abaqinisa izinhliziyo zabo ngokungakholwa, futhi bewenqaba, kuyoba nomphumela wokulahwa kwabo ngecala—
Ngokuba iNkosi uNkulunkulu ikukhulumile lokhu; futhi nathi, amagosa ebandla, sizwile futhi siyafakaza ngamazwi oMkhulu nokhazimulayo ophezulu, malube kuye udumo phakade naphakade. Amen.
Ngalezi zinto siyazi ukuthi ukhona uNkulunkulu ezulwini, ongenasiphelo nophakade, kusuka phakade kuya phakade kusenguye ongaguqukiyo uNkulunkulu, umenzi wezulu nomhlaba, nakho konke okukuwo;
Futhi nokuthi wadala umuntu, owesilisa nowesifazane, ngomfanekiso nongesimo sakhe, wabadala bona;
Futhi wabanika imiyalelo yokuthi bamthande futhi bamsebenzele, okunguye kuphela uNkulunkulu ophilayo noweqiniso, nokuthi kufanele kube uyenamuntu kuphela okufanele bamkhonze.
Kodwa ngokuphambuka kulemithetho engcwele abantu baba ngabathokozisa imizwa futhi baba ngababi, futhi baba ngabawileyo.
Ngalokho-ke, uNkulunkulu uMninimandla Onke wanikela nge Ndodana yakhe eZelwe Yodwa, njengoba kulotshiwe kuleyo mibhalo engcwele eyambuliwe mayelana naye.
Wabekezelela izilingo kodwa wangazinaka.
Wabethelwa, wafa, futhi wavuka ngolwesithathu usuku;
Futhi wenyukela ezulwini, ukuze ahlale ngakwesokunene isandla sika Baba, ukuze abuse ngamandla njengokwentando kaBaba;
Ukuze lowo nalowo oyokholwa futhi abhabhadiswe egameni lakhe elingcwele, futhi abekezele ekukholweni kuze kube sekupheleni, kufanele asindiswe—

Kungebona labo kuphela abakholwa emva kokufika kwakhe maphakathi nesikhathi, enyameni, kodwa bonke labo kusuka ekuqaleni, ngisho bonke ababekhona engakafiki, ababekholwa emazwini abaphrofethi abangcwele, ababekhuluma njengokushisekeliswa yisipho soMoya oNgcwele, ababe fakaza ngaye ngeqiniso kuzo zonke izinto, kufanele babe nokuphila okuphakade;
Kanye nalabo abazofika kamuva, abayokholelwa kwizipho nobizo lukaNkulunkulu ngoMoya oNgcwele, ofakaza ngoBaba nangeNdodana;
UBaba, iNdodana, noMoya oNgcwele abawuNkulunkulu munye, ongenasiphelo futhi ongunaphakade, nongenamkhawulo. Amen.

Futhi siyazi ukuthi bonke abantu kufanele baphenduke futhi bakholwe egameni likaJesu Kristu, futhi bakhonze uBaba egameni lakhe, futhi babekezele ekukholweni egameni lakhe kuze kube sekugcineni, noma ngeke basindiswe embusweni kaNkulunkulu.
Futhi siyazi ukuthi isihlanguzo ngomusa weNkosi yethu nomSindisi uJesu Kristu silungile futhi siliqiniso;

Futhi siyazi nokuthi ukungcweliswa ngomusa weNkosi yethu nomSindisi uJesu Kristu, kulungile futhi kuliqiniso, kubo bonke labo abamthandayo nabamkhonzayo uNkulunkulu ngawo wonke amandla abo, nange ngqondo yabo, nangokuqina kwabo.
Kodwa kunokwenzeka ukuthi umuntu awe emseni futhi ahlubuke kuNkulunkulu ophilayo;
Ngakho-ke ibandla maliqaphele futhi likhuleke njalo, funa bawele esilingweni;
Yebo, futhi ngisho nalabo abangcwelisiweyo mabaqaphele nabo.
