Futhi siyazi ukuthi lezi zinto ziliqiniso futhi zingokwezambulo zikaJohane, futhi asinezezeli futhi asisusi lutho eziphrofethweni zencwadi yakhe, imibhalo engcwele, noma izambulo zikaNkulunkulu ezizofika emva kwalokhu ngesipho nangamandla oMoya oNgcwele, ngezwi likaNkulunkulu, noma ngokusetshenzelwa yizingelosi.
Futhi iNkosi uNkulunkulu ikukhulumile lokhu; udumo, namandla, nenkazimulo makunikwe igama lakhe elingcwele, manje naphakade. Amen.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngendlela yomyalo ebandleni mayelana nendlela yombhabhadiso—Bonke labo abazithobayo phambi kuka Nkulunkulu, futhi befisa ukubhabhadiswa, futhi beza ngezinhliziyo edabukileyo nemimoya ephukileyo, futhi bekhombisa ibandla ukuthi baphenduke ngeqiniso ezonweni zabo zonke, futhi bezimisele ukwemukela igama lika Jesu Kristu, besophe ukumsebenzela kuze kube sekugcineni, futhi bekhombisa ngokweqiniso ngemisebenzi yabo ukuthi sebethole ingxenye yoMoya kaKristu ngokwanele ukuze bathethelelwe izono zabo, bayokwemukelwa ngombhabhadiso ebandleni lakhe.
Lona ngumsebenzi wamagosa, abaphristi, abafundisi, amadikoni, namalungu ebandla likaKristu—Umphostoli uyigosa, futhi wubizo lwakhe ukubhabhadisa;
Futhi nokugcoba amanye amagosa, abaphristi, abafundisi, namadikoni;
Futhi nokupha isinkwa newayini—izimpawu zomzimba negazi likaKristu—
Futhi nokuqinisa labo ababhabhadiswayo ebandleni, ngokubeka izandla ekhanda ukuze babhabhadiswe ngomlilo nango Moya oNgcwele, njengokwemibhalo engcwele;
Futhi nokufundisa, nokuchasisa imibhalo, nokuyala, nokubhabhadisa, futhi nokuvikela ibandla;
Futhi nokuqinisa ibandla ngokubekwa izandla ekhanda, nokupha uMoya oNgcwele;
Futhi nokuhola yonke imihlangano.
Amagosa kufanele aphathe imihlangano njengokuholwa uMoya oNgcwele, ngokwemiyalo nezambulo zikaNkulunkulu.
Umsebenzi womphristi wukushumayela, wukufundisa, wukuchasisa imibhalo, wukuyala nokubhabhadisa, nokupha isidlo esingcwele,
Futhi bavakashele umuzi welungu ngalinye, futhi babayale ukuba bakhuleke ngokuzwakala futhi nasesithe futhi benze yonke imisebenzi yomndeni.
Futhi angabuye agcobe abanye abaphristi, abafundisi, namadikoni.
Futhi kufanele ahole imihlangano uma kungekho gosa elikhona;
Kodwa uma kukhona igosa elikhona, kufanele ashumayele kuphela, afundise, achasise imibhalo, ayale, futhi abhabhadise,
Futhi avakashele umuzi welungu ngalinye, abayale ukuba bakhuleke ngokuzwakala nasesithe futhi benze yonke imisebenzi yomndeni.
Kuyo yonke lemisebenzi umphristi kufanele alekelele igosa uma kunesidingo.
Umsebenzi womfundisi ukuvikela ibandla njalo, nokubazisa futhi nokubaqinisa;
Nokuqiniseka ukuthi abukho ububi ebandleni, nolunya phakathi kwabo, nokuqamba amanga, nenhlebo, nokukhuluma kabi;
Nokuqiniseka ukuthi ibandla lihlangana ndawonye njalo, kanye nokuqiniseka ukuthi wonke amalungu ayawenza umsebenzi wawo.
Futhi kufanele ahole imihlangano uma lingekho igosa noma umphristi—
Futhi kufanele alekelelwe njalo, kuyo yonke imisebenzi yakhe ebandleni, ngamadikoni, uma kunesidingo.
Kodwa abafundisi namadikoni abavunyelwe ukubhabhadisa, nokubusisa isidlo esingcwele, nokubeka izandla;
Kufanele, kodwa, bexwayise, bachasise imibhalo, bayale, futhi bafundise, futhi babizele bonke abantu kuKristu.

Amagosa, abaphristi, abafundisi, noma amadikoni bonke kufanele bagcotshwe ngokwezipho nobizo lukaNkulunkulu kubo ngamunye; futhi ngamunye kufanele bagcotshwe ngamandla oMoya oNgcwele, akulowo obagcobayo.
Amagosa ahlukene ayingxenye yalelibandla likaKristu kufanele ahlangane emhlanganweni kanye ezinyangeni ezintathu, noma ngezikhathi ezahlukene njengokusho noma ukunquma kwaleyomihlangano esishiwo;
Futhi imihlangano esishiwo kufanele yenze noma yimuphi umsebenzi webandla okudingeke wenziwe ngaleso sikhathi.
Amagosa kumele athole izimvumelo kumagosa amanye, ngokuvota kwebandla lapho bengabakhona, noma emihlanganweni.

Umphristi, umfundisi, noma umdikoni ngamunye, ogcotshwe ngumphristi, angathola isitifiketi kuye ngaleso sikhathi, leso sitifiketi okuyothi uma siyiswa egoseni, simnike ilungelo lemvumelo eyomgunyaza ukwenza imisebenzi yobizo lwakhe, noma angayithola emhlanganweni.
Akukho muntu okufanele agcotshwelwe kunoma yisiphi isikhundla kulelibandla, lapho kukhona igatsha lebandla elihlelwe ngokufaneleyo, ngaphandle kwevoti lalelo bandla;

Kodwa amagosa angamele, ababhishobhi abahambayo, abemikhandlu emkhulu, abaphristi abakhulu, namagosa, bangaba nelungelo lokugcobela ubuphristi, lapho kungekho gatsha lebandla lapho ivoti lingabizwa khona.
Umongameli ngamunye wobuphristi obukhulu (noma igosa elingameleyo), umbhishobhi, owomkhandlu omkhulu, nomphristi omkhulu, kufanele bagcotshwe ngokugunyaza komkhandlu omkhulu noma komhlangano omkhulu.

Lona ngumsebenzi wamalungu emva kokwamukelwa ngombhabhadiso—Amagosa noma abaphristi kufanele babe nesikhathi esanele sokuchasisa zonke izinto mayelana nebandla likaKristu ukuze baqonde, ngaphambi kokudla isidlo esingcwele nokuqiniswa ngokubekwa izandla zamagosa, ukuze zonke izinto zenziwe ngohlelo.

Futhi amalungu ayokhombisa phambi kwebandla, kanye naphambi kwamagosa, ngokuziphatha ngokulunga, ukuthi bakufanele lokhu, ukuze kube khona imisebenzi emihle nokholo ngokuvumelana nemibhalo engcwele—behamba ngobungcwele phambi kweNkosi.
Ilungu ngalinye lebandla likaKristu elinezingane kufanele lizilethe kumagosa phambi kwebandla, okufanele abeke izandla phezu kwazo egameni likaJesu Kristu, futhi azibusise egameni lakhe.
Akekho noyedwa ongemukelwa ebandleni likaKristu ngaphandle kokuba esefike eminyakeni yokukwazi ukuziphendulela phambi kukaNkulunkulu, futhi engakwazi ukuphenduka.
Umbhabhadiso kufanele wenziwe ngalendlela elandelayo kubo bonke abaphendukayo—

Umuntu obizwe nguNkulunkulu futhi onegunya elisuka kuJesu Kristu lokubhabhadisa, uyokwehlela emanzini nomuntu ozilethile ukuzobhabhadiswa, futhi uyothi, embiza ngegama lakhe: Ngokugunyazwa uJesu Kristu, ngiyakubhabhadisa egameni likaBaba, neleNdodana, nelikaMoya oNgcwele. Amen.
Uyobe esemcwilisa emanzini, aphinde aphume futhi emanzini.
Kubalulekile ukuthi ibandla lihlangane njalo ndawonye ukuzodla isinkwa newayini ukukhumbula iNkosi uJesu;
Futhi igosa noma umphristi uyokubusisa; futhi uyokubusisa ngalendlela—uyoguqa nebandla futhi abize igama likaBaba ekhuleka ngesizotha, ethi:

O Nkulunkulu, Baba waPhakade, siyakucela egameni leNdodana yakho, uJesu Kristu, ukuba ubusise futhi ungcwelise lesi sinkwa emiphefumulweni yabo bonke labo abasamukelayo, ukuze basidle bekhumbula umzimba weNdodana yakho, futhi bekhombisa kuwe, O Nkulunkulu, Baba waPhakade, ukuthi bayavuma ukubizwa ngegama leNdodana yakho, futhi bayikhumbule njalo futhi bagcine imiyalelo yayo ebanikeze yona; ukuze bahlale beno Moya wayo kubo. Amen.
Indlela yokubusisa iwayini—uyothatha isitsha, futhi athi:

O Nkulunkulu, Baba waPhakade, siyakucela egameni leNdodana yakho, uJesu Kristu, ukuba ubusise futhi ungcwelise leli wayini emiphefumulweni yabo bonke labo abaliphuzayo, ukuze bakwenze lokho bekhumbula igazi leNdodana yakho, elachithelwa bona; ukuze bakhombise kuwe, O Nkulunkulu, Baba waPhakade, ukuthi bayayikhumbula njalo, ukuze babe noMoya wayo. Amen.
Noma yiliphi ilungu lebandla likaKristu elonayo, noma elitholwa lona, liyophathwa njengokusho kwemibhalo engcwele.
Kuyokuba wumsebenzi wamabandla ahlukene, enza ibandla likaKristu, ukuthumela umfundisi wabo oyedwa noma ngaphezulu ukuyoba khona emihlanganweni emikhulu eyahlukene ebanjwe ngamagosa ebandla,

Noluhla lwamagama amalungu ahlukene azihlanganisa nebandla kusukela emhlanganweni wokugcina; noma athumele ngesandla somunye umphristi nje; ukuze uluhla oluhlala lugciniwe lwawo wonke amagama amalunga alo lonke ibandla agcinwe ebhukwini yigosa elilodwa, noma wubani oyokhethwa ngamanye amagosa ngezikhathi ezahlukene;
Futhi nokuthi, uma kukhona abaxoshiweyo ebandleni, ukuze amagama abo asulwe ebhukwini lebandla elikhulu lamagama.

Wonke amalungu athuthayo ebandleni lapho ehlala khona, uma eya ebandleni lapho engaziwa khona, angathatha incwadi eqinisekisa ukuthi angamalungu aqhuba ngendlela eyiyo futhi afanelekile, leso sitifiketi singasayinwa yinoma yiliphi igosa noma ngumphristi uma ilungu elithola incwadi lijwayelene negosa noma umphristi, noma ingasayinwa abafundisi noma amadikoni ebandla.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/21.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 21
chapter_summary: 1–3, UJoseph Smith ubizelwe ukuba umboni, umhumushi, umphrofethi, umphostoli, negosa; 4–8, Izwi lakhe lizohola umgomo weSiyoni; 9–12, AbaNgcwele bazowakholwa amazwi akhe nanini uma ekhuluma ngoMduduzi.

verses.text: Bheka, kuyokuba nombhalo oyogcinwa phakathi kwenu; futhi kuwo uyobizwa ngomboni, umhumushi, umphrofethi, umphostoli kaJesu Kristu, igosa lebandla ngentando kaNkulunkulu uBaba, nangomusa weNkosi yenu uJesu Kristu,
Oshisekeliswe nguMoya oNgcwele ukubeka isisekelo salo, futhi nokulakhela ekukholweni okungcwele kakhulu.
Lelo bandla elahlelwa futhi lamiswa ngonyaka weNkosi yenu wamakhulu ayishumi nesishiyagalombili namashumi amathathu, ngenyanga yesine, futhi ngosuku lwesithupha lwenyanga ebizwa ngokuthi u-Epreli.
Ngalokho-ke, ngisho ibandla, niyowanaka wonke amazwi akhe nemiyalelo ayoninikeza yona nanini uma eyinikwa, nihamba ngobungcwele bonke phambi kwami;
Ngamanye amagama izwi lakhe niyolamukela, kube sengathi liphuma kowami umlomo, ngokubekezela konke nangokukholwa konke.

Ngokuba ngokwenza lezi zinto amasango esihogo ngeke abuse phezu kwenu; yebo, futhi iNkosi uNkulunkulu izowachitha amandla obumnyama iwasuse phambi kwenu, futhi yenze amazulu azamazame ukuze nizuze, nokudumisa igama lakhe.
Ngokuba isho kanje iNkosi uNkulunkulu: Yena ngimshisekelisile ukuba ahambise umgomo we Siyoni ngamandla amakhulu ukuze nizuze, futhi ukukhuthala kwakhe ngiyakwazi, nemikhuleko yakhe ngiyizwile.

Yebo, ukulilela kwakhe iSiyoni ngikubonile, futhi ngizokwenza ukuthi angabe esaqhubeka nokuyililela; ngokuba izinsuku zakhe zokuthokoza sezifikile ngenxa yokuthethelelwa kwezono zakhe, futhi nokubonakaliswa kwezibusiso zami phezu kwemisebenzi yakhe.

Ngokuba, bhekani, ngiyoba busisa bonke labo abasebenza ensimini yami ngesibusiso esikhulu, futhi bayokholelwa emazwini akhe, anikwe wona ngami nguMduduzi, owambula ukuthi uJesu wabethelwa ngabantu ababi ukuze kukhokhelwe izono zomhlaba, yebo, ukuze kuthethelelwe izono kulabo abanezinhliziyo ezidabukileyo.
Ngalokho-ke kuyintando yami ukuba agcotshwe nguwe, u-Oliver Cowdery mphostoli wami;
Lokhu okuyisimiso kuwe, ukuthi uyigosa ngaphansi kwesandla sakhe, yena abe ngowokuqala kuwe, ukuze ube yigosa kuleli bandla likaKristu, elaziwa ngegama lami—
Futhi ungumshumayeli wokuqala walelibandla ebandleni, naphambi komhlaba, yebo, phambi kwabeZizwe; yebo, futhi isho kanje iNkosi uNkulunkulu, bheka, bheka! naku maJuda futhi. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/22.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 22
chapter_summary: 1, Umbhabhadiso uyisivumelwano esisha nesaphakade; 2–4, Umbhabhadiso owenziwe ngegunya elifanele udingekile.

verses.text: Bhekani, ngithi kini ngenze ukuba zonke izivumelwano ezindala ziyekwe kulokhu, futhi lesi yisivumelwano esisha nesaphakade, ngisho lokho okwakukhona kwasekuqaleni.
Ngalokho-ke, nakuba umuntu angabhabhadiswa kaningi akumenzeli lutho, ngokuba ngeke ningene ngesango eliqondile ngomthetho kaMose, nangemisebenzi yenu efile.
Ngokuba kungenxa yemisebenzi yenu efile eyenze ukuba ngenze lesi sivumelwano sokugcina naleli bandla ukuba lakhelwe mina, ngisho njengasezinsukwini zasemandulo.
Ngalokho-ke, ngenani ngesango, njengoba ngiyalile, futhi ningafuni ukweluleka uNkulunkulu wenu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/23.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 23
chapter_summary: 1–7, Laba bafundi bokuqala babizelwa ukuba bashumayele, bayale, futhi baqinise iBandla.

verses.text: Bheka, ngikhuluma kuwe, Oliver, amazwi ambalwa. Bheka, ubusisiwe, futhi awubekwe cala. Kodwa qaphela ukuzikhukhumeza, kungenjalo uzongena ekulingweni.
Yazisa ubizo lwakho ebandleni, kanye naphambi komhlaba, futhi inhliziyo yakho izovuleka ukushumayela iqiniso kusuka manje naphakade. Amen.

Bheka, ngikhuluma kuwe, Hyrum, amazwi ambalwa; ngoba nawe futhi awubekwe cala, futhi inhliziyo yakho ivulekile, nolimi lwakho luqaqiwe; ubizo lwakho ukuyala, nokuqinisa ibandla njalonjalo. Ngalokho-ke umsebenzi wakho usebandleni ingunaphakade, futhi lokhu kungenxa yomndeni wakho. Amen.
Bheka, ngikhuluma amazwi ambalwa kuwe, Samuel; ngokuba nawe futhi awubekwe cala, futhi olwakho ubizo ukuyala, nokuqinisa ibandla; futhi wena awukabizelwa ukushumayela okwamanje phambi komhlaba. Amen.
Bheka, ngikhuluma amazwi ambalwa kuwe, Joseph; ngokuba nawe futhi awubekwe cala, futhi olwakho ubizo ukuyala, nokuqinisa ibandla; futhi lona umsebenzi wakho kusuka manje naphakade. Amen.

Bheka, ngambula kuwe, Joseph Knight, ngalamazwi, ukuthi kumele uthathe isiphambano sakho, ngoku khuleka ngokuzwakala phambi komhlaba nangasese, emndenini wakho, naphakathi kwabangani bakho, nakuzo zonke izindawo.
Futhi, bheka, kuwumsebenzi wakho ukuhlangana nebandla leqiniso, futhi ukhulume ngokuyala njalonjalo, ukuze uyithole inkokhelo yesisebenzi. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/24.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 24
chapter_summary: 1–9, UJoseph Smith ubizelwa ukuhumusha, ukushumayela, ukuchasisa imibhalo engcwele; 10–12, U-Oliver Cowdery ubizelwe ukushumayela ivangeli; 13–19, Umthetho uyambulwa ophathelene nezimangaliso, ukuqalekisa, ukuthuntutha uthuli ezinyaweni, futhi nokuhamba ungaphethe sikhwama semali noma isikhwama.

verses.text: Bheka, wabizelwa futhi wakhethelwa ukubhala iNcwadi kaMormoni, nasebufundisini bami; futhi ngikuphakamisile ngakukhipha ezinhluphekweni zakho, futhi ngikufundisile, ngaleyondlela usukhululiwe kuzona zonke izitha zakho, futhi ukhululiwe emandleni kaSathane nasebumnyameni!
Nokho, awunakuxolelwa eziphambekweni zakho; nokho, hamba indlela yakho ungabe usona futhi.

Khulisa isikhundla sakho; futhi emva kokuba usutshalile amasimu akho futhi wawavikela, hamba ngokushesha uye ebandleni eColesville, eFayette, naseManchester, futhi bayokusekela; nami ngiyobabusisa ngokomoya nangokwasemhlabeni;
Kodwa uma bengakwamukeli, ngiyothumela phezu kwabo isiqalekiso esikhundleni sesibusiso.
Futhi qhubeka nokunxusa kuNkulunkulu egameni lami, futhi ubhale izinto ozonikezwa zona nguMduduzi, futhi uchasise yonke imibhalo engcwele ebandleni.
Futhi uzonikwa ngaso lesosikhathi ozokukhuluma nozokubhala, futhi bayokuzwa lokho, noma ngizothumela kubo isiqalekiso esikhundleni sesibusiso.
Ngokuba uyonikela wonke umsebenzi wakho kwiSiyoni; futhi kulokhu uyoba namandla.
Bekezela ezinhluphekweni, ngokuba usazoba neziningi; kodwa zibekezelele, ngokuba, bheka, nginawe, kuze kube sekupheleni kwezinsuku zakho.

Futhi emisebenzini yasemhlabeni awuyikuba nawo amandla, ngokuba lokhu akulona ubizo lwakho. Yenza ubizo lwakho futhi uyokuthola oyokhulisa ngakho isikhundla sakho, futhi uchasise yonke imibhalo engcwele, futhi uqhubeke ukubeka izandla nokuqinisa amabandla.
Futhi umfowenu u-Oliver uzoqhubeka nokufakaza ngegama lami phambi komhlaba, kanye nasebandleni. Futhi angacabangi ukuthi angasho okwanele kokuthandwa yimi; futhi bheka, nginaye kuze kube sekupheleni.
Ngami uzoba nodumo, futhi hhayi ngokwakhe, noma esebuthakathakeni noma esemandleni, noma esebugqilini noma esekukhululekeni;
Futhi ngazo zonke izikhathi, futhi kuzo zonke izindawo, uzovula umlomo wakhe futhi azise ngevangeli lami njengezwi lecilongo, emini nasebusuku. Futhi ngizomnika amandla angakaze aziwe muntu.
Ningafuni izimangaliso, ngaphandle uma ngizoniyala, ngaphandle kokukhipha amadimoni, ukulapha abagulayo, futhi nokumelana nezinyoka ezinobuthi, futhi nokumelana nobubulalayo ubuthi;
Futhi lezi zinto aniyukuzenza, ngaphandle uma kufunwa kini yilabo abakufisayo, ukuze imibhalo engcwele igcwaliseke; ngokuba niyokwenza njengoba kulotshiwe.

Futhi kunoma iyiphi indawo eniyongena kuyo, futhi banganamukeli egameni lami, niyoshiya isiqalekiso esikhundleni sesibusiso, ngokuthuntutha uthuli lwezinyawo zenu ngokumelene nabo njengobufakazi, futhi nihlanze izinyawo zenu endleleni.
Futhi kuyokwenzeka ukuthi noma ubani oyobeka isandla phezu kwenu ngodlame, niyoyala ukuba bashaywe egameni lami; futhi, bheka, ngiyobashaya njengokwamazwi enu, ngesami isikhathi esifanele.
Futhi noma ubani oyoya emthethweni nawe uyoqalekiswa wumthetho.

Futhi awuyikuthatha sikhwama semali noma isikhwama, naludondolo, namabhantshi amabili, ngokuba ibandla liyokunika ngaleso sikhathi lokho okudingayo kokudla nokwezingubo, kwezicathulo nokwemali, nokwesikhwama.
Ngokuba ubizelwe ukuthena insimu yami ngokuthena okunamandla, yebo, ngisho ukokugcina; yebo, kanye nabo bonke labo obagcobile, futhi bayokwenza ngisho njengokwalesi sifanekiso. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/25.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 25
chapter_summary: 1–6. U-Emma Smith, inkosikazi ekhethiweyo, ubizelwe ukusiza nokududuza umyeni wakhe; 7–11, Ubizelwe futhi ukubhala, ukuchasisa imibhalo engcwele, futhi nokukhetha amaculo; 12–14, Iculo lolungileyo liwumkhuleko eNkosini; 15–16. Imigomo yokuhlonipha ekulesi isambulo iqondene nawo wonke umuntu.

verses.text: Lalela izwi leNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho, ngesikhathi ngikhuluma kuwe, Emma Smith, ndodakazi yami; ngokuba ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, bonke labo abemukela ivangeli lami bangamadodana namadodakazi embusweni wami.
Isambulo ngikunika sona mayelana nentando yami; futhi uma uthembekile futhi uhamba endleleni yokulunga phambi kwami, ngizoyivikela impilo yakho, futhi uyothola ifa eSiyoni.
Bheka, izono zakho zixolelwe, futhi uyinkosikazi ekhethiweyo, engiyibizile.
Ungavungami ngenxa yezinto ongakaziboni, ngokuba zisagodliwe kuwe nasemhlabeni, okuwukuhlakanipha kimi ngesikhathi esizayo.
Futhi isikhundla sobizo lwakho siyoba wukududuza inceku yami, uJoseph Smith, omNcane, umyeni wakho, ezinhluphekweni zakhe, ngamazwi enduduzo, ngomoya wobumnene.
Futhi uyohamba naye ngesikhathi sokuhamba kwakhe, ube ngumbhali wakhe, ngesikhathi engekho ongambhalela, ukuze ngithumele inceku yami, u-Oliver Cowdery, noma yikuphi lapho ngizomthumela khona.
Futhi uyogcotshwa ngaphansi kwesandla sakhe ukuchasisa imibhalo engcwele, futhi nokuyala ibandla, njengoba uyokwambulelwa uMoya wami.
Ngokuba uyobeka izandla zakhe phezu kwakho, futhi uyophiwa uMoya oNgcwele, futhi isikhathi sakho uyosinikela ekubhaleni, nasekufundeni okuningi.
Futhi akudingekile usabe, ngoba umyeni wakho uzokusekela ebandleni; ngokuba ubizo lwakhe ngolwabo, ukuze zonke izinto zambulwe kubo, noma yini engiyifisayo, njengokukholwa kwabo.
Futhi ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe uyobeka eceleni izinto zalomhlaba, futhi ufune izinto zomhlaba ongcono.
Futhi kuzokwabelwa kuwe, ukukhetha amaculo angcwele, njengoba uzokwambulelwa, lokho okuthandekayo kimi, ukuze agcinwe ebandleni lami.
Ngokuba umoya wami uyajabula ngeculo lenhliziyo; yebo, iculo lolungileyo liwumkhuleko kimi, futhi uyogcwaliswa ngesibusiso phezu kwabo.
Ngalokho-ke, phakamisa inhliziyo yakho ujabule, futhi ubambelele ezivumelwaneni ozenzile.
Hlala unomoya wobumnene, futhi uqaphele ukuzikhukhumeza. Umoya wakho mawujabule ngomyeni wakho, futhi nodumo oluyokuza kuye.
Gcina imiyalelo yami njalo njalo, futhi nomqhele wokulunga uyowuthola. Futhi ngaphandle kokuthi wenze lokhu, lapho ngikhona ngeke uze.
Futhi ngiqinisile ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, leli yizwi lami kubo bonke. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/26.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 26
chapter_summary: 1, Bayalwa ukuthi bayifunde imibhalo engcwele futhi bashumayele; 2, Umthetho wokuvuma kwabantu bonke uyaqiniswa.

verses.text: Bhekani, ngithi kini niyochitha isikhathi senu ekufundeni imibhalo engcwele, nasekushumayeleni, nasekuqiniseni ibandla eColesville, nasekwenzeni imisebenzi yenu ensimini, njengoba kudingekile, kuze kube niya entshonalanga ukuyobamba omunye umhlangano; futhi emva kwalokho niyokwaziswa ukuthi niyokwenzani.
Futhi zonke izinto ziyokwenziwa ngokuvuma kwabantu bonke ebandleni, ngokukhuleka nokukholwa okukhulu, ngokuba zonke izinto niyozithola ngokukholwa. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/27.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 27
chapter_summary: 1–4, Izifanekiso okufanele zisetshenziswe uma kuthathwa isidlo esingcwele zibekwa obala; 5–14, UKristu nezinceku Zakhe kusukela kuzo zonke izinhlelo zokuphatha bazothatha isidlo esingcwele; 15–18, Hlomani ngezikhali zonke zikaNkulunkulu.

verses.text: Lalelani izwi likaJesu Kristu, iNkosi yenu, uNkulunkulu wenu, nomHlengi wenu, ozwi lakhe liyashesha futhi linamandla.

Ngokuba, bhekani, ngithi kini, akusho lutho ukuthi niyodlani noma niyophuzani uma nithatha isidlo esingcwele, uma nikwenza ngeso eliqonde udumo lwami—nikhumbula kuBaba umzimba wami owanikelelwa nina, negazi lami elachithelwa ukususa izono zenu.
Ngalokho-ke, ngininika umyalelo, wokuthi aniyukuthenga iwayini noma iziphuzo ezidakayo ezitheni zenu;
Ngalokho-ke, aniyikuthatha lutho ngaphandle uma lenziwe kabusha phakathi kwenu; yebo, kulombuso kaBaba oyokwakhiwa emhlabeni.

Bhekani, ukwenza lokhu kuyinhlakanipho kimi; ngalokho-ke, ningamangali, ngokuba ihora liyeza lapho ngizophuza isithelo sewayini nani emhlabeni, futhi noMoroni, engimuthume kuwe ukwambula iNcwadi kaMormoni, equkethe ukuphelela kwevangeli lami laphakade, engibeke kuye izikhiye zomlando wenduku ka-Efrayimi;
Futhi no-Eliyasi, engibeke kuye izikhiye zokubuyisela zonke izinto ezakhulunywa yimilomo yabo bonke abaphrofethi abangcwele kusukela ekuqaleni komhlaba, ngokuphathelene nezinsuku zokugcina;
Futhi noJohane indodana kaZakariya, loZakariya yena (u-Eliyasi) amvakashela futhi wamnika isethembiso sokuthi uzoba nendodana, futhi igama lakhe kuyoba nguJohane, futhi uyogcwala umoya ka-Eliyasi;
UJohane lowo engimthumele kini, zinceku zami, uJoseph Smith, omNcane, no-Oliver Cowdery, ukunigcobela ebuphristini bokuqala eniphiwe bona, ukuze nibizwe futhi nigcotshwe ngisho njengo Aroni;
Futhi no-Eliya, engibeke kuye izikhiye zokuguqulela izinhliziyo zoyise kubantwana, nezabantwana koyise, ukuze umhlaba wonke ungashaywa ngesiqalekiso;
Futhi noJosefa, noJakobe, no-Isaka, kanye no-Abrahama, obaba benu, ngabo izethembiso ezisekhona;
Futhi noMikayeli, noma u-Adamu, ubaba wabo bonke, umholi wabo bonke, omdala wezinsuku;

Futhi noPetru, noJakobe, noJohane, engibathumele kini, enginigcobe ngabo futhi ngaqinisa ukuthi ningabaphostoli, futhi ningofakazi abakhethekile begama lami, futhi ninezikhiye zobufundisi benu nezinto ezifanayo engizambule kubo;
Engibeke kubo izikhiye zombuso wami, nohlelo lokwengamela lwevangeli lezinsuku zokugcina; futhi nelokuphelela kwezikhathi, kulo engizoqoqa ndawonye konke, okusezulwini, nokusemhlabeni;
Futhi nabo bonke labo uBaba angiphe bona kwabasemhlabeni.
Ngalokho-ke, phamisani izinhliziyo zenu nijabule, nibophe izinkalo zenu, nihlome ngezikhali zami zonke, ukuze nikwazi ukuzabalaza ngosuku olubi, nalapho senifeze konke, nime.

Ngakho-ke; yimani izinkalo zenu ziboshiwe ngeqiniso, nifake isivikelo sesifuba sokulunga, futhi nezinyawo zenu zigqokiswe ukulungiswa ngevangeli lomoya wokuthula, engithumele izingelosi zami ukuthi zilibeke kini;
Nithathe isihlangu sokukholwa eniyokwazi ngaso ukucima yonke imcibisholo evuthayo yomubi;

Futhi nithathe isigqoko sensindiso, nenkemba yoMoya wami, engiyowuthulula phezu kwenu, nezwi lami engilambula kini, futhi nivumelane noma yini eniyoyicela kimi, futhi nithembeke ngize ngize, futhi niyohlwithwa, ukuze lapho ngikhona nani nibekhona futhi. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/28.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 28
chapter_summary: 1–7, UJoseph Smith uphethe izikhiye zezimfihlakalo, futhi nguye kuphela othola izambulo zeBandla; 8–10, U-Oliver Cowdery kufanele ashumayele kumaLamani; 11–16, USathane umkhohlisile uHiram Page futhi wamnika izambulo ezingamanga.

verses.text: Bheka, ngithi kuwe, Oliver, kuzonikwa kuwe ukuthi ibandla likulalele kuzo zonke izinto noma yikuphi oyobafundisa khona ngoMduduzi, ngokuphathelene nezambulo nemiyalelo engiyinikile.
Kodwa, bheka, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, akekho noyedwa oyoqokelwa ukuthola imiyalelo nezambulo kuleli bandla ngaphandle kuka Joseph Smith, omNcane, ngokuba uzithola ngisho nanjengoMose.
Futhi uyomlalela ezintweni engiyokumnika zona, ngisho njengo-Aroni, ukushumayela imiyalelo nezambulo ngokuthembeka, ngamandla nange gunya ebandleni.
Futhi uma uholwa nguMduduzi nganoma yisiphi isikhathi ukuthi ukhulume noma ufundise, noma ngazo zonke izikhathi ngendlela yemiyalelo ebandleni, ungakwenza lokho.
Kodwa awuyikubhala ngokwemiyalelo, kodwa ngenhlakanipho;
Futhi ungamyali oyinhloko yakho, noyinhloko yebandla;
Ngokuba ngimnike izikhiye zezimfihlakalo, nezambulo ezivaliwe, ngize ngibaqokele omunye esikhundleni sakhe.

Manje, bheka, ngithi kuwe uyokuya kumaLamani futhi ushumayele ivangeli lami kubo; futhi kangangoba bezamukela izimfundiso zakho uyokwenza ibandla lami lakhiwe phakathi kwabo; futhi uyothola izambulo, kodwa ungazibhali ngendlela yemiyalelo.

Manje, bheka, ngithi kuwe akwambuliwe, futhi akukho muntu owaziyo ukuthi idolobha iSiyoni liyokwakhiwa kuphi, kodwa kuyokwambulwa esikhathini esizayo. Bheka, ngithi kuwe liyokuba semingceleni ngakumaLamani.
Ungemuki kulendawo kuze kube semuva kwalomhlangano; futhi inceku yami uJoseph uyoqokelwa ukwengamela lomhlangano ngezwi lawo, futhi lokho akushoyo kuwe uyokukhuluma.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, uyothatha umfowenu, uHiram Page, ninodwa naye kuphela, futhi umtshele ukuthi lezo zinto azibhalile azithathe kulelo litshe azisuki kimi nokuthi uSathane umkhohlisile;
Ngokuba, bheka, lezi zinto akazinikezwanga, futhi akukho nalutho oluyonikezwa kunoma ubani waleli bandla ngokuphambhene nezivumelwano zebandla.
Ngokuba zonke izinto kufanele zenziwe ngohlelo, nangokuvumelana kwabo bonke ebandleni, ngomkhuleko wokukholwa.
Futhi uyolekelela ukulungisa zonke lezi zinto, ngokwezivumelwano zebandla, ngaphambi kokuba uthathe uhambo lwakho kuzo zonke izindawo kumaLamani.
Futhi kuzokwambulwa kuwe ngesikhathi uhamba, kuze kube yisikhathi oyobuya ngaso, oyokwenza.
Futhi kufanele uvule umlomo wakho ngazo zonke izikhathi, wazise ngevangeli lami ngezwi lenjabulo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/29.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 29
chapter_summary: 1–8, UKristu uqoqa abakhethiweyo Bakhe; 9–11, Ukubuya Kwakhe kuqalisa isikhathi esiyiNkulungwane yemiNyaka; 12–13, AbayiShumi namBili bazokwahlulela bonke abakwa-Israyeli; 14–21, Izimpawu, izinhlupho, nencithakalo kuzokwandulela ukuZa kwesiBili; 22–28, Ukuvuka kwabafileyo kokugcina nokwahlulelwa kokugcina kulandela imiNyaka eyiNkulungwane; 29–35, Zonke izinto zingokomoya eNkosini; 36–39, Udeveli noquqaba lwakhe balahlwa ngaphandle ezulwini ukuze balinge abantu; 40–45, UkuWa neNhlawulo kuletha insindiso; 46–50, Abantwana abancane bayahlengwa ngeNhlawulo.

verses.text: Lalela izwi likaJesu Kristu, umHlengi wenu, oMkhulu ungiNguye, ongalo yakhe yobubele izihlawulele izono zenu;
Oyoqoqa abantu bakhe njengesikhukhukazi siqoqa amachwane aso ngaphansi kwamaphiko aso, ngisho abaningi abazolalela izwi lami futhi bazithobe phambi kwami, futhi bangibize ngomkhuleko onamandla.
Bhekani, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, ngalesi sikhathi izono zenu zixolelwe, ngakho-ke nithola lezi zinto; kodwa khumbulani ningabe nisona futhi, funa nehlelwe yizingozi.
Ngiqinisile, ngithi kini nikhethiwe emhlabeni ukushumayela ivangeli lami ngomsindo wenjabulo, njengezwi lecilongo.
Phakamisani izinhliziyo zenu futhi nijabule, ngokuba ngiphakathi kwenu, futhi ngingummeli wenu phambi kukaBaba; futhi kuyintando yakhe enhle ukuninika umbuso.
Futhi, njengoba kulotshiwe—Noma yini eniyoyi cela ngokukholwa, nimunye emkhulekweni njengokomyalelo wami, niyoyithola.
Futhi nibizelwe ukufeza ukubuthana kwabakhethiweyo bami; ngokuba abakhethiweyo bami bayalizwa izwi lami futhi abazenzi lukhuni izinhliziyo zabo;

Ngalokho-ke isimemezelo siphumile kuBaba ukuthi bayoqoqelwa endaweni eyodwa ebusweni balelizwe, ukuze balungise izinhliziyo zabo futhi balungiselele zonke izinto ngosuku lapho usizi nencithakalo sekuthunyelwa kwababi.

Ngokuba ihora selisondele nosuku seluseduze lapho umhlaba usuvuthiwe; futhi bonke abaziqhenyayo nabo bonke abenza okubi bayoba njenge zinhlanga; futhi ngizoba shisa baphele, kusho iNkosi yamaBandla, ukuze ububi bungabi bikho emhlabeni;
Ngokuba ihora selisondele, futhi nalokho okwakhulunywa ngabaphostoli bami kumele kugcwaliseke; ngokuba njengoba bakhuluma kuyokwenzeka kanjalo;
Ngokuba ngiyozambula ezulwini ngamandla nangenkazimulo enkulu, nalo lonke uquqaba lwakhona, futhi ngihlale ngokulunga nabantu emhlabeni iminyaka eyinkulungwane, futhi ababi ngeke bame.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, futhi kuphume ngesimemezelo sokugcina, ngentando kaBaba, ukuthi abaphostoli bami, abaliShumi namBili ababenami ebufundisini bami eJerusalema, bayoma ngakwesokudla sami ngosuku lokuza kwami ngensika yomlilo, bembathiswe ngezingubo zokulunga, benemiqhele phezu kwamakhanda abo, besenkazimulweni ngisho njengami, ukuze behlulele yonke indlu ka-Israyeli, ngisho abaningi abangithandile futhi bayigcina imiyalelo yami, futhi namunye omunye.

Ngokuba icilongo liyokhala kade futhi kakhulu, ngisho njengaseNtabeni iSinayi, futhi wonke umhlaba uyozamazama, futhi bayophuma—yebo, ngisho abafileyo abafela kimi, ukuzozuza umqhele wokulunga futhi nokugqokiswa, ngisho njengami, ukuze babe nami, ukuze sibe munye.

Kodwa, bhekani, ngithi kini ngaphambi kwalolu suku olukhulu ilanga liyofiphazwa, futhi nenyanga iguqulwe ibe ligazi, futhi nezinkanyezi ziyowa zisuka ezulwini, futhi kuyoba nezimpawu ezinkulu phezulu ezulwini nasemhlabeni ngaphansi;
Futhi kuyoba khona ukukhala nokulila phakathi koquqaba lonke lwabantu;
Futhi kuyoba khona isichotho esikhulu esiyothunyelwa ukuzobulala zonke izitshalo zomhlaba.

Futhi kuyokwenzeka, ngenxa yobubi bomhlaba, ukuthi ngenze impindiselo kwababi, ngokuba bayenqaba ukuphenduka; ngokuba isitsha sami sentukuthelo sigcwele; ngokuba bhekani, igazi lami ngeke libahlanze uma bengangizwa.
Ngalokho-ke, mina iNkosi uNkulunkulu ngizothumela izimpukane ebusweni bomhlaba, eziyobamba bonke abantu bawo, futhi ziyokudla inyama yabo, futhi zidale ukuthi izimpethu zibahluphe;
Futhi izilimi zabo ziyobambeka ukuze bangakwazi ukukhuluma amazwi amelene nami; futhi inyama yabo iyolephuka isuka emathanjeni abo, futhi amehlo abo asuke ezingoxweni zawo;
Futhi kuyokwenzeka ukuthi izilwane zasendle nezinyoni zezulu ziyobadla zibaqede.

Futhi nebandla elikhulu nelinengekile, eliyisifebe somhlaba wonke, liyophonswa phansi ngomlilo oqothulayo, njengoba kwashiwo ngomlomo kaHezekeli umphrofethi, owakhuluma ngalezi zinto, ezingakenzeki kodwa ngempela okufanele zenzeke, njengoba ngiphila, ngokuba izinengiso ngeke zibuse.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini uma iminyaka eyinkulungwane isiphelile, futhi abantu sebeqala ukuphika uNkulunkulu wabo, ngaleso sikhathi ngiyowuhlenga umhlaba okwesikhashana;
Futhi ukuphela kuyofika, futhi izulu nomhlaba kuyobhujiswa futhi kudlule, futhi kuyoba khona izulu elisha nomhlaba omusha.
Ngokuba zonke izinto ezindala ziyodlula, futhi zonke izinto ziyoba zintsha, ngisho izulu nomhlaba, nako konke ukugcwala kwawo, abantu nezilwane, izinyoni zezulu, nezinhlazi zolwandle;
Futhi akukho nonwele olulodwa, nokuncane, okuyolahleka, ngokuba kuwumsebenzi wezandla zami.

Kodwa, bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngaphambi kokuba umhlaba udlule, uMikayeli, ingelosi yami enkulu, uyoshaya icilongo lakhe, bese bonke abafileyo bevuka, ngokuba amathuna abo ayovulwa, futhi bayophuma—yebo, ngisho bonke.
Futhi abalungileyo bayoqoqelwa ngasesandleni sami sokunene ukuya ekuphileni kwaphakade; futhi ababi abasesandleni sami sokunxele ngizoba namahloni ukuba nabo phambi kukaBaba;
Ngalokho-ke ngiyokuthi kubo—Dedani kimi, nina eniqalekisiweyo, ningene emlilweni waphakade olungiselwe udeveli nezingelosi zakhe.
Manje, bhekani, ngithi kini, angikaze noma ngasiphi isikhathi ngasho ngomlomo wami ukuthi bayobuya, ngokuba lapho ngikhona ngeke beze, ngoba abanawo amandla.

Kodwa khumbulani ukuthi konke ukwahlulela kwami akwambuliwe kubantu; futhi njengoba amazwi esephumile emlonyeni wami kanjalo-ke ayogcwaliseka, futhi abokuqala bayoba abokugcina, futhi nokuthi abokugcina babe abokuqala kuzo zonke izinto nanoma yini engayidalayo ngezwi lamandla ami, okungamandla oMoya wami.
Ngokuba ngamandla oMoya wami ngazidala zona; yebo, zonke izinto kabili ngokomoya nangokwemvelo—
Kuqala ngokomoya, okwesibili ngokwemvelo, okuwukuqala komsebenzi wami; futhi phezu kwalokho, kuqala ngokwemvelo, okwesibili, ngokomoya, okungokokugcina komsebenzi wami—
Ngikhuluma kini ukuze niqonde ngokwemvelo; kodwa kimi umsebenzi wami awunasiphetho, futhi awunasiqalo, kodwa niphiwe kona ukuze niqonde, ngokuba nicelile kimi futhi nivumelene.

Ngalokho-ke, ngiqinisile ngithi kini zonke izinto zingezomoya kimi, futhi akukho sikhathi lapho ngake nganinika umthetho wasemhlabeni; akukho noyedwa umuntu, nabantwana babantu; noma u-Adamu, ubaba wenu, engamdalayo.

Bheka, ngamnikeza ukuba akwazi ukuzikhethela; futhi ngamnika umyalelo, kodwa angimnikanga myalelo wasemhlabeni, ngokuba eyami imiyalelo ingeyomoya; ayiyona eyemvelo noma eyomhlaba, futhi ayiyona eyokunaka inyama noma eyokuthokozisa imizwa.

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi u-Adamu, elingwa ngudeveli—ngokuba, bhekani, udeveli wabakhona kuqala kuno-Adamu, ngokuba wangivukela, ethi, Nginike udumo lwakho, okungamandla ami; futhi phezu kwalokho ingxenye yesithathu yoquqaba lwasezulwini wayenza yangilahla ngenxa yelungelo labo lukukhetha;
Futhi baphonswa phansi, futhi wabakhona kanjalo-ke udeveli nezingelosi zakhe;
Futhi, bhekani, kukhona indawo elungiselwe bona kusuka ekuqaleni, leyondawo yisihogo.
Futhi udeveli kumele abalinge abantwana babantu, noma ngeke bazikhethele ngokwabo; ngokuba uma bengeke bezwe ubuhlungu bebengeke babazi ubumnandi—
Ngalokho-ke, kwenzeka ukuthi udeveli wamlinga u-Adamu, futhi wasidla isithelo ayengavunyelwe ukusidla futhi weqa umyalelo, ngalokho waba ngaphansi kwentando kadeveli, ngokuba wavumela isilingo.

Ngalokho-ke, mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngenza ukuba akhishwe ngaphandle kweNsimu yase-Edene, lapho ngikhona, ngenxa yesiphambeko sakhe, ngalokho waba ngofileyo ngokomoya, okungukufa kokuqala, ngisho lokho kufa okufanayo okungukufa kokugcina, okungokomoya, okuyoshiwo kwababi lapho ngiyothi: Dedani, nina eniqalekisiweyo.

Kodwa, bhekani, ngithi kini mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngamvumela u-Adamu futhi nenzalo yakhe, ukuthi bangafi ngokufa kwasemhlabeni, ngize mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngithumele izingelosi zizokwazisa kubo ngokuphenduka nangokuhlengwa, ngokukholwa egameni leNdodana yami Ezelwe Yodwa.

Futhi ngenza kanjalo-ke mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ukumisela umuntu isikhathi sokuvivinywa—ukuze kuthi ngokufa kwakhe kwemvelo avuselwe esimweni sokungafi nasekuphileni okuphakade, ngisho bebaningi kangakanani abakholwayo;
Futhi labo abangakholwayo bavuselwe usizi nobuhlungu baphakade; ngokuba ngeke bahlengwe esimweni sokuwa ngokomoya, ngokuba abaphenduki;
Ngokuba bathanda ubumnyama kunokukhanya, futhi nezenzo zabo zimbi, futhi bazuza inkokhelo yalowo abakhetha ukumthobela.
Kodwa bhekani, ngithi kini, abantwana abancane bahlengiwe selokhu kwasekelwa umhlaba ngowami Ozelwe Yedwa;
Ngalokho-ke, ngeke bone, ngokuba amandla awanikiwe uSathane ukulinga abantwana abancane, kuze kube bakwazi ukuziphendulela phambi kwami;
Ngokuba kwambuliwe kubo ngokwentando yami, ngokuzikhethela kwami, ukuthi izinto ezinkulu zingadingeka koyise.
Futhi, phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, ubani othi enolwazi, engingamyalile ukuthi aphenduke na?
Futhi lowo ongenakho ukuqonda, kukimi ukuthi ngenze njengoba kulotshiwe. Manje angisazisi lutho olunye kini kulesi sikhathi. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/30.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 30
chapter_summary: 1–4, UDavid Whitmer uyasolwa ngokuhluleka ukusebenza ngokukhuthala; 5–8, UPeter Whitmer omNcane uzophelezela u-Oliver Cowdery emsebenzini wokufundisa ivangeli kumaLamani; 9–11, UJohn Whitmer ubizelwa ukushumayela ivangeli.

verses.text: Bheka, ngithi kuwe, David, usabe abantu futhi awuthembelanga kimi ukuze uthole amandla njengoba bekufanele.

Kodwa umqondo wakho ubusezintweni zomhlaba kakhulu ngaphezulu kokuba sezintweni zami, uMenzi wakho, futhi nobufundisi obizelwe kubo; futhi awunakanga uMoya wami, nalabo ababekwe ngaphezu kwakho, kodwa uvunyiswe yilabo engingazange ngibayale.
Ngalokho-ke, uyekelwe ukuzibuzela wena esandleni sami, futhi udlinze ngezinto ozitholile.
Futhi ikhaya lakho liyoba semzini kayihlo, ngize ngikunike eminye imiyalelo. Futhi uyozinikela ebufundisini ebandleni, naphambi komhlaba, nasezifundeni eziseduze. Amen.

Bheka, ngithi kuwe, Peter, uyothatha uhambo lwakho nomfowenu u-Oliver; ngokuba isikhathi sesifikile ukuthi kufanele kimi ukuthi uvule umlomo wakho ushumayele ngevangeli lami; ngakho-ke, ungesabi, kodwa naka amazwi neziyalo zomfowenu, azokunika zona.

Futhi hlupheka naye kuzo zonke izinhlupho zakhe, ngazo zonke izikhathi uphakamise inhliziyo yakho kimi ngomkhuleko nangokukholwa, ukuze ufeze okwakhe nokwakho ukukhululwa; ngokuba ngimnikeze amandla okwakha ibandla lami phakathi kwamaLamani;
Futhi angiqokanga muntu ukuba abe ngumeluleki wakhe ebandleni, mayelana nezindaba zebandla, ngaphandle komfowabo, uJoseph Smith, omNcane.
Ngalokho-ke, naka lezi zinto futhi ukhuthale ekugcineni imiyalelo yami, futhi uyobusiswa ngokwanele ukuzuza ukuphila okuphakade. Amen.
Bheka, ngithi kuwe, nceku yami uJohn, ukuthi uyoqala kusuka kulesi sikhathi kuya phambili ukushumayela ngevangeli lami, njengezwi lecilongo.
Nomsebenzi wakho uyokuba semzini womfowenu uPhilip Burroughs’, nakuleso sifunda esiseduze, yebo, noma kuphi lapho ungezwakala khona, ngize ngikuyale ukuthi usuke lapho.
Futhi wonke umsebenzi wakho uyokuba seSiyoni, ngawo wonke umphefumulo wakho, kusuka manje; yebo, uyohlala njalo uvula umlomo kokuthandwa yimi, ungesabi okungenziwa ngabantu, ngokuba nginawe. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/31.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 31
chapter_summary: 1–6, UThomas B. Marsh ubizelwa ukushumayela ivangeli futhi uyaqinisekiswa ngenhlalakahle yomndeni wakhe; 7–13, Uyalwa ukuba abekezele, akhuleke njalo, futhi alandele uMduduzi.

verses.text: Thomas, ndodana yami, ubusisiwe ngenxa yokholo lwakho emsebenzini wami.

Bheka, usube nenhlupheko eningi ngenxa yomndeni wakho; nokho, ngizokubusisa wena nomndeni wakho, yebo, nabantwana bakho; futhi usuku luyeza lapho beyokholwa futhi balazi iqiniso futhi babemunye nawe ebandleni lami.

Phakamisa inhliziyo yakho uthokoze, ngokuba ihora lomsebenzi wakho wokufundisa ivangeli lifikile; futhi ulimi lwakho luyokhululwa, futhi uyomemezela izindaba ezimnandi zentokozo enkulu kulesi sizukulwane.
Uyomemezela izinto ezambulwe encekwini yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane. Uyoqala ukushumayela kusuka kulesi sikhathi kuya phambili, yebo, ukuvuna ensimini esimhlophe esilungele ukushiswa.

Ngakho-ke, shwiba isikela lakho ngawo wonke umphefumulo wakho, futhi izono zakho zithethelelwe, futhi uzothwala izithungu emhlane wakho, ngokuba isisebenzi sifanelwe inkokhelo yaso. Ngalokho-ke, umndeni wakho uyophila.
Bheka, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, suka kubo isikhathi esincane kuphela, futhi ushumayele izwi lami, futhi ngizobalungisela indawo.
Yebo, ngizozivula izinhliziyo zabantu, futhi bazokwemukela. Futhi ngizokwakha ibandla ngesandla sakho;
Futhi uzobaqinisa futhi ubalungisele isikhathi lapho bezoqoqwa khona.
Bekezela ezinhluphekweni, ungabethuki labo abethukayo. Busa indlu yakho ngobumnene, futhi uqine.
Bheka, ngithi kuwe uyokuba ngumelaphi webandla, kodwa ungabi ngowomhlaba, ngokuba ngeke bakwemukele.
Hamba endleleni yakho noma yikuphi lapho ngizokuthumela khona, futhi uzokwambulelwa nguMduduzi ukuthi uzokwenzani nokuthi uzoya kuphi.
Khuleka njalo, funa ungene ekulingweni futhi ulahlekelwe wumvuzo wakho.
Thembeka kuze kube sekugcineni, futhi bheka, nginawe. Lawa mazwi akuwona awomuntu noma abantu, kodwa ngawami, ngisho uJesu Kristu, umHlengi wakho, ngentando kababa. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/32.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 32
chapter_summary: 1–3, UParley P. Pratt noZiba Peterson babizelwa ukuyoshumayeza amaLamani nokuthi bahambe no-Oliver Cowdery kanye noPeter Whitmer omNcane; 4–5, Kufanele bakhulekele ukuyiqonda imibhalo engcwele.

verses.text: Manje mayelana nenceku yami uParley P. Pratt, bheka, ngithi kuye njengoba ngiphila ngifisa ashumayele ivangeli lami futhi afunde kimi, abemnene futhi athobeke ngenhliziyo.
Futhi lokho engimnike khona wukuthi uzohamba nezinceku zami, u-Oliver Cowdery noPeter Whitmer, omNcane, aye ehlane phakathi kwa maLamani.
Futhi no Ziba Peterson naye uzohamba nabo; futhi nami uqobo lwami ngizohamba nabo ngibe phakathi kwabo; futhi ngingummeli wabo kuBaba, futhi akukho okuyobanqoba.
Futhi bazolalela lokho okulotshiwe, bangazenzi abanesinye isambulo; futhi bayokhuleka njalo ukuze ngibambulele lokho ukuze baqonde.
Futhi bayowalalela lamazwi bangawenzi ubala, futhi ngizobabusisa. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/33.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 33
chapter_summary: 1–4, Izisebenzi zibizelwa ukuyoshumayela ivangeli ngehora leshumi nanye; 5–6, IBandla liyamiswa, nabakhethiweyo kufanele baqoqwe; 7–10, Phendukani, ngokuba umbuso wezulu ususondele; 11–15, IBandla lakhelwe phezu kwedwala levangeli; 16–18, Lungiselani ukuza koMyeni.

verses.text: Bhekani, ngithi kini, zinceku zami u-Ezra noNorthrop, vulani izindlebe zenu nilalele izwi leNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu, ozwi lakhe liyaphila futhi linamandla, libukhali kunesika nhlangothi-zombili inkemba, ukuhlukanisa ujuqu amalungu nomkantsha, umphefumulo nomoya; futhi obona imicabango nezinhloso zenhliziyo.
Ngokuba ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini nibizelwe ukuphakamisa amaphimbo enu njengokukhala kwecilongo, ukuze nishumayele ivangeli lami kwesigwegwile nesiphambeneyo isizukulwane.
Ngokuba bhekani, insimu imhlophe isilungele ukuvunwa, futhi sekuyihora leshumi nanye, futhi nokokugcina lapho ngizokubizela izisebenzi ensimini yami.
Futhi nesivini sami sesonakele sonkana; futhi abasekho abenza okuhle ngaphandle kwabayidlanzana, futhi bayaphambuka kokuningi ngenxa yobu phristi-mbumbulu, bonke benemiqondo eyonakeleyo.
Futhi ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, leli Bandla ngilimisile futhi ngalibizela ukuba liphume ehlane.
Futhi kanjalo-ke ngizobaqoqa abakhethiweyo bami kumagumbi amane omhlaba, ngisho bonke abazokholelwa kimi, futhi balalele izwi lami.
Yebo, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, insimu imhlophe ilungele ukuvunwa; ngalokho-ke, shwibani amasikela enu, nivune ngawo wonke amandla, ingqondo, nokuqina kwenu.
Vulani imilomo yenu futhi iyogcwaliswa, futhi niyofana no Nefi wasemandulo, owahamba eJerusalema eya ehlane.
Yebo, vulani imilomo yenu ningazibambi, futhi niyothwala izithungu emhlane yenu, ngokuba bheka, nginani.
Yebo, vulani imilomo yenu futhi izogcwaliswa, nithi: Phendukani, phendukani, nilungise indlela yeNkosi, nenze imikhondo yayo iqonde; ngokuba umbuso wezulu ususondele;
Yebo, phendukani futhi nibhabhadiswe, nonke, ukuze nithole ukuthethelelwa kwezono zenu; yebo, bhabhadiswani ngisho nangamanzi, emva kwalokho kuzolandela umbhabhadiso womlilo nowoMoya oNgcwele.
Bhekani, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, leli yivangeli lami; futhi khumbulani ukuthi kufuneka babe nokholo kimi noma bangeke basindiswe nakanye;
Futhi phezu kwaleli dwala ngiyolakha ibandla lami; yebo, phezu kwalelidwala nakhelwe, futhi uma niphikelela, amasango esihogo awayikunehlula.
Futhi niyokhumbula izimfundiso zebandla nezivumelwano ukuthi nizigcine.
Futhi labo abanokholo niyobaqinisa ebandleni lami, ngokubekwa kwezandla, futhi ngiyobapha isipho sikaMoya oNgcwele phezu kwabo.
Futhi iNcwadi kaMormoni nemibhalo engcwele kwambulwe yimi ukuze nifundiswe; futhi namandla oMoya wami aphilisa zonke izinto.
Ngalokho-ke, thembekani, nikhuleke njalo, ninezibani zenu zilungisiwe futhi zivutha, niphethe namafutha, ukuze nilungele ukuza koMyeni—
Ngokuba bhekani, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, ngiza masinyane. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/34.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 34
chapter_summary: 1–4, Abakholwayo baba ngamadodana kaNkulunkulu ngeNhlawulo; 5–9, Ukushunyayelwa kwevangeli kulungisa indlela yokuZa kweSibili; 10–12, Isiphrofetho siza ngamandla oMoya oNgcwele.

verses.text: Ndodana yami u-Orson, lalela futhi uzwe futhi ubheke lokhu mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, engizokusho kuwena, ngisho uJesu Kristu umHlengi wakho;
Onguku khanya nokuphila komhlaba, ukukhanya okukhanya ebumnyameni futhi ubumnyama abukuqondi;
Owathanda umhlaba waze wanikela ngempilo yakhe, ukuze bonke abayokholwa babe ngamadodana kaNkulunkulu. Ngalokho-ke uyindodana yami;
Futhi ubusisiwe ngokuba ukholiwe;
Futhi ubusisiwe ngokwedlulele ngokuba ubizwe yimi ukuba ushumayela ivangeli lami—

Ukuba uphakamisa izwi lakho njengokukhala kwecilongo, kade futhi kakhulu, futhi ushumayele ngokuphenduka kwesonakeleyo nesinenkani isizukulwane, ulungisa indlela yeNkosi ulindele ukuza kwayo kwesibili.
Ngokuba bheka, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, isikhathi sesiseduze ukuthi ngiyoza efwini ngamandla nenkazimulo enkulu.
Futhi kuyokuba usuku olukhulu ngesikhathi sokuza kwami, ngokuba zonke izizwe ziyothuthumela.
Kodwa ngaphambi kokuza kwalolosuku olukhulu, ilanga liyofiphala, nenyanga iphendulwe igazi; nezinkanyezi ziyonqaba nokukhanya kwazo, ezinye ziyokuwa, futhi ukubhujiswa okukhulu kulinde ababi.
Ngalokho-ke, phakamisa iphimbo lakho ungazibambi, ngokuba iNkosi uNkulunkulu ikhulumile; ngakho-ke phrofetha, futhi kuzokwambulwa ngamandla kaMoya oNgcwele.
Futhi uma uthembekile, bheka, nginawe ngize ngize—
Futhi ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, ngiza masinyane. NgiyiNkosi nomHlengi wakho. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/35.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 35
chapter_summary: 1–2, Abantu bangaba kanjani ngamadodana kaNkulunkulu; 3–7, USidney Rigdon ubizelwa ukuba abhabhadise futhi nokuba anike uMoya oNgcwele; 8–12, Izibonakaliso nezimangaliso zenzeka ngokholo; 13–16, Izinceku zeNkosi zizobhula izizwe ngamandla oMoya; 17–19, UJoseph Smith uphethe izikhiye zezimfihlakalo; 20–21, Abakhethiweyo bazomelana nosuku lokuza kweNkosi; 22–27, U-Israyeli uzosindiswa.

verses.text: Lalelani izwi le Nkosi uNkulunkulu wenu, ngisho u-Alfa no-Omega, isiqalo nesiphetho, ondlela yakhe yinye naphakade, ofanayo namuhla njengayizolo, naphakade.

NginguJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, owabethelelwa izono zomhlaba, ngisho bonke abazo kholelwa egameni lami, ukuze babe ngamadodana kaNkulunkulu, ngisho babe munye nami njengoba ngimunye noBaba, njengoba noBaba emunye kimi, ukuze sibe munye.
Bheka, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi encekwini yami uSidney, ngikubhekile nemisebenzi yakho. Ngiyizwile imikhuleko yakho, futhi ngikulungiselele umsebenzi omkhulu.
Ubusisiwe, ngokuba uzokwenza izinto ezinkulu. Bheka wathunyelwa, ngisho njengo Johane, ukuyolungisa indlela phambi kwami, futhi naphambi kuka Eliya okufanele eze, futhi wawungakwazi lokho.
Wabhabhadisa ngamanzi ngenhloso yokuphenduka, kodwa abawutholanga uMoya oNgcwele;
Kodwa manje ngikunika umyalelo, wokuthi uzobhabhadisa ngamanzi, futhi bazothola uMoya oNgcwele ngokubekwa kwezandla, ngisho njengabaphostoli basemandulo.
Futhi kuyokwenzeka ukuthi kuyoba khona umsebenzi omkhulu ezweni, ngisho kwabeZizwe, ngokuba ubuwula nezinengiso zabo ziyokuba sobala emehlweni abo bonke abantu.
Ngokuba nginguNkulunkulu, futhi ingalo yami ayifinyeziwe; futhi ngizobonisa izimangaliso, nezibonakaliso, kubo bonke labo abakholelwa egameni lami.

Futhi kulowo oyokucela egameni lami ngokholo, bayokhipha amadimoni; bayolapha abagulayo; bayokwenza izimpumputhe zithole ukubona kwazo, nabangezwa ukuthi bezwe, nezimungulu ukuthi zikhulume, futhi nezishosha ukuthi zihambe.
Futhi isikhathi siyeza ngokushesha lapho izinto ezinkulu zizoboniswa kubantwana babantu.
Kodwa ngaphandle kokholo akukho okuyoboniswa ngaphandle kwencithakalo eBabiloni, lowo owenze zonke izizwe ziphuze iwayini lolaka lokuhlobonga kwakhe.
Futhi abekho abenza okuhle ngaphandle kwalabo asebelungele ukwemukela ukuphelela kwevangeli lami, engilithumele kulesi sizukulwane.
Ngalokho-ke, ngibiza izinto ezibuthakathaka zomhlaba, labo abangafundile nabadelelekile, ukuba babhule izizwe ngamandla oMoya wami;

Futhi ingalo yabo iyoba ngeyami, futhi ngiyoba yihawu labo nesihlangu sabo; futhi ngizobabopha izinkalo zabo, futhi bazongilwela ngesibindi; nezitha zabo ziyoba ngaphansi kwezinyawo zabo; futhi ngizobawisela inkemba, futhi ngomlilo wentukuthelo yami ngizobagcina.
Futhi abampofu nabazithobile bayoshunyayezwa ivangeli, futhi bayolindela isikhathi sokuza kwami, ngokuba sesiseduze—
Futhi bayofunda umfanekiso wesihlahla somkhiwane, ngokuba ngisho namanje ihlobo seliseduze.
Futhi ngithumele ukuphelela kwevangeli lami ngesandla senceku yami uJoseph; futhi ngimbusisile ebuthakathakeni;

Futhi ngimnike izikhiye zemfihlakalo yalezo zinto ezivaliwe, ngisho izinto ezisuka ekusekelweni komhlaba, nezinto eziyofika kusuka kulesisikhathi kuze kube yisikhathi sokuza kwami, uma ehlala kimi, futhi uma kungenjalo, omunye ngiyomtshala esikhundleni sakhe.
Ngalokho-ke, mubheke ukuze ukholo lwakhe lungapheli, futhi kuyonikwa ngoMduduzi, uMoya oNgcwele, owazi zonke izinto.
Futhi ngikunika lomyalelo—ukuthi uyombhalela; futhi imibhalo engcwele iyokwambulwa, njengoba injalo esifubeni sami, ukuze kusindiswe abakhethiweyo bami;
Ngokuba bazolizwa izwi lami, futhi bayongibona, futhi ngeke balale, futhi bayokwazi ukumelana nosuku lokuza kwami; ngokuba bayohlanzwa; njengoba nami ngihlazekile.
Manje ngithi kuwe, hlala naye, futhi uzohamba nawe; ungamshiyi, futhi ngempela lezi zinto zizogcwalisela.
Futhi kangangoba ningabhali, bhekani, uyonikwa ukuthi aphrofethe; futhi wena uyoshumayela ivangeli lami futhi usebenzise abaphrofethi abangcwele ukuba bafakaze ngamazwi akhe, njengoba eyonikwa kuye.
Gcinani yonke imiyalelo nezivumelwano eniboshwe ngazo; futhi ngiyokwenza amazulu ukuba azamazame ukuze nizuze, noSathane uyoqhaqhazela futhi iSiyoni iyojabula phezu kwezintaba futhi ichume;
Futhi u-Israyeli uyosindiswa ngesami isikhathi esifanele; futhi bayoholwa ngezikhiye engizinikile, futhi ngeke baphinde baphanjaniswe nanini.
Phakamisani izinhliziyo zenu nijabule, ukuhlengwa kwenu kuyasondela.
Ningesabi, mhlambi omncane, umbuso ungowenu ngize ngize. Bhekani, ngiza masinyane. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/36.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 36
chapter_summary: 1–3, INkosi ibeka isandla Sayo ku-Edward Partridge ngesandla sikaSidney Rigdon; 4–8, Yonke indoda eyamukela ivangeli nobuphristi kufanele ibizelwe ukuhamba iyoshumayela.

verses.text: Isho kanje isho iNkosi uNkulunkulu, oMkhulu ka-Israyeli: Bheka, ngithi kuwe, nceku yami u-Edward, ukuthi ubusisiwe, futhi nezono zakho zithethelelwe, futhi ubizelwe ukushumayela ivangeli lami njengephimbo lecilongo;
Futhi ngizobeka isandla sami phezu kwakho ngesandla senceku yami uSidney Rigdon, futhi uyothola uMoya wami, uMoya oNgcwele, ngisho uMduduzi, ozokufundisa izinto zomoya wokuthula zombuso;
Futhi uyokumemezela ngephimbo eliphakeme, uthi: Hosana, libusisiwe igama likaNkulunkulu ophakeme kakhulu.
Manje lolu bizo nomyalelo ngikunika kona ngokuphathelene nabo bonke abantu—

Ukuthi abayoza ngobuningi phambi kwezinceku zami uSidney Rigdon noJoseph Smith, omNcane, bemukela lolubizo nomyalelo, bazogcotshwa futhi bathunyelwe ukuyoshumayela ivangeli laphakade phakathi kwezizwe—
Beshumayela ngokuphendula, bethi: Zisindiseni kulesi sizukulwane esihluphayo, futhi niphume emlilweni, nizonda ngisho izingubo ezichaphazelwe ngenyama.
Futhi lomyalelo uyonikwa amagosa ebandla lami, ukuze wonke umuntu ozowamukela ngobunye benhliziyo agcotshwe futhi athunyelwe ahambe, ngisho njengoba sengikhulumile.
NginguJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu; ngalokho-ke, bophani izinkalo zenu futhi ngokuzumayo ngizokuza ethempelini lami. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/37.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 37
chapter_summary: 1–4, AbaNgcwele babizelwa ukuba babuthane e-Ohio.

verses.text: Bhekani, ngithi kini akudingekile kimi ukuthi nihumushe okunye nize niye e-Ohio, futhi lokhu kungenxa yesitha nangenxa yenu.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini aniyikuhamba nize nishumayele ivangeli lami kulezo zingxenye, futhi seniqinise ibandla ndawozonke lapho litholakala khona, futhi ikakhulukazi eColesville; ngokuba, bhekani, bakhuleka kimi ngokholo olukhulu.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, umyalelo ngiwunika ibandla, ukuthi kudingekile kimi ukuba babuthane ndawonye e-Ohio, ngokuphambana nesikhathi lapho inceku yami u-Oliver Cowdery ayobuya kubo ngaso.
Bhekani, nakhu ukuhlakanipha, futhi wonke umuntu makazikhethele ngize ngize. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/38.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 38
chapter_summary: 1–6, UKristu wadala zonke izinto; 7–8, Uphakathi kwabaNgcwele Bakhe, abazokumbona maduze; 9–12, Yonke inyama yonakele phambi Kwakhe; 13–22, Ubekele abaNgcwele Bakhe izwe lesethembiso kulesi sikhathi naphakade; 23–27, AbaNgcwele bayalwa ukuba babe munye futhi bazisane njengabantu abakhe ndawonye; 28–29, Izimpi ziyabikezelwa; 30–33, AbaNgcwele kufanele banikwe amandla avela phezulu futhi bahambe baye phakathi kwezizwe zonke; 34–42, IBandla liyalwa ukuba linakekele abampofu nabadingile futhi lifune ingcebo yephakade.

verses.text: Isho kanje iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu, ngisho uJesu Kristu, ungiNguye oMkhulu, u-Alfa no-Omega, isiqalo nesiphetho, lowo owabuka ububanzi bephakade, futhi nalolonke uquqaba lwamaserafi asezulwini, ngaphambi kokwenziwa komhlaba;
Lowo owazi zonke izinto, ngokuba zonke izinto ziphambi kwamehlo ami;
Nginguye owakhuluma, futhi umhlaba wenziwa, futhi zonke izinto zeza ngami.

Nginguye othathe iSiyoni ka-Enoke wayiletha esifubeni sami; futhi ngiqinisile, ngithi, ngisho bonke abakholelwe egameni lami, ngokuba nginguKristu, futhi egameni lami, ngenxa yamandla egazi engilichithile, ngibanxusele phambi kukaBaba.
Kodwa bhekani, insalela yababi ngiyigcine emaketangweni obumnyama kuze kube ukwahlulelwa kosuku olukhulu, oluzokuza ekupheleni komhlaba;
Futhi kanjalo-ke ngizokwenza ababi ukuba bagcinwe, labo abangayikulizwaizwi lami kodwa abaqinisa izinhliziyo zabo, futhi maye, maye, maye, isiphetho sabo.
Kodwa bhekani, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini amehlo ami aphezu kwenu. Ngiphakathi kwenu futhi anikwazi ukungibona;
Kodwa usuku luyeza maduze lapho niyongibona khona, futhi nazi ukuthi nginguye; ngokuba isisitho sobumnyama siyodatshulwa maduze, futhi lowo onga hlanziwe angeke amelane nalolo suku.
Ngalokho-ke, bophani izinkalo zenu futhi nizilungiselele. Bhekani, umbuso ungowenu, futhi isitha ngeke sinqobe.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, nihlanzekile, kodwa hhayi nonke; futhi akekho omunye engithokoza kahle ngaye;
Ngokuba yonke inyama yonakele phambi kwami; futhi namandla obumnyama ayabusa phezu komhlaba, phakathi kwabantwana babantu, phambi koquqaba lonke lwasezulwini—
Okwenza ukuthula kubuse, futhi iphakade lonke libuhlungu, futhi nezingelosi zilinde umyalelo omkhulu wokuvunela phansi umhlaba, ukuqoqela ukhula ukuze lushiwe; futhi, bhekani, isitha sihlangene.
Manje nginibonisa imfihlakalo, into ephathwa emagunjini afihlekileyo, ukuletha ngisho ukubhujiswa kwenu ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, futhi beningakwazi;

Kodwa manje nginitshela yona, futhi nibusisiwe, hhayi ngenxa yobubi benu, nezinhliziyo zenu zokungakholwa; ngokuba ngiqinisile abanye benu banecala phambi kwami, kodwa ngizoba nesihawu ebuthakathakeni benu.
Ngakho-ke, qinani kusukela manje kuya phambili; ningesabi, ngokuba umbuso ungowenu.

Futhi ngenxa yensindiso yenu ngininika umyalelo, ngokuba ngiyizwile imikhuleko yenu, futhi abampofu bakhalile phambi kwami, futhi abacebileyo ngibadalile, futhi yonke inyama ingeyami, futhi angibheki ubuso babantu.
Futhi ngenze umhlaba unothe, futhi bhekani uyisenabelo sezinyawo zami, ngalokho-ke, ngizophinda futhi ngime kuwo.
Futhi ngifisa ukuninika ingcebo enkulu, ngisho izwe lesethembiso, izwe elichichima ubisi noju, lapho kungayikubakhona isiqalekiso uma kuza iNkosi;
Futhi ngizoninika lona njengezwe lefa lenu, uma nilifuna ngezinhliziyo zenu zonke.
Futhi lesi kuyokuba yisivumelwano sami nani, nizokubanalo njengezwe lefa lenu, nefa labantwana benu ingunaphakade, ngesikhathi umhlaba usamile, futhi niyobanalo futhi naphakade, ngeke lisadlula neze.
Kodwa, ngiqinisile ngithi kini ngokuhamba kwesikhathi anizukuba nankosi nambusi, ngokuba ngiyokuba yinkosi yenu futhi nginibheke.

Ngalokho-ke, yizwani izwi lami futhi ningilandele, futhi niyokuba ngabantu abakhululekileyo, futhi aniyikuba namithetho kodwa niyokuba neyami imithetho uma ngibuya, ngokuba ngingumniki-mthetho wenu, futhi yini engavimba isandla sami na?
Kodwa, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, fundisanani ngokwesikhundla enginibeke kuso;
Futhi wonke umuntu makazise umfowabo njengoba ezazisa yena, futhi nenze ukulunga nobungcwele phambi kwami.
Futhi ngiyaphinda ngithi kini, wonke umuntu makazise umfowabo njengoba ezazisa yena.

Ngokuba ngumuntu onjani phakathi kwenu othi enamadodana ayishumi nambili, futhi engawabandlululi, nawo emsebenzela ngokumhlonipha, futhi athi kwenye: Gqoka izingubo futhi uhlale lapha; futhi athi kwenye: Wena gqoka izidwedwe bese uhlala laphaya—bese ebuka amadodana akhe athi nginokulunga na?
Bhekani, lokhu ngininike kona njengomfanekiso, futhi kunjengoba mina nginjalo. Ngithi kini, yibani munye; futhi uma ningemunye anibona abami.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini isitha esisemagunjini afihlekileyo sifuna izimpilo zenu.
Nizwa ngezimpi emazweni akude, bese nithi kuzoba nezimpi ezinkulu maduze emazweni akude, kodwa anizazi izinhliziyo zabantu ezweni lenu.

Nginitshela lezi zinto ngenxa yemikhuleko yenu; ngalokho-ke, ngcinani inhlakanipho ezifubeni zenu, hleze ububi babantu bambule lezi zinto kini ngobubi babo, ngendlela ezokhuluma ezindlebeni zenu ngezwi elikhulu kunalelo eliyozamazamisa umhlaba; kodwa uma nizilungiselele ngeke nesabe.
Futhi ukuze niphunyule emandleni esitha, futhi niqoqelwe kimi ningabantu abalungileyo, abangenacashazi nabangasolakaliyo—
Ngakholo-ke, ngalesi sizathu ngininike umyalelo wokuthi kufanele niye e-Ohio; futhi lapho ngizoninika umthetho wami; futhi lapho niyonikwa amandla avela phezulu;

Futhi kusukela kuleyo ndawo, noma ngubani engifisa ahambe uyo hamba aye phakathi kwazo zonke izizwe, futhi bayotshelwa ukuthi benzeni; ngokuba nginomsebenzi omkhulu kakhulu obekiweyo, ngokuba u-Israyeli uyosindiswa, futhi ngizoba holela noma kuphi lapho ngithanda khona, futhi akukho mandla ayovimba isandla sami.
Manje, nginika ibandla kulezi zingxenye umyalelo, wokuthi abantu abathile phakathi kwabo bazobekwa, futhi bazobekwa ngezwi lebandla;
Futhi bazobheka abampofu nabadingile, bese bebapha ukuze bakhululeke bangahlupheki; futhi babathumele endaweni engibayalele yona;
Futhi lona kuyoba ngumsebenzi wabo, ukuphatha izindaba zempahla yalelibandla.
Futhi labo abanamapulazi angadayiseki, mawayekwe noma aqashiswe njengoba kubonakala kukuhle kubo.
Bonani ukuthi zonke izinto zigciniwe; futhi uma abantu sebephiwe amandla avela phezulu futhi bethunywa, zonke lezi zinto ziyoqoqwa zibe ngezebandla.

Futhi uma nifuna ingcebo okuyintando kaBaba ukuninika yona, niyokuba ngabacebile kunabo bonke abantu, ngokuba niyoba nengcebo yaphakade; futhi kunesidingo sokuthi ingcebo yomhlaba kube yimi engiphanisa ngayo; kodwa qaphelani ukuzikhukhumeza, hleze nibe njengamaNefi asemandulo.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, ngininika umyalelo, wokuthi wonke umuntu, igosa, umphristi, umfundisi, ngokunjalo nelungu, makasebenze ngamandla akhe, ngomsebenzi wezandla zakhe, ukulungiselela futhi afeze izinto engiyale ngazo.
Futhi ukushumayela kwenu makube yizwi lesexwayiso, wonke umuntu kumakhelwane wakhe, ngomusa nangobumnene.
Futhi phumani phakathi kwababi. Zihlengeni. Hlanzekani nina eniphatha izitsha zeNkosi. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/39.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 39
chapter_summary: 1–4, AbaNgcwele banamandla okuba ngamadodana kaNkulunkulu; 5–6, Ukwamukela ivangeli wukwamukela uKristu; 7–14, UJames Covel uyalwa ukuba abhabhadiswe futhi asebenze esivinini seNkosi; 15–21, Izisebenzi zeNkosi kufanele zishumayele ivangeli ngaphambi kokuZa kwesiBili; 22–24, Labo abemukela ivangeli bazoqoqwa manje naphakade.

verses.text: Lalela futhi uzwe izwi lalowo ovela kulolonke iphakade kuya kulolonke iphakade, oMkhulu ungiNguye, uJesu Kristu uqobo—
Ukukhanya nokuphila komhlaba; ukukhanya okukhanye ebumnyameni futhi ubumnyama abukuqondanga;
Yena lowo oweza kwabami maphakathi nesikhathi, futhi abami bangangemukela;
Kodwa kwabaningi abangemukeleyo, ngibanike amandla okuba ngamadodana ami; futhi kanjalo-ke ngiyokunika kwabaningi abayongemukela, amandla okuba ngamadodana ami.
Futhi ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, lowo owemukela ivangeli lami wemukela mina; futhi lowo ongalemukeli ivangeli lami akangemukeli mina.

Futhi leli yivangeli lami—ukuphenduka nokubhabhadiswa ngamanzi, bese futhi kuza ukubhabhadiswa ngomlilo nangoMoya oNgcwele, ngisho uMduduzi, okhombisa zonke izinto, futhi ofundisa nezinto zomoya wokuthula zombuso.
Manje, bheka, ngithi kuwe, nceku yami uJames, ngiyibhekile imisebenzi yakho futhi ngiyakwazi.
Futhi ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, inhliziyo yakho isilungile phambi kwami ngalesi sikhathi; futhi, bheka, ngibeke izibusiso ezinkulu phezu kwekhanda lakho;
Nokho, usubone ubuhlungu obukhulu, ngokuba ungalile izikhathi eziningi ngenxa yokuzazisa nokunaka okomhlaba.

Kodwa, bheka, izinsuku zokukhululwa kwakho sezifikile, uma ungalalela izwi lami, elithi kuwe: Sukuma ubhabhadiswe, uhlanze izono zakho, ubize igama lami, futhi uyophiwa uMoya wami, nesibusiso esikhulu ongakaze usazi.

Futhi uma wenza lokhu, ngikulungiselele umsebenzi omkhulu. Uyoshumayela ivangeli lami eliphelele, engilithumele ngalezi zinsuku zokugcina, isivumelwano engisithumele ukubuyisa abantu bami, abangabendlu ka-Israyeli.
Futhi kuyokwenzeka ukuthi amandla ayoba phezu kwakho; uyokuba nokholo olukhulu, futhi ngizoba nawe ngihambe phambi kobuso bakho.
Ubizelwe ukusebenza esivinini sami, nokwakha ibandla lami, nokuveza iSiyoni, ukuze ijabule phezu kwamagquma futhi ichume.
Bheka, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, wena awubizelwanga ukuya emazweni asempumalanga, kodwa ubizelwe ukuya e-Ohio.

Futhi kangangoba abantu bami beyobuthana e-Ohio, ngigcine isibusiso esinjengesingaziwa phakathi kwabantwana babantu, futhi siyothululwa phezu kwamakhanda abo. Futhi ukusuka kuleyondawo amadoda ayohamba aye kuzo zonke izizwe.
Bheka, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, abantu abase-Ohio bangibiza ngokukhulu ukukholwa, bacabanga ukuthi ngizozibamba ukwahlulela izizwe, kodwa angikwazi ukuphika izwi lami.
Ngalokho-ke qalani nisebenze ngamandla enu futhi nibizele izisebenzi ezithembekileyo esivinini sami, ukuze sithenwe okokugcina.
Futhi kangangoba bephenduka futhi bemukela ukuphelela kwevangeli lami, futhi bangcweliswe, ngiyozibamba ekwahluleleni.
Ngalokho-ke, hambani, nimemeze ngezwi elikhulu, nithi: Umbuso wezulu ususondele; nimemeze nithi: Hosana! libusisiswe igama likaNkulunkulu oPhakeme kaKhulu.
Hambani nibhabhadise ngamanzi, nilungise indlela phambi kobuso bami ukulungiselela isikhathi sokuza kwami;
Ngokuba isikhathi sesisondele; usuku noma ihora elingaziwa muntu; kodwa impela liyofika.
Futhi lowo ozamukelayo lezi zinto wemukela mina; futhi bayoqoqwelwa kimi manje naphakade.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, kuyokwenzeka ukuthi kwabaningi eniyobabhabhadisa ngamanzi, niyobabeka izandla zenu, bese bethola isipho soMoya oNgcwele, futhi bayobe belindele izimpawu zokuza kwami, futhi bayongazi.
Bhekani, ngiza masinyane. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/40.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 40
chapter_summary: 1–3, Ukwesaba ukuhlushwa nokunaka okomhlaba kudala ukulenqaba ivangeli.

verses.text: Bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, inhliziyo yenceku yami uJames Covel yayisilungile phambi kwami, ngokuba wenza isivumelwano nami sokuthi uzolithobela izwi lami.
Futhi walemukela izwi ngenjabulo, kodwa masinyane uSathane wamlinga; futhi ukwesaba ukuhlushwa nokunaka okomhlaba kwadala ukuba alenqabe izwi.
Ngalokho-ke wasephula isivumelwano sami, futhi kukimi ukuthi ngimphathe njengoba kubonakala kukuhle kimi. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/41.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 41
chapter_summary: 1–3, Amagosa azolawula iBandla ngomoya wesambulo; 4–6, Abafundi beqiniso bazowemukela futhi bawugcine umthetho weNkosi; 7-12, U-Edward Partridge ubekwa njengombhishobhi eBandleni.

verses.text: Lalelani futhi nizwe, O nina bantu bami, kusho iNkosi noNkulunkulu wenu, nina engithokozela ukunibusisa ngezibusiso ezinkulu kunazozonke izibusiso, nina eningizwayo; futhi nina eningangizwa ngizoniqalekisa, labo abavuma igama lami, ngezinzima kunazo zonke iziqalekiso.
Lalelani, O nina magosa ebandla lami engiwabizile, bhekani ngininika umyalelo, wokuthi niyobuthana ndawonye ukuze nivumelane ngezwi lami;
Futhi ngomkhuleko wokukholwa kwenu niyowuthola umthetho wami, ukuze nazi ukuthi niyoliphatha kanjani ibandla lami futhi nenze zonke izinto kahle phambi kwami.
Futhi ngiyoba ngumbusi wenu ngesikhathi ngiza; futhi bhekani, ngiza masinyane, futhi niyobona ukuthi umthetho wami uyagcinwa.
Lowo owamukelayo umthetho wami futhi awenze, nguye lowo ungumfundi wami; futhi lowo othi uwamukelile futhi angawenzi, nguye lowo ongeyena umfundi wami, futhi uyosuswa phakathi kwenu;
Ngokuba akukuhle ukuthi izinto ezingezabantwana bombuso zinikwe labo abangazifanele, noma izinja, noma kuphoswe amagugu phambi kwezingulube.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, kufanele ukuthi inceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, abe nendlu eyakhiweyo, azohlala kuyo futhi ahumushe.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, kufanele ukuba inceku yami uSidney Rigdon aziphathe njengoba kubonakala kukuhle kuye, kangangoba egcina imiyalelo yami.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngibize inceku yami u-Edward Partridge; futhi nginika umyalelo, wokuthi abekwe ngezwi lebandla, futhi agcotshwe abe ngumbhishobhi ebandleni, ukuze ashiye izimpahla zakhe zokuthengiswa futhi achithe sonke isikhathi sakhe emisebenzini webandla;
Ukubheka zonke izinto njengoba kuyomiselwa kuye emithethweni yami osukwini engiyoyinika ngalo.
Futhi lokhu kungenxa yokuthi inhliziyo yakhe imsulwa phambi kwami, ngokuba ufana no Nathaniyeli wakudala, okungekho nkohliso kuye.
Lamazwi anikezwa nina, futhi amsulwa phambi kwami; ngalokho-ke, qaphelani ukuthi niwaphatha kanjani, ngokuba nizophendula emiphefumulweni yenu ngosuku lokwahlulela. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/42.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 42
chapter_summary: 1–10, Amagosa abizelwa ukushumayela ivangeli, ukubhabhadisa abaphenduki, nokwakha iBandla; 11–12, Kumele abizwe futhi agcotshwe futhi kufanele afundise imigomo yevangeli etholakala emibhalweni engcwele; 13–17, Kufanele afundise futhi aphrofethe ngamandla kaMoya; 18–29, AbaNgcwele bayalwa ukuba bangabulali, bangebi, bangaqambi amanga, bangakhanuki, bangaphingi, noma bakhulume okubi ngabanye; 30–39, Imithetho elawula ukunikela ngempahla ibekwa obala; 40–42, Ukuzazi nobuvila kuyagxekwa; 43–52, Abagulayo kufanele belashwe ngokuphiwa izibusiso nangokukholwa; 53–60, Imibhalo engcwele ilawula iBandla futhi kufanele ishunyayelwe emhlabeni; 61–69, Isiza seJerusalema eNtsha nezimfihlakalo zombuso kuzokwambulwa; 70–73, Izimpahla ezinikelwayo kufanele zisetshenziselwe ukuhlinzekela abasezikhundleni zeBandla; 74–93, Imithetho elawula ukuhlobonga, ukuphinga, ukubulala, ukweba, nokuvuma izono ibekwa obala.

verses.text: Lalelani, O nina magosa ebandla lami, enibuthene ndawonye egameni lami, ngisho uJesu Kristu iNdodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo, umSindisi womhlaba; kangangoba nikholwa egameni lami futhi nigcina imiyalelo yami.
Ngiyaphinda ngithi kini, lalelani futhi nizwe futhi nithobele umthetho engizoninika wona.
Ngokuba ngiqinisile ngithi, njengoba nibuthene ndawonye ngokomyalelo enginiyale ngawo, futhi nivumelana ngokuphathelene nalento eyodwa, futhi nicelile kuBaba egameni lami, kanjalo-ke nizofumana.
Bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngininika lomyalelo wokuqala, wokuthi niyohamba egameni lami, nonke, ngaphandle kwezinceku zami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, noSidney Rigdon.
Futhi ngibanika umyalelo wokuthi bayohamba isikhashana, futhi kuzokunikezwa ngamandla kaMoya ukuthi bayobuya nini.
Futhi niyohamba ngamandla oMoya wami, nishumayela ivangeli lami, ngababili, egameni lami, niphakamisa amaphimbo enu njengomsindo wecilongo, nimemezela izwi lami njengezingelosi zikaNkulunkulu.
Futhi niyohamba nibhabhadisa ngamanzi, nithi: Phendukani, phendukani, ngokuba umbuso wezulu ususondele.
Futhi kusuka kulendawo nizohambela ezifundazweni ezingasentshonalanga; futhi kangangoba nizobathola abazonamukela niyokwakha ibandla lami kuzo zonke izifunda—

Kuze kufike isikhathi lapho kuzokwembulwa kini kusuka phezulu, lapho umuzi wase Jerusalema eNtsha uyolungiswa khona, ukuze niqoqwe nibe ndawonye, ukuze nibe ngabantu bami futhi nami ngibe uNkulunkulu wenu.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, inceku yami u-Edward Partridge uyokuma esikhundleni engimubeke kuso. Futhi kuyokwenzeka, ukuthi uma ephula umthetho omunye uyobekwa esikhundleni sakhe. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

Futhi phezu kwalokho ngithi kini, akuyikuvunyelwa namunye ukuthi ahambe ukuyoshumayela ivangeli lami, noma akhe ibandla lami, ngaphandle kokuba egcotshwe ngothile onegunya futhi kwaziwa ebandleni ukuthi unegunya futhi oseke wagcotshwa ngendlela efanele ngabaphathi bebandla.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, amagosa, abaphristi nabafundisi balelibandla bayofundisa imigomo yevangeli lami, ese Bhayibhelini nase Ncwadini kaMormoni, lapho kukhona ivangeli elipheleleyo.
Futhi bayogcina izivumelwano nezimfundiso zebandla ukuba bazenze, futhi lokhu kuyokuba yizifundiso zabo, njengokuba beyokhonjiswa nguMoya.
Futhi uMoya uyonikezwa kini ngomkhuleko wokukholwa; futhi uma ninganikwa uMoya aniyikufundisa.
Futhi niyogcina konke lokhu njengoba ngiyalile mayelana nokufundisa kwenu, kuze kunikwe ukuphelela kwemibhalo engcwele yami.
Futhi uma niyophakamisa amaphimbo enu ngoMduduzi, niyokhuluma futhi niphrofethe njengoba kubonakala kukuhle kimi;
Ngokuba, bhekani, uMduduzi uyazazi zonke izinto, futhi ufakaza ngoBaba nangeNdodana.
Manje, bhekani, ngikhuluma ebandleni. Ungabulali, futhi lowo obulalayo ngeke abe nokuxolelwa kulomhlaba, nasemhlabeni ozayo.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi, ungabulali; kodwa lowo obulalayo uyokufa.
Ungebi; futhi lowo owebayo futhi owenqaba ukuphenduka uyokhishelwa ngaphandle.
Ungakhulumi amanga; lowo ukhuluma amanga futhi owenqaba ukuphenduka uyokhishelwa ngaphandle.
Wothanda umfazi wakho ngenhliziyo yakho yonke, futhi unamathele kuye hhayi omunye.
Futhi lowo obuka owesifazane amkhanukele uyolulahla ukholo, futhi ngeke abe nawo uMoya; futhi uma enqaba ukuphenduka uyokhishelwa ngaphandle.
Ungaphingi; futhi lowo ophingayo, futhi owenqaba ukuphenduka, uyokhishelwa ngaphandle.
Kodwa lowo osephingile futhi ephenduka ngenhliziyo yakhe yonke, futhi ekuyeka lokho, futhi engasaphindi akwenze, niyomthethelela;
Kodwa uma ephinda ekwenza, ngeke axolelwe, kodwa uyokhishelwa ngaphandle.
Ungakhulumi okubi ngomakhelwane wakho, noma umenzakalise.
Uyayazi imithetho yami emayelana nalezi zinto enikwe emibhalweni yami engcwele; lowo owonayo futhi angaphenduki uyokhishelwa ngaphandle.
Uma ungithanda uyongisebenzela futhi ugcine yonke imiyalelo yami.
Futhi bheka, ubokhumbula abampofu, futhi unikele ngempahla yakho ukubondla ngalokho onakho ukubanika kona, ngesivumelwano nangencwadi yesibopho nesenzo esingeke saphulwa.

Futhi kangangoba ninikela ngezimpahla zenu kwaba mpofu, nizokwenza kimi; futhi ziyobekwa phambi kuka mbhishobi webandla lami nakubeluleki bakhe, ababili bamagosa, noma abaphristi abakhulu, njengalabo azobabeka noma asebabekile futhi wabahlukanisela lenhloso.

Futhi kuyokwenzeka, ukuthi emva kokuba sezibekwe phambi kukambhishobhi webandla lami, emva kokuba esethole lobu bufakazi mayelana nokunikela ngempahla yebandla lami, ukuthi ngeke zisuswe ebandleni, ngokuvumelana nemiyalelo yami, wonke umuntu uyoziphendulela kimi, umphathi phezu kwempahla yakhe, noma lokho akutholile ngokunikela, ngangokulingene yena nomndeni wakhe.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, uma kuyoba khona izimpahla ezandleni zebandla, noma kumuntu ngamunye walo, ezingaphezu kokudingekile ukondla bona emva kwalokhu kunikela kokuqala, okungokuseleyo okuyonikelwa kumbhishobhi, kuyogcinwa ukuze kwabelwe labo abangenakho, izikhathi ngezikhathi, ukuze wonke umuntu odingayo afumane ngokwanele futhi afumane ngokwezidingo zakhe.
Ngakho-ke, okuseleyo kuyogcinwa endlini yami yengcebo, ukuze kwabelwe abampofu nabadingayo, njengoba kuyoboniswa ngumkhandlu omkhulu webandla, nombhishobhi nomkhandlu wakhe;
Futhi ngenhloso yokuthenga imihlaba ukuze kuzuze wonke umuntu ebandleni, nokwakha izindlu zokukhonza, nokwakha iJerusalema eNtsha ezokwambulwa maduze emva kwalokhu—
Ukuze abantu bami besivumelwano babuthane babe ndawonye ngalelo langa mhla ngiza ethempelini lami. Futhi lokhu ngikwenzela insindiso yabantu bami.

Futhi kuyokwenzeka, ukuthi lowo owonayo futhi angaphenduki uyokhishelwa ngaphandle kwebandla, futhi ngeke kubuyiselwe kuye lokho akunikele kwabampofu nabadingayo ebandleni lami, noma ngamanye amazwi, kimi—
Ngokuba kangangoba nikwenza kwabancane balaba, nikwenza kimi.

Ngokuba kuyokwenzeka, ukuthi lokho engikukhulume ngomlomo wabaphrofethi bami kuyogcwaliseka; ngokuba ngizonikela ngengcebo yalabo abemukela ivangeli lami phakathi kwabeZizwe kwabampofu babantu bami abangabendlu ka-Israyeli.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ungazikhukhumezi enhliziyweni yakho; zonke izingubo zakho mazibe ngezingahlotshisiwe, nobuhle bazo bube wubuhle bomsebenzi wezandla zakho;
Futhi zonke izinto mazenziwe ngobunono phambi kwami.
Ungabi yivila; ngokuba lowo oyivila ngeke adle isinkwa noma agqoke izingubo zosebenzayo.
Futhi noma ngubani ogulayo phakathi kwenu, nongenakho ukukholwa kokuba aphiliswe, kodwa ekholwa, uyokondliwa ngobumnene bonke, ngamakhambi nokudla okupholile, futhi lokho hhayi ngesandla sesitha.
Namagosa ebandla, amabili noma ngaphezulu, ayobizwa, futhi ayobakhulekela futhi ababeke izandla zabo egameni lami; futhi uma befa bayofela kimi, futhi uma bephila bayophilela mina.
Niyohlala ndawonye ngothando, kangangokuba niyolila ngokulahleka kwabafayo, futhi ikakhulukazi labo abangenalo ithemba lokuvuka kwabafileyo okuhle kakhulu.
Futhi kuyokwenzeka ukuthi labo abafela kimi ngeke bakuzwe ukufa, ngokuba kuyoba mnandi kubo;
Futhi labo abangafeli kimi, maye kubo, ngokuba ukufa kwabo kubuhlungu.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, kuyokwenzeka ukuthi lowo onokholo kimi lokuba aphiliswe, futhi enga nqunyelwe ukufa, uyophiliswa.
Lowo onokukholwa kokuba abone uyobona.
Lowo onokukholwa kokuba ezwe uyozwa.
Izishosha ezinokukholwa kokuba zigxume ziyogxuma.
Futhi labo abangenakho ukukholwa kokuba benze lezizinto, kodwa bekholwa kimi, banamandla okuba ngamadodana ami; futhi kangangoba bengayiphuli imithetho yami uyobubekezelela ubuthakathaka babo.
Uyokuma endaweni yobuphathi bakho.
Ungayithathi ingubo yomfowenu; uyokukhokhela lokho oyokufumana kumfowenu.
Futhi uma uthola okungaphezulu kwalokho kokondla wena, uyokunikela endlini yami yengcebo, ukuze zonke izinto zenziwe ngokwalokho engikushilo.
Wocela, nemibhalo yami engcwele iyonikwa njengoba ngikhombisile, futhi iyogcinwa iphephile;
Futhi kubalulekile ukuthi ungasho lutho mayelana nayo, futhi ungafundisi ngayo kuze kube usuyifumene ngokugcwele.
Futhi ngikunika umyalelo wokuthi ngaleso sikhathi uyofundisa ngayo kubo bonke abantu; ngokuba iyofundiswa kuzo zonke izizwe, izihlobo, izilimi nabantu.
Uyothatha izinto ozifumene, ezinikwe wena emibhalweni engcwele yami njengomthetho, kube wumthetho wami wokubusa ibandla lami;
Futhi lowo owenza ngokwalezi zinto uyosindiswa, futhi lowo ongazenzi uyoba ngaphansi kwamandla kaSathane uma eqhubeka kanjalo.
Uma uyocela, uyonikwa isambulo phezu kwesambulo, ulwazi phezu kolwazi, ukuze wazi izimfihlakalo nezinto zomoya wokuthula—lokho okuletha intokozo, lokho okuletha impilo yaphakade.
Wocela, futhi kuyokwambulwa kuwe ngesami isikhathi esifanele lapho kuyokwakhiwa khona iJerusalema eNtsha.
Futhi bheka, kuyokwenzeka ukuthi izinceku zami ziyothunyelwa empumalanga nasentshonalanga, enyakatho naseningizimu.
Futhi ngisho manje, lowo oya empumalanga makafundise labo abayophenduka ukuba babalekele entshonalanga, futhi lokhu ngenxa yalokho okuzayo emhlabeni, nangenxa yozungu.
Bheka, uyozigcina zonke lezi zinto, futhi uyoba mkhulu umvuzo wakho; ngokuba kini kunikiwe ukwazi izimfihlakalo zombuso, kodwa emhlabeni akunikezwanga kubo ukuzazi.
Niyoyigcina imithetho eniyifumene futhi nithembeke.
Futhi emva kwalokhu niyofumana izivumelwano zebandla, njengalezo eziyobe zanele ukunimisa, lapha kanye nase Jerusalema eNtsha.
Ngakho-ke, lowo oswele ukuhlakanipha, makacele kimi, futhi ngizomnika ngobubele futhi ngingamsoli neze.
Phakamisani izinhliziyo zenu futhi nithokoze, ngokuba umbuso ungowenu, noma ngamanye amazwi, izikhiye zebandla zinikiwe. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.
Abaphristi nabafundisi bayoba nobuphathi babo, njengamalungu.

Futhi amagosa noma abaphristi abakhulu abaqokelwe ukulekelela umbhishobhi njengabeluleki ezintweni zonke, kufanele imindeni yabo yondliwe ngempahla enikelwe kumbhishobhi, ukusiza abampofu, nokufeza ezinye izinhloso, njengoba kushiwo phambilini;
Noma kufanele bafumane inkokhelo efanele ngokusebenza kwabo konke, njengomphathi noma ngokunye, njengoba kungabonakala kufanele noma kunqume abeluleki nombhishobhi.
Futhi umbhishobhi, naye, uyofumana isondlo sakhe, noma inkokhelo efanele ngakho konke ukusebenza kwakhe ebandleni.

Bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, noma yibaphi abantu phakathi kwenu, abathi behlukanisile nabashade nabo ngesizathu sokuhlobonga, noma ngamanye amazwi, uma beyofakaza phambi kwenu ngokuzithoba konke kwenhliziyo ukuthi kunjalo, aniyukubakhiphela ngaphandle kwenu;
Kodwa uma nithola ukuthi kukhona abantu abashiye abashade nabo ngenxa yokuphinga, futhi nabo beyizoni, futhi abashade nabo bephila, bayokhishelwa ngaphandle kwenu.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, niyohlala niphapheme futhi niqaphele, ngakho konke ukubuza, ukuze ningamukeli abanjalo phakathi kwenu uma beshadile;
Futhi uma bengashadile, bayophenduka kuzo zonke izono zabo noma aniyukubamukela.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, wonke umuntu ongowalelibandla likaKristu, uyogcina yonke imiyalelo nezivumelwano zebandla.

Futhi kuyokwenzeka, ukuthi noma yibaphi abantu phakathi kwenu abayobulala bayolethwa futhi baphathwe ngokwemithetho yezwe; ngokuba khumbulani ukuthi akanakuxolelwa; futhi kuyofakazelwa ngokwemithetho yezwe.

Futhi noma iyiphi indoda noma owesifazane oyophinga, uyoquliswa phambi kwamagosa amabili ebandla, noma ngaphezulu, futhi wonke amazwi amelene naye ayoqiniswa ngofakazi ababili bebandla, futhi hhayi besitha, kodwa uma bengaphezulu kwababili ofakazi kungcono.
Kodwa uyolahlwa ngecala ngomlomo wofakazi ababili; futhi amagosa ayobeka icala phambi kwebandla, futhi ibandla liyophakamisa izandla limelene naye, ukuze baphathwe ngokomthetho kaNkulunkulu.
Futhi uma kungenzeka, kudingekile ukuthi umbhishobhi abekhona naye.
Futhi niyokwenza kanjalo kuwo wonke amacala ayobekwa phambi kwenu.
Futhi uma indoda noma owesifazane ephanga, uyolethwa emthethweni wezwe.
Futhi uma eba, uyolethwa emthethweni wezwe.
Futhi uma ekhuluma amanga, uyolethwa emthethweni wezwe.
Futhi uma enza noma yibuphi ububi, uyolethwa emthethweni, ngisho lowo kaNkulunkulu.
Futhi uma umfowenu noma udadewenu ekona, uyomthatha nihlangane nobabili kuphela; futhi uma esivuma isono niyobuyisana.
Futhi uma engasivumi isono uyomletha ebandleni, hhayi kumalungu, kodwa kumagosa. Futhi kuyokwenziwa emhlanganweni, futhi lokho kungabi phambi komhlaba.
Futhi uma umfowenu noma udadewenu ona abaningi, uyojeziswa phambi kwabaningi.
Futhi noma ubani uma ona phambi kwabantu, uyosolwa phambi kwabantu, ukuze athotshiswe. Futhi uma engasivumi isono, uyolethwa emthethweni kaNkulunkulu.
Uma noma wubani oyokona ngasese, uyosolwa ngasese, ukuze abe nethuba lokuvuma isono ngasese kulowo amonile, nakuNkulunkulu, ukuze ibandla lingakhulumi ngokudumazayo ngaye.
Futhi niyokwenza kanjalo kuzo zonke izinto.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/43.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 43
chapter_summary: 1–7, Izambulo nemiyalelo ivela kuphela ngalowo obekiweyo; 8–14, AbaNgcwele bangcweliswa ngokwenza ubungcwele bonke phambi kweNkosi; 15–22, Amagosa athunyelwa ukuba ashumayele ukuphenduka nokuba alungiselele abantu usuku olukhulu lweNkosi; 23–28, INkosi ibiza abantu ngezwi Layo uqobo nangamandla emvelo; 29–35, ImiNyaka eyiNkulungwane nokuboshwa kukaSathane kuzoza.
