verses.text: O Lalelani, nina magosa ebandla lami, nibeke indlebe emazwini engizowakhuluma kini.
Ngokuba bhekani, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, ninikwe umyalelo njengomthetho ebandleni lami, ngaye engimbekele nina ukuthola imiyalelo nezambulo esandleni sami.
Futhi lokhu niyokwazi ngokuqiniseka—ukuthi akekho omunye obekelwe nina ukuba athole imiyalelo nezambulo aze athathwe yiNkosi, uma ehlala kimi.
Kodwa ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, akekho omunye oyobekelwa lesi sipho ngaphandle uma kungaye; ngokuba uma sithathiwe kuye ngeke abe namandla ngaphandle kokubeka omunye esikhundleni sakhe.
Futhi lokhu kuyokuba wumthetho kini, ukuthi ningemukeli izimfundiso zanoma yimuphi oyoza phambi kwenu njengezambulo noma imiyalelo;
Futhi lokhu ngininika kona ukuze ningakhohliswa, ukuze nazi ukuthi azizona ezami.

Ngokuba ngiqinisile ngithi kini, lowo ogcotshwe yimi uyongena ngesango futhi agcotshwe njengoba nginitshelile phambilini, ukufundisa lezo zambulo enizitholile futhi eniyozithola ngaye lowo engimbekile.

Manje, bhekani, ngininikeza umyalelo, wokuthi uma nihlangene ndawonye niyofundisana futhi nakhane, ukuze nazi ukuthi nizokwenza kanjani futhi nizoliphatha kanjani ibandla lami, ukuthi nizolungisana kanjani ngezihloko zomthetho nemiyalelo yami, engininike yona.
Futhi ngaleyo ndlela niyofundiswa emthethweni webandla lami, futhi ningcweliswe yiloko enikufumene, futhi niyozibophezela ukuthi niziphathe ngobungcwele bonke phambi kwami—
Ukuze kuthi kangangoba nikwenza lokhu, inkazimulo iyokwengezwa embusweni eseniwufumene. Kangangoba ningakwenzi, kuzothathwa, ngisho nalokho esenikufumene.
Buhlanzeni ububi obuphakathi kwenu; zingcweliseni phambi kwami;
Futhi uma nifisa izinkazimulo zombuso, bekani inceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, futhi nimsekele phambi kwami ngomkhuleko wokukholwa.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, uma nifisa izimfihlakalo zombuso, mnikeni ukudla nezingubo, nakho konke akudingayo ukuze afeze umsebenzi engimyale ngawo;
Futhi uma ningakwenzi uzohlala kulabo abamemukele, ukuze ngizigcinele abantu abamsulwa phambi kwami.

Futhi phezu kwalokho ngithi, lalelani nina magosa ebandla lami, engiwabekile: Anithunyelwanga ukuba nifundiswe, kodwa ukuba nifundise abantwana babantu izinto engizibeke ezandleni zenu ngamandla oMoya wami;
Futhi kufanele nifundiswe kusuka phezulu. Zingcweliseni futhi niyophiwa amandla, ukuze ninike ngisho njengoba sengikhulumile.
Lalelani, ngokuba, bhekani, usuku olukhulu lweNkosi luseduze.

Ngokuba usuku luyeza lapho iNkosi iyokhuluma izwi layo eliphuma ezulwini; amazulu ayonyakaza nomhlaba uyozamazama, futhi necilongo likaNkulunkulu liyokhala kade futhi kakhulu, futhi liyothi ezizweni ezileleyo: Nina abangcwele vukani niphile; nina zoni hlalani nilale ngize ngibuye ngibize futhi.
Ngalokho-ke bophani izinkalo zenu hleze nitholakale phakathi kwababi.
Phakamisani amazwi enu futhi ningazongi. Nxusani izizwe ukuba ziphenduke, abadala nabancane, ababoshiwe nabakhululekile, nithi: Zilungiseleleni usuku olukhulu lweNkosi;

Ngokuba uma mina, engiyindoda, ngiphakamisa izwi lami futhi ngininxusa ukuba niphenduke, futhi ningizonda, niyothini ngesikhathi usuku lufika lapho ukuduma kuyozwakalisa amazwi akho kusuka emikhawulweni yomhlaba, kukhuluma ezindlebeni zabo bonke abaphilayo, kuthi—Phendukani, futhi nilungiselele usuke olukhulu lweNkosi na?

Yebo, futhi phezu kwalokho, ngesikhathi imibani iyoshaya kusuka empumalanga kuya entshonalanga, futhi iyokhuluma amazwi ayo kubo bonke abaphilayo, futhi yenze izindlebe zabo bonke abezwayo zinkeneze, isho lamazwi—Phendukani, ngokuba usuku olukhulu lweNkosi selufikile na?
Futhi phezu kwalokho, iNkosi iyokhuluma izwi layo kusuka ezulwini, ithi: Lalelani, O nina zizwe zomhlaba, futhi nizwe amazwi alowo Nkulunkulu owanenzayo.
O, nina zizwe zomhlaba, kukangaki lapho bengiyonibuthela khona ndawonye njengesikhukhukazi sibuthela amachwane aso ngaphansi kwamaphiko aso, kodwa anivumanga!

Kukangaki ngininxusa ngomlomo wezinceku zami, nangokusetshenzelwa yizingelosi, nangezwi lami, nangezwi lokuduma, nangezwi lemibani, nangezwi leziphepho, nangezwi lokuzamazama komhlaba, nangezichotho ezinkulu, nangezwi lendlala nangezifo zezinhlobo zonke, nangomsindo omkhulu wecilongo, nangezwi lokwahlulela, nangezwi lomusa usuku lonke, nangezwi lenkazimulo nodumo nengcebo yempilo yaphakade, futhi bengiyonihlenga ngensindiso yaphakade, kodwa anivumanga!
Bhekani, usuku selufikile, lapho isitsha sentukuthelo yami sesigcwele.
Bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, lawa ngamazwi eNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu.
Ngalokho-ke, sebenzani, sebenzani esivinini sami okokugcina—okokugcina nxusani abantu basemhlabeni.
Ngokuba ngesami isikhathi esifanele ngizoza emhlabeni ngizokwahlulela, futhi abantu bami bayohlengwa futhi bayobusa nami emhlabeni.
Ngokuba iNkulungwane enkulu yemiNyaka, engikhulume ngayo ngomlomo wezinceku zami, iyofika.
Ngokuba uSathane uyoboshwa, futhi lapho esekhululiwe futhi uyobusa kuphela okwesikhashana, bese kufika ukuphela komhlaba.
Futhi lowo ophila ngokulunga uyoshintshwa ngokuphazima kweso, futhi umhlaba uyodlula kanjalo njengomlilo.
Futhi ababi bayohamba baye emlilweni ongacimekiyo, futhi nesiphelo sabo akukho muntu osaziyo emhlabeni, noyoke asazi, baze bafike phambi kwami ekwahlulelweni.
Lalelani lamazwi. Bhekani, nginguJesu Kristu, umSindisi womhlaba. Gcinani lezi zinto ezinhliziyweni zenu, futhi isizotha sobuphakade masihlale ezingqondweni zenu.
Yibani nesizotha. Gcinani yonke imiyalelo yami. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/44.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 44
chapter_summary: 1–3, Amagosa kufanele abuthane emhlanganweni; 4–6, Kufanele bahlele ngokwemithetho yezwe futhi banakekele abampofu.

verses.text: Bhekani, isho kanje iNkosi kini zinceku zami, kufanele kimi ukuthi amagosa ebandla lami abizelwe ndawonye, kusuka empumalanga nasentshonalanga, nasenyakatho naseningizimu, ngencwadi noma ngenye indlela.
Futhi kuyokwenzeka, ukuthi kangangoba bethembekile, futhi besebenzisa ukukholwa kimi, ngiyothulula uMoya wami kubo ngosuku abayobuthana ngalo ndawonye.
Futhi kuyokwenzeka ukuthi bayohamba baye ezifundeni eziseduze, futhi bashumayele ukuphenduka kubantu.
Futhi abaningi bayophendulwa, kangangoba niyothola amandla okuzihlela ngokwemithetho yabantu;

Ukuze izitha zenu zingabi namandla phezu kwenu; ukuze nigcinwe ezintweni zonke; ukuze ninikwe amandla okugcina imithetho yami; ukuze bonke ubudlelwano buphulwe okungabo isitha sifuna ukubhubhisa abantu bami.
Bhekani, ngithi kini, kumele nivakashele abampofu, nabantulayo futhi nibaphe ukuze bakhululeke, ukuze bagcinwe kuze kwenziwe zonke izinto ngomthetho wami eniwufumene. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/45.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 45
chapter_summary: 1–5, UKristu ungummeli wethu kuBaba; 6–10, Ivangeli liyisithunywa ukulungisa indlela phambi kweNkosi; 11–15, U-Enoke nayakhe nabo bemukelwa yiNkosi; 16–23, UKristu wembula izimpawu zokubuya Kwakhe njengoba zanikwa eNtabeni yeMinqumo; 24–38, Ivangeli lizobuyiselwa, izikhathi zabeZizwe zizogcwaliseka, nesifo esibhubhisayo sizogcwala ezweni; 39–47, Izimpawu, izimangaliso, noVuko kuyoba khona ngokuZa kwesiBili; 48–53, UKristu uzoma phezu kweNtaba yeMinqumo, namaJuda ayowabona amanxeba ezandleni nasezinyaweni Zakhe; 54–59, INkosi izobusa ngesikhathi semiNyaka eyiNkulungwane; 60–62, UmPhrofethi uyalwa ukuba aqale ukuhumusha iTestamente eLisha, ngalo okuzokwembulwa ulwazi olubalulekile; 63–75, AbaNgcwele bayalwa ukuba babuthane futhi bakhe iJerusalema eNtsha, okuzoza kuyo abantu bezizwe zonke.

verses.text: Lalelani, O nina bantu bebandla lami, okunikwe kubo umbuso; lalelani nibeke indlebe kuye owabeka isisekelo somhlaba, owenza amazulu nakho konke okukuwo, nangaye zonke izinto zenziwa eziphilayo, nezinyakazayo, nezikhona.
Futhi phezu kwalokho ngithi, lalelani izwi lami, kungenjalo ukufa kuzoninqoba; ngesikhathi eningasicabangiyo ihlobo liyodlula, nokuvuna kufike esiphethweni, imimoya yenu ingasindisiwe.
Lalelani yena ongummeli kuBaba, oniphendulelayo ecaleni lenu phambi kwakhe—
Ethi: Baba, bheka ukuzwa ubuhlungu nokufa kwakhe lowo ongenzanga sono, ngaye owawuthokozile kakhulu; bheka igazi leNdodana yakho elaphalala, igazi lalowo owamnikela ukuze udunyiswe;
Ngalokho-ke, Baba, bahawukele laba bazalwane bami abakholwa egameni lami, ukuze beze kimi futhi bathole ukuphila okuphakade.
Lalelani, O nina bantu bebandla lami, nani magosa lalelani ndawonye, futhi nizwe izwi lami ngesikhathi kusathiwa namuhla, futhi ningaziqinisi izinhliziyo zenu;
Ngokuba ngiqinisile ngithi kini ngingu Alfa no-Omega, isiqalo nesiphetho, ukukhanya nokuphila komhlaba—ukukhanya okukhanye ebumnyameni futhi ubumnyama abukuqondanga.

Ngeza kwabami, futhi abami abangemukelanga; kodwa kulabo abaningi abangemukeleyo ngibanike amandla okwenza izimangaliso eziningi, futhi nokuba ngamadodana kaNkulunkulu; futhi ngisho nakulabo abakholwe egameni lami ngibanike amandla okufumana ukuphila okuphakade.

Futhi kanjalo-ke ngithumele esami isivumelwano saphakade emhlabeni, ukuze sibe wukukhanya komhlaba, futhi ukuze sibe yisibonelo sabantu bami, nesabeZizwe ukuze babheke kuso, nokuba yisithunywa phambi kobuso bami ukulungisa indlela ngaphambi kwami.
Ngalokho-ke, wozani kuso, futhi ngizokhuluma nalowo ozayo njengabantu ezinsukwini zakudala, futhi ngizonitshengisa ingqondo yami enamandla.
Ngalokho-ke, lalelani ndawonye futhi ningivumele nginitshengise ngisho nokuhlakanipha kwami—ukuhlakanipha kwakhe lowo enithi unguNkulunkulu ka-Enoke, nayakhe nabo,
Abahlukaniswa nomhlaba, futhi bemukelwa kimi—idolobha eligodliwe kuze kube usuku lokulunga luyafika—usuku olwafunwa yibo bonke abantu abangcwele, futhi bangaluthola ngenxa yobubi nezinengiso;
Futhi bavuma ukuthi babengaziwa futhi beyizihambi emhlabeni;
Kodwa bathola isethembiso sokuthi kufanele baluthole futhi balubone enyameni yabo.
Ngalokho-ke, lalelani futhi ngizophendulana nani, futhi ngizokhuluma kini futhi ngiphrofethe, njengakubantu ezinsukwini zakudala.

Futhi ngizokwazisa kucace njengoba ngakwazisa kubafundi bami ngenkathi ngime phambi kwabo enyameni, futhi ngikhuluma nabo, ngithi: Njengoba ningibuzile mayelana nezimpawu zokuza kwami, osukwini lapho ngiyoza ngisenkazimulweni yami emafwini ezulu, ukugcwalisa izethembiso engizenzile koyihlo,

Ngokuba njengoba nibuke ukungabi bikho okude kwemimoya yenu emizimbeni yenu kuwukuthumbeka, ngizonitshengisa ukuthi usuku lokukhululwa kuyofika kanjani, nokubuyiselwa kabusha kuka-Israyeli ohlakazekile.
Manje niyalibona lelithempeli eliseJerusalema, enilibiza ngendlu kaNkulunkulu, futhi izitha zenu zithi lendlu ngeke ibhidlike.
Kodwa, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, incithakalo iyofika kulesi sizukulwana njengesela ebusuku, futhi nalaba bantu bayobhujiswa futhi bahlakazeke ezizweni zonke.
Futhi lelithempeli enilibonayo manje liyolahlwa phansi kangangoba akuyikusala itshe phezu kwelinye.
Futhi kuyokwenzeka, ukuthi lesi sizukulwane samaJuda ngeke sidlule kuze kube yonke incithakalo enginitshele ngayo ngokuphathelene nabo iyokwenzeka.
Nithi niyazi ukuthi ukuphela komhlaba kuyeza; nithi futhi niyazi ukuthi amazulu nomhlaba kuyodlula;
Futhi kulokhu nisho okuyikho, ngokuba kunjalo; kodwa lezi zinto enginitshele ngazo ngeke zenzeke kuze kube konke kuyagcwaliseka.
Futhi lokhu nginitshelile ngokuphathelene neJerusalema; futhi uma lolosuku lufika, insali iyohlakazwa ezizweni zonke;
Kodwa bayoqoqwa futhi; kodwa bayohlala kulesosimo kuze kube izikhathi zabeZizwe ziyagcwaliseka.

Futhi kulolosuku kuyozwakala izimpi namahemuhemu ezimpi, futhi umhlaba wonke uyoba yisiyaluyalu, futhi abantu bayophela amandla, futhi bayothi uKristu ulibazisa ukubuya kwakhe kuze kube wukuphela komhlaba.
Nothando lwabantu luyophola lubande, nobubi buyokwanda.
Futhi uma isikhathi sabeZizwe sesifika, kuyovela ukukhanya ngokungazelele kulabo abahleli ebumnyameni, futhi kuyoba wukuphelela kwevangeli lami;
Kodwa abalamukeli; ngokuba abakuqondi ukukhanya, futhi bayazisusa izinhliziyo zabo kimi ngenxa yezimfundiso zabantu.
Futhi kuleso sizukulwane izikhathi zabeZizwe ziyogcwaliseka.
Futhi kuyoba khona abantu abayoma kuleso sizukulwane abangeyukudlula baze babone isijeziso esisakazekile; ngokuba isifo esichithayo siyogcwala izwe.
Kodwa abafundi bami bayoma ezindaweni ezingcwele, futhi ngeke banyakaziswe; kodwa phakathi kwababi, abantu bayophakamisa amazwi abo baqalekise uNkulunkulu bafe.

Futhi kuyoba khona ukuzamazama komhlaba ezindaweni ezahlukahlukene, nezincithakalo eziningi; kodwa abantu bayoziqinisa izinhliziyo zabo ngokumelene nami, futhi bayothathelana inkemba, futhi bayobulalana.
Manje, ngesikhathi mina iNkosi sengikhulumile lawa mazwi kubafundi bami, bakhathazeka.
Futhi ngathi kubo: Ningakhathazeki, ngokuba, uma zonke lezi zinto sezenzeka, anokwazi ukuthi izethembiso ezenziwe kini ziyogcwaliseka.
Futhi uma ukukhanya sekuqala ukuvela, kuyokuba ngokuphathelene nabo njengomfanekiso engizonitshengisa wona—
Niyabuka futhi nibheke izihlahla zomkhiwane, futhi niyazibona ngamehlo enu, futhi nithi uma seziqala ukuhluma, futhi amaqabunga azo esentekenteke, ukuthi ihlobo seliseduze;
Kanjalo-ke kuyoba njalo kulolo suku ngesikhathi beyobona zonke lezi zinto, bayobe sebazi ukuthi ihora selisondele.
Futhi kuyokwenzeka ukuthi lowo ongisabayo uyobe ebheke phambili elindele usuku olukhulu lokubuya kweNkosi, ngisho elindele izimpawu zokuza kwe Ndodana yoMuntu.
Futhi bayobona izibonakaliso nezimangaliso, ngokuba ziyotshengiswa emazulwini phezulu, nasemhlabeni ngaphansi.
Futhi bayobona igazi, nomlilo, nokushunqa komusi.
Futhi ngaphambi kokufika kosuku lweNkosi, ilanga liyofiphazwa, futhi nenyanga iguqulwe ibe yigazi, futhi nezinkanyezi ziyowa zisuka ezulwini.
Futhi insali iyoqoqelwa kulendawo;

Futhi ngaleso sikhathi bayobe bengilindele, futhi, bheka, ngiyoza; futhi bayongibona emafwini asezulwini, ngimbathiswe amandla futhi nenkulu inkazimulo; nazo zonke izingelosi ezingcwele; futhi lowo ongangilindele uyosuswa.
Kodwa ngaphambi kokuba ingalo yeNkosi yehle, ingelosi iyoshaya icilongo layo, futhi nabangcwele asebalala bayovuka ukuyongihlangabeza efwini.

Ngalokho-ke, uma nife nino moya wokuthula nibusisiwe; ngokuba njengoba ningibona futhi nazi ukuthi nginguye, kanjalo-ke niyokuza kimi nemimoya yenu iyophila, futhi nokuhlengwa kwenu kuyopheleliswa; futhi abangcwele bayoza bevela emagunjini amane omhlaba.
Emva kwalokho ingalo yeNkosi iyokwehlela phezu kwezizwe.
Futhi emva kwalokho iNkosi iyobeka unyawo lwayo phezu kwalentaba, futhi iyoqhekezeka kabili, futhi nomhlaba uyozamazama, futhi untengezele nokuntengezela, futhi amazulu nawo ayozamazama.
Futhi iNkosi iyokhuluma izwi layo, futhi imikhawulo yonke yomhlaba iyolizwa, futhi izizwe zomhlaba ziyolila, futhi nalabo abahlekile bayobubona ubuwula babo.
Futhi usizi luyomsibekela lowo ohleka usulu, futhi nesideleli siyoshatshalaliswa; futhi labo abahlalela ububi bayosuswa futhi baphoswe emlilweni.
Futhi emva kwalokho amaJuda ayongibuka futhi athi: Awani lamanxeba asezandleni zakho nasezinyaweni zakho na?

Emva kwalokho bayokwazi ukuthi ngiyiNkosi; ngokuba ngiyothi kubo: Lamanxeba amanxeba engalinyazwa ngawo endlini yabahlobo bami. Nginguye owaphakanyiselwa phezulu. NginguJesu owanqanyulezwa. NgiyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu.
Futhi emva kwalokho bayokhala ngenxa yobubi babo; emva kwalokho bayolila ngokuba bahlupha inkosi yabo.
Futhi emva kwalokho izizwe ezingabahedeni ziyokhululwa, nalabo ababengazi mthetho bayoba nesabelo ovukweni lokuqala; futhi bayoba nokubekezelelwa.
Futhi uSathane uyoboshwa, kangangoba akayikuba nandawo ezinhliziyweni zabantwana babantu.
Futhi ngalolo suku, ngesikhathi ngiyokuza ngisenkazimulweni yami, umfanekiso uyogcwaliseka engakhuluma ngawo mayelana nezintombi ezilishumi.

Ngokuba labo abahlakaniphile futhi abemukele iqiniso, futhi abemukele uMoya oNgcwele waba ngumqondisi wabo, futhi abangakhohlisekanga—ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngeke bacekelwe phansi baphoswe emlilweni, kodwa bayomelana nalolo suku.
Futhi umhlaba uyonikwa bona ube yifa; futhi bayokwanda futhi bakhule ngamandla, nabantwana babo bayokhula bengenasono kuze kube sensindisweni.
Ngokuba iNkosi iyoba phakathi kwabo, futhi nenkazimulo yayo iyoba phezu kwabo, futhi iyoba yinkosi yabo nomnikimthetho wabo.
Manje, bheka, ngithi kuwe, ngeke kusanikwa kuwe ukwazi noma yikuphi okunye mayelana nalesi sahluko, lize lihunyushwe iTestamente eLisha, futhi kulo zonke lezi zinto ziyokwaziswa;
Ngalokho-ke ngikuvumela ukuthi usungalihumusha, ukuze ulungiselelwe izinto ezizayo.
Ngokuba ngiqinisile ngithi kini, zinkulu izinto ezinilindele;
Nizwa ngezimpi zakwamanye amazwe; kodwa, bhekani, ngithi kini, ziseduze, ngisho eminyango yenu, futhi kungakabi minyaka emingaki kusuka manje nizokuzwa ngezimpi emazweni enu.

Ngalokho-ke mina, iNkosi, ngithe, qoqanani nisuke emazweni asempumalanga, buthanani ndawonye nina magosa ebandla lami; hambani niye emazweni asentshonalanga, ninxuse abahlali ukuba baphenduke, futhi kangangoba bephenduka, ngakheleni amabandla.
Futhi ngenhliziyo yinye nangengqondo yinye, qoqani ingcebo yenu ukuze nithenge ifa enizonikezwa lona emva kwalokhu.
Futhi liyokubizwa ngokuthi yiJerusalema eNtsha, izwe lomoya wokuthula, umuzi wokuphephela, indawo yokuphepha yabangcwele baNkulunkulu oPhakeme kaKhulu;
Futhi inkazimulo yeNkosi iyoba lapho, nokwesabeka kweNkosi nakho kuyoba lapho, kangangoba ababi abayukuza kulo, futhi liyobizwa ngokuthi iSiyoni.
Futhi kuyokwenzeka phakathi kwababi, ukuthi wonke umuntu ongezukuthatha inkemba abhekane nomakhelwane wakhe kuzofanele abalekele eSiyoni ukuze aphephe.
Futhi lapho kuyobuthana kulo izizwe zonke phansi kwezulu; futhi kuyoba yibo kuphela abantu abangayikuba sempini omunye komunye.
Futhi kuyothiwa phakathi kwababi: Asingayini ukuyolwa neSiyoni, ngokuba abahlali baseSiyoni bayesabeka; ngalokho-ke ngeke sime.
Futhi kuyokwenzeka ukuthi abalungileyo bayoqoqwa phakathi kwazo zonke izizwe, futhi bayokuza eSiyoni, becula amaculo enjabulo yaphakade.

Manje ngithi kini, gcinani lezizinto zingayi ngaphandle emhlabeni ngize ngikubone kufanele, ukuze nifeze lomsebenzi emehlweni abantu, nasemehlweni ezitha zenu, ukuze bangayazi imisebenzi yenu kuze kube senikufezile lokho enginiyale ngakho;
Ukuze ngesikhathi abayokwazi ngaso, bacabange ngalezi zinto.
Ngokuba ngesikhathi iNkosi eyovela ngaso iyokwesabeka kubo, kangangoba ukwesaba kuyoba phezu kwabo, futhi bayokuma kude futhi baqhaqhazele.
Futhi zonke izizwe ziyokwesaba ngenxa yokwesabeka kweNkosi, namandla akhe amakhulu. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/46.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 46
chapter_summary: 1–2, Amagosa kufanele aphathe imihlangano njengoba eholwa nguMoya oNgcwele; 3–6, Abafuna iqiniso akufanele benqatshelwe ukungena enkonzweni yesidlo esingcwele; 7–12, Buza kuNkulunkulu futhi ufune izipho zikaMoya; 13–26, Ukubalwa kwezinye zalezi zipho kuyanikwa; 27–33, Abaholi beBandla banikwa amandla okubona izipho zikaMoya.

verses.text: Lalelani, O nina bantu bebandla lami; ngokuba ngiqinisile ngithi kini lezi zinto zakhulunywa kini ukuze nizuze inzuzo futhi nifunde.
Kodwa nakuba kunezinto ezibhaliwe, bekulokhu kwanikezwa amagosa ebandla lami kusuka ekuqaleni, futhi kohlala kunjalo, ukuphatha yonke imihlangano njengoba beqondiswe futhi beholwa nguMoya oNgcwele.
Nokho niyaliwe ukuba ningakhiphi namunye ngaphandle kwemihlangano yenu yawo wonke umuntu, ebanjelwa phambi kwabantu.
Niyaliwe futhi ukuba ningakhiphi namunye ongowe bandla ngaphandle kwemihlangano yenu yesidlo esingcwele; nokho, uma kukhona owonile, ningamvumeli athathe isidlo aze enze ukubuyisana.
Futhi phezu kwalokho ngithi kini, ningakhiphi muntu ngaphandle emihlanganweni yenu yesidlo esingcwele abafuna umbuso ngeqiniso—ngikhuluma lokhu ngokuphathelene nalabo abangesibo abebandla.
Futhi phezu kwalokho ngithi kini, ngokuphathelene nemihlangano yenu yokuqinisa, uma kukhona noma ngobani abangebona abebandla, abafuna umbuso ngeqiniso, ningabakhiphi ngaphandle.

Kodwa niya yalwa kuzo zonke izinto ukuba nicele kuNkulunkulu, ophana ngobuhle; futhi lokho okufakazwa nguMoya kini kanjalo-ke ngifuna nikwenze ngobungcwele bonke benhliziyo, nihamba ngobuqotho phambi kwami, nicabanga ngomphumela wensindiso yenu, nenza zonke izinto ngomkhuleko nokubonga, ukuze ningayengwa yimimoya emibi, noma yizimfundiso zodeveli, noma yimiyalelo yabantu; ngokuba eminye ngeyabantu, futhi neminye ngeyodeveli.
Ngalokho-ke, qaphelani kungenjalo nizokhohliseka; futhi ukuze ningakhohliseki funani ngeqiniso izipho ezinhle kakhulu, nikhumbula njalo ukuthi zinikelwani;

Ngokuba ngiqinisile ngithi kini, zinikwe ukuze kuzuze labo abangithandayo nabagcina yonke imiyalelo yami, futhi nalowo ofuna ukwenza njalo; ukuze bonke bazuze labo abafuna noma abacela kimi, labo abacelayo nabangaceli isibonakaliso ukuze banelise izinkanuko zabo.
Futhi, phezu kwalokho ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngifisa ukuthi nikhumbule njalo, futhi njalo nikugcine ezingqondweni zenu ukuthi ziyini lezo zipho, ezinikwa ibandla.
Ngokuba akubona bonke abanikwe zonke izipho; ngokuba ziningi izipho, futhi kuwo wonke umuntu unikezwe isipho ngoMoya kaNkulunkulu.
Kwabanye kunikwa esinye, nakwabanye kwanikwa esinye, ukuze bonke bazuze ngazo.
Kwabanye kunikwa ngoMoya oNgcwele ukuba bazi ukuthi uJesu Kristu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, nokuthi wabethelelwa izono zomhlaba.
Kwabanye kunikwa ukukholwa emazwini abo, ukuze nabo bathole ukuphila kwaphakade uma beqhubeka nokukholwa.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, kwabanye kunikwa ngoMoya oNgcwele ukuba bazi izindlela zokuphatha ezahlukene, njengoba kuthokozisa kuleyoNkosi efanayo, njengokufisa kweNkosi, yenza umusa wayo ngokwezimo zabantwana babantu.
Futhi, kunikwa ngoMoya oNgcwele kwabanye ukuba bazi imisebenzi yamandla eyahlukeneyo, noma ngabe ngekaNkulunkulu yini, ukuze izibonakaliso zikaMoya zinikwe kuwo wonke umuntu ukuze bonke bazuze ngazo.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, kwabanye kunikiwe, ngoMoya kaNkulunkulu, izwi lokuhlakanipha.
Komunye kunikwe izwi lokwazi, ukuze bonke bafundiswe ukuba bahlakaniphe nokuba babe nolwazi.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, kwabanye kunikiwe ukuba babe nokukholwa ukuba baphiliswe;
Futhi kwabanye kunikiwe ukuba babe nokukholwa kokuba baphilise;
Futhi phezu kwalokho, kwabanye kunikiwe ukuba benze izimangaliso;
Futhi kwabanye kunikiwe ukuba baphrofethe;
Futhi kwabanye ukwahlukanisa imimoya.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, kunikiwe kwabanye ukuba bakhulume ngezilimi;
Futhi komunye kunikezwe ukuhumusha izilimi.
Futhi zonke lezi zipho zivela kuNkulunkulu, ukuze kuzuze abantwana baNkulunkulu.

Futhi kumbhishobhi webandla, futhi nakulabo uNkulunkulu ayobabeka futhi abagcobe ukuba bavikele ibandla futhi nokuba babe ngamagosa ebandleni, bayonikwa ukwahlukanisa zonke lezo zipho ukuze kungabi bikho namunye phakathi kwenu ozenza onezipho zokuphrofetha futhi engeyena okaNkulunkulu.
Futhi kuyokwenzeka ukuthi lowo ocela ngokoMoya uyothola ngokoMoya;
Ukuze kwabanye kunikezwe ukuba babe nazo zonke lezo zipho, ukuze kube nenhloko, ukuze onke amalungu azuze ngazo.
Lowo ocela ngokoMoya ucela ngokwentando kaNkulunkulu; ngalokho-ke kwenziwa ngisho njengoba ecelile.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, zonke izinto kumele zenziwe egameni likaKristu, nanoma yini eniyenza ngokoMoya;
Futhi kumele nibonge uNkulunkulu ngokoMoya nganoma yisiphi isibusiso enibusiswa ngaso.
Futhi kumele nenze ukulunga nobungcwele phambi kwami njalonjalo. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/47.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 47
chapter_summary: 1–4, UJohn Whitmer ukhethwa ukuba agcine umlando weBandla nokubhalela umPhrofethi.

verses.text: Bheka, ngikubona kufanele ukuthi inceku yami uJohn abhale futhi agcine ngokulandelana umlando, futhi akusize, nceku yami uJoseph, ekubhaleni zonke izinto eziyonikezwa kuwe, kuze kube ubizelwa kweminye imisebenzi.
Futhi, ngiqinisile ngithi kini angaliphakamisa futhi izwi lakhe emihlanganweni, noma yinini uma kuyobe kufanelekile.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kuwe kuyobekwa kuye ukuba agcine imibhalo yebandla nomlando njalonjalo; ngokuba u-Oliver Cowdery sengimbeke komunye umsebenzi.
Ngalokho-ke, kuyonikwa kuye, kangangoba ethembekile, ngoMduduzi, ukubhala lezi zinto. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/48.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 48
chapter_summary: 1–3, AbaNgcwele abase-Ohio kufanele babelane imihlaba yabo nabazalwane babo; 4–6, AbaNgcwele kufanele bathenge imihlaba, bakhe idolobha, futhi balandele iseluleko sabaholi babo abengamele.

verses.text: Kudingekile ukuthi nihlale okwesikhathi samanje ezindaweni zenu zokuhlala, njengoba kuyohambisana nezimo zenu.
Futhi kangangoba ninemihlaba, niyobapha kubafowenu abangasempumalanga;
Futhi kangangoba ningenayo imihlaba, mabathenge okwesikhathi samanje ezifundeni eziseduze, njengoba kubonakala kukuhle kubo, ngokuba kunesidingo sokuthi babe nezindawo zokuhlala okwesikhathi samanje.

Kudingekile ukuthi nonge yonke imali eningakwazi ukuyonga, futhi nokuthi nithole konke eningakwazi ukukuthola ngokulunga, ukuze ngokuhamba kwesikhathi nikwazi ukuthenga imihlaba ezoba yifa, ngisho idolobha.
Indawo akukafanele yambulwe okwamanje; kodwa emva kokufika kwabafowenu abasuka empumalanga kufanele kubekhona amadoda athile azobekwa, futhi azokwaziswa indawo, noma kuyokwambulwa kuwo.

Futhi bayobekwa ukuze bathenge imihlaba, futhi nokuqalisa ukubeka isisekelo sedolobha; futhi ngalesosikhathi niyoqala ukubuthana ndawonye nemindeni yethu, wonke umuntu ngokomndeni wakhe, ngokwezimo zakhe, nanjengokunikezwa kwakhe ngobumongameli nombhishobhi webandla, ngokwemithetho nemiyalelo eniyitholile, nenisazoyithola emva kwalokhu. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/49.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 49
chapter_summary: 1–7, Usuku nehora lokubuya kukaKristu luyohlala lungaziwa aze Abuye; 8–14, Abantu kufanele baphenduke, bakholwe yivangeli, futhi bathobele izimiso ukuze bazuze insindiso; 15–16, Umshado umiswe nguNkulunkulu; 17–21, Ukudla inyama kuvumelekile; 22–28, ISiyoni iyochuma namaLamani aqhakaze njengembali ngaphambi kokukuZa kwesiBili.

verses.text: Lalelani izwi lami, zinceku zami uSidney, noParley, noLeman; ngokuba bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngininika umyalelo wokuthi niyohamba nishumayele ivangeli lami enilamukele, njengoba nilitholile, kumaShakers.
Bhekani, ngithi kini, balangazelela ukwazi ingxenye yeqiniso, kodwa hhayi lonke, ngokuba abalungile phambi kwami futhi kufanele baphenduke.
Ngalokho-ke, ngiyanithuma, zinceku zami uSidney noParley, ukuyoshumayela ivangeli kubo.

Futhi inceku yami uLeman uyogcotshelwa lomsebenzi, ukuze akhulume nabo, hhayi ngalokho akuthole kubo, kodwa ngalokho azofundiswa kona yini zinceku zami; futhi ngokwenzenjalo ngizombusisa, ngale kwaloko ngeke aphumelele.

Isho kanje iNkosi; ngokuba nginguNkulunkulu, futhi ngithume iNdodana yami Ezelwe Yodwa emhlabeni ukuzohlenga umhlaba, futhi nginqumile ukuthi oyamukelayo uyosindiswa, futhi lowo ongayemukeli uyoba ngaphansi kwamandla kaSathane—

Futhi benze eNdodaneni Yomuntu njengoba bethanda; futhi usethathe amandla akhe kwesokunene isandla senkazimulo yakhe, manje ubusa emazulwini, futhi uzobusa aze ehlele emhlabeni ukuzobeka zonke izitha zakhe ngaphansi kwezinyawo zakhe, okuyisikhathi esesiseduze—
Mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, sengikukhulumile, kodwa ihora nosuku akukho muntu olaziyo, ngisho izingelosi ezulwini, futhi ngeke zazi aze abuye.
Ngalokho-ke, ngifisa ukuthi wonke umuntu aphenduke, ngokuba bonke bangaphansi kwesono, ngaphandle kwalabo engizibekele bona, abantu abangcwele eningazi ngabo.
Ngalokho-ke, ngithi kini ngithumele kini esami isivumelwano saphakade, ngisho lokho okwakukhona kusukela ekuqaleni.
Futhi lokho engikuthembisile ngikufezile, futhi izizwe zomhlaba ziyokukhothamela; futhi, uma zingakhothami ngokwazo, zizokwehliswa, ngakuba lokho okuziphakamisileyo kuzokwehliswa ngamandla.
Ngalokho-ke, ngininikeza umyalelo wokuthi niye phakathi kwalaba bantu, futhi nithi kubo, njengomphostoli wami wakudala, ogamalakhe linguPetru:
Kholwani egameni leNkosi uJesu, owayesemhlabeni, futhi nozayo, isiqalo nesiphetho;
Phendukani futhi nibhabhadiswe egameni likaJesu Kristu, ngokwemiyalelo engcwele, ukuze nithole ukuthethelelwa kwezono;
Futhi lowo owenza lokhu uyofumana isipho sikaMoya oNgcwele, ngokubekwa izandla ngamagosa ebandla.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, lowo owenqaba ukuganana akagcotshiwe ngokukaNkulunkulu, ngokuba umshado umiselwe abantu nguNkulunkulu.
Ngalokho-ke, kusemthethweni ukuthi abe nomfazi oyedwa, futhi bobabili bayoba nyamanye, futhi konke lokhu ukuze umhlaba ugcwalise inhloso yendalo yawo;
Futhi ukuze ugcwaliswe ngenani labantu, ngokwendalo yakhe ngaphambi kokwenziwa komhlaba.
Futhi lowo owenqaba ukuthi kudliwe inyama, ukuthi umuntu angakudli lokho, akagcotshiwe ngokukaNkulunkulu;
Ngokuba, bhekani, izilwane zasendle nezinyoni zezulu, nalokho okuphuma emhlabeni, kubekelwe ukusetshenziswa ngumuntu ukuba adle nokuba embathe, futhi ukuze abenako kubekuningi.
Kodwa akuvunyelwe ukuthi umuntu oyedwa abe nalokho okungaphezulu komunye, ngalokho-ke umhlaba uhlezi esonweni.
Futhi maye kumuntu ochitha igazi noma omosa inyama futhi engenasidingo.
Futhi, phezu kwalokho ngithi kini, iNdodana yoMuntu ayizi ngesimo sowesimame, noma sendoda ehamba emhlabeni.

Ngalokho-ke, ningadukiswa, kodwa qhubekani niqine, nibheke phambili ukuthi amazulu anyakaziswe, nomhlaba uzamazame futhi untengezele njengomuntu ophuzile, futhi nezigodi ziphakanyiswe, nezintaba zehliswe, futhi namagoxigoxi abe ngamathafa—futhi konke lokhu ngesikhathi ingelosi iyozwakalisa icilongo layo.
Kodwa ngaphambi kokufika kosuku olukhulu lweNkosi, uJakobe uyochuma ehlane, futhi namaLamani ayoqhakaza njengembali.
ISiyoni iyochuma phezu kwamaqguma futhi ijabule phezu kwezintaba, futhi iyobuthana ndawonye endaweni engiyimisileyo.
Bhekani, ngithi kini, hambani njengoba nginiyalile; phendukani ezonweni zenu; celani futhi nizofumana; ngqongqothani futhi nizovulelwa.
Bhekani, ngizohamba phambi kwenu futhi ngibe ngasemumva kwenu; futhi ngiyoba phakathi kwenu; futhi ngeke nivinjelwe.
Bhekani, nginguJesu Kristu, futhi ngiza masinyane. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/50.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 50
chapter_summary: 1–5, Miningi imimoya ekhohlisayo ndawozonke emhlabeni; 6–9, Maye kubazenzisi nakulabo abasusiwe eBandleni; 10–14, Amagosa kufanele ashumayele ivangeli ngoMoya; 15–22, Abashumayeli nabezwayo kudingeka bakhanyiselwe nguMoya; 23–25, Lokho okungakhiyo akukona okukaNkulunkulu; 26–28, Abakholwayo bangabanini bezinto zonke; 29–36, Imikhuleko yabangcwelisiwe iyaphendulwa; 37–46, UKristu unguMelusi oMuhle neTshe likaIsrayeli.

verses.text: Lalelani, O nina magosa ebandla lami, futhi ninike indlebe ezwini likaNkulunkulu ophilayo; futhi ninake amazwi okuhlakanipha ayonikezwa nina, njengokucela kwenu futhi nivumelene ngokuthinta ibandla, nemimoya esabalele ndawozonke emhlabeni.
Bhekani, ngithi kini, miningi imimoya ekhohlisayo, esabalele izwe lonke, ikhohlisa umhlaba.
Futhi uSathane ufune ukunikhohlisa, ukuze aniwise.
Bhekani, mina, iNkosi, nginibukile, futhi ngabona izinengiso ebandleni elimemezela igama lami.
Kodwa babusisiwe labo abathembekile nababekezelayo, noma kusekuphileni noma kusekufeni, ngokuba bayodla ifa lempilo engunaphakade.
Kodwa maye kulabo abangabakhohlisi nabazenzisi, ngokuba, isho kanje iNkosi, ngizobaletha ekwahlulelweni.
Bhekani, ngithi kini, kunabakhohlisi phakathi kwenu, asebekhohlise abanye, osekunikeze isitha amandla; kodwa bhekani abanjalo bazobuyiswa;
Kodwa abazenzisi bayokhonjwa futhi bayosuswa, noma kusekuphileni noma kusekufeni, ngisho njengokuthanda kwami; futhi maye kulabo abasusiwe ebandleni lami, ngokuba abanjalo banqotshwa ngumhlaba.
Ngalokho-ke, wonke umuntu makazi funa enze lokho okungelona iqiniso nokulunga phambi kwami.
Futhi wozani manje, kusho iNkosi, ngoMoya, kumagosa ebandla lakhe, futhi masikhulume, ukuze niqonde;
Masikhulume njengomuntu ekhuluma nomunye ubuso nobuso.
Manje, uma umuntu ekhuluma uyaqondwa ngumuntu, ngokuba ukhuluma njengomuntu; kanjalo-ke nami, iNkosi, ngizokhuluma nani ukuze niqonde.
Ngalokho-ke, mina iNkosi nginibuza lombuzo—nagcotshelwa ini na?
Ukushumayela ivangeli lami ngoMoya, ngisho uMduduzi owathunyelwa ukufundisa iqiniso.
Futhi emuva kwalokho nase nemukela imimoya enaningeke niyiqonde, futhi niyamukele ngoba nithi isuka kuNkulunkulu; futhi kulokhu ngabe aninacala na?
Bhekani nizowuphendula lombuzo nina uqobo; nokho, ngiyoba nomusa kini; lowo obuthakathaka phakathi kwenu emva kwalokhu uyokwenziwa aqine.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, lowo ogcotshwe yimi futhi nothunyiwe ukushumayela izwi leqiniso ngoMduduzi, ngoMoya weqiniso, ngabe ulishumayela ngoMoya weqiniso noma ngenye indlela na?
Futhi uma kungenye indlela akuyona ekaNkulunkulu.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, lowo olamukelayo izwi leqiniso, ngabe ulamukela ngoMoya weqiniso noma ngenye indlela na?
Uma kungenye indlela akuyona ekaNkulunkulu.
Ngakho-ke, kungani ningaqondi futhi nazi, ukuthi lowo owemukela izwi ngoMoya weqiniso ulemukela njengoba lishunyayelwa ngoMoya weqiniso na?
Ngalokho-ke, lowo oshumayelayo nalowo owemukelayo, bayaqonda omunye nomunye, futhi bobabili bayakhana futhi bajabule ndawonye.
Futhi lokho okungakhiyo akukona okukaNkulunkulu, futhi kungubumnyama.
Lokho okungokukaNkulunkulu kungukukhanya; futhi lowo owemukela ukukhanya, nohlala kuNkulunkulu, ufumana ukukhanya okuningi; futhi lokho kukhanya kuyakhula futhi kukhule kuze kube semini.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, futhi ngikusho lokhu ukuze nazi iqiniso, ukuze nixoshe ubumnyama phakathi kwenu;
Lowo ogcotshiweyo ngokuka Nkulunkulu futhi wathunywa, nguye lowo obekwe ukuba abe ngomkhulu kunani nonke, nakuba engomncane kubo bonke futhi eyinceku yabo bonke.
Ngalokho-ke, ungumnini wezinto zonke; ngokuba zonke izinto zingaphansi kwakhe, ezulwini nasemhlabeni, impilo nokukhanya, uMoya namandla, okuthunywe ngentando kaBaba ngoJesu Kristu, iNdodana yakhe.
Kodwa akukho muntu ongumnini wezinto zonke ngaphandle kokuba ecwebisiwe futhi wahlanzwa kuzo zonke izono.
Futhi uma nicwebisiwe futhi nahlanzwa kuzo zonke izono, niyocela noma yini eniyifisayo egameni likaJesu futhi kuyokwenziwa.
Kodwa yazini lokhu, kuyonikwa kini eniyokucela; futhi njengoba nibekiwe ukuba yizinhloko, imimoya iyoba ngaphansi kwenu.

Ngalokho-ke, kuyokwenzeka, ukuthi uma nibona umoya eningawuqondi ubonakaliswa, futhi ningawemukeli lowo moya, niyobuza kuBaba egameni likaJesu; futhi uma enganiniki lowomoya, ngalokho niyokwazi ukuthi akuwona okaNkulunkulu.
Futhi kuyonikwa kini, amandla phezu kwalowo moya; futhi niyomemezela ngokumelene nalowomoya ngezwi elikhulu ukuthi akuwona okaNkulunkulu—
Kungabi ngokusola kokuhlambalaza, ukuze ninganqotshwa, noma ngokuziqhayisa noma ukujabula, hleze ningenwe yiwo.
Lowo ofumana okukaNkulunkulu, makakwazise lokho njengokuvela kuNkulunkulu; futhi makajabule ukuthi ubonwe nguNkulunkulu efanele ukukufumana.
Futhi ngokunaka nokwenza lezi zinto enizifumene, nenizozifumana emva kwalokhu—futhi umbuso ninikiwe wona nguBaba, futhi namandla okunqoba zonke izinto ezingagcotshwanga nguye—
Futhi bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, nibusisiwe nina eniwezwayo manje lamazwi ami ngomlomo wenceku yami, ngokuba izono zenu zixolelwe.
Inceku yami uJoseph Wakefield, engithokozayo ngaye, nenceku yami uParley P. Pratt mabahambe baye phakathi kwamabandla futhi bawaqinise ngezwi lokukhuthaza;

Futhi nenceku yami uJohn Corrill, noma abaningi bezinceku zami abagcotshiweyo kulesi sikhundla, futhi mabasebenze esivinini; futhi makungabi bikho muntu obaphazamisayo ekwenzeni lokho engikumisele bona—
Ngalokho-ke, kulento inceku yami u-Edward Partridge akaxolelwe; nokho makaphenduke futhi uzothethelelwa.
Bhekani, ningabantwana abancane futhi anikwazi ukuthwala zonke izinto manje; kufanele nikhule emseni nasolwazini lweqiniso.
Ningesabi, bantwana abancane, ngokuba ningabami, futhi ngiwunqobile umhlaba, futhi niyibo labo uBaba anginike bona;
Futhi abekho kulabo uBaba anginike bona abayolahleka.
Futhi uBaba nami simunye. Mina ngikuBaba naye uBaba ukimi; futhi kangangoba ningemukelile mina, nikimi nami ngikini.
Ngalokho-ke, ngiphakathi kwenu, futhi ngingumalusi omuhle, netshe lika-Israyeli. Lowo owakhela phezu kwaleli dwala akasoze awa.
Futhi usuku luyeza lapho niyolizwa izwi lami futhi ningibone, futhi nibone ukuthi nginguye.
Ngakho-ke, lindani, ukuze nihlale nilungile. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/51.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 51
chapter_summary: 1–8, U-Edward Partridge ubekwa ukuba alawule ubuphathi nezimpahla; 9–12, AbaNgcwele kufanele bathembeke omunye komunye futhi bafumane ngokulinganayo; 13–15, Kufanele babe nendlu yengcebo kambhishobhi futhi bahlele izimpahla ngokomthetho weNkosi; 16–20, I-Ohio kufanele kube yindawo yokuhlanganela yesikhashana.

verses.text: Ngilaleleni, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu, futhi ngizokhuluma encekwini yami u-Edward Partridge, futhi ngizomnika izindlela; ngokuba kunesidingo sokuthi anikwe izindlela zokuthi bazohlelwa kanjani laba bantu.
Ngokuba kunesidingo sokuthi bahlelwe ngokwe mithetho yami; uma kungenjalo, bazosuswa.

Ngalokho-ke, inceku yami u-Edward Partridge, nalabo abakhethile, engithokozile kakhulu ngabo, makahlukanisele laba bantu izingxenye zabo, wonke umuntu ngokulinganayo ngokomndeni wakhe, ngokwezimo zakhe nangezimfuno nezidingo zakhe.

Futhi inceku yami u-Edward Partridge, uma eyohlukanisela umuntu ingxenye yakhe, makamunike okubhaliwe okokuqinisekisa kuye ingxenye yakhe, ukuthi uyobanayo, ngisho lelilungelo nalelifa ebandleni, aze one futhi engabe esabalwa njengofanele ngezwi lebandla, njengokwemithetho nezivumelwano zebandla, ukuba abe ngowebandla.

Futhi uma ona futhi engabalwa njengofanele ukuba ngowebandla, ngeke abe namandla okulanda leyongxenye ayinikele kumbhishobhi ukuze kuzuze abampofu nabadingayo bebandla lami; ngakho-ke, ngeke asigcine isipho, kodwa uyoba nelungelo lokuthola kuphela leyongxenye atayitelwe ngayo.
Futhi ngaleyo ndlela zonke izinto ziyoqinisekiswa, ngokuhambisana nemithetho yezwe.
Futhi lokho okungokwalaba bantu makwahlukaniselwe laba bantu.
Futhi imali esale kulaba bantu—makubekhona umphatheli wabo omiselwe laba bantu, ozothatha imali abafunele ukudla nokokwembatha, ngokwezimfuno zalaba bantu.
Futhi wonke umuntu makathembeke omunye komunye, futhi afane nomunye phakathi kwalaba bantu, futhi afumane ngokufanayo, ukuze nibe munye, njengoba nginiyalile.
Futhi lokho okungokwalaba bantu makungathathwa futhi kunikwe abazalwane belinye igatsha lebandla.
Ngalokho-ke, uma elinye igatsha lebandla lifuna ukuthola imali kuleligatsha lebandla, malikhokhe kuleligatsha lebandla futhi njengoba beyovumelana.
Futhi lokhu kuyokwenziwa ngombhishobhi noma ngomphatheli, ozobekwa ngezwi lebandla.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, umbhishobhi makamise indlu yengcebo yaleli gatsha lebandla; futhi makuthi konke okuyimali nokudlekayo, okungaphezulu kokudingekile kwezimfuno zalaba bantu, kugcinwe ezandleni zikambhishobhi.
Futhi naye makazigcinele futhi ngokwezimfuno zakhe, nangokwezimfuno zomndeni wakhe, njengoba eyobe eqashelwe ukwenza lomsebenzi.
Futhi ngaleyo ndlela nginika kulaba bantu ilungelo lokuzihlela ngokwe mithetho yami.
Futhi nginikela kubo lendawo okwesikhashana, ngize mina, iNkosi, ngibalungiselele ngenye indlela, futhi ngize ngibayale ukuba bahambe kulendawo;
Futhi ihora nosuku akunikiwe kubo, ngalokho-ke mabasebenze kulendawo njengabazohlala iminyaka, futhi lokhu kuyoba nomphumela omuhle kubo.
Bhekani, lokhu kuyoba yisibonelo encekwini yami u-Edward Partridge, nakwezinye izindawo, kuwo wonke amabandla.
Futhi lowo otholakale engothembekile, olungile, futhi nohlakaniphile umphathi uyongena ekujabuleni kweNkosi yakhe, futhi uyodla ifa lempilo yaphakade.
Ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, nginguJesu Kristu, oza masinyane, ngehora eningalicabangiyo. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/52.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 52
chapter_summary: 1–2, Umhlangano olandelayo umiselwe ukubanjwelwa eMissouri; 3–8, Ukubekwa kwamagosa athile ukuba ahambe ndawonye kuyenziwa; 9–11, Amagosa kumele afundise lokho abaphostoli nabaphrofethi abakubhalile; 12–21, Labo abakhanyiselwe nguMoya baveza izithelo zendumiso nokuhlakanipha; 22–44, Amagosa ahlukahlukene abekwa ukuba ahambe eshumayela ivangeli ngesikhathi eya eMissouri emhlanganweni.

verses.text: Bhekani, isho kanje iNkosi kumagosa ewabizileyo newakhethileyo kulezi zinsuku zokugcina, ngezwi loMoya wayo—

Ithi: Mina, iNkosi, ngizokwazisa kini engithanda nikwenze kusuka ngalesi sikhathi kuze kube wumhlangano olandelayo, ozobanjelwa eMissouri, ezweni engizolingwelisela abantu bami, abayinsali kaJakobe, nalabo abayizindlalifa ngokwe sivumelwano.

Ngalokho-ke, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, izinceku zami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, noSidney Rigdon mabathathe uhambo lwabo emva kokuba amalungiselelo enziwe ukushiya amakhaya abo, futhi bahambele indawo yaseMissouri.
Futhi kangangoba bethembekile kimi, kuyokwaziswa kubo ukuthi bayokwenzani;
Futhi kuyophinda, kangangoba bethembekile, kwaziswe kubo izwe lefa lenu.
Futhi kangangoba bengathembekile, bayosuswa, ngisho njengoba ngithanda, njengoba kubonakala kukuhle kimi.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, inceku yami uLyman Wight nenceku yami uJohn Corrill mabathathe uhambo lwabo ngokushesha;
Futhi nenceku yami uJohn Murdock, nenceku yami uHyrum Smith, mabathathe uhambo lwabo baye endaweni efanayo ngendlela yaseDetroit.

Futhi mabahambe kusuka kuleyondawo beshumayela izwi endleleni, bengasho lutho olunye ngaphandle kwalokho abaphrofethi nabaphostoli abakubhalile, futhi nalokho abakufundiswe nguMduduzi ngomkhuleko wokukholwa.
Mabahambe ngababili, futhi ngaleyo ndlela mabashumayele endleleni kubo bonke abazalwane, bebhabhadisa ngamanzi, futhi bebabeka izandla ekhanda ngasemanzini.
Ngokuba isho kanje iNkosi, ngizowufinyeza umsebenzi wami ngokulunga, ngokuba izinsuku ziyeza lapho engiyothumela khona ukwahlulela kube ukunqoba.
Futhi inceku yami uLyman Wight makaqaphele, ngokuba uSathane ufisa ukumhlunga njengekhoba.
Futhi bhekani, lowo othembekileyo uyokwenziwa umbusi phezu kwezinto eziningi.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngizoninika isifanekiso kuzo zonke izinto, ukuze ningakhohliswa; ngokuba uSathane ukhona ndawozonke ezweni, futhi uhamba ekhohlisa izizwe—
Ngalokho-ke lowo okhulekayo, umoya wakhe odabukileyo, nguye lowo owemukelekile kimi uma ethobela izimiso zami.
Lowo okhulumayo, umoya wakhe odabukileyo, nolimi lwakhe olumnene futhi olwakhayo, nguye lowo ongokaNkulunkulu uma ethobela izimiso zami.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, lowo oqhaqhazelayo esaba amandla ami uyokweziwa aqine, futhi uyoveza izithelo zendumiso nokuhlakanipha, ngokwezambulo namaqiniso engininike wona.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, lowo onqotshwayo nongavezi izithelo, ngisho njengokwalesi sifanekiso, akasiye owami.
Ngalokho-ke, ngalesi sifanekiso niyoyazi imimoya kuzo zonke izimo eziphansi kwamazulu onke.
Nezinsuku sezifikile; lapho abantu beyokwenzelwa ngangokukholwa kwabo.
Bhekani, lomyalelo unikwe kuwo wonke amagosa engiwakhethileyo.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, inceku yami uThomas B. Marsh nenceku yami u-Ezra Thayre mabathathe uhambo lwabo nabo, beshumayela izwi endleleni eya kulelozwe.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, inceku yami u-Isaac Morley nenceku yami u-Ezra Booth mabathathe uhambo lwabo, nabo beshumayela izwi endleleni eya kulelozwe.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, izinceku zami u-Edward Partridge noMartin Harris mabathathe olwabo uhambo nezinceku zami uSidney Rigdon noJoseph Smith, omNcane.
Izinceku zami uDavid Whitmer noHarvey Whitlock mabathathe olwabo uhambo nabo, futhi bashumayele endleleni eya kulelozwe.
Futhi izinceku zami uParley P. Pratt no-Orson Pratt mabathathe olwabo uhambo, futhi bashumayele endleleni, ngisho nakulelizwe.
Futhi izinceku zami uSolomon Hancock noSimeon Carter nabo mabathathe olwabo uhambo baye kulelizwe, futhi bashumayele endleleni.
Izinceku zami u-Edson Fuller noJacob Scott mabathathe nabo olwabo uhambo.
Izinceku zami uLevi W. Hancock noZebedee Coltrin nabo mabathathe olwabo uhambo.
Izinceku zami uReynolds Cahoon noSamuel H. Smith nabo mabathathe olwabo uhambo.
Izinceku zami uWheeler Baldwin noWilliam Carter nabo mabathathe olwabo uhambo.
Futhi izinceku zami uNewel Knight noSelah J. Griffin bobabili mabagcotshwe, futhi nabo bathathe olwabo uhambo.

Yebo, ngiqinisile ngithi, bonke laba mabathathe uhambo baye endaweni eyodwa, ezindleleni zabo ezihlukene, futhi umuntu oyedwa akayukwakhela phezu kwesisekelo somunye, futhi makangahambi endleleni yomunye.
Lowo othembekileyo, onjalo uyogcinwa futhi abusiswe ngezithelo eziningi.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, izinceku zami uJoseph Wakefield noSolomon Humphrey mabathathe uhambo lwabo baye emazweni angasempumalanga;

Mabasebenze nemindeni yabo, bengasho lutho ngaphandle kwalokho abakukhulumile abaphrofethi nabaphostoli, lokho abakubonile nabakuzwile futhi nabakukholwa ngokuqinisekile, ukuze iziphrofetho zigcwaliseke.
Ngenxa yesiphambeko, lokho okwanikwa uHeman Basset makuthathwe kuye, futhi kubekwe ekhanda likaSimonds Ryder.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, uJared Carter makagcotshwe abe ngumphristi, futhi noGeorge James makagcotshwe abe ngumphristi.
Abasalayo bamagosa mabavikele amabandla, futhi bamemezele izwi ezifundeni eziseduze nabo; futhi mabasebenze ngezandla zabo ukuze kungabi bikho kukhonza zithombe nobubi obenziwayo.
Futhi khumbulani kuzo zonke izinto abampofu nabantulayo, abagulayo nabasosizini, ngokuba lowo ongazenzi lezi zinto, nguye lowo ongeyena umfundi wami.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, izinceku zami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, noSidney Rigdon no-Edward Partridge mabathathe incwadi yesincomo ebandleni. Futhi makutholakale enye yenceku yami u-Oliver Cowdery.
Futhi ngaleyo ndlela, ngisho njengoba sengishilo, uma nithembekile niyobuthana ndawonye ukuze nijabule ezweni lase Missouri, okuyizwe lefa lenu, okumanje yizwe lezitha zenu.
Kodwa, bhekani, mina, iNkosi, ngizolisheshisa lelidolobha ngesikhathi salo, futhi ngizobethwesa umqhele abathembekileyo ngentokozo nangokujabula.
Bhekani, nginguJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, futhi ngizobaphakamisa ngosuku lokugcina. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/53.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 53
chapter_summary: 1–3, Ukubizwa nokukhethwa kukaSidney Gilbert eBandleni wukugcotshwa abe yigosa; 4–7, Uzosebenza futhi njengomphatheli kambhishobhi.

verses.text: Bheka, ngithi kuwe, nceku yami uSidney Gilbert, ngiyizwile imikhuleko yakho; futhi ucelile ukuze waziswe, yiNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho, mayelana nobizo nokukhethwa kwakho ebandleni, mina, iNkosi, engilimisile kulezi zinsuku zokugcina.
Bheka, mina, iNkosi, eyabethelwa ukuze kukhokhelwe izono zomhlaba, ngikunika umyalelo wokuthi uyowudela umhlaba.
Yamukela ubizo lwami, ngisho lolo lobugosa, ukushumayela ukukholwa nokuphenduka noku thethelwa kwezono, ngokwezwi lami, nokwamukela uMoya oNgcwele ngokubekwa izandla.
Futhi nokuba wumphatheli kuleli bandla endaweni eyokhethwa ngumbhishobhi, ngokwemiyalelo eyonikezwa emva kwalokhu.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, uyothatha uhambo lwakho nezinceku zami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, noSidney Rigdon.
Bheka, lezi yizimiso zokuqala ozozifumana; futhi ezinye zizokwaziswa ngesikhathi esizayo, ngokusebenza kwakho esivinini sami.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngifuna ufunde ukuthi yilowo kuphela osindiswayo obekezela kuze kube sekupheleni. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/54.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 54
chapter_summary: 1–6, AbaNgcwele kufanele bagcine isivumelwano sevangeli ukuze bathole umusa; 7–10, Kufanele babekezele osizini.

verses.text: Bhekani, isho kanje iNkosi, ngisho u-Alfa no-Omega, isiqalo nesiphetho, ngisho yena owabethelelwa izono zomhlaba—
Bheka, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, nceku yami uNewel Knight, uyokuma uqine kulesi sikhundla engikubeke kuso.
Futhi uma abafowenu befisa ukusinda ezitheni zabo, mabaphenduke kuzo zonke izono zabo, futhi babe ngabazithobile ngempela phambi kwami futhi babe ngabadabukile.
Futhi njengoba isivumelwano abasenza kimi sesiphuliwe, kanjalo-ke sesibe yize futhi asiselutho.
Futhi maye kulowo esiza ngaye lesi sikhubekiso, ngokuba bekungaba ngcono kuye ukuba uminziswe ekujuleni kolwandle.
Kodwa babusisiwe labo abasigcinile isivumelwano futhi bagcina nomyalelo, ngokuba bayothola umusa.
Ngalokho-ke, manje hambani futhi nibaleke ezweni, hleze izitha zenu zinihlasele; nithathe uhambo lwenu, futhi nibeke enithanda abe ngumholi wenu, futhi nozokwenza umsebenzi ozoningenisela izimali.
Futhi niyothatha uhambo lwenu ngaleyo ndlela niye ezifundazweni ezingasentshonalanga, ezweni lase Missouri, emingceleni yamaLamani.
Futhi uma senihambile, bhekani, ngithi kini, funani ukuziphilisa njengabanye abantu, ngize nginilungisele indawo yenu.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, bekezelani osizini ngize ngize; futhi, bhekani, ngiza masinyane, nomvuzo wami ukimi, futhi labo abangifune masinya bayothola ukuphumula emiphefumulweni yabo. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/55.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 55
chapter_summary: 1–3, U William W. Phelps uyabizwa futhi ukhethwa ukuba abhabhadiswe, agcotshwe abe yigosa, futhi ashumayele ivangeli; 4, Kufanele futhi abhale izincwadi zabantwana abasezikoleni zeBandla; 5–6, Kufanele ahambe aye eMissouri, okuzoba yindawo yakhe yokusebenza.

verses.text: Bheka, isho kanje iNkosi kuwe, nceku yami uWilliam, yebo, ngisho iNkosi yomhlaba wonke, ubiziwe futhi ukhethiwe; futhi emva kokuba usubhabhadisiwe ngamanzi, okuyothi uma ukwenza ngehlo elibheke inkazimulo yami, uyofumana ukuthethelelwa kwezono zakho futhi ufumane uMoya oNgcwele ngokubekwa izandla;

Futhi emva kwalokho uyogcotshwa ngesandla senceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, ube yigosa kuleli bandla, ushumayele ukuphenduka nokuthethelelwa kwezono ngokubhabhadiswa egameni likaJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo.
Futhi labo oyobeka phezu kwabo izandla, uma bedabukile phambi kwami, uyoba namandla okubanika uMoya oNgcwele.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, uyogcotshelwa ukusiza inceku yami u-Oliver Cowdery ukwenza umsebenzi wokucindezela, futhi nowokukhetha nokubhala izincwadi zezikole kulelibandla, ukuze abantwana abancane nabo bathole ukufundiswa phambi kwami njengoba kukuhle kimi.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, ngalenhloso uzothatha uhambo nezinceku zami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, noSidney Rigdon, ukuze utshalwe ezweni lefa lakho ukwenza lomsebenzi.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, inceku yami uJoseph Coe naye makathathe uhambo lwakhe nabo. Okuseleyo bayokwaziswa kona emva kwalokhu, njengoba ngithanda. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/56.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 56
chapter_summary: 1–2, AbaNgcwele kufanele bathwale isiphambano sabo futhi balandele iNkosi ukuze bathole insindiso; 3–13, INkosi iyayala futhi ichithe, futhi abangalaleli bayasuswa; 14–17, Maye kulabo abacebile abangabasizi abampofu, futhi maye kulabo abampofu izinhliziyo zabo ezingadabukile; 18–20, Babusisiwe abampofu abacwebile enhliziyweni, ngokuba bayodla ifa lomhlaba.

verses.text: Lalelani, O nina bantu abavuma igama lami, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu; ngokuba bhekani, intukuthelo yami yokhelekile kulabo abangivukelayo, futhi bayoyazi eyami ingalo neyami intukuthelo, ngosuku lokuhanjelwa nelolaka phezu kwezizwe.
Futhi lowo ongezukusithwala isiphambano sakhe futhi angilandele, futhi agcine imiyalelo yami, nguye lowo ongeke asindiswe.
Bhekani, mina, iNkosi, ngiyayala; futhi lowo ozongangi thobeli uyosuswa ngesami isikhathi esifanele, emva kokuba sengiyalile futhi nomyalelo usuphuliwe.
Ngalokho-ke mina, iNkosi, ngiyayala futhi ngichithe, njengoba kubukeka kukuhle kimi, futhi konke lokhu kuyophendulwa phezu kwamakhanda abangivukelayo, kusho iNkosi.

Ngalokho-ke, ngiyawuchitha umyalelo engawunika izinceku zami uThomas B. Marsh no-Ezra Thayre, futhi nginika umyalelo omusha encekwini yami uThomas, ukuba athathe uhambo lwakhe ngokushesha aye ezweni laseMissouri, futhi inceku yami uSelah J. Griffin naye uyohamba naye.
Ngokuba bhekani, ngiyawuchitha umyalelo engawunikeza izinceku zami uSelah J. Griffin noNewel Knight, ngenxa yokuba ngontamolukhuni kwabantu bami abaseThompson, nokungivukela kwabo.
Ngalokho-ke, inceku yami uNewel Knight makasale nabo; futhi ngangobuningi kwabangahamba bangahamba, labo abadabukileyo phambi kwami, futhi baholwe nguye ukuya ezweni engilimisileyo.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, inceku yami u-Ezra Thayre kufanele aphenduke ekuzaziseni kwakhe, nasebugovini bakhe, futhi athobele umyalelo wokuqala engimnike wona maqondana nendawo ahlala kuyo.
Futhi uma ezokwenza lokhu, njengoba kungeke kwabakhona ukwahlukana ezweni, uyobekwa futhi ukuba aye ezweni laseMissouri;
Kungenjalo uzoyifumana imali ayikhokhile, futhi ayishiye indawo, futhi uyosuswa ebandleni lami, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wamabandla;
Futhi nakuba izulu nomhlaba kudlula, lawamazwi awasoze adlula, kodwa ayogcwaliseka.

Futhi uma inceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, kufanele ukuba ayikhokhe imali, bheka, mina, iNkosi, ngiyomkhokhela yona futhi ezweni laseMissouri, ukuze labo ayofumana kubo bavuzwe futhi ngokwalokho abakwenzayo;
Ngokuba bayofumana ngokwalokho abakwenzayo, ngisho emazweni efa labo.

Bhekani, isho kanje iNkosi kubantu bami—ninezinto eziningi okufanele nizenze futhi nokufanele niphenduke kuzo; ngokuba bhekani, izono zenu ziyazeka kimi, futhi azixolelwe, ngokuba nifuna ukwenza intando yenu.
Futhi izinhliziyo zenu azinelisekile. Futhi anilithobeli iqiniso, kodwa nijabula ekungalungini.

Maye kini bantu abacebileyo, eningathandi ukunika impahla yenu kwabampofu, ngokuba ingcebo yenu izoyona imimoya yenu; futhi lokhu kuyokuba wukulila kwenu ngosuku lukuhanjelwa, nelokwahlulelwa, nolwentukuthelo: Isivuno sesidlulile, ihlobo liphelile, umoya wami awusindisiwe!

Maye kini bantu abampofu, izinhliziyo zenu ezingadabukile, imimoya yenu engadabukile, nezisu zenu ezingeneli, izandla zenu ezingayeki ukuthatha izimpahla zabanye abantu, amehlo enu agcwele umhobholo, futhi eningafuni ukusebenza ngezandla zenu!

Kodwa babusisiwe abampofu abacwebileyo ezinhliziyweni, izinhliziyo zabo ezidabukileyo, imimoya yabo edabukileyo, ngokuba bayowubona umbuso kaNkulunkulu uza ngamandla nangodumo olukhulu uzobakhulula; ngokuba ukunonophala komhlaba kuyoba ngokwabo.
Ngokuba bhekani, iNkosi iyokuza, futhi inkokhelo yayo iyoba kuyo, futhi iyovuza wonke umuntu, futhi abampofu bayojabula;
Futhi izizukulwane zabo ziyodla ifa lomhlaba isizukulwane ngesizukulwane, phakade naphakade. Manje sengiyagcina ukukhuluma nani. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/57.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 57
chapter_summary: 1–3, I-Independence, eMissouri, yindawo yeDolobha laseSiyoni nethempeli; 4–7, AbaNgcwele kufanele bathenge imihlaba futhi bathole amafa kuleyo ndawo; 8–16, USidney Gilbert kufanele amise isitolo, uWilliam W. Phelps kufanele abe ngumgayi wezincwadi, futhi u-Oliver Cowdery kufanele ahlele okubhaliweyo okuzokhishwa emphakathini.

verses.text: Lalelani, O nina magosa ebandla lami, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu, nina enibuthene ndawonye, ngokwemiyalelo yami, kulelizwe, okuyizwe lase Missouri, okuyizwe engilingcwelisele futhi ngalinikela ukuqoqwa kwabangcwele.
Ngalokho-ke, leli yizwe lesethembiso, futhi nendawo yedolobha lase Siyoni.

Futhi isho kanje iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu, uma nizokwamukela ukuhlakanipha nakhu ukuhlakanipha. Bhekani, indawo ebizwa manje ngokuthi yi-Independence iyindawo ephakathi nendawo; futhi nendawo ye thempeli ingasentshonalanga, phezu kwengxenye yomhlaba ongekude nenkantolo.
Ngalokho-ke, kungukuhlakanipha ukuthi umhlaba kufanele uthengwe ngabangcwele, nayo yonke imihlaba engasentshonalanga, ngisho kuze kube semnceleni ohamba uqonde phakathi kwa maJuda nabeZizwe;
Futhi nayo yonke imihlaba esemceleni wenkangala, kangangoba abafundi bami bevunyelwa ukuthenga imihlaba. Bhekani, lokhu kungukuhlakanipha, ukuba bayithole ukuze ibe yifa laphakade.

Futhi inceku yami uSidney Gilbert makasebenze esikhundleni engimbeke kuso, ukwamukela izimali, ukuba wumphatheli webandla, ukuthenga umhlaba kuzo zonke izifunda eziseduze, kangangoba kungenzeka ngokulunga, nangokuqondiswa wukuhlakanipha.
Futhi inceku yami u-Edward Partridge makasebenze esikhundleni engimbeke kuso, futhi ahlukanisele abangcwele ifa labo, ngisho njengoba ngiyalile; futhi nalabo ababekile ukuba bamlekelele.

Futhi, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, inceku yami uSidney Gilbert makazinze kulendawo, futhi amise isitolo, ukuze adayise izimpahla ngaphandle kwenkohlakalo, ukuze azuze imali yokuthenga imihlaba ukuze kuzuze abangcwele, futhi ukuze azuze nanoma yini abafundi abangayidinga ukuba bazinze efeni labo.

Futhi inceku yami uSidney Gilbert nayo mayithole imvume—bhekani nakhu ukuhlakanipha, futhi lowo ofundayo makaqonde—ukuze athumele izimpahla futhi kubantu, ngisho ngalabo angathanda ukuthumela ngabo njengomabhalane abaqashiwe ukumsebenzela;
Futhi ngaleyondlela ondle abangcwele bami, ukuze ivangeli lami lishunyayelwe kulabo abahleli ebumnyameni nasesifundeni futhi nabase thunzini lokufa.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, inceku yami uWilliam W. Phelps makazinziswe kulendawo, futhi amiswe njengo mgayi wezincwadi webandla.
Futhi bheka, uma umhlaba uyamukela imibhalo yakhe—bheka nakhu ukuhlakanipha—makathole noma yini angayithola ngokulunga, ukuze kuzuze abangcwele.

Futhi inceku yami u-Oliver Cowdery makamsize, ngisho njengoba ngiyalile, kunoma iyiphi indawo engiyommisela yona, ukwenza isifanekiso, futhi alungise, futhi akhethe, ukuze zonke izinto zilunge phambi kwami, njengoba ziyoboniswa nguMoya ngaye.
Futhi labo engikhulume ngabo mabazinziswe ezweni laseSiyoni, ngokushesha okungenzeka, nemindeni yabo, ukuze benze lezo zinto ngisho njengoba sengikhulumile.
Manje ngokuphathene nokubuthana—Umbhishobhi nomphatheli mabenze amalungiselelo aleyo mindeni esiyaliwe ukuza kulendawo, ngokushesha okunokwenzeka, futhi babazinzise efeni labo.
Kulawo asele amagosa namalungu ezinye iziyalelo zizonikwa emva kwalokhu. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/58.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 58
chapter_summary: 1–5, Labo ababekezelela usizi bayoqheliswa ngenkazimulo; 6–12, AbaNgcwele kufanele balungiselele umshado weMvana nesidlo sakusihlwa seNkosi; 13–18, Ababhishobhi bangabehluleli kwa-Israyeli; 19–23, AbaNgcwele mabathobele imithetho yezwe; 24–29, Abantu kufanele basebenzise ilungelo lokukhetha ekwenzeni okuhle; 30–33, INkosi iyayala futhi ichithe; 34–43, Ukuze baphenduke, abantu kufanele bazivume futhi bazishiye izono zabo; 44–58, AbaNgcwele mabathenge ifa labo futhi babuthane eMissouri; 59–65, Ivangeli kufanele lishunyayelwe kuzo zonke izidalwa.

verses.text: Lalelani, O nina magosa ebandla lami, futhi nibeke indlebe ezwini lami, futhi nithole ulwazi kimi ngentando yami ngani, futhi nanga lendawo enginithumele kuyo.
Ngokuba ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ubusisiwe lowo ogcina imiyalelo yami, noma ekuphileni noma ekufeni; futhi lowo othembekileyo osizini, inzuzo yalowo inkulu embusweni wasezulwini.
Anikwazi ukubona ngamehlo enu enyama, okwamanje, isu lika Nkulunkulu wenu ngalezo zinto ezizokuza emva kwalesi sikhathi, futhi nenkazimulo ezolandela emva kosizi olukhulu.
Ngokuba emuva kosizi olukhulu kuza izibusiso. Ngalokho-ke usuku luyeza lapho niyo qheliswa khona ngenkulu inkazimulo; ihora alikafiki, kodwa seliseduze.
Khumbulani lokhu, enganitshela kona kuqala, ukuze nikubeke ezinhliziyweni, futhi namukele lokho okuzolandela.
Bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, nginithumele ngenxa yalokhu—ukuze nilalele, futhi ukuze izinhliziyo zenu zilungele ukufakaza ngezinto ezisazokuza;
Futhi nokuze nihlonishwe ekubekeni isisekelo, futhi ekufakazeni ngalendawo iSiyoni kaNkulunkulu ezokuma kuyona;

Futhi nokuthi idili lezinto ezikhulupheleyo lilungiselelwe abampofu; yebo, idili lezinto ezikhulupheleyo, lewayini elinenhlese elihluzwe kahle, ukuze umhlaba wazi ukuthi imilomo yabaphrofethi ingeke yahluleka;
Yebo, isidlo sakusihlwa sendlu yeNkosi, esilungiswe kahle, okuzomenywa kuso zonke izizwe.
Okokuqala, izicebi nezifundiswa, izazi namakhosi;

Futhi emuva kwalokho kuza usuku lwamandla ami; bese kuthi abampofu, izishosha, nezimpumputhe, nabangezwa, bangene emshadweni weMvana, badle isidlo sakusihlwa seNkosi, esilungiselelwe usuku olukhulu oluzayo.
Bhekani, mina, iNkosi, sengikukhulumile lokhu.
Futhi ukuze ubufakazi buphume eSiyoni, yebo, buphume emlonyeni wedolobha lefa likaNkulunkulu—
Yebo, nginithumele lapha ngalesi sizathu, futhi ngakhetha inceku yami u-Edward Partridge, futhi ngambekela umsebezi wakhe wokufundisa ivangeli kulelizwe.
Kodwa uma engaphenduki ezonweni zakhe, eziwukungakholwa nobulukhumi benhliziyo, makaqaphele hleze awe.
Bheka ubizo lwakhe lunikwe kuye, futhi ngeke lunikwe futhi.
Futhi lowo omi kulolubizo ubekwe ukuba ngumahluleli kwa-Israyeli, njengalokho kwakunjalo ngezinsuku zasemandulo, ukwabela izindawo zefa likaNkulunkulu ebantwaneni bakhe;
Futhi nokwahlulela abantu bakhe ngobufakazi babaqotho, futhi nangokulekelelwa ngabeluleki bakhe, ngokuhambisana nemithetho yombuso enikwe ngabaphrofethi baNkulunkulu.
Ngokuba ngiqinisile ngithi kini, umthetho wami uyogcinwa kulelizwe.

Makungabi namuntu ocabanga ukuthi ungumbusi; kodwa uNkulunkulu makabuse lowo owahlulelayo, ngokuhambisana nezeluleko zentando yakhe, noma, ngamanye amazwi, yena olulekayo noma ohlala esihlalweni sokwahlulela.
Makungabi namuntu ophula imithetho yezwe, ngokuba lowo ogcina imithetho kaNkulunkulu akanasidingo sokuphula imithetho yezwe.
Ngalokho-ke, thobelani amandla akhona, aze abuse lowo okungelakhe ilungelo lokubusa, futhi abeke zonke izitha ngaphansi kwezinyawo zakhe.
Bhekani, imithetho eniyithole esandleni sami yimithetho yebandla, futhi nizoyiphatha ngalendlela. Bhekani, nansi inhlakanipho.

Manje, njengoba ngikhulumile ngenceku yami u-Edward Partridge, lendawo yindawo yakhe yokuhlala, nalabo ababeke njengabeluleki bakhe; futhi phezu kwalokho yindawo yalowo engimubeke ukugcina indlu yami yengcebo;
Ngalokho-ke, mabalethe imindeni yabo kulendawo, njengoba bezolulekana bona futhi bathole neseluleko kimi.
Ngokuba bhekani, akukuhle ukuthi ngiyale kukho konke; ngokuba lowo ophoqwayo kukho konke, nguye lowo oyivila futhi akayona inceku ehlakaniphileyo; ngalokho-ke akatholi mvuzo.
Ngiqinisile ngithi, abantu mabazibandakanye ngokukhuthala emsebenzini omuhle, futhi benze izinto eziningi ngokuthanda kwabo, futhi benze okuningi ukulunga;
Ngokuba amandla akubo, ngawo abakwazi ukuzikhethela. Futhi kangangoba abantu benza okuhle abasoze balahlekelwe wumvuzo wabo.
Kodwa lowo ongenzi lutho aze ayalwe, futhi amukele umyalelo ngengabazayo inhliziyo, futhi awugcine ngobuvila, nguye lowo oba ngaphansi kwamandla kaSathane.
Ngingubani mina engenza umuntu, kusho iNkosi, ongayikumbeka icala ongayithobeli imiyalelo yami na?
Ngingubani mina, kusho iNkosi, othembisile kodwa ongagcwalisanga na?
Ngiyayala futhi abantu bangathobeli; ngiyachitha futhi bangazitholi izibusiso.
Bese bethi ezinhliziyweni zabo: Lona akuwona umsebenzi weNkosi, ngokuba izethembiso zayo azigcwalisiwe. Kodwa maye kulabo, ngokuba umvuzo wabo uhlala ucashile ngaphansi, futhi awuveli phezulu.
Manje sengininika ezinye iziyalelo mayelana nalendawo.
Kuyinhlakanipho kimi ukuthi inceku yami uMartin Harris abe yisibonelo ebandleni, ekubekeni izimali zakhe phambi kukambhishobhi webandla.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, lona ngumthetho kuwo wonke umuntu oza kulendawo ukuzothola ifa; futhi uyokwenza utho ngezimali zakhe njengoba umthetho ubekile.
Futhi kuyinhlakanipho ukuthi kube nezindawo ezithengwayo e-Independence, ezizoba yizindawo zendlu yengcebo, futhi kanjalo nendlu yokucindezela.
Futhi ezinye iziyalelo mayelana nenceku yami uMartin Harris ziyonikwa yena ngokoMoya, ukuze athole ifa lakhe njengoba kubonakala kukuhle kuye;
Futhi makaphenduke ezonweni zakhe, ngokuba ufuna ukudunyiswa ngumhlaba.
Futhi inceku yami uWilliam W. Phelps makame esikhundleni engimubeke kuso, futhi athole ifa lakhe kulendawo;
Futhi kunesidingo sokuthi aphenduke, ngokuba mina, iNkosi, angithokozile kakhulu ngaye, ngokuba ufuna ukuba mkhulu kunabanye, futhi akazithobile ngokwanele phambi kwami.
Bhekani, lowo ophendukile ezonweni zakhe, nguye lowo othethelelwe, futhi mina, iNkosi, angibe ngisazikhumbula.
Ngalokhu niyokwazi uma umuntu ephenduka ezonweni zakhe—bhekani, uyozivuma futhi azishiye.

Manje, ngiqinisile, ngithi ngokuphathelene namagosa ebandla lami asele, isikhathi asikakafiki, iminyaka eminingi, ukuthi bona bathole ifa labo kulendawo, ngaphandle uma belilangazelela ngomkhuleko wokholo, kuphela njengoba bezomiselwa lona yiNkosi.
Ngokuba, bhekani, bazobaphusha abantu ndawonye kusukela emikhawulweni yomhlaba.
Ngalokho-ke, buthanani ndawonye; futhi labo abangabekwanga ukuhlala kulendawo, mabashumayele ivangeli ezifundeni eziseduzane; emva kwalokho mababuyele emakhaya abo.
Mabafundise endleleni, bafakaze ngeqiniso kuzo zonke izindawo, babize izicebi, abaphakeme nabaphansi, futhi nabampofu ukuthi baphenduke.
Futhi mabakhe amabandla, kangangoba abantu basemhlabeni bezophenduka.
Futhi makube nomphatheli obekwe ngezwi lebandla, ebandleni lase-Ohio, ukwamukela izimali ukuze athenge izindawo eSiyoni.
Futhi nginika inceku yami uSidney Rigdon umyalelo, wokuthi uzobhala incazelo yendawo yaseSiyoni, futhi nezwi elilotshiweyo lentando kaNkulunkulu, njengoba iyokwaziswa nguMoya kuye;

Futhi incwadi ebhaliwelo nencwadi yeminikelo, eyothulwa kuwo wonke amabandla ukuze athole izimali, ezizobekwa ezandleni zikambhishobhi, ezakhe noma ezomphatheli, njengoba kubonakala kukuhle kuye noma njengoba eyoyala, ukuthenga izindawo zefa labantwana baNkulunkulu.

Ngokuba, bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, intando yeNkosi wukuthi abafundi nabantwana babantu bavule izinhliziyo zabo, ngisho ukuze bathenge sonke lesi sifunda sezwe, masinyane nje ngokuvuma kwesikhathi.
Bhekani, nansi inhlakanipho. Mabakwenze lokhu kungenjalo ngeke balithole ifa, ngaphandle kokuchitheka kwegazi.
Futhi, kangangoba kunendawo etholakele, makube nezisebenzi zohlobo lonke ezithunyelwe kulendawo, ukusebenzela abangcwele baNkulunkulu.
Mazenziwe zonke lezi zinto ngohlelo; futhi amalungelo ezindawo mawaziswe isikhathi nesikhathi, ngumbhishobhi noma ngumphatheli webandla.
Futhi umsebenzi wokubuthana mawungabi ngokuphuthuma, futhi hhayi ngokubaleka; kepha mawenziwe njengokuyala kwamagosa ebandla emihlanganweni, ngokolwazi abazoluthola isikhathi nesikhathi.
Futhi inceku yami uSidney Rigdon makayingcwelise futhi ayibusise lendawo, nebala lethempeli, eNkosini.

Futhi makubizwe umhlangano; futhi emuva kwalokho izinceku zami uSidney Rigdon noJoseph Smith, omNcane, mababuye, futhi ngokunjalo no-Oliver Cowdery makabuye nabo, ukufeza osele umsebenzi engibamisele wona endaweni yabo, futhi nosele njengoba kuyonquma umhlangano.
Futhi makungabi namuntu obuyayo kulendawo ngaphandle kokuba afakaze endleleni, ngalokho akwaziyo futhi akukholwa ngokweqiniso.

Lokho okunikwe uZiba Peterson makuthathwe kuyena; futhi makame njengelungu ebandleni, futhi asebenze ngezakhe izandla, nabafowabo, aze ajeziswe ngokwanele ngazo zonke izono zakhe; ngokuba akazivumi, futhi ucabanga ukuzifihla.
Asele amagosa alelibandla, ezayo kulendawo, amanye awo ababusiswe kakhulu ngisho ngaphezu kokubala, mawabambe umhlangano kuyo lendawo.
Futhi inceku yami u-Edward Partridge makaqondise umhlangano ozobanjwa yibona.
Futhi nabo mababuye, beshumayela ivangeli endleleni, befakaza ngezinto ezembulwa kubona.

Ngokuba, ngiqinisile, umsindo kufanele uphume kulendawo uye kuwo wonke umhlaba, futhi nasekugcineni du komhlaba—ivangeli kufanele lishunyayelwe kuzo zonke izidalwa, nezibonakaliso zibalandela labo abakholwayo.
Futhi bhekani iNdodana yoMuntu iyeza. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/59.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 59
chapter_summary: 1–4, AbaNgcwele abathembekileyo eSiyoni bazobusiswa; 5–8, Kufanele bayithande futhi bayisebenzele iNkosi futhi bagcine imiyalelo Yayo; 9–19, Ngokugcina usuku lweNkosi lungcwele, abaNgcwele babusiswa ngokomhlaba nangokomoya; 20–24, Abalungileyo bathenjiswa umoya wokuthula kulomhlaba futhi nempilo yaphakade emhlabeni ozayo.

verses.text: Bhekani, babusisiwe, kusho iNkosi, labo abeze kulendawo ngeso eliqonde udumo lwami, ngokwemiyalelo yami.
Ngokuba labo abaphilayo bayokudla ifa lomhlaba, futhi labo abafayo bayophumula emisebenzini yabo, futhi imisebenzi yabo iyobalandela; futhi bayothola umqhele ezindlini zikaBaba, engibalungisele zona.
Yebo, babusisiwe labo izinyawo zabo ezimi endaweni yaseSiyoni, abathobele ivangeli lami; ngokuba bayofumana njengomvuzo wabo izinto ezinhle zomhlaba, futhi uyoveza ngamandla awo.
Futhi bayoqheliswa ngezibusisiso zaphezulu, yebo, futhi nangemiyalelo engembalwa, futhi nange zambulo esikhathini sabo—labo abathembekileyo futhi abazikhandlayo phambi kwami.

Ngalokho-ke, ngibanika umyalelo, ngisho kanje: Wothanda uNkulunkulu wakho ngayo yonke inhliziyo yakho, ngawo wonke amandla akho, ngayo yonke ingqondo yakho nangakho konke ukuqina kwakho; futhi egameni likaJesu Kristu uyomsebenzela.
Wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena. Ungebi; ungaphingi, ungabulali, ungenzi lutho olufana nakho.
Woyibonga iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho kuzo zonke izinto.
Wonika umnikelo eNkosini uNkulunkulu wakho ngokulunga, ngisho lowo wenhliziyo edabukileyo nomoya ophukileyo.
Futhi ukuze uzigcine ngokugcwele ungenasici ezweni, wokuya endlini yomkhuleko futhi unikele ngemnikelo yakho engcwele osukwini lwami olungcwele;
Ngokuba ngiqinisile lolu wusuku olubekelwe wena ukuphumula emisebenzini yakho, futhi nokugcwalisa izethembiso zakho koPhakeme kaKhulu;
Nokho izethembiso zakho uyozenza ngokulunga nsuku zonke futhi zikhathi zonke;
Kodwa khumbula ukuthi ngalolu, usuku lweNkosi, uyonikela iminikelo yakho koPhakeme kaKhulu, uvuma izono zakho kubafowenu, naphambi kweNkosi.
Futhi ngalolusuku awuyikwenza lutho olunye, kuphela makuthi ukudla kwakho kulungiswe ngobumhlophe benhliziyo ukuze ukuzila kwakho kuphelele, noma, ngamanye amazwi, ukuze intokozo yakho igcwale.
Ngiqinisile, lokhu wukuzila nokukhuleka, noma ngamanye amazwi, wukujabula nomkhuleko.
Futhi kangangoba nenza lezi zinto ngokubonga, ngenhliziyo nobuso obuthokozile, ngaphandle kokuhleka okuningi, ngokuba lokhu kuyisono, kodwa ngenhliziyo eneme nobuso obuthokozile—
Ngiqinisile ngithi, kangangoba nenza lokhu, ukugcwala komhlaba kungokwenu, izilwane zasendle kanye nezinyoni zasemoyeni, nalokho okucacayo ezihlahleni futhi nokuhamba emhlabeni;
Yebo, nemifino, nezinto ezinhle ezivela emhlabeni, noma okokudla noma okwezingubo, noma okwezindlu, noma okwezinqolobane, noma okwamasimu ezithelo, noma okwezivande, noma okwezivini;
Yebo, zonke izinto ezivela emhlabeni, ngezikhathi zazo, zenzelwe inzuzo nokusetshenziswa ngabantu, ukujabulisa iso nokwenamisa inhliziyo;
Yebo, okokudla nokwezingubo, okokunambitha nokuhogela, ukuqinisa umzimba nokuvuselela umoya.
Futhi kuyamjabulisa uNkulunkulu ukuthi unike konke lokhu kumuntu; ngokuba yilokhu okwenzelwa khona, ukuba kusetshenziswe ngokwahlulela, hhayi ngokweqisa, noma nangempango.
Futhi akukho umuntu amona ngakho uNkulunkulu, noma akekho omunye ulaka lwakhe olumokhelekayo, ngaphandle kwalabo abangasivumi isandla sakhe kukho konke, futhi nabangayithobeli imiyalelo yakhe.
Bhekani, lokhu kungokomthetho kanye nabaphrofethi; ngalokho-ke, ningabe nisangihlupha mayelana naloludaba.
Kodwa fundani ukuthi lowo owenza imisebenzi yokulunga uyowufumana umvuzo wakhe, ngisho umoya wokuthula kulomhlaba, nempilo yaphakade emhlabeni ozayo.
Mina, iNkosi, sengikukhulumile, noMoya uyafakaza. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/60.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 60
chapter_summary: 1–9, Amagosa kufanele ashumayele ivangeli emabandleni ababi; 10–14, Akufanele bahlale bengenzi lutho ngesikhathi sabo, noma bafihle amathalente abo; 15–17, Bangazigeza izinyawo zabo njengobufakazi obumelene nalabo abenqaba ivangeli.

verses.text: Bhekani, isho kanje iNkosi kumagosa ebandla layo, okufanele abuyele ngokushesha ezweni abaphuma kulo: Bhekani, kuyangithokozisa, ukuthi nize nafika lapha;
Kodwa ngabanye angithokozile kahle, ngokuba abayivuli imilomo yabo, kodwa bayalifihla ithalente engibanike lona, ngenxa yokwesaba abantu. Maye kwabanjalo, ngokuba intukuthelo yami iyokheleka kubo.
Futhi kuzokwenzeka, uma bengathembekile futhi kimi, kuyothathwa kususwe kubo, naloko abanakho.

Ngokuba mina, iNkosi, ngiyabusa emazulwini phezulu, futhi naphakathi kwamabutho omhlaba; futhi osukwini lapho ngiyokwakha khona amagugu ami, bonke abantu bayokwazi ukuthi kuyini lokho okukhombisa ngamandla kaNkulunkulu.

Kodwa, ngiqinisile, ngizokhuluma kini ngohambo oluya ezweni eniphuma kulo. Akube khona isikebhe esenziwayo, noma sithengwe, njengoba kubonakala kukuhle kini, akusho lutho kimi, futhi nithathe uhambo lwenu ngokushesha niye endaweni ebizwa ngokuthi yi St. Louis.
Futhi kusuka lapho izinceku zami, uSidney Rigdon, uJoseph Smith, omNcane, no-Oliver Cowdery, mabathathe uhambo lwabo oluya eCincinnati;

Futhi kulendawo mabaphakamise izwi labo futhi bamemezele izwi lami ngamazwi aphezulu, ngaphandle kwentukuthelo noma ukungabaza, bephakamisa izandla ezingcwele kubo. Ngokuba mina ngiyakwazi ukunenza nibe ngcwele, futhi zono zenu zithethelelwe.
Futhi abasalayo mabathathe uhambo lwabo besuka eSt. Louis, ngababili, futhi bashumayele izwi, ngaphandle kokuphuthuma, phakathi kwamabandla ababi, baze babuyele emabandleni ababesuke kuwo.
Futhi konke lokhu ukuze kuzuze amabandla; ngibathumele ngalenhloso.
Futhi inceku yami u-Edward Partridge makanike imali engimnike yona, ingxenye kumagosa ami ayalwe ukuba abuye;
Futhi lowo okwaziyo, makayibuyise ngendlela yomphatheli; futhi lowo ongakwazi, kuye akudingekile.
Manje sengikhuluma ngalabo abasele ukuba beze kulendawo.

Bhekani, bathunyelwe ukushumayela ivangeli lami phakathi kwamabandla ababi; ngalokho-ke, ngibanika umyalelo, kanje: Ungahlali ungenzi lutho ngesikhathi sakho, futhi ungalifihli ithalente lakho ukuze lingaziwa.

Futhi emva kokuba usubuyile ezweni laseSiyoni, futhi usulimemezelile izwi lami, uyobuya masinyane, umemezele izwi lami phakathi kwamabandla ababi, ngaphandle kokuphuthuma, nangaphandle kolaka noma ngombango.
Futhi nithuntuthe uthuli ezinyaweni zenu kulabo abanganemukeli, hhayi phambi kwabo, hleze nibacunule, kodwa ngasese; futhi nihlanze izinyawo zenu, njengobufakazi obumelene nabo ngosuku lokwahlulela.
Bhekani, lokhu kwanele kini, nentando yakhe onithumileyo.
Futhi ngomlomo wenceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, kuyokwaziwa okumayelana noSidney Rigdon no-Oliver Cowdery. Okuseleyo emva kwalokhu. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/61.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 61
chapter_summary: 1–12, INkosi isimemezele imbubhiso eningi phezu kwamanzi; 13–22, Amanzi aqalekiswa nguJohane, futhi umbhubhisi uhamba phezu kobuso bawo; 23–29, Abanye banamandla okuyala amanzi; 30–35, Amagosa kufanele ahambe ngamabili futhi ashumayele ivangeli; 36–39, Kufanele balungiselele ukuza kweNdodana yoMuntu.

verses.text: Bhekani, futhi nilalele izwi lalowo onamandla onke, osuka phakade kuya phakade, ngisho u-Alfa no-Omega, isiqalo nesiphetho.

Bhekani, iqinisile ithi iNkosi kini, O nina magosa ebandla lami, abuthene kulelibala, izono zawo manje ezixolelwe, ngokuba mina, iNkosi, ngiyazithethelela izono, futhi nginomhawu kulabo abavuma izono zabo ngezinhliziyo ezithobekileyo;
Kodwa ngiqinisile ngithi kini, akudingekile ukuba lonke leliqembu lamagosa ami lihambe ngokushesha okukhulu phezu kwamanzi, ngesikhathi abahlali nhlangothi zombili bebhubha bengakholwa.
Nokho, ngakuvumela ukuze nifakaze; bhekani, ziningi izingozi phezu kwamanzi, futhi ikakhulukazi emva kwalokhu;
Ngokuba mina, iNkosi, ngimemezelile olakeni lwami imbubhiso eningi phezu kwamanzi; yebo, futhi ikakhulukazi phezu kwalamanzi.
Nokho, yonke inyama isesandleni sami, futhi lowo othembekileyo phakathi kwenu akasoze abhubha ngamanzi.
Ngalokho-ke, kufanele ukuba inceku yami uSidney Gilbert nenceku yami uWilliam W. Phelps basheshe ukuya emsebenzini wabo wokufundisa ivangeli.
Nokho, bengingeke ngivume ukuba nihlukane kuze kube nijezisiwe ngazo zonke izono zenu, ukuze nibe munye, ukuze ningabhubhi ebubini;

Kodwa manje, ngiqinisile ngithi, kuhle kimi ukuba nihlukane. Ngalokho-ke izinceku zami uSidney Gilbert noWilliam W. Phelps mabahambe neqembu labo lakuqala, futhi mabathathe uhambo lwabo ngokushesha ukuze bagcwalise umsebenzi wabo wokufundisa ivangeli, futhi ngokukholwa bazonqoba;
Futhi kangangoba bethembekile bazogcinwa, futhi mina, iNkosi, ngizoba nabo.
Futhi abasele mabathathe lokho okudingekile kokwembatha.
Inceku yami uSidney Gilbert makathathe lokho okungadingekile ahambe nakho, ngokuvumelana kwenu.
Manje, bhekani, ukuze nizuze ngininike umyalelo ngalezi zinto; futhi mina, iNkosi, ngizokhuluma nani njengakubantu ezinsukwini zasemandulo.
Bhekani, mina, iNkosi, ekuqaleni ngawabusisa amanzi; kodwa ngezinsuku zokugcina, ngomlomo wenceku yami uJohane, ngawaqalekisa amanzi.
Ngalokho-ke, izinsuku zizoza lapho kungekho nyama eyosinda emanzini.
Futhi kuyothiwa ezinsukwini ezizayo akekho oyokwazi ukuya phezulu ezweni laseSiyoni phezu kwamanzi, kodwa lowo olungileyo enhliziyweni.
Futhi, njengoba mina, iNkosi, ekuqaleni ngaliqalekisa izwe, kanjalo-ke ezinsukwini zokugcina ngilibusisile, ngesikhathi salo, ukuze lisetshenziswe ngabangcwele bami, ukuze badle ukunonophala kwalo.

Manje ngininika umyalelo wokuthi engikusho koyedwa ngikusho kubo bonke, ukuze nixwayise abafowenu ngalamanzi, ukuze bangezi behamba phezu kwawo, hleze ukholo lwabo luhluleke futhi babambeke ezithiyweni;
Mina, iNkosi, ngimisile, futhi umbhubhisi uhamba phezu kobuso bawo, futhi angikuchithi engikumisileyo.
Mina, iNkosi, benginicasukele izolo, kodwa namhlanje ulaka lwami luphelile.
Ngalokho-ke, labo engikhulume ngabo, okufanele bathathe uhambo lwabo ngokushesha—ngiyaphinda ngithi kini, mabathathe uhambo lwabo ngokushesha.

Futhi akusho lutho kimi, emva kwesikhashana, nxa begcwalise umsebenzi wabo wokufundisa ivangeli, noma bahamba emanzini noma ezweni; lokhu makube njengoba kwazisiwe kubo ngokwahlulela kwabo emva kwalesi sikhathi.

Manje, ngokuphathelene nezinceku zami, uSidney Rigdon, uJoseph Smith, omNcane, no-Oliver Cowdery, mabangezi futhi kulamanzi, ngaphandle kokuba semfuleni owakhiweyo, ngesikhathi behamba beya emakhaya abo; noma ngamanye amazwi abayukuza behamba kulamanzi, ngaphandle kokuba behamba emfuleni owakhiweyo.

Bhekani, mina, iNkosi, ngiyimisile indlela yokuhamba abangcwele bami, futhi bhekani, yiyo lena indlela—ukuthi emva kokushiya umfula owakhiweyo bayohamba ezweni, kangangoba beyaliwe ukuhamba futhi bahambe baye phezulu ezweni laseSiyoni;
Futhi bayokwenza njengabantwana bakwa-Israyeli, begxumeka amatende abo ngendlela.
Futhi, bhekani, lomyalelo niyowunika kubo bonke abafowenu.
Nokho, lowo onikwe amandla okuyala amanzi, kuye kunikwe ngoMoya ukwazi zonke izindlela zakhe;
Ngalokho-ke, makenze njengoba uMoya kaNkulunkulu ophilayo umyalela, noma ezweni noma emanzini, njengoba kukimi ukwenza emva kwalokhu.
Futhi kini kunikwe indlela yabangcwele, noma indlela yabangcwele beviyo leNkosi, ukuba lihambe.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, izinceku zami, uSidney Rigdon, uJoseph Smith, omNcane, no-Oliver Cowdery, abayikuyivula imilomo yabo emabandleni ababi baze bafike eCincinnati;
Futhi kuleyo ndawo bayophakamisela amazwi abo kuNkulunkulu ngokumelene nalabo bantu, yebo, kuye intukuthelo yakhe eyokheleka ngokumelene nababi, abantu cishe asebelungele ukubhujiswa.
Futhi kusuka lapho mabahambele amabandla abafowabo, ngokuba imisebenzi yabo ngisho namanje idingeka kakhulu phakathi kwabo kunaphakathi kwamabandla ababi.
Manje, ngokuphathelene nabaseleyo, mabahambe futhi bamemezele izwi phakathi kwamandla ababi, kangangoba kunikiwe;
Futhi kangangoba bekwenza lokhu bayoba ngabangenacala, futhi abazukuba nachashazi phambi kwami.

Futhi mabahambe ndawonye, noma ngababili, njengoba kubonakala kukuhle kubo, kuphela inceku yami uReynolds Cahoon, nenceku yami uSamuel H. Smith, engithokoze kakhulu ngabo, mabangahlukaniswa baze babuyele emakhaya abo, futhi lokhu kungenhloso ehlakaniphile ekimi.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, futhi engikusho koyedwa ngikusho kubo bonke, yibani nenjabulo, bantwana abancane; ngokuba ngiphakathi kwenu, futhi anginilahlile;
Futhi kangangoba nizithobile phambi kwami, izibusiso zombuso zingezenu.
Bophani izinkalo zenu futhi niqaphele futhi nibe nesizotha, nibheke phambili ekuzeni kweNdodana yoMuntu, ngokuba izofika ngehora eningalicabangiyo.
Khulekani njalo ukuze ningangeni ekulingweni, ukuze nilumele usuku lokuza kwakhe, noma ekuphileni noma ekufeni. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.
