/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/62.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 62
chapter_summary: 1–3, Ubufakazi buyalotshwa ezulwini; 4–9, Amagosa kufanele ahambe futhi ashumayele ngokwahlulela nanjengoba eqondiswe nguMoya.

verses.text: Bhekani, futhi nilalele, O nina magosa ebandla lami, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu, ngisho uJesu Kristu, ummeli wenu, owazi ubuthakathaka babantu nowazi ukuthi basizwa kanjani abalingwayo.
Futhi ngiqinisile amehlo ami aphezu kwalabo abangakayi namanje ezweni laseSiyoni; ngalokho-ke umsebenzi wenu wokufundisa ivangeli awukafezeki ngokugcwele.
Kodwa, nibisisiwe, ngokuba ubufakazi enibufakazile bulotshiwe ezulwini ukuze izingelosi zibubheke; futhi ziyanijabulela, nezono zenu zithethelelwe.
Manje qhubekani nohambo lwenu. Buthanani ezweni lase Siyoni; futhi nibambe umhlangano futhi nijabule ndawonye, futhi nilethe isidlo esingcwele koPhakeme kaKhulu.

Futhi emva kwalokho ningabuya ukuzofakaza, yebo, ngisho nonke ndawonye, noma ngabalili, njengoba kubonakala kukuhle kini, akusho lutho kimi; kuphela thembekani, futhi nimemezele izindaba ezinhle kubantu basemhlabeni, noma phakathi kwamabandla ababi.

Bhekani, mina, iNkosi, nginilethe ndawonye ukuze isethembiso sigcwaliseke, ukuze abathembekileyo phakathi kwenu bagcinwe futhi bajabule ndawonye ezweni laseMissouri. Mina, iNkosi, ngiyabethembisa abathembekileyo futhi ngeke ngiqambe amanga.

Mina, iNkosi, ngizimisele, uma kukhona phakathi kwenu ofisa ukugibela amahhashi, noma imnyuzi, noma izinqola, uyosithola lesi sibusiso, uma esithola ngesandla seNkosi, ngenhliziyo ebongayo ezintweni zonke.
Lezi zinto zikini ukuba nizenze ngokwahlulela nangokuyalelwa nguMoya.
Bhekani, umbuso ungowenu. Futhi bhekani, futhi bheka, nginabathembekileyo njalo. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/63.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 63
chapter_summary: 1–6, Usuku lwentukuthelo luzokuza phezu kwababi; 7–12, Izibonakaliso ziza ngokukholwa; 13–19, Abaphingayo ngenhliziyo bazokuphika ukukholwa futhi balahlwe echibini lomlilo; 20, Abathembekileyo bazothola ifa emhlabeni osuguquliwe; 21, Umlando ogcwele ngokwenzeka eNtabeni yokuGuqulwa awukambulwa okwamanje; 22–23, Abalalelayo bathola izimfihlakalo zombuso; 24–31, Amafa aseSiyoni kufanele athengwe; 32–35, INkosi imemezela izimpi, futhi ababi babulala ababi; 36–48, AbaNgcwele kumele babuthane ndawonye eSiyoni futhi bakhiphe izimali zokuyakha; 49–54, Izibusiso ziyathenjiswa kwabathembekileyo ekuZeni kwesiBili, oVukweni, nangesikhathi seNkulungwane yemiNyaka; 55–58, Lolu wusuku lokwexwayisa; 59–66, Igama leNkosi liphathwa ngeze yilabo abalisebenzisayo ngaphandle kwegunya.

verses.text: Lalelani, O nina bantu, futhi vulani izinhliziyo zenu nibeke indlebe nikude; futhi nizwe, nina enizibiza ngabantu beNkosi, futhi nizwe izwi leNkosi nentando yayo ngokuphathelene nani.
Yebo, ngiqinisile, ngithi, yizwani izwi lalowo intukuthelo yakhe eyokheleke ngokumelene nababi nabangivukelayo;
Lowo othanda ukuthatha ngisho labo azobathatha, futhi nogcina ekuphileni labo azobagcina;
Lowo owakha ngentando nangokujabula kwakhe; futhi obhubhisa uma ethanda; futhi ukwazi ukuphosa umoya womuntu esihogweni.
Bhekani, mina, iNkosi, ngikhuluma izwi lami, futhi lizothotshelwa.

Ngalokho-ke, ngiqinisile ngithi, ababi mabaqaphele, futhi nabangivukelayo mabesabe futhi baqhaqhazele; futhi nabangakholwayo mabathule, ngokuba usuku lwentukuthelo luzokuza kubo njengomoya oyisishingishane, futhi yonke inyama iyokwazi ukuthi nginguNkulunkulu.
Futhi lowo ofuna izibonakaliso uyozibona izibonakaliso, kodwa kungabikhona ukuze asindiswe.
Ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, kukhona labo phakathi kwenu abafuna ukubona izibonakaliso, futhi abanjena yilokhu babakhona ngisho kwasekuqaleni;
Kodwa, bhekani, ukukholwa akubi khona ngezibonakaliso, kodwa izibonakaliso zilandela labo abakholwayo.
Yebo, izibonakaliso zibakhona ngokukholwa, hhayi ngentando yabantu, noma ngokuthanda kwabo, kodwa ngentando kaNkulunkulu.

Yebo, izibonakaliso zibakhona ngokukholwa, ukuze kubekhona imisebenzi emikhulu, ngokuba ngaphandle kokukholwa akukho muntu ojabulisa uNkulunkulu; futhi lowo uNkulunkulu amthukuthelele akathokozile ngaye; ngalokho-ke, kulabo akakhombisi izibonakaliso, kuphela intukuthelo ukuze babekwe icala.
Ngalokho-ke, mina, iNkosi, angithokozile ngalabo phakathi kwenu abafuna izibonakaliso nezimangaliso zokukholwa, futhi bengafuneli ukusizakala kwabantu nodumo lwami.
Nokho, nginika imiyalelo, futhi abaningi bayifulathele imiyalelo yami futhi abayigcinanga.
Kwakukhona phakathi kwenu iziphingi neziphingikazi; ezinye zazo esezinifulathele, futhi ezinye zisasele nani ezisazokwembulwa emva kwalokhu.
Abanjena mabaqaphele futhi baphenduke ngokushesha, funa ukwahlulelwa kwehlele kubo njengesithiyo, futhi ubuwula babo buyobonakaliswa, futhi nemisebenzi yabo iyobalandela emehlweni abantu.

Futhi ngiqinisile ngithi kini, njengoba ngishilo phambilini, lowo obuka owesifazane amkhanukele, noma uma kukhona abayophinga enhliziyweni zabo, ngeke babe noMoya, kodwa bayoluphika ukholo futhi besabe.

Ngalokho-ke, mina, iNkosi, ngishilo ukuthi amagwala, nabangakholwayo, nabaqamba amanga, nabo bonke labo abathanda ukukhuluma okungesilo iqiniso, nesifebe, nomthakathi, isabelo sabo siyokuba sechibini elivutha umlilo nesibabuli, okungukufa kwesibili.
Ngiqinisile ngithi, abayikuba nasabelo ovukweni lokuqala.
Manje bhekani, mina, iNkosi, ngithi kini anixolelwe, ngokuba lezi zinto ziphakathi kwenu.
Nokho, lowo obekezelayo ngokukholwa futhi owenza intando yami, nguye lowo oyonqoba, futhi uyothola ifa emhlabeni ngesikhathi usuku lokuguqulwa selufika;
Ngesikhathi umhlaba usuguqulwa, ngisho njengesifanekiso esatshengiswa kubaphostoli bami entabeni; leyondaba ephelele eningakayitholi.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, njengoba ngasho ukuthi ngizonazisa intando yami, bhekani ngizonazisa, hhayi ngendlela yomyalo, ngokuba baningi abangayigcini imiyalelo yami.
Kodwa lowo ogcina imiyalelo yami ngizomnika izimfihlo zombuso wami, futhi ziyokuba kuye ngumthombo wamanzi aphilayo, aphuphumela ekuphileni okuphakade.

Manje, bhekani, lena yintando yeNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu ngokuphathelene nabangcwele bakhe, ukuthi kufanele babuthane ndawonye ezweni laseSiyoni, hhayi ngokujaha, funa kubekhona ukudideka, okuletha isifo esingumashaya bhuqe.
Bhekani, izwe lase Siyoni—mina, iNkosi, ngilibambe ngezandla zami;
Kodwa, Mina, iNkosi, nginika uKhesari lezo zinto ezingezikaKhesari.
Ngalokho-ke, mina iNkosi ngithanda nithenge imihlaba, ukuze nithole inzuzo emhlabeni, ukuze nibize okungokwenu emhlabeni, ukuze bangaphehlelwa entukuthelweni.
Ngokuba uSathane ukufake ezinhliziyweni zabo ukuthi banithukuthelele, nokuthi bachithe igazi.
Ngalokho-ke, izwe laseSiyoni ngeke lizuzwe ngaphandle ngokuthengwa noma ngegazi, kungenjalo alikho ifa lenu.
Futhi uma kungokuthengwa, bhekani nibusisiwe;

Futhi uma kungegazi, njengoba ningavunyelwe ukuchitha igazi, bheka, izitha zenu ziphezu kwenu, futhi niyohlushwa kusuka emzini kuya komunye umuzi, futhi kusuka kwisinagoge kuya kwelinye isinagoge, futhi bambalwa abayoma ukuthola ifa.
Mina, iNkosi, ngibathukuthelele ababi; ngibambe uMoya wami kubantu basemhlabeni.
Ngifungile ekuthukutheleni kwami, futhi ngamemezela izimpi ebusweni bomhlaba, futhi ababi bayobulala ababi, futhi ukwesaba kuyofika phezu kwawo wonke umuntu;
Futhi abangcwele bayosinda kancane; nokho, mina, iNkosi, nginabo, futhi ngiyokwehla ezulwini lapho kukhona uBaba futhi ngishise ababi ngomlilo ongacimekiyo.
Futhi bhekani, lokhu akukenzeki manje, kodwa maduzane.
Ngalokho-ke, ngokubona ukuthi mina, iNkosi, ngimemezele zonke lezi zinto ebusweni bomhlaba, ngithanda ukuthi abangcwele bami babuthane ezweni laseSiyoni;

Futhi nokuthi wonke umuntu kufanele athathe ukulunga ezandleni zakhe nokwethembeka ezinkalweni zakhe, futhi aphakamise izwi lesexwayiso kubantu basemhlabeni; futhi amemezele ngezwi nangokubaleka ukuthi incithakalo izofika kwababi.
Ngalokho-ke, abafundi bami abaseKirtland mabahlele izindaba zabo zasemhlabeni, abahlala kulelipulazi.

Inceku yami uTitus Billings, okunguyena olibhekile, makawudayise lomhlaba, ukuze abe eselungele ngentwasahlobo ezayo ukuthatha uhambo lwakhe oluya ezweni laseSiyoni, nalabo abahlala kulo, ngaphandle kwalabo engizozibekela bona, abangezukuhamba ngize ngibayale.
Futhi zonke izimali eziseleyo, akubalulekile kimi noma zincane noma ziningi, mazithunyelwe ezweni laseSiyoni, kulabo engibakhethele ukuzamukela.
Bhekani, mina, iNkosi, ngizonika inceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, amandla okuthi akwazi ukuqonda ngoMoya ukuthi ubani ozoya ezweni laseSiyoni, nalabo abangabafundi bami abazosala.
Inceku yami uNewel K. Whitney makagcine isitolo sakhe, ngamanye amazwi, isitolo leso, okwesikhashana.
Nokho, makaphisane ngayo yonke imali angaphisana ngayo, ukuze ithunyelwe phezulu ezweni laseSiyoni.
Bhekani, lezi zinto zisezandleni zakhe, makazenze ngokuhlakanipha.
Ngiqinisile ngithi, makagcotshwe abe ngumphatheli kubafundi abazosala, futhi makagcotshelwe kulamandla;
Manje vakashela ngokushesha amagatsha amabandla, ufundise lezi zinto kubo, nenceku yami u-Oliver Cowdery. Bheka, lena yintando yami, ukuthola izimali njengoba ngilayezile.
Lowo othembekileyo nobekezelayo uyowunqoba umhlaba.
Lowo othumela ingcebo ezweni laseSiyoni uyothola ifa kulomhlaba, futhi imisebenzi yakhe iyomlandela, ngokunjalo nomvuzo emhlabeni ozayo.

Yebo, futhi babusisiwe abafileyo abafela eNkosini, kusuka manje, uma iNkosi iyofika, futhi izinto ezindala ziyodlula, futhi zonke izinto zibe zintsha, bayovuka kwabafileyo futhi bangabe besafa emva kwalokho, futhi bayofumana ifa phambi kweNkosi, edolobheni elingcwele.
Futhi lowo ophilayo uma iNkosi isiza, futhi egcine ukukholwa, ubusisiwe; nokho, kumiselwe kuye ukufa esikhathini sonke sokuphila.
Ngalokho-ke, abantwana bayo khula baze babe badala; abantu abadala bayokufa; kodwa ngeke balale othulini, kodwa bayoguqulwa ngokuphazima kweso.
Ngalokho-ke, ngalesi sizathu abaphostoli bashumayela emhlabeni ukuvuka kwabafileyo.
Lezi zinto yizinto okufanele nizibheke; futhi, ukukhuluma ngendlela yeNkosi, seziseduze, futhi esikhathini esizayo, ngisho osukwini lokuza kweNdodana yoMuntu.

Futhi kuze kube yilelo hora kuyoba khona izintombi eziyiziwula phakathi kwezihlakaniphileyo; futhi kulelohora kuyoba khona ukwahlukaniswa konke kwabalungileyo nababi; futhi ngalo losuku ngiyothumela izingelosi zami ukuba ziqoqe ababi futhi zibalahle emlilweni ongacimekiyo.
Manje bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, mina, iNkosi, angithokozile ngenceku yami uSidney Rigdon; uziphakamisile enhliziyweni yakhe, futhi akasemukelanga iseluleko, kodwa umdabukisile uMoya;
Ngalokho-ke umbhalo wakhe awemukelekile eNkosini, futhi uzokwenza omunye; futhi uma iNkosi ingawemukeli, bhekani akasamile futhi esikhundleni engimubeke kuso.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, labo abafisayo ezinhliziyweni zabo, ngobumnene, ukuxwayisa izoni ukuba ziphenduke, mabagcotshelwe kulamandla.
Ngokuba lolu wusuku lwesexwayiso, futhi akulona usuku lwamazwi amaningi. Ngokuba mina, iNkosi, angizukuhlekwa ngezinsuku zokugcina.

Bhekani, ngiphuma phezulu, futhi amandla ami angaphansi. Ngiphezu kwakho konke, futhi kukho konke, futhi phakathi kwakho konke, futhi ngiyazihlolisisa zonke izinto, futhi usuku luyeza lapho zonke izinto ziyoba ngaphansi kwami.
Bhekani, ngingu-Alfa no-Omega, ngisho uJesu Kristu.
Ngalokho-ke, abantu bonke mabaqaphele ukuthi baliphatha kanjani igama lami ezindebeni zabo—
Ngokuba bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, baningi ababekwe lelicala, abasebenzisa igama leNkosi, futhi abalisebenzisa ngeze, bengenalo igunya.
Ngalokho-ke, ibandla maliphenduke ezonweni zalo, futhi mina, iNkosi, ngizobavuma; kungenjalo bazosuswa.

Khumbulani ukuthi lokho okusuka phezulu kungcwele, futhi kumele kukhulunywe ngokuqaphela, futhi ngokuholwa wuMoya, futhi kulokhu akukho ukubekwa icala, futhi nifumana uMoya ngokukhuleka; ngalokho-ke, ngaphandle kwalokhu kusele ukubekwa icala.
Izinceku zami, uJoseph Smith, omNcane, noSidney Rigdon, mabafune ikhaya, njengoba befundisiwe ngokukhuleka nguMoya.
Lezi zinto zisalele ukunqotshwa ngokubekezela, ukuze abanjalo bathole enkulu nengunaphakade inkazimulo, kungenjalo, kukhona ukubekwa icala. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/64.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 64
chapter_summary: 1–11, AbaNgcwele bayalwa ukuba bathethelelane omunye nomunye, funa kusale kubo isono esikhudlwana; 12–22, Abangaphendukile kufanele balethwe phambi kweBandla; 23–25, Lowo okhipha okweshumi ngeke ashiswe ngokuza kweNkosi; 26–32, AbaNgcwele baxwayiswa ngezikweletu; 33–36, Abavukelayo bayosuswa baphume eSiyoni; 37–40, IBandla lizokwahlulela izizwe; 41–43, ISiyoni izochuma.

verses.text: Bhekani, isho kanje iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu kini, O nina magosa ebandla lami, lalelani futhi nizwe, futhi namukele intando yami ngokuphathelene nani.
Ngokuba ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngifisa niwunqobe umhlaba; ngalokho-ke ngizoba nesihawu kini.
Kunalabo phakathi kwenu abonile; kodwa ngiqinisile ngithi, ngalesi sikhathi kuphela, ukuze ngikhazimuliswe, futhi ukuze kusindiswe imimoya, nginixolele izono zenu.
Ngizoba nomusa kini, ngokuba ngininikile umbuso.
Futhi izikhiye zezimfihlakalo zombuso ngeke zithathwe encekwini yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, ngendlela engiyibekile, ngesikhathi esaphila, kangangoba ethobela izimiso zami.
Kunalabo abafune ithuba lokuthola iphutha kuye ngaphandle kwesizathu;
Nokho, wonile; kodwa ngiqinisile ngithi kini, mina, iNkosi, ngithethelela izono kulabo abazivumayo izono zabo phambi kwami futhi becela intethelelo, abangonile kuze kube sekufeni.

Abafundi bami, ezinsukwini zakudala, babefuna ithuba lokuthola amaphutha omunye komunye futhi abathethelelananga omunye nomunye ezinhliziyweni zabo; futhi ngenxa yalobu bubi bahlushwa futhi bajeziswa kabuhlungu.
Ngalokho-ke, ngithi kini, kufanele nithethelelane; ngokuba lowo ongamthetheleli umfowabo iziphambeko zakhe unecala phambi kweNkosi; ngokuba kusele kuye isono esikhudlwana.
Mina, iNkosi, ngizomthethelela lowo engizomthethelela, kodwa kini kudingeke nithethelele wonke umuntu.
Futhi nina nimelwe nithi ezinhliziyweni zenu—uNkulunkulu makahlulele phakathi kwami nawe, akunike umvuzo ngokwezenzo zakho.
Futhi lowo ongaphenduki ezonweni zakhe, futhi ongazivumi, niyomletha phambi kwebandla, futhi nenze kuye njengokusho kwemibhalo engcwele kini, noma ngomyalo noma ngesambulo.
Futhi lokhu niyokwenza ukuze uNkulunkulu adunyiswe—hhayi ngoba ningaxoleli, ningenabo ububele, kodwa ukuze nibe ngabangenacala phambi kwamehlo omthetho, ukuze ningamoni lowo ongumniki mthetho wenu—
Ngiqinisile ngithi, niyokwenza lezi zinto ngalenhloso.
Bhekani, mina, iNkosi, ngangimthukuthelele lowo owayeyinceku yami u-Ezra Booth, futhi nenceku yami u-Isaac Morley, ngokuba abawugcinanga umthetho, nomyalelo.
Bafuna okubi ezinhliziyweni zabo, futhi mina, iNkosi, ngawugodla uMoya wami. Babona ububi entweni engenabo ububi; nokho ngiyixolele inceku yami u-Isaac Morley.
Futhi nenceku yami u-Edward Partridge, bhekani, wonile, futhi uSathane ufuna ukukhubaza umoya wakhe; kodwa uma lezi zinto sezaziswa kubo, futhi bephenduka ebubini, bayoxolelwa.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi ngibona kufanele ukuthi inceku yami uSidney Gilbert, emva kwamasonto ambalwa, uyobuyela emsebenzini wakhe, nasemsebenzini wokuba wumphatheli ezweni laseSiyoni;
Futhi lokho akubonile futhi wakuzwa makwaziswe kubafundi bami, ukuze bangabhubhi. Futhi ngizikhulume lezi zinto ngalesisizathu.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, ukuze inceku yami u-Isaac Morley angalingwa ngaphezu kwalokho angakwazi ukukumela, futhi aneluleke kabi nize nikhubazeke, nganika umyalelo wokuthi ipulazi lakhe malidayiswe.

Angifisi ukuba inceku yami uFrederick G. Williams alidayise ipulazi lakhe, ngokuba mina, iNkosi, ngifisa ukugcina isizinda ezweni laseKirtland, isikhathi esiyiminyaka emihlanu, kuyo engingeke ngibabhubhise ababi, ukuze ngalokho ngisindise abanye.
Futhi emva kwalolo suku, mina, iNkosi, ngeke ngibeke muntu icala oyohamba enenhliziyo evulekile ukuya ezweni laseSiyoni; ngokuba mina, iNkosi, ngifuna izinhliziyo zabantwana babantu.

Bhekani, lesi sikhathi sibizwa ngenamhlanje kuze kuze iNdodana yoMuntu, futhi ngiqinisile kuwusuku lokunikela, futhi nosuku lokweshumi lwabantu bami; ngokuba lowo okhokha okweshumi ngeke ashiswe ekuzeni kwayo.

Ngokuba emva kwanamhlanje kuza ukushiswa—lokhu kungukukhuluma ngendlela yeNkosi—ngokuba ngiqinisile ngithi, kusasa bonke abazikhukhumezayo nalabo abenza okobi bayoba ngamabibi; futhi ngiyobashisa, ngokuba ngiyiNkosi yamaBandla; futhi ngeke ngisindise muntu osele eBabiloni.
Ngalokho-ke, uma ningikholwa, nizosebenza kusathiwa yinamhlanje.

Futhi akufanele ukuthi izinceku zami, uNewel K. Whitney noSidney Gilbert, badayise isitolo sabo nokungokwabo lapha; ngokuba lokhu akukona ukuhlakanipha kuze kube abasele bebandla, abasele kulendawo, bahambe baye ezweni laseSiyoni.
Bhekani, kuthiwa emithethweni yami, noma kwenqatshiwe, ukungena ezikweletini ezitheni zenu;
Kodwa bhekani, akushiwongo noma nini ukuthi iNkosi ingathathi njengoba ithanda, futhi ikhokhe njengoba kubonakala kukuhle kuyo.
Ngalokho-ke, njengoba nina ningabaphatheli, nisemsebenzini weNkosi; futhi noma yini eniyenzayo ngentando yeNkosi kuwumsebenzi weNkosi.
Futhi uninike umsebenzi wokondla abangcwele kulezi zinsuku zokugcina, ukuze bazuze ifa ezweni laseSiyoni.
Futhi bhekani, mina, iNkosi, ngikusho kini, futhi namazwi ami aqinisekile futhi ngeka ahluleke, ukuthi bayolizuza.
Kodwa zonke izinto kufanele zenzeke ngesikhathi sazo.
Ngalokho-ke, ningakhathali ekwenzeni okuhle, ngokuba nibeka isisekelo somsebenzi omkhulu. Futhi ezintweni ezincane kuyovela lokho okukhulu.
Bhekani, iNkosi idinga inhliziyo nenqondo efisayo; futhi abafisayo nabalalelayo bayokudla izinto ezinhle zezwe laseSiyoni ngalezi zinsuku zokugcina.
Futhi abavukelayo bayosuswa baphume ezweni laseSiyoni, futhi bayothunyelwa kude, futhi ngeke balidle ifa lezwe.
Ngokuba, ngiqinisile ngithi abavukelayo ababona abegazi lika-Efrayimi, ngalokho-ke bayosiphulwa.
Bhekani, mina, iNkosi, ngenze ibandla lami ngalezi zinsuku zokugcina njengomahluleli ohlezi egqumeni, noma endaweni ephakeme, ukwahlulela izizwe.
Ngokuba kuyokwenzeka ukuthi abantu baseSiyoni bayokwahlulela zonke izinto eziphathelene neSiyoni.
Futhi abaqambi manga nabazenzisi bayovivinywa yibo, futhi labo abangesibo abaphostoli nabaphrofethi bayokwaziswa.
Futhi ngisho nombhishobhi, ongumahluleli, nabeluleki bakhe, uma bengathembekile ekuphatheni kwabo bayobekwa icala, futhi abanye bayotshalwa ezikhundleni zabo.
Ngokuba, bhekani, ngithi kini iSiyoni izochuma, futhi nenkazimulo yeNkosi izoba phezu kwayo;
Futhi uzoba yisibonakaliso kubantu, futhi kuyoza kuye abantu besuka kuzo zonke izizwe phansi kwezulu.
Futhi usuku luyofika lapho izizwe zomhlaba ziyothuthumela ngenxa yakhe, futhi ziyokwesaba ngenxa yabesabekayo bakhe. INkosi isikukhulumile lokhu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/65.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 65
chapter_summary: 1–2, Izikhiye zombuso kaNkulunkulu zibekwa kubantu emhlabeni, futhi nokuhamba kwevangeli kuzophumelela; 3–6, Umbuso wasezulwini weminyaka eyinkulungwane uzofika uhlangane nombuso kaNkulunkulu osemhlabeni.

verses.text: Lalelani, futhi bheka, izwi okungelalowo othunywe esuka phezulu, omkhulu nonamandla, ohamba ukuya emkhawulweni womhlaba, yebo, ozwi lakhe liya kubantu—Lungisani indlela yeNkosi, nenze imikhondo yayo iqonde.

Izikhiye zombuso kaNkulunkulu zibekwa kubantu abasemhlabeni, futhi ukusula lapho ivangeli lizoginqika njalo kuze kube sekupheleni komhlaba, njengetshe elaqheshulwa entabeni kungengazandla liyoginqika njalo, lize ligcwalise umhlaba wonke.
Yebo, izwi elikhalayo—Lungisani indlela yeNkosi, lungisani isidlo seMvana, lindelani uMyeni.
Khulekani eNkosini, memezani igama lakhe elingcwele, yazisani imisebenzi yakhe ebabazekayo phakhathi kwabantu.

Bizani iNkosi, ukuze umbuso wayo uqhubekele phambili emhlabeni, ukuze abantu abakuwo bawemukele, futhi balungiselele izinsuku ezizofika, lapho iNdodana yoMuntu iyoza phansi isuka ezulwini, yembethe ukukhanya kwenkazimulo yayo, ukuzohlangana nombuso kaNkulunkulu omiswe emhlabeni.

Ngalokho-ke, sengathi umbuso kaNkulunkulu ungaqhubeka, ukuze umbuso wasezulwini ufike, ukuze wena, O Nkulunkulu, ukhazimuliswe ezulwini nasemhlabeni, ukuze izitha zakho zinqotshwe; ngokuba olwakho udumo, namandla nenkazimulo, phakade naphakade. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/66.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 66
chapter_summary: 1–4, Isivumelwano saphakade singukuphelela kwevangeli; 5–8, Amagosa kufanela ashumayele, afakaze, futhi akhulume nabantu; 9–13, Ukwenza umsebenzi wokushumayela ngokwethembeka kuqinisekisa ifa lokuphila okuphakade.

verses.text: Bheka, isho kanje iNkosi encekwini yami uWilliam E. McLellin—Ubusisiwe, kangangoba usubufulathele ububi bakho, futhi wawemukela amaqiniso ami, kusho iNkosi umHlengi wakho, umSindisi womhlaba, ngisho wabo bonke abakholwa egameni lami.

Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, ubusisiwe ngokwamukela isivumelwano sami saphakade, ngisho nokuphelela kwevangeli lami, elithunyelwe kubantwana babantu, ukuze bafumane ukuphila futhi babe ngabahlanganyela ezinkazimulweni ezisazokwembulwa ngezinsuku zokugcina, njengoba kwakubhaliwe ngabaphrofethi nabaphostoli ngezinsuku zasemandulo.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, nceku yami uWilliam, uhlanzekile, kodwa hhayi ngokuphelele; ngakho-ke, phenduka, kulezo zinto ezingajabulisi emehlweni ami, kusho iNkosi, ngokuba iNkosi izokutshengisa zona.
Manje, ngiqinisile, mina, iNkosi, ngizokutshengisa engikufisayo ngawe, noma okuyintando yami ngawe.

Bheka, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, kuyintando yami ukuthi ushumayele ivangeli lami kusuka ezweni kuya kwelinye, kusuka edolobheni kuya kwelinye, yebo, kulezo zifunda eziseduze lapho lingakashunyayelwa khona.
Ungahlali izinsuku eziningi kulendawo; ungayi ezweni laseSiyoni njengamanje; kodwa kangangoba ungathumela, thumela; kungenjalo, ungacabangi ngempahla yakho.
Hamba uye emazweni asempumalanga, ufakaze ezindaweni zonke, kubantu bonke nasemasinagogweni abo, ukhuluma nabantu.
Inceku yami uSamuel H. Smith makahambe nawe, futhi ungamshiyi, futhi umnike imiyalelo yakho; futhi lowo othembekile uyokwenziwa aqine kuzo zonke izindawo; futhi mina, iNkosi, ngizohamba nawe.
Beka izandla zakho kwabagulayo, futhi bayosinda. Ungabuyi ngize mina, iNkosi, ngikuthumele. Bekezela ezinhluphekweni. Cela, futhi uyofumana; nqonqotha, futhi uyovulelwa.
Ungafuni ukukhathazeka. Shiya konke ukungalungi. Ungaphingi—isilingo esesike sakuhlupha.
Gcina lemiyalelo, ngokuba iliqiniso futhi ithembekile; futhi uyosikhulisa isikhundla sakho, futhi ududulele abantu abaningi eSiyoni ngamaculo enjabulo yaphakade emakhanda abo.
Qhubeka kulezi zinto kuze kube sekugcineni, futhi uyofumana umqhele wokuphila okuphakade ngakwesokunene sikaBaba, ogcwele umusa neqiniso.
Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho, umHlengi wakho, ngisho uJesu Kristu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/67.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 67
chapter_summary: 1–3, INkosi iyayizwa imikhuleko futhi iyawabheka amagosa Ayo; 4–9, Iphonsa inselelo kubantu abahlakaniphe kakhulu ukuba baphinde baveze isambulo esincane kunazo zonke zezambulo Zakhe; 10–14, Amagosa athembekile azophiliswa ngoMoya futhi abubone ubuso bukaNkulunkulu.

verses.text: Bhekani futhi nilalele, O nina magosa ebandla lami, abuthene ndawonye, engiyizwile imikhuleko yawo, futhi engizaziyo izinhliziyo zawo, futhi izifiso zawo ezifikile phambi kwami.
Bhekani futhi bheka, amehlo ami aphezu kwenu, futhi amazulu nomhlaba kusezandleni zami, futhi nengcebo yaphakade ingeyami ukuninika.
Nizame ukukholwa ukuthi nizosithola isibusiso esanikelwa kini; kodwa bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini bekuno kwesaba ezinhliziyweni zenu, futhi ngiqinisile lesi yisizathu esenze ningasitholi.
Manje mina, iNkosi, ngininika ubufakazi bobuqiniso balemiyalelo ephambi kwenu.

Amehlo enu abephezu kwenceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, futhi nolimi lwakhe nilwazile, futhi nobuthakathaka bakhe nibazile; futhi nifunile ezinhliziyweni zenu ulwazi lokubeka ngaphezu kolimi lwakhe; nalokhu nakho niyakwazi.
Manje, funani kuyo iBook of Commandments (iNcwadi yeMiyalelo), ngisho nokuncane kakhulu phakathi kwayo, futhi nibeke lowo ohlakaniphe kakhulu phakathi kwenu;
Noma, uma kukhona noma yimuphi phakathi kwenu oyokwenza okufana nawo, ngalokho aninacala ekutheni aniyazi ukuthi iliqiniso;
Kodwa uma ningeke nakwazi ukwenza ofana nawo, ninecala uma ningafakazi ukuthi iliqiniso.
Ngokuba niyazi ukuthi akukho ukungalungi kuyo, futhi lokho okulungile kuza phansi kuphuma ngaphezulu, kusuka kuBaba wokukhanya.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini kuyilungelo lenu, nesithembiso ngiyaninika nina enigcotshelwe kulobu bufundisi, ukuthi kangangoba nizihlubula umona nokwesaba, futhi nizithoba phambi kwami, ngokuba anikakazithobi ngokwanele, isisitho siyodatshulwa futhi niyongibona futhi nazi ukuthi yimi—hhayi ngengqondo yenyama, noma ngeyemvelo, kodwa ngeyomoya.
Ngokuba akukho muntu owake wabona uNkulunkulu noma ngasiphi isikhathi enyameni, ngaphandle ephiliswe nguMoya kaNkulunkulu.
Akekho futhi noma yimuphi umuntu wemvelo ongamela ukuba phambi kukaNkulunkulu, futhi ngeke ngokwengqondo yenyama.
Anikwazi ukumelana nokuba phambi kukaNkulunkulu manje, noma nokusetshenzelwa yizingelosi; ngalokho-ke, qhubekani nokubekezela nize nibe niphelelisiwe.
Ningavumeli izingqondo zenu zibuyele emuva; futhi uma senifanelekile, ngesami isikhathi esifanele, niyokubona futhi nikwazi lokho okwanikwa ngezandla zenceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/68.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 68
chapter_summary: 1–5, Amazwi amagosa uma eqhutshwa nguMoya oNgcwele ayimibhalo engcwele; 6–12, Amagosa kufanele ashumayele futhi abhabhadise, futhi izibonakaliso ziyolandela abakholwa ngokweqiniso; 13–24, Izibulo phakathi kwamadodana ka-Aroni lingasebenza njengoMbhishobhi oNgamele (okungukuthi, liphathe izikhiye zobumongameli njengombhishobhi) ngaphansi kokuyalelwa wubuMongameli bokuQala; 25–28, Abazali bayalwa ukuba bafundise ivangeli ebantwaneni babo; 29–35, AbaNgcwele kufanele bagcine iSabatha, basebenze ngokukhuthala, futhi bakhuleke.

verses.text: Inceku yami, u-Orson Hyde, wabizwa ngokugcotshwa kwakhe ukuba ashumayele ivangeli laphakade, ngo Moya kaNkulunkulu ophilayo, kubantu ngabantu, kumazwe ngamazwe, emabandleni ababi, emasinagogeni abo, ekhuluma nabo futhi ebachazela yonke imibhalo engcwele.
Futhi, bhekani, futhi bheka, lokhu kuyisibonelo kubo bonke labo abagcotshelwa kulobu buphristi, ubizo lwabo olumiselwe bona ukuba bahambe—
Futhi lokhu kuyisibonelo kubo, ukuthi bayokhuluma uma beholwa uMoya oNgcwele.

Futhi noma yikuphi abayokukhuluma uma beholwa uMoya oNgcwele kuyoba umbhalo ongcwele, kuyoba yintando yeNkosi, kuyoba wumqondo weNkosi, kuyoba wumyalezo weNkosi, kuyoba yizwi leNkosi, futhi namandla kaNkulunkulu aletha insindiso.
Bhekani, lesi yisethembiso seNkosi kini, O nina zinceku zami.

Ngalokho-ke, yibani nenjabulo, futhi ningesabi, ngokuba mina iNkosi nginani, futhi ngizoma nani; futhi niyofakaza ngami, ngisho uJesu Kristu, ukuthi ngiyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo, ukuthi ngangikhona, ngikhona, futhi ngizoza.

Lona ngumyalelo weNkosi kuwe, nceku yami u-Orson Hyde, futhi nasencekwini yami uLuke Johnson, nasencekwini yami uLyman Johnson, nasencekwini yami uWilliam E. McLellin, nakuwo wonke amagosa athembekile ebandla lami—
Hambani niye emhlabeni wonke, nishumayele ivangeli kuzo zonke izidalwa, nikwenza ngegunya engininike lona, nibhabhadisa egameni likaBaba, neleNdodana, nelikaMoya oNgcwele.
Futhi lowo okholwayo futhi ebhabhadiswa uyosindiswa, futhi lowo ongakholwayo uyoba ngaphansi kwamandla kaSathane.
Futhi lowo okholwayo uyobusiswa ngezibonakaliso eziyomlandela, ngisho njengoba kubhaliwe.
Futhi nizophiwa ukwazi izimpawu zezikhathi, nezimpawu zokuza kweNdodana yoMuntu;
Futhi abaningi uBaba ayofakaza ngabo, niyonikwa amandla okubabophela ekuphileni kwaphakade. Amen.
Manje, ngokuphathelene nezihloko ezongezwe ezivumelwaneni nasemiyalelweni, yilezi—
Kukhona emva kwalokhu, ngesikhathi esifanele seNkosi, abanye ababhishobhi okufanele bahlukaniselwe ebandleni, ukuba basize njengowokuqala;
Ngalokho-ke bayoba nga baphristi abakhulu abafanelekile, futhi bayobekwa wubu Mongameli bokuQala bobuPhristi bukaMelkisedeki, ngaphandle uma beyisizukulwane sangempela sika-Aroni.
Futhi uma bengabesizukulwane ngempela sika-Aroni banelungelo elisemthethweni lokuba sesikhundleni sobubhishobhi, uma bengamazibulo phakathi kwamadodana ka-Aroni;
Ngokuba izibulo linelungelo lobumongameli kulobu buphristi, kanye nezikhiye noma igunya labo.
Akekho umuntu onelungelo elisemthethweni kulesi sikhundla, ukuphatha izikhiye zalobu buphristi, ngaphandle uma engowesizukulwane ngempela futhi eyizibulo lika-Aroni.

Kodwa, njengoba umphristi omkhulu wobuPhristi bukaMelkisedeki enegunya lokusebenza kuzo zonke izikhundla ezincane angasebenza esikhundleni sika mbhishobhi uma kungekho ongowesizukulwane ngempela sika-Aroni ongatholakala, uma ebiziwe futhi wahlukaniselwa futhi wagcotshwelwa kulamandla, ngaphansi kwezandla zobuMongameli bokuQala bobuphristi bukaMelkisedeki.

Futhi ongowesizukulwane ngempela sika-Aroni, nanye, kufanele akhonjwe yilobu buMongameli, futhi atholakale efanelekile, futhi agcotshwe futhi abekwe ngaphansi kwezandla zobuMongameli, kungenjalo abavunyelwe ngokomthetho ukusebenza ebuphristini babo.

Kodwa, ngesizathu somyalelo ngokuphathelene nelungelo labo lobuphristi elehla kusuka kubaba kuya endodaneni, bangakucela ngokwelungelo ukugcotshwa kwabo uma noma ngasiphi isikhathi bengalukhombisa uzalo lwabo, noma beluqinisa ngesambulo esisuka eNkosini ngaphansi kwezandla zobuMongameli osebushiwo ngenhla.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, akekho umbhishobhi noma umphristi omkhulu oyohlukaniselwa kulesi sikhundla oyoquliswa noma oyobekwa noma yiliphi icala, ngaphandle uma kungaphambi kobu Mongameli bokuQala bebandla;
Futhi ngangoba etholwa enecala phambi kwalobu buMongameli, ngobufakazi obungeke buphikiseke, uyobekwa icala;
Futhi uma ephenduka uyoxolelwa, ngokwezivumelwano nemiyalelo yebandla.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, kangangoba abazali benabantwana eSiyoni, noma kuziphi izikhonkwane zayo ezihleliwe, abangaba fundisi ukuba bayiqonde imfundiso yokuphenduka, ukukholwa kuKristu iNdodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo, nokubhabhadiswa futhi nesipho soMoya oNgcwele ngokubekwa izandla, uma sebeneminyaka eyisishiyagalombili ubudala, isono masibe phezu kwamakhanda abazali.
Ngokuba lokhu kuyoba umthetho kubantu base Siyoni, noma kunanoma kuziphi izikhonkwane zakhe ezihleliwe.
Futhi abantwana babo bayobhabhadiswa ukuze kuthethelelwe izono zabo uma sebeneminyaka eyisishiyagalombili ubudala, futhi bafumane ukubekwa izandla.
Futhi bayofundisa abantwana babo ukuba bakukhuleka, futhi nokuhamba ngobuqotho phambi kweNkosi.
Futhi abantu baseSiyoni bayogcina usuku lweSabatha balugcine lungcwele.
Futhi abantu baseSiyoni bayoyikhumbula imisebenzi yabo, kangangoba bebekwe ukuba basebenze, kukho konke ukuthembeka; ngokuba ivila liyokhunjulwa phambi kweNkosi.

Manje, mina, iNkosi, angithokozile kahle ngabantu baseSiyoni, ngokuba kunamavila phakathi kwabo; futhi nabantwana babo bakhulela ebubini; futhi abayifuni ngokukhuthazela ingcebo yaphakade, kodwa amehlo abo agcwele umhobholo.
Lezi zinto akufanele zibekhona, futhi kufanele ziqedwe phakathi kwabo; ngalokho-ke, inceku yami u-Oliver Cowdery makahambise lokhu okushiwo akuyise ezweni laseSiyoni.
Futhi umyalelo ngiwunika bona—ukuthi lowo ongayenzi imikhuleko yakhe phambi kweNkosi ngesikhathi sakho lokho, makakukhunjulwe phambi kukamehluleli wabantu bami.
Lokhu okushiwo kuliqiniso futhi kuthembekile; ngalokho-ke, ningakwephuli, futhi ningasusi lutho kukho.
Bhekani, ngingu-Alfa no-Omega, futhi ngiza masinyane. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/69.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 69
chapter_summary: 1–2, UJohn Whitmer kufanele aphelezele u-Oliver Cowdery ukuya eMissouri; 3–8, Kufanele naye futhi ashumayele futhi aqoqe, alobe, futhi abhale imininingwane yomlando.

verses.text: Ngilaleleni, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu, ukwenzela inceku yami u-Oliver Cowdery. Akukona ukuhlakanipha kimi ukuthi aphathiswe imiyalelo nezimali azozihambisa ezweni laseSiyoni, ngaphandle kubekhona ohamba naye ozoba neqiniso futhi athembeke.
Ngalokho-ke, mina, iNkosi, ngifisa kuba inceku yami, uJohn Whitmer, ahambe nenceku yami u-Oliver Cowdery;
Futhi nokuthi usazoqhubeka nokubhala futhi nokwenza umlando wazo zonke izinto ezibalulekile ayozibona nayozazi ngokuphathelene nebandla lami;
Futhi nokuba athole ukwelulekwa nokusizwa yinceku yami u-Oliver Cowdery nabanye.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, izinceku zami ezindawo zonke emhlabeni kufanele zithumele imibiko ngobuphathi bazo ezweni laseSiyoni;
Ngokuba izwe laseSiyoni liyoba yikomkhulu nendawo yokwemukela neyokwenza zonke lezi zinto.
Nokho, inceku yami uJohn Whitmer mayihambe izikhathi eziningi izindawo ngezindawo, futhi ibandla ngebandla, ukuze akwazi ukuthola kalula ulwazi—

Eshumayela futhi efundisa, ebhala, ekopisha, ehlunga, ethola zonke izinto eziyokuba yinzuzo ebandleni, futhi nokwenzela izizukulwane ezikhulayo eziyokhula ezweni lase Siyoni, ukuze zibe nakho izizukulwane ngezizukulwana, phakade naphakade. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/70.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 70
chapter_summary: 1–5, Abaphathi bayabekwa ukuba bazise umphakathi ngezambulo; 6–13, Labo abasebenza ezintweni zikamoya bafanelwe inkokhelo yabo; 14–18, AbaNgcwele kufanele balingane ezintweni zasemhlabeni.

verses.text: Bhekani, futhi nilalele, O nina bantu baseSiyoni, futhi nani nonke nina bantu bebandla lami abakude le, futhi nizwe izwi leNkosi engilinika inceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, futhi nase ncekwini yami uMartin Harris, futhi nasencekwini yami u-Oliver Cowdery, futhi nase ncekwini yami uJohn Whitmer, futhi nasencekwini yami uSidney Rigdon, nasencekwini yami uWilliam W. Phelps, ngendlela yomyalelo kubo.
Ngokuba ngibanika umyalelo; ngalokho-ke lalelani futhi nizwe, ngokuba isho kanje iNkosi kubo—
Mina, iNkosi, ngibabekile, futhi ngabagcoba ukuba babe ngabaphathi bezambulo nemiyalelo engibanike yona, futhi engiyobanika yona emva kwalokhu;
Futhi umbiko ngalobu buphathi babo ngiyowufuna kubo ngelanga lokwahlulela.
Ngalokho-ke, ngibamisele wona, futhi lona umsebenzi wabo ebandleni likaNkulunkulu, ukuphatha imiyalelo futhi nezindaba eziphathelene nayo, yebo, nenzuzo yayo.
Ngalokho-ke, umyalelo ngibanika wona, wokuthi bangaziniki lezi zinto ebandleni, futhi nasemhlabeni;
Nokho, kangangoba bethola ngaphezu kwalokho okudingekile ngokwezidingo nangokwezinfuno zabo, kuyobekwa endlini yami yengcebo;
Futhi inzuzo iyongcweliselwa abantu baseSiyoni, nezizukulwane zabo, kangangoba beba yizindlalifa ngokwemithetho yombuso.
Bhekani, yikho lokhu iNkosi ekufunayo kumuntu wonke nobuphathi bakhe, ngisho njengoba mina, iNkosi, ngibekele noma emva kwalokhu ngiyobekela noma yimuphi umuntu.
Futhi bhekani, akukho muntu okhululiwe kulomthetho ongowebandla likaNkulunkulu ophilayo;
Yebo, noma umbhishobhi, noma umphatheli ogcina indlu yengcebo yeNkosi, noma lowo obekwe ebuphathini ezintweni zasemhlabeni.
Lowo obekelwe izinto zikamoya, nguye lowo ofanelwe yinkokhelo yakhe, ngisho njengalabo ababekelwe ubuphathi ukuphatha izinto zasemhlabeni;
Yebo, ngisho ngobuningi kakhulu, leyo nala ephindaphindwayo kubo ngezibonakaliso zoMoya.
Nokho, ezintweni zenu zasemhlabeni niyolingana, futhi lokhu hhayi kalukhuni, kungenjalo inala yezibonakaliso zoMoya iyogodlwa.

Manje, lomyalelo ngiwunika izinceku zami ukuze zizuze ngesikhathi zisaphila, ukuze kube nesibonakaliso sezibusiso zami phezu kwamakhanda abo, futhi ukuze bafumane umvuzo wokukhuthala kwabo futhi ukuze baphephe;

Ukuze bafumane ukudla futhi ukuze bafumane okokwembatha; ukuze bathole ifa; futhi ukuze bathole izindlu nemihlaba, kunoma yiziphi izimo mina, iNkosi, engiyobabeka kuzo, futhi noma yikuphi lapho mina, iNkosi, engiyobathumela khona.
Ngokuba bathembekile ezintweni eziningi, futhi benze kahle kangangoba bengazange bone.
Bhekani, mina, iNkosi, nginomhawu futhi ngizobabusisa, futhi bazongena enjabulweni yalezi zinto. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/71.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 71
chapter_summary: 1–4, UJoseph Smith noSidney Rigdon bayathunyelwa ukuyoshumayela ivangeli; 5–11, Izitha zabaNgcwele zizohlulwa.

verses.text: Bhekani, isho kanje iNkosi kini zinceku zami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, no Sidney Rigdon, isikhathi ngiqinisile sesifikile sokuba kudingekile futhi kufanele kimi ukuthi nivule imilomo yenu ukushumayela ivangeli lami, izinto zombuso, nichaze ngezimfihlakalo zawo ngemibhalo engcwele, ngokwaleyongxenye yoMoya namandla okuyonikwa kini, ngisho ngokwentando yami.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, shumayelani emhlabeni ezifundeni eziseduze, nasebandleni futhi, isikhathi esithile, ngisho kuze kwaziswe yiNkosi kini.
Ngiqinisile lona wumsebenzi wokufundisa ivangeli wesikhathi esithile, engininika wona.
Ngalokho-ke, sebenzani esivinini sami. Nxusani abantu basemhlabeni, futhi nifakaze, futhi nilungiselele imiyalelo nezambulo ezizofika.
Manje, bhekani lokhu ukuhlakanipha; lowo ofundayo, makaqonde futhi emukele;
Ngokuba kulowo owemukelayo uyonikwa ngobuningi, ngisho namandla.
Ngalokho-ke, zehluleni izitha zenu; zibizeni ukuba nihlangane emphakathini nangasese; futhi kangangoba nithembekile ihlazo labo lizobonakaliswa.
Ngalokho-ke, mabalethe izizathu zabo eziqinile ngukumelene neNkosi.
Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi kini—asikho isikhali esakhelwe nina esiyochuma;
Futhi uma kukhona ophakamisa izwi lakhe ngokumelene nani uyohlulwa ngesikhathi sami esifanele.
Ngalokho-ke, gcinani imiyalelo yami; iyiqiniso futhi ithembekile. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/72.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 72
chapter_summary: 1–8, Amagosa kufanele anike umbiko wobuphathi babo kumbhishobhi; 9–15, Umbhishobhi ugcina indlu yengcebo futhi anakekele abampofu nabadingayo; 16–26, Ababhishobhi kufanele baqinise ukufaneleka kwamagosa.

verses.text: Lalelani, futhi nizwe izwi leNkosi, O nina enibuthene ndawonye, eningaba phristi abakhulu bebandla lami, okunikwe kubo umbuso namandla.
Ngokuba ngiqinisile isho kanje iNkosi, ngibona kufanele ukuthi nimiselwe umbhishobhi, noma akhethwe phakathi kwenu, ebandleni kulengxenye yesivini seNkosi.
Futhi ngiqinisile kulokhu nenze ngokuhlakanipha, ngokuba kudingekile eNkosini, esandleni sanoma yimuphi umphathi, ukunikeza umbiko ngobuphathi bakhe, manje naphakade.
Ngokuba lowo othembekileyo futhi nohlakaniphile manje ubalwa njengofanele ukufumana ifa lezindlu ezilungiselelwe yena wuBaba.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, amagosa ebandla kulengxenye yesivini sami ayonika umbiko wobuphathi bawo kumbhishobhi, oyobekwa yimi kulengxenye yesivini sami.
Lezi zinto ziyogcinwa ngokulotshwa phansi, zidluliselwe kumbhishobhi eSiyoni.
Futhi umsebenzi ka mbhishobhi uyokwaziswa ngemiyalelo enikiwe, nangezwi lomhlangano.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, inceku yami uNewel K. Whitney yiyona ndoda ezobekwa futhi igcotshelwe kulamandla. Lena intando yeNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu, umHlengi wenu. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.
Izwi leNkosi, ngaphezu komthetho osunikiwe, elazisa ngomsebenzi kambhishobhi osegcotshiwe ebandleni kulengxenye yesivini, ngokuqinisile eliyilokhu—
Ukugcina indlu yengcebo yeNkosi; ukwemukela izimali zebandla kulengxenye yesivini;
Ukuthola umbiko wamagosa njengoba kuyaliwe ngaphambili; futhi nokunaka izidingo zawo, ayokukhokhela lokho akufumanayo, kangangoba enakho okokukhokha;
Ukuze nalokhu kungcweliselwe ukuzuza kwebandla, kwabampofu nabadingayo.
Futhi lowo ongenako angakhokha ngakho, umbiko uyokwenziwa futhi udluliselwe kumbhishobhi waseSiyoni, oyokhokha isikweletu ngalokho iNkosi eyokubeka ezandleni zakhe.
Futhi imisebenzi yabathembekileyo abasebenza ezintweni zomoya, ukupha ivangeli nezinto zombuso ebandleni, nasemhlabeni, iyokhokhela isikweletu kumbhishobhi eSiyoni;
Ngakho-ke lenkokhelo ivela ebandleni, ngokuba ngokomthetho wonke umuntu oza phezulu eSiyoni kumele abeke zonke izinto ngaphambi kukambhishobhi eSiyoni.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, njengoba igosa ngalinye kulengxenye yesivini kumele linike umbiko wobuphathi balo kumbhishobhi kulengxenye yesivini—

Isitifiketi esiphuma kumahluleli noma kumbhishobhi kulengxenye yesivini, esiya kumbhishobhi eSiyoni, senza wonke umuntu amukeleke, futhi siphendule zonke izinto, ukuze afumane ifa, futhi ukuze amukelwe njengo mphathi ohlakaniphileyo futhi njengesisebenzi esithembekileyo;
Kungenjalo ngeke amukelwe ngumbhishobhi waseSiyoni.

Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, lonke igosa elizokwenza umbiko kumbhishobhi webandla kulengxenye yesivini malivunywe yibandla noma ngamabandla, elisebenza kuwo, ukuze lona futhi nemibiko yalo livunywe kuzo zonke izinto.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, izinceku zami ezibekwe njengabaphathi kokubhaliweyo kwebandla lami mazicele ngokwelungelo usizo kumbhishobhi noma kubabhishobhi kuzo zonke izinto—
Ukuze izambulo zaziswe umphakathi, futhi zihambe ziye emikhawulweni yomhlaba; ukuze nabo futhi bathole izimali eziyozuzisa ibandla kuzo zonke izinto;
Ukuze nabo futhi bavumeleke kuzo zonke izinto, futhi babalwe njengabaphathi abahlakaniphile.
Manje, bhekani, lokhu kuyoba yisibonelo kuwo wonke amagatsha ebandla lami asabalele yonke indawo, kunoma yiliphi izwe lapho ayomiswa khona. Manje sengenza isiphetho salokhu engikushoyo. Amen.
Amazwi ambalwa ukwengeza emithethweni yombuso, ngokuphathelene namalungu ebandla—labo ababekwe nguMoya oNgcwele ukuya phezulu eSiyoni, futhi nalabo abanenhlanhla yokuya phezulu eSiyoni—
Mabaphathele umbhishobhi isitifiketi esisuka emagoseni amathathu ebandla, noma isitifiketi esisuka kumbhishobhi;
Kungenjalo lowo oya phezulu ezweni laseSiyoni ngeke abalwe njengomphathi ohlakaniphileyo. Lokhu futhi kuyisibonelo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/73.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 73
chapter_summary: 1–2, Amagosa kufanele aqhubeke nokushumayela; 3–6, UJoseph Smith noSidney Rigdon kufanele baqhubeke nokuhumusha iBhayibheli lize liphele.

verses.text: Ngokuba ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi, ngibona kufanele ukuba baqhubeke nokushumayela ivangeli, nasekuyaleni amabandla ezifundeni eziseduze, kuze kube wumhlangano;
Futhi emva kwalokho, bhekani, kuyokwaziswa kubo, ngezwi lomhlangano, imisebenzi yabo yokufundisa ivangeli eyahlukahlukene.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kini zinceku zami, uJoseph Smith, omNcane, noSidney Rigdon, kusho iNkosi, kunesidingo sokuthi nihumushe futhi;
Futhi, ngangoba kungenzeka, ukuba nishumayele ezifundeni eziseduze kuze kube wumhlangano; futhi emva kwalokho kunesidingo sokuthi kuqhutshwe umsebenzi wokuhumusha uze uqedwe.
Futhi lokhu makube yisibonelo kumagosa aze aziswe futhi, ngisho njengoba kubhaliwe.
Manje angisani niki lutho olunye futhi kulesi sikhathi. Bophani izinkalo zenu futhi nizothe. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/74.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 74
chapter_summary: 1–5, UPawulu weluleka iBandla langesikhathi sakhe ukuthi bangawugcini umthetho kaMose; 6–7, Abantwana abancane bangcwele futhi bangcweliswa ngeNhlawulo.

verses.text: Ngokuba indoda engakholwayo ingcwelisiwe ngomfazi, nomfazi ongakholwayo ungcwelisiwe ngendoda; uma kungenjalo abantwana benu ngabe bangcolile, kodwa manje bangcwele.
Manje, ezinsukwini zabaphostoli umthetho wokusokwa wawenziwa phakathi kwawo wonke amaJuda ayengalikholwa ivangeli likaJesu Kristu.

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi kwaqubuka impikiswano enkulu phakathi kwabantu ngokuphathelene nomthetho wokusoka, ngokuba umyeni ongakholwayo wayefisa ukuthi abantwana bakhe basokwe futhi babe ngaphansi komthetho kaMose, lowomthetho owawusugcwalisekile.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi abantwana, bekhuliswe ngaphansi komthetho kaMose, banaka amasiko oyise futhi bangalikholwa ivangeli likaKristu, ngalokho abazange babe ngabangcwele.

Ngalokho-ke, ngalenhloso umphostoli wabhalela ibandla, ebanikeza umyalelo, okwakungewona oweNkosi, kodwa okwakungowakhe, ukuthi ikholwa malingahlangani nongakholwayo; ngaphandle uma umthetho kaMose uchithiwe phakathi kwabo,
Ukuze abantwana babo bahlale bengasokiwe; futhi ukuze isiko lichithwe, elalithi abantwana abancane abekho ngcwele; ngokuba lalenziwa phakathi kwamaJuda;
Kodwa abantwana abancane bangcwele, bengcweliswe ngenhlawulo kaJesu Kristu; futhi yikho lokhu okuchazwa yimibhalo engcwele.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/75.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 75
chapter_summary: 1–5, Amagosa athembekileyo ashumayela ivangeli ayofumana ukuphila okuphakade, 6–12, Khulekani ukuze nifumane uMduduzi, ofundisa zonke izinto; 13–22, Amagosa azohlala ekwahlulelweni ngokuphathelene nalabo abenqaba umyalezo wawo; 23–36, Imindeni yabefundisi kufanele ifumane usizo eBandleni.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, mina okhuluma ngisho ngezwi loMoya wami, ngisho u-Alfa no-Omega, iNkosi yenu futhi noNkulunkulu wenu—
Lalelani, O nina eninike amagama enu ukuze nihambe niyoshumayela ivangeli lami, futhi nokuthena isivini sami.
Bhekani, ngithi kini kuyintando yami ukuthi nihambe futhi ningalibali, futhi ningabi ngamavila kodwa nisebenze ngamandla enu—
Niphakamisa amazwi enu njengezwi lecilongo, nishumayela iqiniso ngokwezambulo nemiyalelo engininike yona.
Ngakho-ke, uma nithembekile niyothweswa izithungu eziningi, futhi niqheliswe ngodumo, nenkazimulo, nokungafi, nempilo yaphakade.
Ngalokho-ke, ngiqinisile ngithi encekwini yami uWilliam E. McLellin, ngiyawuchitha umsebenzi wokuthunywa engimnike wona wokuya emazweni asempumalanga;
Futhi ngimnika umsebenzi wokuthunywa nomyalelo omusha, kuwo mina, iNkosi, engimsolayo ngokuvungama enhliziyweni yakhe;
Futhi wonile; nokho, ngiyamthethelela futhi ngiyaphinda ngithi kuye, Hamba uye emazweni aseningizimu.
Futhi inceku yami uLuke Johnson makahambe naye, futhi bashumayele izinto engibayale ngazo—
Bebiza igama leNkosi ukuze bafumane uMduduzi, ozobafundisa zonke izinto ezibafanele—
Bekhuleka njalo ukuze bangaphelelwa yithemba; futhi kangangoba bekwenza lokhu, ngiyoba nabo ngisho kuze kube sekupheleni.
Bhekani, lena yintando yeNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu ngokuphathelene nani. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile isho kanje iNkosi, inceku yami u-Orson Hyde nenceku yami uSamuel H. Smith mabathathe uhambo lwabo baye emazweni asempumalanga, futhi bashumayele izinto engibayale ngazo; futhi kangangoba bethembekile, bheka, ngiyoba nabo kuze kube sekugcineni.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi encekwini yami uLyman Johnson, futhi nasencekwini yami u-Orson Pratt, nabo futhi bayothatha uhambo lwabo baye emazweni asempumalanga; futhi bhekani, futhi bheka, nginabo, kuze kube sekugcineni.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi encekwini yami u-Asa Dodds, nasencekwini yami uCalves Wilson, ukuthi nabo futhi bayothatha olwabo uhambo baye emazweni asentshonalanga, futhi bashumayele ivangeli lami, ngisho njengoba ngibayalile.
Futhi lowo othembekileyo uyozinqoba zonke izinto, futhi uyophakanyiswa ngosuku lokugcina.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi encekwini yami uMeja N. Ashley, nasencekwini yami uBurr Riggs, mabathathe uhambo lwabo nabo baye ezweni eliseningizimu.
Yebo, bonke labo mabathathe uhambo lwabo, njengoba ngibayalile, behamba umuzi ngomuzi, futhi isigodi ngesigodi, futhi idolobha ngedolobha.
Futhi kunanoma yimuphi umuzi enigena kuwo, futhi benamukele, shiyani isibusiso senu kulowo muzi.
Futhi kunanoma yimuphi umuzi eningena kuwo, futhi benganemukeli, niyophuma masinyane kulowo muzi, futhi nithuntuthe uthuli lwezinyawo zenu njengobufakazi obumelene nabo.
Futhi niyogcwala injabulo nentokozo; futhi yazini lokhu, ukuthi ngosuku lokwahlulela niyoba ngabehluleli balowo muzi, futhi nibabeke icala;

Futhi kuyobekezeleleka kakhulu ngokuphathelene nabahedeni ngosuku lokwahlulela, kunalowo muzi; ngakhoke, bophani izinkalo zenu futhi nithembeke, futhi niyozinqoba zonke izinto, futhi niyophakanyiswa ngosuku lokugcina. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, isho kanje iNkosi kini, O nina magosa ebandla lami, eninike amagama enu ukuze nazi intando yakhe ngokuphathelene nani—
Bhekani, ngithi kini, kungumsebenzi webandla ukulekelela ekuxhaseni imindeni yalabo, futhi nokuxhasa imindeni yalabo ababiziwe futhi nokudingeke bathunywe emhlabeni ukuyoshumayela ivangeli emhlabeni.
Ngalokho-ke, mina, iNkosi, ngininika lomyalelo, wokuthi nitholele imindeni yenu izindawo, kangangoba abafowenu bethanda ukuvula izinhliziyo zabo.
Futhi bonke labo abangatholela imindeni yabo izindawo, futhi nokuxhaswa yibandla, mabangehluleki ukuya emhlabeni, noma kusempumalanga noma entshonalanga, noma enyakatho, noma eningizimu.
Mabacele futhi bayofumana, bangqongqothe futhi bayovulelwa, futhi kwaziswe kusuka phezulu, ngisho ngoMduduzi, ukuthi bayoya kuphi.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, wonke umuntu okufanele ondle umndeni wakhe, makawondle, futhi akasoze alahlekelwe wumqhele wakhe; futhi makasebenze ebandleni.
Wonke umuntu makakhuthale ezintweni zonke. Futhi ivila ngeke libe nendawo ebandleni, ngaphandle uma liphenduka lilungisa izindlela zalo.
Ngalokho-ke, inceku yami uSimeon Carter nenceku yami u-Emer Harris mababe munye ebufundisini;
Futhi ngokunjalo nenceku yami u-Ezra Thayre nenceku yami uThomas B. Marsh;
Ngokunjalo nenceku yami uHyrum Smith nenceku yami uReynolds Cahoon;
Futhi ngokunjalo nenceku yami uDaniel Stanton nenceku yami uSeymour Brunson;
Futhi ngokunjalo nenceku yami uSylvester Smith nenceku yami uGideon Carter;
Futhi ngokunjalo nenceku yami uRuggles Eames nenceku yami uStephen Burnett;
Futhi ngokunjalo nenceku yami uMicah B. Welton nenceku yami u-Eden Smith. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/76.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 76
chapter_summary: 1–4, INkosi inguNkulunkulu; 5–10, Izimfihlakalo zombuso zizokwambulwa kubo bonke abathembekileyo; 11–17, Bonke bazovuka ovukweni lwabalungileyo noma lwabangalungile; 18–24, Abantu basemihlabeni eminingi bangamadodana namadodakazi azelwe kuNkulunkulu ngeNhlawulo kaJesu Kristu; 25–29, Ingelosi kaNkulunkulu yawa futhi yaba ngudeveli; 30–49, Amadodana okulahlwa ezwa usizi nobuhlungu baphakade; bonke abanye bazuza izinga elithile lensindiso; 50–70, Inkazimulo nomvuzo wabaphakanyisiweyo embusweni wesilestiyali kuyachazwa; 71–80, Labo abayofumana ifa lombuso wethirestriyali bayachazwa, 81–113, Isimo salabo abasenkazimulweni yethilestiyali, yethirestriyali, neyesilestiyali siyachazwa; 114–119, Abathembekileyo bangazibona futhi baziqonde izimfihlakalo zombuso kaNkulunkulu ngamandla oMoya oNgcwele.

verses.text: Yizwani, O nina mazulu, futhi nibeke indlebe, O mhlaba, futhi nijabule nina abahlala kuwo, ngokuba iNkosi ingu Nkulunkulu, futhi ngaphandle kwakhe akukho mSindisi.
Kukhulu ukuhlakanipha kwakhe, ziyamangalisa izindlela zakhe, nobubanzi bezenzo zakhe ngeke baziwe muntu.
Izinhloso zakhe azihluleki, futhi akekho noyedwa ongakwazi ukuvimba isandla sakhe.
Kusuka phakade kuya phakade uyafana, futhi neminyaka yakhe ayisoze yaphela.
Ngokuba isho kanje iNkosi—mina, iNkosi, nginomhawu futhi nginomusa kulabo abangesabayo, futhi kuyangijabulisa ukuhlonipha labo abangi sebenzela ngokulunga nangeqiniso kuze kube sekupheleni.
Uyoba mkhulu umvuzo wabo futhi iyokuba ngeyaphakade inkazimulo yabo.

Futhi kubo ngizo kwambula zonke izimfihlakalo, yebo, zonke izimfihlakalo ezifihliwe zombuso wami kusuka ezinsukwini zakudala, futhi ezikhathini eziningi ezizayo, ngizobazisa okuhle ngentando yami ngokuphathelene nazo zonke izinto eziqondene nombuso wami.
Yebo, ngisho nezimangaliso zephakade bayozazi, nezinto ezisazofika ngizobatshengisa, ngisho izinto zezizukulwane eziningi.

Futhi ukuhlakanipha kwabo kuyokuba kukhulu, nokuqonda kwabo kuyofinyelela ezulwini; futhi phambi kwabo ukuhlakanipha kwabahlakaniphileyo kuyoshabalala, futhi nokuqonda kwabahlakaniphileyo kuyoba yize.

Ngokuba ngo Moya wami ngizoba khanyisela, futhi nga mandla ami ngizokwambula izimfihlo zentando yami—yebo, ngisho lezo zinto iso elingakaziboni, nendlebe engakazizwa, futhi ezingakangeni enhliziyweni yomuntu.
Thina, uJoseph Smith, omNcane, noSidney Rigdon, siseMoyeni ngosuku lweshumi nesithupha lukaFebruwari, ngonyaka weNkosi yethu wenkulungwane namakhulu ayisishiyagalombili namashumi amathathu nambili—
Ngamandla oMoya amehlo ethu avuleka futhi nokuqonda kwethu kwakhanyiselwa, ukuze sizibone futhi siziqonde izinto zika Nkulunkulu—
Ngisho lezo zinto ezazisuka ekuqaleni ngaphambi kokuba umhlaba ubekhona, ezazimiswe nguBaba, ngeNdodana yakhe Ezelwe Yodwa, eyayisesifubeni sikaBaba, ngisho kusuka ekuqaleni;
Esifakazayo ngaye; futhi ubufakazi esibushoyo buwukuphelela kwevangeli likaJesu Kristu, oyiNdodana, esambona nesa khuluma naye embonweni wasezulwini.

Ngokuba ngesikhathi sisenza umsebenzi woku humusha, iNkosi eyayisimisele wona, safika evesini lamashumi amabili nesishiyagalolunye lesahluko sesihlanu sikaJohane, elanikwa kithi ngalendlela elandelayo—
Elikhuluma ngokuvuka kwabafileyo, ngokuphathelene nalabo abayolizwa izwi le Ndodana yoMuntu;
Futhi bayophuma; labo abenze okuhle, ovukweni lwaba lungileyo; futhi labo abenze okubi, ovukweni lwabangalungile.
Manje lokhu kwenza ukuba simangale, ngokuba kwanikwa kithi ngoMoya.
Futhi ngesikhathi sisadlinza ngalezi zinto, iNkosi yathinta amehlo okuqonda kwethu futhi avuleka, nenkazimulo yeNkosi yasikhanyisa nxazonke.
Futhi sabona inkazimulo yeNdodana, ngakwe sokunene sika Baba, futhi safumana ukuphelela konke kwayo;
Futhi sabona izingelosi ezingcwele, futhi nalabo aba ngcwelisiwe phambi kwesihlalo sakhe, bedumisa uNkulunkulu, neMvana, bemdumisa phakade naphakade.
Manje, emva kobufakazi obuningi osebunikiwe ngaye, nabu ubufakazi, ekugcineni kwako konke, esibunikayo ngaye: Ukuthi uyaphila!
Ngokuba sambona, ngisho ngakwesokunene sika Nkulunkulu; futhi sezwa izwi lifakaza ukuthi uyiNdodana Ezelwe Yodwa kaBaba—
Ukuthi ngaye, futhi ngendlela yakhe, futhi nangamasu akhe, imihlaba ikhona futhi yadalwa, nabantu bayo bangama dodana namadodakazi azelwe kuNkulunkulu.

Futhi nalokhu sakubona, futhi siyafakaza, ukuthi ingelosi kaNkulunkulu eyayiphethe lapho kukhona khona uNkulunkulu, eyavukela iNdodana Ezelwe Yodwa eyayithandwa nguBaba futhi neyayisesifubeni sikaBaba, yaphoswa phansi isuka lapho kukhona khona uNkulunkulu neNdodana,
Futhi yabizwa ngokuLahlwa, ngokuba amazulu amkhalela—wayengu Lusifa, indodana yokusa.
Futhi sabona, futhi bheka, uwile! uwile, ngisho indodana yokusa!

Futhi ngesikhathi sisekuMoya, iNkosi yasiyala ukuthi asiwubhale lombono; ngokuba sambona uSathane, leyo nyoka endala, ngisho udeveli, owavukela uNkulunkulu, futhi wafuna ukuthatha umbuso kaNkulunkulu wethu noKristu wakhe—
Ngalokho-ke, ulwa nabangcwele baNkulunkulu, futhi uyabazungeza nxazonke.
Futhi sabona umbono wokuzwa ubuhlungu kwalabo alwa nabo futhi wabanqoba, ngokuba leza kanje izwi leNkosi kithi:

Isho kanje iNkosi ngokuphathelene nabo bonke abazi amandla ami, futhi naseke bawafumana, futhi nabazivumele ngamandla kadeveli ukuba banqotshwe, futhi nokuba baliphike iqiniso futhi bangawahloniphi amandla ami—
Yibo laba abanga madodana okulahlwa, ngabo engithi kwakuyobangcono kubo ukuba abazalwanga;
Ngokuba bayizitsha zentukuthelo, sebenikelwe ukuba bezwe ubuhlungu bentukuthelo kaNkulunkulu, nodeveli nezingelosi zakhe phakade;
Ngokuphathelene nalabo esengikhulume ngabo akukho ukuthethelelwa kulomhlaba noma emhlabeni ozayo—
Sebewu phikile uMoya oNgcwele emva kokuba sebewufumene, futhi sebeyiphikile iNdodana kaBaba Ezelwe Yodwa, sebeyibethele bona uqobo futhi bayithela ngehlazo obala.
Yibo laba abayoya echibini lomlilo nesibabule, nodeveli nezingelosi zakhe—
Futhi okuyibo bodwa ukufa kwesibili okuyoba namandla kubo;
Yebo, ngiqinisile, nokuyibo bodwa abangeyikukhululwa ngesikhathi esifanele seNkosi, emva kokuzwa ubuhlungu bentukuthelo yayo.
Ngokuba bonke abanye bayokhishwa ngo kuvuka kwabafileyo, ngokunqoba nangenkazimulo ye Mvana, eyabulawa, eyayisesifubeni sikaBaba ngaphambi kokuba imihlaba yenziwe.
Futhi nanti ivangeli, izindaba ezimnandi, izwi elaliphuma emazulwini elafakaza ngazo kithi—
Ukuthi weza emhlabeni, ngisho uJesu, ukuzobethelelwa umhlaba, futhi nokuzo thwala izono zomhlaba, futhi nokuzo ngcwelisa umhlaba, futhi nokuzowu hlanza kukho konke ukungalungi;
Ukuze ngaye bonke basindiswe uBaba ababeke emandleni akhe futhi nabenze ngaye;
Okhazimulisa uBaba, futhi nosindisa yonke imisebenzi yezandla zakhe, ngaphandle kwalawo madodana okulahlwa aphika iNdodana emva kokuba uBaba eseyambulile.

Ngalokho-ke, ubasindisa bonke ngaphandle kwabo—bayohamba baye ekujezisweni kwaphakade, okungukujeziswa okungapheliyo, okungukujeziswa kwaphakade, ukuyobusa nodeveli nezingelosi zakhe ingunaphakade, lapho impethu yabo ingafi, nomlilo ungacinywa, okungubuhlungu babo—
Futhi isiphetho salapho, noma indawo yalapho, noma ubuhlungu babo, akukho muntu obaziyo;
Akukaze kwambulwe, futhi akwambuliwe, futhi akuyikwambulwa kumuntu, ngaphandle kwalabo abenziwa abahlanganyeli balapho;
Kodwa, mina, iNkosi, ngikutshengisa ngombono kwabaningi, kodwa ngokushesha ngiwuvale futhi;
Ngalokho-ke, isiphetho, ububanzi, ukuphakama, ukujula, nosizi lwakhona, abakuqondi, namunye umuntu ngaphandle kwalabo aba bekelwe lokhu kulahlwa yicala.
Futhi sezwa izwi, lithi: Bhalani lombono, ngokuba bhekani, lesi yisiphetho sombono wokuzwa ubuhlungu kwabangamesabi uNkulunkulu.
Futhi phezu kwalokho siyafakaza—ngokuba sabona futhi sezwa, futhi lobu wubufakazi bevangeli likaKristu ngokuphathelene nalabo abayophuma ovukweni lwabalungileyo—
Yibo laba abemukela ubufakazi bukaJesu, futhi bakholwa egameni lakhe futhi babhabhadiswa ngokufana nokungcwatshwa kwakhe, bengcwatshwa emanzini egameni lakhe, futhi lokhu ngokomyalelo awunikile—
Ukuthi ngokugcina imiyalelo banga gezwa futhi bahlanzwe kuzo zonke izono zabo, futhi bafumane uMoya oNgcwele ngokubekwa izandla yilowo ogcotshiwe futhi wanikwa la mandla;
Futhi abanqoba ngokukholwa, futhi babekwa uphawu ngo Moya oNgcwele wesethembiso, uBaba awuthumela kubo bonke labo abalungile nabaqotho.
Yibo laba abayibandla le Nkosana.
Yibo laba ezandleni zabo uBaba asebanike zonke izinto—
Yibo laba abanga baphristi namakhosi, asebefumene ukuphelela konke kwakhe, futhi nenkazimulo yakhe;
Futhi banga baphristi boPhakeme kaKhulu, ngokohlelo lukaMelkisedeki, olwalungokohlelo luka-Enoke, olwalungoko hlelo lweNdodana Ezelwe Yodwa.
Ngalokho-ke, njengoba kubhaliwe, ba ngonkulunkulu, ngisho amadodana kaNkulunkulu—
Ngalokho-ke, zonke izinto zingezabo, noma ukuphila noma ukufa, noma izinto zamanje, noma izinto ezisazokuza, konke kungokwabo futhi bangabaKristu, noKristu ungokaNkulunkulu.
Futhi bayonqoba zonke izinto.
Ngalokho-ke, makungabikho muntu oziqhayisa ngomuntu, kodwa maka ziqhayise ngoNkulunkulu, oyo thobisa zonke izitha azibeke ngaphansi kwezinyawo zakhe.
Laba bayo hlala lapho kukhona khona uNkulunkulu noKristu wakhe phakade naphakade.
Yibo laba ayoza nabo, uma eseza emafwini asezulwini ukuzo busa emhlabeni phezu kwabantu bakhe.
Yibo laba abayokuba nengxenye ovukweni lokuqala.
Yibo laba abayophuma ovukweni lwabalungileyo.
Yibo laba abeze eNtabeni iSiyoni, nasedolobheni likaNkulunkulu ophilayo, indawo yasezulwini, engcwele kunazo zonke.
Yibo laba abeze esixukwini sezingelosi ezingabaleki, embuthanweni wabo bonke abantu nebandla lika-Enoke, nele Nkosana.
Yibo laba amagama abo abhalwe ezulwini, lapho uNkulunkulu noKristu benga bahluleli babo bonke.
Yibo laba abalungileyo aba phelelisiweyo ngoJesu umlamuleli wesi vumelwano esisha, ofeze lenhlawulo ephelele ngokuchitha igazi lakhe uqobo.

Yibo laba imizimba yabo ingeye silestiyali, inkazimulo yabo okuyileyo yelanga, ngisho inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu, ophakeme kunabo bonke, inkazimulo yakhe okubhalwe ngayo ukuthi ifana neyelanga esibhakabhakeni.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, sabona umhlaba wethirestriyali, futhi bhekani bheka, yibo laba abangabe thirestriyali, inkazimulo yabo ehlukile kuleyo yebandla leNkosana abafumane ukuphelela konke kukaBaba, ngisho njengenkazimulo ye nyanga ihlukile elangeni esibhakabhakeni.
Bhekani, yibo laba abafa bengenawo umthetho;
Futhi nalabo abayi mimoya yabantu eyayigcinwe etilongweni, abavakashelwa yiNdodana, futhi yashumayela ivangeli kubo, ukuze bahlulelwe njengabantu abasenyameni;
Abangabemukelanga ubufakazi bukaJesu enyameni, kodwa kamuva babemukela.
Yibo laba abanga bantu abahloniphekile bomhlaba, ababevaleke amehlo ngobuqili babantu.
Yibo laba abafumana inkazimulo yakhe, kodwa hhayi ukuphelela konke.
Yibo laba abafumana ukuba-khona kweNdodana, kodwa hhayi ukuphelela konke kukaBaba.
Ngalokho-ke, bayimizimba yethirestriyali, abayona imizimba yesilestiyali, futhi bahlukile ngenkazimulo njengenyanga ihlukile elangeni.
Yibo laba aba ngaqinile ebufakazini bukaJesu; ngalokho-ke, abawutholi umqhele embusweni kaNkulunkulu wethu.
Manje lesi yisiphetho sombono esawubona wethirestriyali, iNkosi eyasiyala ukuthi siwubhale ngesikhathi sisekuMoya.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, sabona inkazimulo ye thilestiyali, leyonkazimulo yalowo mbuso ongaphansi, ngisho njengenkazimulo yezinkanyezi ihluka enkazimulweni yenyanga esesibhakabhakeni.
Yibo laba abangalemukelanga ivangeli likaKristu, noma ubufakazi bukaJesu.
Yibo laba abangawuphiki uMoya oNgcwele.
Yibo laba abaphonswa phansi esihogweni.
Yibo laba abangeke bakhululwe ku develi kuze kube wuvuko lokugcina, ize iNkosi, ngisho uKristu iMvana, iyobe isiwuqedile umsebenzi wayo.
Yibo laba abangakutholi ukuphelela konke kwakhe emhlabeni waphakade, kodwa abathola okoMoya oNgcwele ngokusetshenzelwa ngabase thirestriyali;
Futhi abethirestriyali ngoku setshenzelwa ngabe silestiyali.
Futhi phezu kwalokho abethilestiyali bakuthola ngokusetshenzelwa yizingelosi ezibekwe ukuba zibasebenzele, noma ezibekwe ukuba zibe yimimoya ebasebenzelayo; ngokuba bayoba izindlalifa sensindiso.
Futhi ngalokho sabona, embonweni wasezulwini, inkazimulo yethilestiyali, edlula ukuqonda konke;
Futhi akukho muntu oyaziyo ngaphandle kwalowo uNkulunkulu ayembule kuye.
Futhi njengoba sekushiwo sayibona inkazimulo yethirestriyali edlula ngokwezinto zonke inkazimulo yethilestiyali, ngisho ngenkazimulo, nangegunya, nangamandla, nangobukhosi.
Futhi njengoba sekushiwo sayibona inkazimulo ye silestiyali, edlula ngokwezinto zonke—lapho uNkulunkulu, ngisho uBaba, ebusa esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi phakade naphakade;
Ngaphambi kwesihlalo sakhe sobukhosi zonke izinto ziyakhothama ngokuhlonipha kokuzithoba, futhi zimnika inkazimulo phakade naphakade.
Labo abahlala lapho ekhona bayibandla le Nkosana; futhi babona njengoba bebonwa, futhi bazi njengoba baziwa, sebefumene ukuphelela konke kwakhe nomusa wakhe;
Futhi ubenza balingane ngegunya, nangamandla, nangobukhosi.
Futhi inkazimulo ye silestiyali iyodwa, ngisho njengoba inkazimulo yelanga iyodwa.
Nenkazimulo yethirestriyali iyodwa, ngisho njengoba inkazimulo yenyanga iyodwa.

Futhi nenkazimulo yethilestiyali iyodwa, ngisho njengoba inkazimulo yezinkanyezi iyodwa; ngokuba njengoba inkanyezi ihluka kwenye inkanyezi ngenkazimulo, kanjalo-ke omunye uhlukile komunye ngenkazimulo emhlabeni wethilestiyali;
Ngokuba yibo laba aba Pawulu, naba-Apholo, nabaKhefase.

Yibo laba abathi bangabomuntu othile abanye bathi bangabomunye—abanye bangabaKristu nabanye bangabaJohane, nabanye bangabaMose, nabanye bangaba-Eliyasi, nabanye bangaba-Esayasi, nabanye abangaba-Isaya, nabanye bangaba-Enoke;
Kodwa abalemukelanga ivangeli, noma ubufakazi bukaJesu, noma abaphrofethi, noma isivumelwano saphakade.
Okokugcina kwakho konke, yibo bonke laba abangeke baqoqwe nabangcwele, ukuze bahlwithelwe ebandleni leNkosana, futhi bamukelwe emafwini.
Yibo laba abangaba qambi manga, nabathakathi, nabaphingi, nezifebe, nabo bonke abathanda nabenza amanga.
Yibo laba abezwa ubuhlungu be ntukuthelo kaNkulunkulu emhlabeni.
Yibo laba abezwa ubuhlungu be mpindiselo yomlilo waphakade.

Yibo laba abaphonswa phansi esihogweni futhi nabezwa ubuhlungu bentukuthelo ka Nkulunkulu uMninimandla Onke, kuze kube wukuphelela kwezikhathi, lapho uKristu eyobe esezithobise zonke izitha ngaphansi kwezinyawo zakhe, futhi eyobe esewu phelelisile umsebenzi wakhe.

Lapho eyonikeza umbuso, ewubeka phambi kuBaba, ucwebile, ethi: Nginqobile futhi isikhamo sewayini ngisinyathele ngingedwa, ngisho isikhamo sewayini lentukuthelo yolaka lukaNkulunkulu uMninimandla Onke.
Lapho uyobe esethweswa umqhele wenkazimulo yakhe, ukuze ahlale esihlalweni sobukhosi samandla akhe ukuze abuse phakade naphakade.
Kodwa bhekani, futhi bheka, sabona inkazimulo nabantu abahlala emhlabeni wethilestiyali, ukuthi babengabaleki njengezinkanyezi esibhakabhakeni sezulu, noma njengesihlabathi osebeni lolwandle;
Futhi sezwa izwi leNkosi lithi: Laba bonke bayogoba amadolo, futhi zonke izilimi ziyomvuma lowo ohlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi phakade naphakade;
Ngokuba bayokwahlulelwa ngokwemisebenzi yabo, futhi wonke umuntu uyofumana ngokwe misebenzi yakhe, ubukhosi bakhe uqobo, ezindlini ezilungisiwe;
Futhi bayoba yizinceku zoPhakeme kaKhulu; kodwa lapho uNkulunkulu noKristu behlala khona ngeke bakwazi ukuza, izizukulwane zonke zaphakade naphakade.
Lesi yisiphetho sombono esawubona, esayalwa ukuba siwubhale ngesikhathi sisekuMoya.
Kodwa mikhulu futhi iyamangalisa imisebenzi yeNkosi, futhi nezimfihlakalo zombuso asikhombisa zona, ezidlula konke ukuqonda ngenkazimulo, nangamandla, nangobukhosi;
Eyasiyala ukuthi singayibhali ngesikhathi sisekuMoya, futhi okungavunyelwe ukuba umuntu ayikhulume;
Futhi akukho noyedwa umuntu ongakwazi ukuyembula, ngokuba ingabonwa futhi iqondwe kuphela ngamandla kaMoya oNgcwele, uNkulunkulu awunika labo abamthandayo, nabazicwebisayo phambi kwakhe;
Kubo abanika lenhlanhla yokuzibonela nokuzazela ngokwabo;
Ukuze ngamandla nangesibonakaliso soMoya, ngesikhathi besenyameni, bakwazi ukubekezelela ukuba phambi kwakhe ezweni lenkazimulo.
Futhi makube kuNkulunkulu neMvana inkazimulo, nodumo, nobukhosi phakade naphakade. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/77.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 77
chapter_summary: 1–4, Izilwane zinemimoya futhi ziyohlala enjabulweni yaphakade; 5–7, Lomhlaba ukhona isikhathi seminyaka eyizinkulungwane eziyisikhombisa; 8–10, Izingelosi ezahlukahlukene zibuyisela ivangeli futhi zisebenza emhlabeni; 11, Ukubekwa uphawu kwabayizinkulungwane eziyikhulu namashumi amane nane; 12–14, UKristu uzoza ekuqaleni konyaka wenkulungwane yesikhombisa; 15, Abaphrofethi ababili bazovuselwa isizwe samaJuda.

verses.text: Umbuzo: Luyini ulwandle lwengilazi akhuluma ngalo uJohane, isahluko sesine, nasevesini lesithupha lesAmbulo na?Impendulo: Liwu mhlaba, esimweni sawo sokungcweliswa, soku ngabhubhi, nesaphakade.

Umbuzo: Yini okufanele siyiqonde ngezilwane ezine, okukhulunywe ngazo evesini elifanayo na?Impendulo: Yizindlela zokukhuluma zokungathekisa, ezisetshenziswa uMambuli, uJohane, uma echaza izulu, iparadesi kaNkulunkulu, ukujabula kwabantu, nokwezilwane, okunwabuzelayo, nokwezinyoni zezulu; lokho okungoko moya kufana naloko okungokwemvelo; nalokho okungokwemvelo kufana naloko okungoko moya; umoya womuntu ufana nesiqu sakhe somzimba, ngokufanayo nomoya wesilwane, nakho konke okudaliweyo okudalwe nguNkulunkulu.

Umbuzo: Ngabe izilwane ezine zimele izilwane ngazinye, noma kungabe zimele izinhlobo zazo noma uhlu lwazo na?Impendulo: Zimele izilwane ngazinye, ezatshengiswa uJohane, ukumela inkazimulo yezinhlobo zezidalwa ohlwini noma ezweni lendalo ezimiselwe lona, entokozweni yokujabula kwazo kwaphakade.

Umbuzo: Yini okufanele siyiqonde ngamehlo nezimpiko, izilwane ezazi nako na?Impendulo: Amehlo azo amele ukukhanya nolwazi, okungukuthi, zigcwele ulwazi; futhi izimpiko zazo zimele amandla, okuhamba, okwenza, njalonjalo.

Umbuzo: Yini okufanele siyiqonde nga magosa angamashumi amabili nane, akhuluma ngawo uJohane na?Impendulo: Kufanele siqonde ukuthi lamagosa uJohane awabona, ayengamagosa aye thembekile emsebenzini wokushumayela futhi ayesafa; ayengawa mabandla ayisikhombisa, futhi ngaleso sikhathi ayeseparadesi kaNkulunkulu.

Umbuzo: Yini okufanele siyiqonde ngencwadi ayibona uJohane, eyayi namatheliswe ngemuva ngezimpawu eziyisikhombisa na?Impendulo: Kufanele siqonde ukuthi iqukethe intando eyambuliwe, izimfihlakalo, nemisebenzi kaNkulunkulu; izinto ezicashisiwe zokuphatha kwakhe ngokuphathelene nalo mhlaba ngesikhathi seminyaka eyizinkulungwane eziyisikhombisa zobumo bawo, noma ukubakhona kwawo ngokwemvelo.

Umbuzo: Yini okufanele siyiqonde ngezimpawu eziyisikhombisa eyayinamatheliswe ngazo na?Impendulo: Kufanele siqonde ukuthi uphawu lokuqala luqukethe izinto zeminyaka yenkulungwane yokuqala, nolwesibili futhi lwenkulungwane yeminyaka yesibili, kanjalo kuze kube ngeyesikhombisa.

Umbuzo: Yini okufanele siyiqonde ngezingelosi ezine, okukhulunywe ngazo esahlukweni sesikhombisa, nevesi lokuqala lesAmbulo na?Impendulo: Kufanele siqonde ukuthi bayizingelosi ezine ezithunyelwe nguNkulunkulu, okunikwe kuzo amandla kuwo womane amagumbi omhlaba, ukuhlenga impilo nokubulala; yibo laba abane vangeli laphakade ukuliletha ezizweni zonke, izihlobo, izilimi, nabantu; benamandla okuvala amazulu, ukubabophela ekuphileni, noma ukuphosa phansi ezindaweni zobumnyama.

Umbuzo: Yini okufanele siyiqonde ngengelosi eyenyuka isuka empumalanga, kwisAmbulo isahluko sesikhombisa kwelesibili ivesi na?Impendulo: Kufanele siqonde ukuthi ingelosi eyenyuka isuka empumalanga yilowo okunikwe kuye uphawu lukaNkulunkulu ophilayo phezu kwezizwana eziyishumi nambili zika-Israyeli; ngalokho-ke, ukhala ezingelosini ezine ezinevangeli laphakade, ethi: Ningawoni umhlaba, nolwandle, nemithi, size sibeke uphawu izinceku zikaNkulunkulu wethu emabunzini azo. Futhi, uma nivuma ukukwamukela lokhu, lona ngu-Eliyasi owayezofika ukuzoqoqa ndawonye izizwana zika-Israyeli futhi abuyisele zonke izinto.
Umbuzo: Ziyofezwa ngasiphi isikhathi izinto okukhulunywe ngazo kulesi sahluko na?Impendulo: Ziyofezwa eminyakeni yenkulungwane yesithupha, noma ngokuvulwa kophawu lwesithupha.

Umbuzo: Yini okufanele siyiqonde ngokubekwa uphawu kwezinkulungwane eziyikhulu namashumi amane nane, kwizizwana zonke zika-Israyeli—abayizinkulungwane eziyishumi nambili kwizizwana zonke na?Impendulo: Kufanele siqonde ukuthi labo ababekwe uphawu banga baphristi abakhulu abagcotshwe ngokohlelo olungcwele lukaNkulunkulu ukuphatha ivangeli laphakade; ngokuba yibo labo abagcotshwe kuzo zonke izizwe, izihlobo, izilimi, nabantu, ngezingelosi okunikwe kuzo amandla phezu kwezizwe zomhlaba, ukuletha abaningi kangangoba bengeza ebandleni le Nkosana.

Umbuzo: Yini okufanele siyiqonde ngokukhala kwamacilongo, okushiwo esahlukweni sesishiyagalombili sesAmbulo na?Impendulo: Kufanele siqonde ukuthi njengoba uNkulunkulu enza umhlaba ngezinsuku eziyisithupha, futhi ngosuku lwesikhombisa wawuqeda umsebenzi wakhe, wawungcwelisa, futhi wabumba umuntu ngothuli lomhlaba, kanjalo-ke, ekuqaleni kweminyaka yenkulungwane yesikhombisa iNkosi uNkulunkulu izowungcwelisa umhlaba, futhi ifeze ukusindiswa komuntu, futhi yahlulele zonke izinto, futhi iyohlenga zonke izinto, ngaphandle kwalokho engakubekanga ngaphansi kwamandla ayo, ngesikhathi lapho izobe isibophe zonke izinto, kuze kube sekupheleni kwezinto zonke; futhi ukukhala kwamacilongo ezingelosi eziyisikhombisa kunguku lungiselela nokuqedela umsebenzi wayo, ekuqaleni kweminyaka yenkulungwane yesikhombisa—ukulungiselela indlela ngaphambi kwesikhathi sokuza kwayo.
Umbuzo: Ziyofezwa nini zonke izinto, ezibhalwe kwesesi shiyagalolunye isahluko sesAmbulo na?Impendulo: Kufanele zifezwe emva kokuvulwa kophawu lwesikhombisa, ngaphambi kokuza kukaKristu.

Umbuzo: Yini okufanele siyiqonde ngencwadi encane eyadliwa uJohane, njengoba kushiwo kweseshumi isahluko sesAmbulo na?Impendulo: Kufanele siqonde ukuthi kwaku ngumsebenzi wokufundisa ivangeli, nesimiso, sokuthi yena aqoqe izizwana zika-Israyeli; bheka, lona ngu-Eliyasi, okufanele, njengoba kubhaliwe, eze futhi azobuyisela zonke izinto.

Umbuzo: Yini okufanele iqondwe ngofakazi ababili, kweseshumi nanye isahluko sesAmbulo na?Impendulo: Labo ngabaphrofethi ababili okufanele bavuselwe isizwe samaJuda ezinsukwini zokugcina, ngesikhathi sokubuyiselwa, nokuphrofetha kumaJuda emva kokuba eseqoqiwe futhi akha idolobha laseJerusalema ezweni loyise.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/78.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 78
chapter_summary: 1–4, AbaNgcwele kufanele bahlele futhi bamise indlu yengcebo; 5–12, Ukusebenzisa ngokuhlakanipha impahla yabo kuzoholela ensindisweni; 13–14, IBandla kufanele lizimele linganciki emandleni asemhlabeni; 15–16, UMikhayeli(u-Adamu) usebenza ngokuyalelwa oNgcwele (uKristu); 17–22, Babusisiwe abathembekileyo, ngokuba bazofumana ifa lazo zonke izinto.

verses.text: INkosi yakhuluma kuJoseph Smith, omNcane, ithi: Ngilaleleni, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu, nina enigcotshelwe ebuphristini obukhulu bebandla lami, enibuthene ndawonye;

Futhi nilalele ukuyala kwakhe onigcobileyo kusuka phezulu, oyokhuluma ezindlebeni zenu amazwi okuhlakanipha, ukuze nisindiswe ngokuphathelene naleyonto eniyilethe phambi kwami, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu.

Ngokuba ngiqinisile ngithi kini, isikhathi sesifikile, futhi bhekani, futhi bheka, kudingekile ukuthi abantu bami bahleleke, ekuqondiseni nasekusunguleni izindaba zendlu yengcebo yabantu bami abampofu, kulendawo nasezweni lase Siyoni—
Ukuze kube khona okungenaku guqulwa nokwaphakade ukumiswa futhi nohlelo ebandleni lami, ukuqhuba inhloso, enizinikele kuyo, ukuze kusindiswe abantu, futhi kukhazimuliswe uBaba wenu osezulwini;
Ukuze nilingane ngezibopho zezinto zasezulwini, yebo, neze zinto zasemhlabeni futhi, ukuze nithole izinto zasezulwini.
Ngokuba uma ningalingani ezintweni zasemhlabeni ngeke nilingane ekuzuzeni izinto zasezulwini;
Ngokuba uma nifisa ukuthi ngini nike indawo ezweni lesilestiyali, kufanele nizi lungiselele ngokwenza izinto enginiyale ngazo nezidingekayo kini.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi isho kanje iNkosi, kufanele ukuthi zonke izinto zenzelwe inkazimulo yami, yini enihlangene ndawonye ngalolu hlelo;
Noma, ngamanye amazwi, inceku yami uNewel K. Whitney nenceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, nenceku yami uSidney Rigdon mabahlale emkhandlwini nabangcwele abaseSiyoni;
Kungenjalo uSathane ufuna ukujika izinhliziyo zabo zisuke eqinisweni, ukuze bavaleke amehlo futhi bangaziqondi izinto ezilungiselwe bona.
Ngalokho-ke, umyalelo ngininika wona, wokuthi nizilungiselele futhi nizihlele ngesibopho noma isivumelwano saphakade esingeke siphulwe.
Futhi lowo osiphulayo uyolahlekelwa yisikhundla nesimo sakhe ebandleni, futhi uyonikelwa ezinhluphweni zikaSathane kuze kube wusuku lokuhlengwa.
Bhekani, lokhu wukulungiselela enginilungiselela ngakho, futhi nesi sekelo, futhi nesibonelo engini nika sona, ngaso eningafeza imiyalelo eni nikwe yona;
Ukuze ngosizo lwami, nakuba izinhlupho zizokwehlela phezu kwenu, ukuze ibandla lizimele ngaphezulu kwazo zonke ezinye izidalwa ezingaphansi kwezwe lesilestiyali;
Ukuze nenyukele emqheleni osulungiselwe nina, futhi nenziwe ababusi phezu kwemibuso eminingi, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu, oNgcwele waseSiyoni, omise izisekelo zase-Adamu-ondi Ahman;

Obeke uMikhayeli ukuba abe yinkosana yenu, futhi wamisa izinyawo zakhe, futhi wambeka phezulu, futhi wamnika izikhiye zensindiso ngaphansi koku lulekwa noku yalelwa ngoNgcwele, ongenaso isiqalo sezinsuku noma isiphetho sempilo.
Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, ningabantwana abancane, futhi anikaziqondi okwamanje ukuthi zinkulu kangakanani izibusiso uBaba anazo ezandleni zakhe futhi anilungiselele zona;
Futhi anikwazi ukubekezelela zonke izinto manje; nokho, yibani nenjabulo, ngokuba ngizonihola phambili. Umbuso ungowenu nezibusiso zawo zingezenu, nengcebo yaphakade ingeyenu.
Futhi lowo owemukela izinto zonke ngokubonga uyokwenziwa abe nenkazimulo enkulu; futhi izinto zalomhlaba ziyokwengezwa kuye, ngisho okuphindwe kaningi, yebo, nangaphezulu.
Ngalokho-ke, yenzani izinto enginiyale ngazo, kusho umHlengi wenu, ngisho iNdodana u-Ahman, olungisa zonke izinto ngaphambi kokuba anithathe;
Ngokuba niyi bandla leNkosana, futhi izoni thatha ngefu, futhi yabele wonke umuntu ingxenye yakhe.
Futhi lowo othembekileyo nongumphathi ohlakaniphileyo uyofumana ifa lazo zonke izinto. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/79.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 79
chapter_summary: 1–4, UJared Carter ubizelwa ukushumayela ivangeli ngoMduduzi.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, kuyintando yami ukuthi inceku yami uJared Carter kufanele ahambe futhi aye emazweni asempumalanga, indawo ngendawo, futhi idolobha ngedolobha, ngamandla okugcotshwa agcotshwe ngawo, ememezela izindaba ezinhle zentokozo enkulu, ngisho ivangeli laphakade.
Futhi ngizothumela kuye uMduduzi, ozomfundisa iqiniso nendlela azohamba ngayo;
Futhi kangangoba ethembekile, ngizomethwesa umqhele futhi nezithungu.
Ngalokho-ke, inhliziyo yakho mayijabule, nceku yami uJared Carter, futhi ungesabi, kusho iNkosi yakho, ngisho uJesu Kristu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/80.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 80
chapter_summary: 1–5, UStephen Burnett no-Eden Smith babizelwa ukushumayela noma kuyiphi indawo abayikhethayo.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi kuwe nceku yami uStephen Burnett: Hamba, hamba uye emhlabeni futhi ushumayele ivangeli kuzo zonke izidalwa eziza ngaphansi komsindo wezwi lakho.
Futhi kangangoba ufisa ozohamba nawe, ngizokunika inceku yami u-Eden Smith.
Ngalokho-ke, hambani futhi nishumayele ivangeli lami, noma kusenyakatho noma kuseningizimu, empumalanga noma entshonalanga, akusho lutho, ngokuba ngeke nihambe ngokungeyikho.
Ngalokho-ke, memezelani izinto enizizwile, futhi enizikholwa ngokuqiniseka, futhi enizazi ukuthi ziliqiniso.
Bhekani, lena intando yakhe onibizileyo, umHlengi wenu, ngisho uJesu Kristu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/81.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 81
chapter_summary: 1–2, Izikhiye zombuso njalo zihlale ziphethwe ngubuMongameli bokuQala; 3–7, Uma uFrederick G. Williams ethembekile ebufundisini bakhe, uzofumana ukuphila okuphakade.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe nceku yami uFrederick G. Williams: Yizwa izwi lalowo okhulumayo, izwi leNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho, futhi ulalele ubizo obizwe ngalo, ngisho ukuba ngumphristi omkhulu ebandleni lami, nomeluleki encekwini yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane;
Kuye engimnike izikhiye zombuso, ezingezobu Mongameli bobuPhristi obuKhulu njalo:

Ngakho-ke, ngiqinisile ngiyamvuma futhi ngizombusisa, futhi nawe, kangangoba uthembekile emsebenzini wokuba ngumeluleki, esikhundleni engikubeke kuso, ekukhulekeni njalo, ngokuzwakala nangenhliziyo, emphakathini nangasese, futhi nasebufundisini bakho ekushumayeleni ivangeli ezweni labaphilayo, naphakathi kwalabo owakhe nabo.
Futhi ngokwenza lezi zinto uyokwenza obukhulu kakhulu ubuhle kubantu bakini, futhi uzoqhubekisa nenkazimulo yakhe oyiNkosi yakho.
Ngalokho-ke, thembeka; yima esikhundleni engikubeke kuso; siza ababuthakathaka, phakamisa izandla ezibuthakathaka, futhi uqinise amadolo axegayo.
Futhi uma uthembeka kuze kube sekupheleni uyothweswa umqhele wokungafi, nokuphila okuphakade ezindlini engizilungisile ekhaya likaBaba.
Bheka, futhi bheka, lawa ngamazwi ka-Alfa no-Omega, ngisho uJesu Kristu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/82.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 82
chapter_summary: 1–4, Lapho kuphiwe khona okuningi, kufuneka okuningi; 5–7, Ubumnyama buyabusa emhlabeni; 8–13, INkosi izibophezele uma senza lokho ekushoyo; 14–18, ISiyoni kufanele yande ngobuhle nangobungcwele; 19–24, Wonke umuntu kufunele afune ukusiza umakhelwane wakhe.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, zinceku zami, kangangoba nithethelelene amacala enu, kanjalo-ke nami, iNkosi, ngiyanithethelela.

Nokho, kunalabo phakathi kwenu abone kakhulu; yebo, ngisho nonke nonile; kodwa ngiqinisile ngithi kini, qaphelani kusuka manje, futhi nipheze ukona, funa ukwahlulelwa okunzima kwehliselwe phezu kwamakhanda enu.
Ngokuba kulowo ophiwe okuningi kufuneka okuningi; futhi lowo owona enolwazi olukhudlwana uyobekwa icala kakhudlwana.

Nibiza igama lami ukuze nifumane izambulo, futhi ngiyani nika zona; futhi kangangoba ningakugcini engikushoyo, engini nika kona, niba ngabaphambukayo; futhi ukulunga nokwahlulelwa yizijeziso ezihlangene nomthetho wami.
Ngakho-ke, engikusho koyedwa ngikusho kubo bonke: Qaphelani, ngokuba omubi wandisa umbuso kwakhe, futhi nobumnyama buyabusa;
Futhi intukuthelo kaNkulunkulu yokhelekela abantu basemhlabeni; futhi akekho owenza okuhle, ngokuba bonke baphumile endleleni.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, mina, iNkosi, ngeke nginibalele sono; hambani futhi ningabe nisona; kodwa kulowo muntu owonayo izono zakuqala ziyobuya, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu.
