Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, ngini nika umyalelo omusha, ukuze niyiqonde intando yami ngokuphathelene nani;
Noma, ngamanye amazwi, ngini nika imiyalelo yokuthi ninga ziphatha kanjani phambi kwami, ukuze lokhu kube nomphumela wokuba nisindiswe.
Mina, iNkosi, ngizibophezele uma nenza lokho engikushoyo; kodwa uma ningakwenzi engikushoyo, aninaso isethembiso.

Ngakho-ke, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, kufanele ukuthi izinceku zami u-Edward Partridge noNewel K. Whitney, u-A. Sidney Gilbert noSidney Rigdon, nenceku yami uJoseph Smith, noJohn Whitmer no-Oliver Cowdery, kanye no W. W. Phelps noMartin Harris bazibophezele ndawonye ngobudlelwano nangesivumelano esingasoze saphulwa ngesiphambeko, uma kungenjalo ukwahlulelwa kuyolandela masinyane, ebuphathini benu obahlukeneyo—
Ukuphatha izindaba zabampofu, nazo zonke izinto eziphathelene nobubhishobhi ezweni laseSiyoni nasezweni laseKirtland;
Ngokuba ngilingcwelisile izwe laseKirtland ngesikhathi sami esifanele ukuze kuzuze abangcwele balowo oPhakeme kaKhulu, futhi njenge sikhonkwane ukuze kuzuze iSiyoni.

Ngokuba iSiyoni kufanele ikhule ngobuhle, nangobungcwele; nemingcele yayo kufanele ikhuliswe; izikhonkwane zayo kufanele ziqiniswe; yebo, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, iSiyoni kufanele isukume futhi igqoke izingubo zayo ezinhle.
Ngakho-ke, ngini nika lomyalelo, wokuthi nizibophe ngalesi sivumelwano, futhi kuyokwenziwa ngokwemithetho yeNkosi.
Bhekani, nansi inhlakanipho futhi ekimi ukuze nizuze.

Futhi kufanele nilingane, noma ngamanye amazwi, nifanele nibe nelungelo elilinganayo lokuthola izimpahla, ukuze nikwazi ukuphatha izindaba zobuphathi, wonke umuntu ngokwezimfuno zakhe nangezidingo zakhe, kangangoba izimfuno zakhe zilungile—

Futhi konke lokhu ukuze kuzuze ibandla likaNkulunkulu ophilayo, ukuze wonke umuntu athuthukise ithalente lakhe, ukuze wonke umuntu azuze amanye amathalente, yebo, ngisho ngokuphindwe kaningi, ukuze abekwe endlini yengcebo yeNkosi, ukuze abe yimpahla yawo wonke umuntu ebandleni lonke—
Wonke umuntu efuna ukusiza umakhelwane wakhe, futhi enza zonke izinto ngeso eliqonde udumo lukaNkulunkulu.
Lolu hlelo ngilubeke ukuba lube wuhlelo lwaphakade kini, futhi nakwaba zonilandela, kangangoba ningoni.

Futhi lowo muntu owonayo kulesi sivumelwano, futhi nowenza lukhuni inhliziyo yakhe kuso, uyophathwa ngokwemithetho yebandla lami, futhi uyonikelwa ezinhluphweni zikaSathane kuze kube wusuku lokukhululwa.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, futhi lokhu wukuhlakanipha, zenzeleni abahlobo nomamona wokungalungi, futhi ngeke banibhubhise.
Yekelani ukwahlulela kimi, ngokuba kungokwami futhi ngizokubuyisela mina. Ukuthula makube kini; izibusiso zami maziqhubeke zibe kini.
Ngokuba ngisho namanje umbuso ungowenu, futhi uyoba ngowenu ingunaphakade, uma ningawi ekwethembekeni kwenu. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/83.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 83
chapter_summary: 1–4, Abesifazane nabantwana banelungelo lokondliwa ngabayeni noyise; 5–6, Abafelokazi nezintandane banelungelo lokondliwa yiBandla.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi, ngaphezulu kwemithetho yebandla ngokuphathelene nabesifazane nabantwana, labo abangabebandla, asebelahlekelwe ngabayeni noma oyise:
Abesifazane banelungelo lokondliwa ngabayeni babo, baze abayeni babo bathathwe yiNkosi; futhi uma bengatholwanga bephambuka bayoba nobulungu ebandleni.
Futhi uma bengathembekile ngeke babe nobulungu ebandleni; nokho bangaphila ngamafa abo ngokwemithetho yezwe.
Bonke abantwana banelungelo lokondliwa ngabazali babo baze babe neminyaka yobudala.
Futhi emva kwalokho, banelungelo lokondliwa yibandla, noma ngamanye amazwi endlini yengcebo yeNkosi, uma abazali babo bengenakho abangabanika ngakho amafa.
Futhi indlu yengcebo iyogcinwa ngeminikelo yebandla; futhi abafelokazi nezintandane bayokondliwa khona, ngokunjalo nabampofu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/84.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 84
chapter_summary: 1–5, IJerusalema eNtsha nethempeli kuzokwakhiwa eMissouri; 6–17, Uhlanga lobuphristi kusuka kuMose kuya ku-Adamu luyanikwa; 18–25, Ubuphristi obukhulu buphethe ukhiye wolwazi ngoNkulunkulu; 26–32, Ubuphristi obuncane buphethe ukhiye wokusetshenzelwa yizingelosi nowevangeli lokulungiselela; 33–44, Amadoda afumana ukuphila okuphakade ngesifungo nangesivumelwano sobuphristi; 45–53, UMoya kaKristu ukhanyisela abantu, futhi umhlaba uhlezi esonweni; 54–61, AbaNgcwele kufanele bafakaze ngalezo zinto abazifumene; 62–76, Kufanele bashumayele ivangeli, futhi izibonakaliso zizolandela; 77–91, Amagosa kufanele ahambe ngaphandle kwesikhwama semali noma kwesikhwama, futhi iNkosi izozi gcwalisa izidingo zawo; 92–97, Izinkathazo neziqalekiso zilindele labo abenqaba ivangeli; 98–102, Iculo elisha lokuhlengwa kweSiyoni liyanikwa; 103–110, Wonke umuntu makame esikhundleni sakhe futhi asebenze obizweni lwakhe; 111–120, Izinceku zeNkosi kufanele zimemezele isinengiso sencithakalo ngezikhathi zokugcina.

verses.text: Isambulo sikaJesu Kristu encekwini yakhe uJoseph Smith, omNcane, nakumagosa ayisithupha, ngesikhathi behlangene ngezinhliziyo futhi bephakamisela amaphimbo abo phezulu.

Yebo, izwi leNkosi ngokuphathelene nebandla layo, elimiswe ngezikhathi zokugcina ukuze kubuyiselwe abantu bayo, njengoba isikhulumile ngemilomo yabaphrofethi bayo, futhi ukuze kuqoqwe abangcwele bayo bame phezu kweNtaba iSiyoni, okuyoba wumuzi weJerusalema eNtsha.

Umuzi lowo oyokwakhiwa, kusuka esabelweni sethempeli, esibekwe ngomunwe weNkosi, ngasemingceleni engasentshonalanga yesiFundazwe saseMissouri, futhi sahlukaniselwa ngesandla sikaJoseph Smith, omNcane, nabanye iNkosi eyayithokoze kakhulu ngabo.
Ngiqinisile leli yizwi leNkosi, ukuthi umuzi iJerusalema eNtsha uyokwakhiwa ngokubuthana kwabangcwele, kusuka kulendawo, ngisho indawo yethempeli, ithempeli lelo eliyomiswa kulesi sizukulwane.
Ngokuba ngiqinisile lesi sizukulwane ngeke sidlule sonke kuze kube indlu yakhelwa iNkosi, futhi nefu liyohlala phezu kwayo, ifu lelo eliyoba ngisho yinkazimulo yeNkosi, eyogcwalisa leyondlu.
Futhi amadodana kaMose, ngokuvumelana nobuPhristi obuNgcwele abuthola ngaphansi kwesandla sikababezala wakhe, uJethiro;
Futhi uJethiro wabuthola ngaphansi kwesandla sikaKalebi;
Futhi uKalebi wabuthola ngaphansi kwesandla sika-Elihu;
Futhi u-Elihu ngaphansi kwesandla sikaJeremi;
Futhi uJeremi ngaphansi kwasandla sikaGadi;
Futhi uGadi ngaphansi kwesandla sika-Esayasi;
Futhi u-Esayasi wabuthola ngaphansi kwesandla sikaNkulunkulu.
U-Esayasi futhi wayephila ezinsukwini zika-Abrahama, futhi wabusiswa nguye—
U-Abrahama lowo owathola ubuphristi ku Melkisedeki, owabuthola ngozalo loyise, ngisho kuze kube kuNowa;
Futhi kusuka kuNowa kuze kube ku-Enoke, ngozalo loyise;
Futhi kusuka ku-Enoke kuya ku-Abela, owabulawa ngozungu lomfowabo, owabuthola ubuphristi ngemiyalelo kaNkulunkulu, ngesandla sikayise u-Adamu, owaye ngumuntu wokuqala—
Ubuphristi lobo obuqhubekayo ebandleni likaNkulunkulu kuzo zonke izizukulwane, futhi abunasiqalo sezinsuku noma isiphelo seminyaka.

Futhi iNkosi yamisa ubuphristi futhi phezu kuka-Aroni nenzalo yakhe, kuzo zonke izizukulwane zabo, ubuphristi lobo obuqhubekayo futhi buhlezi ingunaphakade nobuphristi obufanayo obungokohlelo olungcwele kakhulu lukaNkulunkulu.
Futhi lobu buphristi obukhulu buphethe ivangeli futhi buphethe nesikhiye sezimfihlakalo zombuso, ngisho isikhiye sokwazi ngoNkulunkulu.
Ngakho-ke, ezimisweni zabo, amandla obunkulunkulu ayembulwa.
Futhi ngaphandle kwezimiso zabo, negunya lobuphristi, amandla obunkulunkulu awembulwa kubantu enyameni;
Ngokuba ngaphandle kwalokhu akukho muntu ongabona ubuso bukaNkulunkulu, ngisho uBaba, futhi aphile.
Manje lokhu uMose wakufundisa ngokucacile kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli ehlane, futhi wafuna ngokukhuthala ukungcwelisa abantu bakhe ukuze babone ubuso bukaNkulunkulu;

Kodwa baqinisa izinhliziyo zabo futhi abakwazanga ukubekezelela ukuba phambi kwakhe; ngakho-ke, iNkosi olakeni lwayo, ngokuba intukuthelo yayo yokheleka ngokumelene nabo, yafunga ukuthi abayiku ngena ekuphumuleni kwayo besese hlane, ukuphumula lokho okunguku phelela konke kwenkazimulo yayo.
Ngakho-ke, yamthatha uMose yamkhipha phakathi kwabo, ngokunjalo nobuPhristi obuNgcwele;
Futhi ubuphristi obuncane baqhubeka, ubuphristi lobo obuphethe ukhiye wokusetshenzelwa yizingelosi nowevangeli lokulungiselela;

Ivangeli lelo okuyivangeli lokuphenduka neloku bhabhadiswa, nelo kususwa kwezono, futhi nomthetho wemiyalelo wenyama, iNkosi olakeni lwayo eyawenza ukuba uqhubeke unakekelwe yindlu ka-Aroni phakathi kwabantwana bakwa-Israyeli kwaze kwafika kuJohane, owavuswa nguNkulunkulu, egcwaliswe ngoMoya oNgcwele kwasesi zalweni sikanina.

Ngokuba wabhabhadiswa ngesikhathi esese buntwaneni bakhe, futhi wagcotshwa yingelosi kaNkulunkulu ngesikhathi enezinsuku eziyisishiyagalombili ubudala kulamandla, ukuze achithe umbuso wamaJuda, futhi ukuze enze imikhondo yeNkosi iqonde phambi kobuso babantu bakhe, futhi nokubalungiselela ukuza kweNkosi, ezandleni zayo okunikwe wonke amandla.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, izikhundla zobugosa nobhishobhi ziyizijobelelo ezidingekile ezihlangene nobuphristi obukhulu.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, izikhundla zomfundisi nesedikoni ziyizijobelelo ezidingekile ezihlangene nobuphristi obuncane, ubuphristi lobo obaqiniswa ku-Aroni namadodana akhe.

Ngakho-ke, njengoba ngishilo ngokuphathelene namadodana kaMose—ngokuba amadodana kaMose namadodana ka-Aroni ayonikela umnikelo nomhlatshelo omukelekayo endlini yeNkosi, indlu leyo eyokwakhelwa iNkosi kulesi sizukulwane, phezu kwebala elingcwelisiwe njengoba ngishilo—

Futhi amadodana kaMose namadodana ka-Aroni ayogcwaliswa nge nkazimulo yeNkosi, phezu kwe Ntaba iSiyoni endlini yeNkosi, nina eningamadodana abo; futhi nabaningi engibabizile futhi ngabathuma ukuyokwakha ibandla lami.
Ngokuba noma ubani othembekileyo ukuze afumane lobu buphristi obubili engikhulume ngabo, futhi nabakhulisa ubizo lwabo, baya ngcweliswa ngoMoya ngokwanele ukuba kwenziwa busha imizimba yabo.
Baba ngamadodana kaMose namadodana ka-Aroni futhi nenzalo ka-Abrahama, nebandla nombuso, naba khethiweyo baNkulunkulu.
Futhi phezu kwalokho bonke labo abemukela lobu buphristi bemukela mina, kusho iNkosi;
Ngokuba lowo owemukela izinceku zami wemukela mina;
Futhi lowo owemukela mina wemukela uBaba;
Futhi lowo owemukela uBaba wemukela umbuso kaBaba; ngakho-ke konke lokho uBaba anakho uyonikwa kona.
Futhi lokhu kuhambisana nesifungo nesivumelwano esihlangene nobuphristi.
Ngakho-ke, bonke labo abemukela lobu buphristi, bemukela lesi sifungo nesivumelwano sikaBaba, angeke asephule, futhi esingeke sisuswe.
Kodwa lowo ophula lesi sivumelwano emva kokusemukela, futhi asilahle impela, akasoze axolelwe izono kulomhlaba noma emhlabeni ozayo.

Futhi maye kubo bonke labo abangezi kulobu buphristi esenibemukele, engibuqinisayo manje phezu kwenu enikhona namhlanje, ngezwi lami uqobo liphuma emazulwini; futhi senginike ngisho uquqaba lwasezulwini nezami izingelosi isiyalezo ngokuphathelene nani.
Futhi manje sengininika umyalelo wokuthi niziqaphele, wokuthi ninake ngokukhuthala amazwi okuphila okuphakade.
Ngokuba niyophila ngawo wonke amazwi aphuma emlonyeni kaNkulunkulu.
Ngokuba izwi leNkosi liyiqiniso, futhi noma yini eyiqiniso ingukukhanya, futhi noma yini engukukhanya inguMoya, ngisho uMoya kaJesu Kristu.
Futhi uMoya unika ukukhanya kuwo wonke umuntu oza emhlabeni; futhi uMoya ukhanyisela wonke umuntu emhlabeni, olilalelayo izwi likaMoya.
Futhi wonke umuntu olilalelayo izwi likaMoya uza kuNkulunkulu, ngisho uBaba.
Futhi uBaba umfundisa isivumelwano asivuselelile futhi wasiqinisa phezu kwenu, esiqiniswe phezu kwenu ukuze nizuze ngaso, futhi hhayi ukuze kuzuze nina kuphela, kodwa ukuze kuzuze umhlaba wonke.
Futhi umhlaba wonke uhleli esonweni, futhi ububula ngaphansi ko bumnyama nangaphansi kwesibopho sesono.
Futhi ngalokhu ningazi ukuthi bangaphansi kwesibopho sesono, ngokuba abezi kimi.
Ngokuba lowo ongezi kimi ungaphansi kwesibopho sesono.
Futhi lowo ongalemukeli izwi lami akalazi izwi lami, futhi akasiye owami.
Futhi ngalokhu ningabazi abalungile kwababi, futhi nokuthi wonke umhlaba ububula ngaphansi kwesono nobumnyama ngisho manje.
Futhi izingqondo zenu ngesikhathi esedlule zifiphaziwe ngenxa yokungakholwa, futhi ngokuba anizihloniphanga izinto eninikwe zona—
Lobo buze nokungakholwa okwenze ibandla lonke libekwe icala.
Futhi lokhu kubekwa icala kuhleli phezu kwabantwana baseSiyoni, ngisho bonke.

Futhi bayoba ngaphansi kwalokhu kubekwa icala baze baphenduke futhi bakhumbule isivumelwano esisha, ngisho iNcwadi kaMormoni nemiyalelo yaphambilini engibanike yona, hhayi ukusho kuphela, kodwa ukwenza njengoba ngibhalile—
Ukuze baveze izithelo ezifanele zombuso kaYise; kungenjalo kusele isijeziso nokwahlulelwa okuzothululwa phezu kwabantwana baseSiyoni.
Ngokuba ngabe abantwana bombuso bazokonakalisa izwe lami elingcwele na? Ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, Cha.
Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini eniwezwayo manje amazwi ami, ayiphimbo lami, nibusisiwe kangangoba nizemukela lezi zinto;
Ngokuba ngizonithethelela izono zenu ngalomyalelo—ukuthi nihlale nibambelele ezinqondweni zenu ngesizotha futhi nangomoya wokukhuleka, ukufakaza kuwo wonke umhlaba ngalezo zinto ezikhulunywa kini.
Ngakho-ke, hambani niye kuwo wonke umhlaba; futhi nakunoma iyiphi indawo eningakwazi ukuya kuyo niyothumela, ukuze ubufakazi buhambe busuka kini buye kuwo wonke umhlaba kuzo zonke izidalwa.
Futhi njengoba ngasho kubaphostoli bami, kanjalo-ke ngithi nakini, ngokuba ningabaphostoli bami, ngisho abaphristi abakhulu baNkulunkulu; niyibo labo uBaba wami angiphe bona; ninga bahlobo bami;
Ngakho-ke, njengoba ngasho kubaphostoli bami ngithi nakini futhi, wonke umuntu okholwa emazwini enu, futhi ebhabhadiswa ngamanzi ukuze athethelelwe izono, uyofumana uMoya oNgcwele.
Futhi lezi zibonakaliso ziyobalandela labo abakholwayo—
Egameni lami bayokwenza imisebenzi eminingi emangalisayo;
Egameni lami bayokhipha odeveli;
Egameni lami bayophilisa abagulayo;
Egameni lami bayovula amehlo ezimpumputhe, futhi bavule izindlebe zabangezwa;
Futhi ulimi lwesithuli luyokhuluma;
Futhi uma kukhona umuntu oyobanika ubuthi ngeke bubalimaze;
Futhi ubuthi benyoka ngeke bube namandla okubalimaza.
Kodwa umyalelo ngibanika wona, wokuthi bangazikhukhumezi ngalezi zinto, bangazikhulumi phambi komhlaba; ngokuba lezi zinto zinikwe kini ukuze nizuze futhi ukuze nisindiswe.

Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, labo abangakholwa emazwini enu, futhi abanga bhabhadiswa ngamanzi egameni lami, ukuze bathethelelwe izono zabo, ukuze bafumane uMoya oNgcwele, bayoba ngaphansi kwamandla kaSathane, futhi ngeke beze embusweni kaBaba lapho uBaba nami sikhona.
Futhi lesi sambulo kini, nalomyalelo, kusebenza kusuka ngalelihora emhlabeni wonke, futhi ivangeli liya kubo bonke abangakalitholi.

Kodwa, ngiqinisile ngithi kubo bonke labo okunikwe kubo umbuso—kusuka kini kufanele lishunyayelwe kubo, ukuze baphenduke emisebenzini yabo emibi yaphambilini; ngokuba kufanele basolwe ngezinhliziyo zabo ezimbi zokungakholwa, nabazalwane benu eSiyoni ngokunivukela ngesikhathi nginithumele.

Futhi phezu kwalokho ngithi kini, bahlobo bami, ngokuba kusuka manje ngizonibiza ngabahlobo, kufanele ukuba ngininike lomyalelo, wokuthi nibe ngisho njengabahlobo bami ezinsukwini ngesikhathi nganginabo, ngihambela ukuyoshumayela ivangeli ngamandla ami;
Ngokuba angibavumelanga ukuba babe nesikhwama noma iyika, noma amabhantshi amabili.
Bhekani, nginithumele ukuvivinya umhlaba, futhi isisebenzi sifanelwe yinkokhelo yaso.

Futhi noma yimuphi umuntu oyohamba futhi ashumayele lelivangeli lombuso, ongehluleki ukuqhubeka athembeke ezintweni zonke, ngeke akhathale enqondweni, noma afiphale, noma emzimbeni, isitho, noma amalunga; nonwele lwekhanda lakhe ngeke luwele phansi lungaziwanga. Futhi ngeke balambe, noma bome.
Ngakho-ke, ningakhathazeki ngengomuso, ukuthi niyodlani, noma niyophuzani, noma niyokwembathani.
Ngokuba, bhekani iminduze yasendle, ukuthi imila kanjani, ayikhandleki, ayiphothi; futhi imibuso yomhlaba, kubo bonke ubukhazikhazi bayo, ayimbathisiwe njengomunye wayo.
Ngokuba uYihlo, osezulwini, uyazi ukuthi niyakudinga konke lokhu.
Ngakho-ke, ingomuso malikhathalele okwalo.
Futhi ningakhathazeki ngaphambili ngokuthi niyothini; kodwa gcinani nilondoloze ezingqondweni zenu njalonjalo amazwi okuphila, futhi niyonikwa ngalelo hora leyongxenye eyohlukaniselwa wonke umuntu.

Ngakho-ke, makungabi bikho muntu phakathi kwenu, ngokuba lomyalelo ungowabo bonke abathembekile ababizwe nguNkulunkulu ebandleni ebufundisini, kusukela ngalelihora abathatha isikhwama noma iyika, labo abahamba ukuyoshumayela leli vangeli lombuso.
Bhekani, nginithumela ukuba niqondise umhlaba kuzo zonke izenzo zawo zokungalungi, futhi nibafundise ngokwahlulela okuzayo.

Futhi lowo onemukelayo, lapho ngiyoba khona nami, ngokuba ngiyohamba phambi kobuso benu. Ngizoba kwesokudla senu nakwesobunxele senu, futhi uMoya wami uyoba sezinhliziyweni zenu, futhi izingelosi zami zinizungeze, ukuze zinithwale.
Onemukelayo wemukela mina; futhi lowo uzonipha ukudla, futhi anembathise, futhi aniphe imali.
Futhi lowo onipha ukudla, noma onembathisayo, noma onipha imali, kasoze alahlekelwa umvuzo wakhe.
Futhi lowo ongazenzi lezi zinto akasiye umfundi wami; ngalokhu niyobazi abafundi bami.

Lowo onganemukeli, sukani kuye, futhi nihlanze izinyawo zenu ngisho nangamanzi, amanzi acwebileyo, noma kushisa noma kubanda, futhi nifakaze ngakho kuYihlo osezulwini, futhi ningaphindeli futhi kulowomuntu.
Futhi kunoma yisiphi isigodi noma idolobha eningena kulo, yenzani kanjalo.
Nokho, funani ngokukhuthala futhi ningazibambi; futhi maye kulowo muzi, noma kulesosigodi noma kulelo dolobha elinenqabayo, noma amazwi enu, noma ubufakazi benu ngokuphathelene nami.
Ngithi futhi, maye kulowomuzi, noma kulesosigodi noma kulelo dolobha elinenqabayo, noma amazwi enu, noma ubufakazi benu ngami;
Ngokuba mina, Mninimandla Onke, ngibeke izandla zami phezu kwezizwe zonke, ukubajezisa ngenxa yobubi babo.
Futhi izinhlupho ziyothunyelwa, futhi ngeke zithathwe emhlabeni kuze kube ngiwuqedile umsebenzi wami, oyofinyezwa ngokulunga—

Kuze kube bonke bayongazi, abasele, kusukela komncane kuze kufike komkhulu, futhi bayogcwaliswa ngokuyazi iNkosi, futhi bayo bona iso neso, futhi bayoliphakamisa iphimbo labo, futhi ngephimbo kanyekanye bahlabelele leliculo elisha, bethi:
INkosi iyibuyisile futhi iSiyoni;INkosi ibahlengile abantu bayo, u-Israyeli,Ngoku khethwa ngomusa,Okwafezwa ngokholoNesivumelwano soyise.

INkosi ibahlengile abantu bayo;Futhi uSathane uboshiwe futhi isikhathi asisekho.INkosi ihlanganise zonke izinto ndawonye.INkosi yehlisele phansi iSiyoni isuka phezulu.INkosi yenyusele phezulu iSiyoni isuka phansi.

Umhlaba ube nemihelo futhi wazala amandla awo;Futhi neqiniso limisiwe ezibilini akhe;Futhi namazulu awumamathekele;Futhi wembathiswe ngenkazimulo kaNkulunkulu wawo;Ngokuba yena ume phakathi kwabantu bakhe.
Inkazimulo, nodumo, namandla, nokunqoba,Makubuyiselwe kuNkulunkulu wethu; ngokuba ugcwele ububele,Ukulunga, umusa neqiniso, nokuthula,Phakade naphakade, Amen.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, kufanele ukuthi wonke umuntu ohamba ukuyoshumayela ivangeli lami laphakade, ukuthi kangangoba benemindeni, futhi bethola imali ngesipho, ukuthi mabayithumele kubo noma bayisebenzise ukuba bazuze, njengoba iNkosi iyobabonisa, ngokuba ngalendlela kubukeka kukuhle kimi.

Futhi bonke labo abangenayo imindeni, abathola imali, mabayithumele phezulu kumbhishobhi eSiyoni, noma kumbhishobhi e-Ohio, ukuze ingcweliselwe ukuveza izambulo nokucindezelwa kwazo, nokumiswa kweSiyoni.
Futhi uma kukhona oyopha omunye wenu ibhantshi, noma isudi, thatha endala uyiphe abampofu, futhi uhambe ngendlela yakho uthokoze.
Futhi uma kukhona umuntu phakathi kwenu onamandla eMoyeni, makathathe lowo obuthakathaka ahambe naye, ukuze akheke ngobumnene bonke, ukuze naye abe namandla.

Ngakho-ke, thathani labo abagcotshwe ngobuphristi obuncane, nibathumele ngaphambi kokuza kwenu ukuba bayohlela izikhathi zokubonana, futhi nokuba balungise indlela, futhi bagcine izikhathi zokubonana ezihleliwe nina eningakwazanga ukuzigcina.
Bhekani, yiyo lendlela abaphostoli bami, basendulo, abangakhela ngayo ibandla.

Ngakho-ke, wonke umuntu makame esikhundleni sakhe, futhi asebenze obizweni lwakhe; futhi ikhanda malingasho ezinyaweni ukuthi alizidingi izinyawo; ngokuba ngaphandle kwezinyawo umzimba ungakwazi kanjani ukuma na?
Futhi umzimba unesidingo sawo wonke amanye amalungu, ukuze wonke akhane ndawonye, ukuze uhlelo lugcinwe luphelele.

Futhi bhekani, abaphristi abakhulu kufanele bahambe, futhi ngokunjalo namagosa, futhi ngokunjalo nabaphristi abancane; kodwa amadikoni nabafundisi kufanele babekwe ukubheka ibandla, ukuba babe abefundisi abangahambi bebandla.
Futhi umbhishobhi, uNewel K. Whitney, naye kufanele ahambe ndawo zonke futhi phakathi kwawo wonke amabandla, efuna abampofu ukuba abaphe ngokwezimfuno zabo ngokuthobisa abacebileyo nabazazisayo.
Kufanele futhi aqashe umphatheli ukuze aphathe futhi ukuze amenzele umsebenzi wakhe wasemhlabeni njengokuba eyomkhombisa.

Nokho, umbhishobhi makahambe aye edolobheni laseNew York, nasedolobheni lase-Albany, futhi nasedolobheni laseBoston, futhi exwayise abantu balawo madolobha ngomsindo wevangeli, ngezwi elikhulu, ngokuchithakala nokuqedwa nya okubalindele uma bezinqaba lezi zinto.
Ngokuba uma bezinqaba lezi zinto ihora lokwahlulela kwabo selifikile, futhi indlu yabo iyosala ingenamuntu.
Makathembele kimi futhi ngeke anqotshwe; futhi unwele lwekhanda lakhe ngeke luwele phansi lungaziwanga.

Futhi ngiqinisile ngithi kini, nina nonke eniyizinceku zami, hambani njengokuvuma kwezimo zenu, obizweni lwenu olwahlukeneyo, niye emadolobheni nasezigodini ezinkulu nezaziwayo, nikhuze umhlaba ngokulunga kuzo zonke izenzo zabo ezingalungile nezingenabo ubunkulunkulu, nibeke obala ngokucacile nangokuqonda incithakalo yesinengiso ezinsukwini zokugcina.
Ngokuba, iNkosi uMninimandla Onke ithi ngani, ngizoyibhubhisa imibuso yabo; ngeke ngizamazamise umhlaba kuphela, kodwa namazulu agcwele izinkanyezi ayozamazama.

Ngokuba mina, iNkosi, ngibeke isandla sami ukubonakalisa amandla asezulwini; anikwazi ukukubona manje, kodwa isikhashana niyokubona, futhi nazi ukuthi ngiyimi, futhi nokuthi ngizoza futhi ngizobusa nabantu bami.
Ngingu-Alfa no-Omega, isiqalo nesiphetho. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/85.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 85
chapter_summary: 1–5, Amafa eSiyoni kufanele atholakale ngokunikela; 6–12, Oyedwa oqinileyo nonamandla uzonika abaNgcwele ifa labo eSiyoni.

verses.text: Kungumsebenzi kamabhalane weNkosi, embekile, ukugcina umlando, nemibhalo ejwayelekile yebandla yazo zonke izinto ezenzeka eSiyoni, futhi neyabo bonke labo abanikela impahla, futhi nabathola amafa ngokusemthethweni kumbhishobhi;
Futhi nendlela yabo yempilo, ukholo lwabo, nemisebenzi yabo; futhi neyabahlubuki abahlubukayo emva kokuthola amafa abo.

Kuphambene nentando nomyalelo kaNkulunkulu ukuthi labo abangawatholi amafa abo ngokunikela, ngokuvumelana nomthetho wakhe, awunikile, ukuze akhokhise okweshumi abantu bakhe, ukuze abalungiselele bamelane nosuku lwempindiselo nelokushisa, ukuba amagama abo abhalwe nawabantu baNkulunkulu.
Futhi makungagcinwa umlando wesizukulwana sabo, noma ubekwe lapho ungatholakala khona emibhalweni noma emlandweni webandla.
Amagama abo mawangatholakali, noma namagama oyise, noma amagama abantwana ebhaliwe encwadini yomthetho kaNkulunkulu, kusho iNkosi yamaBandla.
Yebo, lisho kanje izwi lelincane elithule, elinyenyeza phakathi futhi lihlabe zonke izinto, futhi izikhathi eziningi lenza amathambo ami aqhaqhazele ngesikhathi lizibonakalisa, lithi:

Futhi kuyokwenzeka ukuthi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngizothumela oyedwa oqinile nonamandla, ophethe intonga yamandla esandleni sakhe, ombathiswe ukukhanya njengengubo, umlomo wakhe oyokusho amazwi, amazwi aphakade; ngesikhathi izibilini zakhe ziyoba nghjumthombo weqiniso, ukuzohlela indlu kaNkulunkulu, futhi nokuzohlela ngezabelo zezindawo amafa abangcwele amagama abo atholakalayo, futhi namagama oyise, futhi nawabantwana babo, ebhalwe encwadini yomthetho kaNkulunkulu;
Nakuba leyondoda, eyabizwa nguNkulunkulu futhi yabekwa, eyelula isandla ukubamba umphongolo kaNkulunkulu, iyowa ngomcibisholo wokufa, njengesihlahla esishaywe ngumcibisholo wombani okhanya kakhulu.

Futhi bonke labo abayotholwa bengabhaliwe encwadini yokukhumbula abayikulithola ifa ngalolo suku, kodwa bayohlukaniswa nabanye, futhi isabelo sabo bayomiselwa sona phakathi kwabangakholwayo, lapho kukhona ukukhala nokugedla kwamazinyo.
Lezi zinto angizikhulumeli ngokwami; ngakho-ke, njengoba iNkosi ikhuluma, iyozigcwalisa futhi.

Futhi labo abangabobuPhristi obuKhulu, amagama abo angatholakali ebhaliwe encwadini yomthetho, noma labo abatholakale behlubukile, noma besusiwe ebandleni, nalabo bobuphristi obuncane, noma amalungu, kulolo suku ngeke balithole ifa phakathi kwabangcwele boPhakeme kaKhulu;
Ngakho-ke, kuyokwenziwa kubo njengaku bantwana bomphristi, njengoba kutholakala kubhaliwe esahlukweni sesibili ivesi lamashumi ayisithupha nanye nelamashumi ayisithupha nambili lencwadi ka-Ezra.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/86.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 86
chapter_summary: 1–7, INkosi inika incazelo yomfanekiso wamabele nokhula; 8–11, Ichaza izibusiso zobuphristi kulabo abayizi ndlalifa ngokusemthethweni ngokwasenyameni.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi kini zinceku zami, ngokuphathelene nomfanekiso wamabele nokhula:
Bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi, insimu kwakungumhlaba, futhi abaphostoli kwakungaba hlwanyeli bembewu;

Futhi emva kokuba sebelele umhluphi omkhulu webandla, umhlubuki, isifebe, ngisho iBabiloni, owenza izizwe zonke ziphuze enkomishini yakhe, ezinhliziyweni zabo isitha, ngisho uSathane, uhlezi ukuze abuse—bhekani uhlwanyela ukhula; ngalokho-ke, ukhula luminyanisa amabele futhi luphushela ibandla ehlane.
Kodwa bhekani, ezinsukwini zokugcina, ngisho manje ngesikhathi iNkosi isiqala ukuveza izwi, futhi iqabunga seliyahluma futhi lisathambile—
Bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, izingelosi zikhala eNkosini ubusuku nemini, esezilungile futhi esezilindele ukuthunywa ukuyovuna emasimini;
Kodwa iNkosi ithi kuzo, ningalusiphuli ukhula ngesikhathi iqabunga lisathambile (ngokuba ngiqinisile ukholo lwenu luseluncane), hleze nibulale namabele futhi.

Ngakho-ke, yekani kukhule amabele nokhula ndawonye size isivumo sivuthwe kahle; ngemumva kwalokho niyobutha kuqala amabele phakathi kokhula, futhi emva kokubuthwa kwamabele, bhekani futhi bheka, ukhula luboshwa izinyanda, futhi insimu isisalelwe ukushiswa.
Ngakho-ke, isho kanje iNkosi kini, ngani ubuphristi obuqhubeke ngozalo loyihlo—
Ngokuba niyizindlalifa ngokuse mthethweni, ngokwasenyameni, futhi nifihliwe emhlabeni noKristu kuNkulunkulu—

Ngakho-ke impilo yenu nobuphristi buhlezi kukhona, futhi kufanele buhlale bukhona ngani futhi nangozalo lwenu kuze kube yizikhathi zokubuyiselwa kwakho konke okwakhulunywa ngemilomo yabo bonke abaphrofethi abangcwele kusukela ekuqaleni komhlaba.
Ngakho-ke, nibusisiwe uma niqhubeka ebuhleni bami, ukukhanya kwabeZizwe, futhi nangalobu buphristi, umsindisi kubantu bami u-Israyeli. INkosi isikukhulumile. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/87.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 87
chapter_summary: 1–4, Impi iyabikezelwa phakathi kweziFundazwe zaseNyakatho neziFundazwe zaseNingizimu; 5–8, Izehlakalo ezinzima zizowela phezu kwabantu basemhlabeni.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi ngokuphathele nezimpi ezizokwenzeka maduze, kusukela kuthuthuva lwase South Carolina, ekugcineni oluzophetha ngokufa nosizi lwabantu abaningi;
Futhi isikhathi sizoza lapho impi izothululwa phezu kwezizwe zonke, kusukela kulendawo.

Ngokuba bhekani, iziFundazwe zaseNingizimu ziyozihlukanisa ngokumelene neziFundazwe zaseNyakatho, futhi iziFundazwe zaseNingizimu zizobiza ezinye izizwe, ngisho isizwe saseBrithani, njengoba sibizwa kanjalo, futhi nabo bazobiza ezinye izizwe, ukuze bazivikele kwezinye izizwe; futhi emva kwalokho impi izothululwa phezu kwezizwe zonke.
Futhi kuyokwenzeka, emva kwezinsuku eziningi, izigqila ziyovukela abaphathi bazo, abayovivela futhi baqeqeshelwe impi.
Futhi kuyokwenzeka futhi ukuthi insali esele yendawo izoviva, futhi iyoba nolaka olukhulu, futhi iyohlupha abeZizwe ngezinhlupho ezinzima.

Futhi ngalokho, ngenkemba nangokuchitheka kwegazi abantu basemhlabeni bayolila; futhi ngendlala, nangezifo ezibhubhisayo, nokuzamazama komhlaba, futhi nokuduma kwezulu, nangombani onolaka nokukhanya okukhulu, abantu basemhlabeni bayokwenziwa baluzwe ulaka, nentukuthelo, futhi nesandla esijezisayo sikaNkulunkulu uMninimandla Onke, kuze kube imbubhiso eshiwo isiqede zonke izizwe ngokupheleleyo;
Ukuze ukukhala kwabangcwele, nokwe gazi labangcwele, kuyogcina ukuza ezindlebeni zeNkosi Sebawoti, lisuka emhlabeni, ukuze baphindiselelwe ezitheni zabo.
Ngalokho-ke, yimani ezindaweni ezingcwele, futhi ninganyakaziswa, kuze kufike usuku lweNkosi; ngokuba bhekani, luyeza masinyane, kusho iNkosi. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/88.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 88
chapter_summary: 1–5, AbaNgcwele abathembekileyo bathola lowoMduduzi, okuyisethembiso sokuphila okuphakade; 6–13, Zonke izinto ziphethwe futhi zilawulwa ngokuKhanya kukaKristu; 14–16, UVuko luza ngokuHlengwa; 17–31, Ukuhlonipha umthetho wesilestiyali, wethirestriyali, noma wethilestiyali kulungiselela abantu leyo mibuso nezinkazimulo; 32–35, Labo abakhetha ukuhlala esonweni bahlala bengcolile njalo; 36–41, Yonke imibuso iphathwa ngomthetho; 42–45, UNkulunkulu unike umthetho kuzo zonke izinto; 46–50, Umuntu uzoqonda ngisho uNkulunkulu; 51–61, Umfanekiso wendoda ethuma izisebenzi zayo ukuyosebenza ensimini futhi izivakashele omunye emva komunye; 62–73, Sondelani eNkosini, nizobubona ubuso Bayo; 74–80, Zingcweliseni futhi nifundisane izimfundiso zombuso; 81–85, Wonke umuntu osexwayisiwe kufanele axwayise umakhelwane wakhe; 86–94, Izimpawu, ukuphazamiseka kwemvelo, futhi nezingelosi zilungisa indlela yokuza kweNkosi; 95–102, Amacilongo ezingelosi avusa abafileyo ngohlelo lwabo lokulandelana; 103–116, Amacilongo ezingelosi amemezela ukubuyiselwa kwevangeli, ukuwa kweBabiloni, futhi nempi kaNkulunkulu omkhulu, 117–126, Funani ukufunda, nimise indlu kaNkulunkulu (ithempeli), futhi nizembathise ngesibopho sesihe; 127–141, Uhlelo lweSikole sabaPhrofethi lubekwa obala, kanye nesimiso sokugezwa kwezinyawo.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi kini enibuthene ndawonye ukwamukela intando yakhe ngokuphathelene nani:

Bhekani, lokhu kuyajabulisa eNkosini yenu, futhi izingelosi ziyanithokozela; imikhuleko yenu yezenzo zobumnene ikhuphukele ezindlebeni zeNkosi Sebawoti, futhi ibhalwe encwadini yamagama abangcwelisiwe, ngisho labo bezwe lesilestiyali.

Ngalokho-ke, manje ngithumela kini omunye uMduduzi, ngisho kini bahlobo bami, ukuze ahlale ezinhliziyweni zenu, ngisho uMoya oNgcwele wesethembiso; lowoMduduzi ofanayo nengawuthembisa kubafundi bami, njengoba kubhaliwe ebufakazini ngokukaJohane.
LoMduduzi uyisethembiso engininika sona sokuphila okuphakade, ngisho inkazimulo yombuso wesilestiyali.
Leyonkazimulo okungeyebandla le Nkosana, ngisho kaNkulunkulu, ongcwele kakhulu kunabo bonke, ngoJesu Kristu iNdodana yakhe—
Lowo owenyukela phezulu, njengoba futhi ehlela phansi kwazo zonke izinto, kangangoba waqonda zonke izinto, ukuze abe kuzo zonke izinto futhi nasezintweni zonke, ukukhanya kweqiniso;
Iqiniso elikhanyayo. Lokhu ngukukhanya kukaKristu. Njengoba futhi eselangeni, futhi engukukhanya kwelanga, futhi engamandla alo elenziwa ngawo.
Njengoba futhi esenyangeni, futhi engukukhanya kwenyanga, futhi engamandla ayo eyenziwa ngawo;
Njengoba futhi engukukhanya kwezinkanyezi, futhi engamandla azo ezenziwa ngawo;
Futhi nomhlaba nawo, namandla awo, ngisho umhlaba enime kuwo.
Futhi ukukhanya okukhanyayo, okuninika ukukhanya, kungaye okhanyisa amehlo enu, okungukukhanya okufanayo nalokho okukhulisa ukuqonda kwenu;
Ukukhanya okusuka lapho kukhona khona uNkulunkulu kugcwalise ububanzi bomkhathi—

Ukukhanya okukuzo zonke izinto, okunika impilo ezintweni zonke, oku ngumthetho okuphathwa ngawo zonke izinto, ngisho amandla kaNkulunkulu ohlezi esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi, osesifubeni sengunaphakade, ophakathi kwezinto zonke.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngokuhlengwa okwenzelwe nina kufezwa ukuvuka kwabafileyo.
Futhi umoya nomzimba ku ngumuntu.
Futhi ukuvuka kwabafileyo kungukuhlengwa komuntu.
Futhi ukuhlengwa komuntu kungaye ophilisa zonke izinto, esifubeni sakhe okumisiwe ukuthi abampofu naba thobekileyo bomhlaba bayoba yizindlalifa zawo.
Ngakho-ke, kuzofanele ungcweliswe kukho konke ukungalungi, ukuze ulungiselwe inkazimulo yesilestiyali;
Ngokuba emva kokuba usufeze inhloso yokudalwa kwawo, uyoqheliswa ngenkazimulo, ngisho lapho kukhona khona uNkulunkulu uBaba;
Ukuze imizimba okungeyase mbusweni wesilestiyali ube ngeyawo phakade naphakade; ngokuba, kungalesi sizathu weziwa futhi wadalwa, futhi kungalesi sizathu bengcweliswa.

Futhi labo abangangcwelisiwe ngomthetho engini nike wona, ngisho umthetho kaKristu, kufanele babe yizindlalifa zomunye umbuso, ngisho lowo okungumbuso wethirestriyali, noma lowo okungumbuso wethilestiyali.
Ngokuba lowo ongakwazi ukuhlonipha umthetho wombuso wesilestiyali ngeke akwazi ukubekezelela inkazimulo yesilestiyali.
Futhi lowo ongakwazi ukuhlonipha umthetho wombuso wethirestriyali ngeke akwazi ukubekezelela inkazimulo yethirestriyali.

Futhi lowo ongakwazi ukuhlonipha umthetho wombuso wethilestiyali ngeke akwazi ukubekezelela inkazimulo yethilestiyali; ngakho-ke akawufanele umbuso wenkazimulo. Ngakho-ke kufanele abekezelele umbuso okungewona umbuso wenkazimulo.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, umhlaba uyawuhlonipha umthetho wombuso wesilestiyali, ngokuba ufeza inhloso yokudalwa kwawo, futhi awuphuli mthetho—
Ngalokho-ke, uyongcweliswa; yebo, nakuba uzofa, uyophiliswa futhi, futhi uyokwazi ukubekezelela amandla ophiliswa ngawo, futhi abalungileyo bayowufumana njengefa.
Ngokuba nakuba befa, nabo bayo vuka futhi, umzimba womoya.
Labo abangumoya wesilestiyali bayofumana lowomzimba ofanayo owawungo wemvelo; ngisho nani niyoyifumana imizimba yenu, futhi nenkazimulo yenu kuyoba yileyo nkazimulo imizimba yenu eyophiliswa ngayo.
Nina eniphiliswe ngengxenye yenkazimulo yesilestiyali niyobe senifumana efanayo, ngisho ukuphelela kwayo.
Futhi labo abaphiliswe ngengxenye yenkazimulo yethirestriyali bayobe sebefumana efanayo, ngisho ukuphelela kwayo.
Futhi nalabo abaphiliswe ngengxenye yenkazimulo yethilestiyali bayobe sebefumana efanayo, ngisho ukuphelela kwayo.
Futhi labo abaseleyo bayophiliswa nabo; nokho, bayobuyela futhi endaweni yabo, ukuyothokozela lokho abathanda ukuku fumana, ngokuba babengathandi ukuthokozela lokho ababengaku fumana.
Ngokuba kuyomsiza ngani umuntu uma isipho sinikwa yena, futhi esenqaba leso sipho na? Bheka, akathokozi ngalokho akunikiwe, futhi akathokozi ngalowo onika isipho.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, lokho okuphethwe ngomthetho futhi kugcinwa ngomthetho futhi kupheleliswa futhi ku ngcweliswa ngawo.

Lokho okuphula umthetho, futhi okungaphili ngomthetho, kodwa okufuna ukuba ngumthetho ngokwako, futhi okuthanda ukuhlala esonweni, futhi okuhlala esonweni impela, ngeke kwangcweliswa ngomthetho, noma ngo bubele, ukulunga, noma ukwahlulelwa. Ngakho-ke, kufanele bahlale bengcolile njalo.
Yonke imibuso inomthetho onikiwe;
Futhi miningi imibuso; ngokuba awukho umkhathi okungekho kuwo umbuso; futhi akukho mbuso okungekho kuwo umkhathi, kungaba ngomkhulu noma omncane umbuso.
Futhi kunoma yimuphi umbuso kunikwe umthetho; futhi kuwo wonke umthetho ngamunye kukhona imingcele nezimiselo ezithile.
Bonke abantu abangahloniphi lezo zimiselo abatholwa bengenacala.

Ngokuba ukuqonda kunamathela kokunye ukuqonda; ukuhlakanipha kwamukela ukuhlakanipha; iqiniso lisingatha iqiniso; ubuqotho buthanda obunye ubuqotho; ukukhanya kunamathela kokunye ukukhanya; ububele bunesihawu kobunye ububele futhi bufuna okungokwako; ukulunga kuhamba indlela yako futhi kufuna abangabakho; ukwahlulela kuhamba phambi kobuso balowo osesihlalweni sobukhosi nophatha futhi enze zonke izinto.

Uziqonda zonke izinto, futhi zonke izinto ziphambi kwakhe, futhi zonke izinto zinxazonke kuye; futhi uphezu kwezinto zonke, futhi ukuzo zonke izinto, futhi uphakathi kwazo zonke izinto, futhi usezintweni zonke nxazonke; futhi zonke izinto zenziwe nguye, futhi zisuka kuye, ngisho uNkulunkulu, phakade naphakade.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, unike umthetho kuzo zonke izinto, ezinyakaza ngawo ngezikhathi nezinkathi zazo;
Futhi imikhondo yazo imisiwe, ngisho imikhondo yamazulu nomhlaba, okuhlanganisa umhlaba nawo wonke amaplanethi.

Futhi zinika ukukhanya enye kwenye ngezikhathi zazo futhi nangezinkathi zazo zonyaka, ngemizuzu yazo, ngamahora azo, ngezinsuku zazo, ngamasonto azo, ngezinyanga zazo, ngeminyaka yazo—konke lokhu kungunyaka owodwa kuNkulunkulu, kodwa hhayi kumuntu.

Umhlaba uzungeza ngamaphiko awo, futhi nelanga linika ukukhanya kwakhe emini, nenyanga inika ukukhanya kwakhe ebusuku, nezinkanyezi nazo zinika okwazo ukukhanya, ngesikhathi zizungeza ngamaphiko azo enkazimulweni yazo, phakathi kwa mandla kaNkulunkulu.
Ngingayifanisa nani lemibuso, ukuze niqonde na?
Bhekani, zonke lezi ziyimibuso, futhi umuntu oseke wabona noma yiziphi zalezi noma ezincane zalezi usembonile uNkulunkulu ehamba ngobukhosi nangamandla akhe.
Ngithi kini, usembonile; nokho, lowo owenza kwabakhe akemukelwanga.
Ukukhanya kukhanya ebumnyameni, futhi ubumnyama abukuqondi; nokho, usuku luyofika lapho niyoqonda ngisho uNkulunkulu, seniphilisiwe kuye futhi nawuye.
Emva kwalokho niyokwazi ukuthi ningibonile, ukuthi nginguye, futhi nokuthi nginguku khanya kweqiniso okukini, futhi nokuthi nikimi; kungenjalo naningeke niphumelele.
Bhekani, ngizoyifanisa lemibuso nendoda enensimu, futhi yathumela izisebenzi zayo ensimini ukuba ziyolima ensimini.
Futhi yathi kwesokuqala: Hamba usebenze ensimini, futhi ngehora lokuqala ngizoza kuwe, futhi uzokubona ukujabula bobuso bami.
Futhi yathi kwesesibili: Hamba nawe uye ensimini, futhi ngehora lesibili ngizokuvakashela nenjabulo yobuso bami.
Futhi nakwesesi thathu, ithi: Ngizokuvakashela;
Futhi nakwese sine, njalonjalo kuya kwese shuminambili.
Futhi inkosi yensimu yahamba yaya kwesokuqala ngehora lokuqala, futhi yahlala naso ihora lonke, futhi sajabuliswa wukukhanya ebusweni benkosi yaso.
Futhi emva kwalokho yasuka kwesokuqala ukuze ivakashele esesibili, futhi nesesithathu, futhi nesesine, njalonjalo kuya kwese shuminambili.
Futhi ngalokho zonke zathola ukukhanya kobuso benkosi yazo, indoda ngayinye ngehora layo, futhi nangesikhathi sayo, futhi ngenkathi yayo—
Iqale ngesokuqala, njalonjalo kuya kweso kugcina, futhi kusuka kweso kugcina kuya kweso kuqala, futhi kusuka kweso kuqala kuya kweso kugcina;
Indoda ngayinye ngokohlelo lwayo, lize liphele ihora layo, ngisho njengokuyalwa kwayo yinkosi yayo, ukuze inkosi yayo ikhazimuliswe kuyo, futhi nayo enkosini yayo, ukuze bonke bakhazimuliswe.
Ngakho-ke, lemibuso ngizoyifanisa nalomfanekiso, futhi nabahlala khona—umbuso ngamunye ngehora lawo, futhi ngesikhathi sawo, futhi ngenkathi yawo, ngisho ngokwesi memezelo uNkulunkulu asenzile.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, bahlobo bami, ngikushiya nani lokhu engikushoyo ukuba nizindle ngakho ezinhliziyweni zenu, nalomyalelo engini nika wona, ukuthi ningibize ngise seduze—
Sondelani eduze kwami futhi nami ngizo sondela eduze kwenu; ngifuneni ngokukhuthala futhi nizongi fumana; celani futhi nizophiwa, ngqongqothani, futhi nizovulelwa.
Noma yini eniyicela kuBaba egameni lami nizokunikwa yona, lokho okunifanele;
Futhi uma nicela noma yini enganifanele, kuyophenduka ukulahlwa kwenu ngecala.

Bhekani, lokho enikuzwayo kunje ngezwi lokhala ehlane—ehlane, ngokuba anikwazi ukumbona—izwi lami, ngokuba izwi lami lingu Moya; uMoya wami uliqiniso; iqiniso lihlala isikhathi futhi alinasiphelo; futhi uma likini liyovama.
Futhi uma amehlo enu enamathele kudumo lwami, imizimba yonke yenu iyogcwaliswa ngokukhanya, futhi ngeke kubekhona ubumnyama kini; futhi lowo mzimba ogcwaliswe ngokukhanya uqonda zonke izinto.

Ngakho-ke, zingcweliseni ukuze izingqondo zenu zinamathele kuNkulunkulu, futhi izinsuku zizoza lapho niyombona; ngokuba uyonambulela ubuso bakhe, futhi kuyokuba ngesikhathi sakhe, futhi ngendlela yakhe, futhi ngokwentando yakhe.
Khumbulani isethembiso esikhulu nesokugcina engisenze kini; lahlani imicabango yenu yobuvila nohleko oluningi kude kunani.
Hlalani, hlalani kulendawo, futhi nibize umhlangano onesizotha, ngisho walabo abanga basebenzi bokuqala kulombuso wokugcina.
Futhi labo asebeba xwayisile ekuhambeni kwabo mababize iNkosi, futhi bazindle ngezinhliziyo zabo isexwayiso asebesitholile okwesikhashana.
Bhekani, futhi bheka, ngizoyinakekela imihlambi yenu, futhi ngizovusa amagosa futhi ngiwathumele kubo.
Bhekani, ngizowusheshisa umsebenzi wami ngesikhathi sawo.

Futhi nginika nina, eninga basebenzi bokuqala kulombuso wokugcina, umyalelo wokuthi nibuthane ndawonye, futhi nizihlele, futhi nizilungiselele, futhi nizingcwelise; yebo, cwebisani izinhliziyo zenu, futhi nihlanze izandla zenu nezinyawo zenu phambi kwami, ukuze nginenze nihlanzeke;

Ukuze ngifakaze ku Yihlo, noNkulunkulu wenu, noNkulunkulu wami, ukuthi nihlanzekile egazini lalesi sizukulwane esibi; ukuze ngigcwalise lesi sethembiso, lesi sethembiso esikhulu nesokugcina engisenze kini, uma sengithanda.
Futhi, ngininika umyalelo wokuthi niyoqhubeka nokukhuleka nokuzila ukudla kusuka kulesi sikhathi kuya phambili.
Futhi ngini nika umyalelo wokuthi nifundisane imfundiso yombuso.

Fundisani ngokukhuthala futhi umusa wami uzoba nani, ukuze nifundiseke ngokuphelele kokubonwa ngokucabanga kwengqondo, ngemigomo, ngemfundiso, ngomthetho wevangeli, kuzo zonke izinto eziphathelene nombuso kaNkulunkulu, nezifanele nina ukuthi niziqonde;

Ngokuphathelene nezinto ezise zulwini nezise mhlabeni, nezingaphansi komhlaba; izinto esezike zaba khona, izinto ezikhona, izinto okufanele zenzeke maduzane; izinto ezisekhaya, izinto eziphesheya; izimpi nokudideka kwezizwe, futhi nokwahlulela okuningi okusezweni; nolwazi lwamazwe nolwemibuso—
Ukuze nilunge ezintweni zonke uma sengiyonithumela futhi nokuthi niyokhulisa ubizo enginibizele kulo, futhi nomsebenzi wokufundisa ivangeli enginigunyaze ngawo.
Bhekani, nginithumela ukuyofakaza futhi nixwayise abantu, futhi kufanele ukuba wonke umuntu osexwayisiwe axwayise umakhelwane wakhe.
Ngakho-ke, basele bengena zaba, futhi izono zabo ziphezu kwamakhanda abo.
Lowo ongifuna masinya uyongithola, futhi ngeke iNkosi imshiye.

Ngakho-ke, hlalani, futhi nisebenze ngokukhuthala, ukuze nipheleliswe emsebenzini wenu ukuze nihambe phakathi kwa beZizwe okokugcina, ngangobuningi balabo umlomo weNkosi ozobasho, ukuba baqinisekise umthetho futhi banamathelise ubufakazi, ukulungiselela abangcwele ihora lokwahlulela elizofika;

Ukuze bakwazi ukuzisindisa olakeni lukaNkulunkulu, ukuchithakala kwesinengiso esibalindele ababi, kulomhlaba nasemhlabeni ozayo. Ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, labo abangesiwo amagosa okuqala mabaqhubeke esivinini uze umlomo weNkosi ubabize, ngokuba isikhathi sabo asikaka fiki okwamanje; izingubo zabo azihlanzekile egazini lalesi sizukulwane.
Hlalani kuyo ikululeko enikhululwe ngayo; ningahibeki esonweni, kodwa izandla zenu mazihlanzeke, ize ifike iNkosi.

Ngokuba kungakadluli izinsuku eziningi umhlaba uzozamazama futhi untengezele njengomuntu ophuzile; futhi ilanga lizobufihla ubuso balo, futhi lenqabe ukunika ukukhanya; nenyanga iyoba njenge gazi; nezinkanyezi ziyothukuthela kakhulu, futhi ziyozilahla phansi njengomkhiwane owe emthini.
Futhi ngemuva kobufakazi benu kuza ulaka nentukuthelo phezu kwabantu.
Ngokuba ngemuva kobufakazi benu kuza ubufakazi bokuzamazama komhlaba, okuzoletha ukububula phakathi kwakhe, futhi abantu bayowa phansi ngeke bakwazi ukuma.
Futhi kuza ubufakazi bezwi lokuduma okuningi, nezwi lemibani, nezwi leziphepho, nezwi lamagagasi olwande ezifukula ngaphezulu kwemikhawulo yawo.
Futhi zonke izinto ziyoba yisiyaluyalu; futhi nakanjani, abantu bayophela amandla; ngokuba ukwesaba kuyoba kubantu bonke.

Futhi izingelosi ziyondiza emkhathini wezulu, zisho ngezwi elikhulu, zikhalisa icilongo likaNkulunkulu, zithi: Lungisani, lungisani, O nina bantu basemhlabeni; ngokuba ukwahlulela kweNkosi yethu sekufikile. Bhekani, futhi bheka, uMyeni uyeza; phumani niyomhlangabeza.
Futhi masinyane kuyobonakala ezulwini isibonakaliso esikhulu, futhi bonke abantu bayosibona ndawonye.

Futhi enye ingelosi iyoshaya icilongo layo, ithi: Lelo bandla elikhulu, unina wezinengiso, owenze zonke izizwe ziphuze iwayini lolaka lokuhlobonga kwakhe, ohlupha abangcwele baNkulunkulu, ochitha igazi labo—ohlezi phezu kwamanzi amaningi, naphezu kweziqhingi zolwandle—bhekani, ungu khula lomhlaba; useboshwe izinyanda; amaketango akhe asenziwe aqina, akukho muntu ongawaqaqa; ngakho-ke, uselungele ukushiswa. Futhi iyoshaya icilongo layo isikhathi eside futhi kakhulu, futhi zonke izizwe ziyolizwa.

Futhi kuyoba khona ukuthula du ezulwini isikhathi sengxenye yehora; futhi masishane emuva kwalokho ikhethini lezulu liyovulwa, njengo mqulu uvulwa emva kokuba ubugoqiwe, futhi ubuso beNkosi buyokwambulwa.
Futhi abangcwele abasemhlabeni, abaphilayo, bayophiliswa futhi bayohlwithwa ukuyomhlangabeza.
Futhi labo abalale emathuneni abo bayophuma, ngokuba amathuna abo ayovulwa; futhi nabo bayohlwithwa ukuyomhlangabeza phakathi kwensika yezulu—

BangabaKristu, izithelo zokuqala, labo abayokwehla naye kuqala, futhi labo abasemhlabeni futhi nasemathuneni abo, abangabokuqala ukuhlwithwa ukumhlangabeza; futhi konke lokhu ngezwi lokukhala kwecilongo lengelosi kaNkulunkulu.

Futhi emva kwalokhu enye ingelosi iyokhalisa, okuyicilongo lesibili; futhi bese kuza ukukhululwa kwalabo abangabaKristu ekuzeni kwakhe, abafumane ingxenye yabo kulelo tilongo elilungiselwe bona, ukuze bemukele ivangeli, futhi bahlulelwe njengabantu enyameni.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, elinye icilongo liyokhala, okungelesi thathu icilongo; futhi emva kwalokho kuza imimoya yabantu abazokwa hlulelwa, futhi abatholwe benecala;
Futhi yibo bonke laba abafileyo; futhi abaphili kuze kube inkulungwane yeminyaka iyaphela, ngeke futhi, kuze kube sekupheleni komhlaba.
Futhi elinye icilongo liyokhala, okungelesine icilongo, lithi: Kukhona abaphakathi kwalabo okufanele basale kuze kube yilolo suku olukhulu nolokugcina, ngisho ukuphela, abayohlala belokhu bengcolile.
Futhi elinye icilongo liyokhala, okungele sihlanu icilongo, okungeye sihlanu ingelosi ezisa ivangeli laphakade—indiza emkhathini wezulu, kuzo zonke izizwe, izihlobo, izilimi, nabantu;

Futhi lokhu kuyoba ukukhala kwecilongo lakhe, lithi kubo bonke abantu, ezulwini nasemhlabeni, futhi nakulabo abangaphansi komhlaba—ngokuba zonke izindlebe ziyolizwa, futhi wonke amadolo ayoguqa, futhi zonke izilimi ziyovuma, ngesikhathi bezwa ukukhala kwecilongo, lithi: Mesabeni uNkulunkulu, nimnike inkazimulo ohlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi, phakade naphakade; ngokuba ihora lokwahlulela kwakhe selifikile.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, enye ingelosi iyokhalisa elayo icilongo, okungeye sithupha ingelosi, ithi: Usewile ophuzise izizwe zonke iwayini lolaka lokuhlobonga kwakhe; usewile, usewile!

Futhi phezu kwalokho, enye ingelosi iyokhalisa elayo icilongo, okungeye sikhombisa ingelosi, ithi: Kufeziwe; kufeziwe! IMvana kaNkulunkulu inqobile futhi yanyathela isikhamo sewayini iyodwa, ngisho isikhamo sewayini lentukuthelo yolaka lukaNkulunkulu uMninimandla Onke.
Futhi emva kwalokho izingelosi ziyoqheliswa ngenkazimulo yamandla akhe, futhi abangcwele bayogcwaliswa ngenkazimulo yakhe, futhi bafumane ifa labo futhi benziwe balingane naye.

Futhi emva kwalokho ingelosi yokuqala iyophinde iyokhalise icilongo layo emadlebeni abo bonke abaphilayo, futhi yambule izenzo eziyimfihlo zabantu, futhi nemisebenzi emikhulu kaNkulunkulu ngeminyaka eyinkulungwane yokuqala.

Futhi emva kwalokho ingelosi yesibili iyokhalisa elayo icilongo, futhi yambule izenzo eziyimfihlo zabantu, nemicabango nemizindlo yezinhliziyo zabo, futhi nemisebenzi emikhulu kaNkulunkulu ngeminyaka eyinkulungwane yesibili—

Njalo njalo, kuze kube yingelosi yesikhombisa ikhalisa icilongo layo; futhi iyoma ngokugqamileyo emhlabathini naphezu kolwandle, futhi ifunge egameni lalowo ohlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi, ukuthi akuseyikuba khona sikhathi; futhi uSathane uyoboshwa, leyonyoka endala, ebizwa ngodeveli, futhi ngeke adedelwe isikhathi esiyiminyaka eyinkulungwane.
Futhi emva kwalokho uyodedelwa isikhathi esincane, ukuze aqoqe ndawonye amabutho akhe.
Futhi uMikayeli, ingelosi yesikhombisa, ngisho ingelosi enkulu, iyoqoqa ndawonye amabutho ayo, ngisho izixuku zasezulwini.
Futhi udeveli uyoqoqa ndawonye amabutho akhe; ngisho izixuku zesihogo, futhi uyoza phezulu ukuzolwa noMikayeli namabutho akhe.
Futhi emva kwalokho kuza impi kaNkulunkulu omkhulu; futhi udeveli namabutho akhe bayophonswa endaweni yabo, ukuze bangaphinde babe namandla phezu kwabangcwele.
Ngokuba uMikayeli uzobalwela izimpi zabo, futhi uzomnqoba lowo ofuna isihlalo sobukhosi salowo ohlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi, ngisho iMvana.
Lena yinkazimulo kaNkulunkulu, neyaba ngcwelisiwe; futhi abasoze baphinde bakubona ukufa.
Ngakho-ke, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, bahlobo bami, bizani umhlanagano wenu onesizotha, njengoba nginiyalile.

Futhi njengoba bonke bengenalo ukholo, funani ngokukhuthala futhi nifundisane amazwi okuhlakanipha; yebo, funani ezincwadini ezinhle kakhulu amazwi okuhlakanipha; funani ukuthola ulwazi, ngisho ngokufunda futhi nangokukholwa.

Zihleleni; lungisani konke okudingekayo; futhi nimise indlu, ngisho indlu yokukhuleka, indlu yokuzila ukudla, indlu yokukholwa, indlu yokuthola ulwazi, indlu yenkazimulo, indlu ehlelekile, indlu kaNkulunkulu;
Ukuze ukungena kwenu kube segameni leNkosi; ukuze ukuphuma kwenu kube segameni leNkosi; ukuze konke ukubingelelana kwenu kube segameni leNkosi, ngezandla eziphakanyiselwe koPhakeme kaKhulu.

Ngakho-ke, phezani kuzo zonke izinkulumo zenu eziyize, kulo lonke uhleko, kuzo zonke izinkanuko zenu, kukho konke ukuzikhukhumeza kwenu nokukhonza kwenu ukudlala, futhi nakuzo zonke izenzo zenu ezimbi.

Bekani phakathi kwenu ozofundisa, futhi bonke mabangabi ngabakhulumeli babantu ngesikhathi esisodwa; kodwa makukhulume oyedwa ngesikhathi futhi bonke mabalalele akushoyo, ukuze uma bonke sebekhulumile nakhane nonke, futhi ukuze wonke umuntu abe nelungelo elilinganayo.
Bonani ukuthi niyathandana; phezani ukufisa izinto zabanye abantu; fundani ukuphana njengokuba ivangeli lisho.

Phezani ukuvilapha; phezani ukungahlanzeki; phezani ukutholana amaphutha; phezani ukulala kade kunokudingekile; lalani masinya, ukuze ningakhathali; vukani masinya, ukuze imizimba yenu nezingqondo zenu zivuseleleke.
Futhi phezu kwazo zonke izinto, zembathiseni ngesibopho sesihe, njengengubo, okuyisibopho sokuphelela du nokuthula.
Khulekani njalo, ukuze ningadangali, ngize ngifike. Bhekani, futhi bheka, ngiza masinyane, futhi nginamukele kimi. Amen.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, uhlelo lwendlu elungiselelwa ubumongameli besikole sabaphrofethi, emiselwe ukubafundisa ezintweni zonke ezibafanele, ngisho yabo bonke abasezikhundleni bebandla, noma ngamanye amazwi, labo ababizelwe emisebenzini ebandleni, kusuka kubaphristi abakhulu, ngisho kuya phansi kumadikoni—
Futhi lolu kuyoba wuhlelo lwendlu yobumongameli besikole: Lowo obekwe ukuba ngumongameli, noma ngofundisayo, uyotholwa eme endaweni yakhe, endlini eyolungiselwa yena.
Ngakho-ke, uyoba ngowokuqala endlini kaNkulunkulu, endaweni lapho ibandla endlini lingawezwa kahle amazwi akhe nangokucacile, futhi ngaphandle koku khulumela phezulu.
Futhi uma efika endlini kaNkulunkulu, ngokuba kufanele abe ngowokuqala kuleyondlu—bhekani, lokhu kuhle, ukuze abe yisibonelo—
Maka zinikele ngomkhuleko eguqe ngamadolo phambi kukaNkulunkulu, ukubonakalisa noma ukukhumbula isivumelwano saphakade.
Futhi uma kukhona oyokuza emva kwakhe, umfundisi makasukume, futhi, nezandla eziphakanyiselwe ezulwini, yebo, ngisho ziqondile, abingelele umfowabo noma umzalwane ngalamazwi:

Awusiye wena umfowethu noma nina abazalwane na? Ngiyakubingelela egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu, ngesifaniso noma ngokukhumbula isivumelwano saphakade, okuyisivumelwano engikwamukela ngaso ukuba uhlanganyele, ngokuzimisela okumileyo, okunganyakaziseki, futhi okungaguqukiyo, ukuba ngumhlobo nomfowenu ngomusa kaNkulunkulu ngezibopho zothando, ukuhamba kuyo yonke imiyalelo kaNkulunkulu ngokungasoleki, ngokubonga, phakade naphakade. Amen.
Futhi lowo otholwe engafanelwe yilesi sibingelelo ngeke abe nendawo phakathi kwenu; ngokuba aniyuku vumela ukuba indlu yami ingcoliswe uye.

Futhi lowo ongenayo futhi ethembekile phambi kwami, futhi engumfowenu, noma bengabazalwane, bayobingelela umongameli noma umfundis ngezandla eziphakamiselwe ezulwini, ngomkhuleko nesivumelwano esifanayo, noma ngokuthi Amen, ngesifaniso esifanayo.
Bhekani, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, lokhu kuyisibonelo kini sokubingelelana endlini kaNkulunkulu, esikoleni sabaphrofethi.

Futhi nibizwe ukwenza lokhu ngomkhuleko nangokubonga, njengokunikwa wuMoya eniyokusho kukho konke enikwenzayo endlini yeNkosi, esikoleni sabaphrofethi, ukuze ibe yindawo engcwele, itabernakeli likaMoya oNgcwele ukuze nakhiwe.
Futhi aniyukwamukela muntu phakathi kwenu kulesi sikole ngaphandle uma ehlanzekile egazini lalesi sizukulwane;
Futhi uyokwamukelwa ngesimiso soku gezwa kwezinyawo, ngokuba samiselwa lokhu isimiso sokugezwa kwezinyawo.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, isimiso sokugezwa kwezinyawo kufanele senziwe ngumongameli, noma igosa elengamele ibandla.
Kufanele siqaliswe ngomkhuleko; futhi emva kokudla isinkwa newayini, kufanele akhwice njenge sibonelo esinikiwe esahlukweni seshumi nantathu sobufakazi bukaJohane ngokuphathelene nami. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/89.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 89
chapter_summary: 1–9, Ukusetshenziswa kwewayini, iziphuzo ezidakayo, ugwayi, neziphuzo ezishisayo kunqatshelwe; 10–17, Amakhambi, izithelo, inyama, nokudla okusanhlamvu kubekelwe ukusetshenziswa ngabantu nezilwane; 18–21, Ukuhlonipha umthetho wevangeli, kuhlangene neZwi lokuHlakanipha, kuletha izibusiso zasemhlabeni nezikamoya.

verses.text: IZwi lokuHlakanipha, ukuze kuzuze umkhandlu wabaphristi abakhulu, owawuhlangene eKirtland, nebandla, futhi nabangcwele eSiyoni—

Lithunyelwe njengesi bingelelo; hhayi njengomyalelo noma incindezelo, kodwa ngesambulo futhi nangezwi lokuhlakanipha, litshengisa uhlelo nentando kaNkulunkulu ngensindiso yasemhlabeni yabo bonke abangcwele ezinsukwini zokugcina—
Linikezwe ukuba libe ngumgomo onesethembiso, lilinganiselwe ababuthakathaka nababuthakathaka kakhulu babo bonke abangcwele, ababizwa noma abangabizwa ngabangcwele.

Bhekani, ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi kini: Ngenxa yobubi nezinhloso ezikhona nezizoba khona ezinhliziyweni zabantu abenza uzungu ngezinsuku zokugcina, ngini xwayisile, futhi nganixwayisa ngaphambili, ngokuni nika lelizwi lokuhlakanipha ngesambulo—

Ukuthi kangangoba noma yimuphi umuntu ophuza iwayini noma isiphuzo esidakayo phakathi kwenu, bhekani lokhu akukuhle, futhi akwamukelekile emehlweni kaYihlo, kuphela uma nihlangana ndawonye ukunikela izidlo ezingcwele phambi kwakhe.
Futhi, bhekani, leli kuyoba yiwayini, yebo, iwayini elicwebileyo lezithelo zesivini, enizenzele nina.
Futhi, phezu kwalokho, iziphuzo ezidakayo ukuzona ezesisu, kodwa ezokuhlanza imizimba yenu.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ugwayi akuwona owomzimba, noma wesisu, futhi awumulungele umuntu, kodwa uyikhambi lemihuzuko nazo zonke izinkomo ezigulayo, ukuba usetshenziswe ngokwahlulela nangekhono.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, iziphuzo ezishisayo akuzona ezomzimba noma zesisu.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, wonke amakhambi aphilisayo uNkulunkulu uwabekele isimo somzimba, imvelo, nokusetshenziswa ngumuntu—
Lonke ikhambi lisetshenziswe ngesikhathi salo, naso sonke isithelo ngesikhathi saso; zonke zisetshenziswe ngobuhlakani nokubonga.
Yebo, inyama yezilwane neyezinyoni zomkhathi, mina, iNkosi, ngizibekele ukusetsheziswa ngumuntu ngokubonga; nokho kufanele zisetshenziswe ngokonga;
Futhi kuyajabulisa kimi ukuthi zingasetshenziswa, kuphela ngezikhathi zasebusika, noma kubanda, noma kunendlala.

Konke ukudla okusanhlamvu kubekelwe ukusetshenziswa ngumuntu nezilwane, kube wuzime lwempilo, kungekona okomuntu kuphela kodwa kungokwezilwane zasendle, nezinyoni zezulu, nazo zonke izilwane zasendle ezigijimayo noma ezihaqazelayo emhlabeni;
Futhi lezi uNkulunkulu uzenzele ukusetshenziswa ngumuntu ngezikhathi zendlala nezokulamba okukhulu.
Konke ukudla okusanhlamvu kulungile njengokudla komuntu; njengezithelo zesivini nazo; lokho okuthela izithelo, noma emhlabathini noma ngaphezu komhlabathi—

Nokho, amabele ngawomuntu, nommbila ngowenkunzi, izinhlamvu ezidliwayo ngezehhashi, nohlobo lwamabele ngolwezinyoni nezingulube, nazo zonke izilwane zasendle, okusanhlamvu okudliwayo okwazo zonke izilwane ezifuywayo, kanye neziphuzo ezingadakiyo, ngokunjalo nokunye okusanhlamvu.
Futhi bonke abangcwele abakhumbula ukugcina futhi benze lokhu okushiwoyo, behamba ngokuhlonipha imiyalelo, bayofumana impilo enkabeni yabo nomkantsha emathanjeni abo;
Futhi bayofumana ukuhlakanipha namagugu amakhulu olwazi, ngisho amagugu afihliwe;
Futhi bayogijima bangakhathali, futhi bayohamba bangapheli amandla.
Futhi mina, iNkosi, ngibanika isethembiso, sokuthi ingelosi ebhubhisayo iyodlula ngakubo, njengabantwana bakwa-Israyeli, futhi ingababulali. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/90.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 90
chapter_summary: 1–5, Izikhiye zombuso zibekwa kuJoseph Smith futhi ngaye eBandleni; 6–7, USidney Rigdon noFrederick G. Williams kufanele basebenze kubuMongameli bokuQala; 8–11, Ivangeli kufanele lishunyayelwe ezizweni zikaIsrayeli, kwabeZizwe, nakumaJuda, wonke umuntu elizwa ngolimi lwakhe; 12–18, UJoseph Smith nabeluleki bakhe kufanele balungise ibandla lihleleke; 19–37, Abantu abahlukahlukene belulekwa yiNkosi ukuba bahambe ngobuqotho futhi basebenze embusweni Wayo.

verses.text: Isho kanje iNkosi, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe ndodana yami, uthethelelwe izono zakho, ngokwesicelo sakho, ngokuba imikhuleko yakho nemikhuleko yabazalwane bakho ifikile ezindlebeni zami.
Ngakho-ke, ubusisiwe kusuka manje wena ophethe izikhiye zombuso ezinikwe kuwe; umbuso lowo osuvela okokugcina.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, izikhiye zalombuso ngeke zithathwe kuwe, ngesikhathi usesemhlabeni, nasemhlabeni ozayo;
Nokho, ngawe izambulo ziyonikezwa omunye, yebo, ngisho ebandleni.

Futhi bonke labo abafumana izambulo zikaNkulunkulu, mabaqaphele ukuthi baziphethe kanjani hleze zithathwe njengezinto ezingabalulekile, futhi babekwe icala, futhi bakhubeke bawe uma sekwehla iziphepho, nemimoya ivunguza, nezimvula zehla, futhi zishaya phezu kwendlu yabo.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kubazalwane bakho, uSidney Rigdon noFrederick G. Williams, zithethelelwe izono zabo nabo, futhi sebebalwa njengaba lingana nawe ekuphatheni izikhiye zalombuso wokugcina;
Njengokuphatha kwakho izikhiye ze sikole sabaphrofethi, engiyale ukuba sihlelwe;
Ukuze ngalokho bapheleliswe emsebenzini wabo wokusindiswa kweSiyoni, nokwezizwe zikaIsrayeli, nokwabeZizwe, ngobuningi babo abayokholwa;
Ukuze ngokuphatha kwakho balamukele izwi, futhi ngokuphatha kwabo izwi lihambe liye ekupheleni komhlaba, kwa beZizwe kuqala, futhi emva kwalokho, bhekani, futhi bheka, bayophendukela kumaJuda.
Futhi emva kwalokho kufika usuku lapho ingalo yeNkosi iyokwembulwa khona ngamandla ekukholwiseni izizwe, izizwe ezingabahedeni, indlu ka Josefa, ngevangeli lensindiso yabo.

Ngokuba kuyokwenzeka ngalolo suku, ukuthi wonke umuntu uyokuzwa ukuphelela kwevangeli ngolimi lwakhe, ngalabo abagcotshelwe kula mandla, ngokuholwa nguMduduzi, othunyelwe kubo ukuze kwambulwe uJesu Kristu.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngininika umyalelo wokuthi niqhubeke emsebenzini nakubo ubumongameli.
Futhi uma senikuqedile ukuhumusha abaphrofethi, kusuka ngaleso sikhathi niyokwengamela izindaba zebandla nezesikole;
Futhi izikhathi ngezikhathi, njengoba kuyobonakaliswa nguMduduzi, nifumane izambulo ukusombulula izimfihlakalo zombuso;
Futhi nilungise amabandla ahleleke, futhi nifunde futhi nithole ulwazi, futhi nijwayelane nezincwadi ezinhle, futhi nezilimi, nezindlela zokukhuluma, nabantu.
Futhi lokhu kuyokuba ngumsebenzi wenu nomsebenzi wenu wokufundisa ivangeli izimpilo zenu zonke, ukwengamela umkhandlu, futhi nilungise zonke izindaba zaleli bandla nombuso zihleleke.
Ningabi namahloni, futhi ningadunyazwa; kodwa yalekani kukho konke ukuzidla nokuzazisa kwenu, ngokuba kuletha isicupho kini.
Lungisani izindlu zenu zihleleke; susani ukuvilapha noku ngahlanzeki kube kude nani.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, makube khona indawo enikiweyo, ngokushesha okungenzeka, yomndeni womeluleki nomabhalane wakho, ngisho uFrederick G. Williams.
Futhi inceku yami esikhulile, uJoseph Smith, oMdala, makaqhubeke nokuhlala nomndeni wakhe endaweni lapho ahlala khona manje; futhi mayingadayiswa uze umlomo weNkosi usho.
Futhi umeluleki wami, ngisho uSidney Rigdon, makahlale lapho ehlala khona uze umlomo weNkosi usho.
Futhi umbhishobhi makafune ngokukhuthala ukuthola umphatheli, futhi makube umuntu one ngcebo ebekiwe—umuntu kaNkulunkulu, futhi onokholo oluqinile—
Ukuze ngalokho akwazi ukukhokha zonke izikweletu; ukuze indlu yengcebo yeNkosi ingangeni ehlazweni phambi kwamehlo abantu.
Funani ngokukhuthala, khulekani njalo, futhi nikholwe, futhi zonke izinto ziyosebenzelana kube ngokuhle kini, uma nihamba ngobuqotho futhi nikhumbula isivumelwano enivumelane ngaso omunye komunye.
Imindeni yenu mayibe mincane, ikakhulukazi owenceku yami esikhulile uJoseph Smith, oMdala, njengoku phathelene nalabo abangebona abemindeni yenu;
Ukuze lezo zinto eninikwe zona, ukwenza umsebenzi wami wenzeke, zingathathwa kini zinikwe labo abangazifanele—
Futhi ngalokho nivimbeleke ekufezeni lezo zinto enginiyale ngazo.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, kuyintando yami ukuthi incekukazi yami uVienna Jaques afumane imali yokuthwala izindleko zakhe, futhi aye ezweni laseSiyoni;
Futhi esalayo imali ingangcweliselwa mina, futhi anikwe umvuzo ngesikhathi sami esifanele.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, kuhle emehlweni ami ukuba aye ezweni laseSiyoni, futhi afumane ifa esandleni sikambhishobhi;
Ukuze ahlale ngokuthula kangangoba ethembekile, futhi angavilaphi ezinsukwini zakhe zokuphila kusuka ngaleso sikhathi.

Futhi bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, niyowubhala lomyalelo, futhi niwusho kubazalwane benu eSiyoni, nibabingelele ngothando, ukuthi nginibizile futhi ukuba nengamele iSiyoni ngesikhathi sami esifanele.
Ngakho-ke, mabapheze ukungikhathaza ngaloludaba.
Bhekani, ngithi kini abazalwane benu eSiyoni sebeqala ukuphenduka, futhi nezingelosi ziyathokoza ngabo.

Nokho, angijabulile ngezinto eziningi; futhi angithokozile ngenceku yami uWilliam E. McLellin, nangenceku yami uSidney Gilbert; ngokunjalo nombhishobhi, nabaningi banezinto eziningi okufanele baphenduke kuzo.
Kodwa ngiqinisile ngithi kini, mina, iNkosi, ngizolwa ne Siyoni, futhi nginxuse labo abaqinile bakhe, futhi ngimjezise aze anqobe futhi abe ngo hlanzekile kimi.
Ngokuba akanaku suswa endaweni yakhe. Mina, iNkosi, sengikukhulumile lokhu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/91.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 91
chapter_summary: 1–3, I-Aphokhrifa ihunyushwe ngokuyikho ikakulu kodwa iqukethe izijobelelo zamagama eziningi ngezandla zabantu ezingelona iqiniso; 4–6, Isiza labo abakhanyiselwe nguMoya.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi kini nge-Aphokhrifa—Ziningi izinto eziqukethwe kuyo eziliqiniso, futhi ikakhulu ihunyushwe ngokuyikho;
Ziningi izinto eziqukethwe kuyo ezingelona iqiniso, eziyizijobelelo ngezandla zabantu.
Ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, akudingekile ukuba i-Aphokhrifa ihunyushwe.
Ngakho-ke, lowo oyifundayo, makaqonde, ngokuba uMoya uyaliveza iqiniso;
Futhi lowo okhanyiselwe nguMoya uyofumana inzuzo kuyo;
Futhi lowo ongafumani ukukhanyiselwa nguMoya, ngeke asizakale. Ngakho-ke akudingekile ukuba ihunyushwe. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/92.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 92
chapter_summary: 1–2, INkosi inika umyalelo ngokwamukelwa ohlelweni lokuba munye.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi, nginika uhlelo lokuba-munye, oluhlelwe ngokuvumelana nomyalelo onikezwe phambilini, isambulo nomyalelo ngenceku yami uFrederick G. Williams, wokuthi nizomamukela ohlelweni. Engikusho koyedwa ngikusho kubo bonke.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kuwe nceku yami uFrederick G. Williams, uyokuba yilungu eliphilayo kuloluhlelo; futhi kangangoba uthembekile ekugcineni yonke imiyalelo yaphambilini uyobusiswa ingunaphakade. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/93.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 93
chapter_summary: 1–5, Bonke abathembekileyo bazoyibona iNkosi; 6–18, UJohane wafakaza ngokuthi iNdodana kaNkulunkulu yanda emseni yaze yafumana ukuphelela kwenkazimulo kaBaba; 19–20, Abantu abathembekileyo, abanda emseni, nabo bazofumana ukuphelela Kwakhe; 21–22, Labo abazelwe ngoKristu bayiBandla leNkosana; 23–28, UKristu wafumana ukuphelela kwalo lonke iqiniso, futhi umuntu ngokuhlonipha naye angenza kanjalo; 29–32, Umuntu ekuqaleni wayeno Nkulunkulu; 33–35, Imvelo ngeyaphakade, futhi umuntu angafumana ukuphelela kwenjabulo kulo uVuko; 36–37, Inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu ingukuqonda; 38–40, Abantwana bamsulwa phambi kukaNkulunkulu ngenxa yokukhululwa nguKristu; 41–53, Abazalwane abangabaholi bayalwa ukuba balungise imindeni yabo ihleleke.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi: Kuyokwenzeka ukuthi wonke umuntu oshiya izono zakhe futhi oza kimi, futhi obiza igama lami, futhi othobela izwi lami, futhi ogcina imiyalelo yami, uyobubona ubuso bami futhi azi ukuthi nginguye;
Futhi nokuthi nginguku khanya okukhanyisa wonke umuntu oza emhlabeni;
Futhi nokuthi ngikuBaba, futhi uBaba ukimi, futhi uBaba nami simunye—
UBaba ukimi ngokuba wanginika ukuphelela kwakhe, futhi ngiyiNdodana ngokuba ngangise mhlabeni futhi ngenza inyama yami itabernakele, futhi ngahlala phakathi kwamadodana abantu.
Ngangise mhlabeni futhi ngafumana kuBaba, futhi imisebenzi yakhe yabonakaliswa ngokusobala.
Futhi uJohane wabona futhi wafakaza ngokuphelela kwe nkazimulo yami, futhi ukuphelela kobufakazi bukaJohane busazo kwembulwa emva kwalesi sikhathi.
Futhi wafakaza, ethi: Ngayibona inkazimulo yakhe, ukuthi wayekhona ekuqaleni, umhlaba ungakabi bikho;
Ngakho-ke, ekuqaleni uLizwi wayekhona, ngokuba wayenguLizwi, ngisho isithunywa sensindiso—
Ukukhanya no mHlengi womhlaba; uMoya weqiniso, oweza emhlabeni, ngokuba umhlaba wenziwa nguye, futhi kuye kwakukhona ukuphila kwabantu nokukhanya kwabantu.
Imihlaba yenziwa nguye; abantu benziwa nguye; zonke izinto zenziwa nguye, futhi ngendlela yakhe, futhi nangamasu akhe.

Futhi mina, uJohane, ngiyafakaza ukuthi ngabona inkazimulo yakhe, njengenkazimulo yoZelwe Yedwa kaBaba, ogcwele umusa neqiniso, ngisho uMoya weqiniso, oweza wazohlala enyameni, futhi wahlala phakathi kwethu.
Futhi mina, uJohane, ngabona ukuthi akakufumananga ukuphelela ekuqaleni, kodwa wafumana umusa ngenxa yomusa;
Futhi akafumananga ukuphelela ekuqaleni, kodwa waphikelela wanda ngomusa, waze wafumana ukuphelela;
Futhi ngalokho wabizwa ngeNdodana kaNkulunkulu, ngokuba akaku fumananga ukuphelela ekuqaleni.

Futhi mina, uJohane, ngiyafakaza, futhi bheka, amazulu avuleka, futhi uMoya oNgcwele wehlela phezu kwakhe ngesimo sejuba, futhi wahlala phezu kwakhe, futhi kwezwakala izwi liphuma ezulwini lithi: Lena yiNdodana yami ethandekayo.
Futhi mina, uJohane, ngifakaza ngokuthi wafumana ukuphelela kwenkazimulo kaBaba;
Futhi wafumana wonke amandla, ezulwini nasemhlabeni, futhi inkazimulo ka Baba yayinaye, ngokuba wayehlala kuye.
Futhi kuyokwenzeka, ukuthi uma nithembekile niyofumana ephelele indaba kaJohane.
Ngini nika lokhu engikushoyo ukuze niqonde futhi nazi ukuthi kukhozwa kanjani, futhi nazi ukuthi nikhonzani, ukuze nize kuBaba egameni lami, futhi ngesikhathi esifanele nifumane ukuphelela kwakhe.
Ngokuba uma nigcina imiyalelo yami niyokufumana ukuphelela kwakhe, futhi nikhazimuliswe kimi njengami kuBaba; ngakho-ke, ngithi kini, niyofumana umusa ngenxa yomusa.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngangikhona ekuqaleni noBaba, futhi ngiyi Nkosana;
Futhi bonke labo abazalwe ngami bangaba hlanganyela kuyo inkazimulo efanayo, futhi bayibandla leNkosana.
Nani nanikhona ekuqaleni noBaba; lokho okunguMoya, ngisho uMoya weqiniso;
Futhi iqiniso lingu lwazi lwezinto njengoba zinjalo, futhi njengoba zazinjalo, futhi njengoba zizoza;
Futhi noma yini engafani nalokhu ingumoya walowo omubi owayengu mqambi manga kwasekuqaleni.
UMoya weqiniso ungokaNkulunkulu. NginguMoya weqiniso, futhi uJohane wafakaza ngami, ethi: Wafumana ukuphelela kweqiniso, yebo, ngisho lonke iqiniso;
Futhi akukho muntu ofumana ukuphelela ngaphandle kokugcina imiyalelo yakhe.
Lowo ogcina imiyalelo yakhe ufumana iqiniso noku khanya, aze akhazimuliswe kulo iqiniso futhi azi izinto zonke.
Umuntu naye wayenoNkulunkulu ekuqaleni. Ukuqonda, noma ukukhanya kweqiniso, akuzange kudalwe noma kwenziwe, futhi impela ngeke kwaba njalo.
Lonke iqiniso lizimele kuleyondawo uNkulunkulu alibeke kuyo, ukuba lizenzele, njengakho konke ukuqonda nakho; kungenjalo akukho ukuba-khona.

Bhekani, kulokhu kukhona ilungelo lokukwazi ukuzikhethela lomuntu, futhi kulokhu kukhona ukubekwa icala komuntu; ngokuba lokho okwakukhona ekuqaleni kwambulwa ngokucacile kubo, futhi abakwamukeli ukukhanya.
Futhi wonke umuntu umoya wakhe ongakwemukeli ukukhanya unecala.
Ngokuba umuntu ungumoya. Imvelo ngeyaphakade, futhi umoya nemvelo, kuhlangene ngokungahlukaniseki, kufumana ukuphelela kwenjabulo;
Futhi uma kwehlukene, umuntu ngeke akwazi ukuthola ukuphelela kwe njabulo.
Imvelo iyitabernakeli likaNkulunkulu; yebo, umuntu uyitabernakeli likaNkulunkulu, ngisho amathempeli; futhi noma yiliphi ithempeli elingcolisiwe, uNkulunkulu uyolichitha lelo thempeli.
Inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu ingukuqonda, noma, ngamanye amagama, ukukhanya neqiniso.
Ukukhanya neqiniso kuyamshiya lowo omubi.
Umoya wawo wonke umuntu wawu ngenacala ekuqaleni; futhi uNkulunkulu esemkhululile umuntu ekuweni, abantu baphinda futhi, esimweni sobuntwana babo, baba msulwa phambi kukaNkulunkulu.
Futhi lowo omubi ufika athathe ukukhanya neqiniso, ngokungalaleli, kubantwana babantu, futhi ngenxa yosiko lokhokho babo.
Kodwa nginiyalile ukuba nikhulise abantwana benu ekukhanyeni naseqinisweni.
Kodwa ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, nceku yami uFrederick G. Williams, uqhubekile nokuba nalelicala;
Awuzange uba fundise abantwana bakho ukukhanya neqiniso, ngokwemiyalelo; futhi lowo omubi unamandla, njenga manje, phezu kwakho, futhi yikho lokhu okuyisi susa sokuhlupheka kwakho.
Manje ngikunika umyalelo—uma uzokhululwa uzolungisa indlu yakho ihleleke, ngokuba ziningi izinto ezingalungile endlini yakho.
Ngiqinisile, ngithi encekwini yami uSidney Rigdon, kwezinye izinto akayigcinanga imiyalelo ngokuphathelene nabantwana bakhe; ngakho-ke, lungisa kuqala indlu yakho ihleleke.
Ngiqinisile, ngithi encekwini yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, noma ngamanye amagama, ngizonibiza ngabahlobo, ngokuba ningabahlobo bami, futhi niyofumana ifa nami—
Nginibize ngezinceku ngenxa yomhlaba, futhi niyizinceku zabo ngenxa yami—
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kuJoseph Smith, omNcane—Awuyigcinanga imiyalelo, futhi kufanele usolwe phambi kweNkosi;
Umndeni wakho kufanele uphenduke futhi ushiye izinto ezithile, futhi unake ngokucophelela iziyalo zakho, noma basuswe endaweni yabo.
Engikusho koyedwa ngikusho kubo bonke; khulekani njalo hleze lowo omubi abe namandla kini, futhi anisuse endaweni yenu.

Inceku yami uNewel K. Whitney naye, umbhishobhi webandla, kudingeka asolwe, futhi alungise umndeni wakhe uhleleke, futhi aqiniseke ukuthi bakhuthele futhi benza imisebenzi yabo ekhaya, futhi bakhuleke njalo, noma bayosuswa endaweni yabo.

Manje, ngithi kini, bahlobo bami, inceku yami uSidney Rigdon makathathe uhambo lwakhe, futhi asheshise, futhi amemezele unyaka womusa weNkosi, nevangeli lokusindiswa, njengoba ngiyomnika azokusho; futhi nangomkhuleko wenu wokukholwa ngokuvumelana ngizomqinisa.

Futhi izinceku zami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, noFrederick G. Williams mabasheshe nabo, futhi bayonikezwa ngisho ngokomkhuleko wokukholwa; futhi kangangoba nigcina engikushoyo ngeke ninqotshwe kulomhlaba, noma emhlabeni ozayo.

Futhi, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, kuyintando yami ukuba nisheshise ukuhumusha imibhalo yami engcwele, futhi nokuthola ulwazi lomlando, nolwamazwe, nolwemibuso, nolwemithetho kaNkulunkulu nolwabantu, futhi konke lokhu ukuze kusindiswe iSiyoni. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/94.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 94
chapter_summary: 1–9, INkosi inika umyalelo omayelana nokwakhiwa kwendlu yomsebenzi wobuMongameli; 10–12, Indlu yokucindezela okubhaliweyo kufanele yakhiwe; 13–17, Amafa athile ayabiwa.

verses.text: Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, bahlobo bami, ngini nika umyalelo, wokuthi niyoqala umsebenzi wokuklama nokulungiselela isiqalo nesisekelo sedolobha lesi khonkwane seSiyoni, lapha ezweni laseKirtland, niqale endlini yami.
Futhi bhekani, kufanele kwenziwe ngesifanekiso engini nike sona.

Futhi ingxenye yokuqala engaseningizimu mayingcweliselwe mina ukuze kwakhiwa indlu yobumongameli, yomsebenzi wobumongameli, ekutholeni izambulo; neyokwenzela umsebenzi wobufundisi bo bumongameli, kuzo zonke izinto eziphathelene nebandla nombuso.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, iyokwakhiwa ibe isilinganiso samashumi ayisihlanu nanhlanu nangesilinganiso samashumi ayisithupha sezinyawo ububanzi nobude bayo, ingaphakathi legceke.
Futhi kuyokuba igceke eliphansi neliphezulu, ngokwesifanekiso eniyosinikwa emva kwalokhu.
Futhi iyongcweliselwa iNkosi kusuka esisekelweni sayo, ngokohlelo lobuphristi, ngokwesifanekiselo eniyonikwa sona emva kwalokhu.
Futhi yonke iyongcweliselwa iNkosi ukwenza umsebenzi wobumongameli.
Futhi aniyikuvumela into engahlanzekile ukuba ize kuyo; futhi inkazimulo yami iyoba lapho, futhi nami ngiyoba lapho.
Kodwa uma kuyoza kuyo into engahlanzekile, inkazimulo yami ngeke ibe lapho; futhi nami ngeke ngize kuyo.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ingxenye yesibili engaseningizimu iyongcweliselwa mina ukuze kwakhiwe indlu yami, yomsebenzi wokucindezela ukuhunyushwa kwemibhalo yami engcwele, nazo zonke izinto noma yiziphi engiyoniyala ngazo.
Futhi iyoba ngamashumi amahlanu nanhlanu ngamashumi ayisithupha nanhlanu ezinyawo ububanzi nobude bayo, egcekeni elingaphakathi; futhi kuyoba khona eliphansi neliphezulu igceke.

Futhi lendlu yonke iyongcweliselwa iNkosi kusuka esisekelweni sayo, ukweza umsebenzi wokucindezela, kuzo zonke izinto noma yini engiyoniyala ngayo, ibe ngcwele, ingangcoliswa, ngokwesifanekiselo ezintweni zonke njengoba niyonikezwa.
Futhi engxenyeni yesithathu inceku yami uHyrum Smith uyofumana ifa lakhe.
Futhi kweyokuqala neyesibili ingxenye ngasenyakatho izinceku zami uReynolds Cahoon noJared Carter bayothola amafa abo—
Ukuze benze umsebenzi engibabekele wona, ukuba babe yikomiti elakha izindlu zami, ngokomyalelo, mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, engininike wona.
Lezi zindlu zombili akufanele zakhiwe ngize ngininike umyalelo ngazo.
Manje angini niki lutho olunye kulesi sikhathi. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/95.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 95
chapter_summary: 1–6, AbaNgcwele bayasolwa ngokwehluleka kwabo ukwakha indlu yeNkosi; 7–10, INkosi ilangazelela ukusebenzisa indlu Yayo ukupha abantu Bayo amandla avela phezulu; 11–17, Lendlu kufanele ingcweliswe njengendawo yokukhonza nesikole sokufundisa abaPhostoli.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi kini enginithandayo, futhi engibathandayo ngiyaba jezisa futhi ukuze izono zabo zixolelwe, ngokuba ngesijeziso ngilungisa indlela yoku khululwa kwabo kuzo zonke izinto eziyi zilingo, futhi nginithandile—
Ngalokho-ke, kudingeka nijeziswe futhi nisoliwe phambi kobuso bami;
Ngokuba nonile kimi isono esikhulu, ngokuba aniwunakanga umyalelo omkhulu kuzo zonke izinto, engini nike wona ngokuphathelene nowakhiwa kwendlu yami;

Ukwenza ukulungiselela engihlela ngakho ukulungiselela abaphostoli bami ukuba bathene isivini sami okokugcina, ukuze ngeze isenzo sami esingajwayelekile, ukuze ngithele uMoya wami phezu kwayo yonke inyama—
Kodwa bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, baningi abagcotshiwe phakathi kwenu, engibabizile kodwa bambalwa kubo abakhethiweyo.
Labo abangakhethwanga bone isono esikhulu, ngokuba bahamba ebumnyameni kusemini.

Futhi ngaenxa yalokhu nganinika umyalelo wokuba nibize umhlangano wenu ozothileyo, ukuze ukuzila kwenu nokukhala kwenu kufinyelele ezindlebeni zikaJehova Sebawoti, ngokuhunyushwa okungukuthi, umdali wosuku lokuqala, isiqalo nesiphetho.
Yebo, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngini nike umyalelo wokuba kufanele nakhe indlu, kuleyondlu engihlele ukupha labo engibakhethileyo amandla asuka phezulu;
Ngokuba lesi yisethembiso sikaBaba kini; ngakho-ke nginiyala ukuba nihlale, njengabaphostoli bami eJerusalema.
Nokho, izinceku zami zonile isono esikhulu; futhi impikiswano yavuka esikoleni sabaphrofethi; okwaba kubi kakhulu kimi, kusho iNkosi yenu; ngakho-ke ngibaxoshile ukuze bajeziswe.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, kuyintando yami ukuba nakhe indlu. Uma nigcina imiyalelo yami niyokuba namandla okuyakha.
Uma ningayigcini imiyalelo yami, uthando lukaBaba ngeke luqhubeke nani, ngakho-ke niyohamba ebumnyameni.
Manje nakhu ukuhlakanipha, futhi nomqondo weNkosi—mayakhiwe indlu, hhayi ngendlela yomhlaba, ngokuba angini niki ukuba niphile ngendlela yomhlaba;
Ngakho-ke, mayakhiwe ngendlela engiyoyitshengisa kwabathathu benu, eniyobabeka futhi nibagcobe kulamandla.
Futhi ubukhulu bayo buyoba yisilinganiso samashumi amahlanu nanhlanu ububanzi, futhi mayibe yisilinganiso samashumi ayisithupha nanhlanu ubude, ingaphakathi legceke layo.

Futhi indawo engaphansi yegceke elingaphakathi mayingcweliselwe mina ukwenzela iminikelo yesidlo senu esingcwele, neyokushumayela kwenu, nokuzila kwenu, nokukhuleka kwenu, nokunikela ukulangazelela kwenu okungcwele kakhulu kimi, kusho iNkosi.

Futhi ingxenye ephezulu yegceke elingaphakathi mayingcweliselwe mina ukwenzela isikole sabaphostoli bami, kusho iNdodana u-Ahman; noma ngamanye amagama, u-Alfa; noma, ngamanye amazwi u-Omega; ngisho uJesu Kristu iNkosi yenu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/96.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 96
chapter_summary: 1, IsiKhonkwane saseKirtland seSiyoni kufanele senziwe siqine; 2–5, Umbhishobhi kufanele ahlukanisele abaNgcwele amafa; 6–9, UJohn Johnson kufanele abe yilungu lohlelo lokuba-munye.

verses.text: Bhekani, ngithi kini, nakhu ukuhlakanipha, eniyokwazi ngakho ukuthi nenze kanjani ngokuphathelene naloludaba, ngokuba ngibona kufanele ukuthi lesi sikhonkwane engisimisile ukuze kuqine iSiyoni senziwe siqine.
Ngakho-ke, inceku yami uNewel K. Whitney makaphathe leyondawo eshiwo phakathi kwenu, kuyo engihlele ukwakha indlu yami engcwele.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, mayihlukaniswe izingxenye, ngokuhlakanipha, ukuze kuzuze labo abafuna amafa, njengoba kuyonqunywa emkhandlwini phakathi kwenu.
Ngakho-ke, qinisekani ukuthi niluphatha ngokuqaphela loludaba, futhi leyo ngxenye edingekile ukuze kuzuze uhlelo lwami, ngenhloso yokuletha izwi lami kubantwana babantu.

Ngokuba bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, lokhu ngokufanele kakhulu kimi, ukuthi izwi lami lihambe liye kubantwana babantu, ngenhloso yokuthambisa izinhliziyo zabantwana babantu ukuze nizuze. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, kungukuhlakanipha futhi kufanelekile kimi, ukuba inceku yami uJohn Johnson umnikelo wakhe engiwemukele, futhi nemikhuleko yakhe ngiyizwile, enginika kuye isethembiso sokuphila okuphakade kangangoba egcina imiyalelo yami kusuka manje—
Ngokuba ungowozalo luka Josefa futhi uzofumana izibusiso zezethembiso ezenziwa koyise—
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngibona kufanele ukuba abe yilungu lalolu hlelo, ukuba asize ekuletheni izwi lami kubantwana babantu.
Ngakho-ke niyomgcobela kulesi sibusiso, futhi uyofuna ngokukhuthala ukususa izikweletu eziphezu kwaleyondlu eshiwo phakathi kwenu, ukuze ahlale kuyo. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/97.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 97
chapter_summary: 1–2, Abaningi babaNgcwele eSiyoni (esiFundeni iJackson, eMissouri) babusisiwe ngokuthembeka kwabo; 3–5, UParley P.
