Pratt uyanconywa ngomsebenzi wakhe esikoleni eSiyoni; 6–9, Labo abagcina izivumelwano zabo bemukelekile eNkosini; 10–17, Indlu kufanele yakhiwe eSiyoni lapho abanenhliziyo ecwebileyo bezombona khona uNkulunkulu; 18–21, ISiyoni ngabacwebileyo ngenhliziyo; 22–28, ISiyoni izophunyula esijezisweni seNkosi uma ithembekile.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, ngithi kini bahlobo bami, ngikhuluma kini ngezwi lami, ngisho izwi loMoya wami, ukuze nginitshengise intando yami ngabazalwane benu abasezweni lase Siyoni, abaningi babo abazithobe ngokweqiniso futhi bafuna ngokukhuthala ukuba bafunde ukuhlakanipha nokuthola iqiniso.

Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, babusisiwe abanjalo, ngokuba bayokufumana lokho; ngokuba mina, iNkosi, ngitshengisa umusa kubo bonke abamnene, futhi nakubo bonke engizobasthengisa umusa, ukuze ngibe ngongenacala uma ngibaletha ekwahlulelweni.
Bhekani, ngithi kini, ngokuphathelene nesikole eSiyoni, mina, iNkosi, ngithokozile kakhulu ukuba kobekhona isikole eSiyoni, futhi nangenceku yami uParley P. Pratt, ngokuba uhlala kimi.
Futhi kangangoba eqhubeka ehlala kimi uyoqhubeka nokwengamela isikole ezweni laseSiyoni ngize ngimnike eminye imiyalelo.
Futhi ngizombusisa ngezibusiso eziningi, ekuchasiseni yonke imibhalo engcwele nezimfihlo ukuze kwakheke isikole, nebandla eSiyoni.
Futhi kwabasele besikole, mina, iNkosi, ngiyathanda ukutshengisa umusa; nokho, kunalabo okudingeka bajeziswe, futhi imisebenzi yabo iyokwaziswa.
Izembe libekiwe empandeni yemithi; futhi yonke imithi engatheli izithelo ezinhle iyocekelwa phansi futhi iphoswe emlilweni. Mina, iNkosi, sengikukhulumile.

Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, bonke phakathi kwabo abaziyo ukuthi izinhliziyo zabo ziqotho, futhi zidabukile, futhi imimoya yabo idabukile, futhi bethanda ukugcina izivumelwano zabo ngoku nikela—yebo, wonke umnikelo mina, iNkosi, engiyowulayeza—bemukelekile kimi.
Ngokuba mina, iNkosi, ngiyobenza bathele njengesihlahla esithela kakhulu esitshalwe enhlabathini enhle, eduze nomthombo ocwebile, esikhipha isithelo esiyigugu kakhulu.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, kuyintando yami ukuthi indlu kufanele yakhelwe mina ezweni laseSiyoni, njenge sifanekiso engini nike sona.
Yebo, mayakhiwe ngokushesha, ngokweshumi kwabantu bami.
Bhekani, lokhu ngokweshumi futhi kungumnikelo mina, iNkosi, engiwudingayo ezandleni zabo, ukuze kwakhelwe mina indlu ukuze kusindiswe iSiyoni—
Kube yindawo yokubonga yabo bonke abangcwele, futhi kube yindawo yokufundisa bonke labo ababizelwe emsebenzini wobufundisi kukho konke ukubizwa nezikhundla zabo ezahlukene;

Ukuze bapheleliswe ekuqondeni ubufundisi babo, kokubonwa ngokucabanga kwengqondo, kumgomo, nasemfundisweni, kuzo zonke izinto eziphathelene nombuso kaNkulunkulu emhlabeni, izikhiye zalowo umbuso ezinikwe kini.
Futhi kangangoba abantu bami bengakhela indlu yami egameni leNkosi, futhi bengayivumeli into engahlanzekile ize kuyo, ukuze ingangcoliswa, inkazimulo yami iyohlala phezu kwayo;
Yebo, futhi nokuba-khona kwami kuyoba lapho, ngokuba ngiyoza kuyo, futhi bonke abanenhliziyo ecwebileyo abayoza kuyo bayombona uNkulunkulu.
Kodwa uma ingcolisiwe ngeke ngize kuyo, futhi nenkazimulo yami ngeke ibekhona lapho; ngokuba ngeke ngize emathempelini angcolileyo.
Manje, bhekani, uma iSiyoni yenza lezi zinto iyophumelela, futhi izandise futhi ikhazimule kakhulu, ibe nkulu, futhi isabeke kakhulu.

Futhi izizwe zomhlaba ziyomazisa, futhi ziyothi: Impela iSiyoni yidolobha likaNkulunkulu wethu, futhi impela uSiyoni ngeke awe, ngeke asuswe endaweni yakhe, ngokuba uNkulunkulu ulapho, nesandla seNkosi silapho;
Futhi ufungile ngamandla obukhulu bakhe ukuba abe yinsindiso yakhe no mbhoshongo wakhe ophakeme.
Ngakho-ke, ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi, iSiyoni mayijabule, ngokuba lena iSiyoni—abacwebileyo ngenhliziyo; ngakho-ke, iSiyoni mayijabule, ngesikhathi ababi beyolila.
Ngokuba bhekani, futhi bheka, impindiselo iyeza masinyane kwababi njengesivunguvungu; futhi ngubani oyophunyula kuyo na?
Isijeziso seNkosi siyodlula ngobusuku nasemini, futhi umbiko waso uyokhathaza bonke abantu; yebo, ngeke simiswe kuze kuze iNkosi;
Ngokuba intukuthelo yeNkosi iyokheleka ngokumelene nezinengiso zabo nakuyo yonke imisebenzi yabo yobubi.
Nokho, uSiyoni uyophunyula uma ezama ukwenza zonke izinto noma yini engimyale ngayo.
Kodwa uma engazami noma yini engimyale ngayo, ngizom vakashela ngokwemisebenzi yonke yakhe, ngosizi olukhulu, ngobhubhane, ngezinhlupho, ngenkemba, ngempindiselo, ngo mlilo oqothulayo.
Nokho, lokhu makufundwe kanye ezindlebeni zakhe, ukuthi mina, iNkosi, sengiwemukele umnikelo wakhe; futhi uma engeke esona futhi akukho nokukodwa kwalezi zinto okuyomehlela;
Futhi ngiyom busisa ngezibusiso, futhi ngiphindaphinde izibusiso eziningi phezu kwakhe, naphezu kwezizukulwane zakhe phakade naphakade, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/98.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 98
chapter_summary: 1–3, Izinhlupho zababaNgcwele zizoba nenzuzo kubo; 4–8, AbaNgcwele kufanele basekele umthetho sisekelo wezwe; 9–10, Abantu abaqotho, abahlakaniphile, nabalungile kufanele basekelwe ukusebenza kumkhandlu ophetheyo wezwe; 11–15, Labo abadela izimpilo zabo ngenxa yomsebenzi weNkosi bayoba nokuphila okuphakade; 16–18, Lahlani impi nimemezele ukuthula; 19–22, AbaNgcwele eKirtland bayasolwa futhi bayalwa ukuba baphenduke; 23–32, INkosi yambula imithetho Yayo ephathelene nokuhlushwa nobunzima okuthweswe abantu Bayo; 33–38, Impi ivumelekile kuphela uma iNkosi ilayeza ngayo; 39–48, AbaNgcwele kufanele bazixolele izitha zabo, okuzothi uma ziphenduka, nazo ziphunyule empindiselweni yeNkosi.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini bahlobo bami, ningesabi, izinhliziyo zenu maziduduzeke; yebo, thokozani njalonjalo, futhi kukho konke bongani;
Uma nisalindile ngokubekezela eNkosini, ngokuba imikhuleko yenu ingenile ezindlebeni zikaJehova Sebawoti, futhi ibhaliwe ngokuvunywa nobufakazi—iNkosi ifungile futhi yamisa ukuthi iyonikwa.
Ngakho-ke, inikeza lesi sethembiso kini, ngesivumelwano esingaguqulekiyo sokuthi iyofezeka; futhi konke enihlukunyezwe ngakho kuyosebenzelana ukuze nizuze, futhi nokudumisa igama lami, kusho iNkosi.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kini ngokuphathelene nemithetho yezwe, kuyintando yami ukuba abantu bami bagcine zonke izinto noma yini engibayala ngayo.
Futhi lowo mthetho wezwe ohambisana nomthetho-sisekelo, osekela umgomo wenkululeko ekugcineni amalungelo, ungowabo bonke abantu, futhi ulungile phambi kwami.
Ngakho-ke, mina, iNkosi, anginibeki cala, nabazalwane benu bebandla lami, ekusekeleni lowo mthetho ongumthetho-sisekelo wezwe;
Futhi ngokuphathelene nomthetho owenziwe ngumuntu, noma yikuphi okungafani nalokhu kuvela ebubini.
Mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngiyani khulula, ngakho-ke nikhululekile impela; futhi nomthetho nawo uyanikhulula.
Nokho, uma kubusa ababi abantu bayakhala.

Ngalokho-ke, abantu abaqotho nabahlakaniphile kufanele bafunwe ngokukhuthala, futhi abantu abalungile nabahlakaniphile kufanele niqiniseke ukuthi niyabasekela; kungenjalo noma yini engafani nalokhu ivela ebubini.
Futhi ngini nika umyalelo, wokuthi nishiye konke okubi futhi nibambelele kukho konke okuhle, ukuze niphile ngawo wonke amazwi aphuma emlonyeni kaNkulunkulu.
Ngokuba uzo nika abathembekileyo imfundiso phezu kwemfundiso, umthetho phezu komthetho; futhi ngizoni hlola futhi nginivivinye ngalokhu.
Futhi lowo odela impilo yakhe esemsebenzini wami, ngenxa yegama lami, uyobuye ayifumane futhi, ngisho ukuphila okuphakade.

Ngakho-ke, ningazesabi izitha zenu, ngokuba ngikumisile enhliziyweni yami, kusho iNkosi, ukuthi ngizoni vivinya kuzo zonke izinto, ukuthi nizohlala yini esivumelwaneni sami, ngisho kuze kube sekufeni, ukuze nitholakale nifanelekile.
Ngokuba uma ningahlali esivumelwaneni sami aningifanele.
Ngakho-ke, lahlani impi futhi nimemezele ukuthula, futhi nifune ngokukhuthala ukuphendula izinhliziyo zabantwana koyise, nezinhliziyo zoyise kubantwana;
Futhi phezu kwalokho, izinhliziyo zamaJuda kubaphrofethi, nabaphrofethi kumaJuda; funa ngize ngishaye umhlaba wonke ngesiqalekiso, futhi yonke inyama ishe phambi kwami.
Izinhliziyo zenu mazinga khathazeki; ngokuba ekhaya likaBaba kukhona izindlu eziningi, futhi senginilungisele indawo; futhi lapho uBaba nami sikhona, niyoba-khona lapho nani.
Bhekani, mina, iNkosi, angithokozile kahle ngabaningi abasebandleni eKirtland;

Ngokuba abazishiyi izono zabo, nezindlela zabo zobubi, ukuzikhukhumeza kwezinhliziyo zabo, nokufisa kwabo, nezinto zonke zabo ezinengekile, futhi bagcine amazwi okuhlakanipha nawokuphila okuphakade engibanike wona.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, mina, iNkosi, ngizoba jezisa futhi ngizokwenza noma yini engifuna ukuyenza, uma bengaphenduki futhi bagcine zonke izinto noma yini engiyisho kubo.
Futhi phezu kwalokho ngithi kini, uma nizama ukwenza noma yini enginiyala ngayo, mina, iNkosi, ngizophendula lonke ulaka nentukuthelo kusuke kini, futhi amasango esihogo ngeke abuse phezu kwenu.

Manje, sengikhuluma kini ngokuphathelene nemindeni yenu—uma abantu beni shaya, noma imindeni yenu, kanye, futhi nikuthwale ngokubekezela futhi ningabathuki, ningafuni futhi ukuziphindiselela, niyonikwa umvuzo;
Kodwa uma ningakuthwali ngokubekezela, kuyothathwa njengesilinganiso esilungile esinifanele.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, uma isitha senu sinishaya okwesibili, kodwa ningasithuki isitha senu, kodwa nikuthwale ngokubekezela, umvuzo wenu uyophindwa ngekhulu.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, uma enishaya okwesithathu, futhi nikuthwale ngokubekezela, umvuzo wenu uyophindwa kane;
Futhi lobu bufakazi obuthathu buyomelana nesitha senu uma singaphenduki, futhi ngeke bucinywe.

Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, uma leso sitha siyophunyula empindiselweni yami, ukuba singalethwa ekwahlulelweni phambi kwami, uma kunjalo niyokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi niyasi xwayisa egameni lami, ukuze singabe sisanihlasela futhi, noma imindeni yenu, ngisho abantwana babantwana benu besithathu nesesine isizukulwane.
Futhi emva kwalokho, uma ehlasela nina noma abantwana benu, noma abantwana babantwana benu besithathu nesesine isizukulwane, isitha senu ngisinikela ezandleni zenu;
Futhi uma uzosihawukela, uyonikwa umvuzo ngokulunga kwakho; futhi nabantwana bakho nabantwana babantwana bakho kwesesithathu nesesine isizukulwane.

Nokho, isitha sakho sisezandleni zakho; futhi uma usinika umvuzo ngemisebenzi yaso uyoba ongenacala uma efuna impilo yakho, futhi impilo yakho isebucayini ngaye, isitha sakho sisezandleni zakho futhi uyoba ongenacala.
Bhekani, lona ngumthetho engawunika inceku yami uNefi, noyihlo, uJosefa, noJakobe, no-Isaka, no-Abrahama, nabo bonke abaphrofethi nabaphostoli bami basendulo.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, lona ngumthetho engawunika abantu bami basendulo, wokuthi bangayi empini bemelene nanoma yisiphi isizwe, izihlobo, izilimi, noma abantu, ngaphandle kuphela uma mina, iNkosi, ngibayalile.
Futhi uma kukhona isizwe, ulimi, noma abantu abamemezela impi bemelene nabo, kufanele kuqale baphakamise isibonakaliso sokuthula kulabo bantu, isizwe, noma lolo limu;
Futhi uma labo bantu bengakwemukeli ukuthula, noma okwesibili noma okwesithathu, kufanele balethe lobu bufakazi phambi kweNkosi;
Emva kwalokho mina, iNkosi, ngizobanika umyalelo, futhi ngibathola bengenacala ekulweni naleso sizwe, ulimi, noma abantu.
Futhi mina, iNkosi, ngangizolwa izimpi zabo, nezimpi zabantwana babo, nabantwana babantwana babo, kuze kube sebeziphindiselele kuzo zonke izitha zabo, kwesesithathu nesesine isizukulwane.
Bhekani, lesi yisibonelo kubo bonke abantu, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu, ukuze nitholwe ningenacala phambi kwami.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, uma isitha sakho esikuhlasele okokuqala, siphenduka futhi size kuwe sicela intethelelo kuwe, ubosithethelela, futhi ungakugcini lokho njengobufakazi bakho kuye—
Ngokunjalo futhi okwesibili nokwesithathu; futhi njengokuphenduka njalo kwesitha sakho ekoneni kwaso esikone ngako, uyomthethelela, kuze kube amashumi ayisikhombisa ephindwe kasikhombisa.
Futhi uma ekona futhi engaphenduki okokuqala, nokho uyomthethelela.
Futhi uma ekona okwesibili, futhi engaphenduki, nokho uyomthethelela.
Futhi uma ekona okwesithathu, futhi engaphenduki, uyomthethelela futhi.
Kodwa uma ekona okwesine ungamthetheleli, kodwa uyoletha lobu bufakazi phambi kweNkosi; futhi ngeke bucinywe aze aphenduke futhi akukhokhele ngokuphindwe kane kuzo zonke izinto asekone kuzo.
Futhi uma ekwenza lokhu, uyomthethelela ngayo yonke inhliziyo yakho; futhi uma engakwenzi lokhu, mina, iNkosi, ngizoku phindiselela esitheni sakho kuphindwe ngekhulu.
Futhi nasebantwaneni bakhe, nasebantwaneni babantwana babo bonke abangizondayo, kwesesithathu nesesine isizukulwane.

Kodwa uma abantwana beyophenduka, noma abantwana babantwana, futhi be phendukela eNkosini uNkulunkulu wabo, ngezinhliziyo zabo zonke nangawo wonke amandla, umqondo, nangokuqina kwabo, futhi babuyisele ngokuphindwe kane ngazo zonke izono zabo abanone ngazo, noma oyise abona ngazo, noma oyise boyise, emva kwalokho intukuthelo yakho kufanele iphele.
Futhi impindiselo ngeke iphinde ize kubo, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho, futhi izono zabo ngeke zisalethwa futhi njengobufakazi phambi kweNkosi ngokumelene nabo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/99.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 99
chapter_summary: 1–8, UJohn Murdock ubizelwa ukumemezela ivangeli, futhi labo abamemukelayo bemukela iNkosi futhi bazofumana umusa.

verses.text: Bheka, isho kanje iNkosi encekwini yami uJohn Murdock—ubiziwe ukuba uye emazweni angasempumalanga uhambele indlu nendlu, isigodi nesigodi, futhi idolobha nedolobha, ukuze umemezele elami ivangeli laphakade kubantu bakhona, phakathi nokuhlushwa nobubi.
Futhi labo abakwemukelayo bemukela mina; futhi uyokuba namandla okushumayela izwi lami ngesibonakaliso sikaMoya oNgcwele wami.
Futhi labo abakwemukelayo njengontwana, bemukela umbuso wami; futhi babusisiwe labo, ngokuba bayofumana umusa.
Futhi lowo okwenqabayo uyokwe nqatshwa nguBaba nendlu yakhe; futhi uyohlanza izinyawo zakho ezindaweni ezicashile endleleni njengobufakazi obumelene nabo.
Futhi bhekani, futhi bheka, ngiza masinyane ukuzo kwahlulela, ukuzojezisa bonke ngezenzo zabo ezimbi abazenzile ngokuphambene nami, njengoba kulotshiwe ngami emqulwini wencwadi.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, akufanele ukuba uhambe ngaphambi kokuba abantwana bakho behlinzekelwe, futhi bethunyelwe ngokunakekelwa kumbhishobhi waseSiyoni.
Futhi emva kweminyaka embalwa, uma ukufisa kimi, ungahamba nawe uye ezweni elihle, ukuze ube nefa lakho;
Kungenjalo uyoqhubeka nokumemezela ivangeli lami uze uthathwe. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/100.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 100
chapter_summary: 1–4, UJoseph noSidney kufanele bashumayele ivangeli ukuze kusindiswe abantu; 5–8, Bazonikwa ngaso leso sikhathi okuzofanele bakusho; 9–12, USidney kufanele abe ngumkhulumeli futhi uJoseph kufanele abe ngumambuli futhi abe namandla ebufakazini; 13–17, INkosi izovusa abantu abamsulwa, futhi abalalelayo bazosindiswa.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi kini, bahlobo bami uSidney noJoseph, imindeni yenu iyaphila; isezandleni zami, futhi ngizokwenza kubo njengoba kubonakala kukuhle kimi; ngokuba kimi kunamandla onke.
Ngakho-ke, ngilandeleni, futhi nilalele iziyalo engiyoni nika zona.
Bhekani, futhi bheka, nginabantu abaningi kulendawo, ezifundeni ndawo zonke; futhi umnyango omkhulu wethuba lokusebenza uyovuleka ezifundeni eziseduze kulendawo engasempumalanga.
Ngakho-ke, mina, iNkosi, nginivumele ukuba nize kulendawo; ngokuba ngokwenze njalo ngakubona kufanele ukuze kusindiswe abantu.
Ngakho-ke, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, phakamisani amaphimbo enu kulaba bantu; khulumani imicabango engiyoyifaka ezinhliziyweni zenu, futhi ngeke nidunyazwe phambi kwabantu;
Ngokuba niyonikwa ngalelohora, yebo, ngaleso sikhathi, eniyokusho.
Kodwa umyalelo engini nika wona, ngowokuthi niyosho noma yini eniyoyisho egameni lami, ngesizotha senhliziyo, ngomoya wobumnene, ezintweni zonke.
Futhi ngini nika isethembiso, sokuthi kangangoba nikwenza lokhu uMoya oNgcwele uyothunyelwa kini ukufakaza ngazo zonke izinto noma yini eniyoyisho.
Futhi ngikubona kufanele ukuthi wena, nceku yami uSidney, ube ngumkhulumeli kulaba bantu; yebo, ngiqinisile, ngizokugcoba kulolubizo, ngisho ukuba ube umkhulumeli wenceku yami uJoseph.
Futhi ngizomnika amandla kubo ubufakazi.

Futhi ngizokunika amandla okuba ube namandla ekuchasiseni imibhalo yonke engcwele, ukuze ube ngumkhulumeli wakhe, futhi yena uyoba ngumambuli kuwe, ukuze wena ubazi ubuqiniso bezinto zonke eziphathelene nombuso wami emhlabeni.
Ngakho-ke, qhubekani nohambo lwenu futhi izinhliziyo zenu mazijabule; ngokuba bhekani, futhi bheka, nginani ngisho kuze kube sekugcineni.
Manje sengininika izwi eliphathelene no Siyoni. USiyoni uyo khululwa, nakuba ejeziswa okwesikhashana.
Abafowenu, izinceku zami u-Orson Hyde noJohn Gould, base zandleni zami; futhi kangangoba begcina imiyalelo yami bayosindiswa.
Ngakho-ke, izinhliziyo zenu maziduduzeke; ngokuba zonke izinto ziyosebenzelana kube kuhle kulabo abahamba ngobuqotho, futhi ukuze kungcweliswe ibandla.
Ngokuba ngizozivusela abantu abamsulwa, abazongi sebenzela ngokulunga;
Futhi bonke abakhuleka egameni leNkosi, futhi bagcine imiyalelo yayo, bayosindiswa. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/101.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 101
chapter_summary: 1–8, AbaNgcwele bayajeziswa futhi bahlushwa ngenxa yeziphambeko zabo; 9–15, Intukuthelo yeNkosi izokwehlela phezu kwezizwe, kodwa abantu Bayo bayoqoqwa futhi baduduzwe; 16–21, USiyoni nezikhonkwane zakhe uzomiswa; 22–31, Ubunjalo bempilo ngesikhathi seNkulungwane yemiNyaka buyachazwa; 32–42, AbaNgcwele bazobusiswa futhi banikwe umvuzo ngaleso sikhathi; 43–62, Umfanekiso wendoda eyisikhulu emphakathini nezihlahla zomhlwathi ukhombisa izinkathazo nokusindiswa kweSiyoni ekugcineni; 63–75, AbaNgcwele kufanele baqhubeke nokubuthana ndawonye; 76–80, INkosi yamisa uMthetho-sisekelo waseMelika; 81–101, AbaNgcwele kufanele bancengele ukunxeshezelwa kokoniwa, ngokomfanekiso wowesifazane nomahluleli ongalungile.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, mayelana nabafowenu abezwe ubuhlungu, futhi bahlushwa, futhi basuswa ezweni lefa labo—
Mina, iNkosi, ngizivumelile izinhlupho zize kubo, abahlushwe ngazo, ngenxa yezi phambeko zabo;
Nokho ngizobenza abami, futhi bayokuba ngabami ngalolo suku engiyokuza ngalo ukuzokwenza amagugu ami.
Ngakho-ke, kufanele bajeziswe futhi bavivinywe, ngisho njengo-Abrahama, owayalwa ukuba anikele ngendodana yakhe eyodwa ayenayo.
Ngokuba bonke labo abangathandi ukubekezelela ukujeziswa, kodwa bengiphika, ngeke ba ngcweliswe.
Bhekani, ngithi kini, kwakunokuxabana, noku phikisana, no mona, nemibango, nezifiso zenkanuko nezokulangazelela phakathi kwabo; ngakho-ke ngalezi zinto bangcolisa amafa abo.
Babephuza ukulalela izwi leNkosi uNkulunkulu wabo; ngakho-ke, neNkosi uNkulunkulu wabo iyaphuza ukulalela imikhuleko yabo, ukubaphendula ngosuku lwabo lwenkathazo.
Ngosuku lwabo lokuthula basibukela phansi iseluleko sami; kodwa, ngosuku lwabo lwe nkathazo, ngenxa yokudinga bazama ukungifumana.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, nakuba bonile, izibilini zami zigcwele ububele kubo. Ngeke ngibalahle impela; futhi ngosuku lwe ntukuthelo ngizowukhumbula umusa.

Sengifungile, futhi isimemezelo sesiphumile ngomyalelo waphambilini engini nike wona, sokuthi ngizodedela inkemba yentukuthelo yami iwe ukuze kuzuze abantu bami; futhi ngisho njengoba ngishilo, kuyokwenzeka.
Intukuthelo yami isizothululwa maduzane ngaphandle kwesilinganiso phezu kwezizwe zonke; futhi lokhu ngizokwenza uma isitsha sobubi babo obukhulu sesigcwele.
Futhi ngalolo suku bonke abatholwa bephezu kwe silindo, noma ngamanye amagama, wonke u-Israyeli wami, uyosindiswa.
Futhi labo abasabalalisiwe bayoqoqwa.
Futhi bonke labo abalilileyo bayoduduzwa.
Futhi bonke labo abanikele ngezimpilo zabo ngenxa yegama lami bayoqheliswa.
Ngakho-ke, izinhliziyo zenu maziduduzeke ngokuphathelene neSiyoni; ngokuba yonke inyama isezandleni zami; thula futhi wazi ukuthi nginguNkulunkulu.
USiyoni ngeke asuswe endaweni yakhe, nakuba abantwana bakhe besabalele.
Labo abasele, futhi abamsulwa enhliziyweni, bayobuya, futhi beze kuwo amafa abo, bona nabantwana babo, ngamaculo enjabulo yaphakade, ukuzokwakha izindawo eziyincithakalo zaseSiyoni—
Futhi zonke lezi zinto ukuze abaphrofethi bagcwaliseke.
Futhi, bhekani, ayikho enye indawo ebekiwe kunaleyo engiyibekile; futhi akuyikubakhona enye indawo ebekiwe kunaleyo engiyibekile, yomsebenzi wokuqoqa abangcwele bami—
Kuze kuze wusuku lapho ingatholakali indawo yabo; futhi emva kwalokho nginezinye izindawo engiyozimisela bona, futhi ziyobizwa nge zikhonkwane, ukwandisa noma ukuqinisa iSiyoni.
Bhekani, kuyintando yami, ukuthi bonke ababiza igama lami, futhi abangikhonza ngokwevangeli lami laphakade, kufanele baqoqane ndawonye, futhi bame ezindaweni ezingcwele;
Futhi balungiselele isambulo esizokuza, ngesikhathi isisitho sokumboza ithempeli lami, kwitabernakeli lami, esicashisa umhlaba, siyosuswa, futhi yonke inyama iyongibona kanyekanye.
Futhi konke okungcolile, abantu, noma izilwane zasendle, noma izinyoni zezulu, noma kwezinhlanzi zolwandle, okuhlala phezu kobuso bomhlaba, kuyo shiswa;
Futhi nalokho kwemvelo kuyoncibilika ngokukhulu ukushisa; futhi zonke izinto ziyoba zintsha, ukuze ulwazi lwami ne nkazimulo kubekhona emhlabeni wonke.
Futhi ngalolo suku ubutha phakathi kwabantu, futhi nobutha phakathi kwezilwane, yebo, ubutha bayo yonke inyama, buyophela phambi kobuso bami.
Futhi ngalolo suku noma yini umuntu ayoyicela, uyophiwa.
Futhi ngalolo suku uSathane ngeke abe namandla okulinga noyedwa umuntu.
Futhi ngeke kube bikho usizi ngokuba akukho kufa.
Ngalolo suku umntwana ngeke afe aze abe mdala; futhi impilo yakhe iyoba njengeminyaka yesihlahla;
Futhi uma efa ngeke alale, okungukuthi phansi, kodwa uyo guqulwa ngokuphazima kweso, futhi uyo hlwithwa, futhi ukuphumula kwakhe kuyoba yintokozo.
Yebo, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngalolo suku mhla iNkosi isiza, iyo kwambula zonke izinto—
Izinto esezadlula, futhi nezinto ezifihliwe ezingaziwa muntu, izinto zomhlaba, owenziwa ngazo, futhi nenhloso nesiphetho sawo—
Izinto eziyigugu kakhulu, izinto ezingaphezulu, nezinto ezingaphansi, izinto ezisemhlabeni, nezingaphezu komhlaba, kanye nezisezulwini.
Futhi bonke labo abezwa ukuhlushwa ngenxa yegama lami, futhi ababekezela ngokholo, nakuba bedela ukuphila kwabo ngenxa yami kepha bayoyifumana yonke lenkazimulo.
Ngalokho-ke, ningesabi kuze kube sekufeni; ngokuba kulomhlaba ukuthokoza kwenu akuphelele, kodwa kimi ukuthokoza kwenu kuphelele.
Ngakho-ke, ningazikhathazi ngomzimba, noma impilo yomzimba; kodwa zikhathazeni ngomoya, futhi nokuphila komoya.
Futhi funani ubuso beNkosi njalo, ukuze ngoku bekezela nizuze imimoya yenu, futhi niyozuza ukuphila okuphakade.
Uma abantu bebizelwa kwelami ivangeli laphakade, futhi benza isivumelwano ngesivumelwano saphakade, babalwa njengo sawoti womhlaba futhi nobusawoti babantu;

Babizwa ukuba babe ubusawoti babantu; ngakho-ke, uma lowo sawoti womhlaba usulahlekelwe wubusawoti bawo, bheka, kusukela ngaleso sikhathi awusasizi lutho kuphela ufanele ukulahlwa ngaphandle futhi unyathelwe ngabantu.
Bhekani, nakhu ukuhlakanipha ngokuphathelene nabantwana baseSiyoni, ngisho abaningi, kodwa hhayi bonke; batholwa bengaboni, ngakho-ke kufanele bajeziswe—
Lowo oziphakamisayo uyothotshiswa, lowo ozithobayo uyophakanyiswa.
Manje, ngizonitshengisa umfanekiso, ukuze nazi intando yami ngokuphathelene nokuhlengwa kweSiyoni.

Isikhulu esithile sasinesi qinti somhlaba, okhethekileyo kakhulu; futhi sathi ezincekwini zaso: Hambani niye esivinini sami, ngisho phezu kwalesi siqinti somhlaba okhethekileyo kakhulu, futhi nitshale izihlahla zeminqumo eziyishumi nambili;

Futhi nibeke abalindi nxazonke, nakhe umbhoshongo, ukuze umuntu akwazi ukubheka izwe nxazonke, ukuze abe ngumlindi embhoshongweni, ukuze izihlahla zami zeminqumo zingaphulwa uma kufika isitha ukuzophanga futhi bazidlele izithelo zesivini sami.

Manje, izinceku zesikhulu zahamba futhi zenza njengoba inkosi yazo iziyalile, futhi batshala izihlahla zeminqumo, futhi bakha uthango nxazonke, futhi babeka abalindi, futhi baqala ukwakha umbhoshongo.
Futhi kwathi besabeka isisekelo sawo, baqala bathi omunye komunye: Futhi iwudingelani inkosi lombhoshongo na?
Futhi babuzana isikhathi eside, bethi omunye komunye: Iwudingelani inkosi lombhoshongo, kube kuyisikhathi sokuthula na?
Akumelwe yini lemali ibekwe kwabebhange na? Ngokuba asikho isidingo salezi zinto.
Futhi ngesikhathi bephikisana bavilapha kakhulu, futhi bangayilalela imiyalelo yenkosi yabo.
Futhi isitha safika ngobusuku, futhi saphula uthango; futhi izinceku zesikhulu zavuka futhi zasaba, futhi zabaleka; nesitha sawubulala umsebenzi wabo, futhi sacekela phansi izihlahla zeminqumo.
Manje, bhekani, isikhulu, inkosi yesivini, yabiza izinceku zayo, futhi yathi kubo, Kungani! yini edale lobu bubi obungaka na?

Beningafanele yini ukwenza ngisho njengoba nginiyalile, futhi—emva kokutshala isivini, futhi nakha uthango nxazonke, futhi nabeka abalindi phezu kwezindonga zalo—naphinda nakha umbhoshongo, futhi nabeka abalindi phezu kombhoshongo, futhi nasiqapha isivini sami, futhi nangozela nalala, funa isitha size phezu kwenu na?

Futhi bhekani, umlindi phezu kombhoshongo ngabe usibonile isitha ngesikhathi sisekude; futhi ngabe nikwazile ukuzilungiselela futhi nakwazi ukusivimba singabulali uthango lwalapho, futhi ngabe nisi sindisile isivini sami esandleni sombulali.

Futhi inkosi yesivini yathi koyedwa wezinceku zayo: Hamba futhi uqoqele ndawonye zonke izinceku zami ezisele, futhi uthathe wonke amandla endlu yami, okungamabutho ami, izinsizwa zami, futhi nalabo asebe neminyaka emaphakathi phakathi kwazo zonke izinceku zami, abangamandla endlu yami, ngaphandle kwalabo engibabeke ukuba basale;
Futhi hambani masinyane niye esiqintini sesivini sami, futhi nibuyise isivini sami; ngokuba singesami; ngisithenge ngemali.
Ngakho-ke, hambani masinyane niye esiqintini sami; bulalani izindonga zezitha zami; niwise imibhoshongo yazo, futhi nihlakaze abalindi bazo.
Futhi kangangoba beqoqana ndawonye bemelene nani, ngiphindiseleleni ezitheni zami, ukuze maduze ngize nabasele bendlu yami futhi sizosi thatha isiqinti.
Futhi inceku yathi enkosini yayo: Ziyokwenzeka nini lezi zinto na?
Futhi yathi encekwini yayo: Uma sengithanda; hambani masinyane, futhi nenze zonke izinto konke enginiyale ngakho;
Futhi lokhu kuyoba imvume yami nesibusiso kuwe—umphathi othembekile nohlakaniphile phakathi kwendlu yami, umbusi embusweni wami.
Futhi inceku yakhe yahamba masinyane, futhi yenza zonke izinto konke inkosi emyale ngakho; futhi emva kwezinsuku eziningi zonke izinto zafezeka.

Phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngizonitshengisa ukuhlakanipha kimi ngokuphathelene nawo wonke amabandla, kangangoba bethanda ukuholwa ngendlela eqondile futhi nefanele ukufeza ukusindiswa kwabo—
Ukuze umsebenzi wokuqoqa ndawonye kwabangcwele bami uqhubeke, ukuze ngibakhele egameni lami phezu kwezindawo ezingcwele; ngokuba isikhathi sesivuno sifikile, futhi izwi lami kufanele lifezeke.

Ngakho-ke, kufanele ngiqoqele ndawonye abantu bami, ngokomfanekilso wamabele nokhula, ukuze amabele abuthelwe ezinqolobaneni ukuze abe nokuphila okuphakade, futhi aqheliswe nge nkazimulo yesilestiyali, uma sengiza embusweni kaBaba wami ukuze nginike umvuzo kulowo nalowo muntu ngesenzo sakhe;
Ngesikhathi ukhula luboshwa luba yizithungo, futhi izibopho zabo zenziwe zaqina, ukuze bashiswe ngomlilo ongacimeki.
Ngakho-ke, umyalelo ngiwunika kuwo wonke amabandla, ukuthi aqhubeke nokuqoqelana ndawonye ezindwaweni engizimisile.
Nokho, njengoba ngishilo kini ngomyalelo waphambilini, ukuqoqana kwenu makungaphuthumi, noma kube ngokubaleka; kodwa zonke izinto mazilungiswe kuqala.
Futhi ukuze zonke izinto zilungiswe kuqala, gcinani umyalelo engiwunikile ngokuphathelene nalezi zinto—

Othi, noma ofundisa ukuthi, thengani zonke izindawo ngemali, ezingathengwa ngemali, esifundeni esiseduze nezwe engilimise ukuba libe yizwe laseSiyoni, ukuze kufezwe ukuqala kokuqoqana kwabangcwele bami;
Wonke umhlaba ongathengwa esifundeni iJackson, nasezifundazweni eziseduze, futhi nishiye okuseleyo esandleni sami.

Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, wonke amabandla mawaqoqele ndawonye izimali zawo; lezi zinto mazenzeke ngesikhathi sazo, kodwa kungabi ngokuphuthuma; futhi nizame ukuba zonke izinto zilungiswe kuqala.
Futhi amadoda ahloniphekile mawabekwe, ngisho amadoda ahlakaniphileyo, futhi niwathumele ukuyothenga lemihlaba.
Futhi amabandla asemazweni angasempumalanga, uma esakhiwe, uma engalalela lomyalo angathenga imihlaba futhi aqoqanele ndawonye kuyo; futhi ngalendlela angayimisa iSiyoni.

Ngisho namanje sekukhona okwanele okugciniwe, yebo, ngisho inala, ukuze kubuyiswe uSiyoni, futhi kumiswe izindawo zakhe ezichithakeleyo, zingaphindi futhi zilahlwe phansi, uma amabandla, azibiza ngegama lami, ethanda ukulalela izwi lami.

Futhi phezu kwalokho ngithi kini, labo abebehlakazwe yizitha, kuyintando yami ukuthi bangaqhubeka nokucela ukunxeshezelwa, nokubuyiselwa, ngesandla salabo ababekwe njengababusi nabasemagunyeni phezu kwenu—
Ngokwemithetho futhi nangomthetho-sisekelo wabantu, engiwuvumele ukuba umiswe, futhi okufanele ugcinelwe amalungelo nokuvikeleka kwabo bonke abantu, ngokwemigomo elungileyo nengcwele;
Ukuze wonke umuntu enze ngokwezimfundiso nomgomo ophathelene nekusasa, ngoku zikhethela kokulunga engimnike kona, ukuze wonke umuntu aziphendulele ngezono zakhe ngosuku lo kwahlulelwa.
Ngakho-ke, akulungile ukuthi noma yimuphi umuntu abe sebugqilini bomunye.
Futhi ngalenhloso ngiwumisile uMthetho-sisekelo walelizwe, ngezandla zamadoda ahlakaniphileyo engiwavusele yona kanye lenhloso, futhi ngalikhulula izwe ngokuchitha igazi.
Manje, ngizobafanisa nani abantwana baseSiyoni na? Ngizobafanisa nomfanekiso wowesifazane nomehluleli ongalungile, ngokuba abantu kufanele njalo bahlale bekhuleka njalo futhi bangadangali, othi—
Kwakukhona emzini othile umahluleli owayengamesabi uNkulunkulu, enganaki muntu.
Kulowo muzi kwakukhona futhi umfelokazi owayelokhu efika kuye, ethi: Ngizwele esitheni sami.

Futhi kwaba yisikhathi engavumi, kepha kamuva wathi ngenhliziyo: Nakuba ngingamesabi uNkulunkulu, nginganaki muntu, nokho ngokuba lomfelokazi engikhathaza njalo ngizomzwela, funa angikhathaze ngokufika njalonjalo.
Ngizobafanisa nalokho okushiwoyo abantwana baseSiyoni.
Mabanxuse ezinyaweni zomehluleli;
Futhi uma engabanaki, mabanxuse ezinyaweni zombusi;
Futhi uma umbusi engabanaki, mabanxuse ezinyaweni zikamongameli;
Futhi uma umongameli engabanaki, ngaleso sikhathi-ke iNkosi izoqala ukwenza futhi iphume endaweni yayo yokucasha, futhi ngentukuthelo yayo isihluphe isizwe.

Futhi ngokungathokozi kwakhe okukhulu, futhi nangolaka lwakhe olukhulu; ngesikhathi sakhe, uzobasusa labo ababi, abangathembekile, nabaphathi abangalungile, futhi ababele ingxenye yabo phakathi kwabazenzisi, nabangakholwayo;
Ngisho ebumnyameni obungaphandle, lapho kuyoba khona ukukhala, nesililo, nokugedla kwamazinyo.
Ngakho-ke, khulekani, ukuze izindlebe zabo zizwe ukukhala kwenu, ukuze ngibe nomhawu kubo, ukuze lezi zinto zingabehleli.
Engikushilo kini kumelwe ukuba kwenzeke, ukuze wonke umuntu angabi nazaba;
Ukuze izazi nababusi bezwe futhi bazi lokho abangakaze bakuqonde;

Ukuze ngiqhubeke ngenze isenzo sami, isenzo sami esingajwayelekile, futhi ngifeze umsebenzi wami, umsebenzi wami ongajwayelekile, ukuze abantu bawubone umehluko phakathi kwabalungileyo nababi, kusho uNkulunkulu wenu.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, kuphambene nomyalelo wami futhi nentando yami ukuthi inceku yami uSidney Gilbert adayise indlu yami yengcebo, engiyimisele abantu bami, ezandleni zezitha zami.
Lokho engikumisile makungangcoliswa yizitha zami, ngemvume yalabo abazibiza ngegama lami;
Ngokuba lesi yisono esibuhlungu nesibi kakhulu kimi, futhi nakubantu bami, ngenxa yalezo zinto engizimisile futhi ezizokwehlela izizwe.
Ngakho-ke, kuyintando yami ukuthi abantu bami bafune ngokwelungelo, futhi babambelele kulokho engikumisele bona, nakuba bengeke bavunyelwe ukuhlala kukho.
Nokho, angisho ukuthi ngeke bahlale kukho; ngokuba kangangoba beletha izithelo nemisebenzi efanele umbuso wami bayohlala kukho.
Bayokwakha, futhi omunye ngeke akuzuze lokho njengefa; bayotshala izivini, futhi bayokudla izithelo zaso. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/102.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 102
chapter_summary: 1–8, Umkhandlu omkhulu uyabekwa ukuze uxazulule ubunzima obubalulekile obuvela eBandleni; 9–18, Izinqubo zokuthetha amacala ziyanikwa; 19–23, Umongameli womkhandlu ukhipha isinqumo; 24–34, Inqubo yokudlulisa amacala ibekwa obala.

verses.text: Ngalolu suku umkhandlu wabo bonke abaphristi abakhulu abangamashumi amabili-nane wahlangana emzini kaJoseph Smith, omNcane, ngesambulo, futhi baqhubeka nokuhlela umkhandlu omkhulu webandla likaKristu, owawuzokwakhiwa ngabaphristi abakhulu abayishumi nambili, noyedwa noma abathathu omongameli njengoba kudingekile.
Umkhandlu omkhulu wabekwa ngesambulo ukuze uxazulule izinkinga ezibalulekile ezazingavela ebandleni, ezazingeke zixazululwe yibandla noma wumkhandlu kambhishobhi kuze kuneliseke abathintekayo.

UJoseph Smith, omNcane, uSidney Rigdon noFrederick G. Williams bavunywa njengomongameli ngezwi lomkhandlu; futhi uJoseph Smith, oMdala, uJohn Smith, uJoseph Coe, uJohn Johnson, uMartin Harris, uJohn S. Carter, uJared Carter, u-Oliver Cowdery, uSamuel H. Smith, u-Orson Hyde, uSylvester Smith, noLuke Johnson, abaphristi abakhulu, bakhethwa ukuba babe ngumkhandlu ozohlale ukhona webandla, ngezwi lawo wonke umkhandlu.

Lamalunga omkhandlu abalulwe ngenhla abe esebuzwa ukuthi ayakwamukela ukubekwa kwawo na, futhi nokuthi azosebenza kuleso sikhundla ngokomthetho wasezulwini na, kulokho bonke baphendula ukuthi bayakwamukela ukubekwa kwabo, futhi nokuthi bayogcwalisa izikhundla zabo ngokomusa kaNkulunkulu abaphiwe wona.

Inani elalakhe umkhandlu, elavota egameni lebandla futhi lavotela ibandla ngokubeka lamalunga omkhandlu abalulwe ngenhla lalingamashumi amane nantathu, okwakuyilaba: abaphristi abakhulu abayisishiyagalolunye, amagosa alishumi nesikhombisa, abaphristi abane, namalungu alishumi nantathu.
Kwavotelwa ukuthi: umkhandlu omkhulu awukwazi ukuba namandla okwenza izinto ngaphandle kwamalunga omkhandlu ayisikhombisa ababalulwe ngenhla, noma kubekhona abalandelayo ababekwe ngokujwayelekile.
Laba abayisikhombisa bayoba namandla okubeka abanye abaphristi abakhulu, abangababona befanelekile futhi nabangakwazi ukusebenza endaweni yalawo malungu omkhandlu angekho.

Kwavotelwa ukuthi: noma nini uma kuvela noma yisiphi isikhala ngokufa, ukususwa esikhundleni ngenxa yesiphambeko, noma ukususwa emikhawulweni yokuphathwa kwalelibandla, kwanoma yimuphi wamalunga omkhandlu kulaba aba balulwe ngenhla, siyogcwaliswa ngokubekwa okwenziwa ngumongameli noma omongameli, futhi kuvunyelwe ngezwi lomkhandlu wabo bonke abaphristi abakhulu, ohlangene ngaleso sizathu, ukwenza izinto egameni lebandla.
Umongameli webandla, futhi ongumongameli womkhandlu, ubekwa ngesambulo, futhi avunywe ekuphatheni kwakhe ngezwi lebandla.
Futhi kungokwesithunzi sesikhundla sakhe ukuba engamele lomkhandlu webandla; futhi kuyilungelo lakhe ukulekelelwa ngabanye ababili omongameli, ababekwe ngendlela efana naleyo naye uqobo abekwa ngayo.

Futhi uma kwenzeka kubakhona ongekho oyedwa noma bobabili kwababekiwe ukumusiza, unamandla okwengamela umkhandlu ngaphandle komsizi; futhi uma kwenzeka yena uqobo engekho, laba abanye omongameli banamandla okwengamela esikhundleni sakhe, bobabili noma yimuphi oyedwa kubona.

Noma inini umkhandlu omkhulu webandla likaKristu uhlelwa ngokwejwayelekile, ngokwalesi sifaniso esichaziwe, kuyokuba wumsebenzi wamalunga omkhandlu alishumi nambili ukwenza inkatho ngezinombolo, futhi ngalokho kutholakale ukuthi ngubani kulaba abayishumi nambili ozokhuluma kuqala, kuqala ngenombolo yokuqala kanjalo ngokulandelana kuze kube olandelayo wenombolo yeshumi nambili.

Noma inini uma lomkhandlu uhlangana ukubheka nanoma yiluphi udaba, laba abalishumi nambili bamalungu omkhandlu bayobheka ukuthi yicala elibukhuni noma cha; uma lingebukhuni, ababili kuphela bamalungu omkhandlu bayokhuluma kulo, ngokwale ndlela ebhalwe ngenhla.
Kodwa uma kucatshangwe ukuthi libukhuni, kuyobekwa abane; futhi uma libukhuni kakhulu, abayisithupha; kodwa akuyikwenzeka ukuthi abangaphezulu kwesithupha babekwe ukuba bakhulume.
Othweswe icala, zikhathi zonke, unelungelo lengxenye eyodwa yomkhandlu, ukuvimbela ukudelelwa noma okungekona ukulunga.

Futhi amalungu omkhandlu abekwe ukuba akhulume phambi komkhandlu kufanele ethule udaba, emuva kokucwaninga ubufakazi, njengoba bunjalo phambi komkhandlu; futhi wonke umuntu kufanele akhulume ngobuqotho nango kulunga.
Lawo malungu omkhandlu acoshe izinombolo ezingahlukaniseka ngesibili, ezingo, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, kanye no 12, yiwo okufanele amele othweswe icala, futhi bavikele ukudelelwa nokungekona ukulunga.

Ngazo zonke izikhathi ummangali nobekwe icala bayoba nelungelo lokuzikhulumela phambi komkhandlu, emuva kokuba ubufakazi sebulaleliwe namalungu omkhandlu abekiwe ukuba akhulume ecaleni esekuqedile ukuphawula kwawo.

Emuva kokuba ubufakazi sebulaleliwe, abeluleki, ummangali nobekwe icala sebekhulumile, umongameli uyonikeza isinqumo ngokuliqonda kwakhe icala, futhi acele amalungu omkhandlu wabayishumi nambili ukuba avumele okufanayo ngevoti lawo.

Kodwa uma amalungu omkhandlu asele, angazange akhulume, noma yimuphi wabo, emuva kokulalelwa kobufakazi kanye nezicelo ngokungakhethi, ethole iphutha ngesinqumo sikamongameli, angakuveza lokho, futhi icala liyophinda lilalelwe.
Futhi uma, emuva kokuphinda lilalelwe ngokucophelela, kuvezwa noma yiluphi olunye ulwazi olwengeziwe ecaleni, isinqumo siyoshintshwa njengoba kufanele.
Kodwa uma lungekho olunye ulwazi olwengeziwe olunikiwe, isinqumo sokuqala siyoma, iningi lomkhandlu linamandla okunquma okufanayo.
Uma kunobunzima ngokwe mfundiso noma umgomo, uma kungekho okwanele okubhaliwe ukwenza icala licace emiqondweni yabomkhandlu, umongameli angabuza futhi athole intando yeNkosi nge sambulo.
Abaphristi abakhulu, uma bekude, banamandla okubiza futhi bahlele umkhandlu ngendlela esishiwo ngenhla, ukuxazulula ubunzima, uma abathintekayo noma oyodwa wabo ekucela loko.
Futhi lomkhandlu oshiwo wabaphristi abakhulu uyoba namandla okubeka oyedwa wabo ukwengamela lowomkhandlu okwesikhashana.
Kuyokuba umsebenzi womkhandlu oshiwo ukwedlulisa, masinyane, ikhophi yokuqhubekile, nobufakazi obuphelezela isinqumo sabo, emkhandlwini omkhulu wekomkhulu lobuMongameli bokuQala beBandla.

Uma abathintekayo noma oyedwa wabo enganeliseki ngesinqumo salowo mkhandlu esishiwo, bangalidlulisela emkhandlwini omkhulu wekomkhulu wobuMongameli bokuQala beBandla, futhi liphindwe lilalelwe, lelocala liyobe seliqhutshwa lapho, ngokwesifaniso sasekuqaleni esibhaliwe, kube sengathi akukaze kuthathwe sinqumo.
Lomkhandlu wabaphristi abakhulu abakude kufanele ubizwe kuphela kwezilukhuni kakhulu izimo zezindaba zebandla; futhi akukho simo esijwayelekile esinesizathu esanele sokubiza lowomkhandlu.
Abaphristi abakhulu abahambayo noma abahlala kude banamandla okusho ukuthi kunesidingo yini sokubiza lowomkhandlu noma cha.
Kunomehluko phakathi komkhandlu omkhulu noma abaphristi abakhulu abahambayo abakude, nomkhandlu ophezulu wabaphristi abahambayo owakhiwe ngaba phostoli abayishumi nambili, ezinqumweni zabo.
Esinqumweni salaba bokuqala kungaba nokudluliswa kwecala; kodwa esinqumweni salaba okugcinwe ngabo akukho.
Laba okugcinwe ngabo bangabuzwa kuphela ngabanegunya elinkulu ebandleni lonke uma bephambuka.

Kwavunyelwana ukuthi: umongameli noma omongameli bekomkhulu lobuMongameli bokuQala beBandla bayoba namandla okunquma ukuthi noma yiliphi icala elinjalo, elidlulisiwe, ngokulunga lifanele liphindwe lilalelwe na, emuva kokucwaninga ukudluliswa nobufakazi nokushiwo okuphelezela udaba.

Amalungu omkhandlu ayishumi nambili emuva kwalokho abe eseqhubeka nokushaya inkatho noma ukuvota, ukuqiniseka ukuthi ngubani okwakufanele akhulume kuqala, futhi umphumela kwaba yilaba: 1, u-Oliver Cowdery; 2, uJoseph Coe; 3, uSamuel H. Smith; 4, uLuke Johnson; 5, uJohn S. Carter; 6, uSylvester Smith; 7, uJohn Johnson; 8, u-Orson Hyde; 9, uJared Carter; 10, uJoseph Smith, oMdala; 11, uJohn Smith; 12, uMartin Harris.Emva komkhuleko umhlangano wafika esiphethweni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/103.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 103
chapter_summary: 1–4, Kungani iNkosi yavumela abaNgcwele esiFundeni iJackson bahlushwe na?; 5–10, AbaNgcwele bazonqoba uma begcina imiyalelo; 11–20, Ukusindiswa kweSiyoni kuzoza ngamandla, futhi iNkosi izohamba phambi kwabantu Bayo; 21–28, AbaNgcwele kufanele babuthane eSiyoni, futhi labo abalahlekelwa yizimpilo zabo bayozifumana futhi; 29–40, Abazalwane abahlukahlukene babizelwa ukuhlela iNkambu yeSiyoni futhi nokuthi baye eSiyoni; bathenjiswa ukunqoba uma bethembekile.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, bahlobo bami, bhekani, ngizoni nika isambulo nomyalelo, ukuze nazi ukuthi nizokwenza njani ukugcina imisebenzi yenu ephathelene nensindiso noku buyiselwa kwabazalwane benu, abachithiweyo kumhlaba waseSiyoni;
Abasuswa futhi bashaywa ngezandla sezitha zami, kubo engiyothululela ulaka lwami ngaphandle kwesilinganiso ngesami isikhathi.
Ngokuba ngibavumele kuze kube manje, ukuze bagcwalise isilinganiso sobubi babo obukhulu, ukuze isitsha sabo sigcwale;
Futhi ukuze labo abazibiza ngegama lami bajeziswe okwesikhashana ngesibuhlungu nesinzima isijeziso, ngokuba bengazange balalele ngokupheleleyo imiyalelo nemiyalelo engibanike yona.
Kodwa ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngimise isimemezelo esiyoqondwa ngabantu bami, kangangoba belalela kusuka ngalelihora isaluleko mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu wabo, engiyobanika sona.
Bhekani, bayoqala ukuzinqoba izitha zami kusuka ngaleli hora, ngokuba ngikumisile lokho.

Futhi ngokuqaphela ukugcina wonke amazwi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu wabo, engiyowakhuluma kubo, ngeke bayeke ukunqoba kuze kube imibuso yonke yomhlaba ibekwe ngaphansi kwezinyawo zami, futhi umhlaba unikwe abangcwele, ube ngowabo phakade naphakade.
Kodwa kangangoba bengayigcini imiyalelo yami, futhi bengaqapheli ukugcina wonke amazwi ami, imibuso yomhlaba iyobanqoba.
Ngokuba babe bekwe ukuba ngukukhanya kwezwe, futhi nokuba ngabasindisi babantu;
Futhi kangangoba bengebona abasindisi babantu, banjengo sawoti osuphelelwe ubusawoti bawo, futhi kusuka ngaleso sikhathi awusasizi lutho kodwa ukuba ulahlwe phandle futhi unyathelwe ngabantu.
Kodwa ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngikushilo ukuthi abafowenu abachithiweyo bayobuyela emihlabeni engamafa abo, futhi bayokwakha izindawo ezichithakele zeSiyoni.
Ngokuba emva kokuhlupheka okukhulu, njengoba ngishilo kini kwimiyalelo yaphambilini, kuza isibusiso.

Bhekani, lesi yisibusiso enginithembise sona emva kwezinhlupheko zenu, nezinhlupheko zabafowenu—ukubuyiselwa kwenu, nokubuyiselwa kwabafowenu, ngisho ukubuyiselwa kwabo ezweni laseSiyoni, ukuba bamiswe, bangaphinde bachithwe.
Nokho, uma bengcolisa amafa abo bayochithwa; ngokuba ngeke ngibahawukele uma bengcolisa amafa abo.
Bhekani, ngithi kini, ukuhlengwa kweSiyoni kufanele kuze ngamandla;
Ngakho-ke, abantu bami ngizobavusela umuntu, ozobahola njengoba uMose ahola abantwana bakwa-Israyeli.
Ngokuba nina ningabantwana bakwa-Israyeli, futhi ni yinzalo ka-Abrahama, futhi kufanele niholwe niphume ebugqilini ngamandla, futhi ngengalo eluliweyo.
Futhi njengoba oyihlo baholwa ekuqaleni, kuyoba njalo-ke ukubuyiselwa kweSiyoni.
Ngakho-ke, izinhliziyo zenu mazingadangali, ngokuba angisho kini njengoba ngasho koyihlo ukuthi: Ingelosi yami iyohamba phambi kwenu, kodwa hhayi inkazimulo yami.
Kodwa ngithi kini: Izingelosi zami ziyohamba phambi kwenu, futhi ngokunjalo nenkazimulo yami, futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi niyohlala emhlabeni omuhle.
Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, inceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, yiyona indoda engiyifanise nenceku iNkosi ye sivini eyakhuluma nayo emfanekisweni engininike wona.
Ngakho-ke uJoseph Smith, omNcane, makathi emabuthweni endlu yami, izinsizwa zami futhi naba neminyaka emaphakathi—Buthanani ndawonye ezweni laseSiyoni, emhlabeni engiwuthengile ngemali enikelwe kimi.
Futhi amabandla onke mawathumele amadoda ahlakaniphileyo nezimali zawo, futhi bathenge imihlaba ngisho njengoba ngibayalile.

Futhi kangangoba izitha zami ziza ukuzonikhipha emhlabeni wami omuhle, engiwunikele ukuba ube ngumhlaba weSiyoni, ngisho benisusa kweyenu imihlaba emuva kwalobu bufakazi, enibulethe phambi kwami ngokumelana nabo, niyoziqalekisa;
Futhi noma ubani enimqalekisayo, ngizomqalekisa, futhi niyongiphindiselela ezitheni zami.
Futhi inkazimulo yami iyoba nani ngisho ekungiphindiseleleni ezitheni zami, kwesesithathu nesesine isizukulwane salabo abangizondayo.
Makungabi bikho muntu osaba ukudela impilo yakhe ngenxa yami; ngokuba noma ngubani odela impilo yakhe ngenxa yami uyophinda ayifumane.
Futhi noma ubani ongathandi ukudela impilo yakhe ngenxa yami akasiye umfundi wami.

Kuyintando yami ukuba inceku yami uSidney Rigdon ayophakamisa izwi lakhe emabandleni asemazweni asempumalanga, ukulungiselela amabandla agcine imiyalelo engiwanike yona ngokuphathelene nokubuyiselwa nokukhululwa kweSiyoni.

Kuyintando yami ukuba inceku yami uParley P. Pratt nenceku yami uLyman Wight bangabuyeli emhlabeni wabafowabo, baze bathole amaqembu abazoya nawo ezweni laseSiyoni, ngamashumi, noma ngamashumi amabili, noma ngamashumi amahlanu, noma ngekhulu, baze bathole izibalo ezingamakhulu amahlanu amabutho endlu yami.
Bhekani lena intando yami; celani nizophiwa; kodwa abantu abenzi njalo intando yami.
Ngakho-ke, uma ningawatholi amakhulu amahlanu, funani ngokukhuthala mhlawumbe nithole amakhulu amathathu.
Futhi uma ningakwazi ukuthola amakhulu amathathu, funani ngokukhuthala mhlawumbe ningathola ikhulu.
Kodwa ngiqinisile ngithi kini, umyalelo ngini nika wona, wokuthi ningayi phezulu ezweni laseSiyoni kuze kube nithole ikhulu lamabutho endlu yami, ukuba likhuphuka nani niye ezweni laseSiyoni.

Ngakho-ke, njengoba ngishilo kini, celani futhi niyophiwa; khulekani ngokukhuthazela mhlawumbe inceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, angahamba nani, futhi engamele phakathi kwabantu bami, futhi ahlele umbuso wami emhlabeni onikelwe, futhi amise abantwana baseSiyoni phezu kwemithetho nemiyalo eniyi nikiwe futhi enizonikwa yona.
Konke ukunqoba nodumo kufezeka kini ngokukhuthala, ngokuthembeka, nange mikhuleko yokukholwa.
Inceku yami uParley P. Pratt makahambe nenceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane.
Inceku yami uLyman Wight makahambe nenceku yami uSidney Rigdon.
Inceku yami uHyrum Smith makahambe nenceku yami uFrederick G. Williams.

Inceku yami u-Orson Hyde makahambe nenceku yami u-Orson Pratt, noma yikuphi lapho inceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, eyobaluleka ukuthi baye khona, ukuze kugcwaliswe lemiyalelo engini nike yona, futhi bayekele okusele ezandleni zami. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/104.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 104
chapter_summary: 1–10, AbaNgcwele abaphambukayo ohlelweni lokuba-munye bazoqalekiswa; 11–16, INkosi yondla abaNgcwele Bayo ngendlela Yayo; 17–18, Umthetho weVangeli yiwo ophethe ukunakekelwa kwabampofu; 19–46, Ubuphathi nezibusiso zabazalwane abahluka hlukene kuyashiwo; 47–53, Uhlelo lokuba munye eKirtland nohlelo oluseSiyoni kufanele kusebenze ngokuhlukene; 54–66, Indawo engcwele yeNkosi yokubeka imali iyamiswa ukuze kugaywe imibhalo engcwele; 67–77, Indawo yomphakathi yokubeka imali yohlelo lokuba munye kufanele isebenza ngohlelo lokuvumelana; 78–86, Labo abasohlelweni lokuba munye kufanele bakhokhe zonke izikweletu zabo, futhi iNkosi izobakhulula ezibophweni zemali.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, bahlobo, bami ngininika iseluleko, nomyalelo, ngokuphathelene nezimpahla zohlelo engiyale ukuba luhlelwe futhi lumiswe, ukuba kube uhlelo lokuba munye, nohlelo lwaphakade ukuze kuzuze ibandla lami, futhi ukuze abantu basindiswe ngize ngifike—
Ngesethembiso esingaguqukiyo nesingashintshekiyo, sokuthi kangangoba labo engibayalile bethembekile kufanele babusiswe ngezibusiso eziningi;
Kodwa kangangoba bengathembekanga babesondele kukho ukuqalekiswa;
Ngakho-ke, kangangoba abanye bezinceku zami bengawugcinanga umyalelo, kodwa bephule izivumelwano ngomhawu, nangamazwi okuzenzisa, ngibaqalekisile ngesiqalekiso esibuhlungu kakhulu nesinzima.

Ngokuba mina, iNkosi, nginqumile enhliziyweni yami, ukuthi kangangoba noma yimuphi umuntu wohlelo eyotholakala ephambuka, noma, ngamanye amazwi, eyophula izivumelwano eniboshwe ngaso, uyoqalekiswa empilweni yakhe, futhi uyonyathelwa yinoma wubani engimkhethileyo;
Ngokuba mina, iNkosi, angizuku hlekwa kulezi zinto—

Futhi konke lokhu ukuze abamsulwa phakathi kwenu bengeke babekwe icala nabangalungile; futhi ukuze abonile phakathi kwenu bangaphunyuli; ngokuba mina, iNkosi, nginethembisile umqhele wenkazimulo esandleni sami sokunene.
Ngakho-ke, kangangoba nitholwe niphambukile, ngeke niphunyule olakeni lwami ezimpilweni zenu.
Kangangoba nisusiwe ngenxa yokuphambuka, ngeke niphunyule kuzo izinhlupho zikaSathane kuze kube wusuku lokukhululwa.

Futhi manje ngininika amandla kusukela kulelihora, ukuthi uma kukhona phakathi kwenu, ongowohlelo, etholakala ephambuka futhi engaphenduki ebubini, ukuthi niyomnikela kuzo izinhlupho zikaSathane; futhi ngeke abe namandla oku letha ububi phezu kwenu.
Kuwuku hlakanipha kimi; ngakho-ke, umyalelo ngininika wona, wokuthi niyozihlela futhi nibeke wonke umuntu kubo ubuphathi bakhe;
Ukuze wonke umuntu aphendule kimi ngobuphathi anikwe bona.
Ngokuba kufanele ukuthi mina, iNkosi, ngenze wonke umuntu aziphendulele, njengo mphathi phezu kwezibusiso zasemhlabeni, engizenzileyo nengizilungisilele izidalwa zami.
Mina, iNkosi, ngelula amazulu, futhi ngakha umhlaba, umsebenzi wezandla zami uqobo; futhi zonke izinto ezikuwo zingezami.
Futhi kuyinhloso yami ukuhlinzekela abangcwele bami, ngokuba zonke izinto zingezami.
Kodwa kufanele kwenziwe ngendlela yami; futhi bhekani yiyo lendlela mina, iNkosi, engiyimisileyo ukuhlinzekela abangcwele bami, ukuze abampofu baphakanyiswe, ngokuthi abacebileyo benziwe bathobe.
Ngokuba umhlaba ugcwele, futhi kunokwanele nokuseleyo; yebo, ngalungisa zonke izinto, futhi nganika abantwana babantu ukuba bazikhethele.

Ngakho-ke, uma kukhona umuntu oyothatha okwenala engikwenzileyo, futhi anganiki eyakhe ingxenye, ngoko mthetho wevangeli lami, kwaba mpofu nabadingayo, uyophakamisa amehlo akhe esihogweni, nababi, esebuhlungwini.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngokuphathelene nezimpahla zohlelo—

Inceku yami uSidney Rigdon mayi nikezwe indawo lapho ihlala khona manje, nesabelo sendlu yokushuka izikhumba njengobuphathi bakhe, ukuze asizakale ngesikhathi esebenza esivinini sami, ngisho njengoba ngithanda, uma sengiyomyala.
Futhi konke makwenziwe ngokomyalo wohlelo, nokuvumelana okuhlangene noma izwi lohlelo, olusezweni laseKirtland.
Futhi lobu buphathi nesibusiso, mina, iNkosi, ngibunika inceku yami uSidney Rigdon kube yisibusiso kuye, nenzalo yakhe emuva kwakhe;
Futhi ngizozi phindaphinda izibusiso kuye, kangangoba eyozithoba phambi kwami.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, inceku yami uMartin Harris mayinikezwe, njengobuphathi bayo, isabelo somhlaba inceku yami uJohn Johnson ewuthole ngokushintshana ngefa lakhe lokuqala, sibe ngesakhe nenzalo yakhe emuva kwakhe;
Futhi kangangoba ethembekile, ngizozi phindaphinda izibusiso kuye nasenzalweni yakhe emva kwakhe.
Futhi inceku yami uMartin Harris makanikele ngezimali zakhe ukuze kushunyayelwe amazwi ami, njengoba inceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, iyosho.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, inceku yami uFrederick G. Williams makube ngeyakhe indawo ahlezi kuyo manje.
Futhi inceku yami u-Oliver Cowdery makabe nesabelo esihlelwe sahlukana nendlu kodwa siseduze nayo, okufanele sibe yihhovisi lokugayela, okuyisabelo sokuqala, futhi nesabelo lapho uyise ehlala khona.
Futhi izinceku zami uFrederick G. Williams no-Oliver Cowdery mababe nehhovisi lokugayela nelazo zonke izinto eziphathelene nakho.
Futhi lokhu kuyoba wubuphathi babo abayonikwa bona.
Futhi kangangoba bethembekile, bhekani ngiyobabusisa, futhi ngizi phindaphinde izibusiso kubo.
Futhi lokhu kuyisiqalo sobuphathi engibakhethele bona, bube ngobabo nenzalo yabo emuva kwabo.
Futhi, kangangoba bethembekile, ngizozi phindaphinda izibusiso kubo nenzalo yabo emva kwabo, ngisho ubuningi bezibusiso.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, inceku yami uJohn Johnson makabe nendlu ahlala kuyo, nefa, konke ngaphandle kwebala elibekelwe ukwakha izindlu zami, eliphathelene nalelofa, nalezo zabelo ezimiselwe inceku yami u-Oliver Cowdery.
Futhi kangangoba ethembekile, ngizozi phindaphinda izibusiso kuye.
Futhi kuyintando yami ukuthi kufanele adayise izabelo ezihlukaniselwe ukwakha idolobha labangcwele bami, kangangoba kuyokwaziswa kuye ngezwi likaMoya, futhi ngokomyalo wohlelo, nangezwi lohlelo.
Futhi lokhu kuwukuqala kobuphathi engibunike yena, ukubusisa yena nenzalo yakhe emuva kwakhe.
Futhi kangangoba ethembekile, ngizozi phindaphinda izibusiso kuye.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, inceku yami uNewel K. Whitney makanikezwe izindlu nesabelo lapho ehlala khona manje, nesabelo nesakhiwo kuso okumi imikhumbi ethwala impahla, nesabelo esisekhoneni eliseningizimu nemikhumbi ethwala impahla, nesabelo okukhona kuso umlotha.

Futhi konke lokhu ngikunike inceku yami uNewel K. Whitney njengobuphathi bakhe, kube yisibusiso kuye nenzalo yakhe emuva kwakhe, ukuze kuzuze isakhiwo semikhumbi ethwala impahla yohlelo lwami engilulungisele isifunda sami ezweni laseKirtland.
Yebo, ngiqinisile, lobu wubuphathi engibunike inceku yami uN. K. Whitney, ngisho lesi sakhiwo sonke semikhumbi yokuthwala impahla, yena no mphatheli wakhe, nenzalo yakhe emva kwakhe.
Futhi kangangoba ethembekile ekugcineni imiyalelo yami, engimnike yona, ngizozi phindaphinda izibusiso kuye nasenzalweni yakhe emva kwakhe, ngisho ubuningi bezibusiso.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, inceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, makanikezwe isabelo esihlukaniselwe ukwakha indlu yami, enezinduku ezingamashumi amane ubude neshumi nambili ububanzi, futhi nefa lapho kuhlala khona uyise;
Futhi lesi yisiqalo sobuphathi engibunike yena, ukuze kube yisibusiso kuye, nakuyise.
Ngokuba bhekani, ngimgcinele ifa uyise, ukuze odliwe; ngakho-ke uyothathwa njengowendlu yenceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane.
Futhi ngizozi phindaphinda izibusiso endlini yenceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, kangangoba ethembekile, ngisho ubuningi bezibusiso.
Manje, umyalelo sengini nika wona ngokuphathelene neSiyoni, wokuthi aniseyikuphinde nihlanganiswe ngohlelo lokuba munye kubafowenu baseSiyoni, kuphela ngalendlela—

Emva kokuba senihleliwe, niyobizwa ngoHlelo lokuba Munye lwesi Khonkwane seSiyoni, iDolobha laseKirtland. Futhi abafowenu, emva kokuba sebehleliwe, bayobizwa ngoHlelo lokuba Munye lweDolobha laseSiyoni.
Futhi bayohlelwa ngamagama abo, futhi egameni labo; futhi bayokwenza umsebenzi wabo egameni labo, futhi emagameni abo;
Futhi niyokwenza umsebenzi egameni lenu, futhi emagameni enu.
Futhi lokhu ngikuyalele ukuba kwenzelwe insindiso yenu, futhi ngokunjalo nensindiso yabo, ngenxa yoku xoshwa kwabo nalokho okuzokuza.
Izivumelwano ziphulwa ngokuphambuka, ngomhawu namazwi okuzenzisa—

Ngakho-ke, senihlakaziwe njengohlelo lokuba munye nabafowenu, okungukuthi anisahlangene kuphela kuze kube ngalelihora kubona, ngaphandle kwalendlela, njengoba ngishilo, ngezikweletu njengoba kuyovunyelwana ngaloluhlelo emkhandlwini, njengokuvuma kwezimo zenu nangokuyalela kwezwi lomkhandlu.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngini nika umyalelo ngobuphathi engininike bona.
Bhekani, zonke lezi zimpahla zingezami, kungenjalo ukukholwa kwenu kuyize, futhi nitholwe ningaba zenzisi, nezivumelwano enizenzileyo kimi ziphuliwe;
Futhi uma izimpahla kungezami, uma kunjalo ninga baphathi; uma kungenjalo anibona abaphathi.
Kodwa, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, nginikhethile ukuba nibe ngabaphathi endlini yami, ngisho abaphathi ngempela.

Futhi ngenxa yalesi sizathu nginiyale ukuba nizihlele, ngisho ukuba nigaye amazwi ami, ukuphelela konke kwemibhalo yami engcwele, izambulo engini nike zona, futhi nengiyoni nika zona, emva kwalokhu, izikhathi ngezikhathi—
Ngenhloso yokwakha ibandla nombuso wami emhlabeni, futhi nokulungiselela abantu bami isikhathi lapho ngiyo hlala nabo, esesi seduze.
Futhi niyokuzilungiselela indawo yokugcina imali, futhi niyingcwelisele igama lami.
Futhi niyobeka oyedwa wenu ukuba agcine indawo yokugcina imali, futhi uyogcotshelwa kulesi sibusiso.

Futhi kuyoba khona uphawu oluyobekwa phezu kwendawo ehlala imali, futhi zonke izinto ezingcwele ziyolethwa kulendawo yemali; futhi akukho muntu phakathi kwenu oyoyibiza ngokuthi ingeyakhe, noma iyiphi ingxenye yayo, ngokuba iyoba ngeyenu nonke ngesivumelwano sinye.

Futhi ngini nika kusukela ngalelihora; manje qinisekani, ukuthi niyoqala futhi nisebenzise ubuphathi engini nike bona, ngaphandle kwezinto ezingcwele, ngenhloso yokucindezela lezi zinto ezingcwele njengoba ngishilo.

Futhi inzuzo yezinto ezingcwele iyogcinwa endaweni yemali, futhi kuyobekwa uphawu phezu kwayo; futhi ngeke isetshenziswe noma ithathwe isuswe endaweni yemali noma ngubani, futhi ngeke uphawu luthanjiswe olubekwe phezu kwayo, kuphela ngezwi lohlelo, noma ngomyalelo.
Futhi niyoyigcina kanjalo inzuzo yezinto ezingcwele endaweni yemali, ngezinhloso ezingcwele nezilungileyo.
Futhi lokhu kuyobizwa ngendawo yemali engcwele yeNkosi; futhi uphawu luyobekwa phezu kwayo ukuze ibe ngcwele futhi ingcweliselwe iNkosi.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, kuyokuba nenye indawo yemali eyolungiswa, futhi umgcinisikhwama uyobekwa ukugcina indawo yemali, futhi uphawu luyobekwa phezu kwayo;

Futhi zonke izimali enizitholayo ebuphathini benu, ngokwenzangcono impahla engini nike yona, ngokuphathelene nezindlu, nemihlaba, noma izinkomo, noma nazo zonke izinto ngaphandle uma kuyimibhalo engcwele nelungileyo, engiyigcinele mina ukuze ngifeze izinhloso ezingcwele nezilungileyo, ziyophoswa endaweni yemali ngokushesha nisandu kuzithola lezo zimali, ngamakhulu, noma ngamashumi amahlanu, noma ngamashumi amabili, noma ngamashumi, noma ngokuhlanu.

Noma ngamanye amazwi, uma kukhona umuntu phakathi kwenu ofumana amadola amahlanu makawafake endaweni yemali; noma uma ethola ayishumi, noma angamashumi amabili, angamashumi amahlanu noma alikhulu, makenze kanjalo;
Futhi makungabi bikho muntu phakathi kwenu othi ingeyakhe; ngokuba ngeke ibizwe ngeyakhe, noma iyiphi ingxenye yayo.
Futhi akukho ngxenye yayo eyosetshenziswa, noma ithathwe endaweni yemali, kuphela ngezwi nokuvumelana kohlelo.
Futhi lokhu kuyoba yizwi nokuvumelana kohlelo—ukuba noma yimuphi umuntu phakathi kwenu athi kumgcini sikhwama: Ngidinga lokhu ukungilekelela ebuphathini bami—
Uma kungamadola amahlanu, noma uma kungamadola alishumi, noma angamashumi amabili noma angamashumi amahlanu, noma ikhulu, umgcini sikhwama uyomnikeza inani alidingayo ukumlekelela ebuphathini bakhe—
Kuze kube ufunyanwa engophambukile, futhi kuvezwe phambi komkhandlu wohlelo ngokusobala ukuthi ungongathembekile nomphathi ongahlakaniphile.
Kodwa uma esalokhu ehlanganyela ngokugcwele, futhi ethembekile futhi ehlakaniphile ebuphathini bakhe, lokhu kuyoba wuphawu lwakhe kumgcini sikhwama ukuthi umgcini sikhwama angagodli.
Kodwa uma kukhona isiphambeko, umgcini sikhwama uyoba ngaphansi kokulawulwa wumkhandlu nezwi lohlelo.

Futhi uma kutholakala umgcini sikhwama engumphathi ongathembekile futhi nongahlakaniphile, uyoba ngaphansi kokulawulwa wumkhandlu nezwi lohlelo, futhi uyosuswa esikhundleni sakhe, futhi omunye uyobekwa esikhundleni sakhe.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngokuphathelene nezikweletu zenu—bhekani kuyintando yami ukuthi nizikhokhe zonke izikweletu zenu.
Futhi kuyintando yami ukuthi nizithobe phambi kwami, futhi nifumane lesi sibusiso ngokukhuthala nokuzithoba nangomkhuleko wokukholwa.
Futhi kangangoba nikhuthele futhi nithobekile, futhi nenza umkhuleko wokukholwa, bhekani, ngizozithambisa izinhliziyo zalabo enibakweletayo, ngize ngilethe isu kini lokuba nikhululwe.

Ngakho-ke bhalelani ngokushesha eNew York futhi nibhale ngokwalokho okuzonikwa ngu Moya wami; futhi ngizozithambisa izinhliziyo zalabo enibakweletayo, ukuba kususwe ezingqondweni zabo ukuba balethe ukuhlushwa phezu kwenu.
Futhi kangangoba nizithobile futhi nithembekile futhi nibiza igama lami, bhekani, ngizoni nika ukunqoba.
Ngini nika isethembiso, sokuthi niyokhululwa ngalesi sikhathi sodwa ebugqilini benu.
Kangangoba nifumana ithuba lokuboleka imali ngamakhulu, noma ngezinkulungwane, ngisho kuze kube niboleke okwanele ukunikhulula ebugqilini, kulilungelo lenu.
Futhi bambisani ngezimpahla engizibeke ezandleni zenu, ngalesi sikhathi sodwa, ngokunikeza amagama enu ngokuvumelana noma ngenye indlela, njengoba kuyobukeka kukuhle kini.

Ngini nika lelilungelo, ngalesi sikhathi sodwa; futhi bhekani, uma niqhubeka nokwenza lezi zinto engizibeke phambi kwenu, ngokwemiyalelo yami, zonke lezi zinto zingezami, futhi nina ningabaphathi bami, futhi umninindlu ngeke avume indlu yakhe ifohlwe. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/105.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 105
chapter_summary: 1–5, ISiyoni izokwakhiwa ngokulandela umthetho wesilestiyali; 6–13, Ukusindiswa kweSiyoni kuhlehlisiwe okwesikhashana; 14–19, INkosi izozilwa izimpi zeSiyoni; 20–26, AbaNgcwele kufanele bahlakaniphe futhi bangazigabisi ngemisebenzi emikhulu ngesikhathi behlangana; 27–30, Imihlaba eseJackson nasezifundeni ezakhelene kufanele ithengwe; 31–34, Amagosa azophiwa izipho zomoya endlini yeNkosi eseKirtland; 35–37, AbaNgcwele ababiziwe futhi nabakhethiweyo bazongcweliswa; 38–41, AbaNgcwele kufanele baphakamise isibonakaliso sokuthula emhlabeni.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini enizihlanganise ndawonye ukuze nifumane ulwazi ngentando yami ngoku buyiselwa kwabantu bami esimweni sabo abahlushiwe—
Bhekani, ngithi kini, ukuba bekunge ngenxa ye ziphambeko zabantu bami, ngikhuluma ngokuphathelene nebandla hhayi ngabantu ngabanye, ngabe sebebuyiselwe esimweni sabo ngisho manje.

Kodwa bhekani, abafundile ukwenza izinto engizidinga ezandleni zabo, kodwa bagcwele lonke uhlobo lobubi, futhi ababelani izinto zabo, njengokufanele abangcwele, kwabampofu nabahlushiweyo phakathi kwabo;
Futhi aba munye ngokokuba munye okudingwa wumthetho wombuso wesilestiyali;
Futhi uSiyoni ngeke akhiwe ngaphandle kwemigomo yo mthetho wombuso wesilestiyali; kungenjalo angikwazi ukumamukela kimi.
Futhi abantu bami kudingeka bajeziswe baze bafunde ukulalela, uma kudingekile, ngezinto abezwa ubuhlungu ngazo.
Angikhulumi ngalabo ababekelwe ukuhola abantu bami, abanga magosa okuqala ebandla lami, ngokuba akubona bonke abangaphansi kwalokhu kubekwa icala;
Kodwa ngikhuluma ngamabandla ami akude—baningi abazothi: Uphi uNkulunkulu wabo na? Bhekani, uzobakhulula ngesikhathi sobunzima, kungenjalo ngeke siye eSiyoni, futhi sizozi godla izimali zethu.
Ngakho-ke, ngenxa ye ziphambeko zabantu bami, ngibona kufanele ukuba amagosa ami alinde isikhashana kuze kubuyiselwe iSiyoni—

Ukuze bona uqobo balungiswe, futhi nokuba abantu bami bafundiswe ngokuphelele kakhudlwana, futhi bathole ithuba lokuzenzela, futhi bazi kakhudlwana ngokuphathelene nomsebenzi wabo, futhi nezinto engizidinga ezandleni zabo.
Futhi lokhu ngeke kwenzeke kuze kube amagosa ami aphiwa amandla avela phezulu.
Ngokuba bhekani, ngilungise izipho zomoya ezinkulu nesibusiso ukuba kuthululwe phezu kwabo, kangangoba bethembekile futhi beqhubeka ngokuzithoba phambi kwami.
Ngakho-ke ngibona kufanele ukuba amagosa ami alinde isikhashana, kuze kubuyiselwe iSiyoni.
Ngokuba bhekani, angikufuni ezandleni zabo ukuthi balwe izimpi zeSiyoni; ngokuba, njengoba ngishilo emyalelweni ongaphambili, ngisho kanjalo-ke ngiyokugcwalisa lokho—ngizozilwa izimpi zenu.

Bhekani, umbhubhisi ngimthumele ukuba abhubhise futhi achithe izitha zami; futhi iminyaka engeminingi kusuka manje bayobe bengasekho ukungcolisa ifa lami, noku jivaza igama lami emihlabeni engiyi ngcwelisele ukuba kuqoqane ndawonye abangcwele bami.

Bhekani, ngiyale inceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, ukuba athi emandleni endlu yami, ngisho amabutho ami, izinsizwa zami, naba neminyaka emaphakathi, mabaqoqane ndawonye ukubuyisela abantu bami, futhi badilize imibhoshongo yezitha zami, futhi bahlakaze abaqaphi babo;
Kodwa amandla endlu yami awaka walaleli amazwi ami.
Kodwa kangangoba kunalabo abawalalelayo amazwi ami, ngibalungisele isibusiso nesipho somoya, uma beqhubeka ngokuthembeka.
Ngiyizwile imikhuleko yabo, futhi ngizowemukela umnikelo wabo; futhi ngikubona kufanele ukuba balethwe kuze kube lapha ukuze kuvivinywe ukholo labo.
Manje, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, umyalelo ngini nika wona, wokuthi kangangoba bebaningi abeze lapha, abangahlala esifundeni esiseduze, mabahlale;
Futhi labo abangeke bahlale, abanemindeni empumalanga, mabahlale isikhashana, kangangoba inceku yami uJoseph eyobakhombisa;
Ngokuba ngizomluleka ngaloludaba, futhi zonke izinto noma yini ayobabela yona iyogcwaliseka.

Futhi abantu bami bonke abahlala ezifundeni eziseduzane mabathembeke kakhulu, futhi bakhuleke, futhi bazithobe phambi kwami, futhi bangazambuli izinto engizambule kubo, kuze kube ngukuhlakanipha kimi ukuba zambulwe.
Ningakhulumi ngokwahlulelwa, ninga zigabisi ngokukholwa noma ngemisebenzi emikhulu, kodwa qoqanani ndawonye ngokucophelela, ngobuningi benu esifundeni esisodwa, ngokuvumelana nemizwa yabantu;

Futhi bhekani, ngizoni nika umusa emehlweni abo, ukuze niphumule ngo kuthula nangokuphepha, ngesikhathi nithi kubantu: Senzeleni ukwahlulela nokulunga ngokomthetho, futhi nisilungisele ekoniweni kwethu.
Manje, bhekani, ngithi kini, bahlobo bami, ngalendlela ningathola umusa emehlweni abantu, kuze kube ibutho lika-Israyeli liba likhulu kakhulu.

Futhi ngizozi thambisa izinhliziyo zabantu, njengoba ngenza enhliziyweni ka Faro, izikhathi ngezikhathi, kuze kube inceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, namagosa ami, engiwabekile, babe nesikhathi sokuqoqa amandla endlu yami,
Futhi nokuthumela amadoda ahlakaniphileyo, ukugcwalisa lokho engikuyalile ngokuphathelene nokuthengwa kwayo yonke imihlaba esifundeni saseJackson engathengwa, nasezi fundazweni eziseduzane.
Ngokuba kuyintando yami ukuba lemihlaba ithengwe; futhi emva kokuba ithengiwe ukuba abangcwele bami ibe ngeyabo ngokwe mithetho yokunikela engiyinikile.

Futhi emva kokuthengwa kwale mihlaba, angiyukuwabeka cala amabutho ka-Israyeli ngokuthatha imihlaba yabo, ababeyithengile kuqala ngezimali zabo, nokuchitha imibhoshongo yezitha zami engaba phezu kwabo, nokuhlakaza abaqaphi bazo, nokungi phindiselela ezitheni zami esizukulwaneni sesithathu nese sine salabo abangizondayo.
Kodwa ibutho lami malibe likhulu kuqala, futhi malingcweliswe phambi kwami, ukuze libe lihle njengelanga, futhi licwebe njengenyanga, futhi ukuze izibonakaliso zabo zesabeke kuzo zonke izizwe;
Ukuze imibuso yalomhlaba iphoqeleke ukuvuma ukuthi umbuso weSiyoni impela ungumbuso kaNkulunkulu wethu noKristu wakhe; ngakho-ke, masibe phansi kwemithetho yakhe.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngibona kufanele ukuba amagosa ebandla lami okuqala athole izipho zabo zomoya ezivela phezulu endlini yami, engiyalile ukuba yakhiwe egameni lami ezweni laseKirtland.
Futhi leyo miyalo engiyinikile ngokuphathelene noSiyoni nomthetho wakhe mayenziwe futhi mayigcwaliseke, emva kokubuyiselwa kwakhe.
Kube nosuku loku bizwa, kodwa isikhathi sesifikile sosuku lokukhetha; futhi labo abakhethiweyo mabafaneleke.
Futhi kuzovezwa kuyo inceku yami, ngezwi likaMoya, labo abakhethiweyo; futhi bayo ngcweliswa;
Futhi kangangoba belandela iziyalo abazitholile, bazokuba namandla emuva kwezinsuku eziningi okufeza zonke izinto eziphathelene neSiyoni.
Futhi phezu kwalokho ngithi kini, ncengani ukuthula, hhayi kubantu kuphela abanishayile, kodwa futhi nakubo bonke abantu;
Futhi phakamisani isibonakaliso sokuthula, futhi nenze isimemezelo sokuthula siye emikhawulweni yomhlaba;
Futhi yenzani iziphakamiso zokuthula kulabo abanishayile, ngokwezwi loMoya elikini, futhi zonke izinto ziyosebenzelana ukuze kube kuhle kini.
Ngakho-ke, thembekani; futhi bhekani, futhi bheka, nginani ngisho kuze kube sekugcineni. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/106.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 106
chapter_summary: 1–3, UWarren A. Cowdery ubizwa ukuba aphathe isikhundla sokwengamela salapho ehlala khona; 4–5, UkuZa kwesiBili ngeke kubafice abantwana bokukhanya njengesela; 6–8, Zinkulu izibusiso ezilandela ukusebenza ngokwethembeka eBandleni.

verses.text: Kuyintando yami ukuba inceku yami uWarren A. Cowdery abekwe futhi agcotshwe abe ngumphristi omkhulu owengamele ebandleni lami, ezweni lase Freedom nasezifundeni eziseduze;
Futhi kufanele ashumayele ivangeli lami laphakade, futhi aphakamise izwi lakhe futhi axwayise abantu, hhayi kuphela endaweni yakhe, kodwa ezifundeni eziseduze;

Futhi anikele ngesikhathi sonke sakhe kulolubizo oluphezulu nolungcwele, engilunika yena manje, efuna ngokukhuthala umbuso wasezulwini nokulunga kwawo, futhi zonke izinto ezidingekayo ziyokwengezwa kulokho; ngokuba isisebenzi sifanelwe yinkokhelo yaso.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ukuza kweNkosi kuyasondela eduze, futhi kufica umhlaba njengesela ebusuku—
Ngakho-ke, bophani izinkalo zenu, ukuze nibe abantwana bokukhanya, futhi lolo suku ngeke lunifice njengesela.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, kwabakhona injabulo ezulwini ngesikhathi inceku yami uWarren ekhothamela intonga yami, futhi ezihlukanisa nobuqili babantu;
Ngakho-ke, ibusisiwe inceku yami uWarren, ngokuba ngizoba nomusa kuye; futhi, nakuba enobuze enhliziyweni yakhe, ngizomuphakamisa kangangoba ezozithoba phambi kwami.
Futhi ngizomunika umusa nesiqiniseko angama ngaso; futhi uma eqhubeka eba ngufakazi owethembekile nokukhanya ebandleni ngimlungisele umqhele ezindlini zikaBaba. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/107.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 107
chapter_summary: 1–6, Bubili ubuphristi: obuka Melkisedeki nobuka-Aroni; 7–12, Labo abanobuPhristi bukaMelkisedeki banamandla okwenza imisebenzi yazo zonke izikhundla eBandleni; 13–17, Abobu bhishobhi bengamela ubuPhristi buka-Aroni, obenza izimiso zangaphandle; 18–20, UbuPhristi bukaMelkisedeki buphethe izikhiye zazo zonke izibusiso zomoya; ubuPhristi buka-Aroni buphethe izikhiye zokusetshenzelwa yizingelosi; 21–38, UbuMongameli bokuQala, abayiShumi naMbili, nabaNgamashumi ayisiKhombisa bakha imigwamanda engamelayo, izinqumo zawo okufanele zenziwe ngokuba munye nangokulunga; 39–52, Uhlelo lobuphatriyake lwamiswa kusuka ku-Adamu kuya kuNowa; 53–57, AbaNgcwele bakudala bahlangana e-Adamu-ondi-Ahman, futhi iNkosi yavela kubo; 58–67, AbayiShumi naMbili kufanele bahlele abaphathi-zikhundla beBandla; 68–76, Ababhishobhi basebenza njengabehluleli babo bonke kwa-Israyeli; 77–84, UbuMongameli bokuQala nabayiShumi-namBili bayinkantolo enkulu kunazo zonke eBandleni; 85–100, Omongameli bobuPhristi balawula imigwamanda engaphansi kwabo.

verses.text: Ebandleni, kukhona ubuphristi obubili, obubizwa ngokuthi, obuka Melkisedeki nobuka-Aroni, okuhlanganisa nobuPhristi bukaLevi.
Kungani obokuqala bubizwa ngobuPhristi bukaMelkisedeki yingoba uMelkisedeki wayengu mphristi omkhlulu kakhulu.
Ngaphambi kwesikhathi sakhe babubizwa ngobuPhristi obuNgcwele, ngoko Hlelo lweNdodana kaNkulunkulu.

Kodwa ngenxa yokuhlonipha noma ukwesaba igama likaNkulunkulu, ukuvimbela ukuphinda kaningi ngokweqile igama lakhe, bona, ibandla, ezinsukwini zakudala, babubiza lobo buphristi ngoMelkisedeki, noma UbuPhristi bukaMelkisedeki.
Bonke abanye abasemagunyeni noma ezikhundleni ebandleni bayizengezo kulobu buphristi.
Kodwa zimbili izigaba noma izihloko ezinkulu—esisodwa ubuPhristi bukaMelkisedeki, futhi esinye ubuPhristi buka-Aroni noma ubuPhristi bukaLevi.
Isikhundla sobu gosa singaphansi kobuphristi bukaMelkisedeki.
UbuPhristi bukaMelkisedeki buphethe ilungelo lobumongameli, futhi bunamandla ne gunya phezu kwazo zonke izikhundla ebandleni kuzo zonke izikhathi zomhlaba, ukwengamela ezintweni zikamoya.
UbuMongameli bobuPhristi obuKhulu, ngokohlelo lukaMelkisedeki, bunelungelo lokwenza imisebenzi yazo zonke izikhundla ebandleni.

Abaphristi abakhulu ngokohlelo lobuPhristi bukaMelkisedeki bane lungelo lokwenza imisebenzi obizweni lwabo, ngaphansi kokuholwa ubumongameli, ekuphatheni izinto zikamoya, futhi ngokunjalo nakuso isikhundla segosa, sobuphristi (ngokohlelo lukaLevi), sobuthisha, sobudikoni, kanye nesobulungu.
Igosa linelungelo lokwenza imisebenzi kuso isikhundla somphristi omkhulu uma engekho.

Umphristi omkhulu negosa kufanele bengamele ezintweni zikamoya, ngokuvumelana nezivumelwano nemiyalelo yebandla; futhi banelungelo lokwenza imisebenzi kuzo zonke lezi zikhundla zebandla uma bengekho abasemagunyeni amakhulu.
Ubuphristi besibili bubizwa ngo buPhristi buka-Aroni, ngokuba banikwa u-Aroni nenzalo yakhe, kuzo zonke izizukulwane zabo.
Kungani bubizwa ngobuphristi obuncane yingoba buyisengezo kobukhulu, noma ubuPhristi bukaMelkisedeki, futhi bunamandla okwenza izimiso zangaphandle.
Ububhishobhi bungubu mongameli balobu buphristi, futhi buphethe izikhiye noma igunya labo.
Ayikho indoda enelungelo ngokusemthethweni kulesi sikhundla, ukuba iphathe izikhiye zalobu buphristi, ngaphandle uma ingowe sizukulwane ngempela sika-Aroni.

Kodwa ngokuba umphristi omkhulu wobuPhristi bukaMelkisedeki unegunya lokwenza imisebenzi yazo zonke izikhundla ezincane, angaphatha esikhundleni sikambhishobhi uma engekho owesi zukulwane ngempela sika-Aroni ongatholakala, uma ebiziwe futhi wabekwa futhi wagcotshelwa kula mandla ngezandla zo buMongameli bobuPhristi bukaMelkisedeki.
Amandla negunya lalobo obukhulu, noma ubuPhristi bukaMelkisedeki, wukuphatha izikhiye zazo zonke izibusiso zikamoya zebandla—

Ukuba nelungelo lokufumana izimfihlakalo zombuso wasezulwini, ukuba bavulelwe amazulu, ukuxhumana no mbuthano omkhulu nebandla leNkosana, futhi nokuthokozela ubudlelwane nobukhona bukaNkulunkulu uBaba, noJesu ongu mlamuleli wesivumelwano esisha.

Amandla negunya lalobo obuncane, noma ubuPhristi buka-Aroni, wukuphatha izikhiye zokusetshenzelwa yizingelosi, futhi nokwenza izimiso zangaphandle, izenzo zevangeli, umbhabhadiso wokuphenduka ukuze kutholakale ukuthethelelwa kwezono, ngokuvumelana nezivumelwano nemiyalelo.
Ngokwesidingo kukhona omongameli, noma abaphathi zikhundla abengamele abavela, noma ababekwa phakathi kwalabo abagcotshelwe ezikhundleni ezahlukeneyo kulobu buphristi obubili.

Kubo ubuPhristi bukaMelkisedeki, abathathu abaPhristi abaKhulu nabeNgamelayo, abakhethwe wumgwamanda, ababekwe futhi bagcotshelwa kuleso sikhundla, futhi abesekwe ngokuthenjwa, ngokholo, nangomkhuleko webandla, benza umgwamanda wobuMongameli beBandla.

Abayi shumi nambili abeluleki abahambayo babizwa ukuba babe ngaba Phostoli abayiShumi-namBili, noma ofakazi abakhethekileyo begama likaKristu emhlabeni wonke—ngalokho bayahluka kwabanye abaphathi-zikhundla ebandleni ngemisebenzi yobizo lwabo.
Futhi benza umgwamanda, belingana ngegunya nangamandla nomongameli abathathu asebe babaluliwe.

Abangama Shumi-ayisiKhombisa nabo babizwa ukuba bashumayele ivangeli, nokuba ngofakazi abakhethekileyo kwabeZizwe nasemhlabeni wonke—ngalokho bayahluka kwabanye abaphathi-zikhundla ebandleni ngemisebenzi yobizo lwabo.
Futhi benza umgwamanda, olinganayo ngegunya nalabo ofakazi abakhethiweyo abayiShumi-namBili noma abaPhostoli abasanda kubalulwa.

Futhi zonke izinqumo ezenziwa yinoma yimiphi yalemigwamanda kufanele zibe ngezwi lokuvumelana elifanayo; okungukuthi, wonke amalungu kulowo mgwamanda kufanele avumelane nezinqumo, ukuze benze izinqumo zabo zibe namadla afanayo noma zibe neqiniso komunye nomunye—
Iningi lingakha umgwamanda uma izimo zidala ukuba kungenzeki ngenye indlela—

Ngaphandle kokuba lokhu kube njalo, izinqumo zabo azizifanele izibusiso ezifana nezinqumo zomgwamanda womongameli abathathu ezazi zifanele kudala, ababegcotshwe ngokohlelo lukaMelkisedeki, futhi ababe ngamadoda alungile nangcwele.

Izinqumo zalemigwamanda, noma omunye wayo, kufanele zenziwe kukho konke ukulunga, ubungcwele, nokuthobeka kwenhliziyo, ubumnene nokubekezela, nokukholwa, no buqotho, nolwazi, ukuzithiba, isineke, nokwesaba uNkulunkulu, umusa wobuzalwane nesihe;
Ngokuba isethembiso wukuthi, uma lezi zinto zivama kubo ngeke bangatheli olwazini lweNkosi.

Futhi uma kwenzeka kuba khona isinqumo salemigwamanda esithathwe ngokungalungi, singalethwa phambi komhlangano omkhulu wemigwamanda ehlukeneyo, eyakha abasemagunyeni bebandla abaphethe ezomoya; kungenjalo ngeke kubekhona ukudlulisa icala esinqumweni abasithathile.

AbayiShumi namBili bawumKhandlu omKhulu wabeNgamelayo wabaHambayo, ukuba benze imisebenzi egameni leNkosi, ngaphansi kokuholwa wubuMongameli beBandla, ngokuvumelana nokumiswe ezulwini; ukwakha ibandla, nokulawula zonke izindaba zebandla ezizweni zonke, kuqala kwa beZizwe futhi kwesibili kumaJuda.

AbangamaShumi-ayisiKhombisa kufanele benze izinto egameni leNkosi, ngokuholwa abayi Shumi namBili noma umkhandlu omkhulu wabahambayo, ekwakheni ibandla nokulawula zonke izindaba zebandla ezizweni zonke, kuqala kwabeZizwe emva kwalokho kumaJuda futhi—
AbayiShumi-namBili bethunyiwe, bephethe izikhiye, ukuvula umnyango ngokumemezela ivangeli likaJesu Kristu, kuqala kwabeZizwe emva kwalokho kumaJuda futhi.

Imikhandlu emimkhulu emile, kuzo izikhonkwane zeSiyoni, yakha imigwamanda elinganayo ngegunya ezindabeni zebandla, kuzo zonke izinqumo zayo, nomgwamanda wobumongameli, noma nomkhandlu omkhulu ohambayo.
Umkhandlu omkhulu eSiyoni wakha umgwamanda olinganayo ngegunya ezindabeni zebandla, kuzo zonke izinqumo zawo, nemikhandlu yabayiShumi naMbili kuzo izikhonkwane zeSiyoni.
Kungumsebenzi womkhandlu omkhulu wabahambayo ukucela abangama Shumi-ayisiKhombisa, uma bedinga usizo, ukuba benze umsebenzi wokushumayela nokunika ivangeli, esikhundleni sanoma yibaphi abanye.
Kungumsebenzi wabayiShumi naMbili, kuwo wonke amagatsha ebandla amakhulu, ukugcoba abavangeli, njengokuba beyokhonjwa kubo ngesambulo—
Uhlelo lwalobuphristi lwamiselwa ukuba ludluliswe kusuka kubaba kuya kundodana, futhi ngokufanele lungolwe sizukulwane ngempela sozalo olukhethiweyo, okwenziwa kulo izethembiso.
Loluhlelo lwamiswa ezinsukwini zika-Adamu, futhi lwehla njalo ngozalo ngalendlela elandelayo:

Kusuka ku-Adamu kuya ku Seti, owagcotshwa ngu-Adamu eseneminyaka engamashumi ayisithupha nesishiyagalolunye, futhi wabusiswa nguye eminyakeni emithathu eyandulela ukufa kwakhe (u-Adamu), futhi wafumana isethembiso sikaNkulunkulu ngoyise, sokuthi izizukulwane zakhe kufanele zibe ngezikhethiweyo zeNkosi, futhi nokuthi kufanele bagcinwe kuze kube sekupheleni komhlaba;

Ngokuba yena (uSeti) waye yindoda elungileyo, futhi nokufana kwakhe kwaku wukufana ncimishi noyise, kangangoba wayebukeka efana noyise ezintweni zonke, futhi wayengahlukaniswa kuye kuphela ngeminyaka yakhe.
U-Enoshe wagcotshwa eseneminyaka eyikhulu namashumi amathathu nane nezinyanga ezine, ngesandla sika-Adamu.

UNkulunkulu wabiza uKhenani ehlane ngonyaka wamashumi amane eminyaka yakhe; futhi wahlangana no-Adamu ekuhambeni eya endaweni yase Shedolamak. Wayeseneminyaka engamashumi ayisishiyagalombili nesikhombisa yobudala ngesikhathi efumana ukugcotshwa kwakhe.
UMahalalele wayeseneminyaka engamakhulu amane namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye nesithupha nezinsuku eziyisikhombisa zobudala ngesikhathi egcotshwa ngesandla sika-Adamu, owabuye futhi wambusisa.
UJarede wayeneminyaka engamakhulu amabili yobudala ngesikhathi egcotshwa ngaphansi kwesandla sika-Adamu, owabuya futhi wambusisa.
U-Enoke wayeseneminyaka engamashumi amabili nahlanu yobudala ngesikhathi egcotshwa ngaphansi kwesandla sika-Adamu; futhi wayeseneminyaka engamashumi ayisithupha nanhlanu u-Adamu wambusisa futhi.

Futhi wabona iNkosi, futhi wahamba nayo futhi wayephambi kobuso bayo njalonjalo; futhi wahamba noNkulunkulu iminyaka engamakhulu amathathu namashumi ayisithupha nanhlanu, okwamenza waba neminyaka engamakhulu amane namashumi amathathu ngesikhathi eguqulwa.
UMetushela wayeneminyaka elikhulu ubudala ngesikhathi egcotshwa ngaphansi kwesandla sika-Adamu.
ULameka wayeneminyaka engamashumi amathathu nambili yobudala ngesikhathi egcotshwa ngaphansi kwesandla sikaSeti.
UNowa wayeneminyaka eyishumi ubudala ngesikhathi egcotshwa ngaphansi kwesandla sikaMetushela.
