Iminyaka emithathu eyandulela ukufa kuka-Adamu, wabiza uSeti, u-Enoshe, uKhenani, uMahalalele, uJarede, u-Enoke, noMetushela, bonke ababenga baphristi abakhulu, nababesele besizukulwana sakhe ababelungile, esigodini sase Adamu-ondi-Ahman, futhi lapho wabanika isibusiso sakhe sokugcina.
Futhi iNkosi yavela kubo, futhi basukuma futhi bambusisa u-Adamu, futhi bambiza ngo Mikayeli, umholi, ingelosi enkulu.
Futhi iNkosi yamduduza u-Adamu futhi yathi kuye: Ngikwabele ukuba ube ngumholi; izizwe eziningi ziyovela ngawe, futhi ungumholi phezu kwabo ingunaphakade.
Futhi u-Adamu wema phakathi nebandla; futhi, nakuba wayese khothanyiswa wubudala, egcwele uMoya oNgcwele, washo konke okwakuzokwehlela izizukulwane zakhe kuze kube isizukulwane sokugcina.
Lezi zinto zazibhaliwe zonke encwadini ka-Enoke, futhi kufanele kufakazwe ngazo ngesikhathi esifanele.
Kungumsebenzi wabayi Shumi naMbili, futhi, ukugcoba futhi bahlele bonke abaphathi-zikhundla bebandla, ngokuvumelana nesambulo esithi:
Ebandleni likaKristu ezweni laseSiyoni, ukugcwalisela kuyo imithetho yebandla maqondana nomsebenzi webandla—
Ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, kusho iNkosi yamaBandla, kudingeka kubekhona amagosa angamelayo ukwengamela labo abangabesikhundla sobugosa;
Ngokunjalo naba phristi abazokwengamela labo abangabesikhundla sobuphristi;
Ngokunjalo nothisha abazo kwengamela labo abangabesikhundla sobuthisha, ngendlela efanayo, namadikoni—
Ngalokho-ke, kusuka kwidikoni kuya kuthisha, futhi kusuka kuthisha kuya kumphristi, futhi kusuka kumphristi kuya kwigosa, ngamunye njengokubekwa kwabo, ngokwezivumelwano nemiyalelo yebandla.
Emva kwalokho kuza ubuPhristi obuKhulu, obukhulu kunabo bonke.
Ngalokho-ke, kudingeka ukuba oyedwa wobuPhristi obuKhulu abekwe ukwengamela lobu buphristi, futhi uyobizwa ngoMongameli wobuPhristi obuKhulu beBandla;
Noma, ngamanye amazwi, uMphristi oMkhulu oweNgamele kubuPhristi obuKhulu beBandla.
Kusuka kuye kuza ukunikwa kwezimiso nezibusiso ebandleni, ngokubekwa izandla.
Ngalokho-ke, isikhundla sobubhishobhi asilingani naleso sikhundla; ngokuba isikhundla sika mbhishobhi ngesokuphatha zonke izinto zasemhlabeni;
Nokho umbhishobhi kufanele akhethwe ku buPhristi obuKhulu, ngaphandle uma engowe sizukulwane ngempela sika-Aroni;
Ngokuba ngaphandle uma engowesizukulwane ngempela sika-Aroni ngeke aziphathe izikhiye zalobo buphristi.
Nokho, umphristi omkhulu, okungukuthi, ngokohlelo lukaMelkisedeki, angahlukaniselwa ukuphatha izinto zasemhlabeni, futhi enolwazi lwazo ngoMoya weqiniso;

Futhi nokuthi abe ngumahluleli kwa-Israyeli, ukwenza umsebenzi webandla, ukwahlulela abaphambukayo ngobufakazi njengoba buyobekwa phambi kwakhe ngokwemithetho, ngosizo lwabeluleki bakhe, abakhethileyo noma azobakhetha phakathi kwamagosa ebandla.
Lona ngumsebenzi kambhishobhi ongesiye owesizukulwane ngempela sika-Aroni, kodwa ogcotshiwe kubuPhristi obuKhulu ngokohlelo lukaMelkisedeki.

Uyokuba ngumahluleli kanjalo, ngisho umahluleli wabo bonke abahlezi eSiyoni, noma kuso isikhonkwane seSiyoni, noma kuliphi igatsha lebandla lapho ayohlukaniselwa khona kulobu bufundisi, kuze kube imingcele yeSiyoni iyelulwa futhi kudingeke ukuba kubekhona abanye ababhishobhi noma abehluleli eSiyoni noma kwenye indawo.
Futhi kangangoba kukhona abanye ababhishobhi ababekiwe bayosebenza esikhundleni esifanayo.

Kodwa ongowesizukulwane ngempela sika-Aroni unelungelo engokuse mthethweni kubumongameli balobuphristi, kuzo izikhiye zalobu bufundisi, ukuba asebenza esikhundleni sikambhishobhi ezimele, ngaphandle kwabaluleki, ngaphandle kwesimo lapho uMongameli wobuPhristi obuKhulu, ngokohlelo lukaMelkisedeki, equliswa icala, ukuba ahlale njengomahluleli kwa-Israyeli.
Futhi isinqumo sanoma yimuphi walemikhandlu, esivumelana nomyalelo othi:

Futhi, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, umsebenzi obaluleke kakhulu webandla, futhi namacala alukhuni kakhulu ebandla, kangangoba kungekho ukuneliseka kuso isinqumo sikambhishobhi noma abahluleli, liyodluliselwa futhi lihanjiswe phezulu emkhandlwini webandla, phambi ko buMongameli bobuPhristi obuKhulu.

Futhi ubuMongameli bomkhandlu wobuPhristi obuKhulu buyoba namandla okubiza abanye abaphristi abakhulu, ngisho abalishumi nambili, ukuzolekelela njengabeluleki; ngakho-ke ubuMongameli bobuPhristi obuKhulu nabeluleki babo bayoba namandla okunquma ngenxa yobufakazi ngokwemithetho yebandla.

Futhi emva kwalesi sinqumo ngeke liphinde lilethwe futhi phambi kweNkosi; ngokuba lona ngumkhandlu ophezulu kakhulu webandla likaNkulunkulu, futhi yisinqumo sokugcina mayelana nezimpikiswano ezindabeni zomoya.
Akekho umuntu ongowebandla ongekho ngaphansi kwalomkhandlu webandla.
Futhi kangangoba uMongameli wobuPhristi obuKhulu ephambuka, uyolethwa phambi komkhandlu ojwayelekile webandla, oyosizwa ngabeluleki abalishumi nambili bobuPhristi obuKhulu;
Futhi isinqumo sabo ngaye siyokuba ukuphela kwempikiswano ngaye.
Ngalokho, akekho ongeke abe ngaphansi ko kulunga nasemithethweni kaNkulunkulu, ukuze zonke izinto zenziwe ngohlelo futhi nangesizotha phambi kwakhe, ngokweqiniso nangokulunga.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, umsebenzi kamongameli esikhundleni se dikoni ukwengamela amadikoni ayishumi nambili, ukuhlala emkhandlwini nabo, nokuba fundisa umsebenzi wabo, bakhane, njengoba kunikiwe ngokwezivumelwano.

Futhi umsebenzi kamongameli esikhundleni sothisha ukwengamela othisha abangamashumi amabili nane, nokuhlala nabo emkhandlwini, ebafundisa imisebenzi yesikhundla sabo, njengoba kunikiwe ezivumelwaneni.

Futhi umsebenzi kamongameli kubuPhristi buka-Aroni wukwengamela abaphristi abangamashumi amane nesishiyagalombili, futhi ahlale nabo emkhandlwini, ukubafundisa imisebenzi yesikhundla sabo, njengoba inikiwe kuzo izivumelwano—
Lomongameli kufanele abe ngumbhishobhi; ngokuba lona omunye wemisebenzi yalobu buphristi.
Phezu kwalokho, umsebenzi kamongameli esikhundleni samagosa wukwengamela amagosa angamashumi ayisishiyagalolunye nesithupha, futhi ahlale emkhandlwini nabo, nokubafundisa ngokwezivumelwano.
Lobu bumongameli buhlukile kunalobo kwabangamashumi ayisikhombisa, futhi buhlelelwe labo aba ngahambi emhlabeni wonke.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, umsebenzi kaMongameli wesikhundla sobuPhristi obuKhulu wukwengamela ebandleni lonke, futhi abe njengo Mose—
Bhekani, nakhu ukuhlakanipha; yebo, ukuba ngumboni, umambuli, nomhumushi, futhi nomphrofethi, abe nazo zonke iziphiwo zikaNkulunkulu azipha umholi webandla.
Futhi kungoko mbono otshengisa uhlelo lwaba ngamaShumi ayisiKhombisa, ukuthi kufanele babe nomongameli abayisikhombisa ukuba bengamele phezu kwabo, bekhethwe phakathi kwabangamashumi ayisikhombisa;
Futhi umongameli wesikhombisa walabo mongameli kufanele engamele phezu kwabayisithupha;

Futhi labo mongameli abayisikhombisa kufanele bakhethe abanye abangamashumi ayisikhombisa ngaphandle kwalaba bokuqala abangamashumi ayisikhombisa abangamalungu abo, futhi kufanele bengamele phezu kwabo;
Futhi nabanye abangamashumi ayisikhombisa, kuze kube kasikhombisa kuphindwe ngamashumi ayisikhombisa, uma umsebenzi esivinini ukudinga lokho.
Futhi laba abangamashumi ayisikhombisa kufanele babe ngabefundisi abahambayo, kwabeZizwe kuqala ngokunjalo nakumaJuda futhi.

Nakuba abanye abaphathi-zikhundla bebandla, abangebona abeShumi naMbili, noma abangamaShumi ayisiKhombisa, bengekho ngaphansi kwesibopho sokuhamba phakathi kwezizwe zonke, kodwa kufanele bahambe njengokuvunyelwa yizimo zabo, nakuba bengabase zikhundleni ezinkulu nezibophezelayo zebandla.
Ngalokho-ke, wonke amadoda mawafunde umsebenzi wawo, futhi asebenze esikhundleni abekwe kuso, ngakho konke ukukhuthala.
Lowo ovilaphayo ngeke athathwe njengofanele ukuma, futhi lowo ongawufundi umsebenzi wakhe futhi ezikhombisa njengongavunyiwe ngeke athathwe njengofanele ukuma. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/108.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 108
chapter_summary: 1–3, ULyman Sherman uthethelelwe izono zakhe; 4–5, Kufanele abalwe namagosa aholayo eBandla; 6–8, Ubizelwa ukuba ashumayele ivangeli futhi nokuthi aqinise abafowabo ahola nabo.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile isho kanje iNkosi kuwe, nceku yami uLyman: Izono zakho zixolelwe, ngokuba ulithobelile izwi lami ngokuza lapha namhlanje ekuseni ukuzofumana iseluleko kulowo engimbekile.
Ngakho-ke, umphefumulo wakho mawu phumule ngokuma kwakho ngokomoya, futhi ungabe usalenqaba izwi lami.
Futhi sukuma futhi uqaphele kakhulu kusuka manje ekugcineni izifungo zakho, ozenzile nozenzayo, futhi uyobusiswa ngezibusiso ezinkulu kakhulu.

Linda ngokubekezela kuze kubizwe umhlangano onesizotha wezinceku zami, ngaleso sikhathi uyokhunjulwa njengengxenye yamagosa ami okuqala, futhi ufumane ilungelo ngokugcotshwa nawo wonke amagosa engiwakhethileyo.
Bheka, lesi yisethembiso sikaBaba kuwe uma uqhubeka uthembekile.
Futhi siyogcwaliseka kuwe ngalolo suku lapho uyoba nelungelo loku shumayela ivangeli noma yikuphi lapho engiyokuthumela khona, kusuka ngaleso sikhathi.
Ngakho-ke, qinisa abafowenu ohola nabo kuyo yonke inkulumo yakho, kuyo yonke imikhuleko yakho, kukho konke ukuyala kwakho, nakukho konke ukwenza kwakho.
Bheka, futhi bheka, nginawe ukukubusisa noku kukhulula ingunaphakade. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/109.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 109
chapter_summary: 1–5, IThempeli laseKirtland lakhiwa njengendawo lapho kungahambela khona iNdodana yoMuntu; 6–21, Lifanele libe yindlu yomkhuleko, yokuzila ukudla, yokukholwa, yokufunda, yobukhosi nokuhleleka, nendlu kaNkulunkulu; 22–33, Sengathi abangaphendukile abaphikisa abantu beNkosi bangathuliswa; 34–42, Sengathi abaNgcwele bangahamba ngamandla ukuqoqela abalungileyo eSiyoni; 43–53, Sengathi abaNgcwele bangakhululwa ezintweni ezimbi ezizo thululwa phezu kwababi ngezinsuku zokugcina; 54–58, Sengathi izizwe nabantu namabandla bangalilungela ivangeli; 59–67, Sengathi amaJuda, amaLamani, nawo wonke u-Israyeli bangakhululwa; 68–80, Sengathi abaNgcwele bangaqheliswa ngobukhosi nokuhlonishwa futhi bafumane insindiso yaphakade.

verses.text: Malibongwe igama lakho, O Nkosi Nkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, ogcina isivumelwano futhi otshengisa ububele ezincekwini zakho ezihamba ngobuqotho phambi kwakho, ngezinhliziyo zazo zonke—
Wena oyale izinceku zakho ukuthi zakhe indlu egameni lakho kulendawo [eKirtland].
Manje uyabona, O Nkosi, ukuthi izinceku zakho sezenzile njengokomyalelo wakho.

Manje siyakucela, Baba oNgcwele, egameni likaJesu Kristu, iNdodana yakho ethandiweyo, ngegama lakhe kuphela insindiso enganikwa kubantwana babantu, siyakucela, O Nkosi, ukuthi wemukele lendlu, umsebenzi wezandla zethu, izinceku zakho, osiyalile ukuba siyakhe.

Ngokuba uyazi ukuthi siwenze lomsebenzi ngosizi olukhulu; futhi esimweni sokuhlupheka sinikele ngezinto zethu ukwakha indlu egameni lakho, ukuze iNdodana yoMuntu ibe nendawo yokuzibonakalisa kubantu bayo.
Futhi njengoba ushilo kuso isambulo, esinikwe kithi, usibiza ngabahlobo bakho, uthi—Bizani umhlangano wenu ozothile, njengoba nginiyalile;

Futhi njengoba bonke bengenakho ukukholwa, funani ngokukhuthala futhi nifundisane omunye nomunye amazwi okuhlakanipha; yebo, funani ezincwadini ezinhle kakhulu amazwi okuhlakanipha, funani ukufumana ulwazi ngisho ngokufunda nangokukholwa futhi;

Zihleleni; nilungise yonke into edingekayo, futhi nimise indlu, ngisho indlu yokukhuleka, indlu yokuzila ukudla, indlu yokukholwa, indlu yokufunda, indlu yobukhosi, indlu yokuhleleka, indlu kaNkulunkulu;
Ukuze ukungena kwenu kube segameni leNkosi, ukuze ukuphuma kwenu kube segameni leNkosi; ukuze konke ukubingelelana kwenu kube segameni leNkosi, ngezandla eziphakanyiselwe koPhakeme kaKhulu—
Manje, Baba oNgcwele, siyakucela ukuba usisize, thina abantu bakho, ngomusa wakho, ekubizeni umhlangano wethu ozothileyo, ukuze lokho kwenzelwe ukukuhlonipha nokuze kwamukelwe nguwe;
Futhi ngendlela yokuthi sitholakale sifanelekile, ebusweni bakho, ukuze sifumane ukugcwaliseka kwe zethembiso ozenzileyo kithi, abantu bakho, kuzo izambulo ezinikwe kithi;

Ukuze inkazimulo yakho yehlele phansi kubantu bakho, naphezu kwalendlu yakho, esiyahlukanisela kuwe manje, ukuze ingcweliswe futhi yahlukaniselwe ukuba ibe ngcwele, futhi ukuze ubukhona bakho obungcwele buhlale bukhona njalonjalo;
Futhi ukuze bonke abantu abayongena emnyango wendlu yeNkosi bawezwe amandla akho, futhi baphoqeleke ukuvuma ukuthi uyingcwelisile, futhi nokuthi iyindlu yakho, indawo yobungcwele bakho.

Futhi nika, Baba oNgcwele, ukuthi bonke labo abayokhonza kulendlu bafundiswe amazwi okuhlakanipha ezincwadini ezinhle kakhulu, futhi nokuthi bafune ulwazi ngisho ngokufunda, futhi nangokukholwa, njengoba ushilo;
Futhi ukuze bakhule kuwe, futhi banikwe ukuphelela konke kukaMoya oNgcwele, futhi bahlelwe ngokwemithetho yakho, futhi balungele ukufumana konke okudingekayo;
Futhi ukuze lendlu ibe yindlu yomkhuleko, indlu yokuzila ukudla, indlu yokukholwa, indlu yobukhosi nekaNkulunkulu, ngisho indlu yakho;
Ukuze konke ukungena kwabantu bakho, kulendlu, kube segameni leNkosi;
Ukuze konke ukuphuma kwabo kulendlu kube segameni leNkosi;
Futhi ukuze konke ukubingelelana kwabo kube segameni leNkosi, ngezandla ezingcwele, ziphakanyiselwe koPhakeme kaKhulu;
Futhi nokuthi kungabi bikho okungahlanzekile okuyovunyelwa ukuza endlini yakho ukuzoyingcolisa;

Futhi uma abantu bakho bephambuka, noma yimuphi kubo, bangaphenduka ngokushesha futhi babuyele kuwe, futhi bafumane umusa emehlweni akho, futhi babuyiselwe kuzo izibusiso ozinikile ukuba zithululwe phezu kwalabo abayo kuhlonipha endlini yakho.

Futhi siyakucela, Baba oNgcwele, ukuba izinceku zakho zihambe kusuka kulendlu zihlome ngamandla akho, futhi nokuthi igama lakho libe phezu kwabo, futhi nenkazimulo yakho ibe kubo nxazonke, futhi izingelosi zakho zibabheke;

Futhi kusuka kulendawo ukuze bahambise izindaba ezinkulu nezimangalisayo, ngeqiniso, kuze kube kuyo imikhawulo yomhlaba, ukuze bazi ukuthi lona ngumsebenzi wakho, nokuthi uselulile isandla sakho, ukugcwalisa lokho okukhulumile ngemilomo yabaphrofethi, ngokuphathelene nezinsuku zokugcina.
Siyakucela, Baba oNgcwele, ukuba ubamise abantu abayokhonza, futhi baliphathe ngokuhlonipha igama nokuma kulendlu yakho, kuzo zonke izizukulwane futhi naphakade;
Ukuze kungabi bikho sikhali esenzelwe bona esiyophumelela; ukuze lowo obambela umgodi angene kuwo yena;
Ukuze kungabi bikho nhlanganisela yobubi eyokuba namandla okubavukela futhi ibanqobe abantu bakho okuyobekwa kubo igama lakho kulendlu;
Futhi uma kukhona abantu abayovukela labantu, ukuba ulaka lwakho lokheleke ngokumelene nabo;
Futhi uma beyobashaya labantu uyobashaya nabo; uyobalwela abantu bakho ngosuku lwempi, ukuze bakhululwe ezandleni zazo zonke izitha zabo.

Siyakucela, Baba oNgcwele, ukuba ubanqobe, futhi ubamangalise, futhi ubafake ehlazweni nokudideka, bonke labo abandise imibiko yamanga phesheya, emhlabeni, ngokumelene nenceku noma izinceku zakho, uma bengezukuphenduka, uma ivangeli laphakade selishunyayelwa ezindlebeni zabo;
Futhi nokuthi yonke imisebenzi yabo yenziwe ize, futhi ishanelwe nge sichotho, futhi ngezahlulelo oyozithumela kubo ngolaka lwakho, ukuze kuphele ukuqamba amanga nokuhlambalaza abantu bakho.
Ngokuba uyazi, O Nkosi, ukuthi izinceku zakho bezingenacala phambi kwakho ekufakazeni ngegama lakho, ezizwe ubuhlungu ngalo.
Ngakho-ke siyanxusa phambi kwakho ukukhululeka konke nokuphelele phansi kwaleli jokwe;
Linqamule, O Nkosi; linqamule emiqaleni yezinceku zakho, ngamandla akho, ukuze sikwazi ukuvuka phakathi kwalesi sizukulwane futhi senze umsebenzi wakho.
O Jehova, yiba nomusa phezu kwalabantu, futhi njengoba bonke abantu bona, thethelela iziphambeko zabantu bakho, futhi mazisulwe ingunaphakade.
Ukubekwa kwabefundisi bakho makube yinto engaseyikuphela kubo ngamandla asuka phezulu.
Makugcwaliseke phezu kwabo, njengaphezu kwalabo ngosuku lwePhentekoste; isiphiwo sezilimi masithululwe phezu kwabantu bakho, ngisho izilimi ezahlukeneyo kungathi ezomlilo, futhi nokuhunyushwa kwazo.
Futhi indlu yakho mayigcwaliswe, njengokuvunguza komoya onamandla, ngenkazimulo yakho.

Beka phezu kwezinceku zakho ubufakazi besivumelwano, ukuze uma bephuma futhi bememezela izwi lakho bawubophe umthetho, futhi izinhliziyo zabangcwele bakho bazilungiselele zonke izahlulelo osuzozithumela, olakeni lwakho, phezu kwabantu basemhlabeni, ngenxa yeziphambeko zabo, ukuze abantu bakho bangalahlekelwa yithemba ngosuku lwenkathazo.

Futhi noma yiliphi idolobha izinceku zakho eziyongena kulo, nabantu balelo dolobha bemukela ubufakazi babo, ukuthula kwakho nensindiso yakho makube phezu kwalelo dolobha; ukuze baqoqe abalungileyo kulelo dolobha, ukuze beze eSiyoni, noma kuzo izikhonkwane zakhe, izindawo ezikhethwe nguwe, ngamaculo enjabulo yaphakade;
Futhi kuze kube lokhu kuyafezeka, izahlulelo zakho mazingaweli phezu kwalelo dolobha.

Futhi noma yiliphi idolobha izinceku zakho eziyongena kulo, futhi abantu balelo dolobha bengabemukeli ubufakazi bezinceku zakho, nezinceku zakho zibaxwayisa ukuba bazisindise kulesi sizukulwane esiphambeneyo, makube phezu kwalelo dolobha ngokwalokho okukhulumile ngemilomo yabaphrofethi bakho.
Kodwa zikhulule, O Jehova, siyakunxusa, izinceku zakho ezandleni zabo, futhi ubahlanze egazini labo.
O Nkosi, asikujabuleli ukubhujiswa kwabanye abantu; imimoya yabo iyigugu phambi kwakho;
Kodwa izwi lakho kufanele ligcwaliseke. Siza izinceku zakho ukuba zithi, ngokulekelelwa ngumusa wakho: Intando yakho mayenziwe, O Nkosi, futhi hhayi eyethu.
Siyazi ukuthi ukhulumile ngemilomo yabaphrofethi bakho izinto ezesabekayo ngokuphathelene nababi, ezinsukwini zokugcina—ukuthi uzothulula izahlulelo zakho, ngaphandle kwesilinganiso;
Ngakho-ke, O Nkosi, khulula abantu bakho osizini lwababi; zinike amandla izinceku zakho ukuba ziwunamathelise umthetho, futhi zibophe ubufakazi, ukuze balungele usuku lokushiswa.
Siyakucela, Baba oNgcwele, ukuba ukhumbule labo abaxoshwe ngabahlezi esifundeni saseJackson, eMissouri, emihlabeni yefa labo, futhi linqamule, O Nkosi, lelijokwe lokuhlushwa elibekwe phezu kwabo.
Uyazi, O Nkosi, ukuthi bebe cindezelekile futhi behlushwe kakhulu ngabantu ababi; futhi izinhliziyo zethu zigcwele usizi ngenxa yemithwalo yabo enzima.

O Nkosi, kuyoze kube nini uvumela labantu ukuba bathwale lokhu kuhlushwa, nokukhala kwabantu babo abangena cala kunyukele ezindlebeni zakho, negazi labo lize njengobufakazi phambi kwakho, futhi ungenzi isibonakaliso sobufakazi bakho ngenxa yabo na?
Yiba nomusa, O Nkosi, phezu kwequlu lababi, elixoshe abantu bakho, ukuze bayeke ukuphanga, ukuze baphenduke ezonweni zabo uma ukuphenduka kukhona;
Kodwa uma bengezuku phenduka, yambula ingalo yakho, O Nkosi, futhi ubuyisele lokho okumisile kwaba yiSiyoni ukuze kuzuze abantu bakho.

Futhi uma kungeke kwaba ngenye indlela, ukuze umgomo wabantu bakho ungasileli phambi kwakho sengathi ulaka lwakho lungokheleka, nokuthukuthela kwakho kwehlele phezu kwabo, ukuze babhujiswe, izimpande namagatsha, ngaphansi kwezulu;
Kodwa kangangoba bezophenduka, wena unobubele nomhawu, futhi uyolususa ulaka lwakho uma ubuka ubuso boGcotshiweyo wakho.

Yiba nomusa, O Nkosi, kuzo zonke izizwe zomhlaba; yiba nomusa kubabusi bezwe lethu; sengathi leyo migomo, evikelwe ngenhlonipho nangobuqhawe, okungukuthi, uMthetho-sisekelo wezwe lethu, ngobaba bethu, ingamiswa ingunaphakade.
Khumbula amakhosi, amakhosana ohlanga, izikhulu, nabaphakeme bomhlaba, nabo bonke abantu, namabandla, bonke abampofu, nabantulayo, nabahluphekile bomhlaba;

Ukuze izinhliziyo zabo zithanjiswe uma izinceku zakho seziphuma endlini yakho, O Jehova, ukuze zifakaze ngegama lakho; ukuze ubandlululo ludedele iqiniso, futhi abantu bakho bathole ukwemukeleka emehlweni abo bonke;
Ukuze wonke umhlaba wazi ukuthi thina, izinceku zakho, silizwile izwi lakho, nokuthi usithumelile;
Ukuze phakathi kwabo bonke laba, izinceku zakho, amadodana kaJakobe, aqoqe abalungileyo ukuze bakhe idolobha lakho elingcwele egameni lakho, njengoba ubayalile.
Siyakucela ukuba umisele iSiyoni ezinye izikhonkwane ngaphandle kwalesi osusimisile, ukuze ukuqoqana kwabantu bakho kuqhubeke ngamandla amakhulu nobukhosi, ukuze umsebenzi wakho ufinyezwe ngokulunga.
Manje lamazwi, O Nkosi, siwakhulumile phambi kwakho, ngokuphathelene nezambulo nemiyalelo osinike yona, thina esihlangene nabeZizwe.
Kodwa uyazi ukuthi unothando olukhulu lwabantwana baJakobe, aba satshalaliswe ezintabeni isikhathi eside, osukwini oluguqubele nolumnyama.
Ngakho-ke siyakuncenga ukuba ube nomusa kubantwana baJakobe, ukuze iJerusalema, kusukela ngaleli hora, iqale ukubuyiselwa;
Futhi nejoka lobugqili liqale ukunqanyulwa endlini ka Davide;
Futhi nabantwana ba Juda baqale ukubuyela emihlabeni oyinike u-Abrahama, uyise.
Futhi wenze ukuba insali kaJakobe, ebiqalekisiwe futhi yashaywa ngenxa yeziphambeko zayo, iphenduke esimweni sayo sobuluhlaza nokuba nonya ize ekupheleleni konke kwevangeli laphakade;
Ukuze babeke phansi izikhali zabo zokuchitha igazi, futhi bakuyeke nokuvukela kwabo.

Futhi sengathi yonke insali esabalele ka-Israyeli, exoshiwe kwaze kwaba semikhawulweni yomhlaba, ingafinyelela olwazini lweqiniso, ikholwe kuMesiya, futhi ibuyiswe ekucindezelekeni, futhi ijabule phambi kwakho.

O Nkosi, khumbula inceku yakho, uJoseph Smith, omNcane, nakho konke ukuhlushwa nokukhathazwa kwakhe—ukuthi uvumelane kanjani no Jehova, futhi wafunga kuwe, O Nkulunkulu oMkhulu kaJakobe—nemiyalelo omnike yona, futhi nokuthi uzamile ngobuqotho ukwenza intando yakho.
Yiba nomusa, O Nkosi, kumfazi wakhe nabantwana bakhe, ukuze baphakanyiselwe lapho ukhona, futhi bagcinwe ngesandla sakho esilondolozayo.
Yiba nomusa kuzo zonke izihlobo zabo, ukuze ubandlululo lwabo luqedwe futhi lushanelwe njengokwezikhukhula; ukuze baphenduke futhi bakhululwe no-Israyeli, futhi bazi ukuthi wena unguNkulunkulu.

Khumbula, O Nkosi, omongameli, ngisho bonke omongameli bebandla lakho, ukuba isandla sakho sokunene sibaphakamise, nayo yonke imindeni yabo, nezihlobo zabo, ukuze amagama abo aqhutshelwe phambili futhi akhunjulwe phakade izizukulwane ngezi zukulwane.

Khumbula lonke ibandla lakho, O Nkosi, nayo yonke imindeni yabo, nazo zonke izihlobo zabo, nabo bonke abagulayo nabahlushiwe babo, nabo bonke abampofu nabazithobile bomhlaba; ukuze umbuso, owumise ngaphandle kwezandla, ube yintaba enkulu futhi ugcwalise umhlaba wonke;
Ukuze ibandla lakho liphume ehlane lobumnyama, futhi licwazimule libe lihle njengenyanga, licace njengelanga, futhi lisabeke njengebutho namaduku;

Futhi lihlotshiswe njengomakoti ngalolo suku lapho uyokwambula amazulu, futhi wenze izintaba zigobhoze ngobukhona bakho, nezigodi ziphakanyiswe, izindawo ezingamagebhugebhu zilingane; ukuze inkazimulo yakho igcwale umhlaba wonke;
Ukuze kuthi uma icilongo likhalela abafileyo, siyohlwithwa phezulu emafwini ukuyokuhlangabeza, ukuze sibe neNkosi njalo;

Ukuze izingubo zethu zihlanzwe, ukuze simbathiswe izingubo zokulunga, namasundu ezandleni zethu, nemiqhele yenkazimulo emakhanda ethu, futhi sivune ukujabula kwaphakade ngakho konke ukuzwa kwethu ubuhlungu.

O Nkosi Nkulunkulu Mninimandla Onke, sizwe kulezi zicelo zethu, futhi usiphendule usezulwini, endlini yakho engcwele, lapho uhlezi khona esihlalweni sobukhosi, une nkazimulo, ukuhlonishwa, amandla, ubukhulu, ukubusa, iqiniso, ukulunga, ukwahlulela, umusa, nokuphelela konke okungenamkhawulo, kusuka phakade kuya phakade.
O sizwe, O sizwe, O sizwe, O Nkosi! Futhi uziphendule izicelo zethu, futhi wamukele ukwahlukaniselwa kwalendlu kuwe, umsebenzi wezandla zethu, esiyakhele igama lakho;

Futhi naleli bandla, ukuba ubeke igama lakho kulo. Futhi usilekelele ngamandla oMoya wakho, ukuba sihlanganise amazwi ethu nalawo maserafi akhazimulayo, acwebezelayo azungeze isihlalo sakho sobukhosi, ngomhalaliso wendumiso, sihlabelela uHosana kuNkulunkulu nakuyo iMvana!
Futhi makuthi laba, ababekiweyo, bembathiswe ngensindiso, nabangcwele bakho bamemeze kakhulu ngokujabula. Amen, futhi Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/110.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 110
chapter_summary: 1–10, INkosi uJehova ivela isenkazimulweni futhi yemukela iThempeli laseKirtland njengendlu Yayo; 11–12, UMose no-Eliyasi ngamunye bayavela futhi babuyisela izikhiye zabo nezinhlelo zokwengamela; 13–16, U-Eliya uyabuya futhi ubuyisela izikhiye zohlelo lwakhe lokwengamela njengoba kwathenjiswa nguMalaki.

verses.text: Isisitho sasuswa ezingqondweni zethu, futhi amehlo okuqonda kwethu avuleka.
Sayibona iNkosi ime phezu kodonga lwepulupiti, phambi kwethu, futhi ngaphansi kwezinyawo zayo kwakukhona umsebenzi ogandayiwe wegolide elicwebileyo, onombala ofana nokuphuzi.

Amehlo ayo ayefana nelangabi lomlilo; izinwele zekhanda lakhe zazimhlophe njengeqhwa elicwebileyo; ubuso bakhe babucwazimula ngaphezulu kokukhanya kwelanga; futhi izwi lakhe lalinjenge nhlokomo yamanzi amaningi, ngisho izwi likaJehova, lithi:
Ngiyi siqalo nesiphetho; nginguye ophilayo, nginguye owabulawa; ngingummeli wenu kuBaba.
Bhekani, izono zenu zithethelelwe; nihlanzekile phambi kwami; ngakho-ke, phakamisani amakhanda enu nijabule.
Izinhliziyo zabafowenu mazijabule, nezinhliziyo zabo bonke abantu bami mazijabule, ngamandla abo, abakhe lendlu egameni lami.
Ngokuba bhekani, ngiyamukele lendlu, negama lami lizoba lapha; futhi ngizozibonakalisa kubantu bami ngomusa kulendlu.
Yebo, ngizo vela ezincekwini zami, futhi ngikhulume nazo ngezwi lami, uma abantu bami bezogcina imiyalelo yami, futhi bengayi ngcolisi lendlu engcwele.
Yebo izinhliziyo zabayizinkulungwane namashumi ezinkulungwane ziyojabula kakhulu ngenxa ye zibusiso eziyothululwa, futhi ne zipho zomoya izinceku zami eziphiwe zona kulendlu.
Futhi udumo lwalendlu luyokwanda lufinyelele kwamanye amazwe; futhi lesi yisiqalo sezibusiso eziyo thululwa kuwo amakhanda abantu bami. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

Emva kokuba lombono usuvalekile, amazulu abuye avulelwa thina futhi; futhi uMose wavela phambi kwethu, futhi wabuyisela kithi izikhiye zoku qoqa u-Israyeli kusuka kumagumbi amane omhlaba, nokuholwa kwezizwana ezilishumi zisuka ezweni lasenyakatho.
Emva kwalokhu, u-Eliyasi wavela, futhi wabuyisela uhlelo lokwengamela lwevangeli lika-Abrahama, ethi kithi nasenzalweni yethu zonke izizukulwane emva kwethu kufanele zibusiswe.

Emva kokuba lombono usuvalekile, omunye umbono omkhulu nomuhle kakhulu wakhonjiswa kithi; ngokuba u-Eliya umphrofethi, owathathwa waya ezulwini ngaphandle kokuzwa ukufa, wema phambi kwethu, futhi wathi:
Bhekani, isikhathi sesifike ngokugcwele, okwakhulunywa ngaso ngomlomo kaMalaki—efakaza ngokuthi kufanele athunyelwe [u-Eliya], ngaphambi kokuza kosuku olukhulu nolwesabekayo lweNkosi—
Uku phendulela izinhliziyo zoyise kubantwana, nabantwana koyise, funa umhlaba wonke ushaywe ngesiqalekiso—
Ngakho-ke, izikhiye zaloluhlelo lokwengamela sezibekwa ezandleni zenu; futhi ngalokhu seningazi ukuthi usuku olukhulu nolwesabekayo lweNkosi seluseduze, ngisho emnyango.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/111.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 111
chapter_summary: 1–5, INkosi inakekela izidingo zasemhlabeni zezinceku Zayo; 6–11, Izoyiphatha ngobubele iSiyoni futhi ihlele zonke izinto ukuze kuzuze izinceku Zayo.

verses.text: Mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu, angicasukile ngokuthatha kwenu loluhambo, nakuba nenze ubuwula.
Nginengcebo eningi yenu ekulelidolobha, ukuze kuzuze iSiyoni, futhi nabantu abaningi abakuleli dolobha, engizobaqoqa ngesikhathi esifanele ukuze kuzuze iSiyoni, ngosizo lwenu.
Ngakho-ke, kufanele ukuthi nakhe ubudlelwane nabantu abakuleli dolobha, njengoba niyoholwa, futhi njengoba kuyokwambulwa kini.

Futhi kuyokwenzeka ngesikhathi esifanele ukuthi ngizonikela lelidolobha ezandleni zenu, ukuze nibe namandla phezu kwalo, kangangoba ngeke bazi ngezinhloso zenu; futhi ingcebo yalo yegolide nesiliva iyoba ngeyenu.
Ningazihluphi ngezikweletu zenu, ngokuba ngizoni nika amandla okuzikhokha.
Ningazihluphi ngoSiyoni, ngokuba ngizomphatha ngesihawu.
Hlalani kulendawo, nasezifundeni ndawo zonke;
Futhi indawo lapho okuyintando yami ukuba nihlale khona, kakhulu, izokwaziswa kini ngokuthula namandla oMoya wami, oyoza kini.
Lendawo ningayithola ngokuyiqasha. Futhi buzani ngokukhuthala ngabantu bakudala nabakhi balelidolobha;
Ngokuba kunamagugu amaningi enu kulelidolobha.
Ngakho-ke, hlakaniphani njengezinyoka kodwa futhi ningabi nasono; futhi ngizozihlela zonke izinto ukuze nizuze, ngokushesha uma nikwazi ukuzemukela. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/112.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 112
chapter_summary: 1–10, AbayiShumi-namBili kufanele bathumele ivangeli futhi baphakamise izwi lesexwayiso kuzo zonke izizwe nabantu; 11–15, Kufanele bathwale isiphambano sabo, balandele uJesu, futhi baphe izimvu Zakhe; 16–20, Labo abemukela ubuMongameli bokuQala bemukela iNkosi; 21–29, Ubumnyama bumboza umhlaba, futhi yilabo abakholwayo nababhabhadiswayo kuphela abazosindiswa; 30–34, UbuMongameli bokuQala nabayiShumi namBili baphethe izikhiye zohlelo lokwengamela lokuphelela kwezikhathi.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile isho kanje iNkosi kuwe nceku yami uThomas: Ngiyizwile imikhuleko yakho; futhi nokwabela kwakho abampofu kwenyukile kwaba yi sikhumbuzo kimi, ukuze kuzuze labo, abafowenu, abakhethwa ukuba bafakaze ngegama lami futhi nokuthi babuthumele ndawo zonke ubufakazi phakathi kwazo zonke izizwe, izihlobo, izilimi, nabantu, futhi nabagcotshwa ngosizo lwezinceku zami.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, kube nezinto ezimbalwa enhliziyweni yakho futhi ngokuphathelene nawe, mina iNkosi, engingathokozile ngazo.
Nokho, kangagoba uzithobile uyophakanyiswa; ngakho-ke, zonke izono zakho zithethelelwe.
Inhliziyo yakho mayi thokoze phambi kobuso bami; futhi uyofakaza ngegama lami, hhayi kuphela kwabeZizwe, kodwa futhi naku maJuda; futhi uyolithumela igama lami emikhawulweni yomhlaba.
Ngakho-ke, yilwa, ukusa nokusa; futhi usuku emva kosuku hambisa izwi lakho lesexwayiso; futhi uma ubusuku buza ungavumeli abantu basemhlabeni balale, ngenxa yokukhuluma kwakho.
Ukuhlala kwakho makwaziwe eSiyoni, futhi ungayisusi indlu yakho; ngokuba Mina, iNkosi, nginomsebenzi omkhulu okufanele uwenze, ukwazisa ngegama lami phakathi kwabantwana babantu.
Ngakho-ke, ubophele izinkalo zakho lomsebenzi. Izinyawo zakho mazifakwe izicathulo, ngokuba ukhethiwe, futhi indlela yakho isezintabeni, nasezizweni eziningi.
Futhi ngezwi lakho abaningi abaphakemeyo bayothotshiswa, futhi ngezwi lakho abaningi abathobekileyo bayophakanyiswa.
Izwi lakho liyoba wukusola kophambukayo; futhi ngokusola kwakho ulimi lomhlebi malupheze ububi balo.
Zithobe; iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho uyokuhola ngesandla, futhi ikunike impendulo emikhulekweni yakho.

Ngiyayazi inhliziyo yakho, futhi ngiyizwile imikhuleko yakho ngokuphathelene nabafowenu. Ungabakhethi ngothando ngaphezu kwabanye, kodwa uthando lwakho kubo malube njengoba uzithanda wena; futhi uthando lwakho maluvame kubo bonke abantu, nakubo bonke abathanda igama lami.
Futhi bakhulekela abafowenu beShumi-namBili. Bayale kakhulu ngenxa yegama lami, futhi nabo mabayalwe ngazo zonke izono zabo, futhi thembeka phambi kwami kulo igama lami.

Futhi emva kwe zilingo zabo, nosizi olukhulu, bheka, mina, iNkosi, ngizobafuna, futhi uma bengaziqinisi izinhliziyo zabo, futhi bengaqinisi izintamo zabo ngokumelene nami, bayo guqulwa, futhi ngiyobelapha.
Manje, ngithi kuwe, futhi engikusho kuwe, ngikusho kubo bonke abaliShumi namBili; Sukuma ubophe izinkalo zakho, thwala isiphambano sakho, ungilandele, futhi uphe izimvu zami.

Ningaziphakamisi; ningayivukeli inceku yami uJoseph; ngokuba ngiqinisile ngithi kini, nginaye, futhi isandla sami siyoba phezu kwakhe, futhi izikhiye engimnike zona, futhi nakini, ngeke zithathwe kuye ngize ngize.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, nceku yami uThomas, uyindoda engiyikhethileyo ukuba iphathe izikhiye zombuso wami, ngokuphathelene nabayiShumi namBili, ndawo zonke phakathi kwezizwe zonke—
Ukuze ube yinceku yami ezovula umnyango wombuso ezindaweni zonke lapho inceku yami uJoseph, nenceku yami uSidney, nenceku yami uHyrum, bengeke bakwazi ukuza khona.
Ngokuba kubo ngibeke umthwalo wamabandla onke okwesikhashana.

Ngalokho-ke, noma yikuphi lapho beyokuthumela khona, hamba, futhi ngizoba nawe; futhi noma iyiphi indawo oyoshumayela kuyo igama lami uyovulelwa umnyango omkhulu wethuba lokusebenza, ukuze balithole izwi lami.
Noma ngabe ngubani owemukela izwi lami wemukela mina, futhi noma ngabe owemukela mina, wemukela labo, abobuMongameli bokuQala, engibathumileyo, engibenze abaluleki ngenxa yegama lami kini.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, labo eniyobathuma egameni lami, ngezwi labafowenu, abayiShumi namBili, abavunywe ngokufaneleyo futhi bagunyazwa yini, bayokuba namandla okuvula umnyango wombuso wami kunoma yisiphi esizwe noma kuphi lapho niyobathuma khona—
Kangangoba beyozithoba phambi kwami, futhi behlala ezwini lami, futhi belalela izwi loMoya wami.
Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, ubumnyama bumboze umhlaba, futhi obukhulu ubumnyama bumboze imiqondo yabantu, futhi yonke inyama yonakele phambi kobuso bami.

Bhekani, imipindiselo iza ngokushesha kubantu basemhlabeni, usuku lolaka, usuku lokusha, usuku lwencithakalo, lokukhala, lokudabuka, nelesililo; futhi njengesi vunguvungu luyoza kubo bonke ubuso bomhlaba, kusho iNkosi.
Futhi luyoqala kuyo indlu yami, futhi luyoya phambili kusuka endlini yami, kusho iNkosi;
Kuqala phakathi kwalabo abaphakathi kwenu, kusho iNkosi, abazenze abazi igama lami futhi bengazange bangazi, futhi naba hlambalaze ngokumelene nami phakathi kwendlu yami, kusho iNkosi.
Ngakho-ke, qinisekani ukuthi anizikhathazi ngokuphathelene nezindaba zebandla lami kulendawo, kusho iNkosi.
Kodwa cwebisani izinhliziyo zenu phambi kwami; futhi emva kwalokho hambani niye kuwo wonke umhlaba, futhi nishumayele ivangeli lami kuzo zonke izidalwa ezingakalitholi;
Futhi lowo okholwayo futhi abhabhadiswe uyosindiswa, futhi lowo ongakholwa, futhi nongabhabhadiswa, uyoba ngaphansi kwamandla kaSathane.

Ngokuba kini, abayiShumi namBili, futhi nalabo, abobuMongameli bokuQala, ababekwe nani ukuba babe ngabeluleki nabaholi benu, amandla alobu buphristi anikiwe, ngezinsuku zokugcina futhi nangesikhathi sokugcina, lapho kukhona uhlelo lokwengamela lokuphelela kwezikhathi,
Amandla lawo eninawo, ngokuhlangana nabo bonke labo abanikwe uhlelo lokwengamela kunoma yisiphi isikhathi kusuka ekuqaleni kwendalo;
Ngokuba ngiqinisile ngithi kini, izikhiye zohlelo lokwengamela, enizifumene, zehle njalo zisuka kobaba, futhi okokugcina kwakho konke, zithunyelwa kini phansi zisuka ezulwini.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, bhekani ukuthi lukhulu kangakanani ubizo lwenu. Hlanzani izinhliziyo zenu nezingubo zenu, funa igazi lalesi sizukulwane lifunwe ezandleni zenu.
Thembekani ngize ngize, ngokuba ngiza masinyane; futhi umvuzo wami unami ukukhokhela wonke umuntu njengoko msebenzi wakhe. Ngingu Alfa no-Omega. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/113.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 113
chapter_summary: 1–6, ISiqu sikaJese, ihlumela eliphuma kuso, nempande kaJese kuyakhonjwa; 7–10, Insali esabalele yaseSiyoni inelungelo kubo ubuphristi futhi babizelwa ukuba babuyele eNkosini.

verses.text: Ubani iSiqu sika Jese okukhulunywa ngaso evesini lokuqala, elesibili, elesithathu, elesine, nelesihlanu lesahluko seshumi nanye sika Isaya na?
Ngiqinisile isho kanje iNkosi: NguKristu.
Liyini ihlumela okukhulunywa ngalo evesini lokuqala lesahluko seshumi nanye sika-Isaya, okufanele liphume kuso iSiqu sikaJese na?
Bheka, isho kanje iNkosi: Liyinceku ezandleni zikaKristu, nganhlanye ewuzalo lukaJese noluka Efrayimi, noma lwendlu kaJosefa, kuye okubekwe amandla amakhulu.
Iyini impande kaJese okukhulunywe ngayo evesini leshumi lesahluko seshumi nanye na?

Bheka, isho kanje iNkosi, wuzalo lukaJese, kanye nolukaJosefa kubo ubuphristi obungobabo ngokusemthethweni, ne zikhiye zombuso, ukuze kubekhona isibonakaliso, nokuba kuqoqwe abantu bami ngezinsuku zokugcina.

Imibuzo ka-Elias Higbee: Kuqondweni ngomyalo oku-Isaya, esahlukweni samashumi amahlanu nambili, ivesi lokuqala, elithi: Yembatha amandla akho, O Siyoni—futhi yibaphi abantu u-Isaya ayeqondise kubo na?

Wayekuqondise kulabo uNkulunkulu okufanele ababize ngezinsuku zokugcina, okufanele baphathe amandla obuphristi ukubuyisa futhi uSiyoni, nokukhululwa kuka-Israyeli; futhi ukwembatha amandla akhe kuwukwembatha igunya lobuphristi, uSiyoni, ane lungelo kubo ngokohlanga; futhi ukuze abuyele kulawomandla ayemlahlekele.
Kufanele siqondeni ngokuzikhulula kukaSiyoni ezibophweni zomqala wakhe; evesini lesibili na?

Kufanele siqonde ukuthi insali esabalele iyakhuthazwa ukuba ibuyele eNkosini abawa kuyo; okuyothi uma bekwenza, isethembiso seNkosi siwukuthi iyokhuluma nabo, noma ibanike isambulo. Bheka ivesi lesithupha, elesikhombisa, kanye nelesishiyagalombili. Izibopho zomqala wakhe yiziqalekiso zikaNkulunkulu kuye, noma insali ka-Israyeli esimweni sabo zokusabalala phakathi kwabeZizwe.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/114.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 114
chapter_summary: 1–2, Izikhundla zebandla eziphethwe yilabo abangathembekile ziyonikwa abanye.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile isho kanje iNkosi: Kungukuhlakanipha encekwini yami uDavid W. Patten, ukuba aqedele wonke umsebenzi wakhe ngokushesha kangangoba engakwazi, futhi achithe impahla yakhe, ukuze afeze umsebenzi wokufundisa ivangeli kimi ngentwasahlobo elandelayo, ephelezelwa abanye, ngisho abayiShumi namBili behlangene naye, ukuze bafakaze ngegama lami futhi balethe izindaba ezinhle emhlabeni wonke.
Ngokuba ngiqinisile isho kanje iNkosi, kangangoba kukhona labo phakathi kwenu abaphika igama lami, abanye bayotshalwa esikhundleni sabo futhi bafumane ububhishobhi babo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/115.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 115
chapter_summary: 1–4, INkosi iqamba ibandla Layo ngokuthi IBandla likaJesu Kristu labaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina; 5–6, USiyoni nezikhonkwane zakhe bayizindawo zokuvikeleka nezokuphephela zabaNgcwele; 7–16, AbaNgcwele bayalwa ukuba bakhe indlu yeNkosi eFar West; 17–19, UJoseph Smith uphethe izikhiye zombuso kaNkulunkulu emhlabeni.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile isho kanje iNkosi kuwe, nceku yami uJoseph Smith, omNcane, futhi nakuwe nceku yami uSidney Rigdon, futhi nakuwe nceku yami uHyrum Smith, futhi nakubeluleki bakho ababekwayo futhi nabazobekwa emva kwalokhu;
Futhi nakuwe, nceku yami u-Edward Partridge, nakubeluleki bakhe;

Futhi nakuzo izinceku zami ezithembekileyo ezingabomkhandlu omkhulu webandla lami eSiyoni, ngokuba liyobizwa kanjalo, futhi nakuwo wonke amagosa nabantu beBandla likaJesu Kristu labaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina lami, abasabalele ndawo zonke emhlabeni wonke;
Ngokuba liyobizwa kanjena ibandla lami ngezinsuku zokugcina, ngisho IBandla likaJesu Kristu labaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini nonke: Sukumani futhi nikhanye, ukuze ukukhanya kwenu kube umgomo wezizwe;
Futhi ukuze ukuqoqana ndawonye ezweni lase Siyoni, nakuzo izikhonkwane zakhe, kube okokuvikeleka, nokuphepha kuso isichotho, nakulo ulaka uma selu thululwa lungaxutshiwe emhlabeni wonke.
Idolobha, iFar West, malibe umhlaba ongcwele nongcweliselwe mina; futhi liyobizwa ngokuthi elingcwele kakhulu, ngokuba umhlabathi enime kuwo ungcwele.
Ngakho-ke, nginiyala ukuba ningakhele indlu, ukuze kuqoqane ndawonye kuyo abangcwele bami, ukuze bangikhonze.
Futhi makube khona isiqalo salomsebenzi, nesisekelo, nomsebenzi wokulungiselela, ngalelihlobo elilandelayo;
Futhi makwenziwe isiqalo ngosuku lwesine kuJulayi olandelayo; futhi kusuka ngaleso sikhathi kuya phambili abantu bami mabasebenze ngokukhuthala ukwakha indlu egameni lami;
Futhi ngo nyaka owodwa kusuka ngalolusuku mabaqale futhi babeke isisekelo sendlu yami.
Ngalesi sizathu mabasebenze ngokukhuthala kusuka ngaleso sikhathi kuya phambili kuze kube iyaqedwa, kusuka etsheni lesisekelo layo kuya phezulu, kuze kungabi bikho lutho lwayo olungaqediwe.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, inceku yami uJoseph, nenceku yami uSidney, nenceku yami uHyrum, mabangabe besangena ezikweletini ngokwakha indlu egameni lami;
Kodwa indlu mayakhiwe egameni lami ngokwe sifanekiso engiyobatshengisa sona.
Futhi uma abantu bami bengayakhi ngokwesifanekiso engiyositshengisa ubumongameli babo, ngeke ngiyamukele ezandleni zabo.
Kodwa uma abantu bami beyakha ngokwesifanekiso engiyositshengisa ubumongameli babo, ngisho inceku yami uJoseph nabeluleki bakhe, uma kunjalo ngizoyamukela ezandleni zabantu bami.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, kuyintando yami ukuthi idolobha laseFar West kufanele lakhiwe ngokushesha ngokuqoqana kwabangcwele bami;
Futhi nokuthi ezinye izindawo kufanele zimiselwe ukuba yizikhonkwane ndawo zonke, njengoba kuyoboniswa inceku yami uJoseph, izikhathi ngezikhathi.
Ngokuba bhekani, ngizoba naye, futhi ngizomngcwelisa phambi kwabantu; ngokuba kuye nginike izikhiye zalombuso nobufundisi. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

ISpring Hill ibizwa yiNkosi nge-Adamu-ondi-Ahman, ngokuba, kusho yona, kuyindawo lapho u-Adamu eyoza khona ukuzovakashela abantu bakhe, noma oMdala weziNsuku eyohlala khona, njengoba kukhulunywe ngakho nguDaniyeli umphrofethi.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/117.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 117
chapter_summary: 1–9, Izinceku zeNkosi akufanele zifise izinto zomhlaba, ngokuba “iyini impahla eNkosini na?”; 10–16, Kufanele bayeke ukuba nezingqondo ezimfishane, futhi iminikelo yabo iyoba ngcwele eNkosini.

verses.text: Niqinisile isho kanje iNkosi encekwini yami uWilliam Marks, ngokunjalo nasencekwini yami uNewel K. Whitney, mabaqedele umsebenzi wabo ngokushesha futhi bahambe ezweni laseKirtland, ngaphambi kokuba mina, iNkosi, ngithumele futhi ungqoqwane emhlabeni.
Mabavuke, futhi basukume, futhi baphume, futhi bangahlali, ngokuba mina, iNkosi, ngiyakuyaleza lokhu.
Ngakho-ke, uma behlala ngeke kube kuhle kubo.
Mabaphenduke ezonweni zabo zonke, nakuzo zonke izifiso zabo zomhobholo, phambi kwami, kusho iNkosi; ngokuba iyini impahla kimi na? kusho iNkosi.
Impahla yaseKirtland mayidayiswe ukuze kukhokhelwe izikweletu, kusho iNkosi. Mabahambe, kusho iNkosi, futhi noma yini esalayo, mayisale ezandleni zenu, kusho iNkosi.
Ngokuba anginazo yini izinyoni zezulu, nezinhlanzi zolwandle, nezilwane zasezintabeni na? Angiwenzanga yini umhlaba na? Angiphethe yini izimiselo zawo wonke amabutho ezizwe zomhlaba na?
Ngakho-ke, ngeke yini ngenze izindawo zasehlane ziqhumise futhi ziqhakaze, futhi zikhiqize ngobuningi na? kusho iNkosi.

Ayikho yini indawo eyanele ezintabeni zika-Adamu-ondi-Ahman, futhi nasemathafeni ase-Olaha Shineha, noma izwe lapho u-Adamu ayehlala khona, ukuba ningaze nifise lokho okuyiconsi, futhi niyeke lezo zinto ezibaluleke kakhulu na?
Ngakho-ke, zanini lapha ezweni labantu bami, ngisho iSiyoni.

Inceku yami uWilliam Marks mayithembeke ezintweni ezincane, futhi iyoba ngumbusi phezu kokuningi. Makengamele phakathi kwabantu bami edolobheni laseFar West, futhi makabusiswe ngezibusiso zabantu bami.

Inceku yami uNewel K. Whitney makabe namahloni ngebutho lamaNikolawu nazo zonke izinengiso zabo ezicashileyo, nakho konke ukuba negqondo emfishane kwakhe phambi kwami, kusho iNkosi, futhi eze ezweni lase Adamu-ondi-Ahman, futhi abe ngumbhishobhi kubantu bami, kusho iNkosi, hhayi ngegama kodwa ngezenzo, kusho iNkosi.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, ngiyayikhumbula inceku yami u-Oliver Granger; bheka, ngiqinisile ngithi kuye igama lakhe liyokhunjulwa njengelingcwele izizukulwane ngezizukulwane, phakade naphakade, kusho iNkosi.

Ngakho-ke, makalekelele ngokukhuthazela ukuze kukhululwe ubuMongameli bokuQala beBandla lami, kusho iNkosi; futhi uma ewa uyovuka futhi, ngokuba umnikelo wakhe uyobangcwele kakhulu kimi kunenzuzo yakhe, kusho iNkosi.
Ngakho-ke, makeze lapha ngokushesha, ezweni laseSiyoni; futhi ngesikhathi esifanele uyokwenziwa umhwebi egameni lami, kusho iNkosi, ukuze kuzuze abantu bami.
Ngakho-ke makungabi bikho muntu odelela inceku yami u-Oliver Granger, kodwa izibusiso zabantu bami mazibe phezu kwakhe phakade naphakade.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, izinceku zami zonke ezisezweni laseKirtland maziyikhumbule iNkosi uNkulunkulu wazo, ngokunjalo nendlu yami futhi, ukuba ziyigcine ingcwele, futhi bachithe abashintshelana imali ngesikhathi sami esifanele, kusho iNkosi. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/118.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 118
chapter_summary: 1–3, INkosi izoyondla imindeni yabayiShumi namBili; 4–6, Izikhala kwabayiShumi namBili ziyagcwaliswa.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi: Makubanjwe umhlangano ngokushesha; abayiShumi namBili mabahlelwe; futhi makubekwe amadoda azothatha indawo yalawo awileyo.
Inceku yami uThomas makahlale okwesikhashana ezweni laseSiyoni, ukuze azise ngezwi lami.

Abaseleyo mabaqhubeke bashumayele kusuka ngalelo hora, futhi uma bezokwenza lokhu ngakho konke ukuzithoba kwenhliziyo, ngobumnene nokuthobeka, nokuba nenhliziyo ende, mina, iNkosi, ngibanika isethembiso sokuthi ngizoyondla imindeni yabo; futhi umnyango omkhulu wethuba lokusebenza bayovulelwa wona, kusuka ngalesi sikhathi kuya phambili.
Futhi ngentwasahlobo elandelayo mabasuke bahambe bawele amanzi amakhulu, futhi lapho bashumayele ivangeli lami, ukuphelela kwalo, futhi bafakaze ngegama lami.
Mabasuke kwabangcwele bami edolobheni laseFar West, zingamashumi amabili nesithupha ku-Epreli olandelayo, ebaleni lokwakhiwa lendlu yami, kusho iNkosi.

Inceku yami uJohn Taylor, futhi nenceku yami uJohn E. Page, futhi nenceku yami uWilford Woodruff, futhi nenceku yami uWillard Richards, mababekwe ukugcwalisa izikhala zalabo abawileyo, futhi baziswe ngokusemthethweni ngokubekwa kwabo.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/119.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 119
chapter_summary: 1–5, AbaNgcwele kufanele bakhokhe impahla yabo eseleyo futhi bese benikela, njengokweshumi, okukodwa eshumini kwenzuzo yabo ngonyaka; 6–7, Inqubo enjalo izolingcwelisa izwe laseSiyoni.

verses.text: Ngiqnisile, isho kanje iNkosi, ngifuna yonke impahla yabo eseleyo ukuba ibekwe ezandleni zikambhishobhi webandla lami eSiyoni,
Ukuze kwakhiwe indlu yami, futhi ukuze kubekwe isisekelo seSiyoni nesobuphristi, futhi ukuze kukhokhwe izikweletu zobuMongameli beBandla lami.
Futhi lokhu kuyokuba yisiqalo so kweshumi kwabantu bami.

Futhi emva kwalokho, labo abakhokhe okweshumi ngalendlela bayokhokha okukodwa eshumini kwayo yonke inzuzo yabo ngonyaka; futhi lokhu kuyoba umthetho omileyo kubo ingunaphakade, owenzelwe ubuphristi bami obungcwele, kusho iNkosi.

Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, kuyokwenzeka ukuthi bonke labo ababuthanela ezweni lase Siyoni bayokhokha okweshumi okuseleyo kwezimpahla zabo, futhi bayowugcina lomthetho, noma ngeke batholakale befanele ukuhlala phakathi kwenu.

Futhi ngithi kini, uma abantu bami bengawugcini lomthetho, ukuze bawugcine ungcwele, futhi ngalomthetho balingcwelise izwe lase Siyoni kimi, ukuze imithetho yami emisiweyo nokwahlulela kwami kugcinwe lapho, ukuze libe ngcwele kakhulu, bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngeke libe yizwe laseSiyoni kini.
Futhi lokhu kuyoba yisibonelo kuzo zonke izikhonkwane ziseSiyoni. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi, isikhathi sesifikile, sokuthi ziyodayiswa ngumkhandlu, owakhiwe ubuMongameli bokuQala beBandla lami, nombhishobhi nomkhandlu wakhe, nomkhandlu wami omkhulu; futhi nangezwi lami kubo, kusho iNkosi. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/121.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 121
chapter_summary: 1–6, UmPhrofethi unxusa iNkosi ngabaNgcwele abezwa ubuhlungu; 7–10, INkosi iyamduduza; 11–17, Baqalekisiwe bonke labo abakhuluma amanga bethi abantu beNkosi baphambukile; 18–25, Ngeke babe nelungelo lobuphristi futhi bayovinjelwa ukuza kuNkulunkulu; 26–32, Izambulo ezinhle kakhulu zethenjiswa kulabo ababekezelayo ngobuqhawe; 33–40, Kungani bebaningi ababizwayo kodwa beyincosana abakhethiweyo na; 41–46, Ubuphristi kufanele busetshenziswe ngokulunga kuphela.

verses.text: O Nkulunkulu, ukuphi na? Futhi likuphi idokodo elifihle indawo ekucashisile na?

Kuyoze kube nini isandla sakho usibambile, nehlo lakho, yebo ihlo lakho alimsulwa, libheka lisemazulwini aphakade ububi obenziwa kubantu bakho nasezincekwini zakho, nendlebe yakho ithinteke ngokukhala kwabo na?
Yebo, O Nkosi, kuyoze kube nini bezwa ubuhlungu balobu bubi nokucindezeleka okungavumelekile, ngaphambi kokuba inhliziyo yakho ibathambele, nezibilini zakho zithinteke ngokubazwela na?

O Nkosi Nkulunkulu Mninimandla Onke, menzi wezulu, umhlaba, nezilwandle, nazo zonke izinto ezikukho, futhi olawula futhi abeke ngaphansi kwakhe udeveli, nombuso kaSheol omnyama nowabahlwelwe—lula isandla sakho; ihlo lakho malibuke; idokodo lakho maliphakanyiswe; indawo yakho yokucasha mayingabe isambozwa; beka indlebe yakho; inhliziyo yakho mayithanjiswe, nezibilini zakho zithinteke ngokusizwela.
Intukuthelo yakho mayokhelekele izitha zethu; futhi, entukuthelweni yenhliziyo yakho, ngenkemba yakho siphindiselele ngokoniwa okubhekiswe kithi.
Khumbula abangcwele bakho abezwa ubuhlungu, O Nkulunkulu wethu; nezinceku zakho ziyojabula egameni lakho ingunaphakade.
Ndodana yami, ukuthula makube semphefumulweni wakho; ubunzima bakho nezihlupho zakho zizoba ngezesikhashana;
Futhi emva kwalokho, uma ukubekezelela kahle, uNkulunkulu uyokuphakamisela phezulu; uyonqoba phezu kwazo zonke izitha zakho.
Abahlobo bakho bami eduze nawe, futhi bayophinde bakubingelele ngezinhliziyo ezifudumele nangezandla zobungani.
Wena awukafani no Jobe; abahlobo bakho abalwi nawe, noma bakubeke icala lesiphambeko, njengokuba benza kuJobe.
Futhi nalabo abakubeka icala lesiphambeko, ithemba labo liyoshatshalaliswa, futhi nabakulindeleyo kuyoncibilika njengo ngqoqwane uncibilika phambi kwemisebe eshisayo yelanga eliphumayo;

Futhi nokuthi uNkulunkulu usebeke isandla sakhe nesisicilelo ukushintsha izikhathi nezinkathi, nokuphuphuthekisa imiqondo yabo, ukuze bangayiqondi imisebenzi yakhe emangalisayo; ukuze abavivinye futhi ababambe kubo ubuqili babo;
Futhi ngokuba izinhliziyo zabo zikhohlakele, futhi nezinto abathanda ukuzithwesa abanye, futhi bathanda ukuba abanye bezwe ubuhlungu, zizoza kubo kakhulu;
Ukuze badunyazwe futhi, namathemba abo ashatshalaliswe;
Futhi kungakabi minyaka emingaki kusuka manje, bona nezizukulwane zabo bayoshanyelwe ngaphansi kwezulu, kusho uNkulunkulu, kangangoba akukho noyedwa wabo osalayo aphile.

Baqalekisiwe bonke labo abayophakamisela abagcotshiweyo bami isithende, kusho iNkosi, futhi bememeza bethi bonile bebe bengonanga phambi kwami, kusho iNkosi, kodwa benze lokho obekufanele emehlweni ami, futhi engibayale ngakho.
Kodwa labo abamemezela ukuthi baphambukile bakwenza ngokuba beyizinceku zesono, futhi banga bantwana bokungalaleli uqobo lwabo.
Futhi labo abafunga amanga ngokumelene nezinceku zami, ukuze bazilethe ebugqilini nasekufeni—
Maye kubo; ngokuba bakhubekise abancinyane bami bayohlukaniswa ne zimiso zendlu yami.
Amaqoma abo ngeke agcwale, izindlu zabo nezinqolobane zabo ziyobhubha, futhi bona uqobo lwabo bayodelelwa yilabo ababa luthayo.
Ngeke babe nelungelo lo buphristi, noma izizukulwane zabo emva kwabo izizukulwane ngezizukulwane.
Bekuyoba ngcono kubo ukuba itshe lokusila ligaxwe ezintanyeni zabo, futhi baminziswe ekujuleni kolwandle.

Maye kubo bonke labo abahlupha abantu bami, futhi ababaphoqa ukuthi babaleke, futhi ababa bulalayo, futhi bafakaze ngokumelene nabo, kusho iNkosi yamaBandla; isizukulwane samabululu ngeke silubalekele usizi nobuhlungu obungapheli besihogo.
Bheka, amehlo ami ayayibona futhi ayayazi yonke imisebenzi yabo, futhi ngigcine isahlulelo esisheshayo ngesikhathi saso, sabo bonke;
Ngokuba kune sikhathi esimisiwe sawo wonke umuntu, kuyoba ngokwe misebenzi yakhe.
UNkulunkulu uyokunika ulwazi ngo Moya wakhe oNgcwele, yebo, ngesingachazeki isipho sikaMoya oNgcwele, esingakaze sambulwe kusukela umhlaba wabakhona kuze kube manje;
Olwalindelwa ngokhokho bethu ngokulangazelela ukuba lwambulwe ezinsukwini zokugcina, imiqondo yabo eyakhonjwa kulo yizingelosi, njengoba lwalugcinelwe ukupheleliswa kwenkazimulo yabo;
Isikhathi esizayo lapho okungekho lutho oluyofihlwa, noma kukhona uNkulunkulu oyedwa noma onkulunkulu abaningi, bayokwambulwa.
Zonke izihlalo zobukhosi nemibuso, iziphathimandla namandla, kuyo kwambulwa futhi kunikwe bonke abalibekezelele ngobuqhawe ivangeli lika Jesu Kristu.
Futhi nokuthi, ngabe ikhona yini imikhawulo ebekelwe amazulu noma izilwandle, noma umhlaba owonileyo, noma ilanga, inyanga, noma izinkanyezi—

Zonke izikhathi zokuzungeza kwazo, zonke izinsuku ezibekiweyo, izinyanga, neminyaka, futhi zonke izinsuku zezinsuku zazo, izinyanga, futhi neminyaka, nazo zonke izinkazimulo zazo, imithetho yazo, nezikhathi zazo ezihleliweyo, ziyokwambulwa ngezinsuku zo hlelo lokwengamela lokuphelela kwezikhathi—

Njengalokho okwabekwa phakathi ko Mkhandlu kaNkulunkulu waPhakade wabo bonke abanye onkulunkulu ngaphambi kokuba lomhlaba ubekhona, okufanele kugcinelwe isiphetho nesiphelo sawo, lapho wonke umuntu eyongena kubo ubukhona bakhe nakukho ukuphumula kwakhe kokungafi.

Kuyoze kube nini amanzi agobhozayo ehlezi engacwebile na? Yimaphi amandla ayovimba amazulu na? Ngokufanayo umuntu angalula ingalo yakhe ebuthakathaka ukumisa umfula iMissouri endleleni yawo emisiwe, noma ukuwushintsha endleleni yawo ubuyele emuva, njengokuvimba uMninimandla Onke ukuba athulule ulwazi lusuka ezulwini phezu kwamakhanda abaholi babaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina.
Bheka, baningi ababiziwe, kodwa bayingcosana abakhethiweyo. Futhi kungani bengakhethwanga na?
Ngokuba izinhliziyo zabo zinake kakhulu izinto zalomhlaba, futhi balangazelela ukudunyiswa ngabantu, kangangoba abasifundi lesi sifundo esisodwa—
Sokuthi amalungelo obuphristi axhumene ngokungahlukaniseki namandla asezulwini, futhi nokuthi amandla asezulwini ngeke alawulwa noma aphathwe ngaphandle uma kungokwemigomo yo kulunga.

Ukuthi anganikwa kithi, kuyiqiniso; kodwa uma sizama ukufihla izono zethu, noma ukwanelisa ukuzikhukhumeza kwethu, ukulangazelela kwethu okuyize, noma ukusebenzisa ukulawula noma ukubusa noma impoqo kubantwana babantu, nganoma okungakanani ukungalungi, bheka, amazulu ayaziqhelisa; uMoya weNkosi uyadabuka; futhi uma usuqhelile, Amen kubuphristi noma kulo igunya laleyo ndoda.
Bheka, ngaphambi kokuba azi, usesele yedwa, ukukhahlela ezinkandini, ukuhlupha abangcwele, nokulwa noNkulunkulu.
Sifunde kabuhlungu ukuthi kuyimvelo nesimilo cishe sawo wonke umuntu, qeduba bathole igunya elincane, njengoba becabanga, masinyane bazoqala babuse ngokungalungile.
Ngakho-ke baningi ababiziwe, kodwa bayingcosana abakhethiweyo.
Akukho mandla noma umthelela ongagcinwa noma okufanele ugcinwe ngobuphristi, ngaphandle kokubonisa, ngokuba nenhliziyo ende, ngobubele nangobumnene, nangothando olungazenzisi;
Ngomusa, nangolwazi oluphelele, okuyowukhulisa kakhulu umoya ngaphandle kokuzenzisa, nangaphandle kwenkohliso—
Sola kakhulu ngesikhathi esifanele, uma uqhutshwa uMoya oNgcwele; futhi emva kwalokho ukhombise ukukhula ko thando kulowo omsolile, funa akuthathe njengesitha sakhe;
Ukuze azi ukuthi ukukholwa kwakho kuqinile kunamaketango okufa.

Izibilini zakho mazigcwale isihe kubo bonke abantu, futhi nakwabendlu yokukholwa, futhi ukulunga makubuse imicabango yakho ngokungaphezi; uma kunjalo ukuzethemba kwakho kuyoqina phambi kukaNkulunkulu; futhi nemfundiso yobuphristi iyoconsela emoyeni wakho njengamazolo esuka ezulwini.

Umoya oNgcwele uyoba ngumhlobo wakho njalo, futhi nentonga yakho ibe yintonga engashintshiyo yokulunga neqiniso; futhi nokubusa kwakho kuyoba ukubusa kwaphakade, futhi ngaphandle kwempoqo kuyogobhozela kuwe phakade naphakade.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/122.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 122
chapter_summary: 1–4, Umhlaba wonke uzobuza ngegama likaJoseph Smith; 5–7, Bonke ubungozi nokuzwa kwakhe ubuhlungu kuyomnika ithuba lokuzizwela nokuzibonela futhi kumnike inzuzo; 8–9, Indodana yoMuntu ikuzwe konke.

verses.text: Umhlaba wonke uyobuza ngegama lakho, futhi iziwula ziyokudelela, futhi isihogo siyolwa nawe ngolaka olukhulu.
Kodwa abamsulwa ngenhliziyo, futhi abahlakaniphile, naba nobuntu, nabalungile, bayofuna ukwelulekwa, negunya, nezibusiso njalo ngaphansi kwesandla sakho.
Futhi abantu bakho ngeke bakuphendukele ngobufakazi bamambuka.

Futhi nakuba umthelela wabo uyokufaka ezinkathazweni, nasejele, uyohlonishwa; futhi ngaphandle kwesikhashana kuphela izwi lakho liyokwesabeka phakathi kwezitha zakho kune bhubesi elinolaka, ngenxa yokulunga kwakho; futhi uNkulunkulu wakho uyoma eduze kwakho phakade naphakade.
Uma ubizelwa ukudlula osizini; uma usebungozini phakathi kwalabo owakhe nabo abangama mbuka; uma usebungozini phakathi kwabaphangi; uma usebungozini ezweni noma olwandle;

Uma ubekwa icala ngazo zonke izindlela zamanga zokubekwa icala; uma izitha zakho zikuhlasela; uma bekwahlukanisa noyihlo nonyoko nabafowenu nodadewenu; futhi uma ngenkemba izitha zakho zikuhlukanisa nomfazi wakho, nabantwana bakho, futhi nendodana yakho endala, nakuba ineminyaka eyisithupha kuphela ubudala, iyonamathela ezingubeni zakho, futhi ithi: Baba, baba, kungani ungahlali nathi na? O, baba, azokwenzani lamadoda na? futhi uma emva kwalokho iyohlukaniswa nawe ngempoqo ngenkemba, futhi bakuhudulele etilongweni, futhi izitha zakho zikuzulumba njenge zimpisi zifuna igazi lemvana;

Futhi uma uphonswa emgodini, noma ezandleni zababulali, futhi ugwetshwa isigwebo sokufa; uma uphonswa ekujuleni; uma amagagasi aphakamayo ekwenzela uzungu; uma izivunguvungu ziba yisitha sakho; uma isibhakabhaka siba mnyama, futhi imvelo ihlangana yonke ukuvimba indlela; futhi phezu kwakho konke, uma imihlathi ye sihogo uqobo iyokuvulela umlomo kakhulu, wokwazi, ndodana yami, ukuthi zonke lezi zinto ziyokunika ithuba lo kuzizwela nokuzibonela, futhi ziyokuba yinzuzo kuwe.
INdodana yoMuntu ikuzwe konke. Ngabe umkhulu kunayo na?

Ngakho-ke, bambelela endleleni yakho, futhi ubuphristi buyohlala kuwe; ngokuba imikhawulo yabo ibekiwe, ngeke bayidlule. Izinsuku zokuphila zakho ziyaziwa, futhi iminyaka yakho ngeke incishiswe; ngakho-ke, ungakwesabi umuntu angakwenza, ngokuba uNkulunkulu uyoba nawe phakade naphakade.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/123.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 123
chapter_summary: 1–6, AbaNgcwele kufanele baqoqe futhi bakhiphe umbiko ngokuzwa ubuhlungu nokuhlushwa kwabo; 7–10, Umoya ofanayo nalowo owamisa izinkolelo ezingalungile yiwo futhi oholela ekuhlushweni kwabaNgcwele; 11–17, Abaningi phakathi kwazo zonke izinkolo basazolemukela iqiniso.

verses.text: Futhi phezu kwalokho, siphakamisa ukuthi nibheke imfanelo yokuba abangcwele bonke baqoqe ulwazi lwako konke okwenzekayo, futhi nokuzwa ubuhlungu nokuhlushwa ngabantu balesi siFundazwe;
Futhi nayo yonke impahla nobungako bomonakalo abawutholile, ngokwesimilo futhi nangokomzimba, kanye nangokwempahla;
Futhi kanye namagama abo bonke abantu ababe nesandla ekucindezelweni kwabo, kangangoba bengabathola futhi babafumane.
Futhi mhlawumbe ikomiti lingabekwa ukuze lithole lezi zinto, futhi nokuthi lithathe okushiwoyo nokufungelwe; futhi nokuthi liqoqe imibhalo ehlambalazayo esatshalalisiwe;

Futhi nayo yonke leyo esemaphephandabeni, nasezincwadini zolwazi olunhlobonhlobo, nayo yonke imilando ehlambalazayo ekhishiwe, futhi nesabhalwa, futhi nokuthi ibhalwa ngobani, futhi liveze lonke uchungechunge lwezehlakalo zalabo abanodeveli futhi nemithwalo emibi neyokubulala eyethweswe labantu—

Ukuze singayikhipheli kuphela emhlabeni wonke, kodwa siyibeke phambi kwabaholi bomkhandlu ophetheyo kubo bonke ububi bayo obesabekayo, njengemizamo yokugcina eyalelwe kithi nguBaba wethu oseZulwini, ngaphambi kokuba sikwazi ukucela ngokugcwele nangokupheleleyo leso sethembiso esiyombiza endaweni yakhe acashe kuyo; futhi ukuze isizwe sonke singabi nazaba ngaphambi kokuba athumele amandla engalo yakhe enamandla.

Lokhu ngokufunekayo impela esibopheke ukuba sikwenzele uNkulunkulu, izingelosi, esiyomiswa nazo, futhi nokuthi siwenzele thina, abafazi bethu nabantwana bethu, abenziwe ukuba bathobele usizi, ukudabuka, nezinkathazo, ngaphansi kwesandla esizondeka kakhulu sokubulala, sobudlova, nengcindezelo, esiphaswa futhi nesishoshozelwa futhi nesisekelwa ngumthelela walowo moya owaqinisa izinkolelo zobaba, ababethole amanga, ezinhliziyweni zabantwana, futhi ogcwalise umhlaba ngokudideka, futhi obulokhu ukhula ngamandla, manje osuyisisusa sabo bonke ububi, futhi umhlaba wonke ububula ngaphansi kwesi sindo sobubi bawo obukhulu.
Uyijoka lensimbi, uyisibopho esiqinile; ungozankosi bangempela, namaketango, futhi nezibopho, futhi nezindophi zesihogo.

Ngakho-ke lokhu ngofunekayo impela, hhayi kuphela ukuba sikwenzela abafazi nabantwana bethu, kodwa ukuba sikwenzele abafelokazi nezintandane, abayeni babo noyise ababulewe ngaphansi kwesandla sawo sensimbi;

Lezo zenzo ezimbi nezokuhlambalaza ezanele ukwenza isihogo uqobo sithuthumele, futhi sihlale sishaqekile futhi siphaphathekile, futhi nezandla zikadeveli uqobo ziqhaqhazele futhi zixegezele ngokungavimbelekiyo.
Futhi lokhu ngofunekayo impela esibopheke ukuba sikwenzele isizukulwane esikhulayo, futhi nabo bonke abamsulwa ezinhliziyweni—

Ngokuba basebaningi namanje emhlabeni phakathi kwazo zonke izinkolo, amaqembu, namabandla, abavaleke amehlo ngobuqili babantu, obunamacebo okudukisa, futhi abavimbelekile ukuthola iqiniso ngokuba bengazi ukuthi bazolithola kuphi—
Ngakho-ke, kufanele senze konke okusemandleni ukuveza zonke izinto ezifihliweyo zobumnyama, ngangokuzazi kwethu; futhi ziyabonakaliswa ngempela kusuka ezulwini—
Ngakho-ke lokhu kufanele kwenziwe ngenkulu inkuthalo.
Makungabi biko muntu othatha lokhu njengezinto ezingabalulekile; ngokuba kuningi okukhona esikhathini esizayo, ngokuphathelene nabangcwele, okuncike kulezi zinto.
Niyazi, bafowethu, ukuthi umkhumbi omkhulu usizwa kakhulu yiphini elincinyana ngesikhathi sesiphepho, ngokuthi ugcinwe uqhutshwa ngumoya namagagasi.

Ngakho-ke, bafowethu abathandeka kakhulu, masenze zonke izinto esinamandla okuzenza ngenjabulo; futhi emva kwalokho singama sithule, ngesikhulu isiqiniseko, ukuze sibona insindiso kaNkulunkulu, futhi nokuba ingalo yakhe yambulwe.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/124.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 124
chapter_summary: 1–14, UJoseph Smith uyalwa ukuba azise ngevangeli ngesizotha kumongameli waseMelika, kubabusi nakubaholi bazo zonke izizwe; 15–21, UHyrum Smith, uDavid W. Patten, uJoseph Smith, oMdala nabanye phakathi kwabaphilayo nasebafa bayabusiswa ngobuqotho nangokulunga kwabo; 22–28, AbaNgcwele bayalwa ukuba bakhe indlu yokuthokozisa izihambi futhi nethempeli eNauvoo; 29–36, Imibhabhadiso yabafileyo kufanele yenziwe ethempelini; 37–44, Abantu beNkosi njalo bakha amathempeli ukuze kwenziwe izimiso ezingcwele; 45–55, AbaNgcwele bayakhululwa kwisibopho sokwakha ithempeli esiFundeni iJackson ngenxa yokucindezelwa yizitha zabo; 56–83, Imiyalelo iyanikwa ngokwakhiwa kweNdlu yaseNauvoo; 84–96, UHyrum Smith ubizwa ukuba abe ngumphatriyakhe, afumane izikhiye, futhi ame esikhundleni sika-Oliver Cowdery; 97–122, UWilliam Law nabanye bayalulekwa ngemisebenzi yabo; 123–145, Abaphathi-zikhundla abakhulu nabasezindaweni ezithile bayashiwo, kanye nemisebenzi yabo nemigwamanda abahlangene nayo.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi kuwe, nceku yami uJoseph Smith, ngithokozile kakhulu ngokuzinikela nokuvuma kwakho, okwenzile; ngokuba ngikuvusele lenhloso, ukuze ngitshengise ukuhlakanipha kwami ngezinto ezibuthakathaka zomhlaba.

Imikhuleko yakho yamukelekile kimi; futhi ukuyiphendula ngithi kuwe, ubiziwe manje masinyane ukuba wenze isaziso ngesizotha sevangeli lami, futhi nangalesi sikhonkwane engisitshale ukuba sibe yitshe lesisekelo seSiyoni, eyokhazimuliswa ngobuhle obufana nobedlu yobukhosi.

Lesi saziso siyokwenziwa kuwo wonke amakhosi omhlaba, kumagumbi omane awo, kohloniphekileyo umongameli okhethiweyo, nabahloniphekileyo ababusi bezwe ohlala kulo, futhi nakuzo zonke izizwe zomhlaba ezisabalele ndawo zonke.
Masilotshwe ngomoya wo bumnene futhi nangamandla oMoya oNgcwele, oyoba kuwe ngesikhathi sokusiloba;
Ngokuba uyonikezwa nguMoya oNgcwele ukwazi intando yami ngokuphathelene nalawo makhosi nabase magunyeni, ngisho nokuyobehlela ngesikhathi esizayo.
Ngokuba, bheka, sengizobacela ukuba banake ukukhanya futhi nenkazimulo kaSiyoni, ngokuba isikhathi esimisiweyo sesifikile sokumenzela umusa.
Ngakho-ke, bacele, ngesaziso esikhulu, futhi ngobufakazi bakho, ungabesabi, ngokuba banjengo tshani, futhi yonke inkazimulo yabo injengembali esheshe ivuthuluke, ukuze basale futhi bengenazaba—

Futhi ukuze ngibavakashele ngosuku lokuhanjelwa, lapho ngiyokwambula khona okumboze ubuso bami, ukuze ngimisele umcindezeli isabelo sakhe phakathi kwabazenzisi, lapho kukhona khona ukugedla kwamazinyo, uma bezenqaba izinceku zami nobufakazi engibambulile kuzo.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngizobahambela futhi ngithambise izinhliziyo zabo, abaningi babo ukuze nizuze, ukuze nithole umusa emehlweni abo, ukuze beze kukho ukukhanya kweqiniso, futhi abeZizwe ukuze bahlanganyele ekuphakanyisweni noma ekukhushulweni kweSiyoni.
Ngokuba usuku lokuhambela kwami luza ngokushesha, ngehora eningalicabangiyo; futhi kuyoba kuphi ukuphepha kwabantu bami, kanye nesiphephelo salabo abayosala kubo na?
Vukani, O makhosi omhlaba! Wozani, O, wozani, negolide nesiliva lenu, nisize abantu bami, endlini yamadodakazi aseSiyoni.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe inceku yami uRobert B. Thompson makakusize ulobe lesisaziso ngokuba ngithokozile kakhulu ngaye, futhi nokuthi kufanele abe nawe;
Ngakho-ke makasilalele iseluleko sakho, futhi ngizombusisa ngezibusiso eziningi; makathembeke futhi abe neqiniso ezintweni zonke kusuka manje, futhi uyoba mkhulu emehlweni ami;
Kodwa makakhumbule ukuthi ubuphathi bakhe ngizobufuna ezandleni zakhe.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, ibusisiwe inceku yami uHyrum Smith; ngokuba mina, iNkosi, ngiyamthanda ngenxa yobuqotho benhliziyo yakhe, futhi nangenxa yokuthi uthanda lokho okulungile phambi kwami, kusho iNkosi.

Phezu kwalokho, inceku yami uJohn C. Bennett makakusize emsebenzini wakho wokuthumela izwi lami emakhosini nakubantu bomhlaba, futhi makame eduze nawe, ngisho wena nceku yami uJoseph Smith, ngehora lokuhlushwa; futhi umvuzo wakhe ngeke umlahlekele uma emukela iseluleko.

Futhi ngenxa yothando lwakhe uyoba mkhulu, ngokuba uyoba ngowami uma enza lokhu, kusho iNkosi. Ngiwubonile umsebenzi awenzileyo, engiwemukelayo uma eqhubeka, futhi ngizomqhelisa ngezibusiso nangenkazimulo enkulu.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kuwe kuyintando yami ukuthi inceku yami uLyman Wight aqhubeke nokushumayelela uSiyoni, ngomoya wobumnene, engivuma phambi komhlaba; futhi ngizomthwala njengokuba semaphikweni okhozi; futhi uzoletha udumo nokuhlonishwa kuye uqobo nasegameni lami.

Ukuze ngesikhathi eqeda umsebenzi wakhe ngimemukele kimi, ngisho njengoba ngenza encekwini yami uDavid Patten, osenami ngalesi sikhathi, futhi nenceku yami u-Edward Partridge, futhi nenceku yami esikhulile uJoseph Smith, oMdala, ohlezi no-Abrahama ngakwesokunene sakhe, futhi ubusisiwe futhi ungcwele, ngokuba ungowami.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, inceku yami uGeorge Miller akana nkohliso; angathenjwa ngenxa yobuqotho benhliziyo yakhe; futhi nangothando analo ngobufakazi obuvela kimi mina, iNkosi, ngiyamthanda.

Ngakho-ke ngithi kuwe, ngibeka phezu kwekhanda lakhe isikhundla so bubhishobhi, njengasencekwini yami u-Edward Partridge, ukuze emukele iminikelo yendlu yami, ukuze anike izibusiso kwabampofu babantu bami, kusho iNkosi. Makungabikho muntu odelela inceku yami uGeorge, ngokuba iyongihlonipha.
Inceku yami uGeorge, nenceku yami uLyman, futhi nenceku yami uJohn Snider, nabanye, mabakhe indlu egameni lami, inceku yami uJoseph eyobatshengisa yona, nasendaweni eyobatshengisa yona futhi.

Futhi kuyoba indlu yokulala, indlu izihambi ezisuka kude zingeza zizohlala kuyo; ngakho-ke makube yindlu enhle, efanele ukwemukeleka, ukuze isihambi esikhathele sithole ukuphila futhi nokuphepha ngesikhathi sizindla ngezwi leNkosi; futhi nesisekelo engisimisele iSiyoni.

Lendlu iyoba yindawo yokuhlala enempilo uma yakhiwa egameni lami, futhi uma umphathi oyobekwa kuyo engeke avumele noma yikuphi ukungcola ukuba kuze kuyo. Iyoba ngcwele, noma iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu ngeke ahlale kuyo.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, abangcwele bami mabeze besuka kude.

Futhi thumelani izithunywa ezisheshayo, yebo, ezikhethiweyo izithunywa, futhi nithi kuzo: Wozani, nalo lonke igolide lenu, nesiliva lenu, futhi namatshe enu aligugu, futhi nazo zonke izimpahla zenu eziyigugu zasendulo; futhi nabo bonke abanolwazi lwezimpahla eziyigugu zasendulo, abazoza, bangeza, futhi lethani umsayipuresi, nomthidari, nomkhoba, ndawonye nazo zonke izihlahla ezingamagugu zomhlaba;
Futhi nensimbi, nekhopha, nethusi, nokhethe, nangazo zonke izinto zenu eziligugu zomhlaba; futhi nakhe indlu egameni lami, ngenhloso yokuba oPhakeme kaKhulu ahlale kuyo.
Ngokuba ayikho indawo etholakalayo emhlabeni angeza kuyo futhi abuyisele lokho okwakulahlekile kini, noma lokho akuthatha, ngisho ukuphelela kobuphristi.
Ngokuba ichibi lokubhabhadisa alikho emhlabeni, ukuze bona, abangcwele bami, ba bhabhadiselwe labo asebafa—
Ngokuba lesi simiso singesendlu yami, futhi ngeke semukeleke kimi, ngaphandle kwezinsuku zobumpofu benu, lapho ningakwazi ukungakhela indlu.
Kodwa ngiyaniyala, nonke nina bangcwele bami, kuba ningakhele indlu; futhi ngininika isikhathi esanele ukuba ningakhele indlu; futhi ngalesi sikhathi imibhabhadiso yenu iyokwamukeleka kimi.

Kodwa bhekani, ekupheleni kwalesi sikhathi engininike sona imibhabhadiso yenu yabafileyo benu ngeke yamukeleke kimi; futhi uma ningazenzi lezi zinto ekupheleni kwesikhathi engini nike sona niyokwenqatshwa njengebandla, nabafileyo benu, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu.

Ngokuba ngiqinisile ngithi kini, emva kokuba senibe nesikhathi esanele sokungakhela indlu, lapho isimiso sokubhabhadiselwa abafileyo singesakhona, futhi esamiswa ngaphambi kokusekelwa komhlaba, imibhabhadiso yenu yabafileyo ngeke yemukeleke kimi;
Ngokuba kulapho izikhiye zobuphristi obungcwele ezinikwa khona, ukuze nithole ukuhlonishwa nenkazimulo.
Futhi emva kwalesi sikhathi, imibhabhadiso yenu yabafileyo, eyenziwa yilabo abasabalele ndawo zonke, ayamukelekile kimi, kusho iNkosi.
Ngokuba kumisiwe ukuthi eSiyoni, nakuzo izikhonkwane zakhe, futhi naseJerusalema, kulezo zindawo engizimisileyo zokuphephela, kuyoba yizindawo zemibhabhadiso yabafileyo benu.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, kuyomukeleka kanjani ukugezwa kwenu kimi, ngaphandle kokuba nikwenze endlini eniyakhe egameni lami na?

Ngokuba, ngenxa yalokhu ngamyala uMose ukuba akhe itabernakele, ukuze balithwale ehlane, futhi nokuthi bakhe indlu ezweni lesethembiso, ukuze lezo zimiso zambulwe ebezifihliwe ngaphambi kokuba khona komhlaba.

Ngakho-ke, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, imigcobo yenu, nokugezwa kwenu, nemi bhabhadiso yenu yabafileyo, ne mihlangano yenu ezothileyo, nezimiso zenu ze minikelo yenu ngamadodana kaLevi, ukuze kutholakale izambulo zenu ezindaweni zenu ezingcwele kakhulu lapho enithola khona ukukhulumisana, ngokunjalo nemithetho nezahlulelo, ukuze kuqale izambulo futhi nesisekelo sikaSiyoni, futhi ukuze kukhazimuliswe, kuhlonishwe, futhi kuphiwe izipho zomoya kwabahlezi kuye, kunikwe ngesimiso sendlu yami engcwele, abantu bami abahlale njalo beyalwa ukuba bayakhe egameni lami elingcwele.
Futhi ngiqinisile ngithi kini, lendlu mayakhelwe egameni lami, ukuze ngambule izimiso zami kuyo kubantu bami;
Ngokuba ngikubona kufanele ukuba ngambule ebandleni lami izinto ebezifihliwe ngaphambi kokuba khona komhlaba, izinto eziphathelene nohlelo lokwengamela lokuphelela kwezikhathi.
Futhi ngizoyitshengisa inceku yami uJoseph zonke izinto eziphathelene nalendlu, ngokunjalo nobuphristi bayo, futhi nendawo eyokwakhiwa kuyo.
Futhi niyoyakha endaweni enihlele ukuyakha kuyo, ngakuba lelo yibala enginikhethele lona ukuyakha kulo.
Uma nisebenza ngawo wonke amandla enu, ngizolingcwelisa lelobala ukuze lenziwe libe ngcwele.
Futhi uma abantu bami belalela izwi lami, futhi nezwi le zinceku zami engizibeke ukuba zihole abantu bami, bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngeke basuswe endaweni yabo.

Kodwa uma bengalilaleli izwi lami, noma izwi lalamadoda engiwabekile, ngeke babusiswe, ngokuba bangcolisa amagceke ami angcwele, futhi nezimiso zami ezingcwele, ngokunjalo nemithetho, namazwi ami angcwele engibanika wona.

Futhi kuyokwenzeka ukuthi uma nakha indlu egameni lami, futhi ningazenzi izinto engizishoyo, ngeke ngisenze isifungo engisenza kini, noma ngigcwalise izethembiso enizilindele ezandleni zami, kusho iNkosi.

Ngokuba esikhundleni sezibusiso, ngemisebenzi yenu uqobo, niletha iziqalekiso, ulaka, intukuthelo, futhi nezahlulelo phezu kwamakhanda enu, ngobuwula benu, futhi nangazo zonke izinengiso zenu, enizenza phambi kwami, kusho iNkosi.

Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, uma nginika umyalelo kunoma yimaphi amadodana abantu ukuba enze umsebenzi egameni lami, futhi lawo madodana abantu esebenza ngamandla awo onke nangakho konke anakho ukwenza lowo msebenzi, futhi bengakuyeki ukukhuthala kwabo, futhi izitha zabo ziza kubo zibavimbela ekwenzeni lowo msebenzi, bhekani, kuyintando yami ukuba ngingabe ngisawufuna lowo msebenzi ezandleni zalawo madodana abantu, kodwa ukuba ngemukele iminikelo yabo.

Futhi ububi nokuphambuka emithethweni nakuyo imiyalelo yami engcwele ngizoku vakashela phezu kwamakhanda alabo abavimbela umsebenzi wami, kwesesithathu nakwese sine isizukulwane, uma benga phenduki, futhi bengizonda, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu.

Ngakho-ke, ngalesi sizathu ngiyamukele iminikelo yalabo engibayalile ukwakha idolobha nendlu egameni lami, kuso isifunda iJackson, eMissouri, futhi nabavinjelwa yizitha zabo, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu.

Futhi ngizophendula ngokwahlulela, ngolaka, nangentukuthelo, ngokukhala, nangosizi olukhulu, futhi nangokugedla kwamazinyo phezu kwamakhanda abo, kwesesithathu nakwesesine isizukulwane, uma bengaphenduki, futhi bengizonda, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu.

Futhi ngenza lokhu kube yisibonelo kini, ukuze nifumane induduzo ngokuphathelene nabo bonke abayalwe ukwenza umsebenzi futhi nabavinjwe yizandla zezitha zabo, nangokucindezelwa, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu.
Ngokuba ngiyiNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu, futhi ngizobahlenga bonke labo bazalwane benu abebe msulwa enhliziyweni, futhi aba bulewe ezweni laseMissouri, kusho iNkosi.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngiyaniyala futhi ukuba nakhe indlu egameni lami, ngisho kulendawo, ukuze nizibonakalise kimi ukuthi nithembekile kuzo zonke izinto noma ngabe yini enginiyala ngakho, ukuze nginibusise, futhi nginiqhelise ngenhlonipho, nangokungafi, nokuphila okuphakade.

Manje ngithi kini, ngokuphathelene nendlu yami yokuhlala enginiyale ukuba niyakhele izihambi, mayakhiwe egameni lami, futhi mayibizwe ngegama lami, futhi inceku yami uJoseph nendlu yakhe mabahlale kuyo, izizukulwane ngezizukulwane.
Ngokuba lokhu kugcotshwa ngikubeke phezu kwakhe, ukuze izibusiso zakhe zibekwe phezu kwesizukulwane sakhe esizayo emva kwakhe.
Futhi njengoba ngasho ku-Abrahama ngokuphathelene nezihlobo zomhlaba, kanjalo-ke ngithi nakuyo inceku yami uJoseph: Kuwe nakuyo inzalo yakho izihlobo zomhlaba ziyobusiswa.
Ngakho-ke, inceku yami uJoseph nenzalo yakhe emva kwakhe mabahlale kuleyondlu, izizukulwane ngezizukulwane, phakade naphakade, kusho iNkosi.

Futhi igama laleyondlu mayiqanjwe ngokuthi yiNdlu yaseNauvoo; futhi mayibe yindawo yokuhlala ejabulisayo kubantu, futhi ibe yindawo yokuphumula yomhambi okhathele, ukuze acabange ngenkazimulo yaseSiyoni, futhi nangenkazimulo yaleli, itshe lesisekelo layo;
Ukuze futhi athole iseluleko kulabo engibabeke ukuba babe njenge zitshalo ezidumileyo, futhi njenga balindi phezu kwezindonga zakhe.

Bhekani, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, inceku yami uGeorge Miller, nenceku yami uLyman Wight, nenceku yami uJohn Snider, nenceku yami uPeter Haws mabazihlele, futhi bakhethe oyedwa wabo abe umongameli womgwamanda wabo ngenhloso yokwakha leyondlu.
Futhi bayokwenza isimiso, abayothola ngaso imali yokwakha leyondlu.

Futhi mabangatholi ngaphansi kwamadola angamashumi amahlanu ngesabelo sobunikazi kuleyondlu, futhi bayovunyelwa ukwamukela amadola ayizinkulungwane eziyishumi nanhlanu kunoma ubani ozoba nobunikazi kuleyondlu.
Kodwa mabangavunyelwa ukwamukela ngaphezulu kwamadola ayizinkulungwane eziyishumi nanhlanu zemali yobunikazi kumuntu oyedwa.
Futhi mabangavunyelwa ukuthola ngaphansi kwamadola angamashumi amahlanu ngesabelo sobunikazi kunoma ubani kuleyondlu.
Futhi mabangavunyelwa ukwemukela noma ubani, njengomabelwa wobunikazi kulendlu, ngaphandle uma lowo eyokhokha imali yakhe ezandleni zabo ngesikhathi ethola ubunikazi;
Futhi ngokulingene nenani lemali ayikhokhayo ezandleni zabo uyothola ubunikazi kuleyondlu; kodwa uma engakhokhi lutho ezandleni zabo akayikuthola bunikazi kuleyondlu.

Futhi uma kukhona okhokha imali ezandleni zabo iyoba ngeyobunikazi kuleyondlu, bakhe, futhi nobesesi zukulwane sakhe emva kwakhe, izizukulwane ngezizukulwane, uma nje yena nezindlalifa zakhe bezogcina lobo bunikazi, futhi bengabudayisi noma babuhambise ezandleni zabo ngentando yabo nangokwenza kwabo, uma nizokwenza intando yami, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, uma inceku yami uGeorge Miller, nenceku yami uLyman Wight, nenceku yami uJohn Snider, nenceku yami uPeter Haws, bethola noma yimalini ezandleni zabo, ngokwemali, noma ngokwezimpahla ngazo abathola inani langempela lemali, akufanele bahlukanise ingxenye yaleyo mali bayihlukanisele enye inhloso, ngaphandle kokuhlukanisela leyondlu.

Futhi uma bethatha ingxenye yaleyo mali beyisebenzisa kwenye indawo, ngaphandle kwaleyondlu, ngaphandle kwemvume yomnini sabelo, futhi bengayikhokhi ngokuphindwe kane njengokuyithatha kwabo beyisebenzisa kwenye indawo, ngaphandle kwaleyondlu, bayoqalekiswa, futhi basuswe ezikhundleni zabo, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu; ngokuba mina, iNkosi, nginguNkulunkulu, futhi ngeke ngidelelwe kulezi zinto.

Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, inceku yami uJoseph makakhokhe imali ezandleni zabo yokwakha leyondlu, njengoba kubonakala kukuhle kuye; kodwa inceku yami uJoseph ngeke akhokhe ngaphezulu kwamadola ayizinkulungwane ezilishumi nanhlanu zemali kuleyondlu, noma ngaphansi kwamadola angamashumi amahlanu; futhi makungenziwa muntu lokho, kusho iNkosi.
Futhi kunabanye abafisa ukwazi intando yami ngokuphathelene nabo, ngokuba bayibuzile ezandleni zami.
Ngakho-ke, ngithi kini ngokuphathelene nenceku yami uVinson Knight, uma ezokwenza intando yami makazifakele imali kuleyondlu, futhi enzele isizukulwane sakhe emva kwakhe, izizukulwane ngezizukulwane.

Futhi makaphakamise izwi lakhe isikhathi eside futhi kakhulu, phakathi kwabantu, ukuze akhulumele amalungelo abampofu nabantulayo; makangahluleki, noma inhliziyo yakhe mayingadangali; futhi ngizoyemukela iminikelo yakhe, ngokuba ngeke ibe kimi njengeminikelo kaKayini, ngokuba uyoba ngowami, kusho iNkosi.

Umndeni wakhe mawujabule futhi ususe izinhliziyo zawo ekuhlushweni; ngokuba ngimkhethile futhi ngamgcoba, futhi uyohlonishwa phakathi kwendlu yakhe, ngokuba ngiyozithethelela zonke izono zakhe, kusho iNkosi. Amen.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, inceku yami uHyrum makafake imali kuleyondlu njengoba kukuhle kuye, azifakele yena nesizukulwane sakhe emva kwakhe, izizukulwane ngezizukulwane.

Inceku yami u-Isaac Galland mayifake imali kuleyondlu; ngokuba mina, iNkosi, ngiyamthanda ngenxa yomsebenzi awenzileyo, futhi ngizomthethelela zonke izono zakhe; ngakho-ke, makakhunjulwe ngelungelo analo kuleyondlu izizukulwane ngezizukulwane.

Inceku yami u-Isaac Galland mayibekwe phakathi kwenu, futhi igcotshwe yinceku yami uWilliam Marks, futhi ibusiswe nguye, ukuze ahambe nenceku yami uHyrum ukuyofeza umsebenzi inceku yami uJoseph eyobatshela wona, futhi bayobusiswa kakhulu.
Inceku yami uWilliam Marks mayikhokhe imali kuleyondlu, njengoba kubonakala kukuhle kuye, azikhokhele yena nesizukulwane sakhe, izizukulwane ngezizukulwane.
Inceku yami uHenry G. Sherwood mayikhokhe imali kuleyondlu, njengoba kubonakala kukuhle kuye, azikhokhele yena kanye nenzalo yakhe emva kwakhe, izizukulwane ngezizukulwane.
Inceku yami uWilliam Law makakhokhe imali kuleyondlu, azikhokhele yena nenzalo yakhe emva kwakhe, izizukulwane ngezizukulwane.

Uma ezokwenza intando yami makangawuthathi umndeni wakhe awuse emazweni asempumalanga, ngisho eKirtland; nokho, mina, iNkosi, ngizoyakha iKirtland, kodwa mina, iNkosi, nginesijeziso esilungiselelwe abantu balapho.
