Futhi ngokuphathelene nenceku yami u-Almon Babbitt, kunezinto eziningi engingathokozile ngazo; bheka, ulangazelela ukumisa iseluleko sakhe esikhundleni seseluleko engisibekileyo, ngisho leso sobuMongameli beBandla lami; futhi ubeka ithole legolide ukuze lihlonishwe ngabantu bami.
Makungabi bikho muntu ozosuka ahambe kulendawo oze lapha ozama ukugcina imiyalelo yami.
Uma behlala lapha mabahlale kimi; futhi uma befa mabafele kimi; ngokuba bayo phumula kukho konke ukukhandleka kwabo lapha, futhi baqhubeke nemisebenzi yabo.

Ngakho-ke, inceku yami uWilliam makabeke ithemba lakhe kimi, futhi ayeke ukwesaba ngokhuphathelene nomndeni wakhe, ngenxa yesifo sendawo. Uma ningithanda, gcinani imiyalelo yami; futhi isifo sendawo siyophenduka ubuhle kini.

Inceku yami uWilliam makahambe amemezele ivangeli lami laphakade ngezwi elikhulu, nangentokozo enkulu, njengoba eyoholwa nguMoya wami, aye kubantu baseWarsaw, futhi nakubantu baseCarthage, futhi nakubantu baseBurlington, futhi nakubantu baseMadison, futhi alinde nangokukhuthala ezinye iziyalo emhlanganweni omkhulu, kusho iNkosi.

Uma ezokwenza intando yami kusuka manje makalalele iseluleko senceku yami uJoseph, futhi ngenzuzo yakhe alekelele okufunwa ngabampofu, futhi akhiphe ukuhunyushwa okusha kwezwi lami elingcwele kubantu basemhlabeni.
Futhi uma ezokwenza lokhu ngizo mbusisa ngezibusiso eziningi, ukuze angashiywa, noma inzalo yakhe itholwe icela isinkwa.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, inceku yami uWilliam makabekwe, amiswe, futhi agcotshwe, njengomeluleki wenceku yami uJoseph, esikhundleni senceku yami uHyrum, ukuze inceku yami uHyrum ithathe isikhundla sobuPhristi nobu Phatriyakhe, obabu bekwe kuye nguyise, ngesibusiso nangelungelo;
Ukuze kusuka manje abe nezikhiye ze zibusiso zobuphatriyakhe phezu kwamakhanda abo bonke abantu bami,
Ukuze loyo ayombusisa abusiswe, futhi loyo ayomqalekisa aqalekiswe; ukuze lokho ayokubopha emhlabeni kuboshwe ezulwini; futhi noma yikuphi ayokukhulula emhlabeni kuyokhululwa nasezulwini.
Futhi kusuka kulesi sikhathi kuya phambili ngimbeka ukuba abe nguphrofethi, futhi nomboni, futhi nomambuli ebandleni, kanjalo futhi nenceku yami uJoseph;

Ukuze enze ngokuhambisana nenceku yami uJoseph; futhi nokuthi uyothola ukululekwa yinceku yami uJoseph, oyomtshengisa izikhiye ngazo angacela futhi afumane, futhi ethweswe uqhele wezibusiso ezifanayo, nobukhosi, nokuhlonishwa, nobuphristi, futhi nezipho zobuphristi, ezake zabekwa phezu kwalowo owayeyinceku yami u-Oliver Cowdery;
Ukuze inceku yami uHyrum afakaze ngezinto engizomtshengisa zona, ukuze igama lakhe likhujulwe ngokuhlonishwa izizukulwane ngezizukulwane, phakade naphakade.

Inceku yami uWilliam Law nayo mayifumane izikhiye ngazo engacela futhi ifumane izibusiso; makazi thobe phambi kwami, futhi angabi ne nkohliso, futhi uyofumana uMoya wami, ngisho uMduduzi, oyokwambula kuye iqiniso lezinto zonke, futhi uyomnika, ngalelohora, ayokusho.
Futhi lezi zimpawu ziyomlandela—uyo sindisa abagulayo, uyokhipha odeveli, futhi uyosindiswa kulabo abayomfakela ubuthi obubulalayo;
Futhi uyoholelwa ezindleleni lapho izinyoka ezinobuthi zingeke zalithola iqakala lakhe, futhi uyophakamela emicabangweni yakhe njengasemaphikweni okhozi.
Futhi uma ngithanda ukuthi avuse abafileyo, makangalibambi izwi lakhe.

Ngakho-ke, inceku yami uWilliam mayimemeze ngezwi elikhulu futhi ingazibambi, ngentokozo nangokujabula, futhi nangohosana kuye ohleli esihlalweni sobukhosi phakade naphakade, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu.

Bhekani, ngithi kini, nginomsebenzi wokufundisa ivangeli olindele inceku yami uWilliam, nenceku yami uHyrum, futhi ongowabo bodwa; futhi inceku yami uJoseph mayihlale ekhaya, ngokuba iyadingeka. Okokugcina ngizonazisa kona emva kwalokhu. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, uma inceku yami uSidney ezongisebenzela futhi abe ngumeluleki wenceku yami uJoseph, makasukume eze ame esikhundleni sobizo lwakhe, futhi azithobe phambi kwami.

Futhi uma ezonikela kimi umnikelo owemukelekayo, nokuvuma, futhi ahlale nabantu bami, bhekani, mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu, ngizomsindisa ukuze asindiswe; futhi uyophinde aphakamise izwi lakhe ezintabeni, futhi abe ngumkhulumeli phambi kobuso bami.
Makeze abeke umndeni wakhe eduze nalapho inceku yami uJoseph ihlala khona.
Futhi kukho konke ukuhamba kwakhe makaphakamise izwi lakhe njengokukhala kwecilongo, futhi axwayise abantu abahlala emhlabeni ukuba babalekele ulaka oluzayo.
Makalekelele inceku yami uJoseph, futhi phezu kwalokho inceku yami uWilliam Law mayilekelele inceku yami uJoseph, ukwenza isaziso ngesizotha emakhosini omhlaba, njengoba ngishilo phambilini kini.
Uma inceku yami uSidney ezokwenza intando yami, makangawususi umndeni wakhe awuse emihlabeni engasempumalanga, kodwa makashintshe indawo yabo yokuhlala, njengoba ngishilo.
Bhekani, akusiyo intando yami ukuba afune ukuthola ukuphepha nesiphephelo kulelo dolobha enginimisele lona, ngisho idolobha lase Nauvoo.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, ngisho manje, uma ezolalela izwi lami, kuyoba kuhle kuye. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, inceku yami u-Amos Davies makakhokhe imali ezandleni zalabo engibabekileyo ukuba bakhe indlu yokuhlala, ngisho iNdlu iNauvoo.
Lokhu makakwenze uma ezoba nobunikazi; futhi makalalele ukwelulekwa yinceku yami uJoseph, futhi asebenze ngezandla zakhe ukuze athole ukwethenjwa ngabantu.
Futhi uma eyokhombisa ukuthembeka ezintweni zonke ayophathiswa zona, yebo, ngisho izinto ezimbalwa, uyokwenziwa umbusi phezu kokuningi;
Ngakho-ke makazehlise ukuze aphakanyiswe. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, uma inceku yami uRobert D. Foster ezothobela izwi lami, makakhele inceku yami uJoseph indlu, ngokwesivumelwano asenzile naye, njengoba umnyango eyovulelwa wona izikhathi ngezikhathi.
Futhi makaphenduke ebuwuleni bakhe bonke, futhi azembathise nge sihe; futhi ayeke ukwenza okubi, futhi abeke eceleni wonke amazwi akhe alukhuni;
Futhi akhokhe imali ezandleni zomgwamanda weNdlu iNauvoo, azikhokhele yena futhi nesizukulwane sakhe emva kwakhe, izizukulwane ngezizukulwane;

Futhi alalele ukwelulekwa yizinceku zami uJoseph, noHyrum, noWilliam Law, futhi nakuzo iziphathimandla engizibizile ukubeka isisekelo seSiyoni; futhi kuyokuba kuhle kuye phakade naphakade. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, makungabi bikho muntu okhokha imali kumgwamanda weNdllu yaseNauvoo ngaphandle kokuba ekholwa eNcwadini kaMormoni, nakuzo izambulweni engininike zona, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu;
Ngokuba lokho okungafani nalokhu kuvela kokubi, futhi kuyophelezelwa yiziqalekiso hhayi izibusiso, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, umgwamanda weNdlu yaseNauvoo mawuthole inkokhelo elungileyo yakho konke ukusebenza kwabo ekwakheni iNdlu iNauvoo; futhi inkokhelo yabo mayibe njengokuvumelana phakathi kwabo, ngokuphathelene nenani layo.

Futhi wonke umuntu okhokha imali makakhokhe ingxenye yomholo wakhe, uma kudingekile, ukuze bondliwe, kusho iNkosi; uma kungenjalo, imisebenzi yabo iyobalwa njengenkokhelo yemali kuleyondlu. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.
Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, manje sengini nika abaphathi zikhundla zobuPhristi bami, ukuze niphathe izikhiye zabo, ngisho ubuPhristi bohlelo luka Melkisedeki, olungohlelo lweNdodana yami eZelwe Yodwa.

Kuqala, ngini nika uHyrum Smith ukuba ube ngu mphatriyakhe kini, ukuba aphathe izibusiso zoku bopha zebandla lami, ngisho uMoya oNgcwele wesethembiso, ngawo esenikhethelwe usuku lokukhululwa, ukuze ningawi nakuba ihora lokulingwa lizofika kini.
Ngini nika inceku yami uJoseph ukuba abe yigosa elengamele ebandleni lami lonke, ukuba abe ngumhumushi, umambuli, umboni, futhi nomphrofethi.
Ngimnika njengabeluleki inceku yami uSidney Rigdon nenceku yami uWilliam Law, ukuze laba benze umgwamanda wobuMongameli bokuQala, ukuze batholele ibandla lonke izambulo.
Ngini nika inceku yami uBrigham Young ukuba abe ngumongameli womkhandlu ohambayo wabayiShumi namBili;
AbayiShumi namBili labo abaphethe izikhiye zokumisa igunya lombuso wami kumagumbi amane omhlaba, futhi emva kwalokho ukuba bathumele izwi lami kubo bonke abantu.
Bango Heber C. Kimball, uParley P. Pratt, u-Orson Pratt, u-Orson Hyde, uWilliam Smith, uJohn Taylor, uJohn E. Page, uWilford Woodruff, uWilliam Richards, uGeorge A. Smith;
UDavid Patten ngimthathile ukuba abe nami; bhekani, ubuphristi bakhe akukho muntu obuthathayo kuye; kodwa, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, omunye angabekwa obizweni olufanayo.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, ngini nika umkhandlu omkhulu, ukuba ube yisi sekelo seSiyoni—

Okuyilaba abalandelayo, uSamuel Bent, uHenry G. Sherwood, uGeorge W. Harris, uCharles C. Rich, uThomas Grover, uNewel Knight, uDavid Dort, uDunbar Wilson—uSeymour Brunson ngimthathile ukuba abe nami; akukho muntu othatha ubuphristi bakhe, kodwa omunye angabekwa kubuphristi obufanayo esikhundleni sakhe; futhi ngiqinisile ngithi kini, inceku yami u-Aaron Johnson makagcotshwe kulolubizo esikhundleni sakhe—uDavid Fullmer, u-Alpheus Cutler, uWilliam Huntington.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngini nika uDon C. Smith ukuba abe ngumongameli womgwamanda wabaphristi abakhulu;
Isimiso leso esimiselwe ukuze kunikwe amandla labo abayobekwa babe ngomongameli noma izinceku ezengamele njalo phezu kwezi khonkwane ezahlukene ezisabalele ndawozonke;
Futhi bangahamba uma bekhetha lokho, kodwa esikhundleni salokho bagcotshelwa ukuba ngomongameli abengamele njalo; lesi yisikhundla sobizo lwabo, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu.
Ngimnika u-Amasa Lyman noNoah Packard ukuba babe ngabeluleki, ukuze bengamele umgwamanda wabaphristi abakhulu bebandla lami, kusho iNkosi.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, ngininika uJohn A. Hicks, uSamuel Williams, noJesse Baker, lobo buphristi obuzo kwengamela umgwamanda wamagosa, umgwamanda lowo omiselwe ukuba ngabefundisi abahleli bekhona; nokho bangahamba, nakuba begcotshelwe ukuba babe ngabefundisi abahleli bekhona ebandleni lami, kusho iNkosi.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngini nika uJoseph Young, uJosiah Butterfield, uDaniel Miles, uHenry Herriman, uZera Pulsipher, uLevi Hancock, uJames Foster, ukuba bengamele wumgwamanda waba ngamashumi ayisikhombisa;

Umgwamanda lowo omiselwe ukuba ngamagosa ahambayo ukuyofakaza ngegama lami emhlabeni wonke, noma kuphi lapho umkhandlu omkhulu ohambayo, abaphostoli bami, beyobathumela khona ukulungisa indlela ngaphambi kobuso bami.

Umehluko phakathi kwalomgwamanda nomgwamanda wamagosa wukuthi omunye uzohamba njalo, futhi omunye uzokwungamela emabandleni izikhathi ngezikhathi; omunye unomthwalo wokwengamela izikhathi ngezikhathi, futhi omunye awunawo umthwalo wokwengamela, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, ngini nika uVinson Knight, uSamuel H. Smith, noShadrach Roundy, uma ezokwamukela lokho, ukuba bengamele ububhishobhu; ulwazi lwalobo bubhishobhu obushiwo ninikiwe encwadini ye Mfundiso neziVumelwano.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi kini, uSamuel Rolfe nabeluleki bakhe babaphristi, nomongameli wothisha nabeluleki bakhe, ngokunjalo nomongameli wamadikoni nabeluleki bakhe, ngokunjalo nomongameli wesikhonkwane nabeluleki bakhe.
Lezi zikhundla ezingenhla ngini nike zona, nezikhiye zazo, ukunika usizo futhi nokuphatha, zomsebenzi wobufundisi futhi no kupheleliswa kwabangcwele bami.
Futhi umyalelo ngini nika wona, wokuthi nigcwalise zonke lezi zikhundla futhi niwavume lawo magama engiwashilo, noma ningawavumi emhlanganweni wami omkhulu.
Futhi nokuba nilungise izindlu zazo zonke lezi zikhundla endlini yami uma seniyakha egameni lami, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/125.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 125
chapter_summary: 1–4, AbaNgcwele kufanele bakhe amadolobha futhi babuthane kuzo izikhonkwane zaseSiyoni.

verses.text: Iyini intando yeNkosi ngokuphathelene nabangcwele eMhlabeni wase-Iowa na?

Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi, ngithi kini, uma labo abazibiza ngegama lami futhi abazama ukuba ngabangcwele bami, uma bezokwenza intando yami futhi bagcine imiyalelo yami ngokuphathelene nabo, mababuthane ndawonye ezindaweni engizobamisela zona ngenceku yami uJoseph, futhi bakhe amadolobha egameni lami, ukuze balungiselele lokho okugcinelwe isikhathi esizayo.
Mabakhe idolobha egameni lami emhlabeni obhekene nedolobha laseNauvoo, futhi malinikwe igama lokuthi yiZarahemla.

Futhi bonke abaphuma empumalanga, nasentshonalanga, nasenyakatho naseningizimu, abanesifiso sokuhlala lapho, mababe nefa labo lapho, ngokufanayo nasedolobheni lase Nashville, noma edolobheni laseNauvoo, futhi nakuzo zonke izikhonkwane engizibekile, kusho iNkosi.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/126.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 126
chapter_summary: 1–3, UBrigham Young uyanconywa ngemisebenzi yakhe futhi uyakhululwa ekuhambeni ndawo zonke ngesikhathi esizayo.

verses.text: Mfowethu othandiweyo nothandeka kakhulu, uBrigham Young, ngiqinisile isho kanje iNkosi kuwe: Nceku yami uBrigham, akusadingekile esandleni sakho ukushiya umndeni wakho njengase zikhathini eziphambili, ngokuba umnikelo wakho wamukelekile kimi.
Ngiwubonile umsebenzi wakho futhi nokuzikhandla kwakho ekuhambeleni igama lami.
Ngakho-ke ngikuyala ukuba uthumele izwi lami ndawo zonke, futhi unakekele kakhulu umndeni wakho kusukela manje, naphakade. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/127.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 127
chapter_summary: 1–4, UJoseph Smith uyathokoza ekuhlushweni nasosizini; 5–12, Imibhalo kufanele igcinwe ngokuphathelene nokubhabhadisela abafileyo.

verses.text: Ngenxa yokuba iNkosi yambulile kimi ukuthi izitha zami, eMissouri nakulesi siFundazwe, bezingizingela futhi; futhi kangangoba zingizingela ngaphandle kwe sizathu, futhi bengenakho nokuncane okumele ukulunga kubo ekuqhubekiseni ukushushiswa kwami futhi kangangoba konke abakushoyo kwakhelwe emangeni obubi obukhulu, ngikubone kufanelekile futhi kuwukuhlakanipha ukuba ngiyishiye lendawo okwesikhashana, ukwenzela ukuphepha kwami nokuphepha kwalaba bantu. Ngizothi kubo bonke labo engihweba nabo, ngishiye amabhizinisi ami kubaphatheli nomabhalane abazoqhuba wonke umsebenzi ngokushesha futhi nangendlela efanele, futhi bazoqiniseka ukuthi zonke izikweletu zami ziyakhokhelwa ziqedwe ngesikhathi esifanele, ngokudayisa impahla, noma ngandlela thize, njengoba kungadingeka, noma njengoba kungavuma isimo. Uma sengizwa ukuthi isiphepho sesivunguze sadlula, emva kwalokho ngizobe sengibuyela kini futhi.

Futhi ngokuphathelene no bungozi engibizelwe ukuba ngidlule kubo, kubukeka kodwa kuyinto encane kimi, ngokuba umona nolaka lwabantu bekuyinto ejwayelekile kuzo zonke izinsuku zempilo yami; futhi isizathu salokhu asiqondakali, ngaphandle uma ngagcotshelwa isiphetho esihle noma esibi, ngaphambi kokusekelwa komhlaba, ngaleyondlela eningakhetha ukucabanga ngayo. Zicabangeleni nina. UNkulunkulu uyazazi zonke lezi zinto, noma kuhle noma kubi. Kodwa nokho, amanzi ajulile ngijwayele ukubhukuda kuwo. Konke sekuze kwaba yimvelo kimi; futhi ngifisa, njengoPawulu, ukuthokoza osizini; ngokuba kuze kube yilolusuku uNkulunkulu wokhokho bami usangikhululile kulo lonke, futhi usazongikhulula kusukela manje; ngokuba bhekani, futhi bheka, ngizonqoba kuzo zonke izitha zami, ngokuba iNkosi uNkulunkulu ikushilo lokho.

Ngakho-ke abangcwele bonke mabajabule futhi bathokoze kakhulu; ngokuba uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli unguNkulunkulu wabo, futhi uzolinganisa ngokubuyiselwa okufaneleyo phezu kwamakhanda abo bonke abacindezeli babo.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile isho kanje iNkosi: Umsebenzi we thempeli lami, nayo yonke imisebenzi enginimisele yona, mayiqhutshwe futhi ingami; futhi ukukhuthala kwenu, nokuphikelela kwenu, nokubekezela, nemisebenzi yenu mayiphindwe, futhi anisoze nalahlekelwa umvuzo wenu, kusho iNkosi yamaBandla. Futhi uma beni hlupha, babahlupha kanjalo abaphrofethi namadoda alungileyo anandulela. Ngakho konke lokhu kukhona umvuzo ezulwini.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngininika umlayezo ngokuphathelene nokubhabhadiselwa kwabafileyo benu.

Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi kini ngokuphathelene nabafileyo benu: Uma kukhona kini obhabhadiselwa abafileyo benu, makubekhona ozobhala, futhi makabe ngufakazi oyibone ngamehlo imibhabhadiso yenu; makezwe ngezindlebe zakhe, ukuze afakaze ngeqiniso, kusho iNkosi;
Ukuze kuyo yonke imibhalo yenu kubhalwe nasezulwini; noma yikuphi eniku bophayo emhlabeni, kuboshwe nasezulwini; noma yikuphi enikukhululayo emhlabeni, kukhululwe nasezulwini;
Ngokuba sengizo buyisela izinto eziningi emhlabeni, eziphathelene no buphristi, kusho iNkosi yamaBandla.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, mayigcinwe ngohlelo yonke imibhalo, ukuze ibekwe endlini yokukhweza imibhalo nemilando yethempeli lami elingcwele, igcinwe ukuze ikhunjulwe izizukuwane ngezizukulwane, kusho iNkosi yamaBandla.

Ngizokuthi kubo bonke abangcwele, bengifisa, ngokufisa okukhulu kakhulu, ukuba ngikhulume nabo ngisepulupiti ngodaba lokubhabhadiselwa kwabafileyo, ngeSabatha elilandelayo. Kodwa kangangoba ngingeke ngikwazi ukukwenza lokho, ngizobhala izwi leNkosi izikhathi ngezikhathi, ngalolodaba, bese ngilithumela kini ngeposi, kanye nezinye izinto eziningi.
Sengiyayivala incwadi yami okwamanje, ngenxa yokweswela esinye isikhathi; ngokuba isitha siqaphele, futhi njengoba umSindisi asho, umbusi walelizwe uyeza, kepha akanalutho kimi,
Bhekani, umkhuleko wami kuNkulunkulu wukuba nonke nisindiswe. Futhi ngibhala njengenceku yenu eNkosini, umphrofethi futhi no mboni weBandla likaJesu Kristu labaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/128.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 128
chapter_summary: 1–5, Ababhali bezindawo ngezindawo nabebandla lonke kufanele bafakazele ubuqiniso bokubhabhadiselwa abafileyo; 6–9, Imibhalo yabo iyaqinisa futhi ibhaliwe emhlabeni nasezulwini; 10–14, Isakhiwo esiyichibi lokubhabhadisa liyisifaniso sethuna; 15–17, U-Eliya wabuyisela amandla aphathelene nokubhabhadiselwa abafileyo; 18–21, Zonke izikhiye, amandla, futhi namagunya ezinhlelo zokwengamela ezidlule sekubuyiselwe; 22–25, Izindaba ezimnandi nezinhle kakhulu zimenyezelelwa abaphilayo nabafileyo.

verses.text: Njengoba ngishilo kini encwadini yami ngaphambi kokuba ngishiye indawo yami, ukuthi ngizonibhalela izikhathi ngezikhathi futhi nginazise ngokuphathelene nezindaba eziningi, manje sengiphindela odabeni loku bhabhadiselwa abafileyo, njengoba lolodaba kungathi lusengqondweni yami, futhi luthinta imizwa yami kakhulu, kusuka ngenkathi ngifunwa yizitha zami.

Nginibhalele amazwi ambalwa esambulo ngokuphathelene nombhali. Sengibe nemibono embalwa ngaphezulu ngokuphathelene naloludaba, engiyiqinisayo manje. Okungukuthi, kushiwo encwadini yami yaphambilini ukuthi kufanele kubekhona umbhali, okufanele abe ngufakazi ozibonele ngamehlo, futhi nozizwele ngezindlebe zakhe, ukuze abhale umbhalo oyiqiniso phambi kweNkosi.

Manje, ngokuphathelene naloludaba, kuyoba nzima ukuthi umbhali oyedwa abekhona ngazo zonke izikhathi, futhi nokuthi awenze wonke lomsebenzi. Ukuvimbela lobu bunzima, kungabakhona umbhali obekiweyo egatsheni ngalinye ledolobha, okwazi kahle ukuthatha amaminithi aqondile; futhi makenze kahle kakhulu futhi ngokuyikho du uma ebhala konke okuqhubekayo, afakaze emibhalweni yakhe ukuthi wabona ngawakhe amehlo, futhi wezwa ngezindlebe zakhe, anike nosuku, namagama, njalonjalo, nomlando wakho konke okwenzekayo; asho futhi namagama abantu abathathu abakhona, uma kukhona abakhona, abangafakaza noma ngasiphi isikhathi uma kuthiwa abafakaze ngalokho, ukuze ngemilomo yababili noma abathathu ofakazi onke amazwi aqinisiwe.

Phezu kwalokho, makubekhona umbhali webandla lonke, okungadluliselwa kuye lena eminye imibhalo, ephelekezelwa ubufakazi bamagama alotshwe yibo, ifakazisa ukuthi umbhalo abawubhalile uyiqiniso. Emuva kwalokho umbhali webandla lonke angawufaka umbhalo encwadini yebandla lonke, nobufakazi nabo bonke ofakazi ababekhona, nowakhe umbiko wokuthi uyakholwa ngeqiniso ukuthi lombiko nemibhalo iliqiniso, ngokwazi isimilo esijwayelekile futhi nokubekwa kwalawo madoda yibandla. Futhi uma lokhu sekwenziwe encwadini yebandla lonke, umbhalo uyoba njengongcwele, futhi uyokwenza isimiso sifane nanjengoba ezibonele ngawakhe amehlo futhi wazizwela ngezakhe izindlebe, futhi wenza umbhalo ofanayo encwadini yebandla lonke.

Ningacabanga ukuthi loluhlelo lwezinto lunemi niningwane eminingi; kodwa manginitshele ukuthi kungukufeza kuphela intando kaNkulunkulu, ngokulandela isimiso futhi nokulungisela lokho iNkosi eyakumisa futhi yakulungisa ngaphambi kokusekelwa komhlaba, ukuze kusindiswe abafileyo abayofa ngaphandle kolwazi lwevangeli.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithanda nikhumbule ukuthi uJohane uMambuli wayecabanga ngalo loludaba ngokuphathelene nabafileyo, ngesikhathi ethi, njengoba uzokuthola kubhaliwe encwadini yesAmbulo 20:12—Futhi ngabona abafileyo, abancane nabakhulu, bemi phambi kukaNkulunkulu; futhi izincwadi zavulwa; nenye incwadi yavulwa, okuyincwadi yokuphila; futhi abafileyo bahlulelwa ngalokho okulotshiwe ezincwadini, njengokwemisebenzi yabo.

Nizothola kulamazwi acashunwe kulencwadi ukuthi izincwadi zavulwa; futhi nenye incwadi yavulwa, okwakuyi ncwadi yokuphila; kodwa abafileyo bahlulelwa ngezinto ezazilotshiwe ezincwadini, njengokwemisebenzi yabo; ngenxa yalokho, izincwadi okukhulunywa ngazo kufanele kube yizincwadi eziqukethe imibhalo yemisebenzi yabo, futhi ziqonde imibhalo egcinwe emhlabeni. Futhi incwadi okwakuyincwadi yokuphila ngumbhalo ogciniwe ezulwini; umgomo ovumelana kahle nemfundiso eniyaliwe ngayo esambulweni esiqukethwe yincwadi enganibhalela yona ngaphambi kokushiya indawo yami—ukuze kukho konke enikubhalayo kubhalwe nasezulwini.

Manje, ubunjalo balesi simiso bukuwo amandla obuphristi, ngesambulo sikaJesu Kristu, lapho kunikiwe khona ukuthi noma yini eniyi bopha emhlabeni iboshiwe nasezulwini, futhi enikukhulula emhlabeni kuyokhululwa nasezulwini. Noma, ngamanye amazwi, uma sibheka ukuhunyushwa ngenye indlela, enikubhalayo emhlabeni kuyobhalwa nasezulwini, futhi eningakubhali emhlabeni ngeke kubhaliwe nasezulwini; ngokuba abafileyo benu bayokwehlulelwa ngokusezincwadini, ngokwemisebenzi yabo, ukuthi ngabe bona uqobo lwabo bazenzile yini izimiso propria persona (ngokwabo), noma ngokusizwa ngaba bamele, ngokwesimiso uNkulunkulu asilungiselela ukusindiswa kwabo ngaphambi kokumiswa komhlaba, ngokwemibhalo abayigcinile ngokuphathelene nabafileyo babo.

Kungabukeka kwabanye kuyimfundiso engekho esikweni lena esikhuluma ngayo—amandla abhala noma abopha emhlabeni futhi abophe ezulwini. Nokho, kuzo zonke izikhathi zomhlaba, njalo uma iNkosi inike uhlelo okwengamela lobuphristi kunoma iyiphi indoda ngesambulo uqobo, noma kunoma yiliphi iqoqo lamadoda, lamandla ayelokhu enikiwe. Ngalesi sizathu, noma yini lawo madoda aye yenza nge gunya, egameni leNkosi, futhi eyenza ngeqiniso nangokuthembeka, futhi egcina umbhalo ofanele nothembekile walokho, wawuba ngumthetho emhlabeni nasezulwini, futhi wawungeke uchithwe yilutho, ngokwezimemezelo zika Jehova omkhulu. Likholekile lelizwi. Ngubani ongalizwa na?

Futhi phezu kwalokho, njengesandulelo, bheka uMathewu 16:18, 19: Futhi ngithi kuwe, Wena unguPetru, futhi phezu kwalelidwala ngizolakha ibandla lami; futhi amasango esihogo awayikulihlula. Ngizokunika izikhiye zombuso wezulu: oyokubopha emhlabeni kuyobe kuboshiwe nasezulwini, nalokho oyokukhulula emhlabeni kuyobe kukhululiwe nasezulwini.

Manje imfihlo enkulu neyingqikithi yalo lonke udaba, futhi ne-summum bonum (ubuhle obudlula konke) yalo lonke loludaba oluphambi kwethu, isekutholeni amandla obuPhristi obuNgcwele. Kulowo okunikwe kuye lezi zikhiye akukho ubunzima ekutholeni ulwazi lwamaqiniso ngokuphathelene ne nsindiso yabantwana babantu, yabafileyo nabaphilayo.

Bulapha ubukhosi noku hlonishwa, futhi nokungafi nokuphila okuphakade—Isimiso sokubhabhadiswa ngamanzi, uku cwiliswa kuwo ukuze kuvumelane nesifanekiso sabafileyo, ukuze umgomo uvumelane nomunye umgomo; ukucwiliswa emanzini futhi uphume emanzini kufana nokuvuka kwabafileyo bephuma emathuneni abo; ngalesi sizathu, lesi simiso samiselwa ukuba sibe wubudlelwane nesimiso sokubhabhadiselwa abafileyo, ngokuba siyisifanekiso sabafileyo.

Ngenxa yalokho, isakhiwo sechibi lokubhabhadisela samiswa njengesifaniso sethuna, futhi sayalezwa ukuba sibe sendaweni engaphansi lapho abaphilayo bejwayele ukuhlanganela khona, ukuhlukanisa abaphilayo nabafileyo, futhi ukuze zonke izinto zibe nesifanekiso sazo, futhi ukuze zivumelane—lokho okusemhlabeni kuvumelana nalokho okusezulwini, njengoba uPawulu amemezela, Ⅰ kwabaseKorinte 15:46, 47, kanye no 48:

Kepha okokuqala kwakungesikho okomoya, kodwa lokho okuyimvelo; futhi emva kwalokho lokho okungumoya. Umuntu wokuqala uvela emhlabathini, engowenhlabathi; umuntu wesibili iNkosi evela ezulwini. Njengokuba enjalo ongowenhlabathi, banjalo nalabo abangabenhlabathi; futhi njengokuba enjalo ongowasezulwini, banjalo nabo abangabasezulwini. Futhi njengoba injalo imibhalo emhlabeni ngokuphathelene nabafileyo benu, ebhalwe ngokweqiniso, injalo futhi nemibhalo esezulwini. Ngakho-ke lokhu, kungamandla oku hlanganisa nokubopha, futhi, ngamanye amazwi, yizikhiye zombuso, okuyizikhiye zo lwazi.

Manje, bafowethu nodadewethu abathandeka kakhulu, mangini qinisekise ukuthi lena yimigomo ephathelene nabafileyo nabaphilayo engeke ithathwe kalula, ngokuphathelene nensindiso yethu. Ngokuba insindiso yabo idingekile futhi ibalulekile ensindisweni yethu, njengoba uPawulu esho ngokuphathelene nobaba—ukuthi bona ngaphandle kwethu ngeke ba pheleliswe—ngeke nathi ngaphandle kwabafileyo bethu senziwe sipheleliswe.

Manje, ngokuphathelene nokubhabhadiselwa abafileyo, ngizoni nika amanye amazwi kaPawulu, Ⅰ kwabaseKorinte 15:29: Pho, bayokwenze-njani ababhabhadiselwa abafileyo, uma abafileyo bengavuki nempela na? Kungani bebhabhadiselwa abafileyo na?

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngokuphathelene nalamazwi acashuniwe ngizoni nika amazwi acashuniwe omunye wabaphrofethi, owayecabanga ngo kubuyiselwa kobuphristi, amaqiniso ayezokwembulwa ezinsukwini zokugcina, futhi ngendlela ekhethekileyo ngaloludaba olumangalisa kakhulu olungele vangeli laphakade, okungukuthi, ukubhabhadiselwa abafileyo; ngokuba uMalaki uthi, isahluko sokugcina, ivesi lesihlanu nelesithupha: Bhekani, ngizothumela kini u-Eliya umphrofethi lungakafiki usuku lweNkosi olukhulu nolwesabekayo: Futhi uyophendulelaizinhliziyo zoyise kubantwana, nezinhliziyo zabantwana koyise, funa ngifikengishaye umhlaba ngesiqalekiso.

Bengizonika ukuhunyushwa okuthe ukucaca kulelivesi, kodwa licacile ngokwanele ukuvumelana nenhloso yami njengoba injalo. Kwanele ukwazi, kulesi simo, ukuthi umhlaba uzoshaywa ngesiqalekiso ngaphandle uma kukhona ubudlelwane obuhlanganisayo bohlobo oluthile phakathi kobaba nabantwana, ngokuphathelene nodaba oluthile noma olunye—futhi bhekani yiluphi lolo daba na? Nguku bhabhadiselwa abafileyo. Ngokuba thina ngaphandle kwabo ngeke senziwe sipheleliswe; noma bona ngaphandle kwethu ngeke benziwe bapheleliswe. Phezu kwalokho bona noma thina ngeke sapheleliswa ngaphandle kwalabo abafele evangelini; ngokuba kudingekile ekuqaleni ko hlelo lokwengamela lokuphelela wezikhathi, uhlelo lokwengamela lolo manje oseluqala, ukuthi ukuhlangana konke okufeziwe futhi nokupheleleyo, kanye nokuhlanganiswa ndawonye kwezinhlelo zokwengamela, ngokunjalo nezikhiye, amandla, namaqiniso amahle kakhulu kufanele kwenzeke, futhi kwambulwe kusuka ezinsukwini zika-Adamu ngisho kuze kube sesikhathini samanje. Futhi hhayi lokhu kuphela, kodwa lezo zinto ezingakaze zambulwe kusuka ekusekelweni komhlaba, kodwa ezigcinwe zifihliwe kwabahlakaniphileyo nabanokuqonda, ziyokwambulelwa abantwana abancelayo kulolu, uhlelo lokwengamela lokuphelela kwezikhathi.

Manje, sizwani evangelini esilitholileyo na? Izwi lenjabulo! Izwi lomusa ovela ezulwini; futhi nezwi le qiniso elisuka emhlabeni; izindaba ezimnandi zabafileyo; izwi lenjabulo labaphilayo nabafileyo; izindaba ezimnandi zenjabulo enkulu. Zinhle kangakanani ezintabeni izinyawo zalabo abaletha izindaba ezimnandi, futhi nabathi kuSiyoni: Bheka, uNkulunkulu wakho uyabusa! Njenga mazolo aseKarmeli, ulwazi ngoNkulunkulu luyokwehlela kubo kanjalo!

Futhi phezu kwalokho, sizwani na? Izindaba ezimnandi ezisuka eKumora! uMoroni, ingelosi esuka ezulwini, imemezela ukugcwaliseka kwabaphrofethi—incwadi esazokwembulwa. Izwi leNkosi ehlane lase Fayette, esifundeni saseSeneca, limemezela ngofakazi abathathu abazo fakaza ngencwadi! Izwi lika Mikayeli osebeni lweSusquehanna, ebona udeveli ngesikhathi evela njenge ngelosi yokukhanya! Izwi lika Petru, noJakobe, noJohane ehlane phakathi kweHarmony, esifundeni saseSusquehanna, ne-Colesville, esifundeni saseBroome, emfuleni iSusquehanna, abathi bane zikhiye zombuso, futhi nohlelo lokwengamela lokuphelela kwezikhathi!

Futhi phezu kwalokho, izwi likaNkulunkulu endlini ka Baba uWhitmer osemdala, eFayette, esifundeni saseSeneca, futhi ngezikhathi ezingafani, futhi ezindaweni ezahlukene kukho konke ukuhamba nezinhlupheko zaleliBandla likaJesu Kristu labaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina! Futhi nezwi likaMikayeli, ingelosi enkulu; izwi lika Gabriyeli, futhi nelika Rafayeli, futhi nele zingelosi ezahlukene, kusuka kuMikayeli noma u-Adamu kwehla njalo kuze kube yisikhathi samanje, bonke bazisa nge zinhlelo zabo zokwengamela, amalungelo abo, izikhiye zabo, ubizo lwabo, ubukhulu nobukhosi babo, futhi namandla obuphristi babo; benika imfundiso phezu kwenye, umyalelo phezu komunye; okuncane lapha, nokuncane laphaya; besinika induduzo ngokumemezela lokho okuzayo, beqinisa ithemba lethu!

Bazalwane, singaqhubeki yini kulomgomo omkhulu kangaka na? Qhubekani futhi ningahlehli. Yimani isibindi, bazalwane; futhi niqhubeke, qhubekelani ekunqobeni! Izinhliziyo zenu mazijabule, futhi zijabule kakhulu. Umhlaba mawuqhumuke ngokuhlabelela. Abafileyo mabasho amaculo okudumisa kwaphakade eNkosi u-Imanuweli, owabekwa ngaphambi kokuba khona komhlaba, lokho okuzo sinika amandla okuba siba khulule kulo itilongo labo; ngokuba iziboshwa ziyokhululwa.

Izintaba mazimemeze ngenxa yenjabulo, futhi nonke nina zigodi khalani kakhulu; futhi nonke nina zilwandle nemihlaba eyomileyo yishoni izimanga zeNkosi yenu yaPhakade! Futhi nina mifula, nemifudlana, nemithombo gobhozani ngenjabulo. Amahlathi nezihlahla zonke zehlane mazibonge iNkosi; futhi nina madwala aqinileyo khalani ngenxa yejabulo! Ilanga, inyanga, nezinkanyezi zokusa makucule ndawonye, futhi wonke amadodana kaNkulunkulu mawamemeze ngenxa yenjabulo! Futhi izidalwa zaphakade mazibize igama lakhe phakade naphakade! Futhi phezu kwalokho ngithi, lingamangalisa kangakanani izwi esilizwa livela ezulwini, elimemezela ezindlebeni zethu, ubukhosi, nensindiso, nenhlonipho, futhi nokungafi, futhi nokuphila okuphakade; imibuso, ababusi, namandla!

Bhekani, usuku olukhulu lweNkosi seluseduze; futhi ngubani ongamelana nosuku lokuza kwayo, futhi ngubani oyokuma ngesikhathi ivela na? Ngokuba injengo mlilo ocwengisisayo, futhi njengensipho yomhlanzi; futhi iyohlala njengo mcwengi nomhlanzi wesiliva, futhi iyohlambulula amadodana kaLevi, futhi iwahluze njengegolide nesiliva, ukuze anikele eNkosini umnikelo ngokulunga. Ngakho-ke masinikele eNkosini umnikelo ngokulunga, njengebandla nabantu, futhi njengaBangcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina; futhi masilethe ethempelini lakhe elingcwele, uma seliphelile, incwadi equkethe imibhalo yabafileyo bethu, eyofaneleka ukuba yemukeleke.

Bazalwane, nginezinto eziningi engizozisho kini ngokuphathelene naloludaba; kodwa manje ngizoyivala lencwadi okwamanje, futhi ngibuye ngiluqhube loludaba ngesinye isikhathi. Ngiyiyo, njengemihla yonke, inceku yenu ezithobile nomhlobo ongaphambukiyo,

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/129.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 129
chapter_summary: 1–3, Ezulwini kukhona imizimba evuswe ekufeni kanye nemizimba yomoya; 4–9, Izikhiye ziyanikwa okungabonwa ngazo izithunywa ezisuka ngale kwesi sitho.

verses.text: Zimbili izinhlobo zabantu ezulwini, okungukuthi: Izingelosi, okungabantu asebe vuswe ekufeni, abanemizimba yenyama namathambo—
Isibonelo, uJesu wathi: Ngiphatheni futhi nibone, ngokuba umoya awunayo inyama namathambo, njengoba ningibona nginakho.
Okwesibili: imimoya ya bantu abalungileyo abaphelelisiweyo, labo abangakavuswa ekufeni, kodwa abafumana inkazimulo efanayo.
Uma isithunywa sifika sithi sinomyalezo ophuma kuNkulunkulu, mnike isandla sakho futhi umcele ukuba nixhawulane.
Uma eyingelosi uyokwenze njalo, futhi uyosizwa isandla sakhe.
Uma engumoya womuntu olungileyo ophelelisiweyo uyoza esenkazimulweni yakhe; ngokuba leyo yiyona ndlela kuphela angavela ngayo—
Mcele ukuba nixhawulane, kodwa ngeke anyakaze, ngokuba kuphambene nohlelo lwasezulwini ukuba umuntu olungileyo akhohlise; kodwa nokho uyowuletha umyalezo wakhe.
Uma kungu develi evela njengengelosi yokukhanya, uma umcela ukuba nixhawulane uyokunika isandla sakhe kodwa ngeke uzwe lutho; uyobe usukwazi ukumbona.
Lezi yizikhiye ezintathu ezibalulekile kakhulu ongakwazi ukubona ongazo ukuthi uma kukhona ukusetshenzelwa ngabe kuvela kuNkulunkulu yini.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/130.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 130
chapter_summary: 1–3, UBaba neNdodana bangaziveza bona uqobo lwabo kubantu; 4–7, Izingelosi zihlala kwimbulunga yasezulwini i; 8–9, Umhlaba wesilestiyali uzoba yi-Urimi neThumimi enkulu; 10–11, Itshe elimhlophe linikwa bonke abangena ezweni lesilestiyali; 12–17, Isikhathi sokuZa kwesiBili sigodliwe kumPhrofethi; 18–19, Ulwazi olutholakale kulempilo sivuka nalo oVukweni; 20–21, Zonke izibusiso ziza ngokulalela umthetho; 22–23, UBaba neNdodana banemizimba yenyama namathambo.

verses.text: Uma umSindisi esebonakaliswa siyombona njengoba enjalo. Siyobona ukuthi ungu muntu njengathi.
Futhi lobo budlelwane obukhona phakathi kwethu lapha buyoba khona phakathi kwethu lapho, kodwa buyobe sebuhambisana ne nkazimulo yaphakade, leyo nkazimulo esingenayo njengamanje.
UJohane 14:23—Ukuvela kuka Baba ne Ndodana, kulelo vesi, wuku ziveza bona uqobo lwabo; futhi umqondo wokuthi uBaba neNdodana bahlala enhliziyweni yomuntu yinkolo endala yamabandla, futhi ingamanga.
Ukuphendula umbuzo othi—Ingabe ukubala isikhathi sikaNkulunkulu, sezingelosi, sabaphrofethi, futhi nesabantu, akuvumelani yini neplanethi abahlala kuyo na?
Ngiphendula ngithi, Yebo. Kodwa azikho izingelosi ezithunywa kulomhlaba ngaphandle kwalezo ezingezawo noma ezike zaba ngezawo.
Izingelosi azihlali kwiplanethi enjengalo mhlaba;

Kodwa zihlala phambi kukaNkulunkulu, kwimbulunga enjengo lwandle lwengilazi no mlilo, lapho zonke izinto zenkazimulo yazo zambuliwe, okwedlule, imanje, nekusasa, futhi zonke izinto ziphambi kweNkosi ngaso sonke isikhathi.
Indawo lapho uNkulunkulu ehlala khona iyi-Urimi neThumimi enkulu.

Lo mhlaba, esimweni sawo sokungcweliswa nesokungafi, uyokwenziwa ufane netshe elikhanya njenge ngilazi futhi ube yi-Urimi neThumimi kubantu abahlala kuwo, okuyothi ngawo zonke izinto eziphathelene nombuso ongaphansi, noma yonke imibuso yohlelo olungaphansi, iyokwembulwa kulabo abahlala kuwo; futhi lomhlaba uyoba ngokaKristu.

Ngaleso sikhathi itshe elimhlophe okukhulunywa ngalo encwadini yesAmbulo 2:17, liyoba yi-Urimi neThumimi kumuntu ngamunye olitholayo, okuyokwaziswa ngalo izinto eziphathelene nohlelo oluphezulu lwemibuso ziyokwembulwa;
Futhi itshe elimhlophe linikezwa umuntu ngamunye kulabo abeza embusweni wesilestiyali, okubhalwe kulo igama elisha, elingaziwa muntu ngaphandle kwalowo olitholayo. Lelo gama elisha lingukhiye.
Ngiyaphrofetha, egameni leNkosi uNkulunkulu, ukuthi ukuqala ko bunzima obuyodala ukuchitheka kwegazi eliningi ngaphambi kokuza kweNdodana yoMuntu kuyoba se South Carolina.
Kungenzeka buvele ngenxa yenkinga yobugqila. Lokhu izwi lakusho kimi, ngesikhathi ngikhuleka kakhulu ngaloludaba, ngomhlaka 25 Disemba 1832.
Ngake ngakhuleka kakhulu ukuze ngazi isikhathi so kuza kweNdodana yoMuntu, ngesikhathi ngizwa izwi lisho lokhu okulandelayo:

UJoseph, ndodana yami, uma uyophila uze ube neminyaka engamashumi ayisishiyagalombili nanhlanu ubudala, uyobubona ubuso beNdodana yoMuntu; ngakho-ke lokhu makukwanelise, futhi ungabe usangihlupha ngaloludaba.

Ngasala ngikuleso simo, ngaphandle kokwazi ukuthi ngabe lokhu kuza kuqondiswe ekuqaleni kwenkulungwane yeminyaka noma kokunye ukuvela kwayo kwaphambilini, noma kufanele ngife kuthi ngenxa yalokho bese ngibona ubuso bakhe.
Ngikholwa wukuthi ukuza kweNdodana yoMuntu akuzukwenzweka ngaphambi kwaleso sikhathi.
Noma ngabe lungakanani ulwazi esilutholayo kulempilo, luyovuka nathi kulo uvuko.
Futhi uma umuntu ethola ulwazi nokuqonda okuningi kulempilo ngoku khuthala noku lalela kwakhe kunomunye, uyokuba ne nzuzo enkulu ezweni elizayo.
Kukhona umthetho, ongeke ususwe owamiswa ezulwini ngaphambi koku sekelwa kwalomhlaba, izibusiso zonke ezimiswe kuwo—
Futhi uma sithola noma yisiphi isibusiso kuNkulunkulu, kungenxa yokulalela lowo mthetho esimiswe kuwo.

UBaba uno mzimba wenyama namathambo othintekayo njengowo muntu; ngokunjalo neNdodana; kodwa uMoya oNgcwele awunawo umzimba wenyama namathambo, kodwa ungumuntu onesithunzi woMoya. Ukuba kwakungenjalo, uMoya oNgcwele wawungeke uhlale kithi.
Umuntu angawuthola uMoya oNgcwele, futhi ungehlela phezu kwakhe futhi ungahlali naye.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/131.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 131
chapter_summary: 1–4, Umshado wesilestiyali udingeka kakhulu ukuze umuntu aphakanyiselwe kweliphezulu kakhulu izulu; 5–6, Kuyachazwa ukuthi abantu baqinisekiswa kanjani ngokuphila okuphakade; 7–8, Konke okungumoya kuyinto ethintekayo futhi nebonakalayo.

verses.text: Embusweni wesilestiyali kunamazulu noma amabanga amathathu;
Futhi ukuze afumane eliphezulu kunawo wonke, umuntu kufanele angene kulolu hlelo lobuphristi, [okungukuthi isivumelwano esisha nesaphakade somshado];
Futhi uma engangeni kulolu hlelo, ngeke alifumane.
Angangena kwelinye ibanga, kodwa lokho sekuyisiphetho sombuso wakhe; ngeke abe nokwanda ngezizukulwane.
(Ngomhlaka 17 Meyi 1843.) Izwi eliqinisekile kakhulu le siphrofetho lisho ukwazi komuntu ukuthi use khethelwe ukuphila okuphakade, ngesambulo nangomoya wokuphrofetha, ngamandla obuPhristi obuNgcwele.
Ngeke kwenzeke ukuba umuntu asindiswe engenalo ulwazi.
Ayikho into engathinteki nenga bonakali. Konke okungu moya kuyinto ethintekayo nebonakalayo, kodwa kucolekile noma kucwebe kakhulu, futhi kungabonwa kuphela ngamehlo acwebe kakhulu;
Asikwazi ukuku bona; kodwa uma imizimba yethu isicwebisiwe siyobona ukuthi konke kuyinto ethintekayo nebonakalayo.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/132.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 132
chapter_summary: 1–6, Ukuphakanyiswa kuzuzwa ngesivumelwano esisha nesaphakade; 7–14, Imigomo nemibandela yaleso sivumelwano iyachazwa; 15–20, Umshado wesilestiyali nokuqhubeka komndeni kuvumela abantu ukuba bakwazi ukuba ngonkulunkulu; 21–25, Indlela encane neqondile iholela ezimpilweni zaphakade; 26–27, Umthetho uyanikwa ngokuphathelene nokuhlambalaza uMoya oNgcwele; 28–39, Abaphrofethi nabaNgcwele bathenjiswa ukwanda kwezizukulwane nokuphakanyiswa kuzo zonke izikhathi zomhlaba; 40–47, UJoseph Smith unikwa amandla okubopha nokukhetha emhlabeni nasezulwini; 48–50, INkosi iqinisa kuye ukuphakanyiswa kwakhe; 51–57, U-Emma Smith uyalwa ukuba athembeke futhi abe neqiniso; 58–66, Imithetho elawula umshado wesithembu iyachazwa.

verses.text: Ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi kuwe nceku yami uJoseph, ukuthi kangangoba ucelile esandleni sami ukwazi nokuqonda ukuthi mina, iNkosi, ngazithethelela kanjani izinceku zami u-Abrahama, u-Isaka, noJakobe, ngokunjalo noMose, noDavide noSolomoni, izinceku zami, ngokuphathelene nomgomo nemfundiso yokuba nesithembu nezancinza—
Bheka, futhi bheka, ngiyiNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho, futhi ngizokuphendula ngokuphathelene naloludaba.
Ngakho-ke, lungisa inhliziyo yakho ukuze ufumane futhi uthobele imiyalelo esengizokunika yona; ngokuba bonke labo abanalomthetho owambulwe kubo kufanele bawuthobele.

Ngokuba bhekani, ngambula kini isivumelwano esisha nesaphakade; futhi uma ningasigcini leso sivumelwano, niyobe senivinjelwa ukuza kimi; ngokuba akekho ongenqaba lesi sivumelwano bese evunyelwa ukungena enkazimulweni yami.
Ngokuba bonke abafuna ukufumana isibusiso ezandleni zami bayogcina umthetho owabekelwa leso sibusiso, nemibandela yakhona, njengoba kwamiswa kusuka ngaphambi kokusekelwa komhlaba.

Futhi ngokuphathelene nesivumelwano esisha nesaphakade; samiselwa ukuphelela konke kwe nkazimulo yami; futhi lowo ofumana konke ukuphelela kwayo kufanele awugcine lomthetho, noma uyovinjelwa ukuza kimi, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu.

Futhi ngiqinisile ngithi kini, imibandela yalomthetho yilena: Zonke izivumelwano, izibopho, izimelo, izifungo, izethembiso, izenzo, ukuhlanganiswa, ukuhlangana, noma okulindelweyo, okungenziwanga futhi kwavunyelwana ngakho futhi kwa qiniswa ngu Moya oNgcwele wesethembiso, yilowo obekiweyo, manje naphakade, futhi lokho okungcwele kakhulu, nge sambulo nangomyalelo walowo ogcotshiweyo wami, engimbekile emhlabeni ukuba abe nalamandla (futhi ngibeke inceku yami uJoseph ukuba abe nalamandla ngezinsuku zokugcina, futhi akukaze kube khona ngaphezu koyedwa emhlabeni ngesikhathi okunikwe kuye lamandla ne zikhiye zalobu buphristi), akusebenzi noma akunamandla ngesikhathi sokuvuka kwabafileyo noma ngemuva kwakho; ngokuba zonke izivumelwano ezingenzelwanga lenhloso ziyaphela uma abantu sebefile.
Bhekani, indlu yami iyindlu ehlelekile, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu, futhi akuyona indlu yenhlakanhlaka.
Ngingawemukela yini umnikelo, kusho iNkosi, ongenziwanga egameni lami na?
Noma ngingakwemukela yini ezandleni zenu lokho engingazange ngikumise na?
Futhi nginganimisela yini, kusho iNkosi, ngaphandle kokuba kube ngokomthetho, ngisho njengoba mina noBaba sawubeka, umhlaba ungakabi bikho na?
NgiyiNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu; futhi ngini nika lomyalelo—ukuthi akukho muntu oyoza kuBaba ngaphandle kwami noma ngezwi lami, elingumthetho wami, kusho iNkosi.

Futhi konke okusemhlabeni, noma kugcotshwe ngabantu, ngemibuso, noma ngababusi, noma ngamandla, noma ngezinto ezaziwayo, noma ngabe ziyini, ezingamisiwe yimi noma ngezwi lami, kusho iNkosi, ziyolahlwa phansi, futhi ngeke ziqhubeke nokuba khona emva kokufa kwabantu, noma ngesikhathi sokuvuka kwabafileyo noma ngemuva kwako, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu.
Ngokuba konke okuqhubekayo nokuba khona kugcotshwe yimi; futhi konke okungagcotshiwe yimi kuyohlakazwa futhi kuqedwe.

Ngakho-ke, uma indoda ithatha umfazi emhlabeni, futhi ingamthathi ngokumiswe yimi noma ngezwi lami, futhi ivumelana naye ngesikhathi yona isese mhlabeni futhi naye esenayo, isivumelwano sabo nomshado wabo awunawo amandla ahlanganisayo uma sebefile, futhi noma sebengasekho emhlabeni; ngakho-ke, akukho mthetho obahlanganisile uma bengasekho emhlabeni.

Ngakho-ke, uma bengasekho emhlabeni abaganwa futhi abendiswa; kodwa babekwa njenge zingelosi ezulwini, izingelosi lezo eziyizinceku ezithunywayo, ukuba zithunywe kulabo abafanelwe ngenkulu kakhulu nengeyaphakade inkazimulo, futhi edlula kakhulu, futhi engeyaphakade nenkulu kakhulu inkazimulo.

Ngokuba lezi zingelosi aziwugcinanga umthetho wami; ngakho-ke, ngeke zandiselwe inzalo, kodwa zihlala ngokuhlukana futhi ngazinye, zingaphakanyisiwe, ezimweni zazo zokusindiswa, kulo lonke iphakade; futhi kusuka manje azibona onkulunkulu, kodwa ziyizingelosi zikaNkulunkulu phakade naphakade.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, uma indoda ithatha umfazi, futhi yenza isivumelwano naye samanje naphakade, uma leso sivumelwano singenziwa ngokumiswe yimi noma ngezwi lami, okungumthetho wami, futhi singaqiniswanga nguMoya oNgcwele wesethembiso, ngalowo engimgcobile futhi ngamnika lamandla, leso sivumelwano asinamthetho noma amandla ahlanganisayo uma sebengasekho emhlabeni, ngokuba abahlanganiswanga yimi, kusho iNkosi, noma ngezwi lami; uma sebengasekho emhlabeni ngeke semukelwa lapho, ngokuba izingelosi nonkulunkulu babekiwe lapho, abangeke bedlula kubo; ngakho-ke ngeke bakwazi ukuyifumana njengefa inkazimulo yami; ngokuba indlu yami iyindlu ehlelekile, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, uma indoda ithatha umfazi ngezwi lami, elingumthetho wami, nange sivumelwano esisha nesaphakade, futhi kuqiniswe kubo nguMoya oNgcwele wesethembiso, yilowo ogcotshiweyo, engibeke kuye lamandla ne zikhiye zalobu buphristi; futhi kuyothiwa kubo—Niyophuma ngovuko lokuqala; futhi uma kungemumva kovuko lokuqala, kolulandelayo uvuko; futhi niyofumana njengefa izihlalo zobukhosi, imibuso, iziphathimandla, namandla, ukubusa, konke ukuphakama nokujula—emva kwalokho kuyobhalwa eNcwadini yokuPhila yeMvana, ukuthi akayikuchitha igazi elingenacala ngokubulala, futhi uma nihlala kuso isivumelwano sami, futhi ningalichithi igazi elingenacala ngokubulala, kuyokwenziwa kubo ngokuphathelene nazo zonke izinto noma yini inceku yami ekubekile phezu kwabo, manje nakulo lonke iphakade; futhi kuyoba namandla ahlanganisayo uma sebengasekho emhlabeni; futhi bayodlula phambi kwezingelosi, nako nkulunkulu, abamiswe lapho, baye kukho ukuphakanyiswa nobukhosi babo kuzo zonke izinto, njengoba bekubekiwe phezu kwamakhanda abo, lobo bukhosi obuyoba wukuphelela du nokuqhubeka kwenzalo phakade naphakade.

Ngaleso sikhathi bayokuba ngonkulunkulu, ngokuba abasenasiphelo; ngakho-ke bayophila kusuka phakade kuya phakade, ngokuba bayaqhubeka; ngaleso sikhathi bayokuba phezu kwakho konke, ngokuba zonke izinto zilawulwa yibo. Ngaleso sikhathi bayokuba ngonkulunkulu, ngokuba banawo wonke amandla, futhi nezingelosi zilawulwa yibo.
Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, ngaphandle kokuba nigcine umthetho wami ngeke nifinyelele kulobu bukhosi.
Ngokuba lincane isango, futhi ne ndlela iwumngcingo eya ekuphakanyisweni nakukho ukuqhubeka kwezimpilo; futhi bayingcosana abayifumanayo, ngokuba aningemukeli emhlabeni futhi aningazi.
Kodwa uma ningemukeli emhlabeni, uma kunjalo niyongazi, futhi niyokufumana ukuphakanyiswa kwenu; ukuze lapho ngikhona nani nibekhona futhi.
Izimpilo zaphakade yilokhu—ukwazi uNkulunkulu okunguyena yedwa ohlakaniphileyo futhi noweqiniso, noJesu Kristu, amthumileyo. Nginguye. Ngakho-ke wemukeleni, umthetho wami.
Libanzi isango, nendlela inkulu eya ekufeni; futhi baningi abaya lapho, ngokuba abangemukeli, futhi abawugcini umthetho wami.

Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, uma indoda ithatha umfazi ngokwezwi lami, futhi beqiniswa nguMoya oNgcwele wesethembiso, ngokwesimiso sami, futhi uma yona noma yena eyokwenza noma yisiphi isono noma isiphambeko sesivumelwano esisha nesaphakade sanoma yiluphi uhlobo, futhi nazo zonke izinhlobo zokuhlambalaza, futhi uma bengalichithi igazi elingenacala ngokubulala, nakuba kunjalo bayophuma ngovuko lokuqala, futhi bangene ekuphakanyisweni kwabo; kodwa bayobhujiswa enyameni, futhi bayo nikelwa kuzo izinhlupho zika Sathane kuze kube wusuku lokukhululwa, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu.

Ukuhlambalaza uMoya oyiNgcwele, okungeke kwathethelelwa kulelizwe noma kwelizayo, kwenziwa wukuthi nichithe igazi elingenacala ngokubulala, futhi nivumelana nokubulawa kwami, emva kokuba senamukele isivumelwano sami esisha nesaphakade, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu; futhi lowo ongawugcini lomthetho akasoze angena enkazimulweni yami, kodwa uyovinjelwa ukuza kimi, kusho iNkosi.
NgiyiNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho, futhi ngizokunika umthetho wobuPhristi obuNgcwele bami, njengoba wabekwa yimi noBaba umhlaba ungakabi bikho.
U-Abrahama wafumana zonke izinto, lokho akufumana, ngesambulo nangomyalelo, ngezwi lami, kusho iNkosi, futhi usengenile ekuphakanyisweni kwakhe futhi uhlezi esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi.

U-Abrahama wafumana izethembiso ngokuphathelene nenzalo yakhe, futhi nangokuphathelene nenzalo yezinkalo zakhe—izinkalo zakhe wena ophuma kuzo, okungukuthi, inceku yami uJoseph—okwakufanele iqhubeke uma nje isese mhlabeni; futhi ngokuphathelene no-Abrahama nenzalo yakhe, kufanele iqhubeke ezweni elizayo; kufanele iqhubeke njengezinkanyezi ezingabaleki kulelizwe nakwelizayo; noma, uma beningazama ukusibala isihlabathi phezu kosebe lolwandle beningeke nakwazi ukuyibala.
Lesi sethembiso singesenu nani, ngokuba ningabesizukulwane sika-Abrahama; futhi isethembiso senziwa ku-Abrahama; futhi ngalomthetho kunguku qhubeka kwemisebenzi kaBaba, azikhazimulisa ngayo.
Ngakho-ke, hambani, nenze imisebenzi ka-Abrahama; yemukelani umthetho wami futhi niyosindiswa.
Kodwa uma ningawemukeli umthetho wami ngeke nisithole isethembiso sikaBaba, asenza ku-Abrahama.

UNkulunkulu wamyala u-Abrahama, futhi uSara wanika u-Abrahama uHagari ukuba abe ngumfazi wakhe. Futhi wakwenzelani lokho na? Ngokuba lokhu kwakungumthetho; futhi kuHagari kwavela abantu abaningi. Ngakho-ke, lokhu, kwakugcwalisa, izethembiso, phakathi kwezinye izinto.
Ngakho-ke, ngabe u-Abrahama wayebekwa icala na? Ngiqinisile ngithi kini, Cha; ngokuba mina, iNkosi, ngangiku layezile lokho.
U-Abrahama wayalwa ukuba anikele ngendodana yakhe u-Isaka; nokho, kwakubhaliwe ukuthi: Ungabulali. U-Abrahama, kodwa, akenqabanga, futhi kwathathwa njengokulunga kwakhe.

U-Abrahama wanikwa izancinza, futhi zamzalela abantwana; futhi kwathathwa njengokulunga kwakhe, ngokuba wanikwa zona, futhi wagcina umthetho wami; ngokunjalo no-Isaka futhi no Jakobe abenzanga lutho olunye ngaphandle kwalokho ababeyalwe ngakho; futhi ngokuba bengenzanga lutho olunye ngaphandle kwalokho ababeyalwe ngakho, sebengenile kukho ukuphakanyiswa kwabo, ngokwezethembiso, futhi bahleli ezihlalweni zobukhosi, futhi abazona izingelosi kodwa bangonkulunkulu.

UDavide naye wanikwa abafazi abaningi nezancinza, futhi noSolomoni noMose izinceku zami, njengabaningi bezinceku zami, kusuka ekuqaleni kwendalo kuze kube yilesi sikhathi; futhi abonanga ngalutho ngaphandle kwalezo zinto abangazi nikwanga yimi.

Abafazi nezancinza zikaDavide waye nikwe zona yimi, ngesandla sikaNathani, inceku yami, futhi nabanye babaphrofethi ababene zikhiye zalamandla; futhi akonanga lutho kimi ngokuphathelene nalezi zinto ngaphandle kwesimo sika-Uriya nomfazi wakhe; ngakho-ke usewile ekuphakanyisweni kwakhe, futhi wafumana isabelo sakhe; futhi ngeke esabathola ezweni elizayo, ngokuba sengibanike omunye, kusho iNkosi.
NgiyiNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho, futhi ngakunika, nceku yami uJoseph, ubizo, futhi ngibuyisela zonke izinto. Cela lokho okufisayo, futhi uyonikwa kona ngokwezwi lami.

Futhi njengoba ubuzile ngokuphathelene nokuphinga, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, uma indoda ifumana umfazi ngesivumelwano esisha nesaphakade, futhi uma eba nenye indoda, futhi ngingamnikezanga leyondoda ngokugcotshwa okungcwele, usephingile futhi uzobhujiswa.
Uma engekho esivumelwaneni esisha nesaphakade, futhi eba nenye indoda, usephingile.
Uma umyeni wakhe eba nomunye wesifazane, futhi kade engaphansi kwe sifungo, usiphulile isifungo sakhe futhi usephingile.

Futhi uma engaphinganga, kodwa engenacala futhi engasiphulile isifungo sakhe owesifazane, futhi ekwazi lokho, ngikwambula kuwe lokhu, nceku yami uJoseph, uma kunjalo uyoba namandla, ngamandla obuPhristi bami obuNgcwele, okumthatha owesifazane umnike owesilisa ongazange aphinge kodwa obe thembekile; ngokuba uyokwenziwa umbusi phezu kwezinto eziningi.
Ngokuba nginike kuwe izikhiye namandla obuphristi, ngawo engi buyisela zonke izinto, futhi ngembula kuwe zonke izinto ngesikhathi esifanele.

Futhi ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, noma yini oyi khethayo emhlabeni iyokhethwa ezulwini; futhi noma yini oyibophayo emhlabeni, egameni lami nangezwi lami, kusho iNkosi, iyoboshwa phakade emazulwini; futhi izono zalowo ozi susayo emhlabeni ziyosuswa phakade emazulwini; futhi izono zalowo ozigcinayo emhlabeni ziyogcinwa ezulwini.
Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi, lowo ombusisayo ngizombusisa, futhi lowo omqalekisayo ngizo mqalekisa, kusho iNkosi; ngokuba mina, iNkosi, nginguNkulunkulu wakho.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe, nceku yami uJoseph, noma yini oyiphayo emhlabeni, futhi kunoma wubani omphayo emhlabeni, ngezwi lami nangomthetho wami, kuyohanjelwa ngezibusiso futhi hhayi ngeziqalekiso, futhi nangamandla ami, kusho iNkosi, futhi ngeke kubekwe icala emhlabeni nasezulwini.

Ngokuba ngiyiNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho, futhi ngizoba nawe ngisho kuze kube seku pheleni komhlaba, futhi nakulo lonke iphakade; ngokuba ngiqinisile sengiku khethela ukuphakanyiswa kwakho, futhi ngikulungisela isihlalo sobukhosi embusweni kaBaba, eduze no-Abrahama uyihlo.

Bheka, ngikubonile ukuzinikela kwakho, futhi ngizokuthethelela zonke izono zakho; ngikubonile ukuzinikela kwakho ekulaleleni lokho engikutshele kona. Ngakho-ke hamba, futhi ngizokulungisela indlela yokuphunyula, njengoba ngawemukela umnikelo ka-Abrahama wendodana yakhe u-Isaka.

Ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe: Nginika umyalelo kuyo incekukazi yami, u-Emma Smith, umfazi wakho, engikunike yena, ukuba azithibe futhi angakwemukeli lokho engikuyale ukuba umnike kona; ngokuba ngakwenza lokho, kusho iNkosi, ukunivivinya nonke, njengoba ngenza ku-Abrahama, futhi ukuze ngifune umnikelo ophuma ezandleni zenu, ngesivumelwano nangokuzinikela.

Futhi incekukazi yami, u-Emma Smith, mayemukele bonke labo abanikwe inceku yami uJoseph, futhi abacwebile ngokomzimba nabamsulwa phambi kwami; futhi labo abangemsulwa, nabathe bamsulwa, bayobhujiswa, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu.

Ngokuba ngiyiNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu, futhi niyolithobela izwi lami; futhi nginika inceku yami uJoseph ukuthi uyokwenziwa umbusi phezu kwezinto eziningi; ngokuba uthembekile ezintweni eziyingcosana, futhi kusuka manje ngizomqinisa.

Futhi ngiyala incekukazi yami, u-Emma Smith, ukuba ahlale futhi anamathele encekwini yami uJoseph, futhi hhayi komunye. Kodwa uma engeke awugcine lomyalelo uyobhujiswa, kusho iNkosi; ngokuba ngiyiNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho, futhi ngizombhubhisa uma engawugcini umthetho wami.

Kodwa uma engeke awugcine lomyalelo, uma kunjalo inceku yami uJoseph iyomenzela zonke izinto, ngisho njengoba ishilo; futhi ngizombusisa futhi ngimandisele futhi ngimnike okuphindwe ngekhulu kulomhlaba, kobaba nomama, abafowabo nodadewabo, imizi nemihlaba, abafazi nabantwana futhi nemiqhele ye zimpilo zaphakade emazweni aphakade.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile ngithi, incekukazi yami mayixolele inceku yami uJoseph eziphambekweni zakhe; futhi uma kunjalo naye uyoxolelwa eziphambekweni zakhe, aphambuke ngazo kimi; futhi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho, ngizombusisa, futhi ngimandisele, futhi ngenze inhliziyo yakhe ijabule.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngithi, inceku yami uJoseph makangathengisi ngempahla yakhe, funa isitha size simbhubhise; ngokuba uSathane ufuna ukubhubhisa; ngokuba ngiyiNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho, futhi yena uyinceku yami; futhi bhekani, futhi bheka, nginaye, njengoba ngangino-Abrahama, uyihlo, ngisho kwaze kwaba kukho ukuphakanyiswa nakuyo inkazimulo yakhe.
Manje, ngokuphathelene nomthetho wo buphristi, ziningi izinto eziqondene nawo.

Ngiqinisile, uma umuntu ebizwe nguBaba, njengo-Aroni, ngezwi lami uqobo, nangezwi lalowo ongithumileyo, futhi engimuphe izikhiye zamandla alobu buphristi, uma enza noma yini egameni lami, futhi nangokomthetho wami nangezwi lami, ngeke one, futhi ngiyothi akanacala.
Ngakho-ke, makungabi bikho muntu, ogxeka inceku yami uJoseph; ngokuba ngiyothi akanacala; ngokuba uyokwenza umnikelo engiwudingayo ezandleni zakhe ngeziphambeko zakhe, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngokuphathelene nomthetho wobuphristi—uma kukhona indoda ethatha intombi emsulwa, futhi efisa ukuthatha enye, futhi eyokuqala imvumela, uma ethatha eyesibili, futhi beyizintombi ezimsulwa, futhi bengavumelene nenye indoda, uma kunjalo akanacala; ngeke aphinge ngokuba banikiwe kuye; ngokuba ngeke aphinge nalokho okungokwakhe futhi okungekona okomunye.
Futhi uma enezintombi ezimsulwa ezilishumi ezinikwe kuye ngalomthetho, ngeke aphinge, ngokuba zingezakhe, futhi zinikwe kuye; ngakho-ke akanacala.

Kodwa uma oyedwa noma yimuphi wezintombi ezilishumi, emva kokwenda, eyoba nenye indoda, usephingile, futhi uyobhujiswa; ngokuba zinikwe kuye ukuba zandise abantwana futhi zigcwalise umhlaba, ngokomthetho wami, nokufeza isethembiso esanikwa nguBaba ngaphambi kokusekelwa komhlaba, futhi ukuze baphakanyiswe emazweni azayo, ukuze bazale imimoya yabantu; ngokuba kulokhu umsebenzi kaBaba uyaqhubeka, ukuze akhazimuliswe.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kini, uma kukhona indoda enomfazi ephethe izikhiye zalamandla, futhi emfundisa umthetho wobuphristi bami, ngokuphathelene nalezi zinto, uma kunjalo owesifazane uyomkholwa futhi amsize, noma owesifazane uyobhujiswa, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho; ngokuba ngiyombhubhisa; ngokuba ngizolikhazimulisa igama lami kubo bonke abemukela futhi bagcine umthetho wami.

Ngakho-ke, kuyoba semthethweni kimi, uma owesifazane engawemukeli lomthetho, ukuba owesilisa athole zonke izinto noma yini mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakhe, engiyomnika yona, ngokuba owesifazane akazange akholwe futhi amsize owesilisa ngokwezwi lami; futhi owesifazane uma kunjalo uba eseba ngumoni; futhi owesilisa ukhululekile emthethweni kaSara, owasiza u-Abrahama ngokomthetho ngesikhathi ngiyala u-Abrahama ukuba athathe uHagari ukuba abe ngumfazi wakhe.
Manje, ngokuphathelene nalomthetho, ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile, ngithi kuwe, ngizokwambulela okunye, emva kwalokhu; ngakho-ke, makukwanelise lokhu okwamanje. Bheka, ngingu-Alfa no-Omega. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/133.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 133
chapter_summary: 1–6, AbaNgcwele bayalwa ukuba balungiselele ukuZa kwesiBili; 7–16, Bonke abantu bayalwa ukuba babaleke eBabiloni, beze eSiyoni, futhi balungiselele usuku olukhulu lweNkosi; 17–35, Uyokuma phezu kweNtaba iSiyoni, amazwekazi ayophenduka izwe lelilodwa, nezizwana ezilahlekileyo zika-Israyeli zizobuya; 36–40, Ivangeli labuyiselwa ngoJoseph Smith ukuze lishunyayelwe emhlabeni wonke; 41–51, INkosi izokwehla ngempindiselo phezu kwababi; 52–56, Kuyoba wunyaka wabakhululiweyo Bayo; 57–74, Ivangeli kufanele lithunyelelwe ukuhlenga abaNgcwele nokubhujiswa kwababi.

verses.text: Lalelani, O nina bantu bebandla lami, kusho iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu, futhi nizwe izwi leNkosi ngokuphathelene nani—

INkosi eyoza masinyane ethempelini layo; iNkosi eyokwehlela phezu komhlaba nesiqalekiso ukuzo kwahlulela; yebo, phezu kwazo zonke izizwe ezimkhohlwayo uNkulunkulu, naphezu kwabo bonke ababi phakathi kwenu.
Ngokuba uyokwambula ingalo yakhe engcwele emehlweni ezizwe zonke, futhi yonke imikhawulo yomhlaba iyoyibona insindiso kaNkulunkulu wayo.
Ngalokho-ke, lungiselelani, lungiselelani, O bantu bami; zingcweliseni; buthanani ndawonye, O nina bantu bebandla lami, ezweni laseSiyoni, nani nonke eningakayalwa ukuba nihlale.
Phumani eBabiloni. Hlanzekani nina eniphatha izitsha zeNkosi.
Bizani imihlangano yenu enesizotha, futhi nikhulume njalo omunye komunye. Futhi wonke umuntu makabize igama leNkosi.

Yebo, ngiqinisile ngiyaphinda ngithi kini, isikhathi sesifikile lapho izwi leNkosi lithi kini: Phumani eBabiloni; buthanani niphume phakathi kwezizwe, kusuka kuzo izingxenye ezine zomhlaba, kusuka emkhawulweni wezulu kuya komunye.
Thumelani amagosa ebandla lami ezizweni ezikude; eziqhingini zolwandle; thumelani kwamanye amazwe; nxusani izizwe zonke, kuqala kwabeZizwe, futhi emva kwalokho naku maJuda futhi.

Futhi bhekani, futhi bheka, lesi kuyoba yisimemezelo sabo, futhi nezwi leNkosi kubo bonke abantu: Hambani niye ezweni laseSiyoni, ukuze imingcele yabantu bami yandiswe, futhi ukuze ne zikhonkwane zakhe ziqiniswe, futhi ukuze uSiyoni aqhubekele ezifundeni ndawo zonke.
Yebo, isimemezelo masiye phakathi kwabo bonke abantu: Vukani futhi nisukume niyohlangabeza uMyeni; bhekani futhi bheka, uMyeni uyeza; hambani niyomhlangabeza. Zilungiseleleni usuku olukhulu lweNkosi.
Ngakho-ke, lindani, ngokuba anilwazi usuku noma ihora.
Ngakho-ke, labo aba phakathi kwabeZizwe mababalekele eSiyoni.
Futhi labo abayisizwe sika Juda mababalekele eJerusalema, ezintabeni zendlu yeNkosi.
Phumani phakathi kwezizwe, ngisho eBabiloni, phakathi kobubi, okuyiBabiloni yomoya.

Kodwa ngiqinisile, isho kanje iNkosi, ukubaleka kwenu makungabi ngokushesha, kodwa zonke izinto mazilungiswe ngaphambi kwenu; futhi lowo ohambayo, makangabheki emuva hleze imbubhiso engalindelekile ingamehleli.

Lalelani futhi nizwe, O nina bantu basemhlabeni. Lalelani, nina magosa ebandla lami ndawonye, futhi nizwe izwi leNkosi; ngokuba ubiza bonke abantu, futhi uyala bonke abantu yonke indawo ukuba baphenduke.
Ngokuba bhekani, iNkosi uNkulunkulu ithumele ingelosi ukuba imemezele emkhathini wezulu ithi: Lungisani indlela yeNkosi, futhi nenze imikhondo yayo iqonde, ngokuba ihora lokuza kwayo seliseduze—
Lapho iMvana iyoma phezu kwe Ntaba iSiyoni, futhi kumi kanye nayo abayizinkulungwane eziyikhulu namashumi amane nane, benegama likaYise lilotshwe emabunzini abo.
Ngalokho-ke, lungiselelani ukuza ko Myeni; phumani, phumani niyomhlangabeza.
Ngokuba bhekani, uyokuma phezu kwentaba yemiNqumo, futhi naphezu kolwandle olukhulu, ngisho ukujula okukhulu, naphezu kweziqhingi zolwandle, futhi naphezu kwezwe laseSiyoni.
Futhi uyo khuluma izwi lakhe ese Siyoni, futhi uyokhuluma eseJerusalema, futhi izwi lakhe liyozwakala kubo bonke abantu;
Futhi kuyokuba yizwi njengezwi lamanzi amaningi, futhi njengezwi lokuduma okukhulu, okuyo diliza izintaba, futhi izigodi ngeke zitholakale.
Uyoyala ukujula okukhulu, futhi kuyohlehla kuye emazweni asenyakatho, iziqhingi ziyoba yizwe elilodwa;
Futhi izwe lase Jerusalema nezwe laseSiyoni ayophindiselwa ezindaweni zawo, futhi umhlaba uyoba njengoba wawunjalo ezinsukwini phambi kokuba uhlukaniswe.
Futhi iNkosi, ngisho umSindisi, iyoma phakathi kwabantu bayo, futhi iyobusa phezu kwayo yonke inyama.
Futhi labo abase mazweni asenyakatho bayokhunjulwa phambi kweNkosi; futhi nabaphrofethi babo bayolizwa izwi layo, futhi ngeke besazibamba; bayoshaya amadwala, iqwa liyogobhoza phambi kwabo.
Futhi kuyomiswa indlela phakathi nolwandle olukhulu.
Izitha zabo ziyoba ngaphansi kwabo,
Futhi ogwadule olomileyo kuyophuma amachibi amanzi agobhozayo; nesihlabathi esihangukileyo ngeke sisaba yizwe elomileyo.
Futhi bayoletha amagugu abo enani elikhulu kubantwana ba-Efrayimi, izinceku zami.
Futhi imikhawulo ye zintaba ezimiyo ziyothuthumela phambi kwabo.
Futhi lapho bayoguqa phansi futhi baqheliswe ngenkazimulo, ngisho eSiyoni, ngezandla zezinceku zeNkosi, ngisho abantwana ba-Efrayimi.
Futhi bayogcwaliswa nga maculo enjabulo yaphakade.
Bhekani, lesi yisibusiso sikaNkulunkulu waphakade kuzo izizwana zika-Israyeli, futhi nesibusiso esikhulu kuye u-Efrayimi nabangani bakhe.
Futhi nalabo futhi be sizwana sikaJuda, emva kobuhlungu babo, bayongcweliswa ukuba babe ngcwele phambi kweNkosi, ukuze bahlale lapho ikhona imini nobusuku, phakade naphakade.

Manje, ngiqinisile ithi iNkosi, ukuze lezi zinto zaziwe phakathi kwenu, O bantu basemhlabeni, ngithumele ingelosi yami endiza emkhathini wezulu, ine vangeli laphakade, evele kwabanye futhi yalinika abantu, eyovela kwabaningi abahlala emhlabeni.
Futhi leli vangeli liyo shunyayelwa kuzo zonke izizwe, nezihlobo, nezilimi, nabantu.
Futhi izinceku zikaNkulunkulu ziyohamba, zithi ngezwi elikhulu: Mesabeni uNkulunkulu futhi nimnike udumo, ngokuba ihora lokwahlulela kwakhe selifikile;
Futhi mkhonzeni lowo owenza izulu, nomhlaba, nolwandle, nemithombo yamanzi—
Zibiza igama leNkosi imini nobusuku, zithi: O sengathi unga dabula amazulu, sengathi ungehla, izintaba zigobhoze phambi kwakho.
Futhi ziyophendulwa; ngokuba inkazimulo yeNkosi iyofana nomlilo oncibilikisayo ongamalangabi, futhi njengomlilo owenza amanzi abile.
O Nkosi, uyokwehla uzokwenza igama lakho laziwe ezitheni zakho, futhi zonke izizwe ziyothuthumela ngenxa yenkazimulo yakho—
Lapho usuwenza izinto ezesabekayo, izinto abangazibhekile;
Yebo, lapho usuwehla, nezintaba sezigobhozela phansi ngenxa yenkazimulo yakho, uyo hlangana naye othokozayo nowenza ukulunga, okukhumbulayo ezindleleni zakho.

Ngokuba kusuka ekuqaleni komhlaba ngabe abantu abakaze bezwe na noma bazi nangendlebe, futhi ngabe iso alikaze libone na, O Nkulunkulu, ngaphandle kwakho, ukuthi zingakanani izinto osu mlungisele zona okulindileyo.
Futhi kuyothiwa: Ubani lona owehla ephuma kuNkulunkulu ezulwini nezingubo ezibomvu; yebo, osuka ezindaweni ezingaziwa, ogqoke ingubo yakhe ekhazimulayo, ohamba ngobukhulu bamandla akhe na?
Futhi uyothi: Nginguye owakhuluma ngokulunga, nonamandla okusindisa.
Futhi iNkosi iyoba bomvu ngezingubo zayo, futhi izingubo zayo zinjenge zonyathela kuso isikhamo sewayini.
Futhi iyoba nkulu kakhulu inkazimulo yobukhona bakhe kangangoba ilanga liyofihla ubuso balo ngamahloni, nenyanga iyogodla ukukhanya kwayo, nezinkanyezi ziyodedeleka zisuka ezindaweni zazo.
Futhi izwi lakhe liyozwakala lithi: Ngisi nyathelile isikhamo sewayini ngingedwa, futhi ngilethe ukwahlulela kubo bonke abantu; futhi kakho obenami;

Futhi ngibanyathelile ngolaka, futhi nginyathelile phezu kwabo ngentukuthelo yami, futhi igazi labo ngilifafazile phezu kwezingubo zami, futhi ngangcolisa zonke izambatho zami; ngokuba yilo lolu suku lwempindiselo olwaluse nhliziyweni yami.
Manje unyaka waba khululiweyo bami usufikile; futhi bayophawula ngesihe seNkosi yabo, nangakho konke lokho ebaphe kona ngokokulunga kwakhe, futhi nangokwesihe sakhe, phakade naphakade.

Ezinhluphekweni zabo zonke wahlupheka naye. Futhi ingelosi esuka kuye yabasindisa; futhi ngo thando lwakhe, nangokubahawukela kwakhe, waba khulula, wabetshatha, futhi wabathwala zonke izinsuku zasemandulo;
Yebo, no-Enoke futhi, nalabo ababenaye; abaphrofethi ababengaphambi kwakhe; no Nowa futhi, nalabo ababengaphambi kwakhe; no Mose futhi, nalabo ababengaphambi kwakhe;
Futhi kusuka kuMose kuya ku-Eliya, futhi kusuka ku-Eliya kuya kuJohane, ababenoKristu kulo uvuko lwakhe, nabaphostoli abangcwele, beno-Abrahama, u-Isaka, kanye noJakobe, bayoba khona phambi kweMvana.

Futhi amathuna abangcwele ayovulwa; futhi bayophuma futhi bame ngakwe sokudla isandla seMvana, ngesikhathi isiyoma phezu kwe Ntaba iSiyoni, naphezu komuzi ongcwele, iJerusalema eNtsha; futhi bayocula iculo le Mvana, imini nobusuku phakade naphakade.

Futhi ngenxa yalesi sizathu, ukuze abantu babe ngabahlanganyela kuzo izimfihlakalo ezazisazo kwembulwa, iNkosi yathumela ukuphelela kwe vangeli layo, isivumelwano sayo saphakade, ikhuluma ngokucacile nangokuzwakala kalula—

Ukulungiselela abathobekileyo izinto ezizayo emhlabeni, nomsebenzi weNkosi ngosuku lapho abathobekileyo beyothobisa abahlakaniphileyo, naba buthakathaka beyoba yisizwe esinamandla, futhi ababili bayoxosha abayizinkulungwane eziyishumi zezitha zabo.
Futhi ngezinto ezithobekileyo zomhlaba iNkosi iyoshaya izizwe ngamandla oMoya wayo.
Futhi ngenxa yalesi sizathu lemiyalelo yanikwa; yayalelwa ukuba igodlwe emhlabeni ngosuku eyanikwa ngalo, kodwa manje kufanele iye kubo bonke abantu—
Futhi lokhu ngokomqondo nangokwentando yeNkosi, ebusa phezu kwabo bonke abantu.
Futhi lowo ophendukayo futhi nozi ngcwelisayo phambi kweNkosi uyonikwa ukuphila okuphakade.
Futhi kulabo abangali laleli izwi leNkosi kuyogcwaliseka lokho okwalotshwa ngumphrofethi uMose, ukuthi kufanele basuswe phakathi kwabantu.

Futhi nalokho okwalotshwa ngumphrofethi uMalaki: Ngokuba, bhekani, usuku luyeza oluyo shisa njengeziko, futhi bonke abaziqhenyayo, yebo, futhi nabo bonke abenza okubi, bayoba ngamabibi; futhi usuku oluzayo luyobashisa, kusho iNkosi yamabandla, lungabashiyeli mpande nagatsha.
Ngalokho-ke, lokhu kuyoba yimpendulo yeNkosi kubo:
Ngalolo suku lapho ngiza kwabami, akukho muntu phakathi kwenu owangemukela, futhi naxoshwa.
Ngesikhathi ngibiza futhi kwakungekho muntu kini ukuphendula; kodwa ingalo yami yayingafinyeziwe neze ukuba nginganihlengi, noma amandla ami ukuba nginikhulule.
Bhekani, ngokukhuza kwami ngiyalomisa ulwandle. Ngenze imifula ibe yihlane; izinhlazi zayo zinuke, futhi zife ngenxa yokoma.
Ngigqokisa amazulu ngobumnyama, futhi ngenze ubumnyama bube yingubo yawo.
Futhi lokhu niyokuthola kuvela esandleni sami—niyokulala phansi ngobuhlungu.
Bhekani, futhi bheka, akekho ozonikhulula; ngokuba anilithobelanga izwi lami ngesikhathi nginibiza ngisemazulwini; anizikholwanga izinceku zami, futhi ngesikhathi zithunyelwe kini anizemukelanga.
Ngalokho-ke, zabuqinisa ubufakazi futhi zawubopha umthetho, futhi nina nayekwa ebumnyameni.
Laba bayoya ebumnyameni obungaphandle, lapho kukhona ukukhala, nesililo, nokugedla kwamazinyo.
Bhekani iNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu ikushilo lokhu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/134.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 134
chapter_summary: 1–4, Imikhandlu ephetheyo kufanele ilondoloze inkululeko yonembeza neyokukhonza; 5–8, Bonke abantu kufanele bayisekele imikhandlu yabo ephetheyo futhi kufanele bahloniphe futhi bathobele umthetho; 9–10, Izinhlangano zenkolo akufanele zisebenzise amandla okuqhuba umthetho; 11–12, Abantu abanacala ekuzivikeleni bona nempahla yabo.

verses.text: Sikholelwa wukuthi imikhandlu ephetheyo yamiswa nguNkulunkulu ukuze kuzuze umuntu; futhi nokuthi ubeke ukuthi umuntu aziphendulele ngezenzo zakhe mayelana nayo, ekushayeni imithetho nasekuyiphatheni, ukuze kuzuze futhi kuphephe umphakathi.

Sikholelwa wukuthi awukho umkhandlu ophetheyo ongaba khona ngokuthula, ngaphandle kokuba kumiswe uhlobo lwemithetho ezogcinwa futhi ingaphulwa nezoqinisekisa kumuntu ngamunye ukuthi asebenzise unembeza wakhe ngokukhululeka, ilungelo namandla okuphatha impahla, noku vikeleka kwempilo.

Sikholelwa wukuthi yonke imkhandlu ephetheyo idinga abaphathi zikhundla nabathethimacala abagunyaziwe ukwenza imithetho yaleyo mikhandlu igcinwe; futhi nokuthi labo abazophatha umthetho ngokungakhethi nangokulunga kufanele bafunwe futhi basekelwe ngezwi labantu uma lowo mkhandlu unombusi ode ekhethwa ngabantu, noma ngentando yenkosi yezwe.

Sikholelwa wukuthi inkolo imiswe nguNkulunkulu; nokuthi abantu kufanele baphendule kuye, futhi kuye kuphela, ngokuyisebenzisa inkolo, ngaphandle uma imibono yabo ngokwenkolo ibangela ukuthi bathathe amalungelo nokukhululeka kwabanye; kodwa asikholelwa ekutheni umthetho wabantu unelungelo lokuzigaxa ngokunquma imigomo yokukhonza ngenhloso yokulawula onembeza babantu, noma ukuphoqelela izindlela zokukhonza komphakathi noma komuntu ngamunye; sikholelwa wukuthi abathethimacala kufanele babuvimbele ubugebengu, kodwa bangawulawuli unembeza; kufanele bakujezise ukona, kodwa bangayicindezeli inkululeko yomuntu.

Sikholelwa wukuthi bonke abantu bamelwe ukuyisekela nokuyiqinisa leyo mikhandlu ephetheyo abahlala kuyo, uma imithetho yaleyo mikhandlu ibavikele ngokuphathelene namalungelo abo emvelo futhi angenakwephucwa; nokuthi ukuvukela umbuso noku hlubuka akufanele kwenziwe umphakathi wezwe ovikeleke kanjalo, futhi kufanele kujeziswe ngokufanele; futhi nokuthi yonke imikhandlu ephetheyo inelungelo lokumisa uhlobo lwemithetho ngokubona kwayo ezoqinisekisa okufunwa ngumphakathi; nakuba kunjalo, begcine inkululeko yonembeza ingenaku guqulwa.

Sikholelwa wukuthi wonke umuntu kufanele ahlonishwe esikhundleni sakhe, ababusi nabathethimacala ngokunjalo, bebekelwe ukuvikela abangenacala nokujeziswa kwabonile; nokuthi bonke abantu kufanele bayihloniphe futhi bayithobele imithetho, njengoba ngaphandle kwayo kuyoba khona isiphithiphithi nokwesaba esikhundleni sokuthula nokuzwana; imithetho yabantu emiswe ngenhloso yokulawula okuthandwa yithi njengabantu nezizwe, phakathi komuntu nomuntu; futhi nemithetho kaNkulunkulu enikwe ezulwini, emisa imigomo ngokuphathelene nezinto zomoya, ukuqhubekisa ukukholwa nokukhonza, umuntu azophendula ngayo yomibili lemithetho kuMdali wakhe.

Sikholelwa wukuthi ababusi, izizwe, nemikhandlu ephetheyo inelungelo, futhi ifanele ukumisa imithetho ukuvikela wonke umphakathi wezwe ekwenzeni ngokukhululeka imfundiso yokholo lwabo; kodwa asikholelwa ukuthi banelungelo lokuphuca umphakathi wezwe lelilungelo, noma ukuwenqabela ngokuphathelene nemibono yabo, uma nje uyinaka futhi uyihlonipha leyo mithetho futhi leyomibono ngokwenkolo ingasekeli ukuvukela umbuso noma uzungu.

Sikholelwa wukuthi isenzo sobugebengu kufanele sijeziswe ngokobunjalo baso; nokuthi ukubulala, ukuvukela umbuso, ukuphanga, ukweba, nokuphazamisa ukuthula komphakathi, nganoma iyiphi indlela, kufanele lezo zenzo zijeziswe ngobunjalo bazo nangokuvama kwazo ukuqhubekisa ububi phakathi kwabantu, ngokwemithetho yalowo mkhandlu ophetheyo lapho kwenziwe khona leso senzo sokona; futhi sikholelwa wukuthi ukuze emphakathini kube khona ukuthula nokuzwana wonke umuntu kufanele kubekhona akwenzayo futhi basebenzise amandla abo ukuletha izoni eziphula imithetho emihle ukuba zijeziswe.

Asikholelwa wukuthi kulungile ukuhlanganisa imfundiso yenkolo nomkhandlu ophetheyo womphakathi, okubangela ukuthi enye inhlangano yenkolo ikhuliswe futhi enye yenqatshelwe ngokuphathelene namalungelo ayo ngokwenkolo, futhi amalungu ayo, njengomphakathi, ephucwe amalungelo.

Sikholelwa wukuthi zonke izinhlangano zenkolo zinelungelo lokuthathela amalungu azo izinyathelo ngokuziphatha kwawo okungalungile, ngokwemithetho nenqubo yalezo zinhlangano; uma lezo zinyathelo kungezobulungu nokuziphatha kahle; kodwa asikholelwa wukuthi noma iyiphi inhlangano yenkolo inegunya lokuthetha amacala abantu ngokuphathelene namalungelo abo empahla noma empilo, ukuthatha kubo izimpahla zalomhlaba, noma ukubabeka ebungozini bempilo noma bomzimba, noma ukubajezisa ngokubazwisa ubuhlungu emzimbeni. Bangaba xosha kuphela enhlanganweni yabo, futhi bathathe kubo ubulungu babo.

Sikholelwa wukuthi abantu kufanele bancengele ukunxeshezelwa kukho konke ukoniwa nezikhalo, lapho umuntu ezwiswe khona ukuhlukunyenzwa, noma kuphulwe ilungelo lempahla noma lesimilo, uma kukhona imithetho enjalo evikela lawo malungelo; kodwa sikholelwa wukuthi bonke abantu abanacala ekuzivikeleni bona, abangani babo, nempahla, nomkhandlu ophetheyo, ekuhlaselweni okungekho emthethweni kwamalungelo abo bonke abantu ngezikhathi zobungozi, lapho umuntu engeke akwazi ukufaka isikhalo ngokushesha, futhi nokusizakala kungeke kutholakale.

Sikholelwa wukuthi kulungile ukushumayela ivangeli ezizweni zomhlaba, futhi nokuxwayisa abalungileyo ukuba bazigcine ekukhohlakaleni komhlaba; kodwa asikholelwa wukuthi kulungile ukuzigaxa ezigqilini, noma ukushumayela ivangeli kuzo, noma ukubabhabhadisa ngokuphambene nentando nokufisa kwabaphathi bazo, noma ukubafaka umoya kancane okuzobenza banganeliseki ngezimo zabo kulempilo, ngaleyondlela sibeke ebungozini izimpilo zabantu; ukuzigaxa okunjalo sikholelwa wukuthi akukho emthethweni futhi akulungile, futhi kuyingozi kukho ukuthula kwanoma yimuphi umkhandlu ophetheyo ovumela abantu baphathwe ngobugqili.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/135.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 135
chapter_summary: 1–2, UJoseph noHyrum bafela ukholo beseTilongweni lase Carthage; 3, Isikhundla esikhulu somPhrofethi siyamenyezelwa; 4–7, Igazi labo elingenacala lifakaza ngokuthi lomsebenzi uyiqiniso nokuthi uvela kuNkulunkulu.

verses.text: Ukuqinisa ubufakazi balencwadi neNcwadi kaMormoni, sazisa ngokufela ukholo kuka uJoseph Smith umPhrofethi, noHyrum Smith uMphatriyakhe. Badutshulwa bese tilongweni laseCarthage, ngomhlaka 27 Juni 1844, ngezikhathi zehora lesihlanu ntambama, yisixuku esasihlomile—bezipende baba mnyama—sabantu ababeyikhulu namashumi amahlanu kuya kumakhulu amabili. UHyrum wadutshulwa kuqala futhi wawa ngesizotha, ememeza ethi: Ngiyindoda efileyo! UJoseph wagxuma esuka ewindini, futhi wadutshulwa wafa kulowo mzamo, ememeza ethi: O Nkosi Nkulunkulu wami! Bobabili badutshulwa emva kokuba sebefile, ngendlela enonya, futhi bobabili bathola izinhlamvu ezine.

UJohn Taylor noWillard Richards, ababili babayiShumi namBili, kwakuyibona bantu kuphela endlini ngaleso sikhathi; owokuqala walinyazwa ngendlela enonya ngezinhlamvu ezine, kodwa wabuye walulama; owesibili, ngosizo lukaNkulunkulu wasinda ngaphandle ngisho kwembobo engutsheni yakhe.

UJoseph Smith, umPhrofethi no Mboni weNkosi, usenze okuningi, ngaphandle kukaJesu kuphela, ukuze abantu basindiswe kulomhlaba, kunanoma yimuphi omunye umuntu owake waphila kuwo. Esikhathini esifishane seminyaka engamashumi amabili, useveze iNcwadi kaMormoni, ayihumushe ngesipho nangamandla kaNkulunkulu, futhi ube yindlela yokuyikhipha kumazwekazi amabili; usethumele ukuphelela kwevangeli laphakade, eliqukethwe yiyo, emagunjini amane omhlaba; useveze izambulo nemiyalelo eyenza lencwadi yeMfundiso neziVumelwano, futhi neziningi ezinye izincwadi ezinolwazi nezimfundiso ukuze kuzuze abantwana babantu; usehlanganise izinkulungwane eziningi zabaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina, usemise idolobha elikhulu, futhi washiya udumo negama okungeke kwashabalaliswa. Waphila emkhulu, futhi wafa emkhulu emehlweni kaNkulunkulu nakubantu bakhe; futhi njengabaningi abagcotshiweyo beNkosi ezikhathini zasendulo, usekuqinisile ukuthunywa kwakhe nemisebenzi yakhe ngegazi lakhe uqobo; futhi ngokunjalo nomfowabo uHyrum. Empilweni babengehlukene, futhi nasekufeni babengehlukene!

Ngesikhathi uJoseph eya eCarthage ukuyoziletha kulokho okwakuthiwa kuyizidingo zomthetho, ezinsukwini ezimbili noma ezintathu ezandulela ukubulawa kwakhe, wathi: “Ngihamba njenge mvana iyohlatshwa; kodwa ngizolile njengokusa kwasehlobo; nginonembeza ongenacala kuNkulunkulu, nakubantu bonke. Ngizofa ngingenacala, futhi ngesikhathi esizayo kuyothiwa ngami—wabulawa ngonya”—Ngalokho kusa, emva kokuba uHyrum eselungiselele ukuhamba—ngabe kufanele kuthiwe ukuyobulawa na? yebo, ngokuba kwabanjalo—wafunda lesi sigaba esilandelayo, ngasekupheleni kweseshumi nambili isahluko sika-Etere, eNcwadini kaMormoni, wayesegoqa ikhasi lencwadi kulesosigaba:

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi ngakhuleka eNkosini ukuthi ibe nomusa kwabeZizwe, ukuze babe nesihe. Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi iNkosi yathi kimi: Uma bengenaso isihe akusho lutho kuwe, wena wethembekile; ngalokho-ke izingubo zakho ziyokwenziwa zihlanzeke. Futhi ngenxa yokuthi ububonile ubuthakathaka bakho, uyokwenziwa uqine, ngisho kangangoba uzohlala phansi endaweni engiyilungisile ezindlini eziningi zikaBaba. Manje mina … sengiyavalelisa kwabeZizwe; yebo, futhi ngokunjalo nakubafowethu engibathandayo, kuze kube sihlangana phambi kwesihlalo sokwahlulela sikaKristu, lapho bonke abantu beyokwazi ukuthi izingubo zami azichaphazelekanga ngegazi lenu. Ofakazi sebefile manje, futhi nobufakazi babo bunamandla.

UHyrum Smith wayeneminyaka engamashumi amane nane ubudala ngoFebruwari, 1844, kanti uJoseph Smith wayeneminyaka engamashumi amathathu nesishiyagalombili ngoDisemba, 1843; futhi kusuka manje amagama abo ayobalwa nawalabo abafela ukholo; futhi umfundi kuzo zonke izizwe uyokhumbula ukuthi iNcwadi kaMormoni, nalencwadi yeMfundiso neziVumelwano zebandla, zabanga ukuchitheka kwegazi elihle kakhulu lekhulu neshumi nesishiyagalolunye leminyaka ukuba zikhishwe ukuze kusindiswe umhlaba owonakeleyo; futhi nokuthi uma umlilo ungashisa umuthi oluhlaza ukuze kudunyiswe uNkulunkulu, kuyoba lula kangakanani ukushisa imithi eyomileyo ukususa ukonakala esivinini. Baphilela udumo; bafela udumo; futhi udumo lungumvuzo wabo waphakade. Izikhathi ngezikhathi amagama abo ayodluliswa ezizukulwaneni njengamatshe aligugu kwabangcwelisiweyo.

Babengenacala, njengoba babelokhu betholakala phambilini, futhi babevalelwe etilongweni ngozungu lwamambuka nabantu ababi; futhi igazi labo elingenacala phansi etilongweni laseCarthage liyisi sicilelo esisobala esinanyathiselwe ku “buMormoni” esingasoze senqatshwa yinoma iyiphi inkantolo emhlabeni, futhi igazi labo elingenacala elisesihlangwini sesiFundazwe sase-Illinois, nesethembiso esephulwa yisiFundazwe njengokuthenjiswa ngumbusi, liwubufakazi bobuqiniso bevangeli laphakade umhlaba wonke ongeke wabuphikisa; futhi igazi labo elingenacala elisefulegini lenkuleko, futhi nakwi-magna charta yaseMelika, liyinxusa lenkolo kaJesu Kristu, eliyothinta izinhliziyo zabantu abathembekile phakathi kwezizwe zonke; futhi igazi labo elingenacala, negazi elingenacala labo bonke abafela ukholo ngaphansi kwe-altare elabonwa nguJohane, liyokhala eNkosini yamaBandla, ize ithole impindiselo yalelo gazi emhlabeni. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/136.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 136
chapter_summary: 1–16, Kuchazwa ukuthi kufanele imiswe kanjani inkambu ka-Israyeli ukuze kuthathwe uhambo oluya ngasentshonalanga; 17–27, AbaNgcwele bayalwa ukuba baphile ngemigomo eminingi yevangeli; 28–33, AbaNgcwele kufanele bacule, badanse, bakhuleke, futhi bafunde ukuhlakanipha; 34–42, AbaPhrofethi bayabulawa ukuze badunyiswe futhi ababi babekwe icala.

verses.text: Izwi neNtando yeNkosi ngokuphathelene neNkambu ka-Israyeli ekuhambeni kwabo okuningi okuya entshonalanga:
