Abantu bonke be Bandla likaJesu Kristu labaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina, nalabo abahamba nabo, mabamiswe ngamaqoqo, ngesivumelwano nesethembiso sokugcina yonke imiyalelo nemithetho yeNkosi uNkulunkulu wethu.

Amaqoqo abantu mawamiswe nabaholi bamakhulu, abaholi bamashumi amahlanu, nabaholi bamashumi, kube khona nomongameli nabeluleki babo ababili abazohola lawo maqoqo, ngaphansi kokuqondiswa ngaba Phostoli abayiShumi namBili.
Futhi lesi kuyokuba yisivumelwano sethu—ukuthi siyo hamba ngokwe zimiso zonke zeNkosi.
Iqoqo ngaliye malizihlinzeke ngazo zonke izilwane ezizodonsa, izinqola, imihlinzeko, izingubo, nezinye izidingo zohambo, abangakwazi ukuzithola.
Uma amaqoqo esemisiwe mabahambe ngamandla abo, ukulungiselela labo abazosala.

Iqoqo ngalinye, nabaholi nomongameli babo, mabanqume ukuthi bangaki abazohamba ngentwasahlobo elandelayo; emva kwalokho bakhethe isibalo esanele samadoda anamandla futhi anamakhono, azothatha izilwane ezizodonsa izinqola, izimbewu, nezinto zokulima, bahambe njengezingqalabutho ukulungiselela ukuyotshala izithombo zasentwasahlobo.

Iqoqo ngalinye malibe nesibalo esilinganayo, ngokwesabelo sempahla yalo, ukuthatha abampofu, abafelokazi, abangenababa, nemindeni yalabo abaye emabuthweni, ukuze ukukhala kwabafelokazi nabangenababa kungakhuphukeli ezindlebeni zeNkosi ngokumelene nalaba bantu.
Iqoqo ngalinye malilungise izindlu, namasimu okutshala okusanhlamvu, bakwenzele labo abazosala ngemumva kulenkathi; futhi lokhu kuyintando yeNkosi ngokuphathelene nabantu bayo.
Wonke umuntu makasebenzise onke amandla akhe nempahla ukususa lababantu baye endaweni lapho iNkosi iyokhomba khona isikhonkwane saseSiyoni.

Futhi uma nenza lokhu ngenhliziyo ecwebileyo, ngakho konke ukuthembeka, niyo busiswa; niyobusiswa emihlambini yenu yezimvu, nasemihlambini yenu yezinkomo, nasemasimini enu, nasezindlini zenu, nasemindenini yenu.
Izinceku zami u-Ezra T. Benson no-Erastus Snow mabamise iqoqo.
Nezinceku zami u-Orson Pratt noWilford Woodruff mabamise iqoqo.
Futhi, izinceku zami u-Amasa Lyman noGeorge A. Smith mabamise iqoqo.
Futhi mababeke omongameli, nabaholi bamakhulu, nabamashumi amahlanu, nabamashumi.
Futhi izinceku zami ezibekiwe mazihambe ziyokufundisa lokhu, okuyi intando yami, kwabangcwele, ukuze balungiselele ukuhamba baye ezweni lokuthula.
Hambani nenze njengoba nginitshelile, futhi ningazesabi izitha zenu; ngokuba ngeke zibe namandla okumisa umsebenzi wami.
ISiyoni iyo khululwa ngesikhathi sami esifanele.
Futhi uma kukhona umuntu ofuna ukuziphakamisa, futhi engasifuni iseluleko sami, ngeke aba namandla, futhi ubuwula bakhe buyobonakaliswa.
Yifuneni iNkosi; futhi nigcine zonke izethembiso zenu omunye komunye; futhi ningakufisi lokho okungokomfowenu.
Zigcineni ebubini bokuphatha igama leNkosi ngeze, ngokuba ngiyiNkosi uNkulunkulu wenu, ngisho uNkulunkulu woyihlo, uNkulunkulu ka-Abrahama noka-Isaka nokaJakobe.
NgiNguye owahola abantwana bakwa-Israyeli bephuma ezweni laseGibithe; futhi ingalo yami yeluliwe ezinsukwini zokugcina, uku hlenga abantu bami u-Israyeli.
Phezani ukubanga omunye nomunye; phezani ukukhuluma okubi omunye ngomunye.
Phezani ukudakwa; futhi amazwi enu mawakhe omunye komunye.
Uma uboleka okungokuka makhelwane wakho, kufanele ukubuyisele lokho okubolekile; uma ungakwazi ukukubuyisela iya kuye masinyane futhi umtshele umakhelwane wakho, funa akubeke icala.
Uma uthola lokho okulahlekele umakhelwane wakho, uyomfuna ngokukhuthala uze ukuse kuye futhi.
Khuthala ekugcineni lokho onakho, ukuze ube ngumphathi ohlakaniphileyo; ngokuba kuyisipho samahala seNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho, futhi wena ungumphathi wakhe.
Uma uthokozile, dumisa iNkosi ngoku cula, ngomculo, ngokudansa, nango mkhuleko wokudumisa nokubonga.
Uma udabukile, biza iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho ngomkhuleko, ukuze imiphefumulo yenu ijabule.
Ningazesabi izitha zenu, ngokuba zise zandleni zami futhi ngizokwenza intando yami ngazo.

Abantu bami kufanele ba vivinywe ezintweni zonke, ukuze balungele ukufumana inkazimulo engibabekele yona, ngisho inkazimulo yeSiyoni; futhi lowo ongeke akubekezelele ukujeziswa akawufanele umbuso wami.
Lowo ongazi makafunde ukuhlakanipha ngoku zithoba nokubiza igama leNkosi uNkulunkulu wakhe, ukuze amehlo akhe avuleke ukuze abone, futhi nezindlebe zakhe zivuleke ukuze ezwe;
Ngokuba uMoya wami uthunyelwe emhlabeni ukukhanyisela abazithobile nabadabukile, futhi nokubabeka icala abangamesabi uNkulunkulu.
Enakhe nabo banenqabile nobufakazi benu, ngisho isizwe sinixoshile;
Manje kuza usuku lokuhlupheka kwabo, ngisho izinsuku zosizi, njengowesifazane obelethayo; futhi usizi lwabo luyoba lukhulu ngaphandle uma bephenduka ngokushesha, yebo, ngokushesha okukhulu.
Ngokuba babulale abaphrofethi, nalabo ababethunywe kubo; futhi bachithe igazi elingenacala, elikhalayo phansi ngokumelene nabo.

Ngakho-ke, ningamangali ngalezi zinto, ngokuba anikakabi ngaba cwebileyo okwamanje; ngeke nikwazi ukumelana nenkazimulo yami; kodwa niyoyibona uma nithembekile ekugcineni wonke amazwi ami engininike wona, kusuka ezinsukwini zika-Adamu kuya ku-Abrahama, kusuka ku-Abrahama kuya kuMose, kusuka kuMose kuya kuJesu nabaphostoli bakhe, futhi kusuka kuJesu nabaphostoli bakhe kuya kuJoseph Smith, engimbize nge zingelosi zami, izinceku zami ezifundisayo, futhi nangezwi lami uqobo lisuka ezulwini, ukuba aveze umsebenzi wami
Leso sisekelo asibekile, futhi wathembeka; futhi ngase ngimthatha ngamletha kimi.
Abaningi bamangele ngokufa kwakhe; kodwa bekudingekile ukuba aqinise ubufakazi bakhe ngegazi lakhe, ukuze adunyiswe futhi ababi babekwe icala.
Anginihlenganga yini kuzo izitha zenu, ngendlela yokuthi ngishiye ubufakazi begama lami na?
Ngakho-ke, manje, lalelani, O nina bantu be bandla lami; futhi nani magosa lalelani ndawonye; niwufumene umbuso wami.

Khuthalani ekugcineni imiyalelo yami yonke, funa ukwahlulela kwami kwehlele phezu kwenu, futhi ukukholwa kwenu kuphele, futhi nezitha zenu zijabule ngani. Ngakho-ke, angembuli lutho olunye okwamanje. Amen futhi Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/137.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 137
chapter_summary: 1–6, UmPhrofethi ubona umfowabo u-Alvin embusweni wesilestiyali; 7–9, Imfundiso ngensindiso yabafileyo iyembulwa; 10, Bonke abantwana basindiswa embusweni wesilestiyali.

verses.text: Amazulu savulelwa wona, ngase ngibona umbuso wesilestiyali kaNkulunkulu, nenkazimulo yawo, noma ngangisemzimbeni noma ngangingekho angazi.
Ngabona ubuhle be sango obubabazekayo okuzongena kulo izindlalifa zalowo mbuso, obabufana namalangabi omlilo azungezayo;
Futhi nesi vuthayo isihlalo sobukhosi sikaNkulunkulu, kuso okwakuhleli uBaba ne Ndodana.
Ngabona imigwaqo emihle yalowo mbuso, eyayibonakala sengathi yayenziwe nge golide.
Ngabona uBaba u-Adamu no-Abrahama; futhi no baba no mama; nomfowethu u-Alvin, osewalala kudala;

Futhi ngamangaliswa wukuthi walithola kanjani ifa kulowo mbuso, ngokuba wayedlule kulomhlaba ngaphambi kokuba iNkosi yelule isandla sayo ukuqoqa u-Israyeli okwesibili, futhi wayengazange abhabhadiswe ukuze kuthethelelwe izono.
Lasho kanje izwi leNkosi kimi, lithi: Bonke abafe ngaphandle kolwazi lwalelivangeli, abebe zolemukela ukuba babevunyelwe ukuphila, bayokuba yizindlalifa zo mbuso wesilestiyali kaNkulunkulu;
Futhi bonke abayokufa kusuka manje ngaphandle kokulazi, abebe zolemukela ngezinhliziyo zabo zonke, bayoba yizindlalifa zalowo mbuso.
Ngokuba mina, iNkosi, ngizo kwahlulela bonke abantu ngokwe misebenzi yabo, ngokwe zifiso zezinhliziyo zabo.
Futhi ngaphinde ngabona ukuthi bonke abantwana abafa bengakafiki eminyakeni yokuziphendulela basindiswa embusweni wesilestiyali wasezulwini.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/138.title: IMfundiso neziVumelwano 138
chapter_summary: 1–10, UMongameli uJoseph F. Smith uzindla ngemibhalo kaPetru nokuhambela kweNkosi ezweni lemimoya; 11–24, UMongameli uSmith ubona abafileyo abalungileyo behlangene eparadesi nobufundisi bukaKristu phakathi kwabo; 25–37, Ubona ukuthi ukushunyayelwa kwevangeli kwamiswa kanjani phakathi kwemimoya; 38–52, Ubona u-Adamu, u-Eva, nabaningi babaphrofethi abangcwele ezweni lemimoya ababebuka isimo sabo somoya ngaphambi kokuvuswa kwabo kwabafileyo njengokuthumbeka; 53–60, Abafileyo abalungileyo balesi sikhathi bayaqhubeka nemisebenzi yabo ezweni lemimoya.

verses.text: Ngomhlaka 3 ku-Oktoba, ngonyaka wamakhulu ayishumi nesishiyagalolunye neshumi nambili, ngahlala egunjini lami ngizindla ngemibhalo engcwele;
Futhi ngicabanga ngomnikelo omkhulu ohlawulayo owenziwa yiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, ukuze ku hlengwe umhlaba;
No thando olukhulu nolumangalisayo olwabonakaliswa nguBaba neNdodana ngokuza ko mHlengi emhlabeni;
Ukuthi ngenhlawulo yakhe, futhi nangoku thobela imigomo yevangeli, isintu singasindiswa.

Ngesikhathi ngisacabanga ngalokho, umqondo wami wabuyela emibhalweni yomphostoli uPetru, eyayibhekiswe kwabangcwele basemandulo ababesakazeke ndawo zonke ePontu, eGalathiya, eKhaphadosiya, nakwezinye izingxenye zase-Asiya, lapho ivangeli lalishunyayelwe khona emva kokubethelwa kweNkosi.

Ngavula iBhayibheli futhi ngafunda isahluko sesithathu nesesine sencwadi yokuqala kaPetru, futhi ngesikhathi ngifunda ngaba nokuqonda okukhulu, ngaphezu kwalokho kwaphambilini, ngalezi zigaba ezilandelayo:
“Ngokuba naye uKristu wake wezwa ubuhlungu kwabakanye ngezono, olungileyo ngenxa yabangalungile, ukuze asiyise kuNkulunkulu, ebulawa enyameni, kepha ephiliswa nguMoya:
“Ahamba ngawo futhi washumayeza imimoya esetilongweni;

“Ngesinye isikhathi eyayingalaleli, lapho ukubekezela kukaNkulunkulu kwakubalindele ezinsukwini zikaNowa, ngesikathi umkhumbi usakhiwa, kuwo abayingcosana, okungukuthi, abantu abayisishiyagalombili abasindiswa ngamanzi.” (Ⅰ kaPetru 3:18–20.)
“Ngokuba ngenxa yalokhu ivangeli lashunyayelwa nakwabafileyo, ukuze bahlulelwe ngokwabantu enyameni, kepha baphile ngokukaNkulunkulu emoyeni.” (Ⅰ kaPetru 4:6.)
Ngisazindla ngalezi zinto ezi bhaliwe, amehlo okuqonda kwami avuleka, futhi noMoya weNkosi waba phezu kwami, futhi ngabona izixuku zabafileyo, abancane nabakhulu.
Futhi kwakubuthene ndawonye endaweni eyodwa amaqoqo angabaleki emimoya yabalungileyo, ababe thembekile kubo ubufakazi bukaJesu ngesikhathi besaphila emhlabeni;
Futhi ababenze umnikelo ofana nomnikelo omkhulu weNdodana kaNkulunkulu, futhi naba bezwe usizi egameni lomHlengi wabo.
Bonke laba babefe, beqinile ethembeni lo vuko oluhle lakhulu, ngo musa kaNkulunkulu uBaba ne Zelwe Yodwa iNdodana yakhe, uJesu Kristu.
Ngabona ukuthi babegcwele injabulo nentokozo, futhi babethokoza ndawonye ngenxa yokuthi usuku lokukhululwa lwase lusondele.
Babebuthene belindele ukufika kweNdodana kaNkulunkulu ezweni lemimoya, ukuzomemezela ukukhululwa kwabo kuwo amaketango okufa.

Uthuli lwabo oluleleyo lwaluzo buyiselwa lube sesimweni esipheleleyo, ithambo ethanjeni lalo, nemisipha nenyama phezu kwamathambo, umoya nomzimba kwakuzo hlanganiswa kungaphinde kuhlukaniswe, ukuze bafumane injabulo epheleleyo.
Ngesikhathi lesi sixuku esikhulu silindile futhi sixoxa, sijabulela ihora lokukhululwa kwaso kuwo amaketango okufa, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu yavela, imemezela ukukhululwa kwababoshiweyo ababethembekile;
Futhi lapho washumayela kubo ivangeli laphakade, imfundiso yovuko nokukhululwa kwesintu kukho ukuwa, nasezonweni zomuntu ngamunye uma ephenduka.
Kodwa kwababi akayanga, futhi phakathi kwabangalungile nabangaphendukile ababezi ngcolisile bese senyameni, akakhulumanga kubo;
Nalabo abahlubukayo nabaphika ubufakazi nezexwayiso zabaphrofethi basendulo abazange bayibone inkazimulo yakhe, noma babubheke ubuso bakhe.
Lapho okwakukhona laba, kwakubusa ubumnyama, kodwa phakathi kwabalungileyo kwakukhona ukuthula;
Futhi abangcwele bakujabulela ukukhululwa kwabo, futhi bakhothama ngamadolo abo futhi bayemukela iNdodana kaNkulunkulu njengomHlengi nomKhululi wabo ekufeni nakuwo amaketango esihogo.
Ubuso babo bakhanya, futhi inkazimulo ngenxa yobukhona beNkosi yahlala phezu kwabo, futhi bacula amaculo okudumisa igama lakhe elingcwele.

Ngamangala, ngokuba ngangiqonda ukuthi umSindisi wachitha iminyaka emithathu ebufundisini bakhe phakathi kwamaJuda nalabo bendlu ka-Israyeli, ezama ukubafundisa ivangeli laphakade futhi ebabizela ekuphendukeni;

Kepha, nakuba enza imisebenzi yakhe emikhulu, nezimangaliso, nokumemezela iqiniso, nga mandla nangegunya, baba yingcosana abalalela izwi lakhe, futhi bajabula ngobukhona bakhe, futhi bemukela insindiso ezandleni zakhe.
Kodwa ubufundisi bakhe phakathi kwalabo ababefile kwaba yisikhathi esincane phakathi kokubethelwa nokuvuka kwakhe;

Futhi ngamangala ngamazwi kaPetru—lapho ethi iNdodana kaNkulunkulu yashumayela emimoyeni eyayisekuboshweni, ngesinye isikhathi ababekade bangalaleli, ngesikhathi ukubekezela kukaNkulunkulu kwakubalindile ezinsukwini zikaNowa—futhi nokuthi kwenzeka kanjani ukuba ashumayele kuleyo mimoya futhi enze nemisebenzi efanele phakathi kwabo ngesikhathi esincane kangaka.
Futhi ngesikhathi ngisamangele, amehlo ami avuleka, futhi nokuqonda kwami kwandiswa, futhi ngaqonda ukuthi iNkosi ayiyanga yona uqobo phakathi kwababi nabalenqaba iqiniso, ukuyobafundisa;

Kodwa bheka, phakathi kwabalungileyo, wamisa amabutho akhe futhi wabeka izithunywa, ezembathiswe ngamandla nangegunya, futhi wabathuma ukuba bahambise ukukhanya kwevangeli bakuyise kulabo ababe sebumnyameni, ngisho kuyo yonke imimoya yabantu; futhi lashunyayelwa kanjalo-ke ivangeli kwabafileyo.

Futhi izithunywa ezazikhethiwe zahamba ukuyomemezela usuku lomusa lweNkosi futhi nokumemezela ukukhululeka kweziboshwa ezaziboshiwe, ngisho nakubo bonke ababezophenduka ezonweni zabo futhi bemukele ivangeli.
Lashunyayelwa kanjalo-ke ivangeli kulabo aba befe besezonweni zabo, bengenalo ulwazi lweqiniso, noma beseziphambekweni, bebenqabile abaphrofethi.
Laba bafundiswa ukukholwa kuNkulunkulu, ukuphenduka ezonweni, ukubhabhadiswa ngokumelwa ukuze ku thethelelwe izono, isipho sikaMoya oNgcwele ngokubekwa izandla ekhanda,
Futhi nayo yonke eminye imigomo yevangeli okwakubalulekile ukuba bayazi ukuze balungele ukuba bahlulelwe ngokwabantu enyameni, kodwa baphile ngokukaNkulunkulu emoyeni.
Kwaziswa kanjalo-ke phakathi kwabafileyo, abancane nabakhulu, abangalungile nabathembekile, ukuthi ukuhlengwa kulethwe ngo mnikelo weNdodana kaNkulunkulu esiphambanweni.
Kwaziswa kanjalo-ke ukuthi umHlengi wethu wachitha isikhathi ehlezi isikhashana ezweni lemimoya, efundisa futhi elungiselela imimoya ethembekile yabaphrofethi ababefakaze ngaye bese senyameni;
Ukuba bahambise umlayezo wokuhlengwa kubo bonke abafileyo, ayengeke akwazi ukuya yena uqobo, ngenxa yo kuhlubuka neziphambeko zabo, ukuze nabo ngokusetshenzelwa yizinceku zakhe bawezwe amazwi akhe.
Phakathi kwabakhulu nabanamandla ababebuthene kulelibandla elikhulu labalungileyo kwakukhona uBaba u-Adamu, umDala weziNsuku nobaba wabo bonke,
Futhi noMama wethu ohlonishwa kakhulu u-Eva, nabaningi bamadodakazi akhe athembekileyo ayephila ngezikhathi ezedlule futhi ayekhonza uNkulunkulu weqiniso nophilayo.
U-Abela, umfelukholo wokuqala, wayelapho, nomfowabo uSeti, omunye wabanamandla, nowaye fana du noyise, u-Adamu.
UNowa, owanika isexwayiso sozamcolo; uShemi, umphristi omkhulu owaziwayo; u-Abrahama, ubaba wabathembekileyo; u-Isaka, uJakobe, noMose, umniki-mthetho omkhulu ka-Israyeli.

Futhi no-Isaya, owamemezela ngesiphrofetho ukuthi umHlengi wagcotshwa ukuze kuboshwe izinhliziyo ezidabukileyo, ukumemezela inkululeko kwaba boshiweyo, nokuvulwa kwe tilongo kulabo ababe boshiwe, nabo babekhona futhi.
Phezu kwalokho, u-Ezekeli, owakhonjiswa embonweni isigodi esikhulu samathambo omileyo, ayezombathiswa ngenyama, ukuze aphume futhi ekuvukeni kwabafileyo, sekungabantu abaphilayo.
UDaniyeli, owabona kungakenzeki futhi wabikezela ngokumiswa ko mbuso kaNkulunkulu ngezinsuku zokugcina, owawungeke futhi usabhujiswa noma unikwe abanye abantu.
U-Eliyasi, owayenoMose eNtabeni yo kuGuqulwa;

Futhi no Malaki, umphrofethi owafakaza ngokuza kuka-Eliya—uMoroni owakhuluma ngaye naye kumPhrofethi uJoseph Smith, ememezela ukuthi kufanele afike ngaphambi kokuqala ko suku olukhulu nolwesabekayo lweNkosi—nabo babelapho.
UmPhrofethi u-Eliya wayezotshala kuzo izinhliziyo zabantwana izethembiso ezenziwa koyise,

Okwandulela umsebenzi omkhulu okufanele wenziwe kuwo amathempeli eNkosi ngo hlelo lokwengamela lokugcwaliseka kwezikhathi, ukuze kuhlengwe abafileyo, futhi noku boshwa kwabantwana nabazali babo, funa umhlaba wonke ushaywe ngesiqalekiso futhi uchitheke ube yize ekuzeni kwakhe.
Bonke laba nabanye abaningi, ngisho na baphrofethi ababephakathi kwamaNefi futhi ababefakaza ngokuza kweNdodana kaNkulunkulu, babehlangene kulombuthano omkhulu futhi belindele ukukhululwa kwabo,
Ngokuba abafileyo babebuka ukungabi bikho isikhathi eside kwe mimoya yabo emizimbeni yabo njengoku thumbeka.
Laba iNkosi yabafundisa, futhi yabanika amandla okuvuka, emva kokuvuka kwakhe kwabafileyo, ukuba bangene embusweni kaYise, lapho ukuba baqheliswe ngo kungafi no kuphila okuphakade,
Futhi baqhubeke emisebenzini yabo kusuka ngaleso sikhathi njengoba babethenjiswe yiNkosi, futhi babe ngabahlanganyeli kuzo zonke izibusiso ezazigcinelwe labo abamthandayo.

UmPhrofethi uJoseph Smith, nobaba, uHyrum Smith, uBrigham Young, uJohn Taylor, uWilford Wooddruff, nemiye imimoya ekhethiweyo eyayi gcinelwe ukuba ize ekugcwalisekeni kwezikhathi ukuba nesandla ekubekweni kwe zisekelo zomsebenzi omkhulu wezinsuku zokugcina,
Okuhlanganisa nokwakhiwa kwamathempeli nokwenziwa kwezimiso kuwo ukuze kuhlengwe abafileyo, nabo futhi babesezweni lemimoya.
Ngabona ukuthi babephakathi kwalabo ababe nobuntu nabakhulu ababe khethiwe ekuqaleni ukuba babe ngababusi eBandleni likaNkulunkulu.

Ngisho bengakazalwa, bona, nabaningi abanye, bathola izifundo zabo zokuqala ezweni lemimoya futhi balungiselelwa ukuba beze nge sikhathi esifanele seNkosi ukuzosebenza kuso isivini sayo ukuze kusindiswe imiphefumulo yabantu.

Ngabona ukuthi amagosa athembekile alolu hlelo lokwengamela, uma ehamba emhlabeni, ayaqhubeka nemisebenzi yawo yokushunyayelwa kwevangeli lokuphenduka nokuhlengwa, ngomnikelo weNdodana eZelwe Yodwa kaNkulunkulu, phakathi kwalabo abase bumnyameni futhi bengaphansi kobugqili besono ezweni elikhulu lemimoya yabafileyo.
Abafileyo abaphendukayo bazo hlengwa, ngokuthobela izimiso zendlu kaNkulunkulu,
Futhi emva kokuba sebeyikhokhile inhlawulo yeziphambeko zabo, futhi ba hlanzwa baba msulwa, bayofumana umvuzo ngokwe misebenzi yabo, ngokuba bayizindlalifa zensindiso.
Wembulwa kanjalo-ke umbono wokuhlengwa kwabafileyo kimi, futhi ngiyafakaza, futhi ngiyazi ukuthi lombhalo uliqiniso, ngesibusiso seNkosi noNkulunkulu wethu, uJesu Kristu, ngisho kanjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/od/1.title: IZwi EliGunyaziwe 1
text: Kulowo Okungathintana Naye:

Imibiko yezindaba isithunyelwe ngezinhloso zezombusazwe, isuka eSalt Lake City, nesikhishwe, ibika ukuthi uMkhandlu wase-Utah, embikweni wawo osandakwenziwa oya kuNobhala wezangaPhakathi, othi imishado yesithembu isenziwa futhi nokuthi imishado enjalo engamashumi amane noma ngaphezulu amalungu ebandla angene kuyo e-Utah kusukela ngoJuni odlule noma ngonyaka odlule, futhi nokuthi ezintshumayelweni zasemphakathini abaholi beBandla bawufundisile, bawukhuthazile futhi bawushoshozela umkhuba wokuthathwa kwesithembu—

Ngakho-ke mina, njengoMongameli weBandla likaJesu Kristu labaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina, ngalesi simemezelo, ngesizotha esikhulu, ngimemezela ukuthi ngalesi simemezelo zingamanga. Asisifundisi isithembu noma imishado yokuganwa ngabafazi abaningi, futhi asivumeli umuntu ukuba enze lowomkhuba, futhi ngiyaphika ukuthi kukhona imishado yesithembu engamashumi amane noma eyasiphi esinye isibalo eyenziwe ngaleso sikhathi emaThempelini ethu noma kunoma iyiphi enye indawo kulesi siFunda.

Isehlakalo esisodwa sibikiwe, lapho labo abebebika bethi umshado wenzelwa eNdlini yeZipho zoMoya, eSalt Lake City, ngeNtwasahlobo ka1889, kodwa angikakwazi ukuthola ukuthi ubani owenza lomshado; noma yini eyenziwa kulesisehlaklo yenziwa ngaphandle kokwazi kwami. Ngenxa yalesi sehlakalo okuthiwa senzekile iNdlu yeZipho zoMoya, ngemiyalo yami, yabhidlizwa ngaphandle kokulibala.

Kangangoba imithetho isibekiwe yisiShayamthetho eyenqabela imishado yesithembu, leyo mithetho inkantolo yokugcina yezikhalo ethe ihambisana nomthetho-sisekelo, mina ngalesi simemezelo ngimemezela inhloso yami yokuthobela leyomthetho, futhi nokusebenzisa imfundiso yami kumalungu eBandla engiwengamele ukuba nawo enze okufanayo.

Akukho lutho ezimfundisweni zami eBandleni noma kulabo engisebenzisana nabo, kuleso sikhathi esibaluliwe, okukhombisa ukuthi siqhubekisa noma sikhuthaza isithembu; futhi uma kukhona iGosa leBandla elisebenzise ulimi oluzwakala lufundisa imfundiso enjalo, lisolwe ngokushesha. Manje phambi kwabantu bonke ngimemezela iseluleko sami kwabaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina sokuthi mabayeke imishado eyenqatshelwe wumthetho walelizwe.
uWilford Woodruff
UMongameli weBandla likaJesu Kristu labaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina.
UMongameli uLorenzo Snow wabeka lokhu okulandelayo:

“Ngiphakamisa ukuthi, ngokuba semukela uWilford Woodruff njengoMongameli weBandla likaJesu Kristu labaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina, futhi nokuyiyona yodwa indoda emhlabeni kulesi sikhathi samanje onezikhiye zezimiso zokubopha, simthatha njengogunyazwe ngokugcwele ngenxa yesikhundla sakhe ukukhipha lesi siMemezelo esesifundiwe ukuze sizwe, futhi nesosuku lomhlaka 24, Septemba, 1890, futhi nokuthi njengeBandla kuloMhlangano oMkhulu ohlangene, siyasemukela isimemezelo ngokuphathelene nemishado yesithembu njengesisemthethweni nesibophayo.”
ESalt Lake City, e-Utah, ngomhlaka 6 Oktoba 1890.

INkosi ngeke ingivumele mina noma iyiphi enye indoda eme njengoMongameli waleliBandla ukuba inihole ngokwedusa. Akukho ohlelweni. Akukho emqondweni kaNkulunkulu. Uma bengingakuzama lokho, iNkosi ibizongisusa endaweni yami, futhi izokwenza kanjalo kunoma iyiphi enye indoda ezama ukuhola yeduse abantwana babantu basuke ezambulweni zikaNkulunkulu futhi basuke nasemsebenzini wabo. (EMhlanganweni oMkhulu weNgxenye wonyaka wamaShumi ayisithupha nanye weBandla, ngoMsombuluko, ngomhlaka 6 Oktoba 1890, eSalt Lake City, e-Utah. Yabikwa kwiDeseret Evening News, yomhlaka 11 Oktoba 1890, ikhasi 2.)

Akusho lutho ukuthi ubani ophilayo noma ubani ofayo, noma ubani obizwe ukuhola leliBandla, kufanele balihole ngokushisekeliswa nguNkulunkulu uMninimandla Onke. Uma bengenzi ngaleyondlela, ngeke bakwenze kwakona. …
Ngibe nezambulo kulesi sikhathi esisanda kudlula, futhi ezibaluleke kakhulu kimi, futhi ngizonitshela ukuthi iNkosi itheni kimi. Ake nicabange ngalokhu okubizwa ngesimemezelo. …

INkosi ingitshele ukuba ngibabuze abaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina umbuzo, futhi ingitshele ukuthi uma bengalalela lokho engakusho kubo futhi baphendule umbuzo obuzwe kubo, ngoMoya nangamandla kaNkulunkulu, bonke bazophendula ngendlela efanayo, futhi bazokholwa bonke ngendlela efanayo ngokuphathelene naloludaba.

Umbuzo yilona: Iyiphi indlela enokuhlakanipha kakhulu okumele abaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina bayilandele—baqhubeke ukuzama ukwenza umkhuba wokuganwa yisithembu, nemithetho yezwe iphikisana nako nokuphikiswa yizigidi ezingamashumi ayisithupha zabantu, futhi nomphumela wokuthathwa nokulahleka kwawo wonke amaThempeli, futhi nokumiswa kwazo zonke izimiso ezikuwo, zabaphilayo nezabafileyo, futhi nokuboshwa kobuMongameli bokuQala nabayiShumi namBili nezinhloko zemindeni eBandleni, futhi nokuthathwa kwezimpahla zabantu (konke lokhu okungenza abangcwele bawuyeke lomkhuba); noma, emuva kokwenza lokho esikwenzile nokuzwa ubuhlungu balokho esikuzwile ngokubambelela kwethu kulomgomo ukuba siwuyeke lomkhuba futhi sithobele umthetho, futhi ngokwenzenjalo sivumele abaPhrofethi, abaPhostoli nobaba babe semakhaya, ukuze bakwazi ukufundisa abantu futhi benze imisebenzi yeBandla, futhi siphinde sivumele amaThempeli abe sezandleni zabaNgcwele, ukuze bakwazi ukwenza izimiso zeVangeli, zabaphilayo nezabafileyo na?

INkosi ingibonisile ngombono nangesambulo kahle hle ukuthi bekuzokwenzekani uma besingawumisi lomkhuba. Ukuba asiwumisanga, beningeke niwadinge … amadoda kulelithempeli laseLogan; ngokuba zonke izimiso bezizoyekwa kulo lonke izwe laseSiyoni. Ukudideka bekuzobusa kuwo wonke u-Israyeli, futhi amadoda amaningi abezoba yiziboshwa. Lenkathazo ibizokwehlela iBandla lonke, futhi besizophoqeka ukuwumisa lomkhuba. Manje, umbuzo yilona, ngabe kufanele umiswe ngalendlela, noma ngendlela iNkosi esambulele yona, futhi sivumele abaPhrofethi bethu nabaPhostoli nobaba ukuba babe ngamadoda akhululekile, futhi namathempeli esezandleni zabantu, ukuze abafileyo bakhululwe na? Isibalo esikhulu sesikhululiwe endlini yetilongo yilaba bantu ezweni lemimoya, futhi ingabe umsebenzi uzoqhubeka noma uzoma na? Yilona umbuzo engiwubeka phambi kwabaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina. Kufanele nizinqumele nina. Ngifuna niziphendulele nina lombuzo. Ngeke ngiwuphendule; kodwa ngithi kini yiso kanye lesisimo thina njengabantu ebesizokuba kuso ukuba asiyithathanga lendlela esiyithathile.

… Ngabona kahle hle ukuthi bekuzokwenzekani ukuba bekungenziwanga lutho. Sengibenawo lomoya kimi isikhathi eside. Kodwa ngifuna ukukusho lokhu: Bengizodedela amathempeli wonke aphume ezandleni zethu; bengizoya etilongweni mina uqobo, futhi nawo wonke amadoda abezoya lapho, ukuba uNkulunkulu wasezulwini ubengangiyalanga ukuba ngenze lokho engikwenzile; futhi kuthe uma sekufika ihora lapho ngiyalwe khona ukuba ngikwenze lokho kube sobala konke kimi. Ngaye phambi kweNkosi, futhi ngabhala lokho iNkosi engitshele ukuba ngikubhale. …

Nginishiya nalokhu, ukuze nizindle ngakho futhi nikucabange. INkosi isebenza ngathi. (UMhlangano wesiFunda saseCache, eLogan, e-Utah, ngosuku lwangeSonto ngomhlaka 1 Novemba 1891. Kwakubikwe kwiDeseret Weekly onke, ngomhlaka 14 Novemba 1891.)

Manje sengizonitshela okwembulwa kimi futhi nokwenziwa yiNdodana kaNkulunkulu kulento … Zonke lezi zinto bezizokwenzeka, njengoba uNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke ephila, ukuba leso siMemezelo asinikwanga. Ngakho-ke, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu ifise ukuba leyonto yethulwe eBandleni futhi nasemhlabeni ukuze ifeze izinhloso ezisemqondweni wayo. INkosi ibisikumemezelile ukumiswa kweSiyoni. Ibisikumemezelile ukuba kuqedelwe leli thempeli. Ubesekumemezelile ukuthi insindiso yabaphilayo nabafileyo kufanele inikwe kulezizigodi zezintaba. Futhi UNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke ukumemezelile ukuthi uDeveli akufanele akuvimbele lokho. Uma ningakuqonda lokho, lokho kuyisikhiye sezizathu zokunikwa kwalesi siMemezelo. (Kuthathwe enkulumweni yokwahlukaniselwa kwesithupha kweThempeli laseSalt Lake, ngo-Epreli 1893. Umbhalo olotshwe ngomshini wemiSebenzi yokwaHlukanisela, eNdlini yemiLando, kuMnyango wezemiLando yeBandla, eSalt Lake City, e-Utah.)

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/od/2.title: IZwi EliGunyaziwe 2
text: Kulowo Okungathintana Naye:

Ngomhlaka 30 Septemba 1978, eMhlanganweni oMkhulu weNgxenye yonyaka wekhulu namashumi amane nesishiyagalombili weBandla likaJesu Kristu labaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina, lokhu okulandelayo kwethulwa nguMongameli uN. Eldon Tanner, uMeluleki wokuQala kubuMongameli bokuQala beBandla:

Ekuqaleni kukaJuni walonyaka, ubuMongameli bokuQala bumemezele ukuthi uMongameli uSpencer W. Kimball uthole isambulo esinika ubuphristi nezibusiso zasethempelini kuwo wonke amalungu esilisa afanelekile eBandla. UMongameli uKimball ucelile ukuba ngazise lomhlangano ukuthi emuva kokuba esethole lesisambulo, ezise kuye emuva kokuzindla nokukhuleka ezindlini ezingcwele zethempeli elingcwele, usethule kubeluleki bakhe, abasemukele futhi basivuma. Sibe sesethulwa kuMgwamanda wabaPhostoli abayiShumi naMbili, abasemukele ngokuvumelana, futhi kamuva sethulwa kubo bonke abaneGunya eliKhulu eBandleni Lonke, nabo ngokunjalo basemukele ngokuvumelana.
UMongameli uKimball usecele ukuthi manje ngifunde lencwadi:
Ngomhlaka 8 Juni 1978
Kubo bonke abaphathi-zikhundla zabaphristi bomhlaba wonke nabezindawo beBandla likaJesu Kristu labaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina emhlabeni wonke:
Bazalwane abathandekayo:

Njengoba sizibonele ukukhula komsebenzi weNkosi emhlabeni, siyabonga ukuthi abantu bezizwe eziningi bazivumile izindaba zevangeli elibuyiselwe, futhi bazihlanganisa neBandla ngobuningi. Ngenxa yalokhu, ngokuholwa nguMoya sibe nesifiso sokunikeza noma yiliphi ilungu leBandla elifanelekile wonke amalungelo nezibusiso ezilethwa yivangeli.

Ngokwazi izethembiso ezenziwe ngabaphrofethi nomongameli beBandla abasandulele ukuthi ngesikhathi esithile, ohlelweni lukaNkulunkulu lwaphakade, bonke abafowethu abafanelekile bangabuthola ubuphristi, futhi ngokubona ukwethembeka kwalabo ubuphristi obebugodliwe kubo, sibancengele isikhathi eside futhi nangokushisekela, labafowethu abathembekileyo, sichitha amahora amaningi eGunjini eliPhezulu leThempeli sinxusa eNkosini ukuze sithole ukuholwa nguNkulunkulu.

Useyizwile imikhuleko yethu, futhi ngesambulo waqinisa ukuthi usuku olukade lwathenjiswa selufikile lapho wonke umuntu wesilisa othembekileyo, ofanelekile eBandleni angabuthola ubuphristi obungcwele, kanye namandla okusebenzisa igunya labo elivela kuNkulunkulu, nokuthokozela kanye nabathandiweyo bakhe zonke izibusiso eziphuma kubo, kanye nezibusiso zethempeli. Ngakho-ke, wonke amalungu esilisa afanelekile eBandla angagcotshelwa ebuphristini ngaphandle kokubheka ubuhlanga noma ibala. Abaholi bobuPhristi bayalwa ukuba balandele inqubo-mgomo yokubonana nokuxoxa nabo bonke abacatshangelwa ukugcotshelwa ebuPhristini buka-Aroni noma bukaMelkisedeki ukuqiniseka ukuthi bayayenelisa imigomo emisiweyo yokufaneleka.

Simemezela ngesizotha ukuthi iNkosi isiyazisile intando yayo ukuze kubusiswe bonke abantwana bayo emhlabeni wonke abazolalela izwi lezinceku zayo ezigunyaziwe, futhi balungiselele ukuthola izibusiso zonke zevangeli.
Yithi uqobo,
Spencer W. Kimball
N. Eldon Tanner
Marion G. Romney
UbuMongameli bokuQala

Ngokwamukela uSpencer W. Kimball njengomphrofethi, umboni, nomambuli, nanjengomongameli weBandla likaJesu Kristu labaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina, kuphakanyiswa ukuthi thina njengebandla elinamandla okwemukela nokushintsha imithetho semukele lesi sambulo njengezwi nentando yeNkosi. Bonke abavumayo sicela batshengise ngokuphakamisa izandla zabo zokunene. Uma ekhona ophikisayo atshengise ngophawu olufanayo.
Ukuvotela ukusekela lesi siphakamiso esichaziwe kwenziwa ngokuvumelana.
ESalt Lake City, e-Utah, ngomhlaka 30 Septemba 1978.
